column2: Iga nyigo marina ga waku wa Yesu Kristo awei o kyishari kya Dawidi na Abrahamu.
Abrahamu nalefee Isakyi, Isakyi kafee Yakobo; Yakobo kafee Yuda na wana wa wamae.
Yuda kafee Peresi na Sera ipfo ko Tamari; Peresi kafee Esiromu; Esiromu kafee Aramu.
Aramu kafee Aminadabu; Aminadabu kafee Nashon, Nashon kafee Salyimone.
Salyimone kafee Boasi ko Rahabu; Boasi kafee Obedi ko Ruti, Obedi kafee Yese.
Yese kafee Mangyi Dawidi.
Dawidi kafee Solomon ko mka ulya o Uria.
Solomon kafee Rehoboamu; Rehoboamu kafee Abiya; Abiya kafee Asa.
Asa kafee Yoshafati; Yoshafati kafee Yoramu; Yoramu kafee Usia.
Usia kafee Yotamu; Yotamu kafee Ahasi; Ahasi kafee Esekyia.
Esekyia kafee Manase; Manase kafee Amon; Amon kafee Yosia.
Yosia kafee Yekonia na wana wa wamae, kyiyeri kya wana wa Isiraelyi waleṙoo wusingyenyi kulya Babelyi.
Na numa ya wusamiṟo wulya wo Babelyi, Yekonia kafee Shealyitielyi; Shealyitielyi kafee Serubabelyi.
Serubabelyi kafee Abihudi; Abihudi kafee Elyiakyimu; Elyiakyimu kafee Asori.
Asori kafee Sadokyi; Sadokyi kafee Akyimu; Akyimu kafee Elyiudi.
Elyiudi kafee Elyieseri; Elyieseri kafee Matani; Matani kafee Yakobo.
Yakobo kafee Yosefu mii o Maria alefee Yesu elago Kristo.

Koikyo marika goose wookyia Abrahamu mṟasa Dawidi nyi ikumi na gaana. Na wookyia Dawidi mṟasa kyiyeri wana wa Isiraelyi waleṙoo wusingyenyi kulya Babelyi nyi marika ikumi na gaana. Na wookyia wusamiṟo wo Babelyi mṟasa Kristo nyi marika ikumi na gaana.
Yesu Kristo nalefeo kuṙi. Maria wamae kyiyeri aweṙuṙo nyi Yosefu, walandekooyane kyimmbiu nalewono ai mlemo kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele.
Na Yosefu, mii okye, kyipfa kya ilyi-indi awekyeri mndu msumganyi alakunde imsutsa, kaṙumbuo imṙa kui kyiṟika.

Kyasia-ng'u kyiyeri awekusaṟa isho, malaika o Mndumii kamchia ndoṙonyi, echigamba, “Yosefu, mana o Dawidi, ulaowuoe iṙuo Maria mka opfo, kyipfa ikyo kyikyimooge kokye nyi kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele.
Na oe nechienengo mana o womi, na iyoe nochimlaga Yesu, kyipfa, nyi oe echiwuta wandu wakye ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
Isho shoose shaṟundika kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi Mndumii kui ndumo ya moonguo shisuku echigamba,
‘Ambuya, mana mkyega nechiira mana,
na oe nechienengo mana o womi;
nawo wechimlaga Imanuelyi;
ikyo nyi kyimwi na igamba, Ruwa hamwi na soe.’ ”
Na Yosefu lyilya aleamka iwuka maṙoenyi, nalewuta chandu malaika o Mndumii alemmbia. Kaṙuo mka okye;
alakooyane na oe kyimmbiu maa lyimwi, mṟasa kyiyeri aleenengo mana okye; kamlaga Yesu.
Lyilya Yesu alefeo Betilehemu ya Uyuda, kacha kyiyeri kya mangyi Herode, wandu wawewoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri wa ura lo ngamenyi waleshika Yerusalemu, wechigamba,
“Nyi kwi ai ulya alefeo mangyi o Wayuda? Kyipfa lulewona nyenyeri yakye ura lo ngamenyi, na soe locha luchemuolokyia.”
Kyasia mangyi Herode amuicho isho, nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi, na wandu wa Yerusalemu taa hamwi na oe.
Kasania wang'anyi wa makohanyi woose na walosha wa mawawaso, kapfula mbonyi kowo, Kristo nafeo kwi?
Nawo wakammbia, “Kyiiṙi kya Betilehemu ya Uyuda; kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyiwekyiṟeie nyi moonguo shisuku:
‘Na iyoe Betilehemu, urukyenyi lo Yuda,
ukyeri mtutu wachilyinyi wa Yuda maa ale-pfo;
kyipfa kopfo nechiwuka mochilyia uruka,
echilyisa wandu wako Isiraelyi.’ ”
Numa Herode kalaga wandu walya wawoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri kawaṙa nawo kyisanzionyi kyiṟika kawawesa nyi indi nyenyeri-yo ilewoneka.
Kawaṙuo Betilehemu, kagamba, “Yendenyi mundewesa mnu mbonyi tsa mana; na mukommbona, ngyiendienyi mbonyi, kundu na inyi ngyindemwindia.”
Nawo waicho maṙeṙo ga mangyi, walewooka kyaro; na nyenyeri iya waleiwona ura lo ngamenyi ikawasongoya, mṟasa ikayenda ikagoṟoka wuye ya handu mana awekyeri.
Na lyilya walewona nyenyeri iya walewoṙo nyi sia ing'anyi mnu.
Wakaiṙa na numba, wakawona mana hamwi na Maria wamae, wakapfiria ndi wakamwindia; nawo wampfunguo mkunja yawo wakamwenengyia shindo sha woguru wung'anyi; sahapu na uvumba na manemane.
Nawo wammbawaso nyi Ruwa ndoṙonyi walawiyilyie Herode, wakayenda urukyenyi kowo kui njia ingyi.
Na iwo wamuyende, malaika o Mndumii nalecha na ko Yosefu ndoṙonyi kagamba, “Yenda, uṙuo mana na wamae, uṙiche na Misiri, ukae pfo mṟasa ngyikuwie; kyipfa Herode nakundi ipfula mana namrumatse.”
Kayenda kaṙuo mana na wamae kyio, kayenda Misiri,
kakaa pfo mṟasa Herode kapfa; kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi Mndumii kui ndumo ya moonguo shisuku, echigamba,
“Iwuka Misiri ngyilelaga mono-ko.”

Naaho-ng'u Herode, ammbone kye ammbutio shindo sha ngyeṟo nyi wandu walya wawoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri naleicho nyashi mnu, kaṙuma wandu wakawaaga wana woose wa kyisoṟo wawekyeri kulya Betilehemu na ipfo mṟasenyi koose, wookyia wawoṙe maka iwi na wanda ya iho, ko kyiyeri kyoose alekyimanya ko wandu walya wawoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri.
Naaho-ng'u kyileafukyia kyindo kyilegambo nyi moonguo shisuku Yeremia, echigamba,
“Ṟui lyileaṙanyio Rama,
wukyiwa, na ikapa ṟanyi lying'anyi,
Raheli echifiiṟia wana wakye,
alaiṙikyie iwiyiṟio moo,
kyipfa woose wawepfiie.”
Kyaindi kyiyeri Herode alepfa, malaika o Mndumii nalecha na ko Yosefu ndoṙonyi ipfo Misiri,
kagamba, “Amka, uṙuo mana na wamae uwuye na kulya urukyenyi lo Isiraelyi; kyipfa wampfa walya waweikundi iwaaga mana-cho.”
Kayenda kaṙuo mana na wamae, kashika uruka lo Isiraelyi.
Kyaindi amwicho kye Arikyelao nawoṙe wuchilyi ipfo Uyuda handu ha Herode awuye, naleowuo iyenda pfo; na oe ammbawaso ndoṙonyi kayenda ngyuura tsa Galyilaya.
Kakaa mṟinyi uwekyelago Nasareti; kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi weonguo shisuku: “Nechilago Mnasorayo.”
Mfiri iya Yohane Mpatisi naleyenda echionguo mbonyi ngyicha nukyenyi ya Uyuda, na igamba,
“Ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi; kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu womshika kufuhi.”
Cha kyipfa icho nyi oe alegambo nyi moonguo shisuku echigamba,
“Ṟui lya mndu aieṙia nuka,
ṟeyeṟenyi njia ya Mndumii,
goṟotsenyi kundu echiiṙia.”
Na Yohane naweṟee ikunya lya mapfukye ga ngamia na ukowa lo njonyi kyitsinyi kyakye; na kyelya kyakye nyi-we nzie na wukyi wo nguṙunyi.
Naaho-ng'u wandu wa Yerusalemu waleyenda kokye, na wa Uyuda koose, na wa ngyuuruka tsoose tsa mbai ya Yoridan;
na oe kawapatisa kulya mfonyi o Yoridan, wechitocha ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
Na lyilya alewona wafoi kyiiṙi kya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo wechicha na wupatisonyi wokye, nalewawia, “Nyoe maalea ga njoka, nyi wui alemwikyimbia nyoe iṙicha nyashi-yo iicha?
Kyasia kumbienyi ndunda tsiṙuṙanyi na iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.
Maa mulakusaṟe mrimenyi konyu kye, ‘Muwoṙe awu, nyi oe Abrahamu; kyipfa ngammbia kye Ruwa neiṙima kyiiṙi kya magoe-ga iiria Abrahamu wana.’
Na soka lyammbikyio matsindenyi ga mashiṙi; kyasia orio ikyiṙi lyilekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha lyekyemanyo na iwiyitso moṙonyi.

Ny'kyaloi inyi ngyimpatisa kui mṟinga kyipfa kya iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi; kyaindi ulya aicha numa yako nawoṙe pfinya kuta inyi, ngyiwaṟi maa iira shiaṙu shakye-pfo; oe nechimpatisa kui Mumuyo Mweele na kui moṙo.
Indo lyakye lyeela shindo lyikyeri kuwokonyi kokye, na oe nechiaia muului oose handu hakye heelyia shindo; na isania nganu yakye kyikumbinyi, kyaindi muului nechiurumatsa moṙonyi ulekyeruma.”
Kyiyeri-kyo Yesu kacha awuka Galyilaya mṟasa Yoridan ko Yohane kundu napatiso.
Kyaindi Yohane katambagana imshingyia, echigamba, “Inyi ngyilangyie ipatiso nyi iyoe, na iyoe nuicha na koko?”
Yesu kagaluo kammbia, “Iṙikyia wulalu kuṙi; kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyiluwaṟi iafutsia wusumganyi woose.” Kyasia kamwiṙikyia.
Na Yesu ampatiso cha ilyi kaṙo iwuka kulya mṟingyenyi; na mapuchi gakaseia, kawona Mumuyo o Ruwa echisokyia wuye yakye cha mbeta.
Na ṟui lyiwukyie ruwewu lyikagamba, “Ichu nyi Mana oko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyakye.”
Numa ya iho Yesu kaṙoo nyi Mumuyo kundu ko nuka, kundu nayesho nyi Mokyiriinzi.
Kakuretekyia mfiri makumi gaana kyio na kyingoto, mafurumionyi kawoṙo njaa.
Myeshi kacha na kokye kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mana o Ruwa, wia magoe-ga gawe mkate.”
Na oe kagaluo, kagamba, “Kyikyiṟeie, ‘Mndu echiwona moo kui mkate tikyi-pfo, kyaindi ko orio ṙeṙo Ruwa agamba.’ ”
Kyasia Mokyiriinzi kamṙuo mṟasa Yerusalemu, mṟi mweele, kammbikyia wuye ya uweri lo hekalu
kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi Mana o Ruwa kuwiyitse wanda; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie,
‘Nechikuṙumia malaika wakye;
na wechikuwaṙa mawokonyi gawo;
ulachekapa ṙende igoenyi.’ ”
Yesu kammbia, “Ngoseṟa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Ulayeshe Mndumii Ruwa opfo.’ ”
Numa ya iho Mokyiriinzi kamṙuo fumvunyi lyileshi mnu, kamloṟa ngyuuchilyi tsoose tsa wuyana, na wung'anyi wotso,
kammbia, “Ishi shoose ngyechikuenenga, kongyiindia.”
Naaho-ng'u Yesu alemmbia, “Wuka iha, Satana, kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘India Mndumii Ruwa opfo, umterewe oe amonyi.’ ”
Numa ya iho Mokyiriinzi kamleka; na malaika wakacha wakamtarama.
Yesu amwicho kye Yohane Mpatisi nampfungye, naleyenda mṟasa Galyilaya.
Kawuka Nasareti, kacha kakaa Kaperinaumu, mṟi ukyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi, mṟasenyi o Sabulon na Naftalyi;
kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, echigamba,
“Uruka lo Sabulon na uruka lo Naftalyi,
ṟuko lya ipalyipalyi, molyolya o Yoridan,
Galyilaya ya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
Wandu walya wakyeri meemenyi
wammbona saa ing'anyi,
na walya wakyeri urukyenyi lo kyirinje kya upfu,
ngyeela yammboneka kowo.”
Wookyia kyiyeri-kyo Yesu nalewooka ionguo mbonyi ngyicha, na igamba, “Ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu womtikyira kufuhi.”

Na oe kyiyeri aweichumia mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, nalewona wana wa mka wawi, Simion ekyelago Petiro na Anderea mono-wamae wechiwiyitsa ndusu tseṙeia makunga ipalyipalyinyi; kyipfa wawekyeri wandu wekyeṙega makunga.
Kawawia, “Ngyioshenyi, na inyi ngyechimugaluo muwe wandu wekyeṙega wandu.”
Cha ilyi wakaṙa ndusu tsilya tsawo tseṙega makunga, wakamwosha.
Kaengyeṟa ichumia, kawona wana wengyi wa mka wawi, Yakobo mana o Sebedayo, na Yohane mono-wamae, wakyeri ngalawenyi hamwi na Sebedayo awu-yawo, wechiachikyia ndusu tsawo tseṙega makunga; kawalaga.
Cha ilyi wakaṙa ngalawa iya yawo na awu-yawo wakamwosha.
Na oe nawetenga-tenga urukyenyi lo Galyilaya loose, echilosha masinagoginyi gawo na ilosha Mbonyi Ngyicha ya Wumangyi, na ikyiṟa ndoṟe na wufafa wo orio mbaṟe wandunyi.

Na mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana urukyenyi lo Shamu loose; wakamwendie woose waweluoe, wawoṙo nyi orio ndoṟe na orio ilyiso wukyiwa, wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, na wekyeuma nguku, na wapfiie ngapfu ura lumwi; kawakyiṟa.
Na wuingyi wo wandu wukomwosha, iwookyia Galyilaya na Dekapolyi, na Yerusalemu na Uyuda, na molyolya o Yoridan.
Na oe kyiyeri alewona wuingyi wo wandu, naleṙo na fumvunyi; na amṙamie, wanalosho wakye walecha na kokye.
Kawooka iwalosha echigamba,
“Wagusu iwo wawoṙe wukyiwa wo mrima;
kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu nyi wowo.
Wagusu iwo wawasokyie nyi fowa;
kyipfa iwo wechiwiyiṟio moo.
Wagusu iwo wawoṙe wuhoo;
kyipfa iwo wechioṟa uruka.
Wagusu iwo wawoṙe njaa na nyoṙa ya wusumganyi;
kyipfa iwo wechiigutso.
Wagusu iwo wawoṙe isaṟia;
kyipfa iwo wechiwona isaṟia.
Wagusu iwo wawoṙe mrima mmbaṙami;
kyipfa iwo wechiwona Ruwa.
Wagusu iwo wekyeende ufoṟo;
kyipfa iwo wechilago wana wa Ruwa.
Wagusu iwo wechipfulutso nyashi kyipfa kya iwa wasumganyi;
kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu nyi wowo.
Wagusu nyoe ilyi wechimkapa kyipfa kya wusumganyi na impfulutsa nyashi na imuiria orio kyindo kyiwicho kui wongo, kyipfa kyako.
Chihiyonyi, na ikyesa; kyipfa wori wonyu nyi wung'anyi ruwewu. Kyipfa nyi wuṙo walepfulutsa nyashi weonguo shisuku walemusongoya nyoe.”
“Nyoe nyi munyu o wuyana. Kyaindi munyu ukyeri unyamaṟikyie owiko-kyi mṟasa uṙahie? Ochiwaṙa-se kyiira maa ale-pfo, sile iwiyitso nja na ichumo-chumo nyi wandu.
Nyoe nyi saa ya wuyana. Mṟi oiṙima ikuṟiika ukyeri wuye ya fumvu-pfo.
Maa wandu wekyekoṟa taa na iiwikyia handu hakuṟiikyie-pfo, kyaindi handu hakuirie; nayo ikalyimikyia woose wakyeri numba.
Na wuṙo ngyeela yanyu ilyimikye mbele ya wandu, waiṙime iwona mawuto ganyu mecha, waṟumishe Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu.”
“Mulakusaṟe kye ngyilecha iilacha mawawaso na shilya weonguo shisuku wagambie. Ote. Ngyilecha iilacha-pfo, kyaindi iichuṟia.
Kyipfa, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mṟasa kyiyeri ruwewu na uruka shechiwuka ho, maa kyindo kyitung'tu kya mawawaso kyechiwuka ho-pfo, mṟasa shoose shiafukyie.

Kyasia mndu oose echinyamaṟa iwawaso lyimwi kyiiṙi kya iga gai matutu, na ilosha wandu kuṙo, nechilago mtutu kuta woose Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu; kyaindi mndu echigaosha na igalosha, icho nechilago ang'anyi Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu.
Kyipfa ngammbia-kye wusumganyi wonyu wulandeng'anie wulya wo walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, mochiiṙa maa ale na Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu-pfo.”
“Mulemuicho chandu wandu wa kacha walewio ulawaage; na mndu kawaaga kyimmbaṟi ianduyo.
Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, orio mndu mokapo nyi nyashi kyipfa kya mono-wamae kyimmbaṟi ianduyo. Na mndu molahia mono-wamae, kyimmbaṟi iṙeṙio moondu. Na mndu kamlaga tondo, kyimmbaṟi ngyehena ya moṙo.
Kyasia koende kyiano kyapfo na mbele ya Ruwa, na kunu kokumbuo kye mono-womoo nawoṙe ṙeṙo na iyoe,
ṙa kyiano-kyo kyapfo mbele ya Ruwa, uyende, uachikyie kuwooka mbonyi tsapfo na mono-womoo, numa uwuye uenengyie kyiano kyapfo.

Achikyia iwinyi mbonyi tsapfo na ulya uwoṙe na oe moondu kyiyeri uṙuṙanyi na oe njienyi; ulya uwoṙe na oe moondu alachekuṙuo ko moṙumbuo moondu, na moṙumbuo moondu kakuṙuo ko asikari, kowiyitso kyipfungonyi.
Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, ochiwuka pfo maa ale-pfo mṟasa umarise itaa helo iya ya mafurumionyi.”
“Muleicho kye kyikyigambe, ulaṟuguye maa ulaṟuguyo.
Kyaindi inyi ngammbia orio mndu aambuya mndu mka kui imlanga, amumṟuguya ipfo mrimenyi kokye.
Riso lyapfo lya kulyoe lyikakutewe, lyikuluoe ulyiwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe; kyipfa kyikuwaṟi kyoonyi kyapfo kyimwi kyiṙekye kundu mmbiu opfo oose ulawiyitso ngyehenenyi.
Na kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe kukokutewe, ṙumbuo kuwoko-ko uwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe. Kyipfa kyikuwaṟi kyoonyi kyapfo kyimwi kyiṙekye, kundu mmbiu opfo oose ulawiyitso ngyehenenyi.”
“Kyiwekyiṙeṙe taa, mndu kaṙa mka okye, namwenengye kyiṟeio kyelekana na oe.
Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, orio mndu aṙa mka okye, sile ko mbonyi tsa wuṟui, namgaluo mṟui; na mndu kaalyika ulya aṙio naṟuguya.”
“Ngoseṟa mulemuicho chandu wandu wa kacha walewio, ulalye nyamu kui rina lya Ruwa, kyaindi afutsia nyamu tsapfo ko Mndumii.
Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, molalye nyamu maa ale; maa kui ruwewu, kyipfa ikyo nyi kyiṙi kya Ruwa kya wuchilyi.
Maa kui uruka, kyipfa nyiho hewikyia maṙende gakye; maa kui Yerusalemu, kyipfa nyicho mṟi o mangyi ang'anyi.
Maa ulalye nyamu kui mṙoe opfo, kyipfa oiṙima igaluo uchui lumwi iwa uwiṟo ang'u njuu-pfo.
Kyaindi maṙeṙo ganyu gawe yee, yee; ote, ote; kyipfa gaelewetsie igo gawukyie ko ulya mmbicho.”
“Mulemuicho kye kyikyigambe, riso ko riso, na yego ko yego;
kyaindi inyi ngammbia, mulawingane na mndu mmbicho; kyaindi mndu akukapa nguchu ya ura lo kulyoe, mgalutsie na nguchu ya kawi.
Na mndu akundi ikulaga moondunyi na iṙuo iwale lyapfo, mṙeeye na ijoho taa.
Na mndu echikuitika uyende na oe mailyi imwi, yenda na oe tsiwi.
Akuterewa, mwenengye; na mndu akundi iakuo kopfo ulamwime.”
“Mulemuicho kye kyikyigambe, ukunde momṟasa opfo, na usuo mokyituwa opfo.
Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, kundenyi washituwa wanyu, terewienyi walya waimpfulutsa nyashi;
kundu muiṙime iwa wana wa Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu. Kyipfa oe nekyeenenga mmbaṟi okye wawicho na wecha, nekyeolotsia mvuo wasumganyi na walai wasumganyi.
Kyipfa mukokunda wamukundi nyoe tupu, mowona wori wuha? Maa wesania ukamba, wekyeṟunda isho isho-pfoe?
Ngoseṟa mukoiṟikyiṟa wana wa wamanyu tupu, moṟunda kyi kya ngoseṟa? Maa wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyewuta cha isho-pfoe?
Kyasia nyoe mochiwa wandu walawoṙe mti, chandu Awu-yonyu o ruwewu alawoṙe mti.”
“Mulaloṟe wucha wonyu mbele ya wandu, kundu wamuambuye. Kyipfa mukoṟunda muṙo, mowona wori ko Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu-pfo.
Kyasia kyiyeri-kyo uienengyia kyiano kyesaṟia molakushele, chandu wakulembecheṟi wekyewuta ipfo masinagoginyi na njienyi, kundu waṟumisho nyi wandu.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, wammbona wori wowo. Kyaindi kyiyeri iyoe uienengyia kyiano kyesaṟia, maa kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso kulamanye kyindo kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe kuiṟunda.
Kyiano kyapfo kyesaṟia kyiwe kui kyiṟika; na Awu-yopfo ulya ekyewona maa shilya shikuṟiikyie nechikuenenga iṟikoso.”
“Ngoseṟa kyiyeri muiterewa, mulawe cha wakulembecheṟi; kyipfa wo wakundi iterewa wagoṟokyi masinagoginyi na mbai ya njia, kundu wawono nyi wandu. Ny'kyaloi, ngyimmbia, wamuambilyia wori wowo.

Kyaindi iyoe kyiyeri-kyo uiterewa, iṙa na kyiṟinyi kyapfo uwiirie moongo, na komshinga moongo opfo, uterewe mbele ya Awu-yopfo akyeri handu hakuṟiikyie; na Awu-yopfo ekyewona maa shilya shikuṟiikyie nechikuenenga iṟikoso.
Na nyoe kyiyeri-kyo mukyeri kyiterewonyi, mulagambe shindo shifoi shilawoṙe kyiira, cha wandu walaichi Ruwa, kyipfa wo wekyekusaṟa kye wechiaṙanyio kyipfa kya maṙeṙo gawo iwa gafoi.
Kyasia mulawe cha iwo; kyipfa Awu-yonyu naichi shilya mukundi maa nyoe mulamterewa.
Kyasia nyoe terewenyi kuṙi,
‘Awu-yoṙu ukyeri ruwewu,
Rina lyapfo lyitano lyiele,
Wumangyi wopfo wuche,
kyindo ukundi kyiṟundikye,
iha wuyanenyi cha kulya ruwewu.
Uluenengye kando kaṙu inu.
Uluhooṟie maṙeko gaṙu,
chandu na soe lokyehooṟia walya wekyeluṙekyio.
Na ulaluṙuo kyiyeshionyi,
kyaindi ulukyiṟe ngyeṟo tsa ulya mmbicho.
[Cha kyipfa Wumangyi nyi wopfo, na pfinya, na mng'ano, mṟasa mlungana. Amen.’ ”]
“Cha kyipfa mukohooṟia wandu maṙeko gawo, na Awu-yonyu o ruwewu nechimuhooṟia nyoe.
Kyaindi mulandehooṟie wandu maṙeko gawo, maa Awu-yonyu echimuhooṟia nyoe maṙeko ganyu-pfo.”

“Ngoseṟa kyiyeri moṙumbuo ikuretekyia kundu muṟumishe Ruwa, mulawe cha wakulembecheṟi wawoṙe shaam shiwoṙe nzineeri. Kyipfa wekyenyamaṟa shaam shawo, kundu wawono nyi wandu kye wailya maa inyo-pfo. Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, wamuambilyia wori wowo.
Kyaindi iyoe kyiyeri okuretekyia, kushie mafuṙa mṙoenyi, usambe kyaam;
kundu ulawono nyi wandu kye nokuretekyia, sile nyi Awu-yopfo akyeri handu hakuṟiikyie, na Awu-yopfo ekyewona maa shilya shikuṟiikyie nechikuenenga iṟikoso.”
“Mulakoome shindo sha woguru kyipfa kyanyu iha wuyanenyi, handu mashinu na koṟa shekyenyamaṟa, na mbafu tsekyefunja na iiwa.
Kyaindi koomenyi shindo sha woguru kyipfa kyanyu ruwewu, kulekyenyamaṟika kyindo kyipfa kya mashinu maa koṟa, maa mbafu tsilekyefunja na iiwa.
Kyipfa handu kyindo kyapfo kya woguru kyikyeri na ho-ndu na mrima opfo ochikaa.”
“Taa ya mmbiu nyi riso. Kyasia riso lyapfo lyechiṟunda necha mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa ngyeela.
Kyaindi riso lyapfo lyikanyamaṟika, mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa meema. Kyasia ngyeela iya ikyeri kopfo ikawa meema; nyi meema ung'anyi mnu!”
“Kuwoṙe mndu echiiṙima iṟundia wandumii wawi-pfo; cha kyipfa nechisuo ichu, na ikunda ichu; ang'u nechikuwaṙa na ichu na imina ichu. Moiṙima iṟundia Ruwa na masaa-pfo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, mulawinie moo yanyu, mulye kyi ang'u munyo kyi; maa mmbiu yanyu muṟaae kyi. Moo chi ngoseṟa ya kyelya, na mmbiu chi ngoseṟa ya kyindo kyeṟaa?

Ambuyenyi shileye sha ngyinenyi kye shekyeṙonga-pfo, maa shekyesambuo-pfo, maa shekyesania kyikumbinyi-pfo; na awu-yonyu o ruwewu nekyeshiembeṟa shoose. Nyoe muwoṙe woguru wung'anyi kuta shileye-sho-pfoe?
Nyi wui konyu maa kakuwinisha eiṙima iengyeṟa maa ale mfiri yakye ya iha wuyanenyi?
Kyatarama kyi iwinia shindo sheṟaa? Kusaṟenyi kya shiwaṟo sha maṙemenyi, chandu shekyeṙo. Shekyeṟunda-pfo, maa shekyeoka-pfo.
Na inyi ngammbia kye maa Solomon mng'anonyi okye oose aleṟiko necha cha shiwaṟo-shi pfo.
Kyasia, kokooya Ruwa nekyeṟika kuṙo melyi tsa maṟa gai ho inu na ngama gakawiyitso moṙonyi, ngyesa echimṟika nyoe lya ngoseṟa, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyifofo-pfoe?
Kyasia mulakuwinishe, mochigamba, lulye kyi, ang'u lunyo kyi, ang'u lpṟaae kyi?
Cha kyipfa isho shoose wandu walaṙikyie Ruwa wekyeshipfula. Na awu-yonyu o ruwewu naichi kye mukundi isho shoose.
Kyaindi pfulenyi kuwooka Wumangyi wokye, na wusumganyi wokye; na isho shoose mochiengyeṟio.
Kyasia mulakuwinishe na sha ngama; kyipfa ngama yekuwinia imonyi. Kyishikyie ikuwinisha orio mfiri na ngyuukyiwa tsa mfiri-cho.”
“Mulaanduye, mulacheanduyo nyoe.
Kyipfa chandu muianduya wengyi na wuṙo mochianduyo. Na kyiyeṟo kyilya mueṟa nakyo mochiyeṟio.
Kyasia, ny'kyilyi uiambuya kyiunana kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo, na mriti-cho ukyeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo ulauambuye?
Ang'u nowia kuṙa mono-womoo, ‘Ngyileka ngyiwute kyiunana ipfo risonyi lyapfo,’ na kunu kuwoṙe mriti ipfo risonyi lyapfo?
Iyoe mkulembecheṟi, wuta kuwooka mriti-cho ipfo risonyi lyapfo; naaho-ng'u ochiwona necha iwuta kyiunana kyilya kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo.
Mulaenengye shite kyilya kyikyeri kyiele. Maa mulawiyitse lulu tsanyu mbele ya nguwe. Tsilachetsichuma-chuma, tsikagaluka na imtafuo-tafuo.”
“Terewenyi na nyoe mochienengo. Pfulenyi, na nyoe mochiwona. Kape-kapenyi moongo na nyoe mochipfunguyo.
Kyipfa orio moterewa nekyeambilyia; na ulya mopfula nekyewona; na ulya mokapa-kapa moongo nechipfunguyo moongo.
Ang'u kuwoṙe mndu uha konyu, mono-kye kamterewa mkate, echimwenenga igoe?
Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, echimwenenga njoka?
Kyasia kokooya nyoe, mui wawicho, muichi ienenga wana wanyu shienengo shicha, ngyesa chi ngoseṟa mnu Awu onyu akyeri ruwewu echienenga mecha walya wekyemterewa-pfoe?
Kyasia shoose mukundi muṟundio nyi wandu, na nyoe waṟundienyi kuṙo. Kyipfa iga nyigo mawawaso na malosho ga weonguo shisuku.”
“Iṙenyi na numba kui moongo ulya msuse. Kyipfa moongo nyi umlandari, na njia iyendie wuṙetsinyi nyi ingyilandari, na nyi wafoi wekyeiṙa na numba kui moongo-cho.
Kyaindi moongo nyi umsuse, na njia iyendie moonyi o mlungana nyi ingyisuse, na wekyeiwona nyi sa waangu.”
“Kushowenyi na weonguo shisuku wa wongo, wandu wekyecha na konyu wakyeri cha moondo, kyaindi ipfo mrimenyi kowo nyi shisii shilang'a.
Mochiwamanya kui ndunda tsawo. Ngyesa wandu wekyehaa sabibu mshenyi, ang'u ndunda ngyicha tseloṙa nduonyi?
Na wuṙo orio ikyiṙi lyicha lyekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha; na ikyiṙi lyiwicho lykyekumbia ndunda ngyiwicho.
Ikyiṙi lyicha lyeiṙima ikumbia ndunda ngyiwicho maa ikyiṙi lyiwicho ndunda ngyicha-pfo.
Orio ikyiṙi lyilekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha lyekyemanyo na iwiyitso moṙonyi.
Kyasia na wuṙo kyikyeri kui ndunda tsawo mochiwamanya.”
“Chi orio mndu ekyengyiwia, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii’ echiiṙa na ipfo Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu-pfo; sile ulya ekyeosha shilya Awu oko akyeri ruwewu akundi.
Wafoi wechingyiwia mfiri ulya, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii, luleonguo shisuku kui rina lyapfo, na kui rina lyapfo iwuta waṟufui wawicho, na kui rina lyapfo iwuta shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho?’
Naaho-ng'u ngyechiwawia na pata, ‘Ngyimuichi nyoe maa ale-pfo. Wukyenyi koko, nyoe mokyeṟunda mawicho.’ ”
“Kyasia orio mndu ekyeicho maṙeṙo-ga gako na igaosha, nechiwa cha mndu awoṙe wuṟango, alewika numba yakye wuye ya iṟaṟa.
Mvuo ikakapa, mra ung'anyi ukocha, shiwiṟi shikakuma, shikakapa numba iya, ilaolokye; kyipfa ingyiyekyie wuye ya iṟaṟa.
Na orio mndu echiicho maṙeṙo gako alagaoshe, nechiwa cha mndu mtondo, alewika numba yakye wuye ya mlelya;
mvuo ikakapa, mra ung'anyi ukocha, shiwiṟi shikakuma, shikakapa numba iya, ikaoloka, na ioloka lyayo lyikawa lying'anyi.”
Na lyilya Yesu alemarisa igamba kuṙo, wuingyi wo wandu wuleṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya malosho gakye.
Cha kyipfa naweiwalosha cha mndu awoṙe wuchilyi, maa chi cha walya wawekyelosha mawawaso-pfo.
Na oe kyiyeri alesoka kulya fumvunyi, wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wulemwosha.
Kukocha mndu awoṙo nyi ndoṟe ya taambo kamwindia echigamba, “Mndumii, kokunda, noiṙima ingyiyeṟemtsa.”
Yesu kagoṟuo kuwoko kampaaya, echigamba, “Ngyikundi; yeṟemka.” Na cha ilyi ndoṟe yakye ya taambo ikammbuka.
Yesu kammbia. “Ulawie mndu; kyaindi yenda, undekuloṟa ko mkohanyi, undeenengyia kyiano chandu Mose alegamba, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
Na kyiyeri aleiṙa na Kaperinaumu mchilyi umwi mtutu nalecha na kokye.
Kamterewa, echigamba, “Mndumii, mṟundi oko nalee kanyi, nawoṙo nyi ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi, naiwawio mnu.”
Yesu kammbia, “Ngyeecha, ngyimkyiṟe.”
Mchilyi ulya kamgaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, inyi ngyiwaṟi iyoe uiṙe na numba koko-pfo; kyaindi gamba ṙeṙo lyimwi tikyi, na mṟundi oko nechichia.
Cha kyipfa inyi nyi mndu ngyiwoṙe wuchilyi, ngyiwoṙe asikari wanda yako; ngawia ichu, ‘yenda’ nekyeyenda; na ichu, ‘nnjo’ nekyecha; na kyisinga kyako, ‘wuta kuṙi’, kyekyewuta.”
Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho isho, naleṟiyio, kawia walya waweimwosha, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ngyilandewone iiṙikyia lying'anyi kuṙi, ko mndu oose kunu Isiraelyi-pfo.
Na inyi ngammbia, kye wafoi wechicha iwuka ura lo ngamenyi na ura lo kyukonyi, nawo wechiṙamia hamwi na Abrahamu, na Isakyi, na Yakobo Wumangyinyi wo Ruwewu;
kyaindi wana wa Wumangyi wechiwiyitso meemenyi o nja. Nyipfo kochiwaṙa ṟanyi na ilya ngakuru.”
Na Yesu kawia mchilyi ulya, “Yenda; kyiwe kopfo chandu oiṙikyia.” Mṟundi ulya okye kachia saa iya iya.
Kyiyeri Yesu aleshika kanyi ko Petiro, kawona mamka o Petiro, alee kyitaṟenyi nawoṙo nyi isemu.
Kampaaya kuwoko, isemu lyikamleka; na oe kafuma kawaṟundia.
Na lyilya kuleila, wakamwendie wandu wafoi wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho; kawuta waṟufui wawicho kui ṙeṙo lyakye, kakyiṟa woose walawekuiṙima,
kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya kyikyigambe nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, echigamba,
“Oe amonyi naleṙuo wufafa woṙu,
na iṙuo ndoṟe tsaṙu.”
Na kyiyeri Yesu alewona wuigyi wufoi wo wandu wochimtengyetia, nalewia wanalosho wakye handu hamwi na oe wayende molyolya.
Mlosha umwi o mawawaso kayenda kokye, kammbia, “Mlosha, ngyekuosha orio handu ochiyenda.”
Yesu kammbia, “Mapaara gawoṙe mṟeshe, na shileye sha ngyinenyi shiwoṙe singyi kyaindi Mono-Adamu awoṙe handu heonyonyia-pfo.”
Ungyi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyienenga momu kuwooka, ngyiyende ngyindeṟika awu-yoko.”
Kyaindi Yesu kammbia, “Ngyiosha; leka wapfu waṟikye wapfu wawo.”
Kaṙooya ngalawenyi, wanalosho wakye wakamwosha.
Kukowaṙa shiwiṟi shing'anyi kulya ipalyipalyinyi; shiwiṟi-sho shikakapa ngalawa iya ikashikyio nyi mṟinga, na oe nawelee maṙoe.
Wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye, wakamwamtsa, wechigamba, “Mndumii, luletse, luisia.”
Kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi mowa waowu, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyiangu?” Cha ilyi kafuma, kaṙeṙia shiwiṟi na ipalyipalyi; kukotsia sau.
Wandu walya wakaṟiyio, wechigamba, “Ichu nyi mndu o mbaṟe iha maa shiwiṟi sha ipalyipalyinyi shiosha kyilya aigamba?”
Na oe kyiyeri aleshika molyolya, urukyenyi lo Wakyerasi, wandu wawi wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho walekarisana na oe, wawukyie handu heṟika wandu, walang'a mnu, maa mndu alaiṙime iiṙa njia iya.
Wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Luwoṙe kyikyi na iyoe, Mana o Ruwa? Ngyesa nocha ichelutuura kyiyeri kyaṙu kyilashika?”
Kyasia, kuleshi nawo kuwewoṙe poo lya nguwe tsifoi tsechilya.
Waṟufui walya wawicho wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Koluwuta, luṙe luyende, lundeiṙa na kulya poonyi lya nguwe.”
Kawawia, “Yendenyi.” Wakawuka, wakaiṙa na kulya mmbiunyi ya nguwe; na poo lyilya lyoose lyikasoka halya kyiiṟimikonyi lyeṙicha mṟasa ipalyipalyinyi, lyikapfiia mṟingyenyi.
Kyaindi walya wawelyisa nguwe-tso waleṙicha, wakayenda mṟinyi, wakaonguo mbonyi-tso kundu koose, na mbonyi tsa walya wawewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho taa.
Wandu woose wa mṟi ulya wakafuma indeambilyia Yesu; nawo lyilya walemmbona, walemterewa nawukye mṟasenyi kowo.
Kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kaambaṙa, kashika mṟinyi kowo.

Wandu wakamwendie mndu awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi, alee kyitaṟenyi, na Yesu kyiyeri alewona iiṙikyia lyawo, nalewia ulya awoṙe ndoṟe-yo, “Kuwanze lying'anyi mrimenyi, mono-ko; omhooṟio maṙeko gapfo.”
Na numa ya iho walosha waata wa mawawaso wakagamba mrimenyi kowo, “Ichu nailahia Ruwa kyipfa naikuloṟa cha ilyi oe nyi Ruwa.”
Na Yesu, aichi makusaṟo gawo, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi mukusaṟa shiwicho mrimenyi konyu?
Kyipfa nyi kyiha kyii kyaangu, nyi igamba, ‘Omhooṟio maṙeko gapfo,’ ang'u nyi igamba, ‘Amka, uyende?’
Kyaindi muiṙime imanya kye Mono-Adamu nawoṙe wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo hooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi, (Nawia ulya awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi,) ‘Amka, ukuṙikye kyitaṟa kyapfo uyende kanyi kopfo.’ ”
Kaamka, kayenda kanyi kokye.
Kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wulemmbona, walewoṙo nyi wuowu, wakang'anyisa Ruwa, aleenenga wandu wuchilyi wo mbaṟe-i.
Na Yesu kyiyeri aweiṙa awuka pfo nalewona mndu aṙamie handu hesania ukamba mbai ya ipalyipalyi ekyelago Matayo, kammbia, “Ngyiosha.” Kaamka kamwosha.
Na kyiyeri aleṙamia kanyi nalye kyelya, wesania ukamba wafoi na wanyamaṟi walecha wakaṙamia handu hamwi na Yesu na wanalosho wakye.
Kyiyeri Mafarisayo walewona, walewia wanalosho wakye, “Ny'kyilyi mlosha onyu ailya handu hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi?”
Na oe kyiyeri aleicho, nalewawia, “Walya walaluoe wekyepfula mwaanga-pfo, sile walya waluoe.
Kyaindi yendenyi, mundekulosha kyitambuluo kya maṙeṙo-ga. ‘Ngyikundi isaṟia, maa chi shienengo-pfo’, kyipfa ngyilecha ilaga walya wasumganyi-pfo kyaindi wanyamaṟi.”
Kyiyeri kyilya wanalosho wa Yohane wakayenda kokye wakagamba, “Ny'kyilyi soe na Mafarisayo lokyekuretekyia kyaindi wanalosho wapfo wekyewuta kuṙo-pfo?”
Yesu kawawia, “Wawalage wolyinyi weiṙima kuṙa ikapa ṟanyi kyiyeri monyi wolyi akyeri handu hamwi nawo? Kyaindi kochicha mfiri monyi wolyi echiwuto kowo, nyilyo wechikuretekyia.
Kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika kyiṙami kya nguwo ngyihya nguwonyi ngyiku-pfo. Kyipfa ikyo kyihya kyewuta ho ikyo kyiku na handu halya harandukyie hekyeengyeṟa ing'ana.

Na wandu wekyewika mpfinyo mhya maselelenyi maku-pfo. Na wakawika pfo, maselela-go gekyepaṟika; mpfinyo ukopusuka, na maselela gakanyamaṟika. Kyaindi wekyewika mpfinyo maselelenyi mahya, shikakyia shoose.”
Kyiyeri aweiwawia isho, kukocha mchilyi umwi, kamwindia, echigamba, “Mono-ko o kyika napfa wulalu kuṙi; kyaindi nnjo, uwikyie kuwoko kopfo wuye yakye, na oe nechiwaṙa moo.”
Yesu kaamka, kamwosha, hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
Na mndu mka awewoṙe ndoṟe yechoṟa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na iwi, kacha kyanuma kokye, kapaaya ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye.
Kyipfa nalegamba mrimenyi kokye: Ngapaaya ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye tikyi ngyechichia.
Yesu kagaluka kammbona, kammbia, “Kuwanze mnu mrimenyi, mono-ko; iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa.” Mndu mka ulya kachia saa iya.
Kyiyeri Yesu aleshika kanyi ko mchilyi ulya, nalewona wekapa mtoṟiṟo, na wuingyi wo wandu wochikapa ṟanyi.
Kawawia, “Wukyenyi iha, kyipfa manakye-chu apfiie-pfo, nalee tikyi.” Wakamsaaṟa mnu.
Kyaindi wuingyi wo wandu wommbuto ho, naleiṙa na numba, kammbaṙa kuwoko; manakye ulya kagoṟoka.
Mbonyi-tsi tsikaṙunganana uruka lulya loose.
Kyiyeri Yesu aweiṙa iwuka pfo, shipfupfuṟe shiwi shikamwosha, shikakuilenga, shechigamba, “Ulusaṟie, Mono-Dawidi.”
Na oe kyiyeri aleshika kanyi, shipfupfuṟe shilya shileyenda kokye na oe kashiwia, “Muiṙikyie kye ngyeiṙima iṟunda ikyi?” Shikammbia, “Yee, Mndumii.”
Naaho-ng'u kashipaaya meso, kagamba, “Kui kyiyeṟo kya iiṙikyia lyanyu wonenyi.”
Meso gasho gakatambaṟuka. Na Yesu kashiwia ko pfinya, echigamba, “Ambuyenyi maa mndu alamanye.”
Kyaindi shikafuma, shikaonguo mbonyi tsakye kulya urukyenyi koose.
Nawo kyiyeri waweiyenda, wakamwendie mndu ai ndiṟi awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.
Na kyiyeri mṟufui ulya mmbicho alewuto, ulya awei ndiṟi naleṙeṙa, wuingyi wo wandu wakaṟiyio, wakagamba, “Kyilandewonekye kunu Isiraelyi kyiyeri kyoose-pfo.”
Kyaindi Mafarisayo wakagamba, “Kui pfinya tsa ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho naiwuta waṟufui wawicho.”
Na Yesu naweitenga-tenga kyiiṙi kya mṟi yoose na shikaṟo, echilosha masinagoginyi gawo, ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Wumangyi; na ichihiṟa ndoṟe tsoose na wufafa wo orio mbaṟe.
Na kyiyeri alewona wuingyi wo wandu, nalewona wukyiwa mrimenyi kokye kyipfa wawewinie na inyanyaṟika cha moondo galawoṙe mlyisi.
Naaho-ng'u kawia wanalosho wakye, “Shilyimu nyi shifoi, kyaindi waṟundi nyi waangu.
Kyasia, terewenyi Monyi ṙema naṙikye waṟundi ṙemenyi lyakye.”
Kalaga wanalosho wakye ikumi na wawi, kawaenenga pfinya yechilyia waṟufui wawicho, wawawute, na iwuta ndoṟe tsoose na wufafa wo orio mbaṟe.
Na marina ga wasu-wo ikumi na wawi nyi iga. O kuwooka nyi Simion awekyelago Petiro, na Anderea mono-wamae; Yakobo o Sebedayo, na Yohane mono-wamae.
Filyipo, na Baritolomayo, Tomasi, na Matayo msani o ukamba; Yakobo mana o Alyifayo, na Tadayo.
Simion Mkananayo, na Yuda Isikariote, na oe nyi oe alemṟiinga.
Iwo ikumi na wawi Yesu nalewaṙuma, kawawia, “Ko walya walakyeri Wayuda mulayende, maa mulaiṙe na mṟinyi maa umwi o Wasamaria.
Nanga moyenda ko wandu wa Isiraelyi waṙekyie cha moondo.
Na ilyi moyenda, onguonyi mbonyi ngyicha, mochigamba, ‘Wumangyi wo Ruwewu womtikyira kufuhi.’
Kyiṟenyi waluoe, ṟutsenyi wapfu, yeṟemtsenyi wawoṙo nyi taambo, wutenyi waṟufui wawicho; muleenengo mulaitaa kyindo, enengyienyi mulaitoo kyindo.
Mulakuṙikye sahapu, maa heleri tsa orio mbaṟe mkunjenyi yanyu.
Maa mkunja o kyaro, maa mawale gawi, maa shiaṙu, maa upoi; kyipfa mṟundi nawaṟi kyelya kyakye.
Na orio mṟi na kyikaṟo mochiiṙa napfo, pfulenyi pfo mndu awoṙe kyienengo kyeambilyia wayenu; mkae kokye mṟasa ilyi mochiwuya na kanyi.
Na nyoe mukoiṙa na kanyi ko mndu-cho muiṟikyiṟenyi.
Na kokooya mndu-cho na walya wa kanyi kokye wawaṟi, ufoṟo lo Mndumii lukae nawo; indi kokooya walawaṟi, ufoṟo lo Mndumii lummbiyilyie nyoe.
Na mndu alandemuambilyie na iaṙanyia maṙeṙo ganyu, ilyi mowuka ipfo kokye, ang'u ipfo mṟinyi, kute-kutenyi kyilulyi ipfo maṙendenyi ganyu, iloṟa mowalega nakamwi.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, kyechiwa kyaangu uruka lo Sodoma na Gomora ihooṟio maṙeko mfiri ulya o ianduyo kuta mṟi-cho.”
“Inyi ngyimṙuma cha moondo ko shisii. Kyasia waṙenyi wuṟango cha njoka, na iwa wahoo cha mbuna.
Kuṟiisenyi na wandu cha kyipfa wechimṙuo mengyenyi, na masinagoginyi gawo wechimkapa.
Na nyoe wechimṙuo mbele ya wachilyi na wamangyi kyipfa kyako, iwa wuṟingyishi kowo na ko walya walai Wayuda.
Kyaindi iho-ndu wechimṙuo, mulakusaṟe-saṟe chandu mochiṙeṙa; kyipfa mochienengo saa-yo shilya mochiṙeṙa.
Kyipfa chi nyoe muiṙeṙa-pfo, indi nyi Mumuyo o Awu-yonyu aiṙeṙa kui maṙumbu ganyu.
Na mongari nechiṟiingyia mono-wamae kundu nawoogo, na awu nechiṟiingyia mana, na wana wechigaluka na iwaaga wafee wawo.
Na nyoe wandu woose wechimsuo kyipfa kya rina lyako; kyaindi ulya echikarishia mṟasa mafurumionyi nyi oe echikyia.
Kyaindi ilyi wechimfuna mṟinyi umwi, ṙichilyienyi mṟinyi ungyi. Cha kyipfa nyi loi ngammbia mochimarisa ionguo mbonyi mṟinyi ya Isiraelyi Mono-Adamu alacha-pfo.
Manalosho ekyeiṙa mlosha okye-pfo, na kyisinga kyekyeiṙa mndumii okyo-pfo.
Kyishikyie manalosho iwa cha mlosha okye, na kyisinga iwa cha mndumii okyo. Kokooya walelaga monyi kanyi Beelyisebulyi ngyesa chi ngoseṟa walya wai wa kanyi kokye-pfoe?”
“Kyasia, mulawaowuoe, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyishikyie maa kyikuṟiikyie kyilechimanyika-pfo.
Kyilya ngyimmbia nyoe meemenyi, kyigambenyi saenyi. Na kyilya moicho kui kyiṟika, kyionguonyi na pata.
Mulaowuoe iwo waiwaaga mmbiu, walaiṙime iwaaga na mrima. Nanga moowuo ulya echiiṙima irumatsa mmbiu na mrima taa ngyehenenyi.
Ngyesa, shileye shiwi shekyekumbo helo imwi-pfoe? Kyaindi maa kyimwi kyekyeṙeka Awu-yonyu alaichi-pfo.
Kyaindi nyoe maa njui tsa mṙoe yanyu tsingyitale tsoose.
Kyasia mulaowuoe, nanga nyoe kuta shileye shifoi.”
“Kyasia, orio mndu echingyiṟingyishia mbele ya wandu, na inyi ngyechimṟingyishia mbele ya Awu-yoko akyeri
Kyaindi orio mndu echingyikana mbele ya wandu, na inyi ngyechimkana mbele ya Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu.”
“Mulakusaṟe ngyilecha iende ufoṟo wuyanenyi. Ote! Ngyilecha iende ufoṟo-pfo, indi ushu.
Cha kyipfa ngyilecha iṟiingyia mndu na awuye, na mono-waka na wamae, na mndu na mamii okye.
Na washituwa wa mndu nyi walya wa kanyi kokye.
Akundi awuye ang'u wamae kuta inyi, angyiwaṟi-pfo, maa akundi mono-kyisoṟo ang'u mono-kyika kuta inyi, angyiwaṟi-pfo.
Maa mndu alechikuṙika msalaba okye kangyiosha, angyiwaṟi-pfo.
Mokyiṟa moo okye nechiuṙetsa; na mouṙetsa kyipfa kyako nechiukyiṟa.”
“Amuambilyia nyoe nangyiambilyia inyi, na oe angyiambilyia inyi, naambilyia ulya alengyiṙuma.
Moambilyia moonguo shisuku kyipfa oe nyi moonguo shisuku nawaṙilyia wori wo ionguo shisuku; na oe echiambilyia mndu msumganyi kyipfa oe nyi mndu msumganyi, nechiwaṙilyia wori wo mndu msumganyi.
Na orio mndu echirutsa umwi o iwa watutu mṟinga uichololyia, kyipfa nyi manalosho, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, wori wokye wochiṙeka maa ale-pfo.”
Na Yesu kyiyeri alemarisa iṙeṙa na wanalosho wakye ikumi na wawi, nalendelosha na ionguo mbonyi ngyicha mṟinyi yawo.
Na Yohane kyiyeri aleicho ipfo kyipfungonyi mawuto ga Kristo, naleṙuma wanalosho wakye, immbesa,
“Iyoe nyi ulya aicha, ang'u luweṙelyie ungyi?”
Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Yendenyi mundeongoya Yohane shilya mushiicho na ishiwona;
shipfupfuṟe shienengo iwona, shiwete shichumia, wawoṙo nyi taambo waiyeṟemtso, wapfu maṙwi waiicho, wapfu waiṟutso, na wakyiwa waiongoyo Mbonyi Ngyicha.
Agusu orio mndu alammbihie kyipfa kyako.”
Na wanalosho wa Yohane wamuyende, Yesu nalewooka iongoya wuingyi wo wandu mbonyi tsa Yohane. “Mulefuma iyenda nuka iambuya kyikyi? Unyatsi lochiṙeṙemsho nyi mkuma?
Kyaindi mulefuma indewona kyi? Mndu amṟikye nguwo tsa wusuṟi? Wandu waṟee nguwo tsa wusuṟi wakyeri numbenyi tsa kyimangyi.
Kyaindi kyitewe mukofuma nyi kyikyi? Nyi iwona moonguo shisuku? Yee loi, ngammbia, na akyeri ang'anyi kuta moonguo shisuku.
Ichu nyi oe shiṟeio shilegamba,
‘Inyi, ngyiṙuma mndu oko
mbele ya ushangu lopfo,
echisungusia njia yapfo.’ ”
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kulandewaṙe mndu kyiiṙi kya walya wawafee nyi waka akyeri ang'anyi kuta Yohane Mpatisi-pfo. Kyaindi akyeri mtutu Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu nyi nang'anyi kuta oe.
Wookyia kyiyeri kya Yohane Mpatisi mṟasa wulalu Wumangyi wo ruwewu wokyecha ko pfinya, na iwo wawoṙe pfinya waiwurakuo.
Cha kyipfa weonguo shisuku na uwawaso waleonguo mṟasa Yohane.
Na kokooya mukundi iiṙikyia, oe nyi oe Elyiya ulya echicha.
Awoṙe maṙwi, naaṙanyie.
“Kyaindi ngyechilyingatsana na kyi rika-lyi? Lyikyeri cha wana wekyeṙamia sangaṙa, wekyelaga oṙiawo, wechigamba,
‘Lulekapa mtoṟiṟo kyipfa kyanyu, maa muletema-pfo; lulekapa ṟanyi maa mulawoṙo nyi wukyiwa.’
Kyipfa Yohane nalecha, alailya maa alainyo, wakagamba, ‘Nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.’
Mono-Adamu nalecha, echilya na inyo, wakagamba, ‘Ichu nawoṙe ndewu, nyi mnanzi, mbuya ya wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi!’ Na wuṟango wo Ruwa wochimanyika kui shindo wuṟango-wo wuiṟunda.”
Naaho-ng'u kawooka iṙeṙia mṟi iya kyiiṙi kyayo kuleṟundika shiṟiyisho shakye shifoi, kyipfa ileṙumbuya wunyamaṟi-pfo.

“Ochia lopfo, Korasini! Ochia lopfo Betisaida! Kyipfa cha kokooya shiṟiyisho shilewutika konyu shilewutika kulya Tiro na Sidon wawechiṙumbuya wunyamaṟi kyiyeri kyileshi kyileiṙa kui iṟaa masaṟa na ikushia ifui.
Kyaindi ngammbia, kyechiwa kyaangu Tiro na Sidon ikarishia ngapo tsawo mfiri o ianduyo kuta nyoe.
Na iyoe Kaperinaumu, ngyesa noching'anyiso mṟasa ruwewu? Nochisotso mṟasa ko waṟumu cha kyipfa shiṟiyisho shilewutika kopfo shiwechiwutika kulya Sodoma, mṟi-cho uwechiṙio ho mṟasa inu.
Kyaindi ngammbia, kyechiwa kyaangu ko uruka lo Sodoma ikarishia ngapo yalo mfiri o ianduyo kuta iyoe.”
Kyiyeri kyilya Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngakuana, Awu, Mndumii o ruwewu na uruka, kyipfa shindo-shi ulekunda ishitambuluya wawoṙe wuṟango-pfo, kyaindi kotambuluya wana watutu.
Yee, loi, Awu, kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyilechihiṟa mbele yapfo.”
Kagamba, “Ngyimṙambikye shoose na Awu-yoko, maa kuwoṙe aichi Mana, sile Awu-pfo; maa kuwoṙe aichi Awu, sile Mana-pfo, na orio oose ulya Mana akunda imtambuluya.
Nnjonyi na koko, nyoe moose muiwina na muwalemie nyi maṟio, na inyi ngyechimuonyonyisha.
Waṙilyienyi iṟunda-lyi ngyimṙambika, mukuloshe koko; kyipfa inyi ngyimhoo na muindi mrimenyi; na nyoe mochiwaṙa ufoṟo mrimenyi konyu.
Cha kyipfa kyilya ngyimmbia kyikyicha konyu, na ṟio ngyimṙika lyilyiangu.”
Kyiyeri kyilya Yesu naleiṙa maṙemenyi mfiri o onyonya. Wanalosho wakye wakawoṙo nyi njaa, wakawooka itumuo magaa ga nganu wakalya.
Na lyilya Mafarisayo walewona walemmbia, “Wanalosho wapfo waiṟunda kyindo kyilakyeri sungusinyi ikyiṟunda mfiri o onyonya.”
Kawawia, “Muichi kyindo Dawidi alewuta, lyilya alewoṙo nyi njaa, oe na woṙoe?
Chandu aleiṙa na numbenyi ya Ruwa, kalya mkate iya ngyeele, mkate kyilakyeri sungusinyi kokye maa ko woṙoe iilya, sile ko makohanyi wawenyi?
Maa muichi chandu kyikyiṟeie ipfo mawawasonyi, kye mfiri o onyonya makohanyi numbenyi ya Ruwa wekyefanyiṟa mfiri o onyonya walatalyio wunyamaṟi?
Kyaindi ngammbia, kye iha nakyeri ho ai ang'anyi kuta numba ya Ruwa.
Kyaindi kokooya muweichi kyitambuluo kya maṙeṙo-ga, ‘Ngyikundi isaṟia, maa chi shienengo-pfo,’ muwechigamba wawoṙe ṙeko iwo walawatalyie wunyamaṟi-pfo!
Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu nyi oe Mndumii o mfiri o onyonya.”
Kawuka pfo, kaiṙa na sinagoginyi lyawo.
Na kuwewoṙe mndu awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu. Kyasia kundu waiṙime iwona kyindo kyemmbusia wuwingo wakammbesa, “Nyi sungusinyi ikyiṟa wandu mfiri o onyonya?”
Kawawia, “Nyi mndu uha kyiiṙi kyanyu awoṙe ondo lyimwi, na ondo-lyo lyikaoloka mkuwenyi mfiri o onyonya, alechilyiwaṙa nalyikyiṟe?
Ngyesa mndu awoṙe kyiira kying'anyi kuta ondo kafong'ui-pfoe? Kyasia nyi sungusinyi iṟunda mecha mfiri o onyonya.”
Naaho-ng'u kawia mndu ulya, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo.” Kagoṟuo kuwoko, kukochia, kukowaṙa pfinya cha kulya ko kawi.
Kyaindi Mafarisayo walya wakalya wuṟiingyi chandu wechimrumatsa.
Na Yesu aicho isho shoose nalewuka pfo; na wandu wafoi wakamwosha; kawakyiṟa woose.
Kawaima walamṟingyishie;
kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyikyigambe nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, echigamba,
“Ambuya, mṟundi oko ngyilemsambuṟa;
mkunde oko, mrima oko umchihiye kyipfa kyakye;
ngyechimwenenga pfinya ya Mumuyo oko,
na oe nechianduya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
Echiṙeṙa maa ikuilenga na ṟui lyakye-pfo;
maa mndu echiicho ṟui lyakye njienyi-pfo.
Echituura mndu mfafa-pfo,
maa echiinyala ulya alawoṙe kyitarama-pfo,
mṟasa naenengye ianduyo wuwinzi.
Na rina lyakye wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wechilyikusuria.”
Kyiyeri kyilya kaendio mndu awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho, kyipfupfuṟe kyiwekyeiṙima iṙeṙa; kamkyiṟa, na ulya alaweiṙima iṙeṙa kaṙeṙa na iambuo.
Wuingyi wo wandu wukoṟiyio, wakagamba, “Ichu chi mono-Dawidi-pfoe?”
Kyaindi lyilya Mafarisayo waleicho, walegamba, “Ichu naifuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho.”
Kyasia Yesu aichi makusaṟo gawo, kawawia, “Wumangyi wukowaṙa wuṟiingyi, kokyewaṙa wukyiwa; ngoseṟa mṟi ang'u kanyi kukowaṙa wuṟiingyi kuwoṙe kyindo kyechiiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
Na Satana kafuna Satana, nakuṟiinga oe amonyi, kyasia wumangyi wokye wochigoṟoka wuṙa?
Na inyi ngafuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho, ngyesa wana wanyu wekyefuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa wui? Kyipfa kya ikyo iwo nyiwo wechimuanduya.
Kyaindi inyi ngafuna waṟufui wawicho kui Mumuyo o Ruwa, kyasia Wumangyi wo Ruwa wommaa icha na konyu.
Ang'u mndu neiṙima kuṙa iiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu awoṙe pfinya na imsoka shindo shakye, alapfunga kuwooka icho awoṙe pfinya? Nyi lyo-ng'u echiiṙima iwaṙa numba-yo ko pfinya.
Mndu alakyeri hamwi na inyi ekyeoshana na inyi-pfo; na mndu alekyesania hamwi na inyi nekyeola-ola.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, ‘Orio wunyamaṟi na orio ṙeṙo lyelahia Ruwa wandu wechihooṟio, kyaindi ko ilahia Mumuyo wechihooṟio-pfo.
Na mndu oose echiṙeṙa Mono-Adamu uwicho nechihooṟio, kyaindi ulya echiṙeṙa Mumuyo Mweele uwicho echihooṟio-pfo.’ ”
“Kundu ikyiṙi lyiwe lyicha kyiwaṟi iwaṙa ndunda ngyicha; kyaindi kokooya nuwoṙe ikyiṙi lyiwicho na ndunda tsechiwiha, cha kyipfa ikyiṙi lyekyemanyika kui ndunda tsalyo.
Nyoe maalea ga njoka, moiṙima kuṙa iṙeṙa shindo shicha, mui wawicho? Kyipfa, ṙumbu lya mndu lyekyeṙeṙa shilya shiichuṟie mrima-cho okye.
Mndu mcha kyiseyesoenyi kyicha nekyewuta shicha; na mndu mmbicho kyiseyesoenyi kyiwicho nekyewuta shiwicho.
Kyasia ngammbia, ‘Orio ṙeṙo lyilawoṙe kyiira, wandu wechilyiṙeṙa, kyiwawaṟi iwia Ruwa kyimaṙuma kyelyiṙeṙa mfiri ulya o furumia.’
Kyipfa kui maṙeṙo gapfo nochitalyio wusumganyi, na kui maṙeṙo gapfo nochianduyo.”
Iho walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo waata wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Mlosha, lukundi iwona kyiṟingyishio kopfo.”
Kagaluo kawawia, “Rika lyiwicho lya wuṟui lyipfula kyiṟingyishio, maa lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio-pfo, sile kyiṟingyishio kya moonguo shisuku Yona.
Kyipfa chandu Yona awekyeri mfiri iṟaṟu kyingoto na kyio ndewunyi ya nyangumi, na wuṙo Mono-Adamu echikaa mfiri iṟaṟu kyingoto na kyio amṟikye terinyi.

Wandu wa Ninawi wechigoṟoka mfiri o ianduyo hamwi na wandu wa rika-lyi. Nawo wechianduya rika-lyi kye lyileṙeko. Kyipfa wo waleṙumbuya wunyamaṟi kui malosho ga Yona; na iha hakyeri ai ang'anyi kuta Yona.

Mangyi o kyika o ura lo kyaseri nechigoṟoka mfiri o ianduyo hamwi na wandu wa rika-lyi, na oe nechiwaanduya kye waleṙeko. Kyipfa oe nalecha iwuka ngyuura tsa kyishingonyi tsa wuyana kundu naicho wuṟango wo Solomon, na iha hakyeri ai ang'anyi kuta Solomon.”
“Mṟufui mmbicho, ilyi awuka ko mndu, nekyeiṙia handu halawoṙe mṟinga, echipfula handu heonyonya, alawone.
Na numa nekyegamba, ‘Ngyechiwuya na kanyi koko ngyilewuka.’ Na kacha, kawona numba iya ilawoṙe kyindo, ingyiaie, na ichopo,

cha ilyi nekyeyenda, kaṙuo handu hamwi na oe waṟufui wengyi wawicho mfungaaṙe wakyeri wawicho kuta oe amonyi, nawo wekyeiṙa na numba na ikaa pfo; na mndu ulya mafurumionyi gakye gekyewiha kuta kulya mawookyionyi. Nyi wuṙo kyechiwa, ko rika-lyi lyii lyiwicho.”
Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa na wuingyi wo wandu, wamae na wana wa wamae wawegoṟokyi iho nja wakundi iṙeṙa na oe.
Mndu umwi kammbia, “Womoo na wana wa wama wapfo wagoṟokyi iho nja, wakundi iṙeṙa na iyoe.”
Kagaluo, kawia mndu ulya alemwendie mbonyi, “Wama oko nyi wui? Na wana wa wama wako nyi wakyi?”
Kagoṟuya wanalosho wakye kuwoko, kagamba, “Wonenyi wama oko na wana wa wama wako!
Cha kyipfa orio oose echiṟunda shilya Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu akundi, ichu nyi oe mono-wama oko, na mshikyi oko, na wama oko.”
Mfiri ulya Yesu kawuka kanyi kaṙamia mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukokuumbia kufui na oe, mṟasa kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kaṙamia, na wuingyi wulya woose wukogoṟoka mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
Kawawia shindo shifoi kui mfano, echigamba, “Moolyia mbeu nalefuma indewaaya.
Na kyiyeri aweiwaaya, mbeu tsingyi tsileoloka kufui na njia, shileye shikacha shikatsilya.
Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe iṟaṟa, halawoṙe teri ishikyie. Cha ilyi tsikaṙo, na kyipfa halawewoṙe teri ishikyie;
mui ukowaa ukotsikoṟa; na kyipfa tsilawewoṙe mri tsikauma.
Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe msha. Msha iya ikaṙo ikatsiilama.
Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha, tsikakumbia, imwi igana, imwi makumi gaṟandaaṟu, imwi makumi gaṟaaṟu.
Awoṙe maṙwi naaṙanyie.”
Wanalosho wakacha, wakammbia, “Kyitewe uiṙeṙa nawo kui mfano ny'kyi?”
Kagaluo kawawia, “Nyoe muwaenengye imanya shiṟika sha Wumangyi wo ruwewu, kyaindi wo wawaenengye-pfo.
Cha kyipfa orio oose awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na oe nechipfumbutsio pacha; kyaindi orio oose alawoṙe kyindo, maa kyilya awoṙe nechisoko.
Kyipfa kya ikyi ngyiṙeṙa nawo kui mfano; cha kyipfa wakaambuo wawonyi-pfo, na wakaaṙanyia waiicho maa imanya-pfo.
Na ṙeṙo lya moonguo shisuku Yesaya lyaafukyia kowo, lyechigamba,
‘Iicho mochiicho, maa mochimanya-pfo,
iambuo mochiambuo, maa mochiwona-pfo.
Kyipfa mrima ya wandu-wa yawa ngyiumu,
na kui maṙwi gawo wekyeicho necha-pfo,
na washingyie meso gawo;
walachewona kui meso gawo,
walaicho kui maṙwi gawo,
wakamanya kui mrima yawo,
wakangyigalukyia, ngawakyiṟa.’ ”
“Kyaindi, agusu meso ganyu, cha kyipfa gawonyi; na maṙwi ganyu, cha kyipfa gaiicho.
Cha kyipfa, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, weonguo shisuku wafoi na wasumganyi walelanga iwona ishi mushiwonyi nyoe, walashiwone; na iicho ishi muicho nyoe walashiicho.”
“Kyasia nyoe aṙanyienyi mfano o moolyia mbeu.
Orio mndu kaicho ṙeṙo lya Wumangyi wo ruwewu alalyimanye, mmbicho ulya nekyecha, karakuo kyilya kyikyiṙongye mrimenyi kokye. Iyi nyiyo mbeu iya ingyiṙongye mbai ya njia.
Na mbeu iya ingyiṙongye iṟaṟenyi, nyi mndu ulya ekyeicho ṙeṙo lyilya, kalyiambilyia cha ilyi na sia.
Kyaindi lyekyewaṙa mri mrimenyi kokye-pfo, na lyekyekaa kyiyeri kyifuhi. Kukocha wukyiwa ang'u matuuro kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, cha ilyi, lyekyekaa kokye-pfo.
Na iya ingyiṙongye mshenyi, icho nyi mndu ekyeicho ṙeṙo lyilya; na mawino ga wuyana, na wulembi wo masaa wokyeilama ṙeṙo lyilya; lyilawaṙe ndunda.
Na iya ingyiṙongye terinyi ngyicha, icho nyi oe ekyeicho ṙeṙo lyilya, na ilyimanya. Icho nyi oe ekyekumbia ndunda, ichu igana, na ichu makumi gaṟandaaṟu, na ichu makumi gaṟaaṟu.”
Kawaenenga mfano ungyi, echigamba, “Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mndu alewaaya mbeu ngyicha ṙemenyi lyakye.
Kyaindi wandu wamlae, mokyituwa okye kacha kawaaya makacha nganunyi, kaṙicha.
Numa kyiyeri nganu ileṙo na ikumbia, kukowoneka makacha.
Shisinga sha monyi kanyi shikayenda shikammbia, ‘Mndumii, ulewaaya mbeu ngyicha ṙemenyi lyapfo-pfoe? Nyi kwi lyileende makacha?’
Kashiwia, ‘Mokyituwa nyi oe aleṟunda kuṙi.’ Shisinga shikammbia, ‘Kyasia nukundi luyende lundegasania?’
Kagamba, ‘Ote, mulachesania makacha, na ikuluo nganu hamwi nago.

Ṙenyi shoose shing'ane mṟasa kyiyeri kyesambuo. Na kyiyeri kyesambuo ngyechiwia iwo waisambuo, sanienyi makacha kuwooka, mugapfungye shikonde shikonde mugakoṟe; kyaindi nganu isanienyi kyikumbinyi kyako.’ ”
Kawaenenga mfano ungyi, echigamba, “Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mbeu ya haradalyi, mndu aleiwuta na iiwaaya ṙemenyi lyakye.
Nayo nyi ingyitutu kuta mbeu tsoose. Kyaindi ikamṙo, yekyeng'ana kuta mashiṙi goose, ikawa ikyiṙi, maa shileye sha ngyinenyi shekyecha na iṙamia mbagenyi tsayo.”
Kawawia mfano ungyi. “Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na chachu ilewuto nyi mndu mka, kaikooma shitelenyi shiṟaaṟu sha mso, mṟasa mso-cho ukoshimba oose taa.”
Isho shoose Yesu nalewia wuingyi wo wandu kui mfano, maa kulawoṙe mfano alewawia kyindo-pfo.
Kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyikyiṙeṙe nyi moonguo shisuku echigamba,
“Ngyechiṙeṙa nawo kui mfano,
ngyechigamba shikuṟiikyie wookyia mawookyionyi.”
Numa ya iho Yesu kasamana na wuingyi wo wandu. Kaiṙa na kanyi, wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye, wakagamba, “Lutambuluye mfano o makacha ga ṙemenyi.”
Kagaluo, kagamba, “Ekyewaaya mbeu tsilya ngyicha nyi Mono-Adamu.
Ṙema-lyo nyi wuyana. Mbeu tsilya ngyicha nyi wana wa Wumangyi wo ruwewu, na makacha-go nyi wana wa mmbicho ulya.
Mokyituwa ulya alewaaya nyi Mokyiriinzi. Kyilyimu nyi mafurumionyi ga wuyana; na wesambuo nyi malaika.
Kyasia, chandu makacha gekyesanio na ikoṟo moṙonyi; nyi wuṙo kyechiwa mafurumionyi ga wuyana.
Mono-Adamu nechiṙuma malaika wakye, nawo wechisania iwuka ipfo Wumangyinyi wokye, woose wekyeende wunyamaṟi, na iwo wekyefunja mawawaso,
na iwawiyitsa moṙonyi ung'anyi. Nyi pfo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.
Nyilyo wasumganyi wechiaka-aka cha mnengyeṟi Wumangyinyi wo Awu-yawo. Awoṙe maṙwi, naaṙanyie.”

“Lyingyi-se Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na kyindo kya woguru wung'anyi kyikyiṟikye ṙemenyi. Kyiyeri mndu alewona kyindo-kyo, nalekyiṟika; na kyipfa alechihiyo mnu naleyenda kakumba shoose awewoṙe, kaguṟa ṙema lyilya.”
“Lyingyi-se Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mndu o mbucha, awekyepfula lulu ngyicha.
Na oe kyiyeri alewona lulu imwi ngyicha ya woguru wung'anyi, naleyenda kakumba shoose awewoṙe kaiguṟa.”
“Lyingyi-se Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na iṟambika, lyilewiyitso ipalyipalyinyi, lyikasania wa orio mbaṟe.
Na lyilya lyileichuo, walelyikuruo na mbai ya ipalyipalyi; wakaṙamia, wakasania wai wecha ngalawenyi, kyaindi wai wawicho wakawawiyitsa.
Nyi wuṙo kyechiwa mafurumionyi ga wuyana. Malaika wechiwoneka, wewikyia wawicho kuleshi na wasumganyi,
na iwawiyitsa moṙonyi ung'anyi. Nyi pfo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.”
Yesu nalewawesa, “Momanya isho shoose?” Wakammbia, “Yee.”
Kawawia, “Kyipfa kya ikyo, orio mlosha o mawawaso awoṙe wuṟango wo malosho ga Wumangyi wo ruwewu nafananyi na monyi kanyi ekyewuta kyindonyi kyakye kya woguru wung'anyi shindo shihya na sha kacha.”
Na kyiyeri Yesu alemarisa ilosha kui mfano-yo, nalefuma kayenda.
Na lyilya aleshika urukyenyi lokye, nalewalosha sinagoginyi lyawo, mṟasa wakaṟiyio, wakagamba, “Ichu nyi kwi aleende wuṟango-wu na maṟiyisho-ga?
Ichu chi mana o ulya ekyepacha mbau? Wamae chi ulya ekyelago Maria? Na wana wa wamae chi Yakobo, na Yosefu, na Simion, na Yuda?
Na washikyi wakye woose wakyeri iha koṙu-pfoe? Kyasia ichu nyi kwi alewona ishi shoose?”
Wakawihiyo kyipfa kyakye. Yesu kawawia, “Moonguo shisuku nekyeindio kundu koose sile urukyenyi lokye, na kanyi kokye amonyi.”
Maa aleṟunda shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho ipfo-pfo, kyipfa walemwiṙikyia-pfo.
Kyiyeri kyilya mangyi Herode naleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu.
Kawia waṟundi wakye, “Ichu nyi oe Yohane Mpatisi. Naṟuka ko wapfu. Nyikyo kyitewe awoṙe pfinya tseṟunda ishi shoose.”
Kyipfa Herode nalekoawaṙa Yohane, kampfunga, kammbika kyipfungonyi, kyipfa kya Herodia, mka o Filyipo mono-wamae.
Kyipfa Yohane nalemmbia, “Chi sungusinyi ikaa na oe-pfo.”
Na oe kyiyeri awekundi immbaaga, naleowuo wandu, kyipfa walewona Yohane cha moonguo shisuku.
Na kyiyeri mfiri ung'anyi o ifeo lya Herode uleshika mana o Herodia o waka naletema mbele ya wandu, kachihiṟa Herode,
mṟasa Herode kawika kyaasa kui ilya nyamu kye nechimwenenga kyindo kyoose echikyiterewa.
Na oe, kunu echilosho nyi wamae, kagamba, “Ngyienenga wulalu kuṙi iha ipongonyi mṙoe o Yohane Mpatisi.”
Na mangyi kawona fowa mrimenyi. Kyaindi kyipfa kya nyamu tsakye, na kyipfa kya walya waweilya handu hamwi na oe, kagamba naenengo.
Kaṙuma mndu, kaṙumbuo Yohane mṙoe kulya kyipfungonyi.
Mṙoe okye ukoendo ukyeri ipongonyi, mana ulya o waka kauenengo; kauṙuo ko wamae.
Wanalosho wakye wakayenda, wakaṙuo mnying'a ulya, wakamṟika; numa wakayenda wakaongoya Yesu mbonyi.
Na Yesu kyiyeri aleicho isho, nalewuka ipfo ngalawenyi, kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, hatsie sau. Na wuingyi wo wandu kyiyeri waleicho, walemwosha wechumia na maṙende wawuka mṟinyi kowo.
Yesu kafuma, kawona wuingyi wo wandu wung'anyi, kawona wukyiwa mrimenyi kyipfa kyawo, kawakyiṟa ndoṟe tsawo.
Na kyiyeri kuleila, wanalosho wakye waleyenda kokye, wakagamba, “Handu ha nyi nuka mreesi, na kyiyeri kyamwiṙa. Samana na wuingyi wo wandu, wayende shikaṟonyi, wandeguṟa shelya.”
Yesu kawawia, “Wawoṙe kyitewe kyeyenda-pfo. Waenengyenyi kyelya.”
Wakammbia, “Luwoṙe kyindo iha sile mkate itanu na makunga gawi-pfo.”
Kagamba, “Ngyiendienyi.”

Kagamba wuingyi wo wandu waṙamie maṟenyi. Kaira mkate iya itanu na makunga galya gawi, kaambuya wuye ruwewu, kawikyia mboṟa, kafunja mkate iya, kaenengyia wanalosho, wanalosho wakaenengyia wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
Wakalya woose wakaiguṙa. Wakasania matsugaṟo ga shipeṟengu sha mkate iya, mkunja ikumi na iwi, iichuo.
Nawo walelya wawekyeri wasoṟo washikyie shiku shitaanu, kulawoṙe waka na wana watutu.
Cha ilyi kaitika wanalosho wakye waṙooye ngalawenyi wasonguo mbele yakye iyenda molyolya, kyiyeri oe aweisamana na wuingyi wo wandu.
Na oe amsamane na wuingyi wo wandu, naleṙooya fumvunyi handu halawoṙe wandu, indeterewa. Na kyiyeri kuleila, nawekyeri pfo amonyi.
Na ngalawa iya ilekoyamshika makyiṙi-gawi ga ipalyipalyi, yechilya wukyiwa mnu kyipfa shiwiṟi shiweikapa.
Na kyiyeri kya iringa lya kaana lya kyio Yesu naleyenda ko wanalosho walya, echichumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi.
Kyiyeri wanalosho walemmbona echichumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi, walewoṙo nyi wuowu, wechigamba, “Nyi kyirinje”; wakafiiṟa kui wuowu.
Cha ilyi Yesu kaṙeṙa, kawawia, “Kuwanzenyi mrimenyi; nyi inyi, mulaowuoe.”
Petiro kamgaluo, kagamba, “Kokooya nyi iyoe, ngyiwia ngyiche na kopfo wuye ya mṟinga.”
Kagamba, “Nnjo.” Petiro kasoka kulya ngalawenyi, kachumia na maṙende wuye ya mṟinga, kundu nayende ko Yesu.
Kyaindi kyiyeri alewona kyiwiṟi, kaowuo; kawooka isoṟowia; kafiiṟa, echigamba, “Mndumii, ngyiletsa.”
Cha ilyi Yesu kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kammbia, “Iyoe uwoṙe iiṙikyia lyaangu, ny'kyilyi ulaleiṙikyia kye ngyeiṙima ikuenenga wuiṙimi wo chumia wuye ya mṟinga?”
Nawo wakaṙooya ngalawenyi, kyiwiṟi kyikatsia.
Na walya wawekyeri kulya ngalawenyi wakamwindia, wechigamba, “Ny'kyaloi iyoe nui Mono-Ruwa.”
Na wamuambaṙe, waleshika uruka lo Kyenesareti.
Na wandu wa handu halya kyiyeri walemmanya, waleṙuma wandu iyenda ngyuuruka tsikyeri mṟasenyi, wakamwendie woose walawekuiṙima.
Nawo wakamterewa wapaaye maa ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye tupu; na woose walepaaya wakakyiṟo piu.
Naaho-ng'u Mafarisayo na walosha wa mawawaso wawukyie Yerusalemu waleyenda ko Yesu wechigamba,
“Ny'kyilyi wanalosho wapfo wainyamaṟa shilya shileambilyio ko waku waṙu? Cha kyipfa wekyesamba mawoko ilyi wailya-pfo.”
Kagaluo, kawawia, “Ny'kyi kyitewe na nyoe mokyenyamaṟa iwawaso lya Ruwa kyipfa kya shilya muleambilyia ko waku wanyu?
Cha kyipfa Ruwa nalegamba, ‘India awuyo na womoo,’ na ‘Alahia awuye ang'u wamae ipfa napfe.’
Kyaindi nyoe mokyegamba, ‘Echiwia awuye ang'u wamae, ikyo kyoose kyikuwaṟi inyi ngyikutarame nyi kyiṙaso,’
kyasia alaindie awuye ang'u wamae. Mukoilacha ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kyipfa kya shilya muleambilyia ko waku wanyu.
Nyoe wakulembecheṟi, nyi necha chandu Yesaya aleonguo shisuku kyipfa kya mbonyi tsanyu, echigamba,
‘Wandu-wa wekyengyiindia kui maṙumbu;
kyaindi mrima yawo ikyeri kuleshi na inyi.
Nawo wekyengyiana na ingyiterewa kya maai,
wechilosha malosho
gakyeri mawawaso ga wandu.’ ”
Kalaga wuingyi wo wandu, kawawia.
“Aṙanyienyi, mumanye. Kyekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe chi kyilya kyekyeiṙa na ṙumbunyi-pfo. Indi kyilya kyekyewuka ṙumbunyi ny'kyo kyekyefanyiṟa mndu.”
Naaho-ng'u wanalosho wakye waleyenda kokye wakammbia, “Uichi kye Mafarisayo kyiyeri waleicho ṙeṙo lyilya walewihiyo?”
Kagaluo, kawawia, “Orio kyindo Awu-yoko o ruwewu alalekyiṙonga nechikyikuluo.
Walekyenyi. Iwo nyi shipfupfuṟe wai wasongoru wa shipfupfuṟe. Na kyipfupfuṟe kyikasongoya kyipfupfuṟe oṙoe, sheoloka mkuwenyi shoose shishiwi.”
Kyasia Petiro kagaluo, kammbia, “Lutambuluye mfano-chu.”
Yesu kagamba, “Mṟasa wulalu maa nyoe muwoṙe wuṟango-pfoe?
Mulandemanye kye orio kyindo kyekyeiṙa na ṙumbunyi kyekyeiṙa ndewunyi, kyikawiyitso choṟonyi?
Kyaindi shekyewuka ṙumbunyi shawuka mrimenyi; nasho nyisho shekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe.
Cha kyipfa mrimenyi kokyewuka makusaṟo mawicho, uwaagi, wuṟui, wuiwi, wuṟingyishi wo wongo, na shilahio.
Igo nyigo gekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe. Kyaindi ilya ulasamba mawoko kokyefanyiṟa mndu-pfo.”
Yesu kawuka handu halya, kayenda mbai ura lo Tiro na Sidon.
Na mndu mka Mkananayo o ura lulya kacha, kakuilengakyika echigamba, “Ungyisaṟie, Mndumii, Mono-Dawidi; mana oko o waka nawoṙo kyetse nyi mṟufui mmbicho.”
Maa oe alemgaluo kyindo-pfo. Na wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Mlekye nayende; cha kyipfa naikalagatsa numa yaṙu.”
Kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyileṙumo ko wandu wengyi sile ko wana wa Isiraelyi waṙekyie cha moondo-pfo.”
Na oe kacha kamwolokyia, echigamba, “Mndumii, ungyitarame.”
Kagaluo, kagamba, “Chi necha iwuta kyelya kya wana na iwiyitsia shite-pfo.”
Mndu mka ulya kagamba, “Yee, Mndumii. Kyaindi maa shite shekyelya matsugaṟo gekyeoloka mesenyi ko wandumii washo.”
Naaho-ng'u Yesu kagaluo kammbia, “Mama, iiṙikyia lyapfo nyi lying'anyi; na kyiwe kopfo chandu ukundi.” Mana ulya okye o kyika kachia cha ilyi.
Yesu kawuka handu halya, kashika mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, kaṙooya fumvunyi, kaṙamia ho.
Wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wukoyenda kokye, wechimwendie shiwete, shipfupfuṟe, wai ndiṟi, wafiri shiwungo, na wengyi wafoi, wakawawikyia maṙendenyi gakye; kawakyiṟa;
mṟasa wuingyi wulya wo wandu wakaṟiyio, kyiyeri walewona wai ndiṟi waiṙeṙa, wawoṙe shiwungo shifiri waichia, shiwete shichumia na shipfupfuṟe shiwona, wakang'anyisa Ruwa o Isiraelyi.

Yesu kalaga wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Ngawoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kyipfa kya wuingyi-wu wo wandu, cha kyipfa wulalu nyi mfiri iṟaṟu wakyeri hamwi na inyi, maa wawoṙe kyindo kyelya-pfo. Ngoseṟa isamana nawo walalyiie kyindo ngyikundi-pfo, walacheoloka njienyi.”
Wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Lowona kwi mkate ifoi iha nuka, mṟasa iigutsa wuingyi wung'anyi kuṙi?”
Yesu kawawia, “Muwoṙe mkate inga?” Wakagamba, “Mfungaaṙe, na shikunga shaangu.”
Kagamba wuingyi wo wandu wuṙamie wanda.
Kawaṙa mkate iya na shikunga shilya, kaana, kashifunja-funja, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye, nawo wanalosho wakaenenga wuingyi wo wandu.
Wakalya woose wakaiguṙa. Wakasania matsugaṟo ga shifunjoe sha mkate, mkunja mfungaaṙe, iichuo.
Nawo walelya wawekyeri wasoṟo shiku shiina, kulawoṙe waka na wana watutu.
Kasamana na wuingyi wo wandu, kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kayenda ngyuura tsa Makadan.
Mafarisayo na Masadukayo wakacha na kokye, wakamwesha, wakamterewa nawaloṟe kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu.
Kagaluo, kawawia, “Kukoila, mokyegamba, ‘Kochiwa mfiri mcha; cha kyipfa ruwewu ifanyi kyimaande.’

Na ngamenyi, mokyegamba, ‘Inu kochiwaṙa shiwiṟi; cha kyipfa ruwewu ifanyi kyimaande; lyingyi-se kushimbi.’ Nyoe wakulembecheṟi, muichi imanya fana ya ruwewu, kyaindi, ngyesa, shiṟingyishio sha shiyeri-shi moiṙima ishimanya?
Rika lyiwicho na lya wuṟui lyikundi kyiṟingyishio, maa lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio-pfo, sile kyiṟingyishio kya Yona.” Kalekana nawo, kayenda.
Na wanalosho wakayenda mṟasa molyolya, wakawaṙima iṙuo mkate.
Yesu kawawia, “Kushowenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo.”
Wakagaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Nyi kyipfa kya ilyi lulaende mkate.”
Na Yesu kamanya, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muigaluana nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyaangu? Nyi kyipfa nyoe mulawoṙe mkate?
Maa mulandemanye maa mukumburie mkate iya itanu ko walya shiku shitaanu, na nyi mkunja inga mulesania-pfoe?
Maa mkate iya mfungaaṙe ko walya shiku shiina, na nyi mkunja inga mulesania-pfoe?
Kyawa kuṙa mulalemanya kye chi kyipfa kya mkate ngyilemmbia-pfo? Kyaindi kushowenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo.”
Naaho-ng'u walemanya kye alewawia ikuringa na chachu ya mkate, indi na malosho ga Mafarisayo na Masadukayo-pfo.
Kyasia Yesu kayenda ngyuura tsa Kaisaria-Filyipi, kawesa wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Wandu wekyegamba Mono-Adamu nyi wui?”
Wakagamba, “Wengyi wekyegamba nui Yohane Mpatisi, wengyi Elyiya, wengyi Yeremia ang'u umwi o weonguo shisuku.”
Kawawia, “Aa nyoe mokyegamba inyi nyi wui?”
Simion Petiro kagaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa ai na moo mlungana.”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Agusu iyoe Simion Mono-Yona, cha kyipfa chi pfinya ang'u wuṟango wo kyimndu shakutambuluya ikyi-pfo; indi Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu.
Na inyi ngakuwia, iyoe nyi oe Petiro, na kyiyeri-kyo ngyechiwika Siṟi yako iyoe nyilyo iṟaṟa handu ngyechiiyekyia; maa pfinya tsa upfu tseiwinga-pfo.

Na inyi ngyechikuenenga iyoe ngyuupfunguo tsa Wumangyi wo ruwewu na orio kyindo ochikyipfunga iha wuyanenyi, kyewa kyikyipfungye ruwewu; na orio kyindo ochikyipfunguo wuyanenyi, kyechiwa kyikyipfunguoe ruwewu.”
Naaho-ng'u kaima mnu wanalosho wakye walawie mndu oose kye oe nyi oe Kristo.

Wookyia kyiyeri-kyo Yesu nalewooka iwia na pata wanalosho wakye kye kyimmbaṟi iyenda Yerusalemu na iambilyia matuuro gafoi iwuka ko wameeku wa mengye, na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na iwoogo, na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu iṟuka.
Petiro kamṙuo mbai, kawooka imṙeṙia, echigamba, “Maa ale, Mndumii, isho shechikukooya-pfo.”
Kagaluka, kawia Petiro, “Wuka koko, Satana, nungyishingyia; kyipfa uikusaṟa shikyeri sha Ruwa-pfo, indi sha wandu.”
Kyiyeri-kyo Yesu nalewia wanalosho wakye, “Mndu oose kakunda ingyiosha, nakulege amonyi, nakuṙikye msalaba okye, nangyioshe.
Cha kyipfa mndu akundi ikyiṟa mrima okye, nechiuṙetsa; na mndu echiṙetsa mrima okye kyipfa kyako, nechiukyiṟa.
Kyipfa mndu nechiiria ho kyi kaenengo wuyana woose, na iṙetsa mrima okye? Ang'u mndu nechienengyia kyi handu ha mrima okye?
Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu nechicha mng'anonyi o Awu-yokye hamwi na malaika wakye. Naaho-ng'u echitaa orio mndu iṙuana na mmbutie yakye.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, hawoṙe wandu kyiiṙi kya iwa wagoṟokyie iha, walechiwona upfu maa ale mṟasa kyiyeri wechiwona Mono-Adamu echicha Wumangyinyi wokye.”
Na mfiri iṟandaaṟu yamuiṙe Yesu kaṙuo Petiro na Yakobo, na Yohane mono-wamae, kawaende mṟasa wuye ya fumvu lyileshi handu halawoṙe wandu.
Kailachika fana yakye mbele yawo; kyaam kyakye kyikaaka-aka cha mnengyeṟi; mkoṟoṟi okye ukoila cha ngyesa.
Mose na Elyiya wakacha na kowo wakaṙeṙa na Yesu.
Petiro kagaluo, kawia Yesu, “Mndumii, nyi kyicha soe ikaa iha. Kokunda, ngyechiachikyia matengo gaṟaaṟu iha. Lyimwi lyapfo iyoe, na lyimwi lya Mose, na lyimwi lya Elyia.”
Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, ipuchi lyiilyi lyikawaendie mrinje; na ṟui lyikawuka kulya ipuchinyi, lyikagamba, “Ichu nyi Mono-ko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyakye; muaṙanyienyi oe.”
Na kyiyeri wanalosho walya waleicho, waleoloka na ndewu, wakaowuo mnu.
Yesu kacha, kawapaaya, kagamba, “Amkyenyi, maa mulaowuoe.”
Wakaambuo, walawone mndu sile Yesu amonyi.
Na kyiyeri waweisoka fumvunyi, Yesu nalewawia, “Mulawie mndu oose mbonyi tsa isho moloṟo, mṟasa kyiyeri Mono-Adamu echiṟuka ko wapfu.”
Wanalosho wakye wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Kyasia ny'kyilyi walosha wa mawawaso wekyegamba kye Elyia nawaṟi icha kuwooka?”
Na oe kagaluo, kawawia, “Loi Elyia naicha kuwooka, na oe nechiachikyia shoose;
kyaindi ngammbia kye Elyiya amcha, walammanye, kyaindi wakammbutia orio kyindo walekunda. Na wuṙo Mono-Adamu na oe aindelyiso wukyiwa kowo.”
Naaho-ng'u wanalosho walya walemanya kye naṙeṙa nawo mbonyi tsa Yohane Mpatisi.
Nawo kyiyeri waleshika kyisanzionyi, mndu umwi kacha na kokye, kampfiria ndi, echigamba,
“Mndumii, usaṟie mono-ko, cha kyipfa nawoṙo nyi iuma nguku, na ilyiso wukyiwa wuwicho; kyipfa kafoi nekyeoloka moṙonyi, na kafoi mṟingyenyi.
Ngamwende na ko wanalosho wapfo, walaiṙime imkyiṟa.”
Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyoe rika lyilawoṙe iiṙikyia, lyiendie njia ilawaṟi, ngyechikaa hamwi na nyoe mṟasa indi? Ngyeṙuana na nyoe mṟasa indi? Mwendenyi na kunu koko.”
Yesu kaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, kawuka mana ulya. Manakye ulya kyakyia wookyia kyiyeri kyilya.
Numa wanalosho walya wakayenda ko Yesu kui kyiṟika, wakagamba, “Ny'kyilyi soe lulaiṙima immbuta?”

Yesu kawawia, “Kyipfa kya wufofo wo iiṙikyia lyanyu. Cha kyipfa, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mukowaṙa iiṙikyia lyishikyie cha mbeu ya haradalyi mochiwia fumvu-lyi, ‘Wuka iha uyende kulya;’ nalyo lyechiwuka ho; maa kochiwaṙa kyindo kyilechiiṙimika konyu-pfo. [
Kyaindi mbaṟe-i yekyewuka sile kui iterewa na ikuretekyia-pfo.]”
Nawo kyiyeri wawekyeri Galyilaya, Yesu kawawia. “Mono-Adamu naindewiko mawokonyi ga wandu, nawo wechimmbaaga, na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu nechiṟuka”.
Wakawoṙo nyi fowa mnu mrimenyi kowo.
Na kyiyeri waleshika Kaperinaumu, walya wawekyesania kyifunjoe kya shekyelyi waleyenda ko Petiro, wakagamba, “Ngyesa mlosha onyu aienengyia kyifunjoe kya shekyelyi-pfoe?” Kagamba, “Nekyeenengyia.”
Na oe kyiyeri aleiṙa na kanyi Yesu nalesonguo immbesa, echigamba, “Nuwonyi kuṙa, Simion? Wamangyi wa wuyana wekyeambilyia kodi ang'u ukamba ko wandu waha? Ko wana wawo ang'u ko wayenu?”
Na oe kyiyeri alegamba, “Ko wayenu,” Yesu nalemmbia, “Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, wana wawaṟi itaa ukamba-pfo.

Kyaindi kundu lulachewawutia kyindo lukowawihiṟa, yenda ipalyipalyinyi undewiyitsa-pfo ndoana uwaṙe ikunga lyilya lyawoneka kuwooka, na kotambaṟuo ṙumbu lyalyo nowona shekyelyi yetaa ukamba lo hekalu. Ṙuo iyo undewaenengyia kyipfa kyako na kyipfa kyapfo.”
Kyiyeri kyilya wanalosho wakayenda ko Yesu, wechigamba,
“Kyasia nyi wui-ng'u ai ang'anyi Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu?” Kalaga mana umwi mtutu, kammbikyia makyiṙi-gawi gawo,
kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mulandegalukye na iwa cha shiwana shitutu, mochiiṙa maa ale na Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu-pfo.
Kyasia, orio oose echikukyiwasha amonyi cha mana-chu, icho nyi oe ai ang'anyi Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu.
Na orio oose echiambilyia mana umwi mfano o ichu kui rina lyako, nangyiambilyia inyi.”
“Kyaindi echitewe umwi o iwa watutu wangyiiṙikyie, kyimmbaṟi napfungyio nzingonyi ikyesa na iwiyitso kyitsindenyi kya ipalyipalyi.
Ochia nyi lo wuyana kyipfa kya shindo shetewe! Kyipfa shindo shetewe icha shechicha; kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya aende kyindo kyetewe!

Kyasia kuwoko kopfo ang'u kuṙende kopfo kukokutewe; ṙumbuo kuwoko-ko ang'u kuṙende-ko uwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana ulawoṙe kuwoko ang'u kuṙende, kuta iwaṙa mawoko gawi na maṙende gawi, na iwiyitso moṙonyi o mlungana.
Na riso lyapfo lyikakutewe; lyikuluoe, ulyiwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana uwoṙe riso lyimwi, kuta iwaṙa meso gawi na iwiyitso ngyehenenyi ya moṙo.”
“Mulamine umwi o iwa watutu, cha kyipfa ngammbia kye malaika wawo ruwewu mfiri yoose wekyeambuya kyaam kya Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu. [
Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu nalecha iletsa kyiṙekyie.]
Muwonyi muṙa? Mndu awoṙe moondo igana, lyimwi lyikaṙeka, ngyesa ekyeṙa galya makumi kyenda na kyenda, kayenda mafumvunyi, na ipfula lyilya lyaṙeka-pfoe?
Na kaiṙima ilyiwona, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, nekyechihiyo kyipfa kya ilyo ngoseṟa, kuta galya makumi kyenda na kyenda galaṙekyie.
Na wuṙo kyilachihiṟie ushangunyi lo Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu kye umwi o iwa watutu naṙekye.”
“Na mono-womoo kakuṙekyio, yenda umṙeṙie kya ṙeko lyakye, iyoe na oe tupu. Kakuaṙanyia, nowona mono-womoo.
Ote, kokooya alaaṙanyia, ṙuo handu hamwi na iyoe mndu umwi ang'u wawi, kundu kui maṙumbu ga waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu orio ṙeṙo lyimanyikye na pata.
Na alandemuaṙanyie nyoe, wia siṟi; na alandeaṙanyie siṟi taa, na nawe kopfo cha mndu alaiṙikyie Ruwa na mosania ukamba.”
“Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, shoose mochishipfunga wuyanenyi shechiwa shishipfungye ruwewu; na shoose mochishipfunguo wuyanenyi shechiwa shishipfunguoe ruwewu.
Lyingyi-se ngammbia, kyiyeri wawi wanyu wechisanza kyindonyi kyoose wechikyiterewa, wewutio nyi Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu.
Cha kyipfa hai wawi waṟaaṟu wasanzie kui rina lyako, na inyi ngyikyeri iho makyiṙi-gawi gawo.”
Numa ya iho Petiro kayenda kokye kammbia, “Mndumii, mono-wama oko nangyiṙekyio kyenga na inyi ngyimhooṟie? Nyi ka mfungaaṙe ngyesa?”
Yesu kammbia, “Ngyikuwia ka mfungaaṙe tupu-pfo, indi umhooṟie makumi mfungaaṙe, ka mfungaaṙe.
Kyipfa kya ikyo Wumangyi wo ruwewu wukyeri cha mangyi umwi alekunda isungusia matala na waṟundi wakye.
Kyiyeri alewooka iṟunda-lyo naleendio mndu umwi airiko sile ya talanta shiku ikumi.
Na oe kyiyeri aleuṟa kyetaa, mndumii okye kagamba nakumbo, oe na mka okye na wana wakye, na shindo shoose awoṙe, sile iya itoo.
Kyasia mṟundi ulya kaoloka, kamwindia echigamba, ‘Mndumii, ngyiweṙa, na inyi ngyechikutaa sile yoose taa.’
Mndumii o mṟundi ulya kammbonia wukyiwa kampfunguo, kamhooṟia sile iya.
Mṟundi ulya kafuma, kawona umwi o mbuya tsakye, awemmbesa dinari igana. Kamtirimisha, kammbaṙa maṟoo, echigamba, ‘Ngyitaa sile iya uriko.’
Kyasia mbuya iya oṙoe ikaoloka maṙendenyi gakye, ikamterewa, yechigamba, ‘Ngyiweṙa, na inyi ngyechikutaa sile yoose taa.’
Kyaindi alekunda-pfo. Kayenda, kammbiyitsa kyipfungonyi, mṟasa ilyi echitaa sile-yo.
Kyasia kyiyeri mbuya tsakye tsilewona shilya shileṟundika, tsilewihiyo mnu mrimenyi, tsikayenda tsikaongoya Mndumii otso shoose shileṟundika.
Naaho-ng'u Mndumii okye kamlaga, kammbia, ‘Iyoe mṟundi mmbicho, ngyilekuhooṟia iyoe sile iya yoose, lyilya ulengyiterewa;
na iyoe, ngyesa kyiwekuwaṟi isaṟia mbuya yapfo, chandu inyi ngyilekusaṟia iyoe-pfoe?’
Mndumii okye kasuo, kamṙuo ko watuuri, mṟasa kyiyeri echitaa sile iya yoose.
Na wuṙo Awu-yoko a ruwewu echimmbutia nyoe, mulandehooṟie kui mrima yanyu orio mndu mono-wamae.”
Na lyilya Yesu alemarisa ionguo maṙeṙo-go nalefuma Galyilaya kayenda kaiṙa na urukyenyi lo Uyuda, molyolya o Yoridan.
Wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wulemuosha, kawakyiṟia pfo.
Kyasia Mafarisayo wakayenda kokye, wakamwesha, wechimmbia, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi mndu iṙa mka okye chandu akukundia?”
Kagaluo, kawawia, “Muichi kye ulya alewagumba mawookyionyi, nalegumba mndu msoṟo na mndu mka?”
Kaengyeṟa igamba, “Kyipfa kya ikyo, mndu nechiṙa awuye na wamae, nawaṙane tapu na ioshana na mka okye; na iwo wawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi.
Kyasia wakyeri wawi-se-pfo, indi mmbiu umwi. Kyasia walya Ruwa awalunga, mndu alawaletsane.”
Wakammbia, “Kyasia nyi wuṙa-ng'u Mose alegamba kye mka-cho naenengo kyiṟeio kyeletsana wolyi, na imṙa?”
Kawawia, “Mose, kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanyu, nalemuenenga momu o lekana na waka wanyu; kyaindi wookyia mawookyionyi kyiwekyeri kuṙo-pfo.
Na inyi ngammbia nyoe, orio mndu echiṙa mka okye, sile nyi kyipfa kya wuṟui, kaalyika ungyi, naṟuguya. Na ulya aalyika ulya aṙio naṟuguya.”
Wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Mbonyi tsa mndu na mka okye tsikawa kuṙo, kuwoṙe kyiira ialyika-pfo.”
Kyaindi oe kawawia, “Chi woose weiṙima iambilyia ṙeṙo-lyi-pfo, sile walya wawaenengye wuiṙimi.

Kyipfa kuwoṙe wandu walekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wolyi kyipfa wawafee mbaṟe-yo iyo. Lyingyi-se kuwoṙe wandu wawaime nyi wandu wengyi pfinya tsekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wolyi. Ngoseṟa kuwoṙe wandu waleṙumbuo wo wawenyi iṙa ikuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wolyi kyipfa kya Wumangyi wo ruwewu. Eiṙima iambilyia ṙeṙo-lyi, nalyiambilyie.”
Naaho-ng'u kaendio wana watutu kundu nayekyie mawoko wuye yawo na iwaterewia; wanalosho wakye wakaṙeṙia walya walewaende.
Kyaindi Yesu kagamba, “Lekyenyi wana watutu wache na koko; maa mulawashingyie; cha kyipfa wafananyi na iwo, Wumangyi wo ruwewu nyi wowo.”
Kayekyia mawoko gakye wuye yawo kawuka pfo.
Na mndu umwi kayenda kokye kammbia, “Mlosha, ngyiwute kyindo kyiha kyicha, kundu ngyiwone moo o mlungana?”
Kammbia, “Ny'kyi kyitewe ungyiwesa mbonyi tsa wucha? Ai mcha nyi umwi. Kyaindi kokunda iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana, osha kyilya mawawaso gakundi.”
Kammbia, “Mawawaso gaha?” Yesu kagamba, “Nyi iga: Ulawaage, Ulaṟuguye maa Ulaṟuguyo, Ulaiwe, Ulaṟingyishie wongo.
India awuyo na womoo, Kunda momṟasa opfo chandu ukukundi iyoe kumonyi.”
Manakye ulya kammbia, “Igo goose ngyekyeosha kyilya gakundi. Ny'kyikyi ngyiwuṟie-se?”
Yesu kammbia, “Kokunda iwa mndu aafutsie shoose yenda undekumba shoose uwoṙe, uenengye wakyiwa, na iyoe nochiwaṙa kyiseyesoe ruwewu, numa nnjo ungyioshe.”
Kyiyeri manakye ulya aleicho ṙeṙo-lyo, kawuka ho akuinyaṙie; kyipfa nawewoṙe masaa gafoi.
Yesu kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kye kyechiwa kyilemeri mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu.
Lyingyi-se ngammbia, nyi kyaangu ngoseṟa ngamia iiṙa ṟochonyi lya sindanu, kuta mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
Kyiyeri wanalosho waleicho, waleṟiyio mnu, wechigamba, “Nyi wui-ng'u echiiṙima ikyia?”
Yesu kawaitukuya na pfinya, kawawia, “Ko wandu ikyo kyeiṙimika-pfo; kyaindi ko Ruwa shoose shekyeiṙimika.”
Naaho-ng'u Petiro kagaluo, kammbia, “Soe luleṙa shoose lukokuosha; lochienengo kyi?”

Yesu kawawia “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kye nyoe mulengyiosha inyi, wuyanenyi wuhya, kyiyeri Mono-Adamu echiṙamia kyiṙinyi kya mng'ano okye, na nyoe mochiṙamia shiṙinyi ikumi na shiwi, mochianduya mbaṟe ikumi na tsiwi tsa wandu wa Isiraelyi.
Na orio mndu aleṙa numba, ang'u mono-wamae o kyisoṟo ang'u o kyika, ang'u awuye, ang'u wamae, ang'u wana, ang'u maṙema, kyipfa kya rina lyako, nechiambilyia ka igana, na ioṟa moo o mlungana.
Kyaindi wafoi wai wa kuwooka wechiwa wefurumia, na wai wefurumia wechiwa wa kuwooka.”
“Cha kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na monyi kanyi, alefuma ngamenyi utuko indeṟeia waṙemi nawaṙuo ṙemenyi lyakye lya msabibu.
Na oe ammarise iiṙikyiana woguru na waṙemi walya iwaenenga dinari ko mfiri umwi, nalewaṙuo kulya ṙemenyi lyakye.
Kafuma kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟaaṟu tsa ngamenyi, kawona wengyi wagoṟokyi sangaṙa walawoṙe kyindo kyeṟunda.
Na iwo kawawia, ‘Na nyoe yendenyi ṙemenyi lyako lya msabibu, na kyilya kyiwaṟi ngyechimuenenga.’ Wakayenda.
Kafuma-se kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟandaaṟu na saa kyenda, kawuta wuṙo.
Na kyiyeri kya saa kumi na imwi kafuma, kakooya wengyi wagoṟokyi, kawawia, ‘Ny'kyilyi mugoṟokyi iha kyingoto puti kulawoṙe maṟunda?’
Wakammbia, ‘Ny'kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu aluṟeie iṟunda-pfo.’ Kawawia, ‘Na nyoe yendenyi ṙemenyi lyako lya msabibu.’
Kyiyeri kuleila, monyi ṙema ulya kawia mchilyi o waṙemi wakye, ‘Laga waṙemi, uwataae wori wowo, ochiwooka na o mafurumionyi mṟasa o kuwooka.’
Na kyiyeri walecha walya wa saa kumi na imwi, waleambilyia orio mndu dinari.
Na walya wa kuwooka kyiyeri walecha, walekusaṟa kye weambilyia ngoseṟa. Kyaindi na iwo taa wakaambilyia oṙio mndu dinari.
Kyasia wamuambilyie, wakanunuwia monyi kanyi,
wechigamba, ‘Iwo wa mafurumionyi waṟunda saa imwi tupu, na iyoe nowalyingatsana na soe lokarishia ngyuukyiwa na mui o mfiri puti.’
Na oe kagaluo umwi owo, kammbia, ‘Mbuya yako, ngakuima kyilya uwaṟi-pfo. Oiṙikyiana na inyi iambilyia dinari?
Ṙuo kyii kyapfo, uyende; ngakunda ienenga ichu o mafurumionyi kyilyingananyi na iyoe.
Chi sungusinyi iwuta na shilya shii shako chandu ngyikundi-pfoe? Ang'u riso lyapfo lyanyeng'a kyipfa kya inyi iwa mcha?’
Na wuṙo wa mafurumionyi wechiwa wa kuwooka, na wa kuwooka wechiwa wa mafurumionyi.”
Na lyilya Yesu aweiṙo echiyenda Yerusalemu, kaṙuo wanalosho walya ikumi na wawi handu halawoṙe wandu; na njienyi kawawia,
“Luiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu; na Mono-Adamu nechiwiko mawokonyi ga wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso; nawo wemwanduya napfe.
Numa ya iho wechimṙuo ko masanga waiṙime imkapa makuukuu, na imkapa na ngowa, na imkapia msalabenyi; na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu neṟuka.”
Naaho-ng'u mama o wana wa Sebedayo kayenda ko Yesu hamwi na wana wakye kamwindia, na imterewa kyindo.
Yesu kammbia, “Nukundi kyikyi?” Kammbia, “Gamba kye wana-wa wako wawi waṙamie umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe na umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso, Wumangyinyi wopfo.”
Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Muichi kyindo muiterewa-pfo. Ngyesa moiṙima iiṙia matuuro-ga gaingyiweṙa?” Wakammbia, “Loiṙima.”
Kawawia, “Kyaloi mochiiṙima ituuro cha inyi, kyaindi iṙamia kuwoko koko ko kulyoe na kuwoko koko ko kumoso, ngyiwoṙe pfinya yemuenenga-pfo, indi weenengo walya wawaṟeyeṟie nyi Awu-yoko.”
Na kyiyeri walya ikumi waleicho walesuuya wana walya wa mka wawi.
Kyaindi Yesu kawalaga, kagamba, “Muichi kye wang'anyi wa wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyechilyia wandu wawo kui pfinya, na wang'anyi wawo wakawagaluo waṟundi.
Kyaindi kyechiwa kuṙo konyu-pfo. Mndu oose akundi iwa ang'anyi konyu, na nawe mṟundi onyu;
na mndu oose akundi iwa o kuwooka konyu nawe kyisinga kyanyu.
Chandu Mono-Adamu alalecha iṟundio, kyaindi iṟunda, na ireka moo uwe kyindo kyekyiṟa wanyamaṟi.”
Na lyilya waweiwuka Yeriko wandu wa kyisanzionyi kying'anyi wakamwosha.
Na shipfupfuṟe shiwi shiweṙamie mbai ya njia, nasho kyiyeri shileicho kye Yesu naiiṙa, shilekuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, shechigamba, “Ulusaṟie, Mndumii, mono-Dawidi.”
Wandu wa kyisanzionyi kyilya wakashiṙeṙia, kundu shitsie. Kyaindi sho shikaengyeṟa ikuilenga na maṟui gang'anyi, shechigamba, “Ulusaṟie, Mndumii, mono-Dawidi!”
Yesu kagoṟoka, kashilaga, kagamba, “Mukundi ngyimmbutie kyi?”
Shikammbia, “Lukundi meso gaṙu gatambaṟukye luwone.”
Yesu kashiwonia wukyiwa, kapaaya meso gasho; cha ilyi shikaiṙima iwona, shikamwosha.
Na lyilya waleshika kufuhi na Yerusalemu, na ishika Betifage, kyikaṟo kyiwekyeri msaṟinyi o mashiṙi ga mseituni, naaho-ng'u Yesu aleṙuma wanalosho wawi, echiwawia,
“Yendenyi mṟasa kyikaṟo kyilya kyikyeri mbele ya ushangu lonyu, na cha ilyi mowona nzoi ingyipfungye, na igache lya nzoi hamwi nayo; tsipfunguonyi mungyiendie.
Na kokooya mndu ammbesa kyindo, gambenyi, ‘Mndumii nawoṙe kyindo akundi iwuta natso,’ na kulawoṙe iṙetsa kyiyeri nechitsiende.”
Ishi shoose shechiwa, kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku echigamba,
“Wienyi mṟi o Sion,
mangyi opfo naicha na kopfo,
namhoo, na oe naṙamie wuye ya nzoi.
Na igache lya nzoi, mana o nzoi.”
Wanalosho walya wakayenda, wakawuta chandu Yesu alewawia.
Wakaende nzoi iya na igache lya nzoi, wakawikyia nguwo tsawo wuye yatso, na oe kaṙamia wuye yayo.
Wandu wafoi wa kyisanzionyi kyilya wakaala nguwo tsawo njienyi; na wengyi wakamanya maṟamba ga mashiṙi, wakagaala njienyi.
Na wuingyi wo wandu wawesongoi, na walya walemwosha, wakakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi wechigamba,
“Hosiana, Mono-Dawidi!
Nyi oe ammbikyie mboṟa,
ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii,
Hosiana wuye ruwewu.”
Na lyilya aleiṙa na Yerusalemu, mṟi oose ukowaṙa ndiṟimo tsing'anyi, wandu wechigamba, “Nyi wui ichu?”
Wuingyi wo wandu wukogamba, “Ichu nyi moonguo shisuku ulya, Yesu o Nasareti ya Galyilaya.”
Yesu kaiṙa na hekalunyi, kafuna woose wawekapa mbucha kulya hekalunyi, kapfuluo mesa tsa weilacha heleri, na shiṙi sha walya waweikumba mbeta.
Kawawia, “Kyikyiṟeie, ‘Numba yako yechilago numba ya kyiterewionyi,’ kyaindi nyoe moigaluo iwa usanja lo wasokyi.”
Na shipfupfuṟe na shiwete shikayenda kokye akyeri kulya hekalunyi, kashikyiṟa.
Kyaindi wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso kyiyeri walewona maṟiyisho alewuta, na kyiyeri wana walekuilenga na maṟui gawo hekalunyi, wechigamba, “Hosiana, Mono-Dawidi” walesuo,
wakammbia, “Uichuoe chandu iwa waigamba?” Yesu kawawia, “Yee loi. Mulandeicho kye ‘Kui maṙumbu ga wana wanangu na waionga nuleafutsia kyiṟumi?’ ”
Kalekana nawo, kayenda nja ya mṟi mṟasa Betania, kalaa pfo.
Na lyilya kulekya kyiyeri aweiyenda mṟinyi, nalewoṙo nyi njaa.
Kawona mfumu umwi mbai ya njia, kayenda halya-ndu uwekyeri, alawone pfo kyindo sile maṟa tupu. Kauwia, “Kulawonekye ndunda kopfo wookyia inu mṟasa mlungana.” Mfumu ukouma cha ilyi.
Kyiyeri wanalosho walewona, waleṟiyio, wechigamba, “Nyi wuṙa mfumu ouma cha ilyi?”

Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mukowaṙa iiṙikyia, mulandewe wandu weilacha-ilacha kyilya moiṙikyia, mochiṟunda chi ilyo lya mfumu tupu-pfo, kyaindi maa mukowia fumvu-lyi, ‘Kuluka, uwiyitso ipalyipalyinyi,’ kyechiṟundika.
