Na shoose mochishiterewa kyiterewonyi mochiiṙikyia, mochiambilyia.”

Na kyiyeri amwiṙe na hekalunyi wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu wakayenda kokye kyiyeri aweilosha, wakagamba, “Nyi kui wuchilyi wuha uiwuta shindo-shi? Na oe nyi wui alekuenenga wuchilyi-wu?”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Na inyi ngyemmbesa kyindo kyimwi na nyoe mukongyigaluo, inyi ngyechimmbia nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiwuta ishi.
Wupatiso wa Yohane wulewuka kwi? Wulewuka ruwewu, ang'u ko wandu?” Wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Lukogamba, wulewuka ruwewu, neluwia, ‘Ny'kyilyi-ng'u mulalemwiṙikyia?’
Na lukogamba, ‘Wulewuka ko wandu,’ luiowuo kyisanzionyi; kyipfa wandu woose wawonyi Yohane nyi moonguo shisuku.”
Wakagaluo Yesu, wakagamba, “Luichi-pfo.” Na oe kawawia, “Maa inyi ngyimmbia nyoe nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiwuta ishi-pfo.”
“Kyaindi muwonyi kuṙa? Mndu umwi nawewoṙe wana wawi. Kayenda ko ulya o kuwooka, kagamba, ‘Mono-ko, inu yenda undeṟunda ṙemenyi lya msabibu.’
Kagaluo kagamba, ‘Ngyiyenda, Mndumii,’ alayende.
Kayenda ko ulya o kawi, kagamba wuṙo. Na oe kagaluo, kagamba, ‘Ngyikundi-pfo.’ Numa ya iho katerewa ihooṟio, kayenda.

Ngyesa kyiiṙi kya iwo wawi nyi uha aleṟunda kyilya awuye akundi?” Wakammbia, “Nyi ulya o kawi.” Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, wesania ukamba na maṟai waimusongoya iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa Yohane nalecha na konyu kui njia ya wusumganyi, nyoe mulamwiṙikyie. Kyaindi wesania ukamba na maṟai walemwiṙikyia; na nyoe maa lyilya mulewona, muleṙumbuya kundu mumwiṙikyie-pfo.”

“Aṙanyienyi mfano ungyi. Kuwewoṙe mndu umwi monyi kanyi, na oe nalewaaya sabibu ṙemenyi lyakye, kalyiringyichia uṟigo, kasuma rina lyekamia mpfinyo makyiṙi-gawi galyo, kawika kyitaanga, kagawia waṙemi ṙema lyilya, kayenda kyaro.
Ilyi kyiyeri kyesambuo kyiletikyira kufuhi, kaṙuma waṟundi wakye ko waṙemi walya, waambilyie ndunda tsakye.
Waṙemi walya wakawaṙa waṟundi walya, ichu wakamkapa, na ichu wakammbaaga, na ichu wakamkapa na magoe.
Kaṙuma-se waṟundi wengyi wafoi kuta walya wa kuwooka, wakawawutia wuṙo.
Mafurumionyi kaṙuma mono-kye o womi kowo, echigamba, weindia mono-ko.
Kyaindi waṙemi walya kyiyeri walewona mana ulya, wakaṙeṙa wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, ‘Ichu nyi mokyioṟa. Sindenyi lummbaage, luṙuo kyooṟa kyakye.’
Wakammbaṙa, wakammbiyitsa nja ya ṙema lya msabibu wakammbaaga.
Kyasia kyiyeri echicha mndumii ulya o ṙema lya msabibu nechiwutia kyi waṙemi-wo?”
Wakammbia, “Nechirumatsa uwicho walya wawicho; na ṙema lya msabibu nechigawia waṙemi wengyi, wechimtaa ndunda kui kyiyeri kyiwaṟi.”
Yesu kawawia, “Muichi chandu kyikyeri shiṟeionyi:
‘Igoe walelyilega wewika numba,
ilyo lyawa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi;
ṙeṙo-lyi lyiwukyie ko Mndumii,
nalyo nyi kyiṟiyisho mesonyi gaṙu?’ ”
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, “Wumangyi wo Ruwa wochiwuto konyu, na ienengo isanga lyingyi lyekyekumbia ndunda tsa Wumangyi-wo. [
Na icho echioloka wuye ya igoe-lyo nechifinjika-finjika; na ulya lyechimwolokyia, lyechimsaa lyimmamiṟe.]”
Wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo, kyiyeri waleicho mfano yakye, walemanya kye nyi kyawo aiṙeṙa.
Nawo kyiyeri walepfula immbaṙa, waleowuo wuingyi wo wandu, cha kyipfa wo walemmbona nai moonguo shisuku.
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia-se kui mṙeṙie, echigamba,
“Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mangyi umwi aleachikyia mono-kye wolyi.
Kaṙuma shisinga shakye shilage walya wawewalage na kulya wolyinyi; nawo wakalega icha.
Kaṙuma-se shisinga shingyi, echigamba, ‘Wienyi walya wawalage, kye ngyiṟeyeṟie shelya shako; umbe tsako na orio kyindo kyinoru shamshinjo, na shoose shammba; nnjonyi na wolyinyi.’
Kyaindi wakamina, wakayenda, umwi ṙemenyi kokye, umwi mbuchenyi yakye;
na walya waletsugaa wakawaṙa shisinga shilya shakye, wakashiwutia shindo shiwicho, na ishiwaaga.
Kyasia mangyi ulya kakapo nyi nyashi; kaṙika mbaganyi tsakye, karumatsa wawaagi walya, karumatsa mṟi owo kui moṙo.
Numa ya iho kawia shisinga shakye, ‘Wolyi wommba, kyaindi walya wawalage wawaṟi-pfo.
Kyasia yendenyi mṟasa handu mtandaṟa ikooyanyi na woose mowawona walagenyi na wolyinyi.’
Shisinga shilya shikafuma shikayenda njienyi ing'anyi, shikasania woose walewawona, wawicho na wecha; wolyi wukoichuo wayenu.
Kyaindi kyiyeri mangyi ulya aleiṙa na numba kundu naambuye wayenu wakye, kawona pfo mndu umwi alaṟee mkoṟoṟi o wolyi.
Kammbia, ‘Mbuya-ko, noiṙa kuṙa na kunu na iyoe uwoṙe mkoṟoṟi o wolyi-pfo?’ Na oe kauṟa kyegamba.
Mangyi kawia waṟundi, ‘Mpfungyenyi mawoko na maṙende, mṙuonyi mundemmbiyitsa meemenyi o nja. Nyipfo kochiwaṙa ṟanyi na ilya ngakuru.
Cha kyipfa walage nyi wafoi, indi wasambuṟe nyi waangu.’ ”
Naaho-ng'u Mafarisayo wakayenda wakalya njama, chandu wemṙega kui maṙeṙo.

Wakaṙuma kokye wanalosho wawo hamwi na Maherodi, wakagamba, “Mlosha, luichi kye iyoe nyi mndu o loi, na njia ya Ruwa nokyeilosha kui wuloi, maa okyesaṟa rina lya mndu oose-pfo, cha kyipfa okyeambuya fana tsa wandu-pfo.
Kyasia luwie, nuwonyi kuṙa? Nyi sungusinyi ienenga Kaisari kodi, ang'u chi wuṙo-pfo?”
Kyaindi Yesu kamanya wuwicho wowo, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi mungyiyesha, nyoe wakulembecheṟi?
Ngyiloṟenyi heleri ya kodi.” Nawo wakamwendie dinari.
Kawawia, “Nyi ya wui sanamu-i na kyiṟeio-kyi?”
Wakammbia, “Nyi ya Kaisari.” Kawawia, “Kyasia, enengyenyi Kaisari shikyeri sha Kaisari, na Ruwa shikyeri sha Ruwa.”
Kyiyeri waleicho waleṟiyio, wakamṙa wakayenda.
Mfiri ulya Masadukayo, wandu wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟuka lya wapfu-pfo, waleyenda kokye, wakammbesa,
wechigamba, “Mlosha, Mose nalegamba, ‘Mndu kapfa, alawoṙe wana, mono-wamae naalyikye mka ulya okye, kundu mono-wamae nawone mana.’
Kyasia koṙu kuwewoṙe wana wa mka mfungaaṙe. O kuwooka kaalyika, kapfa, na kyipfa alawoṙe mana, kaṙeeya mono-wamae mka okye.
Na wuṙo o kawi na oe, na o kaṟaaṟu, mṟasa woose mfungaaṙe.
Mafurumionyi ga woose mndu mka ulya na oe kapfa.
Kyasia, kyiyeri kya iṟuka lya wapfu, nechiwa mka o uha kyiiṙi kya walya mfungaaṙe? Kyipfa woose wawekyeri na oe.”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Muiṙeka, cha kyipfa muichi shiṟeio maa wuiṙimi wo Ruwa-pfo.
Cha kyipfa walya wekyeṟuka ko wapfu wekyealyika maa ialyiko-pfo, kyaindi wekyewa cha malaika wa ruwewu.
Lyingyi-se ko mbonyi tsa iṟuka lya wapfu, muichi kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi Ruwa, echigamba,
‘Inyi nyi Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi na Ruwa o Yakobo?’ Ruwa chi Ruwa o wapfu-pfo, indi o wai na moo.”
Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu waleicho waleṟiyio, kyipfa kya malosho gakye.
Na kyiyeri Mafarisayo waleicho kye nalegaluo ndiṟi Masadukayo walya, waleṙamia kyiṙombo handu hamwi.
Umwi owo, aichi mawawaso, kammbesa, echimwesha,
“Mlosha, kyiiṙi kya mawawaso nyi lyiha lying'anyi kuta goose?”
Yesu kammbia, “Kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo kui ngoo yapfo yoose, na kui mrima opfo oose, na kui wuṟango wopfo woose.
Ilyi nyilyo iwawaso lying'anyi kuta goose, nalyo nyi lya kuwooka.
Na lya kawi lyifananyi nalyo, nalyo nyi ilyi, ‘Kunda momṟasa opfo cha mrima opfo.’
Mawawaso goose na malosho ga weonguo shisuku gakyeri kyiiṙi kya mawawaso-ga gawi.”
Na kyiyeri Mafarisayo walesanzia handu hamwi, Yesu nalewawesa, echigamba, “Muwonyi kuṙa mbonyi tsa Kristo?
Nyi mono-wui?” Wakammbia, “Nyi o Dawidi.”
Kawawesa, “Kyasia kyawa-ng'u kuṙa Dawidi kyiiṙi kya Mumuyo ilaga Mndumii, echigamba,
‘Mndumii nalewia Mndumii oko,
uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe,
mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechiwika washituwa wapfo,
wanda ya wuchilyi wopfo?’ ”
“Kyasia, Dawidi kamlaga Mndumii, nawa-se kuṙa mono-kye?”
Maa kulewaṙa mndu aleiṙima imgaluo kyindo-pfo; maa kuwoṙe mndu oose alekaria wookyia mfiri ulya immbesa kyindo-se-pfo.
Numa ya iho Yesu kaṙeṙa na wuingyi wo wandu na wanalosho wakye, echigamba,
“Walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo wawoṙe wuiṙimi wo tambuluo mawawaso ga Mose.
Kyasia, shoose wechimmbia, mushiwute; kyaindi kui mfano o mawuto gawo, mulawute; kyipfa wo wekyeṙeṙa kyaindi wekyewuta-pfo.
Wo wekyepfunga maṟio malemeri na iṙika wandu mayewenyi gawo; walakunde wo wawenyi igapaaya na kyimnyoe kyawo.

Lyingyi-se mmbutie yawo yoose nyi kundu wawono nyi wandu; cha kyipfa shichonyi-sho shishiṟeie maṙeṙo ga Ruwa wekyeṟaa shaamunyi shawo na mawoko nyi shing'anyi mnu, na makyechu ga mkoṟoṟi yawo gangyilesheṟe mnu.
Wakundi iṙamia shiṙi sha mbele handu hawoṙe shelya, na iṙamia mbele masinagoginyi,
na iiṟikyiṟo sangaṙa, na ilago nyi wandu ‘Rabi.’
Kyaindi nyoe mulalago ‘Rabi,’ kyipfa mlosha onyu nyi umwi, na nyoe moose nyi wana wa mka.
Maa mulalage mndu awu wuyanenyi, kyipfa Awu-yonyu nyi umwi, ai o ruwewu.
Maa mulalago wasongoru; kyipfa msongoru onyu nyi umwi, na oe nyi oe Kristo.
Na oe ai ang'anyi onyu nechiwa mṟundi onyu.
Na orio oose echikung'anyisa amonyi nechititiṟo, na orio oose echikutitiṟa amonyi neching'anyiso.
“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyeshingyia wandu moongo o Wumangyi wo ruwewu; nyoe muwenyi mulaiṙe napfo, maa walya waiiṙa mulawalekyie waiṙe napfo.

“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyesoka wakusu orio kyindo wawoṙe, na kui wukulembecheṟi mokyewika shiterewo shileshi; kyipfa kya ikyo mochiambilyia ianduyo lying'anyi ngoseṟa.]

“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyetenga-tenga mapalyipalyinyi na urukyenyi lugaṙutsu kundu mugaluoe mndu umwi nawaṙe iiṙikyia, na kammboneka, mokyemgaluo kawa mana o ngyehena ammbicho kuta nyoe kawi.
“Ochia lonyu wasongoru mui shipfupfuṟe. Nyoe mokyegamba, ‘Mndu echilya nyamu kui hekalu chi kyindo-pfo, indi mndu kalya nyamu kui shindo sha sahapu shikyeri hekalunyi, kyimmbaṟi iwuta shilya ateṟia.’
Nyoe matondo na shipfupfuṟe. Kyipfa nyi kyiha kying'anyi kuta kyingyi, nyi sahapu iya, ang'u hekalu-lyo lyekyeyeṟemtsa sahapu-yo?
Lyingyi-se, ‘Mndu echilya nyamu kui alyitaṟe, chi kyindo-pfo; indi mndu echilya nyamu kui kyienengo kyikyeri iho wuye ya alyitaṟe-yo, kyimmbaṟi iwuta shilya ateṟia.’
Shipfupfuṟe nyoe. Kyipfa nyi kyiha kying'anyi kuta kyingyi, kyienengo-kyo, ang'u alyitaṟe-yo yekyeyeṟemtsa kyienengo-kyo?
Kyasia ulya alya nyamu kui alyitaṟe, nekyelya nyamu nayo na shindo shoose shikyeri wuye yayo.
Na ulya alya nyamu kui hekalu, nekyelya nyamu nalyo, na ilya nyamu kui Ruwa ulya ekyekaa pfo.
Na ulya ekyelya nyamu kui ngyina, nekyelya nyamu kui kyiṙi kya mng'ano kya Ruwa, na ilya nyamu kui Ruwa ulya akyiṙamilyie.

“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyetaa orio kyifunjoe kya ikumi kya maṟa gelotsiṟa kyelya, kyaindi mukoṙa mbonyi tsing'anyi tsa mawawaso, cha iṙumbuo moondu kulawoṙe ikundia, na isaṟia, na iiṙikyia. Isho muwaṟi ishiwuta, maa shilya shingyi mulashiṙe.
Wasongoru shipfupfuṟe, mokyefifina kyitsina shindonyi shanyu shenyo kyaindi mkomeṟa ngamia.
“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyesanja kyiṙoo na kyitela ipfo kyanja kyaindi shindo muwikyie pfo nyi sha wusokyi na ikukunda nyoe muwenyi.
Iyoe Mfarisayo kyipfupfuṟe. Sanja kyiṙoo kuwooka ipfo kyanumba, kundu na ipfo kyanja kuiṙime iila.

“Ochia lonyu, walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mufananyi na shilome shishishie kyindo kya uwiṟo, nasho kya ipfo nja shekyewoneka shii shicha, kyaindi ipfo kyanumba shiichuo mafuo ga wapfu; na orio kyindo kyiporu.
Na wuṙo na nyoe; ipfo kyanja muwono nyi wandu cha muwoṙe wusumganyi, kyaindi ipfo kyanumba muichuo wukulembecheṟi na ifunja mawawaso lya orio mbaṟe.
“Ochia lonyu, walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyewika shilome shicha sheṟika weonguo shisuku na waṟundi wengyi wasumganyi wa Ruwa na shilome-sho mkoshichopa mnu,
na igamba, ‘Kokooya soe luwekyeri pfo kyiyeri kya kacha kya waku waṙu, luwechisanza nawo ipusuo samu ya weonguo shisuku-pfo.’
Kuṙi muikuṟingyishia muwenyi, kye nyoe nyi wana wa walya walewaaga weonguo shisuku.
Afutsienyi-ng'u kyila waku wanyu walewooka.
Nyoe njoka, wana wa manjoka, moṙicha kuṙa ngapo ya ngyehena?

Kyipfa kya ikyo, inyi ngyiṙuma konyu weonguo shisuku na wawoṙe wuṟango na walosha wa mawawaso na wengyi kyiiṙi kyawo mochiwawaaga na iwakapia msalabenyi, wengyi kyiiṙi kyawo mochiwakapa wakyeri masinagoginyi ganyu na iwafuna mṟi kui mṟi.
Na mochiwona ngapo kyipfa kya samu ya wandu wasumganyi mulewaaga, wookyia samu ya Abelyi, ulya msumganyi, mṟasa samu ya Sakaria, mono-Barakyia, mulemmbaagia kyiiṙi kya haele na alyitaṟe.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbienyi, ngapo-tso tsoose tsechiolokyia rika-lyi.

“Iyoe Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, uiwaaga weonguo shisuku na ikapa na magoe walya wawaṙume kopfo! Nyi kyenga ngyilekunda ikusania hamwi na wana wapfo, chandu nguku yekyesania handu hamwi maalea gayo wanda ya makungo gayo, kyaindi mulekunda-pfo?
Ruwa akyeri-se numbenyi yanyu yeterewia-pfo.
Cha kyipfa ngammbia, mochingyiwona-se maa ale wookyia wulalu-pfo, mṟasa kyiyeri mochigamba, ‘Namwenengye mboṟa ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii.’ ”
Yesu kayenda, kawuka hekalunyi. Wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye wamloṟe numba tsa hekalu.
Na oe kagaluo, kawawia, “Muwonyi ishi shoose? Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, hechitsugaa igoe wuye ya igoe lyingyi lyilechiolotso-pfo.”

Na lyilya aweṙamie fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni, wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye kui kyiṟika, wechigamba, “Luwie, mbonyi-tsi tsechiwa indi? Na kyiṟingyishio kya icha lyapfo na kya mafurumionyi ga wuyana nyi kyikyi?”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Mndu alamlembe.
Cha kyipfa wafoi wechicha kui rina lyako, wechigamba, ‘Inyi nyi Kristo;’ nawo wechilemba wafoi.
Na nyoe mochiicho mbonyi tsa shiṙa na iweweṙo lya shiṙa. Maa mulaowesho; kyipfa isho shiwaṟi iwa kuṙo; kyaindi mafurumionyi galya galandeshikye-pfo.
Cha kyipfa isanga lyechiwuka ikapana na isanga, na wumangyi ikapana na wumangyi. Kochiwaṙa njaa, na shiriinza handu kui handu.
Isho shoose nyisho mawookyionyi ga iwawio lying'anyi.
Kyiyeri-kyo wechimṟiinga nyoe muwoṙo nyi wukyiwa, nawo wechimmbaaga, na nyoe mochiwa wandu wawasuoe nyi masanga goose kyipfa kya rina lyako.
Naaho-ng'u wafoi wechikapa tuulyia, nawo wechiṟiingana, na isuana.
Na weonguo shisuku wa wongo wechiwoneka na ilemba wafoi.
Na kyipfa kya iengyeṟika inyamaṟa mawawaso, ikunda lya wandu wafoi lyechiololyia.
Kyaindi ulya echikarishia mṟasa mafurumionyi, nyi oe echikyia.
Lyingyi-se mbonyi ngyicha tsa Wumangyi tsechiongoyo wuyanenyi koose, iwa wuṟingyishi wo masanga goose. Iho nyiho mafurumionyi galya gechicha.”
“Kyasia kyiyeri-kyo mochiwona ulya ekyenyamaṟa na ifunja orio kyindo kyiele, ulya amgambe nyi moonguo shisuku Danielyi, agoṟokyi handu haele (aikulosha na namanye).
Naaho-ng'u wakyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda waṙichilyie mafumvunyi.
Na ai kai alasokye iṙuo shilya shikyeri kanyi kokye.
Maa akyeri mṙemenyi alawuye na numa ionduo nguwo yakye.
Ochia lo iwo wai wanene na waionza mfiri-yo!
Terewenyi, kundu iṙicha lyanyu kulawe kyiyeri kya mbeho, maa mfiri o onyonya.
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri-kyo kochiwaṙa wukyiwa wung'anyi, mbaṟe yakye ilandewonekye wookyia mawookyionyi ga wuyana mṟasa wulalu, maa mbaṟe-yo iyo yechiwono-se maa ale-pfo.
Na kokooya mfiri-yo ilawechifuhiṟo, mndu oose awechikyia-pfo; kyaindi kyipfa kya wasambuṟe mfiri-yo yechifuhiṟo.
Kyiyeri-kyo mndu kammbia, ‘Kristo nakyeri iha, ang'u nakyeri kulya,’ mulaiṙikyie.
Cha kyipfa wechiwoneka makristo wa wongo, na weonguo shisuku ga wongo, nawo wechiwuta ṟigo tsing'anyi na shiṟiyisho; waiṙime imuṙetsa, cha kyikaiṙimika, mṟasa wai wasambuṟe.
Ngammuikyimbia.
Kyasia wakammbia, ‘Nakyeri kundu ko nuka kuumu suwaa kulawoṙe maa mṟinga,’ mulafume; ‘Nakyeri kanyi,’ mulaiṙikyie.
Cha kyipfa chandu mbawa yekyewaṟuka iwuka ura lo ngamenyi mṟasa ikawono ura lo kyukonyi, nyi wuṙo kochiwa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mono-Adamu.
Cha kyipfa handu mnying'a ukyeri nyi ho-ndu mbeṟo tsekyekuumbia.”

“Kyaindi cha ilyi, numa ya wukyiwa wo mfiri iya, mnengyeṟi ochiwiko meema, na mori ochiloṟa ngyesa yacho-pfo, na nyenyeri tsechioloka iwuka ruwewu, na shindo shingyi sha ruwewu shekupaaya-paya na inyanyaṟika.
Naaho-ng'u yechiwonekana ṟigo ya Mono-Adamu ruwewu; na masanga goose ga wuyana gechikapa ṟanyi; nago gechiwona Mono-Adamu echicha mapuchinyi ga ruwewu hamwi na pfinya na mng'ano ung'anyi.
Na oe nechiṙuma malaika wakye hamwi na ṟui lying'anyi lya iganda, nawo wechisania wasambuṟe wakye iwuka ngyuura tsoose tsa wuyana.”
“Kyasia ko mfumu kuloshenyi mfano. Mbaga yakye ikammarisa ioṟia na iwaṙa maṟa, mokyemanya kye kyiyeri kya isambuo kyikyeri kufuhi.
Na nyoe taa, ilyi mowona isho shoose, manyenyi kye Mono-Adamu nakyeri kufuhi, moongonyi.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, rika-lyi lyechiiṙa-pfo, mṟasa kyiyeri isho shechiafukyia.
Ngyina na uruka shechiiṙa, kyaindi, maṙeṙo gako gechiiṙa maa ale-pfo.”
“Kyaindi mbonyi tsa mfiri ulya na saa iya kuwoṙe aichi-pfo, maa malaika wakyeri ruwewu, maa Mana, sile Awu amonyi.
Cha kyipfa chandu kyiwekyeri kyiyeri kya Noe, nyi wuṙo kochiwa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mono-Adamu.
Cha kyipfa chandu kyiwekyeri mfiri iya ilesongoya Mfu wandu waweilya na inyo, wechialyika na ialyiko, mṟasa mfiri ulya Noe aleiṙa na safinenyi
walamanye mṟasa Mfu ukocha, ukowarumatsa woose. Nyi wuṙo kochiwa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mono-Adamu.
Kyiyeri-kyo wandu wawi wekooya wai ṙemenyi; umwi nawuto ho, umwi naṙio ho.
Waka wawi wekooya wesaa; umwi nawuto ho, umwi naṙio ho.”
“Kyasia laenyi kyiṙombo; kyipfa muichi nyi mfiri uha Mndumii onyu echicha-pfo.
Kyaindi manyenyi kyindo-kyi; kokooya monyi kanyi aweichi kyiyeri mbafu yechicha, nawelaa kyiṙombo, maa awechiṙa numba yakye ifunjo-pfo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo na nyoe kuṟeyeṟenyi; cha kyipfa saa mulaikusaṟie Mono-Adamu naicha.”
“Kyasia nyi wui-ng'u mṟundi muyendelyi, awoṙe wuṟango, mndumii okye alemwenenga wuchilyi kanyi kokye, naenengye wandu kyelya kyiyeri kyiwaṟi?
Agusu mṟundi ulya, mndumii okye echicha namkooye ewuta kuṙo.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, nechimwenenga ichilyia shindo shakye shoose.
Kyaindi mṟundi ulya mmbicho kagamba mrimenyi kokye, ‘Mndumii oko naikyelyio,’
kawooka ikapa woṙoe, na ilya na inyo hamwi na wananzi.
Mndumii o mṟundi-cho neecha mfiri mṟundi-cho alaukusaṟie, na saa alaichi;
nechimṙumbuo mateng'eta gawi na immbutia chandu wakulembecheṟi wekyewutio. Nyi lyo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.”
“Naaho-ng'u Wumangyi wo ruwewu wochifanana na wana wa kyika ikumi, waleira taa tsawo, wakafuma indeambilyia monyi wolyi.
Wataanu wawekyeri matondo, na wataanu wawewoṙe wuṟango.
Walya wawekyeri matondo waleira taa tsawo, walaṙuo mafuṙa;
indi walya wawoṙe wuṟango waleṙuo mafuṙa shindonyi shawo shewika mafuṙa hamwi na taa tsawo.
Na lyilya monyi wolyi alekyelyio, woose wakarengyera wakalaa maṙoe.
Kyaindi kyio kya mayeleyele, hakawaṙa iiṟuka lya mndu aigamba, ‘Aulya, monyi wolyi; fumenyi mundemwambilyia.’
Cha ilyi wana walya wa kyika woose wakafuma, wakaṟeyeṟa taa tsawo.
Walya wai matondo wakawia walya wawoṙe wuṟango, ‘Luenengyenyi shifuṙa shanyu; kyipfa taa tsaṙu tsiruma.’
Kyaindi walya wawoṙe wuṟango wakawagaluo, wechigamba, ‘Chi wuṙo-pfo; gelushika soe na nyoe-pfo. Nanga moyenda ko walya wekyekumba mafuṙa mundeguṟa pfo ganyu.’
Nawo kyiyeri waweiyenda iguṟa, monyi wolyi kacha, na walya wawekuṟeyeṟie wakaiṙa na oe na wolyinyi; moongo ukoshingo.
Numa wana walya wa kyika wengyi wakacha, wakagamba, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii, lupfunguye moongo.’
Kagaluo kagamba, ‘Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, ngyimuichi nyoe-pfo.’
Kyasia laenyi kyiṙombo, cha kyipfa muichi mfiri-cho maa saa-pfo.”
“Kyipfa nyi cha mfano o mndu akundi iyenda kyaro. Nalelaga waṟundi wakye, kawaṙambika masaa gakye.
Kaenenga umwi talanta tsitaanu, na umwi talanta tsiwi, na umwi talanta imwi; orio mndu iṙuana na wuiṙimi wokye; kayenda kyaro.
Cha ilyi ulya aleambilyia talanta tsitaanu kayenda, kakapa natso mbucha, kawona ho kyiira talanta tsingyi tsitaanu.
Na wuṙo taa ulya awoṙe tsiwi; oe kawona ho kyiira talanta tsiwi.
Kyaindi ulya aleambilyia imwi, naleyenda kasuma wanda terinyi, kaṟika pfo heleri iya ya mndumii okye.
Mfiri ifoi yamuiṙe mndumii o waṟundi walya kacha, kaachikyia matala hamwi nawo.
Ulya aleambilyia talanta tsitaanu kacha kaende talanta tsingyi tsitaanu, echigamba, ‘Mndumii, nulekooma koko talanta tsitaanu; aitsi talanta tsingyi tsitaanu ndewona ho kyiira.’
Mndumii okye kammbia, ‘Necha, mṟundi mcha na mwendelyi. Nokuloṟa kye numwendelyi maa shindonyi shitutu. Ngyechikuwika mchilyi o shindo shifoi. Iṙa na sienyi ya mndumii opfo.’
Na ulya aleambilyia talanta tsiwi kacha, kagamba, ‘Mndumii, nulekooma koko talanta tsiwi; aitsi, talanta tsingyi tsiwi ndewona ho kyiira.’
Mndumii okye kammbia, ‘Necha, mṟundi mcha na mwendelyi. Nokuloṟa kye numwendelyi maa shindonyi shitutu. Ngyechikuwika mchilyi o shindo shifoi. Iṙa na sienyi ya mndumii opfo.’
Na ulya aleambilyia talanta imwi, kagamba, ‘Mndumii, ngyilemanya kye iyoe nyi mndu muumu. Nokyesambuo handu ulawaaya, nokyesania handu ulaolyie mbeu.
Kyasia ngaowuo, ngayenda ngaṟika talanta yapfo terinyi. Wulalu nuwoṙe kyilya kyikyeri kyapfo.’
Mndumii okye kagaluo, kagamba, ‘Iyoe mṟundi mmbicho na mṙoko. Nulemanya kye ngyekyesambuo handu ngyilawaaya, ngyekyesania handu ngyilaolyia mbeu.
Kyasia, kyiwekuwaṟi ikooma heleri yako ko walya wekyeilacha heleri; na inyi ngacha ngyiwewona kyilya kyikyeri kyako na heleri ya ngoseṟa.
Kyasia, msokyenyi talanta-yo enengyenyi ulya awoṙe talanta ikumi.
Cha kyipfa ulya awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na iengyeṟio pacha; kyaindi alawoṙe kyindo, maa kyilya awoṙe nechisoko.
Na mṟundi-cho alawoṙe kyiira, mmbiyitsenyi kuleshi meemenyi o nja. Nyi pfo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.’ ”
“Kyiyeri-kyo Mono-Adamu echicha mng'anonyi okye na malaika waele woose hamwi na oe, nyi lyo-ndu echiṙamia kyiṙinyi kya mng'ano okye.
Na masanga goose gechisanzia mbele yakye; na oe nechiwasawuo chandu mlyisi ekyesawuo moondo na mburu.
Nechiwika moondo kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, na mburu kuwoko kokye ko kumoso.
Numa ya iho mangyi nechiwia walya wakyeri kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, ‘Nnjonyi, nyoe muwawikyie mboṟa nyi Awu-yoko, oṟenyi Wumangyi muleṟeyeṟio wookyia itsano lya wuyana.
Cha kyipfa ngyiwewoṙo nyi njaa, mkongyienenga kyelya; ngyiwemwangari mukongyienenga mṟinga o nyo; ngyiwekyeri muyenu, mukongyiambilyia cha mndu onyu;
ngyiwemkuuye, mukongyienenga nguwo tseṟaa; ngyiweluoe, mukochengyiwia hai; ngyiwekyeri kyipfungonyi mukochengyisaia.’
Naaho-ng'u wasumganyi wechimgaluo, wechigamba, ‘Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona uwoṙo nyi njaa, lukokuenenga kyelya, ang'u umwangari lukokuenenga mṟinga o nyo?
Lyingyi-se nyi indi lulekuwona ukyeri muyenu, lukokuambilyia cha mndu oṙu, ang'u umkuuye, lukokuenenga nguwo tseṟaa?
Nyi indi-se lulekuwona uluoe, ang'u ukyeri kyipfungonyi, lukokusaia?’
Na Mangyi nechigaluo, echiwawia, ‘Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, chandu mulewutia umwi o wana wa wama-wo wako wai watutu, mulengyiwutia inyi.’
Numa ya iho nechiwia na walya wakyeri kuwoko kokye ko kumoso, ‘Wukyenyi koko, nyoe muwasese, muyende moṙonyi o mlungana, umṟeyeṟie Mokyiriinzi na malaika wakye.
Cha kyipfa nyiwewoṙo nyi njaa, mulangyienengye kyelya; ngyiwemwangari, mulangyienengye mṟinga o nyo;
ngyiwekyeri muyenu, mulangyiambilyie cha mndu onyu; ngyiwemkuuye, mulangyienengye nguwo tseṟaa; ngyiweluoe, na ngyiwekyeri kyipfungonyi, mulachengyisaia.’

Naaho-ng'u na iwo taa wechigaluo, wechigamba, ‘Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona iyoe uwoṙo nyi njaa, ang'u umwangari, ang'u ukyeri muyenu, ang'u umkuuye, ang'u uluoe, ang'u ukyeri kyipfungonyi, lulakupfuṟukanie?’
Na oe newagaluo, echigamba, ‘Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, chandu mulalewutia umwi o iwo wai watutu, mulengyiwutia inyi-pfo.’
Na iwo wechiyenda na iiṙa na ngaponyi ya mlungana; indi wasumganyi wechiyenda moonyi o mlungana.”
Na lyilya Yesu alemarisa ionguo shindo-sho shoose, nalewia wanalosho wakye,
“Muichi kye numa ya mfiri iwi kochiwa pasaka, na Mono-Adamu nechiṟiingo nakapio msalabenyi.”
Kyiyeri kyilya wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na wasongoru wa wandu, wakasanzia numbenyi ya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose ekyelago Kayafa;
wakachila handu hamwi, kundu wawaṙe Yesu kui ngyeṟo na immbaaga.
Kyaindi wakagamba, “Kyilawe kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi, kulacheamka kyituṟu wandunyi.”
Na Yesu kyiyeri awekyeri Betania numbenyi ko Simion awewoṙo nyi taambo,
mndu mka awewoṙe kyimkyepe kyiwoṙe mafuṙa mecha gekushia ga woguru wung'anyi naletikyira kufuhi na oe, kagaletsia mṙoenyi kokye kyiyeri aweṙamie echilya.
Wanalosho wakye kyiyeri walewona, wakasuo, wakagamba, “Iola-ola-lyi ilyi nyi lya kyikyi?
Kyipfa mafuṙa-ga gaweiṙima ikumbo ko heleri tsifoi wakyiwa waenengo.”
Yesu kamanya, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muilyisa mndu mka-chu wukyiwa? Kyipfa nyi iṟunda lyicha angyiṟundia inyi.
Cha kyipfa mfiri yoose muwoṙe wakyiwa hamwi na nyoe; kyaindi inyi mungyiwoṙe mfiri yoose-pfo.
Kyipfa kui ipusia mmbiu oko mafuṙa-go, nawuta aṙo ingyiṟeyeṟa ko iṟiko lyako.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbienyi orio handu ndumi-i ngyicha yechiongoyo wuyanenyi koose, kyindo-kyo mndu mka-chu aṟunda na kyakye kyegambo kyipfa-kya imkumbuo.”
Kyiyeri-kyo umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, awekyelago Yuda Isikariote naleyenda ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi,
kagamba, “Ny'kyikyi mochingyienenga, ngamtarama muiṙime immbaṙa?” Wakamteṟia rupia makumi gaṟaaṟu.
Wookyia kyiyeri kyilya Yuda kapfula ṙaawa lyicha lyemṟiinga.
Na mfiri o kuwooka o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe, wanalosho walya waleyenda ko Yesu, wakammbia, “Nyi hanga ukundi lukuṟeyeṟie ulyiie ho Pasaka?”
Kagamba, “Yendenyi mṟinyi ko mndu mlyiwe, mundemmbia, ‘Mlosha nagamba, kyiyeri kyako kyikyisaangye kyikyeri kufuhi; kopfo ngyechiachikyia Pasaka hamwi na wanalosho wako.’ ”
Wanalosho wakawuta chandu Yesu alewawia, wakaṟeyeṟa Pasaka.
Kyasia kyiyeri kuleila naleṙamia ilya kyelya hamwi na walya ikumi na wawi.
Nawo kyiyeri waweilya, nalegamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, umwi onyu nechingyiṟiinga.”
Wanalosho wakye wakawoṙo nyi fowa mnu, wakawooka immbesa umwi, umwi, “Nyi inyi, Mndumii?”
Kagaluo, kagamba, “Icho awika kuwoko kokye hamwi na inyi kyitelenyi, nyi oe echingyiṟiinga.
Mono-Adamu naindepfa, chandu kyikyiṟeie; kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya echiṟiinga Mono-Adamu! Kyiwechiwa nanga mndu-cho alawefeo.”
Yuda, ulya momṟiinga, kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyi inyi, Mlosha?” Kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
Nawo kyiyeri waweilya, Yesu naleira mkate, kauwikyia mboṟa, kaupeṟenguo, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Waṙilyienyi, mulye. Ichu nyicho mmbiu oko.”
Kaira kyiṙoo, kaana, kawaenengyia, echigamba, “Nyonyi moose kyilya kyikyeri kunu
cha kyipfa iyi nyi samu yako ya mma, ipusuka kyipfa kya wafoi ko iwuto wunyamaṟi.
Kyaindi ngammbia, ngyechinyo-se mpfinyo maa ale-pfo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechiunyo na nyoe wuyanenyi wuhya wo Awu-yoko.”
Nawo kyiyeri walemarisa iimba, wakafuma na nja iyenda fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni.
Naaho-ng'u Yesu kawawia, “Nyoe moose mochiwihiyo kyipfa kyako kyio-kyi; cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Ngyechiwaaga mlyisi, na moondo ga poo gechinyanyaṟika.’
Kyaindi numa ya iṟuka lyako, ngyechimusongoya iyenda Galyilaya.”
Petiro kagaluo, kammbia, “Wakawihiyo woose kyipfa kyapfo, inyi ngyechiwihiyo maa ale-pfo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi ngakuwia iyoe, kyio-kyi ilying'onyi lyilafuga, nongyikana kaṟaaṟu.”
Petiro kammbia, “Maa kokooya ngyechipfa na iyoe, ngyechikukana maa ale-pfo.” Na wanalosho woose wakagamba wuṙo.
Numa ya iho Yesu kayenda hamwi nawo mṟasa handu hekyelago Getisemane, kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ṙamienyi iha, mṟasa ngyiyende kulya ngyindeterewa.”
Kaṙuo Petiro na wana walya wawi wa Sebedayo, kawooka iiṟewe na iwona fowa mrimenyi.
Naaho-ng'u kawawia, “Mrima oko uwoṙo nyi iiṟewe lying'anyi mnu ngyeiṙima maa ipfa. Kaenyi iha, mulae kyiṙombo hamwi na inyi.”

Kayenda mbele kyitutu, kaoloka na ndewu, katerewa, echigamba, “Awu-yoko, kyikaiṙimika, ṙombo-lyi lya matuuro lyiiṙe kuleshi na inyi. Kyaindi chi chandu ngyikundi inyi-pfo, indi nyi chandu ukundi iyoe.”
Kacha na ko wanalosho walya, kawakooya walee, kawia Petiro, “Ngyesa moiṙima ilaa kyiṙombo na inyi maa saa imwi-pfoe?
Laenyi kyiṙombo, muterewe, mulacheiṙa na kyiyeshionyi. Mrima ukundi; kyaindi mmbiu uwoṙe pfinya-pfo.”
Kayenda-se lya kawi, katerewa, echigamba, “Awu-yoko kokooya kyilechiiṙimika ṙombo-lyi lya matuuro lyiiṙe kuleshi na inyi, kyilya ukundi kyiwe kuṙo.”
Kacha-se, kawakooya walee; kyipfa meso gawo gawewoṙo nyi maṙoe malemeri.
Kawaṙa-se, kayenda, katerewa lya kaṟaaṟu, echigamba maṙeṙo galya galya.
Numa ya iho kacha na ko wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Laenyi wulalu, muonyonye. Saa yamtikyira kufuhi, na Mono-Adamu nechiwiko mawokonyi ga wanyamaṟi.
Amkyenyi, sindenyi! Ulya aingyiṟiinga amtikyira kufuhi.”
Kyasia kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, Yuda, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, kacha, aṙuṙanyi na ṟiima lying'anyi lya wandu wawoṙe ngyuushu na ṟungu, wawuka ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu.
Na ulya momṟiinga nalekoamuwaenenga kyiṟingyishio, echigamba, “Icho ngyechimkomba, nyi oe; mmbaṙenyi.”
Cha ilyi kayenda ko Yesu, kagamba, “Ngakuiṟikyiṟa, Mlosha.” Kamkomba.
Yesu kammbia, “Mbuya yako, ṟunda ikyo kyakuende.” Wakayenda, wakagoṟuo mawoko gawo wakawaṙa Yesu.
Na umwi o walya wawekyeri hamwi na Yesu kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kawuta ushu lokye, kamanya isinga lya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kalyiṙumbuo kuṙwi.
Naaho-ng'u Yesu alemmbia, “Wiyiṟa ushu lopfo na halya-ndu luwekyeri; kyipfa woose wekyekapana kui ushu wechirumatso kui ushu.
Ang'u nokusaṟa kye inyi ngyechiiṙima iterewa Awu-yoko, na oe nangyiendie wulalu kuṙi ngyuulyimalyi tsa malaika tsifoi kuta ikumi na tsiwi-pfoe?
Kyasia kokooya Ruwa aṙika ngyuulyimalyi tsengyikapania shiṟeio shechiafutsio kuṙa kye isho nyisho shiwaṟi iwa?”
Saa iya Yesu kawia wuingyi wo wandu, “Ngyesa mofuma cha ilyi mundewaṙa msokyi, muwoṙe ngyuushu na ṟungu, ingyiwaṙa? Orio mfiri ngyileṙamia hekalunyi ngyechilosha, mulangyiwaṙe.
Kyaindi ishi shoose shawa, kundu shiṟeio sha weonguo shisuku shiwe chandu shigambie.” Naaho-ng'u wanalosho woose wakamṙa wakaṙicha.
Nawo wakawaṙa Yesu wakamṙuo ko Kayafa, Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, handu wawesanzie walosha wa mawawaso na wasongoru.
Na Petiro kamwosha ai kuleshi mṟasa numba ya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kaiṙa na numba, kaṙamia hamwi na waṟundi, nawone mafurumionyi.
Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na mengye yoose wakapfula wandu weṟingyishia Yesu shindo sha wongo, waiṙime immbaaga;
walawone, maa chandu waṟingyishi wa wongo wafoi walecha.
Kyaindi numa ya iho kukocha waṟingyishi wawi, wakagamba, “Ichu nalegamba, ‘Ngyeiṙima ifunja hekalu lya Ruwa, na ilyiwika-se numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu.’ ”
Kyasia Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kammbia, “Ugaluo kyindo? Iwa nyi kyikyi waikuṟingyishia?”
Kyaindi Yesu katsia sau. Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kammbia, “Ngakututuma ulye nyamu kui rina lya Ruwa ai na moo, uluwie kokooya iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa.”
Yesu kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba; kyaindi ngammbia, wookyia wulalu mochiwona Mono-Adamu aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa echicha mapuchinyi ga ruwewu.”
Naaho-ng'u Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose karanduo mkoṟoṟi okye, echigamba, “Nalahia Ruwa. Lukundi-se wuṟingyishi wo ngoseṟa maa ale-pfo. Wulalu momuicho chandu alahia Ruwa.
Muwonyi kuṙa nyoe?” Wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Nawaṟi iwoogo.”
Naaho-ng'u wakampuchia maṙa ipfo kyaam, wakamkapa nzina; wengyi wakamkapa ngofi,
wechigamba, “Iyoe Kristo lutambuluye; nyi wui akukapa?”
Na Petiro naweṙamie nja ya numba iya. Kyisinga kyimwi kyikayenda kokye, kyikagamba, “Na iyoe nuwekyeri hamwi na Yesu o Galyilaya.”
Kakana mbele ya woose, echigamba, “Ngyiichi ikyo uigamba-pfo.”
Na oe kyiyeri alefuma na nja mṟasa kyichuminyi kyisinga kyingyi kyikammbona, kyikawia wandu wawekyeri pfo, “Ichu nawekyeri hamwi na Yesu o Nasareti.”
Kakana-se kui nyamu, “Ngyiichi mndu-chu-pfo.”
Halaiṙa kyiyeri kyileshi, walya walecha na halya wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Petiro, ny'kyaloi iyoe nyi umwi owo; kyipfa maa mṙeṙie opfo ukumanyisha.”
Naaho-ng'u Petiro kagamba, “Ngalya nyamu ngyigamba kya loi! Ruwa nangyikape kokooya ngyilaigamba kya loi! Ngyiichi mndu-chu-pfo!” Na cha ilyi ilying'onyi lyikafuga.
Petiro kakumbuo kyindo kyilya Yesu alegamba, “Ilying'onyi lyilafuga, nongyikana kaṟaaṟu.” Kafuma na nja katonyitsa mcheṟeṟe ya fowa.
Na kyiyeri kulekya, wang'anyi wa makohanyi woose na wasongoru wa wandu wakaṙamia kyama chandu weiṙima iwaaga Yesu.
Wakampfunga, wakammbuta halya, wakamṙambika ko Pilato awekyeri mchilyi o uruka lulya.

Numa ya iho Yuda, ulya momṟiinga, kyiyeri alewona kye amwanduyo kamanya wuwicho wo kyilya aleṟunda, kawiyiṟia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru rupia tsilya makumi gaṟaaṟu, kagamba, “Ngyileṙeko kyiyeri ngyileṟiinga mndu alawoṙe ṙeko.”
Wakagamba, “Kyasia, soe luwoṙo pfo-pfo. Isho nyi shapfo kumonyi.”
Kawiyitsa rupia tsilya hekalunyi kafuma, kandekuwika kyigowo kapfa.
Wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakasania rupia tsilya, wakagamba, “Chi sungusinyi itsisanza na shienengo sha numbenyi ya Ruwa-pfo, cha kyipfa nyi wori wo ipusuo samu.”
Wakaṙamia kyiṙombo, wakaṙumbuo iguṟa ṙema lya mndu ekyeachikyia shinungu na heleri tsilya, hakawa handu heṟika wayenu wapfa.
Koikyo ṙema-lyo lyekyelago ṙema lya samu mṟasa inu.
Naaho-ng'u kyikaafukyia kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku Yeremia, echigamba, “Walewuta rupia makumi gaṟaaṟu, kyindo wandu waata wa Isiraelyi waleiṙikyiana na oe imtaa;
wakaguṟa natso ṙema lya mndu ekyeachikyia shinungu chandu Mndumii alengyiwia.”
Na Yesu kagoṟoka mbele ya ulya awekyechilyia uruka lulya. Mchilyi-cho kammbesa, kagamba, “Iyoe nyi oe mangyi o Wayuda?” Yesu kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
Kyaindi kyiyeri wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru walewia Yesu kye nammbicho alegaluo kyindo-pfo.
Naaho-ng'u Pilato kammbia, “Uichuo mawicho-ga goose waikusendia?”
Alamgaluo maa kyindo kyimwi mṟasa mchilyi ulya kaṟiyio mnu.
Kyasia kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka, mchilyi ulya naweichiwie ipfunguo mpfungo umwi wandu wamkunda.
Kyasia kuwewoṙe mpfungo orio mndu awemwichi kyipfa kya wuwicho wokye, ekyelago Baraba.
Kyasia kyiyeri wandu walesanzia handu hamwi Pilato kawawia, “Mukundi ngyimpfunguye wui? Baraba ulya, ang'u Yesu ekyelago Kristo?”
Cha kyipfa nalemanya kye walemṙambika kokye kui wunyenyi.

Na kyiyeri Pilato aweṙamie kyiṙinyi kyakye echiṙumbuo moondu, mka okye nalemṙumia ndumo, immbia, “Ulawutie mndu-cho msumganyi kyindo kyoose; cha kyipfa kyio-kyi kyaamkyia inu ngyileloṙo kyakye ngawihiyo mnu.”
Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu wakawanzia wuingyi wulya wo wandu wuwie Pilato napfunguo Baraba, na iwaaga Yesu.
Kyasia mchilyi ulya kagaluo, kawawia, “Mukundi ngyimpfunguye wui kyiiṙi kya iwa wawi?” Wakagamba, “Baraba.”
Pilato kawawia, “Kyasia, Yesu-chu ekyelago Kristo ngyimmbutie kyi?” Wakagamba woose, “Nakapio msalabenyi.”
Kagamba, “Ny'kyi? Wuwicho wokye nyi kyikyi?” Wakaengyeṟa mnu ikalagatsa, wechigamba, “Nakapio msalabenyi.”

Kyasia kyiyeri Pilato alewona kuwoṙe kyiira kyoose-pfo, indi kyituṟu kyikundi iamka, kaira mṟinga, kasamba mawoko gakye mbele ya wuingyi wulya wo wandu, kagamba, “Inyi ngyiwoṙe ṙeko samunyi ya mndu-chu msumganyi-pfo. Ilyi nyi iṟunda lyanyu nyoe.”
Wandu woose wakagaluo wakagamba, “Leka samu ya mndu-chu iwe wuye yaṙu na ko wana waṙu.”
Naaho-ng'u kawapfunguya Baraba; na ammarise igamba Yesu nakapo na ngowa, kamṙambika ko ngyuulyimalyi tsakye wandemkapia msalabenyi.
Naaho-ng'u asikari wa mchilyi o uruka lulya wakaṙuo Yesu mṟasa Praitorio ngyuulyimalyi tsingyi tsoose tsikakuumbia halya-ndu awekyeri.
Wakammbuta nguwo, wakamṟika ikunya lyifanyi kyimaande.
Wakaoka oṟo ya msha, wakamṟika mṙoenyi kokye, wakammbikyia upoi lo wuchilyi kuwokonyi kokye ko kulyoe; wakapfiria ndi mbele yakye, wakamkapa makuukuu, wechigamba, “Lokuiṟikyiṟa, Mangyi o Wayuda!”
Numa ya iho wakampuchia maṙa, wakaira upoi lulya, wakamkapa mṙoenyi.
Wammarise imkapa makuukuu, wakawuta ikunya lyilya, wakamṟika mkoṟoṟi okye, wakamṙuo imkapia msalabenyi.
Na lyilya waweiwuka kulya mṟinyi wakawona mndu o Kyirene, ekyelago Simion; ichu wakamwitika nakuṙikye msalaba okye.
Na kyiyeri waleshika handu hekyelago Golyigota, kyimwi na igamba, “Ipoṟong'u,”
wakamwenenga mpfinyo umsanze-sanze na mṟinga o nduu nanyo; kyaindi oe kyiyeri aleukomba na ulumi lokye alakunde inyo.
Wammarise imkapia msalabenyi, wakagawa mkoṟoṟi okye wechikapa kuṟu kuha; kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku,
“Walegawiana nguwo tsako;
na kyipfa kya ikunya lyako walekapa kuṟu kuha.”
Wakaṙamia wakamringa halya.
Wakawikyia wuye ya mṙoe okye kyindo kyeloṟa kyimaṙuma kyewoogo, kyindo kyikyiṟeie: “ICHU NYI YESU, MANGYI O WAYUDA.”
Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya wasokyi wawi wakakapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe, umwi kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, na umwi kuwoko kokye ko kumoso.
Na wandu wawekuiṙia wakamlahia, wechisunza-sunza mṙoe yawo, na igamba,
“Iyoe ochiiṙima ifunja hekalu na ilyiwika-se numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu, kukyiṟe mrima opfo. Kokooya iyoe nyi mono-Ruwa, soka iho msalabenyi.”
Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi taa wakamkapa makuukuu hamwi na walosha wa mawawaso wechigamba, “Nalekyiṟa wengyi, aiiṙima ikukyiṟa amonyi-pfo.
Oe nyi mangyi o Isiraelyi; wulalu nasokye msalabenyi, na soe lochimwiṙikyia.
Nalekuwaṙa na Ruwa; namkyiṟe wulalu, kokooya namkundi; cha kyipfa nalegamba, ‘Inyi nyi Mono-Ruwa.’ ”
Na wasokyi walya walekapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe walemlahia wuṙo.
Kyasia wookyia saa tsiṟandaaṟu kulewaṙa meema wuye ya uruka loose mṟasa saa kyenda.
Na cha saa kyenda, Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi echigamba, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakyitani?” Kyimwi na igamba, “Ruwa oko, Ruwa oko, ny'kyilyi ongyiṙa?”
Na kyiyeri wandu waata wawekyeri halya waleicho, walegamba, “Ichu nailaga Elyiya.”
Cha ilyi umwi owo kayenda eṙicha, kaira kyindo kyekyeongyia mṟinga, kakyiichuṟa mṟinga okyetarang'ia, kakyipfungyia upoinyi, kamrutsa.
Walya wengyi wakagamba, “Leka luwone kokooya Elyiya nechicha imkyiṟa.”
Na Yesu amkuilengye-se na ṟui lyakye ko pfinya, kalekyia moo.
Na isulyia lyeshingyia ipfo hekalunyi lyikaranduka kawi wookyia wuye mṟasa wanda. Uruka lukoṙeṙema; na maṟaṟa gang'anyi gakapaṟika.
Shilome shikaṟuguka; mmbiu ifoi ya waele wapfiie ikaamka.
Nawo wammbukye shilomenyi shawo, numa ya iṟuka lyakye, wakaiṙa na mṟinyi mweele, wandu wafoi wakawawona.
Kyasia mchilyi ulya, na iwo wawekyeri hamwi na oe wechiringa Yesu, kyiyeri walewona kyiriinza na chandu mbonyi tsilewa, wakaowuo mnu, wechigamba, “Ny'kyaloi ichu nawekyeri Mono-Ruwa.”
Hawewoṙe na waka wafoi halya wechiambuya wakyeri kuleshi. Iwo nyiwo waleosha Yesu iwuka Galyilaya, na imṟundia.
Kyiiṙi kyawo nawekyeri ho Maria Makyidalena, na Maria mama o Yakobo na Yosefu na mama o wana wa Sebedayo.
Na lyilya kuleila mndu mnjama o Arimataya ekyelago Yosefu kacha, na oe nawekyeri manalosho o Yesu.
Mndu-chu naleyenda ko Pilato, katerewa mmbiu o Yesu. Naaho-ng'u Pilato kagamba naenengo mmbiu-cho.
Yosefu kaira mmbiu ulya, kauaṟahia sandenyi ya uwiṟo,
kauwikyia kyilomenyi kyakye kyihya, awekyiachikyie igoenyi; kaiṟimitsia igoe lying'anyi mbele ya moongo o kyilome, kawuka ho.
Na halya wawekyeri ho Maria Makyidalena, na Maria ulya o kawi, waṙamie weambuyana na kyilome kyilya.
Na Mfiri o kawi, numa ya mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa lya mfiri o onyonya, wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na Mafarisayo walekooyana na Pilato,
wakagamba, “Mndumii, lokumbuo kye ulya ekyeṙeṙa wongo nalegamba kyiyeri-kyo awei na moo, ‘Numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu nechiṟuka!’
Kyasia gamba kye kyilome-kyi kyiringo necha mṟasa mfiri o kaṟaaṟu; wanalosho wakye walachemwiwa, na iwia wandu, ‘Naṟuka ko wapfu; na wulembi wo mafurumionyi wukong'ana kuta wulya wo mawookyionyi.’ ”
Pilato kawawia, “Muwoṙe asikari; yendenyi munderinga necha kyilome chandu muichi.”
Wakayenda, wakaringa kyilome necha, kui iwikyia igoe lyilya kyiṟingyishio kyiwoṙe mfano owo, hamwi na asikari walya waringyi.
Na lyilya mfiri o onyonya uleiṙa, ochikya mfiri o kuwooka o juma Maria Makyidalena, na Maria ulya o kawi, waleyenda indeambuya kyilome kyilya.
Na hawewoṙe kyiriinza kying'anyi kya uruka; kyipfa malaika o Mndumii nalesoka iwuka ruwewu, kacha kaiṟimitsa igoe lyilya kalyiṙamilyia.
Na fana yakye iwekyeri cha mbawa, na mkoṟoṟi okye mwiilyi cha Kyipoo.
Na kui imwowuo, waringyi walya wakaṙeṙema, wakawa cha wapfu.
Malaika kagaluo, kawia waka walya, “Mulaowuoe, cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye muipfula Yesu alekapio msalabenyi.
Akyeri iha-pfo; kyipfa amṟuka, chandu alegamba. Nnjonyi, muambuye handu awemlaṟe.
Na nyoe yendenyi faṟa, mundewia wanalosho wakye, amṟuka ko wapfu. Naimusongoya iyenda Galyilaya. Nyi pfo-ndu mochimmbona. Aikyonyi-ng'u, ngamummbia.”
Wakafuma iwinyi iwuka kyilomenyi, kui wuowu na sia ing'anyi, wakayenda weṙicha iongoya wanalosho wakye mbonyi.
Na Yesu kakarisana nawo, echigamba, “Ngamuiṟikyiṟa!” Wakatikyira kufuhi wakammbaṙa maṙende, wakamwindia.
Numa ya iho Yesu kawawia, “Mulaowuoe. Yendenyi, mundewia wana wa wama wako wayende Galyilaya. Nyi pfo-ndu wechingyiwona.”
Na walya kyiyeri waweiyenda, asikari waata waleiṙa na mṟinyi, wakaongoya wang'anyi wa makohanyi mbonyi tsa shindo shoose shileṟundika.
Wakasanza hamwi na wasongoru, wakachila, wakaenenga asikari heleri tsifoi,
wechigamba, “Gambenyi kye wanalosho wakye walecha kyio, wakamwiwa, kyiyeri soe luwelee.
Na mbonyi-tsi tsikamanyika ko mchilyi o uruka-lu, soe loṙeṙa na oe, na echimmbutia kyindo kyiwicho-pfo.”
Kyasia wakaambilyia heleri tsilya, wakawuta chandu walelosho. Na mbonyi-tso tsikaṙunganana ko Wayuda mṟasa inu.
Na wanalosho walya ikumi na umwi wakayenda Galyilaya mṟasa fumvu lyilya Yesu alewawia.
Nawo kyiyeri walemmbona, walemwindia; kyaindi waata walewaṙa iiṙikyia lyaangu.
Yesu kacha na kowo, kaṙeṙa nawo, kawawia, “Ngyimṙambikye wuchilyi woose ruwewu na wuyanenyi.
Kyasia, yendenyi, mundegaluo masanga goose iwa wanalosho, mochiwapatisa kui rina lya Awu, na Mana, na Mumuyo Mweele;
na iwalosha iosha shoose ngyilemmbi nyoe. Na inyi ngyikyeri na nyoe mfiri yoose, mṟasa mafurumionyi ga wuyana.”
Iyi nyi Ndumi Ngyicha ya Yesu Kristo, Mono-Ruwa,
chandu ingyiṟeie nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya,
“Ambuya, ngyiṙuma mndu awoṙe ulogo loko,
mbele ya ushangu lopfo,
echiachikyia njia yapfo,
Ṟui lya mndu aipoṟogoṟia nuka,
reyeṟenyi njia ya Mndumii,
Goṟotsenyi kundu echiiṙia.”
Yohane nalewoneka, echipatisia kundu ko nuka, na ionguo mbonyi, kundu wandu waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi na ipatiso; na Ruwa nawahooṟie maṙeko.
Wandu wafoi mnu wa uruka lo Uyuda wakayenda kokye, na wandu wa Yerusalemu, wakapatiso mfonyi o Yoridan, wechitocha wunyamaṟi wowo.
Na Yohane naweṟee mapfukye ga ngamia na ukowa lo njonyi kyitsinyi kyakye, kalya nzie na wukyi wo nguṙunyi.
Kalosha echigamba, “Numa yako kuicha awoṙe pfinya kuta inyi. Icho inyi ngyiwaṟi iarama na ituruchuo ngowa tsa shiaṙu shakye-pfo.
Inyi ngyilempatisa nyoe kui mṟinga; indi oe nechimpatisa nyoe kui Mumuyo Mweele.”
Kyasia mfiri iya, Yesu nalecha awuka Nasareti ya Galyilaya, kapatiso nyi Yohane kulya Yoridan.
Na chailyi kyiyeri aleṙo awuka mṟingyenyi, kawona mapuchi geseia na Mumuyo, cha mbuna, echimsokyia.
Na ṟui lyikawuka ruwewu, lyikagamba, “Iyoe nyi oe Mono-ko, mkunde oko; ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyapfo.”
Cha ilyi Mumuyo kammbuta nayende kundu ko nuka.
Kakaa ipfo nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga mfiri makumi gaana, echiyesho nyi Satana. Na oe nawekyeri hamwi na mando ga saka, na malaika wawemṟundia.
Kyasia Yohane ammbiko kyipfungonyi, Yesu kayenda Galyilaya, echionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Ruwa,
echigamba, “Kyiyeri kyamshika, na Wumangyi wo Ruwa womtikyira kufuhi; ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi na iiṙikyia Ndumi Ngyicha.”
Na oe kyiyeri aweiiṙa mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, kawona Simion na Anderea, mono-wamae, wechiwiyitsa iṟambika ipalyipalyinyi; cha kyipfa wawekyeri wandu wekyeṙeia makunga.
Yesu kawawia, “Nnjonyi mungyioshe, na inyi ngyemugaluo wandu wekyeṙega wandu.”
Cha ilyi wakaṙa ngowa tsawo tseṙega makunga, wakamwosha.
Kayenda mbele kyitutu, kawona Yakobo o Sebedayo na Yohane, mono-wamae; nawo taa wawei ngalawenyi, wechiachikyia ngowa tsawo tseṙega makunga.
Cha ilyi kawalaga, wakaṙa awu-yawo Sebedayo ngalawenyi hamwi na wandu wa wori, wakayenda, wakamwosha.
Wakayenda mṟasa Kaperinaumu, na cha ilyi mfiri o onyonya kaiṙa na sinagoginyi, kalosha.
Wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya malosho gakye; cha kyipfa naweiwalosha cha mndu awoṙe wuchilyi, maa chi cha walosha wa mawawaso-pfo.
Na cha ilyi hawewoṙe sinangoginyi lyawo mndu awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho. Kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi,
echigamba, “Luwoṙe kyi na iyoe, Yesu o Nasareti? Ngyesa nocha ilurumatsa?
Ngyikuichi iyoe nyi Mweele o Ruwa.” Yesu kamṙeṙia, echigamba, “Tsia sau, uwukye ko mndu-chu.”
Mṟufui ulya mmbicho kamṙeṙemsha cha mndu ekyeuma nguku, kafiiṟa na ṟui lying'anyi, kammbuka.
Wakaṟiyio woose, mṟasa wakawesana, wechigamba, “Ny'kyikyi ikyi? Nyi wuṟango wuhya! Kyipfa kui wuchilyi naiṙeṙia maa waṟufui wawicho, nawo wakamwindia!”
Cha ilyi mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana orio handu ngyuurukyenyi tsoose tsa mṟasenyi o Galyilaya.
Na kyiyeri walewuka sinagoginyi, waleshika kanyi ko Simion na Anderea, hamwi na Yakobo na Yohane.
Na mamka o Simion, nawekyeri kyitaṟenyi, nawoṙo nyi isemu; na cha ilyi wakammbia mbonyi tsakye.
Katikyira kufuhi na oe, kammbaṙa kuwoko kokye kamwira, isemu lyikamleka, kawaṟundia.
Kyasia kyiyeri kuleila, na mnengyeṟi omwolokyie, wawemwendie woose walawekuiṙima, na wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho.
Na wandu wafoi mnu wa mṟi ulya wawekuumbie moongonyi.
Kakyiṟa wafoi wawewoṙe ndoṟe tsa orio mbaṟe, kawuta waṟufui wafoi wawicho, maa alelekyia waṟufui wawicho iṙeṙa-pfo, cha kyipfa wawemwichi.
Kyasia ngamenyi utuko, kafuma kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, kandeterewa.
Simion na oṙoe wakamwosha.
Nawo kyiyeri walemmbona wakammbia, “Wandu woose waikupfula.”
Kawawia, “Sindenyi handu hengyi, mṟasa shikaṟo shikyeri kufuhi, na ipfo ngyiiṙime ionguo pfo mbonyi; kyipfa ikyo nyikyo kyilengyiende.”
Kayenda echionguo mbonyi masinagoginyi gawo, urukyenyi loose lo Galyilaya, na iwuta waṟufui wawicho.
Mndu awoṙo nyi taambo kacha na kokye, echimpfiria ndi, na imterewa, echigamba, “Kokunda noiṙima ingyulyisha na ingyiwuta ndoṟe-i.”
Na oe kawona fowa mrimenyi kyipfa kyakye, kalesha kuwoko kokye, kampaaya, kammbia, “Ngyikundi, ila.”
Na cha ilyi taambo lyakye lyikammbuka, kaila.
Kamwima na pfinya, kammbuta ho cha ilyi,
kammbia, “Ulawie mndu kyindo kyoose, indi yenda undekuloṟa ko mkohanyi, undeenengyia kyiṙaso chandu Mose alegamba kyipfa kya iila lyapfo, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”

Kyaindi kafuma, kuwooka iṙeṙa maṙeṙo gafoi, na igamba kyindo kyilya, mṟasa Yesu alaiṙime-se iiṙa na mṟinyi kulawoṙe ikuṟiika; indi nawekyeri nja handu halawoṙe wandu. Wandu wakayenda kokye wawuka ngyuura tsoose.
Kaiṙa-se na Kaperinaumu hamwiṙe mfiri ifoi, kyikamanyika kye nakyeri kanyi.
Halya kanyi hakasanzia wandu wafoi halatsugae maa ṙaawa moongonyi. Kawaongoya Ṙeṙo lyakye.
Kukocha wandu wechimwendie mndu apfiie ngapfu, aṙuṙo nyi wandu waana.
Na kyiyeri walelemo itikyira kufuhi na oe kyipfa kya wuingyi wo wandu, waletocha kai halya-ndu awekyeri; na wammarise iifunja walesotsa ikondoṟo mndu ulya apfiie ngapfu awelyilaaye.
Na Yesu, kyiyeri alewona iiṙikyia lyawo, kawia ulya apfiie ngapfu, “Mono-ko, omhooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo.”
Na walosha waata wa mawawaso wawekyeri pfo, waṙamie, wechikusaṟa mrimenyi kowo,
“Ny'kyilyi ichu aigamba kuṙi? Nailahia Ruwa. Nyi wui echiiṙima ihooṟia wunyamaṟi sile umwi tupu, nyi oe Ruwa?”
Cha ilyi Yesu kamanya mrimenyi kokye kye waikusaṟa kuṙo mrimenyi kowo, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muikusaṟa kuṙi mrimenyi konyu?
Kyii kyaangu nyi kyiha, iwia apfiie ngapfu, ‘Nohooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo’, ang'u igamba, ‘Amka ukuṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo uyende?’
Kyaindi muiṙime imanya kye Mono-Adamu nawoṙe wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo ihooṟia wunyamaṟi.” Iho naiwia ulya apfiie ngapfu,
“Ngakuwia, amka, ukuiṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo uyende kanyi kopfo.”
Cha ilyi kaamka, kakuṙika ikondoṟo lyakye, kawuka mbele yawo woose; mṟasa wakaṟiyio woose, wakang'anyisa Ruwa, wechigamba, “Mbaṟe-i iyi lulandeenengo iiwona maa ale-pfo.”
Kafuma-se kayenda mbai ya ipalyipalyi, wandu woose wa kyisanzionyi wakayenda kokye kawalosha.
Na kyiyeri aweiiṙa, kawona Lewi, mana o Alyifayo, aṙamie handu hesania ukamba mbai ya ipalyipalyi, kammbia, “Ngyiosha.” Kaamka kamwosha.
Na kyiyeri aweṙamie kanyi kokye echilya, wesania ukamba wafoi na wanyamaṟi waleṙamia hamwi na Yesu na wanalosho wakye; cha kyipfa wawei wafoi wechimwosha.
Na walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo kyiyeri walemmbona echilya hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi, walewia wanalosho wakye, “Ny'kyilyi ailya hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi?”
Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho nalewawia, “Walaluoe wekyepfula mganga-pfo, kyaindi walya walaikuiṙima. Ngyilecha ilaga wasumganyi-pfo, indi wanyamaṟi.”
Na wanalosho wa Yohane na Mafarisayo wawekyekuretekyia. Kyasia walecha, wakammbia, “Ny'kyilyi wanalosho wa Yohane na wanalosho wa Mafarisayo wekyekuretekyia, indi wanalosho wapfo wekyewuta kuṙo-pfo?”
Yesu kawawia, “Walage wolyinyi weiṙima kuṙa ikuretekyia kyiyeri monyi wolyi akyeri hamwi nawo? Kyiyeri kyoose monyi wolyi akyeri hamwi nawo wechiiṙima ikuretekyia-pfo.
Kyaindi kuicha mfiri monyi wolyi echiwuto kowo, nyi lyo-ndu wechiṙa ikuretekyia mfiri-cho.
Kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika kyiṙami kya nguwo ngyihya ikunyenyi lyiku-pfo; kawika kuṙo, kyilya kyihya kyawiko ho kyechinyamaṟa ikunya-lyo lyiku, na halya-ndu harandukyie hekyeengyeṟika.
Maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika mpfinyo shisagenyi shiku-pfo. Kokooya awika, mpfinyo ulya ochipaṟa shisaga-sho, mpfinyo ukopusuka, shisaga shilya shikanyamaṟika. Indi nekyewika mpfinyo shisagenyi shihya.”
Kyiyeri aweiiṙa maṙemenyi mfiri o onyonya wanalosho wakye wai kyaronyi walewooka iṙumbuo magaa ga nganu.
Mafarisayo wakammbia, “Ny'kyilyi waiwuta kyindo kyilai kya sungusinyi mfiri o onyonya?”
Kawawia, “Muichi chandu Dawidi aleṟunda, kyiyeri awemfooye, na iwoṙo nyi njaa, oe na oṙoe?
Chandu aleiṙa na numbenyi ya Ruwa, kacha kyiyeri kya Abiatari, Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kalya mkate iya Ngyeele, ilawaṟi ilyio nyi mndu sile makohanyi, kaenenga na oṙoe?”
Kawawia, “Mfiri o onyonya ulewiko kyipfa kya mndu, chi mndu kyipfa kya mfiri o onyonya-pfo.
Kyasia Mono-Adamu nyi oe Mndumii o mfiri o onyonya taa.”
Kaiṙa-se na sinagoginyi; napfo kuwewoṙe mndu awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu.
Wakamwowelyia kundu wawone kokooya nemkyiṟa mfiri o onyonya; waiṙime imṙuo mengyenyi.
Kawia ulya awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu “Goṟoka makyiṙi-gawi.”
Kawawesa, “Nyi sungusinyi mfiri o onyonya iwuta shicha ang'u iwuta shiwicho? Ikyiṟa mrima ang'u iuwaaga?” Wakatsia.
Kawaitukuya ngyuura tsoose ko nyashi, echiwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yawo. Kawia mndu ulya, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo.” Na oe kagoṟuo kuwoko; kuwoko kokye kukowaṙa-se pfinya.
Cha ilyi Mafarisayo walya wakayenda, wakachila mbonyi tsakye hamwi na Maherodi, chandu wechimrumatsa.
Na Yesu kakaa kuleshi, oe na wanalosho wakye, kayenda ipalyipalyinyi. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukomwosha, iwuka Galyilaya na Uyuda,
na Yerusalemu, na Idumaya, na molyolya o Yoridan, na ngyuura tsa Tiro na Sidon. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi tsoose tsa shindo awekyeri iṟunda, wakayenda kokye.
Kawia wanalosho wakye kye kyingalawa kyitutu kyikae kufuhi na oe, kundu wuingyi wo wandu wulampeṟeetse.
Cha kyipfa nalekyiṟa wafoi, mṟasa woose wawewoṙe ngyuukyiwa wakamraia waiṙime impaaya.
Na waṟufui wawicho, orio kyiyeri walemmbona, waleoloka mbele yakye, wakafuga, wechigamba, “Iyoe nyi oe Mono-Ruwa.”
Kawaima mnu walamṟingyishie.
Kaṙooya fumvunyi, kalaga walya alekunda oe amonyi; wakayenda kokye.
Kawika wandu ikumi na wawi, waiṙime iwa hamwi na oe, na nawaṙume ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha.
Ngoseṟa wawe na wuchilyi wo iwuta waṟufui wawicho.
Kawika walya ikumi na wawi. Simion kamlaga Petiro;
na Yakobo kamlaga mono-Sebedayo, na Yohane, mono-wama o Yakobo, kawalaga Bonerikye, kyimwi na igamba, wana wa ikuṟuṟuma.
Na Anderea, Filyipo, Baritolomayo, Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo o Alyifayo, Tadayo, na Simion Mkananayo.
Na Yuda Isikariote, nyi oe alemṟiinga.
Numa ya iho kayenda kanyi. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukosanza-se, mṟasa Yesu na wanalosho wakye walaiṙime maa ilya mkate.
Wandu wakye kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi wakafuma indemmbaṙa; kyipfa walegamba, “Nasuko.”
Na walosha wa mawawaso walesoka iwuka Yerusalemu wakagamba, “Nawoṙe Beelyisebulyi, na kui ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho naiwuta waṟufui wawicho.”
Kawalaga, kawawia kui mfano, “Satana neiṙima kuṙa ifuna Satana?
Na wumangyi wukokuṟiinga wumonyi, wochiiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
Na kanyi kukokuṟiinga kumonyi, kanyi-ko koiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
Na kokooya Satana afuma kakapana na mrima okye amonyi, kakuṟiinga, eiṙima igoṟoka-pfo, indi neshika mafurumionyi.
Mndu echiiṙima iiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu awoṙe pfinya, na imsoka shindo shakye, sile apfunga kuwooka ulya awoṙe pfinya, naaho-ng'u echiṙuo ko pfinya numba yakye.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, wandu wechihooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsoose, na ilahia Ruwa lyawo lyoose;
indi mndu echilahia Mumuyo Mweele echihooṟio mṟasa mlungana-pfo; kyaindi nechiwaṙa ṙeko lyilechisia”;
kyipfa kya ilyi walegamba, “Nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.”
Wamae na wana wa wamae wakacha; wakagoṟoka nja, wakaṙuma mndu imlaga.
Na wuingyi wo wandu waweṙamie, wechimwiṟiwia; wakammbia, “Ambuya, womoo na wana wa wama wapfo wai iho nja, waikupfula.”
Kawagaluo, echigamba, “Wama oko na wana wa wama wako nyi wakyi?”
Kaambuya walya waweṙamie wamwiṟiwie ngyuura tsoose, kagamba, “Ambuya wama oko na wana wa wama wako!
Cha kyipfa orio mndu echiṟunda shilya Ruwa akundi, icho nyi oe mono-wama oko, na mshikyi oko, na wama oko.”

Kawooka-se iloshia mbai ya ipalyipalyi. Wuingyi wung'anyi mnu wo wandu wukokuumbia kokye, mṟasa oe kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kakaa ipalyipalyinyi. Wuingyi woose wo wandu wuwei handu hagaṙutsu mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
Kawalosha shindo shifoi kui mfano. Kawawia maloshonyi gakye,
“Aṙanyienyi. Moolyia mbeu nalefuma indewaaya.
Na kyiyeri aweiwaaya, mbeu ingyi ileoloka mbai ya njia, shileye shikacha shikailya.
Ingyi ikaoloka handu hawoṙe iṟaṟa, halawoṙe teri ishikyie. Cha ilyi ikaṙo kyaindi kyipfa kya iwuṟa teri ishikyie,
kyiyeri mui ulewaa ukoikoṟa, na kyipfa ilawoṙe mri ikauma.
Ingyi ikaoloka handu hawoṙe msha; msha iya ikaṙo, ikaipfumba, ilakumbie ndunda.
Ingyi ikaoloka handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha, tsikakumbia ndunda, tsechiṙo na ing'ana, na ikumbia, imwi makumi gaṟaaṟu, imwi makumi gaṟandaaṟu, na imwi igana.”
Kagamba, “Awoṙe maṙwi geaṙanyia, naaṙanyie.”
Na oe kyiyeri awekyeri amonyi, wandu walya wawemwiṟiwie, na walya ikumi na wawi, walemmbesa mbonyi tsa mfano iya.
Kawawia, “Nyoe muwaenengye imanya kyiṟika kya Wumangyi wo Ruwa, indi ko walya wai nja ya Wumangyi-wo shoose shekyeṟundika kui mfano,
‘Kundu wakaambuya waambuye walawone;
na wakaaṙanyia waicho, walamanye;
walachengyiwiyilyia, na ihooṟio.’ ”
Kawawia, “Muichi mfano-chu? Kyasia mfano yoose moimanya kuṙa?
Moolyia mbeu-cho nekyewaaya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Iwa nyiwo wai mbai ya njia, Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyekyewooyo kowo. Nawo wakamuicho, cha ilyi Satana nekyecha, kawuta ho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa lyileṙongo mrimenyi kowo.
Na wuṙo iwa nyiwo wekyeṙongo handu hawoṙe maṟaṟa. Nyiwo wakammaa iicho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa, cha ilyi wekyelyiambilyia na sia.
Kyaindi wawoṙe mri makyiṙi-gawi gawo-pfo, indi lyekyekaa kowo kyiyeri kyifuhi. Numa ya iho kukocha wukyiwa na ipfulutso nyashi kyipfa kya Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa, cha ilyi wekyekapa tuulyia.
Na iwa nyiwo walya wekyeṙongo handu hawoṙe msha. Nyi wandu wekyeicho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa,
kyaindi ikuwinisha lya kyiwuyana, na wulembi wo masaa, na lango tsa shindo shingyi tsikacha, shekyepfumba Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa lyilakumbie.
Na iwa nyiwo wawaṙongye handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha. Nyi wandu wekyeicho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa na ilyiambilyia, na ikumbia ndunda, umwi makumi gaṟaaṟu, umwi makumi gaṟandaaṟu, na umwi igana.”
Kawawia, “Muwonyi kuṙa? Taa yekyekoṟo kundu iwikyio wanda ya kyitela, ang'u wanda ya kyitaṟa? Chi yekyewikyio handu hakuirie-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikuṟiikyie kyilechimanyika-pfo; maa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyiṟikye, kyilechiwoneka na pata-pfo.
Mndu kawaṙa maṙwi geaṙanyia, naaṙanyie.”
Kawawia, “Aṙanyienyi kyindo-kyi. Kyindo kyilya muianduya nakyo oṙianyu ny'kyo Ruwa echimuanduya nakyo, kyaindi na wulang'a ngoseṟa.
Cha kyipfa awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na oe alawoṙe kyindo kying'anyi, maa kyilya kyitutu awoṙe nechisoko.”
Kagamba, “Wumangyi wo Ruwa, mfano okye nyi cha mndu aleola mbeu wuye ya uruka.
Kawamolaa na iamka, kyio na kyingoto, na mbeu iya ikaṙo na ing'ana, alaichi oe.
Kyipfa uruka lokyeṙosa shindo lumonyi; kuwooka iṟa, kawi igaa lya nganu, numa nganu ikoṟie igaenyi.
Na ndunda tsikammba tsesambuo, cha ilyi nekyeira ishami, cha kyipfa kyilyimu kyamwafukyia.”
Kagamba, “Lulyingatsane Wumangyi wo Ruwa na kyikyi? Ang'u luuwikye mfanonyi uha?
Nyi cha ndunda ya haradalyi. Kyiyeri yekyeṙongo urukyenyi, maa chandu ikyeri ngyitutu kuta mbeu tsoose tsikyeri urukyenyi,
ikamṙongo yekyeng'ana, ikawa ing'anyi kuta mashiṙi goose gawoṙe maṟa gekyelyio nyi wandu, ikawaṙa mbaga tsing'anyi; mṟasa shileye sha ngyinenyi shikaiṙima ikaa wanda ya mrinje oyo.”
Kui mfano ifoi ya mbaṟe-i naweiwaongoya Ṙeṙo lyakye, iṙuana na chandu waleiṙima ilyiaṙanyia.
Maa aleṙeṙa nawo kulawoṙe mfano-pfo; kyaindi kaongoya wanalosho wakye amonyi mbonyi tsoose kui kyiṟika.
Mfiri ulya kyiyeri kya kyukonyi kawawia, “Luambaṙe mṟasa molyolya.”
Wakaṙa wuingyi wulya wo wandu, wakamṙuo wuṙo chandu awekyeri ngalawenyi. Na ngalawa tsingyi tsiwekyeri hamwi na oe.
Kukocha kyiwiṟi kying'anyi kya mkuma, mṟinga uiyenda na pfinya ukokapa ngalawa iya mṟasa ikawooka iichuo mṟinga.
Na oe amonyi nawekyeri ura lo numa lo ngalawa, alee wuye ya mto. Wakamwamtsa, wakammbia, “Mlosha, chi kyindo kopfo iluṙa lurumare-pfoe?”
Kaamka, kaṙeṙia mkuma, kawia ipalyipalyi, “Tsia, ulakupaaye!” Mkuma ukotsia, kukowaṙa itsia sau lying'anyi.
Kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi mowa waowu? Mulandewaṙe iiṙikyia-pfoe?”
Wakawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi, wakawiana, “Nyi wui ichu-ng'u, maa mkuma na ipalyipalyi shimwindia?”
Wakashika molyolya o ipalyipalyi mṟasa uruka lo Wakyerasi.
Na amsokye ngalawenyi, cha ilyi nalekarisana na mndu, awewukyie handu heṟika wandu wapfiie, awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.
Kanyi kokye kuwei handu halya heṟika wandu wapfiie; maa kuwoṙe mndu oose aleiṙima impfunga-se maa kui mshe-pfo,
cha kyipfa nawekyepfungo kafoi ko pingu na mshe; kaṙumbuo-ṙumbuo mshe iya na ifunja-funja pingu tsilya; maa kuwoṙe mndu awewoṙe pfinya tsemmbinga-pfo.
Na mfiri yoose, kyio na kyingoto, nawekyeri kulya kundu koṟika wandu wapfiie na mafumvunyi, ekalagatsa na ikuwega-wega na magoe.
Na kyiyeri alewona Yesu ai kuleshi, nalekapa mteeṟa, kamwindia.
Kakalagatsa kui ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Lekana na inyi, Yesu, Mono-Ruwa akyeri ruwewu. Kui rina lya Ruwa ulangyilyise wukyiwa.”
Cha kyipfa nalemmbia, “Iyoe mṟufui mmbicho, wuka mndu-chu.”
Kammbesa, “Rina lyapfo nyi wui?” Kamgaluo, kagamba, “Rina lyako nyi ‘Wandu Walang'a’, cha kyipfa lui wafoi.”
Kamterewa mnu alawaṙuo nja ya uruka lulya.
Na iho mafumvunyi hawewoṙe poo lying'anyi lya nguwe, tsechilyiso.
Waṟufui wawicho woose wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Luṙuo ko nguwe, luiṙime iiṙa na mmbiunyi yatso.”

Kawaenenga momu. Waṟufui walya wawicho wakafuma, wakaiṙa na mmbiunyi ya nguwe tsilya; na poo lyilya lyoose lyikaseṟemka kyiiṟimikonyi lyeṙicha, tsikaiṙa na ipalyipalyinyi, cha nguwe shiku shiwi; tsikapfiia ipalyipalyinyi.
Walyisi wa nguwe tsilya wakaṙicha, wakaonguo mbonyi-tso mṟinyi na kundu kulai mṟinyi. Wandu wakafuma wawone kyindo kyilewutika.
Wakayenda ko Yesu, wakawona ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, aṙamie, aṟee nguwo, alamsuko-se, na oe nyi oe awewoṙo nyi poo lyilya lya waṟufui wawicho; wakaowuo.
Na walya walekowawona walewaongoya mbonyi tsilewutikyia ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, na mbonyi tsa nguwe.
Wakawooka imterewa nawukye kulya kowo.
Na oe kyiyeri aweiṙooya ngalawenyi, ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho nalemterewa nayende na oe.
Kyaindi alemlekyia-pfo, indi nalemmbia, “Yenda kanyi kopfo, ko wandu wa kopfo, ndewaongoye shindo shilya shing'anyi Mndumii alekuwutia, na chandu alekusaṟia.”
Kafuma kawooka ionguo mṟinyi ung'anyi uwoṙe shikaṟo ikumi okyelago Dekapolyi, shindo shilya shing'anyi Yesu alemmbutia; wandu woose wakaṟiyio.
Na kyiyeri Yesu amwambaṙe iwuya na molyolya akyeri kulya ngalawenyi, wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukokuumbia kufuhi na oe; na oe nawekyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
Kukocha mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya wang'anyi wa sinagogi, ekyelago Yairo; na kyiyeri alemmbona, kaoloka maṙendenyi gakye,
echimterewa mnu, echigamba, “Mono-ko mtutu o kyika naipfa. Ngyikuterewa uche, uwikyie kuwoko kopfo wuye yakye, naiṙime ikyia, na iwaṙa moo.”
Kayenda hamwi na oe. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukomwosha, wechimpeṟeetsa-peṟeetsa.
Kuwewoṙe mndu mka umwi awoṙe ndoṟe yechoṟa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na iwi,
maa chandu alelyiso wukyiwa kafoi echiṟundio nyi waganga wafoi. Shindo shoose awewoṙe shileenengyio shemṟundia, kyaindi shilamtarame maa ale, indi ndoṟe yakye ikaengyeṟa ing'ana.
Kyiyeri aleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, naleiṙa wuingyinyi wulya wo wandu kakaa numa ya Yesu, kapaaya ikunya lyakye,
kyipfa nalegamba, “Ngapaaya maa mawale gakye tikyi, ngyechikyiṟo.”
Cha ilyi shoka ya samu yakye ikauma, na oe kamanya mmbiunyi okye kye amkyia wukyiwa wulya.
Cha ilyi Yesu, aichi mrimenyi kokye kye pfinya yammbuka, kaambuya numa kulya wuingyinyi wo wandu, kagamba, “Nyi wui angyipaaya mawale gako?”
Wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Nuwewonyi chandu wuingyi wo wandu waikupeṟeetsa-peṟeetsa, na iyoe nuigamba, ‘Nyi wui angyipaaya?’ ”
Kaambuya ngyuura tsoose kundu nawone ulya aleṟunda kyindo-kyo.
Na mndu mka ulya kawoṙo nyi wuowu na iṙeṙema, aichi kyammbutikyia, kacha kamwolokyia, kamwongoya wuloi woose.
Kammbia, “Mono-ko o kyika, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa, yenda na ufoṟo, ndoṟe-yo ilawe-se wukyiwa wopfo.”
Na kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, kukocha wandu wawuka ko ulya ang'anyi o sinagogi, wechigamba, “Mono-pfo o kyika ampfa. Kuwoṙe kyiira kyiha iengyeṟa ituura mlosha?”
Kyaindi Yesu, kyiyeri aleicho mbonyi-tso, kawia ang'anyi ulya o sinagogi, “Ulaowuoe, waṙa iiṙikyia tupu.”
Maa alelekyia mndu ioshana na oe-pfo, sile Petiro, Yakobo, na Yohane, mono-wama o Yakobo.
Wakashika kanyi ko ang'anyi ulya o sinagogi, kawona kyituṟu, na wandu wechifiiṟa, wechikapa ṟanyi ing'anyi.
Amwiṙe na numba, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muwoṙe kyituṟu na ifiiṟa? Mana alandepfe-pfo, indi nalee tupu.”
Wakamsaaṟa mnu. Na oe amwafune na nja woose, kaṙuo awu o mana ulya na wamae, na walya wakyeri hamwi na oe, kaiṙa na halya-ndu mana ulya awekyeri.
Kawaṙa mana ulya kuwoko, kammbia, “Talyita, kumi”; kyitambuluo kyakye nyi “Mono-waka, ngakuwia, amka.”
Cha ilyi mana ulya kagoṟoka, kayenda, cha kyipfa nawewoṙe maka ikumi na iwi. Cha ilyi wakaṟiyio lying'anyi.
Kawatutuma mnu, mndu alamanye mbonyi tsilya, kagamba mana ulya naenengo kyelya.
Kawuka pfo, kayenda mṟasa uruka lo kowo; wanalosho wakye wakamwosha.

Kyiyeri mfiri o onyonya ulecha, nalewooka iloshia sinagoginyi. Wandu wafoi kyiyeri waleicho wakaṟiyio, wechigamba, “Ichu nyi kwi alewona ishi? Nyi wuṟango wuha amwenengye? Nyi kuṙa aiwuta shindo shing'anyi kuṙi sha maṟiyisho?
Ichu chi ulya ekyepacha mbau, mana o Maria, na mono-wama o wako-Yakobo, Yose, Yuda, na Simion-pfoe? Na washikyi wakye wakyeri iha koṙu-pfoe?” Koikyo wakammina.
Yesu kawawia, “Moonguo shisuku ekyewuṟa iindio, sile urukyenyi lokye amonyi-pfo, ko wandu wakye, na kanyi kokye.”
Maa aleiṙima iṟunda kyiṟiyisho kyoose ipfo-pfo, sile nalewikyia mawoko gakye wuye ya wandu waangu waluoe, kawakyiṟa.
Kaṟiyio kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyawo lyaangu. Katenga-tenga kulya shikaṟonyi, echilosha.
Kalaga walya ikumi na wawi, kawooka iwaṙuma wawi wawi, kawaenenga pfinya yechilyia waṟufui wawicho.
Kawaima walaṙuo kyindo kyoose kyewatarama njienyi sile upoi tupu; maa mkate, maa mkunja, maa heleri tsa kyiseyesoe;
kyaindi waṟae shiaṙu. Kagamba, “Mulaṟae mawale gawi.”
Kawawia, “Handu hoose mochiiṙa na numba, kaenyi pfo mṟasa kyiyeri mochiwuka handu-ho.
Na handu hoose walandemuambilyie nyoe maa imuaṙanyia, kyiyeri mowuka ho, kute-kutenyi kyilulyi kyikyeri maṙendenyi ganyu, kundu wamanye wuwicho wo kyilya wawuta.”
Wakafuma, wakaonguo kye wandu waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi.
Wakafuna waṟufui wawicho wafoi; wakashia mafuṙa wandu wafoi waweluoe, wakawakyiṟa.
Na Mangyi Herode kaicho mbonyi, cha kyipfa rina lya Yesu lyiwesendo orio handu, kagamba, “Yohane Mpatisi naṟuka ko wapfu, koikyo pfinya-tsi tsiṟunda kyiiṙi kyakye.”
Wengyi walegamba, “Nyi Elyia.” Wengyi walegamba, “Ichu nyi moonguo shisuku, ang'u nyi cha umwi o weonguo shisuku.”
Kyaindi kyiyeri Herode aleicho nalegamba, “Yohane, ulya ngyilemṙumbuo mṙoe, naṟuka.”
Cha kyipfa Herode amonyi nalekoaṙuma wandu, kawaṙa Yohane, kammbika kyipfungonyi, kyipfa kya Herodia, mka o Filyipo, mono-wamae; cha kyipfa Herode nawemwalyikyie.
Cha kyipfa Yohane nalewia Herode, “Chi sungusinyi kopfo ialyika mka o mono-womoo-pfo.”
Na Herodia naweimwotia, kapfula immbaaga, alaiṙime.
Cha kyipfa Herode naleouwuo Yohane; amwichi kye nyi mndu o wusumganyi, mweele, kamringa. Na kyiyeri ammwaṙanyie nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi mnu; na oe nawemwaṙanyia na sia.
Na lyilya ṙaawa lyicha lyilewoneka, na Herode, mfiri ung'anyi o iwoneka lyakye, kyiyeri aleachikyia wang'anyi wakye shelya, na wasongoru wa asikari wa shiṙa, na wandu wawoṙe kyiṟumi wa Galyilaya;
nyi lyo-ndu mono-kyika o Herodia aleiṙa na numba, katema, kachihiṟa Herode na walya waweilya handu hamwi na oe. Mangyi kawia mana ulya, “Ngyiterewa kyoose ukundi, ngyechikuenenga.”
Kammbia, “Kyoose ochingyiterewa ngyekuenenga, maa kokooya nyi igawana wumangyi woko.”
Kyasia kafuma kawesa wamae, “Ngyiterewe kyi?” Na wamae kagamba, “Mṙoe o Yohane Mpatisi.”
Cha ilyi kayenda faṟa ko mangyi, katerewa echigamba, “Ngyikundi ungyienengye wulalu kuṙi ipongonyi mṙoe o Yohane Mpatisi.”
Mangyi kawihiyo mnu mrimenyi, kyaindi kyipfa kya nyamu tsakye, na kyipfa kya walya waweilya na oe, alekunda imlegia-pfo.
Cha ilyi mangyi kaṙuma asikari, kagamba mṙoe okye uendo. Asikari ulya kayenda, kaṙumbuo Yohane mṙoe kulya kyipfungonyi,
Kaende mṙoe okye ipongonyi, kaenengyia mana ulya, na oe kaenengyia wamae.
Kyiyeri wanalosho wa Yohane waleicho mbonyi, waleyenda, wakaṙuo mmbiu okye, wakauṟika kyilomenyi.
Na wanalosho wakasanza mbele ya Yesu, wakamwongoya mbonyi tsa shindo shoose waleṟunda, na shindo shoose walelosha.
Kawawia, “Nnjonyi nyoe muwenyi, na handu halawoṙe wandu, mucheonyonya kyitutu.” Cha kyipfa hawewoṙe wandu wafoi, wechicha, wechiyenda, mṟasa ṙaawa lyelya lyikawuṟika.
Wakayenda handu hakuṟiikyie ngalawenyi, handu halawoṙe wandu.
Wandu wakawawona wechiyenda, na wafoi wakamanya, wakayenda pfo mteeṟa ko maṙende, iwuka mṟi yoose, wakawooka ishika.
Na oe kyiyeri alesoka ngalawenyi, kawona wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu, kawawonia wukyiwa; cha kyipfa wawekyeri cha moondo galawoṙe mlyisi; kawooka iwalosha shindo shifoi.
Na lyilya kyiyeri kying'anyi kya kyingoto kyileiṙa, wanalosho wakye waleyenda kokye, wakagamba, “Handu-ha nyi nuka mreesi, na wulalu kuila.
Sama wandu-wa, kundu wayende, maṙemenyi na shikaṟonyi sha kufuhi na iha, wandeguṟa kyelya.”
Kagaluo, kawawia, “Waenengyenyi kyelya.” Wakammbia, “Ngyesa, luende lundeguṟa mkate ya woguru wo dinari magana gawi kundu luwaenengye walye?”
Kawawia, “Muwoṙe mkate inga? Yendenyi mundeambuya.” Wammanye, wakagamba, “Itanu na makunga gawi.”
Kawawia wawaṟamiṟe woose, shiṙombo shiṙombo, handu hawoṙe maṟa mawishi.
Wakaṙamia nzengye nzengye, iha igana, iha makumi gataanu.
Kawaṙa mkate iya itanu na makunga galya gawi, kaambuya ruwewu, kaana, kapeṟenguo mkate iya, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye wawagawie; na makunga galya gawi kawagawia woose.
Wakalya woose wakaiguṙa.
Wakasania shipeṟengu sheiṙima iichuṟa mkunja ikumi na iwi; na shipeṟengu sha makunga taa.
Na walelya mkate iya nyi cha wasoṟo shiku shitaanu.
Cha ilyi kaitika wanalosho wakye waṙooye ngalawenyi, wasonguo iyenda molyolya mṟasa Betisaida, kyiyeri oe aweisama wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
Na amwasame kayenda fumvunyi indeterewa.
Na kyiyeri kuleila ngalawa iwekyeri makyiṙi-gawi ga ipalyipalyi, na oe nakyeri amonyi urukyenyi lugaṙutsu.

Kawawona wechilya wukyiwa kyipfa kya ikuruo makasia, cha kyipfa kyiwiṟi kyiwekyilang'a. Na lyilya kulewa (cha kamba lya kaana lyeringa kyio) naleyenda ko wanalosho echumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi; kawa cha ilyi nakundi iwaiṙa.
Nawo kyiyeri walemmbona echumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi, walekusaṟa kye nyi kyirinje, wakafuga.
Cha kyipfa woose walemmbona, wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, cha ilyi kaṙeṙa nawo, kawawia, “Kuwanzenyi nyi inyi, mulaowuoe.”
Kaṙooya kulya ngalawenyi kundu wakyeri; kyiwiṟi kyikatsia. Wakaṟiyio mnu mrimenyi kowo;
cha kyipfa walemanya mbonyi tsa mkate iya-pfo, kyaindi mrima yawo iwengyiumu.
Na wamuambaṙe, waleshika uruka lo Kyenesareti, wakatirimisha ngalawa.
Nawo wammbukye ngalawenyi, cha ilyi wandu walemmanya.
Wakakapa mteeṟa, wechitenga uruka lulya loose, wakawooka iṙuo wandu waluoe walee shitaṟenyi, iyenda orio handu waleicho kye nakyeri.
Na orio handu aleyenda, echiiṙa na shikaṟonyi, ang'u maṙemenyi, wakawikyia wandu waluoe sangaṙa, wakamterewa wapaaye maa ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye. Na woose walempaaya wakachia.
Numa ya iho Mafarisayo na walosha waata wa mawawaso wawewukyie Yerusalemu, wakakuumbia mbele yakye.
Wakawona wengyi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye, wechilya shelya na mawoko galamasanje kyimṟumoe chandu Mafarisayo wawekyewuta.
Cha kyipfa Mafarisayo na Wayuda woose, walandesanje mawoko mṟasa ukokuo wekyelya-pfo, wechiindia shilya waleambilyia ko waku wawo.
Lyingyi-se wakawuka sangaṙa walandesambe, wekyelya-pfo. Na kuwoṙe shido shingyi waleshiambilyia ko waku wawo wawekyeshiindia, cha isanja shiṙoo, na shinungu, na shindo cha piṟika.
Kyasia Mafarisayo na walosha walya wa mawawaso wakammbesa, “Ny'kyilyi wanalosho wapfo walekyeindia shilya luleambilyia ko waku waṙu, indi wekyelya na mawoko gafanyi?”
Kawawia, “Yesaya nalesonguo ionguo necha mbonyi tsanyu nyoe wakulembecheṟi, chandu kyikyiṟeie,
‘Wandu-wa wekyengyiindia kui maṙumbu
indi mrima yawo ikyeri kuleshi na inyi;
Nawo wekyengyiana na ingyiterewa wulya,
wechilosha malosho
gakyeri mawawaso ga wandu.’ ”
Nyoe mokyemina iwawaso lya Ruwa, na iwaṙa shilya wandu waambilyie ko waku wawo.
Kawawia, “Necha! Muilega iwawaso lya Ruwa muiṙime iindia shindo muleambilyia ko waku wanyu.
Kyipfa Mose nalegamba, ‘India awuyo na womoo’, na, ‘Alahia awuye ang'u wamae ipfa na napfe.’
Kyaindi nyoe mokyegamba, ‘Mndu kawia awuye ang'u wamae, kyindo ngyikundi ikuenenga uwone ho kyiira nyi Koriban’, kyimwi na igamba, kyindo kyikyiwikyie mboṟa ko maṟunda ga Ruwa, kyekyewa kuṙo.
Maa numa ya iho mokyeenenga mndu-cho momu iṟundia awuye ang'u wamae kyindo-pfo;
kunu mochilega kyilya Ruwa agambie kui shindo nyoe cha Wayuda muleambilyia ko waku wanyu na iwia wana wanyu ishiṟunda. Lyingyi-se mokyeṟunda shindo shifoi shilyingananyi na isho.”
Kalaga-se wuingyi wo wandu, kawawia, “Ngyiaṙanyienyi moose na imanya.
Kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyeri nja ya mndu kyekyeiṙa na kokye kyikaiṙima imfanyiṟa kyimṟumoe-pfo. Indi shilya shekyewuka kokye, nyisho shekyefanyiṟa mndu ulya. [
Mndu kawaṙa maṙwi geaṙanyia, na naaṙanyie.]”
Na lyilya aleiṙa na kanyi, nalekana na wuingyi wo wandu, wanalosho wakye wakammbesa mbonyi tsa mfano ulya.
Kawawia, “Maa nyoe muwoṙe wuṟango-pfoe? Muichi kye orio kyindo kyikyeri nja ya mndu, kyikaiṙa na kokye, kyeiṙima imfanyiṟa-pfo;
cha kyipfa kyekyeiṙa na mrimenyi kokye-pfo, indi ndewunyi tikyi; numa ya iho kyekyefuma iyenda choṟonyi?” Kui igamba kuṙo naleloṟa kye kuwoṙe kyelya kyiwicho-pfo.
Kagamba, “Kyekyewuka ko mndu nyikyo kyekyemfanyiṟa kyimṟumoe.
Cha kyipfa mrimenyi ko wandu kokyewuka makusaṟo mawicho, wuṟui,
wuiwi, uwaagi, lango ngyiwicho, wulang'a, ngyeṟo, ukoe, wunyeng'i, shilahio, ikuṙosa na wutondo.
Ishi shoose shekyewuka ko mndu, nasho shekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe.”
Kawuka pfo, kayenda mṟasa uruka lo Tiro na Sidon. Kaiṙa na numba, alakunde kyimanyikye; kyaindi aleiṙima ikuṟiika-pfo.
Cha ilyi mndu mka, mono-kye awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho, naleicho mbonyi tsakye, kacha kamwolokyia maṙendenyi gakye.
Na mndu mka ulya nyi Mkyiṟikyi, amfee ko Wasirofoinikye. Kamterewa nawute mana ulya okye o kyika mṟufui mmbicho.
Kammbia, “Leka wana waiguṙe kuwooka; kyipfa chi necha iwuta kyelya kya wana na iwiyitsia shite-pfo.”
Na oe kagaluo, kammbia, “Yee, Mndumii, kyaindi maa shite shikyeri wanda ya mesa shekyelya matsugaṟo ga wana.”
Kammbia, “Kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, yenda; mṟufui mmbicho ammbuka ko mono-opfo.”
Kayenda kanyi kokye, kakooya mana ulya amlaṟe kyitaṟenyi, na mṟufui ulya mmbicho amwummbuka.
Kawuka-se urukyenyi lo Tiro, kaiṙa makyiṙi-gawi ga Sidon, kayenda mṟasa ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, mṟasenyi na uruka luwoṙe mṟi ung'anyi uwoṙe shikaṟo ikumi okyelago Dekapolyi.
Wakamwendie mndu mpfu maṙwi, alawekyeiṙima iṙeṙa, wakamterewa namwekyie mawoko.
Kammbikyia kuleshi na wuingyi wo wandu handu hakuṟiikyie. Kawika shimnyoe shakye maṙwinyi gakye, kapucha maṙa, kampaaya ulumi.
Kaambuya wuye ruwewu, katerewa Ruwa kui isumkyia lying'anyi, kammbia, “Efata”, kyimwi na igamba, “Tambuluka.”
Cha ilyi maṙwi gakye gakaṟusuka, ulumi lokye lukoṟengyeṟa, kaṙeṙa necha.
Kawaima walaongoye mndu; kyaindi chandu aleengyeṟa iwaima, nyi wuṙo waleengyeṟa ionguo mbonyi.
Wakaṟiyio mnu, wechigamba, “Naṟunda shindo shoose necha. Wapfu maṙwi naiwaenenga iicho, na wai ndiṟi iṙeṙe.”
Mfiri iya, chandu wuingyi wulya wo wandu wuweng'anyi-se nawo wauṟa kyindo kyelya, kalaga wanalosho wakye, kawawia,
“Ngawonia wuingyi-wu wo wandu wukyiwa cha kyipfa nyi mfiri iṟaṟu wakyeri na inyi, maa wawoṙe kyindo kyelya-pfo;
na inyi ngawasama wayende kanyi kowo na kunu wakuretekyie, wechioloka njienyi; na waata wawukyie kuleshi.”
Wanalosho wakye wakamgaluo, “Ngyesa mndu neiṙima kuṙa iigutsa iwa kui mkate iha nuka?”
Kawawesa, “Muwoṙe mkate inga?” Wakagamba, “Mfungaaṙe.”
Kagamba wuingyi wo wandu waṙamie wanda. Kaira mkate iya mfungaaṙe, kaana, kaipeṟenguo, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye wawagawie; wakagawia wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
Wawewoṙe shipere shaangu; kashiwikyia mboṟa, kagamba wagawio na isho taa.
Wakalya, wakaiguṙa, wakasania matsugaṟo ga shipeṟengu sha mkate, mkunja mfungaaṙe ikaichuo.
Na wandu walelya waweshikyie shiku shiina. Kawasama.
Cha ilyi kaṙooya ngalawenyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye, kayenda mṟasa ura lo Dalyimanuta.
Mafarisayo wakacha, wakawooka igaluana na oe; wechipfula kokye kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu; wechimyesha.
Kawona fowa mrimenyi kokye, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi rika-lyi lyipfula kyiṟingyishio? Ny'kyaloi, ngammbienyi, rika-lyi lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu-pfo.”
Kalekana nawo, kaṙooya-se ngalawenyi, kayenda mṟasa molyolya.
Wakawaṙima iṙuo mkate, maa ngalawenyi wawewoṙe kyindo sile mkate umwi tupu-pfo.
Kawaikyimbia, kagamba, “Kushowenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo na chachu ya Herode.”
Wakagaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi, cha kyipfa walawewoṙe mkate.
Na Yesu kamanya, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muigaluana kyipfa mulawoṙe mkate? Maa mulandemanye-pfoe? Ngyesa mrima yanyu nyi ingyiumu?
Muwoṙe meso, muwonyi-pfo. Muwoṙe maṙwi, muichuoe-pfoe? Maa mukumburie-pfoe?
Kyiyeri ngyilepeṟenguo mkate iya itanu na ienengyia walya shiku shitaanu, muleira mkunja inga iichuo shipeṟengu?” Wakammbia, “Ikumi na iwi.”
“Na iya mfungaaṙe ienengyia walya shiku shiina, muleira mkunja inga iichuo shipeṟengu?” Wakammbia, “Mfungaaṙe.”
Kawawia, “Mulandemanye-pfoe?”
Wakashika Betisaida, wakamwendie kyipfupfuṟe wakamterewa nakyipaaye.
Kawaṙa kyipfupfuṟe kyilya kuwoko, kakyiṙuo nja ya kyikaṟo, kakyipuchia maṙa mesonyi, kakyiyekyia mawoko, kakyiwesa, “Nuwonyi kyindo?”
Kyikaambuya wuye, kyikagamba, “Ngyiwonyi wandu cha mashiṙi, gaiyenda.”
Naaho-ng'u kawika-se mawoko gakye wuye ya meso gakyo, nakyo kyikaambuya mnu; kyikachia, kyikawona shoose na pata.
Kakyiwia kyiyende kanyi, echigamba, “Maa kyikaṟonyi ulaiṙe napfo.”
Yesu kafuma na wanalosho wakye, wakayenda shikaṟonyi sha Kaisaria-Filyipi na njienyi kawesa wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Wandu wekyegamba kye inyi nyi wui?”
Wakamgaluo, “Yohane Mpatisi; wengyi Elyia; wengyi, umwi o waikyimbi.”
Na oe kawawesa, “Na nyoe muigamba kye inyi nyi wui?” Petiro kamgaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nyi oe Kristo.”
Kawatutuma walawie mndu mbonyi tsakye.
Kawooka iwalosha kye Mono-Mndu nawaṟi iwona matuuro gafoi, na ilego nyi wasongoru, na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na iwoogo, na numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu iṟuka.
Na oe naweionguo mbonyi-tso na pata. Petiro kamṙuo, kawooka imṙeria.
Kagaluka, kaambuya wanalosho wakye, kaṙeṙia Petiro, kagamba, “Wuka koko, Satana; kyipfa uikusaṟa shii sha Ruwa-pfo, indi sha wandu.”
Kalaga wuingyi wo wandu hamwi na wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Mndu oose akundi ingyiosha nakulege amonyi, nakuṙikye msalaba okye, nangyioshe.
Cha kyipfa mndu akundi ikyiṟa moo okye, nechiuṙetsa, na mndu echiṙetsa moo okye kyipfa kyako na kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha, ichu nechiukyiṟa.
Cha kyipfa mndu nechiiria ho kyi iwona wuyana woose, echiṙetsa mrima okye?
Ang'u mndu naenengyie kyi handu ha moo okye?

Kyipfa orio mndu echirigo nyi sonu kyipfa kyako, na malosho gako, kyiiṙi kya rika-lyi lya wuṟui na wunyamaṟi, Mono-Adamu nechirigo nyi sonu kyipfa kya mndu-cho, kyiyeri echicha mng'anonyi o Awu okye hamwi na malaika waele.”
Kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, kuwoṙe wandu kyiiṙi kya iwa wagoṟokyi iha, wechiwaṙa moo, mṟasa kyiyeri wechiwona Ruwa echichilyia.”
Na lyilya mfiri iṟandaaṟu ileiṙa Yesu kaṙuo Petiro, na Yakobo, na Yohane, kawaṙuo wuye ya fumvu lyileshi handu hakuṟiikyie, wo wawenyi; kailachika fana mbele yawo.
Mawale gakye gechikyema-kyema, gameelyi mnu, kulawoṙe mndu wuyanenyi koose eiṙima igasanja gaile kuṙo.
Elyia hamwi na Mose wakacha na handu halya, nawo waweiṙeṙa na Yesu.
Petiro kawia Yesu, “Mlosha, nyi kyicha soe ikaa iha. Luwikye matengo gaṟaaṟu, lyimwi lyapfo iyoe, lyimwi lya Mose, na lyimwi lya Elyia.”
Petiro alemanya kyeṙeṙa-pfo, cha kyipfa walewoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi.
Numa ya iho hakawoneka ipuchi, lyikawaendie kyirinje. Ṟui lyikawuka kulya ipuchinyi, “Ichu nyi Mono-ko, mkunde oko, mwaṙanyienyi oe.”
Cha ilyi kyiyeri waleambuya kunu na kunu, walawone mndu akyeri nawo sile Yesu amonyi tupu.
Na lyilya waweisoka fumvunyi nalewaima walaongoye mndu shilya walewona, mṟasa kyiyeri Mono-Mndu echiṟuka ko wapfu.
Wakawuta kyilya walewio, wechiwesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Iṟuka-lyo ko wapfu lyagamba kyi?”
Wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Ny'kyilyi walosha wa mawawaso wekyegamba kye kyiwaṟi Elyia icha kuwooka?”
Kagaluo kawawia, “Nyi loi Elyia naicha kuwooka, na iwiyiṟia wuhya shindo shoose, kyaindi, hamwi na isho, kyikyiṟeie kuṙa kye Mono-Mndu nechiwona matuuro gafoi na imino?
Kyaindi ngammbia, Elyia amcha, nawo wakammbutia shoose walekunda chandu kyiwekyiṟeie.”
Na lyilya walekooyana na wanalosho, walewona wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wuwaiṟiwie na walosha wa mawawaso wechigaluana nawo.
Cha ilyi kyiyeri wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu walemmbona waleṟiyio, wakakapa mteeṟa, wakamwiṟikyiṟa.
Kawawesa, “Ny'kyikyi muigaluana nawo?”
Mndu umwi wuingyinyi wulya wo wandu kagaluo kagamba, “Mlosha, ngaende mono-ko na kopfo, nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho ekyemwima iṙeṙa.
Na orio kyiyeri ammbaṙa, nekyemwolotsa wanda, na oe nekyeṙosa mawia na ilya ngakuru na imwumiṟa ng'ashu. Ngaṙeṙa na wanalosho wapfo wammbute mṟufui-cho mmbicho walaiṙime.”
Kawagaluo, kagamba, “Nyoe rika lyiwoṙe iiṙikyia lyifofo, ngyikae na nyoe mṟasa indi? Ngyiṙuane na nyoe mṟasa indi? Muendenyi na koko.”
Wakamwende na kokye. Na lyilya alemmbona, cha ilyi mṟufui ulya nalemṙeṙemsha, na oe kaoloka wanda, kakuoṟoosa-oṟoosa, echiṙosa mawia.
Kawesa awuye, “Ishi shimmbookyie indi?” Kagamba, “Wookyia wututunyi.
Na kafoi nekyemmbiyitsa moṙonyi, na mṟingyenyi, namrumatse. Kyaindi koiṙima, luwonie wukyiwa, na ilutarama.”
Yesu kammbia, “Koiṙima! Shoose shekyeiṙimika ko ulya aiṙikyie.”
Cha ilyi awu o manakye ulya kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Ngaiṙikyia, ngyitarama kundu ngyiiṙikyie.”
Na Yesu awonyi kye wuingyi wo wandu wuisanza iwinyi, kaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, kammbia, “Iyoe mṟufui mmbicho moima iṙeṙa na iaṙanyia, inyi ngakuwia, wuka ko ichu, maa ulaiṙe-se na kokye.”
Kafuga, kamṙeṙemsha mnu, kammbuka; na oe kawa cha ilyi apfiie; mṟasa wafoi wakagamba, “Napfa.”
Kyaindi Yesu kammbaṙa kuwoko kamwira; na oe kagoṟoka.
Na lyilya aleiṙa na kanyi, wanalosho wakye wakammbesa kui kyiṟika, “Kyitewe soe lulaleiṙima immbuta ny'kyi?”
Kawawia, “Mbaṟe-i yeiṙima iwuka kui ṙeṙo lyoose, sile kui iterewa-pfo.”
Wakawuka pfo, wakaiṙa makyiṙi-gawi ga Galyilaya; na oe alekunda mndu namanye-pfo.
Cha kyipfa naweilosha wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Mono-Mndu naindewiko mawokonyi ga wandu, nawo wechimmbaaga; na kammboogo, numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu nechiṟuka.”
Kyaindi walemanya ṙeṙo lyilya-pfo, wakaowuo immbesa.
Wakashika Kaperinaumu; na lyilya awekyeri kanyi, kawawesa, “Ny'kyikyi muweiṙeṙa njienyi?”
Wakatsia; cha kyipfa njienyi waweigaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi, nyi wui akyeri ang'anyi.
Kaṙamia wanda, kalaga walya ikumi na wawi, kawawia, “Mndu akundi iwa o kuwooka nechiwa o mafurumionyi kuta woose, na mṟundi o woose.”
Kaira kyikoku, kakyiwikyia makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kakyichunguṟia, kawawia,
“Mndu kaambilyia mana umwi o mbaṟe-i kui rina lyako, nangyiambilyia inyi; na mndu kangyiambilyia inyi, naambilyia, chi inyi-pfo, indi ulya alengyiṙuma.”
Yohane kamgaluo, kammbia, “Mlosha, lulewona mndu echiwuta waṟufui wawicho kui rina lyapfo, alekyeoshana na soe; lukomwima, cha kyipfa ekyeoshana na soe-pfo.”
Yesu kagamba, “Mulamwime-pfo, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu echiwuta kyindo kya kyiṟiyisho kui rina lyako kaweiṙima na iṙeṙa kyiwicho kyako-pfo.
Cha kyipfa ai ura loṙu, nyi oṙu.
