Orio mndu echimrutsa nyoe kyiṙoo kya mṟinga, cha kyipfa nyoe nyi wandu wa Kristo, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, easha wori wokye-pfo.”
“Na mndu echitewe umwi o iwa watutu wangyiiṙikyie, nanga apfungyio ikyesa nzingonyi kokye, na iwiyitso ipalyipalyinyi.
Na kuwoko kopfo kukokutewe, ṙumbuo kuwoko-ko. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana uwoṙe kuwoko kumwi, kuta iwaṙa mawoko gawi na iyenda ngyehenenyi, kundu kuwoṙe moṙo ulekyeruma; [
kulya-ndu mashinu gekyelya mawoko-ga galekyepfa, maa moṙo ulekyeruma.]
Na kuṙende kopfo kukokutewe, ṙumbuo kuṙende-ko. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana, ui kyiwete, kuta iwaṙa maṙende gawi na iwiyitso ngyehenenyi; [
kulya-ndu mashinu gekyelya maṙende-ga galekyepfa, maa moṙo ulekyeruma.]
Na riso lyapfo lyikakutewe, lyikuluoe, ulyiwiyitse. Nyi nanga iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa, uwoṙe riso lyimwi, kuta iwaṙa meso gawi, na iwiyitso ngyehenenyi
kulya-ndu mashinu gekyelya meso-ga galekyepfa, maa moṙo ulekyeruma.”
“Cha kyipfa iiṙikyia lya orio mndu lyechilotsiṟo nyi moṙo chandu munyu okyelotsiṟa shindo.
Munyu nyi kyindo kyicha, kyaindi munyu ukowa chi munyu-se-pfo, mochiuwika kyi uṙahie? Waṙenyi munyu mrimenyi konyu, mukae na ufoṟo nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.”
Kawuka pfo kashika mṟasenyi ya Uyuda, na molyolya o Yoridan. Wuingyi wufoi wukosanza-se wakayenda kokye, kawalosha-se chandu aweichiwie.
Kyasia Mafarisayo wakayenda kokye, wakammbesa, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi mndu iṙa mka okye?” kunu wechimyesha.
Na oe kagaluo, kawawia, “Mose nalemmbia kyi?”
Wakagamba, “Mose naleenenga momu iṟeia kyiṟeio kyelekana na imṙa.”
Yesu kawawia, “Kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanyu nalemuenenga iwawaso-lyi.
Kyaindi wookyia mawookyionyi ga igumbo wuyana, nalegumba mii na mka.
Kyipfa kya ikyo mndu nechilekana na awuye na wamae, naawishane na mka okye;
na iwo wawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi; kyasia wai-se wawi-pfo, indi mmbiu umwi.
Kyasia ikyo Ruwa akyilunga, mndu alakyiletsane.”
Na lyilya walewuya na kanyi wanalosho wakammbesa mbonyi tsa ṙeṙo-lyo.
Kawawia, “Orio mndu echiṙa mka okye na ialyika ungyi nawa mṟui;
na mka, kaṙa mii okye na ialyiko nyi mndu ungyi, nawa mṟui.”
Kyasia wakaendie Yesu wana watutu kundu nawapaaye; wanalosho wakye wakawaṙeṙia.
Indi Yesu kyiyeri alewona kasuo mnu, kawawia, “Lekyenyi wana watutu wache na koko, mulawashingyie-pfo; cha kyipfa wana cha iwa Wumangyi wo Ruwa nyi wowo.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, orio oose alechiiṙikyia Wumangyi wo Ruwa cha mana mtutu echiiṙa napfo maa ale-pfo.”
Kawachunguṟia, kayekyia mawoko gakye wuye yawo, kawawikyia mboṟa.
Na lyilya awefuma iyenda njienyi, mndu umwi kacha eṙicha, kampfiria ndi, kammbesa, “Mlosha mcha, ngyiwute kyi ngyiiṙime ioṟa moo o mlungana?”
Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyilyi uigamba ngyimcha? Kuwoṙe ai mcha sile umwi tupu-pfo, nyi oe Ruwa.
Nuichi mawawaso: Ulawaage, Ulaṟuguye maa Ulaṟuguyo, Ulaiwe, Ulaṟingyishie wongo, Ulalembe, India awuyo na womoo.”
Kammbia, “Mlosha, iga goose ngyekyegaosha wookyia wututu woko.”
Yesu kamwitukuya ko pfinya kamkunda, kammbia, “Nuuṟie kyindo kyimwi. Yenda, undekumba shoose uwoṙe, uenengye wakyiwa, na iyoe nochiwaṙa kyiseyesoe ruwewu; numa ya iho nnjo ungyioshe.”
Kyaindi oe kalema nzineeri kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, kawuka halya ammbihie mrimenyi; cha kyipfa nawewoṙe masaa gafoi.
Yesu kaambuya ngyuura tsoose, kawia wanalosho wakye, “Kyechiwa kyuumu ko wawoṙe masaa iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa!”
Wanalosho wakaṟiyio kyipfa kya malosho gakye. Yesu kagaluo-se kawawia, “Wana, kyikyilemeri iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa!
Kyikyeri kyaangu ngamia iiṙa ṟochonyi lya sindanu kuta mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
Nawo wakaṟiyio mnu, wechimmbia, “Nyi wui-ngu ngyesa, echiiṙima ikyia?”
Yesu kawaitukuya, kagamba, “Ko wandu kyechiiṙimika-pfo, indi ko Ruwa chi wuṙo-pfo; kyipfa shoose shekyeiṙimika ko Ruwa.”
Petiro kawooka immbia, “Ambuya, soe luleṙa shoose lukokuosha iyoe.”

Yesu kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, kuwoṙe mndu aleṙa numba, ang'u wana wa wama wa kyisoṟo, ang'u washikyi, ang'u mama, ang'u awu, ang'u wana, ang'u maṙema kyipfa kyako, na kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha-pfo,
alechienengo ka igana kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu, numba, na wana wa wama wa kyisoṟo, na washikyi, na mama, na wana, na maṙema, hamwi na ngapo, na kulya wuyanenyi wuicha moo o mlungana.
Kyaindi wafoi wakyeri wa kuwooka wechiwa wa mafurumionyi; na wa mafurumionyi wechiwa wa kuwooka.”
Nawo wawekyeri njienyi, kunu wechiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu; na Yesu nawewasongoye. Wakaṟiyio, nawo wechiosha wakaowuo. Kawuta-se walya ikumi na wawi, kawooka iwawia mbonyi tsa shindo shechimmbutikyia,
echigamba, “Ambuyenyi luiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu; na Mono-Mndu nechiwiko mawokonyi ga wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso. Nawo wechimwanduya napfe, wechimmbika mawokonyi ga masanga,
nawo wechimtaluo, na impuchia maṙa, na imkapa na ngowa, na immbaaga, na numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu nechiṟuka.”
Na Yakobo na Yohane, wana wa Sebedayo, wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Mlosha, lukundi uluwutie ikyo kyoose lochikuterewa.”
Kawawia, “Mukundi ngyimmbutie kyi?”
Wakammbia, “Uluenengye soe luṙamie, umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe, na umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso, mng'anonyi opfo.”
Yesu kawawia, “Muichi kyindo muiterewa-pfo. Moiṙima iiṙia matuuro ngyigaiṙia, ang'u ipatiso wupatiso ngyipatiso inyi?”
Wakammbia, “Loiṙima.” Yesu kawawia, “Matuuro ngyigaiṙia, mochigaiṙia, na wupatiso ngyipatiso inyi mochipatiso,
kyaindi mbonyi tsa iṙamia kuwoko koko ko kulyoe ang'u kuwoko koko ko kumoso chi momu oko imuenenga-pfo, sile wechienengo iwo wamuṟeyeṟio.”
Na kyiyeri walya ikumi waleicho wakawooka isuuya Yakobo na Yohane.
Yesu kawalaga, kawawia, “Muichi kye walya wawatale iwa wang'anyi wa masanga wekyemuchilyia kui pfinya, na wasongoru wawo wekyemugaluo nyoe waṟundi wawo.
Kyaindi kyechiwa kuṙo konyu-pfo; indi mndu akundi iwa ang'anyi konyu, nechiwa mṟundi onyu,
na mndu akundi iwa o kuwooka konyu, nechiwa isinga lya woose.
Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu alecha icheṟundio-pfo, indi iṟundia wengyi, na ireka moo okye uwe kyindo kyekyiṟa wengyi.”
Wakashika Yeriko; na kyiyeri aweiwuka pfo, hamwi na wanalosho wakye, na kyisanzionyi, mana o Timayo, Baritolomayo, kyipfupfuṟe kyilya kyiwekyeeṟeṟa, kyiweṙamie mbai ya njia.
Nakyo kyiyeri kyileicho kye nyi Yesu o Nasareti, kyilewooka ikuilenga, na igamba, “Mono-Dawidi, Yesu, ungyisaṟie.”
Na wandu wafoi wakakyiṙeṙia kundu kyitsie, kyaindi kyikaengyeṟa ikuilenga, “Mono-Dawidi, ungyisaṟie.”
Yesu kagoṟoka, kagamba, “Kyilagenyi.” Wakalaga kyipfupfuṟe kyilya, wakakyiwia, “Kuwanze mrimenyi; goṟoka, naikulaga.”
Kyikawiyitsa ikunya lyakyo, kyikatoola, kyikayenda ko Yesu.
Yesu kakyigaluo, kakyiwia, “Nukundi ngyikuwutie kyi?” Kyipfupfuṟe kyilya kyikammbia, “Mlosha oko, ngyikundi ngyiiṙime iwona.”
Yesu kakyiwia, “Yenda, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa.” Cha ilyi kyikaenengo iwona; kyikamwosha njienyi.
Na kyiyeri wawei kufuhi na Yerusalemu, kufuhi na Betifage na Betania, iambuyana na fumvu lya mashiṙi ga mseituni, naleṙuma wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye,
kawawia, “Yendenyi mṟasa kyikaṟo kyilya kyiambuyanyi na nyoe; na mukoiṙa napfo, cha ilyi mochiwona igache lya nzoi, lyilandeṙamilyio nyi mndu; lyipfunguonyi, mulyiende.
Na mndu kammbia, ‘Ny'kyilyi muiwuta kuṙi?’ gambenyi ‘Mndumii kuwoṙe kyindo aindeṟunda nalyo, na cha ilyi nechilyiwiyiṟa-se na iha.’ ”
Wakayenda, wakawona igache lya nzoi lyilyipfungye moongonyi, njienyi ing'anyi.
Wandu waata wawegoṟokyi halya-ndu waleṙumo wakawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muipfunguo igache-lyi lya nzoi?”
Wakawawia chandu Yesu alewawia, nawo wakawaenenga momu.
Wakaendie Yesu igache lyilya lya nzoi, wakaala mawale gawo wuye yalyo; kalyiṙamilyia.
Wandu wafoi wakaala mawale gawo njienyi, na wengyi maṟamba walefunja maṙemenyi.
Na wandu wawesongoye na walya wawei numa wakakuilenga wechigamba, “Hosiana; nyi oe ammbikyie mboṟa ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii.
Wumangyi wuicha wo awu-yoṙu Dawidi wuwuwikyie mboṟa. Hosiana wuye ruwewu.”
Na oe kaiṙa na Yerusalemu mṟasa hekalunyi; na kyiyeri amwambuye shoose ngyuura tsoose, cha kyipfa nyi kyiyeri kya kyukonyi, kafuma, kayenda Betania hamwi na walya ikumi na wawi.
Na lyilya kulekya kyiyeri walewuka Betania nalewoṙo nyi njaa.
Kuleshi na oe kawona mfumu uwoṙe maṟa, kayenda kundu nawone kokooya uwoṙe ndunda; na kyiyeri aleshika halya-ndu uwekyeri alewona kyindo sile maṟa-pfo; kyipfa chi kyiyeri kya ikumbia ndunda-pfo.
Kagaluo kauwia, “Wookyia inu mṟasa mlungana mndu alalye ndunda kopfo.” Wanalosho wakye wakaicho.
Wakashika Yerusalemu, na oe kaiṙa na hekalunyi, kawooka ifuna walya waweikapa mbucha kulya hekalunyi, kapfuluo mesa tsa weilacha heleri, na shiṙi sha walya wekyekumba mbeta.
Maa aleenenga mndu momu o iitsia kyindo kulya hekalunyi-pfo.
Kalosha, kagamba, “Ngyesa kyikyiṟeie kye numba yako yechiwa yeterewia masanga goose-pfoe? Indi nyoe moigaluo iwa usanja lo wasokyi.”
Wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakamanya mbonyi wakapfula chandu wechimrumatsa; kyipfa walemwowuo, cha kyipfa wuingyi woose wo wandu waleṟiyio kyipfa kya malosho gakye.
Na lyilya kuleila kawuka kulya mṟinyi.
Na ngamenyi kyiyeri waweiṙa, walewona mfumu ulya uumie nakamwi.
Petiro kakumbuo mbonyi tsa mfumu ulya, kammbia, “Mlosha, ambuya, mfumu ulya uleusesa omwuuma.”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Iṙikyienyi Ruwa.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, orio oose echiwia fumvu-lyi, kuluka undewiyitso ipalyipalyinyi, maa alawe moilacha-ilacha kyilya aiṙikyie mrimenyi, indi naiṙikyie kye isho agamba shaafukyia, shechiwa kuṙo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, orio kyoose moterewa ilyi muiterewa iṙikyienyi kye moshiambilyia, nasho shechiwa shanyu.
Na nyoe orio kyiyeri mogoṟoka na iterewa, hooṟienyi, orio ṙeṙo muwoṙe na mndu; kundu na Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu namuhooṟie nyoe maṙeko ganyu. [
Kyaindi kokooya nyoe mulaihooṟia, maa Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu echimuhooṟia nyoe maṙeko ganyu-pfo.]”
Wakashika-se Yerusalemu. Na kyiyeri aweichumia hekalunyi, wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso na wasongoru wa wandu waleyenda kokye.
Wakammbia, “Nyi kui wuchilyi wuha uiṟunda shindo-shi? Na nyi wui alekuenenga wuchilyi uṟunde ishi?”
Yesu kawawia, “Ngyechimmbesa kyindo kyimwi, na nyoe mungyigaluoe; naaho-ng'u ngyechimmbia nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiṟunda ishi.
‘Wupatiso wo Yohane wulewuka ruwewu, ang'u ko wandu?’ Ngyigaluonyi.”
Wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Kokooya logamba wulewuka ruwewu negamba, ‘Ny'kyilyi-ng'u mulalemwiṙikyia?’
Indi lukogamba, ‘Wulewuka ko wandu…’”, waleowuo wandu, kyipfa wandu walewona Yohane cha mwikyimbi nakamwi.
Wakagaluo Yesu wakagamba, “Luichi-pfo.” Yesu kawawia, “Maa inyi ngyimmbia nyoe nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiṟunda ishi-pfo.”
Kawooka iṙeṙa nawo kui mfano. “Mndu umwi naleṙonga ṙema lya msabibu, karingyichia uṟigo, kasuma rina lyekamia mafuṙa, kawika kyitaanga, kagawia waṙemi, kayenda kyaro.
Na kui kyiyeri kyakye kaṙuma mtumo ko waṙemi walya, kundu naambilyie ko waṙemi ndunda tsa msabibu.
Wakammbaṙa, wakamkapa, wakammbiyitsa nja, alawoṙe kyindo.
Kawaṙumia-se mtumo ungyi, na oe wakamfaṟa mṙoenyi, wakammbutia shindo shiwicho.
Kaṙuma ungyi, icho wakammbaaga; na wengyi wafoi, iwa wechiwakapa na iwa wechiwawaaga.
Kyasia nawewoṙe umwi-se, mana mkunde okye. Ichu na oe kamṙuma kowo mafurumionyi, echigamba, ‘Wechiindia mono-ko.’
Kyaindi waṙemi walya wakawiana, ‘Ichu nyi mokyioṟa, lummbaage, na kyioṟa kyechiwa kyaṙu.’
Wakammbaṙa, wakammbaaga, wakammbiyitsa nja ya ṙema lya msabibu.
Kyasia monyi ṙema lya msabibu newuta kyi? Neecha na irumatsa waṙemi walya, na ṙema lyilya lya msabibu neenengyia wengyi.
Maa mulandesome shiṟeionyi shiele,
‘Igoe wewika numba walelyilega
lyo lyawa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.
Ṙeṙo-lyi lyiwukyie ko Mndumii,
nalyo nyi kyiṟiyisho mbele yaṙu?’ ”
Nawo wakapfula immbaṙa, wakaowuo wandu wa kyisanzionyi; kyipfa walemanya kye kui mfano ulya naleṙeṙa mbonyi tsawo. Wakamṙa wakayenda.
Wakaṙuma kokye Mafarisayo waata na Maherodi, kundu wamṙege kui maṙeṙo.

Na kyiyeri waleafukyia walemmbia, “Mlosha, luichi kye iyoe nyi mndu o loi, maa okyesaṟa kyiṟumi kya mndu-pfo; cha kyipfa okyeambuya fana tsa wandu-pfo kyaindi kyiiṙi kya wuloi nokyelosha njia ya Ruwa. Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi ienenga Kaisari kodi ang'u ote?
Lumwenengye, ang'u lulamwenengye?” Na oe, aichi wukulembecheṟi wowo, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi mongyiyesha? Ngyiendienyi dinari ngyiiwone.”
Wakaiende. Kawawia, “Nyi ya wui sanamu-i na kyiṟeio-kyi?” Wakammbia, “Nyi ya Kaisari.”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Enengyenyi Kaisari shikyeri sha Kaisari, na shikyeri sha Ruwa enengyienyi Ruwa.” Wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kyakye.
Naaho-ng'u Masadukayo, wandu wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟuka lya wapfu-pfo, wakayenda kokye, wakammbesa, wachigamba,
“Mlosha, Mose naleluṟeia kye mono-wama o mndu kapfa, kaṙa mka okye alawoṙe mana, mono-wamae naṙuo mka ulya okye nawonie mono-wamae mana.
Kyasia kuwewoṙe wana wa mka mfungaaṙe. O kuwooka kaalyika mka, kapfa, alaṙe mana.
O kawi na oe kamwalyika kapfa, maa oe aleṙa mana-pfo. Na o kaṟaaṟu na wuṙo taa;
mṟasa woose mfungaaṙe, walaṙe mana. Mafurumionyi ga woose mndu mka ulya na oe kapfa.
Kyasia, kyiiṙi kya iṟuka lya wapfu nechiwa mka o uha kyiiṙi kya iwo? Kyipfa woose mfungaaṙe walekaa na oe.”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa muiṙeka kyipfa kya ikyi, cha kyipfa mulaichi shiṟeio maa wuiṙimi wo Ruwa?
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri wechiṟuka ko wapfu, wekyealyika maa ialyiko-pfo, indi wekyewa cha malaika wakyeri ruwewu.

Na ko mbonyi tsa wapfu kye wekyeṟutso, mulandesome kyitapunyi kya Mose, halya-ndu haṙeṙie mbonyi tsa kyinguṙu, chandu Ruwa alemmbia echigamba, ‘Inyi nyi Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi, na Ruwa o Yakobo?’
Oe chi Ruwa o wapfu-pfo, indi o wai na moo. Koikyo muiṙeka mnu.”
Na umwi o walosha wa mawawaso kacha, kaicho weṙeṙa na oe, kamanya kye nawagaluo necha, kammbesa, “Kyiiṙi kya mawawaso goose nyi lyiha lyikyeri lya kuwooka?”
Yesu kamgaluo, “Lya kuwooka nyilyo ilyi, ‘Aṙanyia, Isiraelyi, Mndumii Ruwa oṙu nyi Mndumii umwi.
Na iyoe kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo kui ngoo yapfo yoose, na kui mrima opfo oose, na kui wuṟango wopfo woose, na kui pfinya tsapfo tsoose.’
Na lya kawi nyilyo ilyi. ‘Kunda momṟasa opfo chandu ukukundi iyoe kumonyi.’ Kuwoṙe iwawaso lying'anyi kuta iga-pfo.”
Mlosha ulya o mawawaso kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, Mlosha, nogamba necha kye Ruwa nyi umwi, kuwoṙe ungyi sile oe-pfo.
Na imkunda oe kui ngoo yoose, na kui wuṟango woose, na kui pfinya tsoose, na ikunda momṟasa chandu ukukundi kumonyi kuwoṙe kyiira kuta shiṙaso shoose na shienengo taa.”
Na Yesu, kyiyeri alewona kye nagaluo kui wuṟango, nalemmbia, “Iyoe ukyeri kuleshi na Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.” Maa mndu alekaria-se immbesa kyindo wookyia iho-pfo.
Na kyiyeri Yesu aweiloshia hekalunyi nalegaluo, kagamba, “Walosha wa mawawaso wekyegamba kuṙa kye Kristo nyi Mono-Dawidi?
Dawidi amonyi nalegamba, kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele,
‘Mndumii nalewia mndumii oko,
uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe,
mṟasa ngyechiwikyia washituwa wapfo
ikaa wanda ya wuchilyi wopfo.’ ”
“Dawidi amonyi nagamba nyi Mndumii; kyasia nawa kuṙa mono-kye?” Na wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu waweimwaṙanyia kui sia.
Kawawia maloshonyi gakye, “Kushowenyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakundi ichumia waṟee magale maleshi, na iiṟikyiṟo sangaṙa,
na iṙamia mbele masinagoginyi, na shiṙi sha mbele shelyenyi.
Wekyesoka wakusu shindo shawo, na kui wukulembecheṟi iterewa shiterewo shileshi. Iwa wechiwona ianduyo lying'anyi.”
Na Yesu aṙamie kufuhi na halya-ndu wandu wawekyewika heleri, kaambuya chandu wuingyi wo wandu wawewika heleri handu halya. Wanjama wakawika shifoi.
Mndu mka umwi mkusu, mkyiwa kacha, kawika helo tsiwi, tsilyingananyi na kyindo kyilashikyie maa dinari.
Kalaga wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mkusu-chu mkyiwa nawika ngoseṟa kuta woose waiwika handu-ha hewika heleri;
kyipfa iwo woose walewika shindo wawuta ngoseṟenyi ya masaa gawo.”
Na kyiyeri aweiwuka hekalunyi, umwi o wanalosho wakye nalemmbia, “Mlosha, ambuya, chandu magoe-ga na numba-tsi shikyeri!”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Uwonyi manumba-ga gang'anyi? Hechitsugaa igoe wuye ya igoe lyilechiolotso-pfo.”
Na kyiyeri aweṙamie fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni; iambuyana na hekalu, Petiro, na Yakobo, na Yohane, na Anderea walemmbesa handu halawoṙe wandu,
“Luwie, mbonyi-tsi tsechiwa indi? Na nyi kyikyi kyiṟingyishio kya kyiyeri, isho shoose shechiwa kufuhi iafukyia?”
Yesu kawooka iwawia, “Kuṟiisenyi, mndu alamlembe.
Wandu wafoi wechicha kui rina lyako, wechigamba, ‘Inyi nyi oe Kristo’, nawo wechilemba wafoi.
Na nyoe kyiyeri mochiicho mbonyi tsa shiṙa, na iweweṙo lya shiṙa mulakangaṟikye. Isho shiwaṟi iwoneka, kyaindi mafurumionyi galya galandeche-pfo.
Cha kyipfa isanga lyechiamka ikapana na isanga, na wumangyi ikapana na wumangyi. Kochiwaṙa shiṙiinza handu kui handu na kochiwaṙa njaa. Igo nyigo mawookyionyi ga iwawio lying'anyi.
“Na nyoe kuṟiisenyi mrima yanyu. Kyipfa wechimṙuo nyoe mengyenyi; na masinagoginyi wechimkapa; na nyoe mochiṙoo mbele ya wachilyi na wamangyi kyipfa kyako, iwa wuṟingyishi kowo.
Na kyiwaṟi Ndumi Ngyicha iongoyo kuwooka masangyenyi koose.
Na kyiyeri wechimsuo nyoe, na imṟiinga, mulakusaṟe kuwooka shilya mochigamba, kyaindi orio kyindo mochienengo saa iya, kyigambenyi cha kyipfa chi nyoe muiṙeṙa-pfo, indi nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
Na mndu nechiṟiinga mono-wamae kundu nawoogo, na awu nechiṟiinga mana, na wana wechigalukyia wafee wawo, na iwawaaga.
Na nyoe mochiwa muwasuoe nyi wandu woose kyipfa kya rina lyako; kyaindi mokarishia mṟasa mafurumionyi, nyi oe echikyia.”
“Kyaindi mukowona ulya aoweshie, na ekyenyamaṟa shindo shiele agoṟokyi handu halawaṟi, (aisoma namanye), nyi lyo-ng'u wakyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda waṙichilyie mafumvunyi.
Na mndu akyeri kai alasokye pfo, maa alaiṙe na kanyi kokye iṙuo kyindo.
Na akyeri mṙemenyi alawuye na numa iṙuo ikunya lyakye.
Kyaindi ochia lowo iwo wai wanene, nawo waionza mfiri-yo!
Indi terewenyi isho shilawutikye kyiyeri kya mbeho.
Cha kyipfa mfiri-yo yechiwaṙa wukyiwa, chandu kyilandewe wookyia mawookyionyi ga Ruwa igumba mṟasa wulalu, maa kyechiwa maa ale-pfo.
Na kokooya Mndumii alalefuiṟa mfiri-yo mndu oose awechikyia-pfo; kyaindi kyipfa kya wasambuṟe alewasambuṟa nalefuhiṟa mfiri-yo.
Na kyiyeri-kyo mndu kammbia, ‘Kristo nakyeri iha’, ang'u ‘nakyeri kulya’, maa mulaiṙikyie.
Cha kyipfa kochiwoneka Makristo ga wongo, na weonguo shisuku wa wongo, wechiloṟa shiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho, waiṙime imlemba, kokooya kyaiṙimika, maa iwo wasambuṟe.
Indi nyoe kuṟiisenyi; ngamumuikyimbia shoose.”
“Kyaindi mfiri iya, numa ya wukyiwa-wo, mnengyeṟi oshikyio nyi meema, na mori ochiwuta ngyeela yacho-pfo,
na nyenyeri tsa ruwewu tsechioloka, shindo shingyi shikyeri ruwewu shechikupaaya-paya.
Iho nyilyo wechiwona Mono-Adamu echicha mapuchinyi kui pfinya tsifoi na mng'ano.
Nyilyo echiṙuma malaika na isania wasambuṟe wakye iwuka ngyuura tsoose tsiina tsa wuyana, iwuka ura lo kyishingonyi kya uruka mṟasa matsitsionyi ga ruwewu.”
“Ko mfumu kuloshenyi mfano. Kyiyeri mbaga yacho yawiṟa-wiṟa, na ioṟia maṟa, mokyemanya kye kyiyeri kya kyilyimu kyikyeri kufuhi.
Na nyoe taa, mukowona mbonyi-tso tsewooka, manyenyi kye nai kufuhi moongonyi.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, rika-lyi lyechiiṙa-pfo, mṟasa isho shoose shiafukyie.
Ruwewu na uruka shechiiṙa; kyaindi maṙeṙo gako gechiiṙa maa ale-pfo.”
“Kyaindi mbonyi tsa mfiri ulya na saa iya kuwoṙe aichi-pfo, maa malaika wakyeri ruwewu, maa Mana, sile Awu.
Ambuyenyi necha, laenyi kyiṙombo, terewenyi, cha kyipfa muichi kyiyeri kyechiwa indi-pfo.
Mfano okye nyi cha mndu aiyenda kyaro, kawia watumo wakye waambuye numba yakye, na ienenga orio mndu iṟunda lyakye, na oe kawia mringyi o moongonyi nalae kyiṙombo.
Kyasia, laenyi-ng'u kyiṙombo, cha kyipfa muichi kyiyeri monyi kanyi aicha-pfo, kye nyi kyukonyi, ang'u kye nyi kyio kya mayeleyele, ang'u kyiyeri ilying'onyi lyifuga, ang'u ngamenyi;
alache kyituukyia namukooye mulee.
Na ikyo ngyimmbia nyoe, ngammbia moose, laenyi kyiṙombo.”
Numa ya mfiri iwi kuwekyeri mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka na mkate ilawengyitarang'ishe wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakapfula njia ya immbaṙa kui ngyeṟo na immbaaga.
Cha kyipfa walegamba, “Kyilacheewa kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi, kulachewaṙa kyituṟu wandunyi.”

Na oe kyiyeri awekyeri Betania, kanyi ko Simion awewoṙo nyi taambo, echilya kyelya, mndu mka awoṙe kyimkyepe kya mafuṙa mecha ga woguru wung'anyi kacha, kapfunuo kyimkyepe kyilya kagaletsia mṙoenyi kokye.
Hawewoṙe na wandu walesuo wechigamba, “Kyitewe nyi kyikyi iṙetsa mafuṙa mecha ga woguru wung'anyi mbaṟe-i iyi?
Cha kyipfa mafuṙa-ga gaweiṙima ikumbo ko dinari magana gaṟaaṟu na ngoseṟa, wakyiwa wakaenengo. Wakanuṟia mnu kyipfa kya mka ulya.”
Yesu kagamba, “Mlekyenyi. Ny'kyilyi mumlyisa wukyiwa? Nangyiṟundia kyindo kyicha.
Kyipfa mfiri yoose muwoṙe wakyiwa hamwi na nyoe, na orio kyiyeri mukokunda moiṙima iwaṟundia mecha; kyaindi inyi mungyiwoṙe mfiri yoose-pfo.
Naṟunda chandu aiṙima. Nasonguo ishia mmbiu oko mafuṙa mecha kyipfa kya iṟiko.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, orio kyiyeri Ndumi Ngyicha yaongoyo wuyanenyi koose, ikyi ichu aṟunda kyechisendo imkumbuo.”
Yuda Isikariote, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, kayenda mṟasa ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi, naiṙime imṟiinga kowo.
Nawo kyiyeri waleicho walechihiyo, wakateṟia imwenenga heleri. Kapfula kyiyeri kyicha kyemṟiinga.
Na mfiri o kuwooka o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe kyiyeri waleshinja shimana sha moondo ga Pasaka, wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Nyi kwi ukundi luyende lukuṟeyeṟie ulye pasaka?”
Kaṙuma wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Yendenyi mṟinyi, mndu msoṟo akuṙikyie kyigondi kya mṟinga nechikarisana na nyoe, muoshenyi.
Na handu hoose echiiṙa naho wienyi monyi kanyi, ‘Mlosha nagamba, nyi hanga kyiṟi kyako kya wayenu kyikyeri, ngyilyiie pfo pasaka, hamwi na wanalosho wako?’
Na oe amonyi nechimloṟa, kai ing'anyi, ingyichope, ipfo luṟeyeṟienyi.”
Wanalosho wakafuma, wakayenda mṟinyi, wakawona chandu alewawia, wakaṟeyeṟa pasaka.
Kyasia kyiyeri kuleila Yesu kacha hamwi na walya ikumi na wawi.
Kyiyeri waweilya, Yesu nalegamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, umwi onyu, na oe nailya hamwi na inyi nechingyiṟiinga.”
Wakawooka iwona fowa mrimenyi, wakammbia umwi umwi, “Ngyesa, nyi inyi?”
Kawawia, “Nyi umwi o iwo ikumi na wawi, aikapa itongye hamwi na inyi kyitelenyi.
Cha kyipfa Mono-Mndu naindepfa chandu shiṟeio shigambie; kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya echiṟiinga Mono-Mndu! Kyiwechiwa nanga kokye mndu-cho alawefeo.”
Nawo kyiyeri waweilya, kaira mkate, kawikyia mboṟa, kaupeṟenguo, kawaenenga, kagamba, “Ambilyienyi; ichu nyicho mmbiu oko.”
Kaira kyiṙoo, kaana, kawaenengyia; wakaikanana kyiṙoo kyilya woose.
Kawawia, “Iyi nyiyo samu yako ya mma, ipusuka kyipfa kya wafoi.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia nyoe, ngyechinyo-se mpfinyo-pfo, mṟasa mfiri ulya ngyechiunyo uhya Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
Nawo wamuimbe walefuma iyenda fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni.
Yesu kawawia, “Kyio-kyi nyoe moose mochiṙicha mungyiṙe ngyimonyi, cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie,
‘Ngyechikapa mlyisi,
na moondo gechinyanyaṟika.’
Kyaindi numa ya iṟuka lyako, ngyechimusongoya iyenda Galyilaya.”
Petiro kammbia, “Wechiṙicha woose, kyaindi chi inyi-pfo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia iyoe, inu, kyio-kyi, ilying'onyi lyilafuga kawi, nochingyikana kaṟaaṟu.”
Na oe kaengyeṟa mnu igamba, “Maa kyikangyikooya ipfa na iyoe, ngyechikukana maa ale-pfo.” Na woose wakawegamba kuṙo.
Numa ya iho wakacha mṟasa bustanyi yekyelago Getisemane; kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ṙamienyi iha kyiyeri-kyo ngyiterewa.”
Kaṙuo Petiro na Yakobo na Yohane hamwi na oe, kawooka iiṟewe mnu na ikutuura.
Kawawia, “Mrima oko uiṟewe cha mndu aipfa. Kaenyi iha mulae kyiṙombo.”
Katikyira mbele kyitutu, kaoloka wanda, echiterewa kye, kyikaiṙimika, saa iya ya matuuro immbukye.
Kagamba, “Awu, Awu-yoko, shoose shekyeiṙimika kopfo. Ungyiwute matuuro-ga; kyaindi, chi chandu ngyikundi inyi-pfo, indi chandu ukundi iyoe.”
Kacha kawakooya walee maṙoe, kawia Petiro, “Ngyesa, Simion, nulee? Oiṙima ilaa kyiṙombo maa saa imwi-pfoe?
Laenyi kyiṙombo muterewe, mulacheyesho. Mrima ukundi indi mmbiu umfafa.”
Kayenda-se, katerewa, echigamba kyindo kyilya kyilya.
Kacha-se kawakooya walee, kyipfa meso gawo gawa malemeri, maa walamanye kyemgaluo.
Kacha lya kaṟaaṟu, kawawia, “Laenyi wulalu, muonyonye. Kyishikyie. Saa yamcha. Ambuya, Mono-Adamu naiwiko mawokonyi ga wandu wawoṙe wunyamaṟi.
Amkyenyi, sindenyi. Ambuya ulya aingyiṟiinga amshika kufuhi.”

Kyasia kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, cha ilyi Yuda nalecha, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, na hamwi na oe ṟiima lya wandu, wawoṙe ngyuushu na maṟeta, wawukyie ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na wasongoru wa wandu.
Na ulya momṟiinga nalekoawaenenga kyiṟingyishio, echigamba, “Icho ngyechimkomba, icho nyi oe; mmbaṙenyi, mumṙuo mochimringa.”
Kyasia kyiyeri alecha, cha ilyi kayenda kokye, kagamba, “Rabi,” kamkomba.
Wakagoṟuo mawoko gawo wakammbaṙa.
Na umwi o walya wawekyeri ho kaira ushu, kakapa mtumo o Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kamṙumbuo kurwi.
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa, nyi cha msokyi mofuma muwoṙe ngyuushu na maṟeta, ingyiwaṙa inyi?
Orio mfiri ngyiwekyeri mbele yanyu hekalunyi ngyechilosha, mulangyiwaṙe; kyaindi ishi shawa kundu shiṟeio shiiṙime iafukyia.”
Naaho-ng'u wakamṙa, wakaṙicha woose.
Na manakye umwi kamwosha, alaṟee kyindo sile iwale lya uwiṟo, wakammbaṙa.
Na oe kaṙa iwale lyilya, kaṙicha ai kyiṟanguoe.
Nawo wakaṙuo Yesu ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose wakakuumbia kufuhi na oe, wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu na walosha wa mawawaso.
Na Petiro kamwosha akyeri kuleshi, mṟasa numbenyi ya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose; kaṙamia hamwi na waṟundi, echioṙa moṙo.
Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na woose halya mengyenyi wakapfula wuṟingyishi waiṙime iwaaga Yesu; walawone.
Cha kyipfa wafoi walemṟingyishia wongo, kyaindi wuṟingyishi wowo wulaṙuane.
Mṟasa wengyi wakagoṟoka, wakamṟingyishia wongo, wechigamba,
“Soe lulemwicho echigamba, ‘Inyi ngyechiunduo hekalu-lyi lyilyiachikyie kui mawoko, na kyiiṙi kya mfiri iṟaṟu ngyechiwika lyingyi lyilalyiachikyie kui mawoko.’ ”
Maa kuṙo wuṟingyishi wowo wuleṙuana-pfo.
Naaho-ng'u Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi, kawesa Yesu, echigamba, “Ugaluo kyindo? Iwa waikuṟingyishia kyi?”
Kyaindi katsia tsi, maa alegaluo kyindo-pfo. Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kammbesa-se kammbia, “Iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mana o ulya awoṙe mng'ano?”
Yesu kagamba, “Inyi nyi oe, na nyoe mochiwona Mono-Adamu aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa monyi pfinya, echicha na mapuchi ga ruwewu.”
Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose karanduo mawale gakye, echigamba, “Kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya kyikyi ipfula waṟingyishi?
Momuicho chandu alahia Ruwa. Muwonyi kuṙa nyoe?” Woose wakamwanduya kye kyimmbaṟi iwoogo.
Wengyi wakawooka impuchia maṙa, wakamshikyia kyaam, na imkapa nzina, na immbia, “Lasha. Maa waṟundi nawo wakamkapa ngofi.”
Na Petiro nawekyeri halya-ndu aweioṙia moṙo. Umwi o shisinga sha Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kacha,
kawona Petiro eoṙa moṙo kamwitukuya, kagamba, “Maa iyoe nuwekyeri hamwi na Yesu, Mnasareti ulya.”
Kakana kagamba, “Ngyiichi maa ngyimanya isho ugamba iyoe-pfo.” Kafuma na nja, ilying'onyi lyikafuga.
Na kyisinga kyilya kyikammbona-se, kyikawooka-se iwia walya wawegoṟokyi halya, “Ichu nyi umwi owo.”
Kakana-se. Numa ya kyiyeri kyifuhi-se walya wawegoṟokyi halya wakawia Petiro, “Loi nui umwi owo, cha kyipfa iyoe nui Mgalyilaya.”
Kawooka ilya nyamu, “Ngyiichi mndu-chu mumsenda-pfo.”
Na cha ilyi ilying'onyi lyikafuga lya kawi. Petiro kakumbuo kyindo kyilya alewio nyi Yesu, “Ilying'onyi lyilafuga kawi, nochingyikana kaṟaaṟu.” Na kyiyeri alekusaṟa kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, kalyia.
Na kyiyeri kulekya wang'anyi wa makohanyi walewaṙa kyisanzionyi hamwi na wasongoru wa wandu na walosha wa mawawaso na mengye yoose, wakapfunga Yesu, wakamṙuo mbele ya Pilato.
Pilato kammbesa, “Iyoe nyi oe mangyi o Wayuda?” Kagaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi wawemwanduya shindo shifoi.
Pilato kammbesa-se, echigamba, “Ugaluo kyindo? Ambuya nyi shindo shinga waikuanduya!”
Maa Yesu alegaluo kyindo-se-pfo, mṟasa Pilato kaṟiyio.
Kyasia kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi nekyewapfunguya mpfungo umwi wamkundi.
Hawewoṙe mndu umwi ekyelago Baraba, nampfungye hamwi na walya walelya wuṟiingyi, na iwaaga kyiiṙi kya wuṟiingyi-wo.
Wandu wa kyisanzionyi wakacha wakawooka iterewa nawawutie chandu aweichiwie.
Pilato kawagaluo, echigamba, “Ngyesa, mukundi ngyimpfunguye mangyi o Wayuda?”
Cha kyipfa nalemanya kye wang'anyi wa makohanyi wamṙambika kokye kui wunyenyi.
Kyaindi wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakaamtsa kyituṟu kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya, kye nanga wapfunguyo Baraba.
Pilato kagaluo-se, kawawia, “Kyasia ngyimmbutie kyi ichu mugamba kye nyi mangyi o Wayuda?”
Wakakalagatsa-se, “Mkapie msalabenyi.”
Pilato kawawia, “Nyi wuwicho wuha alewuta?” Wakaengyeṟa mnu ikalagatsa, “Mkapie msalabenyi.”
Pilato akundi ichihiṟa walya wasanzie halya, kawapfunguya Baraba; kawuta Yesu, numa ya igamba nakapo na ngowa, kundu nakapio msalabenyi.
Na asikari wakamṙuo mṟasa Praitorio (kyimwi na igamba numba ya wuchilyi), wakasanzia ho asikari walya wengyi woose.
Wakamṟika iwale lya kyimaande-maande, wakaoka oṟo ya msha, wakaimṟika mṙoenyi.
Wakawooka imwiṟikyiṟa, “Lokuiṟikyiṟa, Mangyi o Wayuda!”
Wakamkapa na upoi mṙoenyi, wakampuchia maṙa, wakapfiria ndi, wakamwindia.
Na wamumkape makuukuu, wakammbuta iwale lyilya lyakye lya kyimaande-maande, wakamṟika mawale gakye amonyi; wakamṙuo nja kundu wamkapie msalabenyi.
Wakaitika mndu aweiiṙa, awukyie mṙemenyi, Simion o Kyirene, awu-yawo Iskanda na Ṟufo, kundu naṙuo msalaba okye.
Wakamwende mṟasa handu hekyelago Golyigota, kyimwi na igamba, “Ipoṟong'u.”
Wakamwenenga mpfinyo ummbikye manemane, alaambilyie.
Wakamkapia msalabenyi, wakagawa mawale gakye, wakagakapia kuṟu kuha orio mndu naṙuo kyi.
Kyasia kyiwekyeri kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟaaṟu, nawo wakamkapia msalabenyi.
Hawewoṙe na kyiṟeio kya ianduyo lyakye kyigambie, “MANGYI O WAYUDA.”
Na hamwi na oe walekapia msalabenyi wasokyi wawi, umwi kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe na umwi kuwoko kokye ho kumoso. [
Kyasia kyiṟeio kyikaafutsio kyigambie, “Naletalo hamwi na wefunja mawawaso.]”
Na wandu waweiṙa njienyi wakamlahia, wechisunza-sunza mṙoe, wechigamba, “Mwambuye! Iyoe mounduo hekalu na ilyiwika mfirinyi iṟaṟu,
kukyiṟe mrima opfo, usokye msalabenyi.”
Na wuṙo na wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakamkapa makuukuu, hamwi na walosha wa mawawaso, wechigamba, “Nalekyiṟa wengyi, aiiṙima ikukyiṟa amonyi-pfo.
Kristo, mangyi o Isiraelyi, nasokye wulalu msalabenyi luiṙime iwona na iiṙikyia. Maa walya walekapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe wakamṙeṙia maṙeṙo mawicho.”
Na kyiyeri kulewa saa tsiṟandaaṟu, kukowaṙa meema urukyenyi koose, mṟasa saa kyenda.
Na saa kyenda Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lyakye ko pfinya, “Eloi, eloi, lama sabakyitani?” Ikyo kyagamba, “Ruwa oko, Ruwa oko, ny'kyilyi ongyiṙa?”
Na wandu waata wawegoṟokyi halya, walegamba, “Nailaga Elyiya.”
Na umwi kakapa mteeṟa, kaichuṟa kyindo kyekyetarang'ia kyindonyi kyekyeongyia mṟinga, kakyiwikyia upoinyi, kamrutsa, echigamba, “Lekyenyi, luwone kokooya Elyiya neecha imsotsa msalabenyi.”
Na Yesu kafiiṟa na pfinya kalekyia moo.
Isulyia lyeshingyia hekalunyi lyikaranduka kawi wookyia wuye mṟasa wanda.
Kyasia mchilyi ulya, awegoṟokyi ho iambuyana na oe, kyiyeri alewona kye nalelekyia moo mbaṟe-yo, kagamba, “Loi mndu-chu nawekyeri Mono-Ruwa.”
Hawewoṙe na waka waiambuya wakyeri kuleshi; kyiiṙi kyawo hawewoṙe Maria Makyidalena, na Maria wama o Yakobo ulya mtutu na Yose, na Salome.
Iwo nyiwo waleoshana na oe ipfo Galyilaya, na imṟundia; na wengyi wafoi waleṙo hamwi na oe mṟasa Yerusalemu.
Na kommbe kyukonyi, cha kyipfa nyi Ikuṟeyeṟa, nyicho mfiri osongoya mfiri o onyonya,
Yosefu, mndu o Arimataya, mndu ekyeindio, mndu o mengye yeanduya wandu, na oe naweiweṙelyia iafukyia lya Wumangyi wo Ruwa; kayenda kulawoṙe wuowu, mṟasa mbele ya Pilato katerewa mmbiu o Yesu.
Kyaindi Pilato kaṟiyio, kye ampfa. Kalaga mchilyi ulya kammbesa kokooya ampfa kyiyeri kyileshi kyamwiṙe.
Na ammbone wuṟingyishi ko mchilyi ulya, kaenenga Yosefu mnying'a ulya.
Na oe kaguṟa sanda, kamsotsa msalabenyi, kamwaṟahia sanda iya, kammbika kyilomenyi kyiwekyiachikyie iṟaṟenyi; kawikyia igoe mbele ya moongo o kyilome.
Na Maria Makyidalena na Maria mama o Yose wakaambuya handu alewikyio.
Na mfiri o onyonya omwiṙe Maria Makyidalena na Maria mama o Yakobo na Salome waleguṟa mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha waiṙime indemshia.
Na ngamenyi utuko, mfiri o kuwooka o juma, wakayenda kyilomenyi, kyiyeri mnengyeṟi uweiṙo;
wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Nyi wui echiwuta igoe lyilya halya moongonyi o kyilome?”
Na lyilya waleambuya walewona kye igoe lyilya lyammbuto ho; nalyo lyiweng'anyi mnu.
Wakaiṙa na kyilomenyi wakawona manakye aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe, aṟee iwale lya uwiṟo; wakaṟiyio.
Na oe kawawia, “Mulaṟiyio. Muipfula Yesu Mnasareti; alekapio msalabenyi. Amṟuka; akyeri iha-pfo. Ambuyenyi handu walemmbikyia.
Kyaindi yendenyi, mundewia wanalosho wakye, na Petiro, kye namsongoi iyenda Galyilaya; ipfo mochimmbona, chandu alemmbia.”
Wakafuma na nja, iwuka kulya kyilomenyi weṙicha; cha kyipfa walewoṙo nyi iṙeṙema na iṟiyio. Maa walewia mndu kyindo-pfo, kyipfa waleowuo.
Na oe kyiyeri aleṟuka mfiri o kuwooka o juma, nalewoneka ko Maria Makyidalena kuwooka, ulya alemmbuta waṟufui wawicho mfungaaṙe.
Icho naleyenda kaongoya mbonyi walya wawekyeri hamwi na oe, nawo waweikapa ṟanyi na ifiiṟa.
Kyaindi iwo kyiyeri waleicho kye nai na moo, na oe nammbona, waleiṙikyia-pfo.
Numa ya isho kawoneka ko wandu wawi kyiiṙi kyawo, nawoṙe fana ingyi; nawo waweiyenda mṙemenyi.
Na iwo wakayenda wakaongoya mbonyi walya wengyi; maa iwo walewairikyia-pfo.
Numa ya iho kawono nyi walya ikumi na umwi kyiyeri waweilya. Kawaṙeṙia kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyawo lyaangu na wuumu wo mrima yawo, cha kyipfa waleiṙikyia walya walemmbona kyiyeri aleṟuka ko wapfu-pfo.
Kawawia, “Yendenyi wuyanenyi koose, mundeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha ko orio kyigumbe.
Aiṙikyia na ipatiso nechikyia; alaiṙikyia, nechianduyo.
Na shiṟingyishio-shi shechioshana na iwo waiṙikyie. Kui rina lyako wechifuna waṟufui wawicho; wechiṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ngyihya.
Wechiwaṙa njoka; maa wakanyo kyindo kya wuṟoi; kyechiwawutia kyindo maa ale-pfo. Wechiyekyia mawoko gawo wuye ya waluoe, nawo wechiwaṙa pfinya.”
Kyasia Mndumii Yesu, amṙeṙe nawo, kaṙoo wuye ruwewu, kaṙamia kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.
Na walya wakafuma, wakaonguo Ndumi Ngyicha kundu koose, Mndumii echiṟunda maṟunda hamwi nawo, na iṟingyishia mbonyi tsilya kui shiṟingyishio shileoshana natso.]
Kyipfa kya ilyi wandu wafoi waletambagana iṟeia necha mbonyi tsilya tsilewutika koṙu,
chandu walya waleṟingyishia na iwona mbonyi-tsi waleluongoya, hamwi na waṟundi wa Ṙeṙo lyilya wookyia mawookyionyi,
ngawona nyi necha inyi, kyipfa kya ilyi ngyilepfula wuṟingyishi wo mbonyi-tso wookyia mawookyionyi, ikuṟeia necha, Tofilo Monyi Kyiṟumni,
umanye necha mbonyi tsilya ulelosho.
Kacha kyiyeri kya Herode, mangyi o Wayuda, kuwewoṙe mkohanyi umwi, ekyelago Sakaria, o kamba lya Abiya, na mka okye nawei umwi o kyishari kya Aron, ekyelago Elyisapeti.
Na woose wewawi wawewoṙe wusumganyi mbele ya Ruwa, wechiosha mawawaso goose ga Mndumii na shilya atutumie kulawoṙe igambo kye wawoṙe kyindo kyoose kyiwicho.
Nawo wawewoṙe mana-pfo, kyipfa Elyisapeti nawei muumba na woose wewawi wawewaku mnu.
Kyasia kyiyeri kya kamba lyakye lyeṟunda cha mkohanyi mbele ya Ruwa,
chandu kyiwekyeri kyiṙo kya wukohanyi, kaolokyio nyi kuṟu kuha iiṙa na hekalunyi lya Mndumii indekoṟa uvumba.
Na wuingyi woose wo wandu wawekyeri iterewa Ruwa nja ya hekalu kyiyeri kya ikoṟa uvumba.
Malaika o Mndumii kacha na kokye agoṟokyi ura lo kulyoe lo mesa ya Mndumii yekoṟia shindo shekyeṙutsa mtsu.
Kyiyeri Sakaria alemmbona naleiṟewe, kawoṙo nyi wuowu.
Kyaindi malaika ulya kammbia, “Ulaowuoe, Sakaria, kyipfa kyiterewo kyapfo kyaaṙanyio, na mka opfo, Elyisapeti, nechifee mana o kyisoṟo, na nochimlaga Yohane.
Na iyoe nochiwaṙa sia na ichihiyo lying'anyi, na wandu wafoi wechichihiyo kyiyeri mana-cho echifeo.
Kyipfa nechiwa ang'anyi mbele ya Ruwa. Echinyo mpfinyo maa kyindo kya wunanzi-pfo; na oe nechiichuṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele wookyia wosinyi ko wamae.
Na oe nechiwiyiṟa wandu wafoi wa Isiraelyi na ko Mndumii Ruwa owo.

Nechisonguo mbele yakye awoṙe pfinya tsa mrima cha tsilya tsa Elyiya, kundu nagaluo waawu wasanze na wana, na ienenga wawicho wuṟango wo wandu wasumganyi, na iṟeyeṟia Mndumii wandu wawaṟeyeṟie Wumangyi wo Ruwa.”
Sakaria kawia malaika, “Ngyechimanya kuṙa wuloi wo mbonyi-tsi? Inyi ngyimku na mka oko nyi mkyeku o mfiri ifoi.”
Malaika kamgaluo, kammbia, “Inyi nyi Kapreelyi, ngekyegoṟoka mbele ya Ruwa; na inyi ngaṙumo ngyiṙeṙe na iyoe na ikuwia mbonyi-tsi ngyicha.
Nochiwa ndiṟi, ulechiiṙima iṙeṙa, mṟasa mfiri ulya shechiṟundika isho, kyipfa oiṙikyia maṙeṙo gako-pfo, nago gechiafukyia kui kyiyeri kyago.”
Na wandu walya waweiweṙelyia Sakaria, wakaṟiyio kya ifurumia lyakye kulya hekalunyi.
Na lyilya alefuma pfo alaiiṙima iṙeṙa nawo, walemanya kye nalewona shindo shilandewono akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo kulya hekalunyi, na oe kawatsinia kaṙio ai ndiṟi.
Kyasia na lyilya mfiri ya kamba lyakye ileafukyia kayenda kanyi kokye.
Na numa ya mfiri iya mka okye, Elyisapeti, naleira mana kakaa numba mori itanu, echigamba,
“Kuṙi nyi wuṙo Mndumii alengyiwutia mfiri iya alengyiambuya kundu nangyiwute sonu mbele ya wandu.”
Mori iṟandaaṟu wookyia kyiyeri Elyisapeti aleira mana, malaika Kapreelyi naleṙumo nyi Ruwa nayende mṟasa mṟi o Galyilaya okyelago Nasareti,
ko mana mkyega aweṙuṙo nyi mndu awekyelago Yosefu, o kyishari kya Dawidi; na rina lya mana-cho mkyega nyi Mariamu.
Kaiṙa na kanyi kokye, kagamba, “Ngakuiṟikyiṟa, iyoe umwenengye isaṟia, Mndumii nai hamwi na iyoe.”
Na oe kaiṟewe mnu mrimenyi kyipfa kya maṙeṙo ga malaika ulya kakusaṟa mrimenyi, “Kyiiṟikyiṟo-kyi nyi kya mbaṟe iha?”
Malaika kammbia, “Ulaowuoe, Maria, kyipfa nowona isaṟia ko Ruwa.
Nochiira mana na nofee mana o kyisoṟo; na nochimlaga Yesu.
Icho nechiwa ang'anyi. Nechilago Mana o ulya ai wuye, na Mndumii Ruwa nemwenenga kyiṙi kya wuchilyi kya Dawidi, awuye.
Nechichilyia numba ya Yakobo mlungana, na Wumangyi wokye wochisia-pfo.”
Maria kawia malaika ulya, “Kyechiwa kuṙa kyindo-kyi, na inyi ngyilamwalyikye?”
Malaika kagaluo, kammbia, “Mumuyo Mweele necha na kopfo na pfinya tsa icho ai wuye tsekushikyia cha kyirinje. Kyipfa kya ikyo, ikyo kyechifeo kyelago nyi kyiele, Mana o Ruwa.
Lyingyi-se, mshari opfo, Elyisapeti, na oe naleira mana o kyisoṟo wukunyi wokye; na mori-chu nyi o kaṟandaaṟu ko icho alelago muumba.
Kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyilekyeiṙimika ko Ruwa-pfo.”
Maria kagamba, “Inyi nyi kyisinga kya Mndumii; kyiwe koko chandu ogamba.” Numa ya iho malaika kawuka halya kayenda.
Kyasia, mfiri-yo Maria kafuma, kayenda faṟa mṟasa uruka lo mafumvunyi mṟinyi umwi o Yuda,
kaiṙa na kanyi ko Sakaria, kaiṟikyiṟa Elyisapeti.
Na lyilya Elyisapeti aleicho kyiiṟikiṟo kyilya kya Maria, kyikoku kyikakupaaya wosinyi kokye. Elyisapeti kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mweele
kaṙeṙa kui ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Nummbikyie mboṟa iyoe kyiiṙi kya waka, na mono-pfo nechiwikyio mboṟa.
Mbonyi-tsi tsangyiwutikyia kuṙa, utane mama o Mndumii oko acha na koko inyi?
Kyipfa ilyi ṟui lyapfo lyeiṟikyiṟa lyileiṙa na maṙwinyi gako, kyikoku kyilekupaaya kui sia wosinyi-koko.
Na agusu icho aleiṙikyia; kyipfa isho alewio nyi Mndumii shechiafukyia.”
Maria kagamba,
“Mrima oko ong'anyisa Mndumii,
na ngoo yako yachihiyo kyipfa kya Ruwa,
Mkyiṟa oko.
Kyipfa naambuya
wufofo wo kyisinga kyakye.
Kyipfa, ambuya, wookyia wulalu
marika goose gengyilaga ammbikyie mboṟa.
Kyipfa awoṙe pfinya nangiwutia maṟiyisho,
na rina lyakye lyilyiele.
Na isaṟia lyakye lyekyekaa marika mṟasa marika
ko iwo wekyemwowuo na imwindia.
Nawoṙe pfinya yewuta shindo sha maṟiyisho;
naleola-ola walekyeicho makusaṟonyi ga ngoo tsawo.
Naleolotsa wang'anyi shiṙinyi shawo sha wuchilyi,
na wafofo kawang'anyisa.
Wawoṙo nyi njaa kawaigutsa mecha,
na wanjama kawaima iwona kyiira.
Naleikanyia Isiraelyi, mṟundi okye;
kundu nakumbuo isaṟia lyakye.
Chandu alewia waku waṙu,
Abrahamu na ushari lokye mṟasa mlungana.”
Maria kakaa na oe cha mori iṟaṟu, numa ya iho kawuya na kanyi kokye.
Na kyiyeri mfiri ya Elyisapeti yesaṟio mana ileafukyia, naleenengo mana o kyisoṟo.
Wamṟasa na wa kyishari kyakye wakaicho kye Mndumii namwengyeṟia isaṟia lyakye, wakachihiyo hamwi na oe.
Mfiri o nyanya wakacha icheṙina mana; wakakunda imṙumbuya rina lya awuye, Sakaria.
Wamae kagaluo, kagamba, “Chi wuṙo-pfo; nechilago Yohane.”
Wakammbia, “Kuwoṙe mndu ekyelago kuṙo kunu kyisharinyi kyapfo-pfo.”
Wakatsinia awuye wamanye chandu echimlaga.
Kawawia wamwenenge handu heṟeia, kaṟeia kye rina lyakye nyi Yohane. Wakaṟiyio woose.
Iho iho ṙumbu lyakye lyikatambuluka na ulumi lokye taa, kawooka iṙeṙa echiṟumisha Ruwa.
Woose wawei kufuhi wakawoṙo nyi wuowu; na mbonyi-tso tsoose tsikaongoyo urukyenyi loose lo Uyuda luwewoṙe mafumvu.
Na woose waleicho wakawika mbonyi-tso mrimenyi kowo, wechigamba, “Mana-chu nechiwa o mbaṟe iha? Kyipfa pfinya ya Mndumii iwei hamwi na oe.”
Na Sakaria, awuye, kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mweele kaonguo shisuku, kagamba,
“Naṟumisho Mndumii, Ruwa o Isiraelyi,
kyipfa nalecha na ko wandu wakye, na iwakyiṟa.
Nalelugoṟotsia membe ya wukyiṟo
moongonyi o Dawidi, mṟundi okye.
Chandu agambie wookyia mawookyionyi
kui ṙumbu lya weonguo shisuku wakye waele;
Lukyiṟo iwuka ko washituwa waṙu
na mawokonyi ga woose walusuuye.
Kundu nawutie waku waṙu, isaṟia
na ikumbuo mma okye mweele.
Nyamu alelyiia Abrahamu awu-yoṙu,
kye nechilutarama soe,
lukyiṟo iwuka mawokonyi ga washituwa waṙu,
na imṟundia kulawoṙe wuowu,
ko wuele na wusumganyi
mbele yakye mfiri yaṙu yoose.
Na iyoe, mana, nolago moonguo shisuku
o icho ai wuye,
kyipfa nochisonguo mbele ya Mndumii
umṟeyeṟie njia tsakye;
umanyishe wandu wakye wukyiṟo,
kyiiṙi kya ihooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
Kui njia ya isaṟia lya Ruwa oṙu,
na kui njia-tso ngyeela iwukyie wuye yacha na koṙu.
Ilyimikyia wai meemenyi na kyirinjenyi kya upfu,
na isongoya maṙende gaṙu kui njia ya ufoṟo.”
Mana ulya kang'ana, kaengyeṟika pfinya mrimenyi. Kakaa kundu ko nuka kuumu suwaa kulawoṙe maa mṟinga mṟasa mfiri o kuloṟa ko Waisiraelyi.
Mfiri iya iwawaso lyilewuka ko Kaisari Agusto kye kuṟeio marina ga wandu woose wa wuyana.
Marina-ga nyigo ga kuwooka galeṟeio kyiyeri Kyirenio awekyeri mchilyi o Shamu.
Wandu woose wakandeṟeio, orio mndu mṟinyi kokye.
Yosefu na oe nalefuma Galyilaya, awuka mṟi o Nasareti, kaṙo kayenda Uyuda mṟasa mṟi o Dawidi, okyelago Betilehemu, kyipfa oe nyi o kyishari kya Dawidi;
kundu naṟeio hamwi na Maria awekyeri tindi yakye na oe nawei mnene.
Na kyiiṙi kya ikaa-pfo, mfiri yakye yesaṟio mana ikaafukyia,
kafee mono-kye mmbele, kamṟika nguwo tsa kyikoku, kamlaṟa mugondinyi o umbe, kyipfa walewona ṙaawa numbenyi ya wayenu-pfo.
Na kulya urukyenyi kuwewoṙe walyisi wawekyeri mapatenyi wechiringa mapoo gawo kyio kui iseiyana.
Malaika o Mndumii kacha na kowo walakuṟeyeṟie, mng'ano o Mndumii ukowaa ngyuura tsoose, wakaowuo mnu.
Malaika kawawia, “Mulaowuoe; kyipfa inyi ngyimuendie mbonyi ngyicha tsa sia ing'anyi yechiwa ko wandu woose.
Kyipfa inu mṟinyi o Dawidi nafeo, kyipfa kyanyu, Mkyiṟa, nyi oe Kristo Mndumii.
Na ikyi nyikyo kyiṟingyishio konyu; mochikooya mana aionga amṟikye nguwo tsa kyikoku, alee mgondinyi o umbe.”
Cha ilyi wawei hamwi na malaika-cho, wuingyi o ngyuulyimalyi tsa ruwewu, wechiṟumisha Ruwa na igamba,
“Naṟumisho Ruwa wuye Ruwewu,
na wuyanenyi kuwe ufoṟo ko wandu awakundi.”
Na lyilya malaika-wo walelekana nawo wechiyenda ruwewu, walyisi walya walewiana, “Luyende mṟasa Betilehemu lundewona kyindo-kyo Ruwa aleluwia.”
Wakayenda faṟa wakakooya Maria na Yosefu, na mana ulya aionga alee mgondinyi.
Wamummbone wakaonguo mbonyi tsakye chandu walekowaongoyo.
Woose waleicho wakaṟiyio kyipfa kya isho walewio nyi walyisi.
Kyaindi Maria kakumbuo shindo-sho shoose, echikusaṟa mrimenyi kokye.
Walyisi walya wakawuya weching'anyisa na iṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kya mbonyi tsoose waleicho na iwona chandu walewio.
Hamwiṙe mfiri nyanya, kyiyeri kyeṙina mana kyamwafukie, nalelago nyi Yesu, chandu Malaika alekoamlaga kyiyeri alandemogo.
Numa ya iho lyilya kyiyeri kya iilyiro lyawo kyileafukyia, chandu mawawaso ga Mose gagambie, waleyenda na oe mṟasa Yerusalemu, wammṙambikye ko Mndumii,
Chandu kyikyiṟeie mawawasonyi ga Mndumii: “Orio mana o kyisoṟo mmbele ko wamae nalago mweele ko Mndumii.”
Wandewuta kyiano chandu kyikyigambe mawawasonyi ga Mndumii, “Mbuna tsiwi ang'u maalea gawi ga mbeta.”
Na halya Yerusalemu hawewoṙe mndu ekyelago Simion, na oe nyi mndu msumganyi, akundi na iowuo Ruwa, echiweṙelyia kyiyeri kya Waisiraelyi, iwiyiṟio moo na Mumuyo Mweele nawei na oe.
Na oe nawemmbie nyi Mumuyo Mweele kye echipfa alawona Kristo o Mndumii-pfo.
Kyasia kacha na hekalunyi echisongoyo nyi Mumuyo; na lyilya wafee waleende mana ulya Yesu na numba, kundu wammbutie chandu kyiwekyigambe.
Oe amonyi nalemwambilyia kaana Ruwa, echigamba,
“Wulalu Mndumii, noenenga kyisinga kyapfo momu,
kui ufoṟo chandu ugambie.
Kyipfa meso gako gawona wukyiro wopfo,
ulewuṟeyeṟia wandu woose;
Ngyeela yelyimika Masanga,
na iwa mng'ano o wandu wapfo Isiraelyi.”
Na awuye na wamae waweiṟiyio kyipfa kya isho shileṙeṙo kyipfa kyakye.
Simion kawawikyia mboṟa, kawia Maria, wamae, “Ichu nammbikye kyipfa kya ioloka na igoṟoka lya wandu wafoi wakyeri Isiraelyi, na iwa kyindo kya maṟiyisho kyechiṙeṙo uwicho.
Na iyoe kumonyi, kyechiwa cha ilyi ushu loiṙa na mrimenyi kopfo, kundu mrima ya wandu wafoi igalutso.”
Kuwewoṙe moonguo shisuku o kyika, ekyelago Ana, mana o Fanuelyi, o ushari lo Asheri, na maka yakye iwefoi. Nalekoamkaa na mii maka mfungaaṙe wookyia kyiyeri alealyiko.
Na oe nyi mka mkusu o maka makumi nyanya na ina, ekyewuka hekalunyi-pfo, indi nyi iterewa Ruwa kyio na kyingoto echikuretekyia na iterewa.
Ichu nalecha kyiyeri kyilya kyilya kaana Ruwa, na woose waweiweṙelyia wukyiṟo kulya Yerusalemu kawawia mbonyi tsakye.
Na kyiyeri walemarisa iwuta shoose chandu kyikyigambe mawawasonyi ga Mndumii, walewuya na Galyilaya mṟasa mṟinyi kowo, Nasareti.
Mana ulya kang'ana, kaengyeṟika pfinya, aichuo wuṟango na isaṟia lya Ruwa lyiwei wuye yakye.
Kyasia, wafee wakye wekyeyenda Yerusalemu orio maka, kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka.
Na kyiyeri alesutsa maka ikumi na iwi, waleṙo chandu kyiwekyeri mwichiwie o mfiri ung'anyi.
Na mfiri yawo yekaa Yerusalemu yamsie, kyiyeri kya iwuya lyawo, mana ulya Yesu naleṙio numa kulya Yerusalemu, na wafee wakye waweichi-pfo.
Nawo wakakusaṟa kye nakyeri wandunyi, wakayenda handu ha mfiri umwi, wechimpfula wandunyi wa kyishari kyakye na woṙiao,
na lyilya walalemmbona, wakawuya na Yerusalemu wechimpfula.
Na hamwiṙe mfiri iṟaṟu wakammbona hekalunyi, aṙamie makyiṙi-gawi ga walosha, echiwaaṙanyia na iwawesa shindo.
Na woose waleicho shilya awegamba waleṟiyio kyipfa kya wuṟango wokye na chandu aweiwagaluo.
Lyilya walemmbona waleṟiyio, na wamae kammbia, “Mono-ko, ny'kyilyi oluwutia kuṙi? Awuyo na inyi luwekupfula luwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi.”
Kawawia, “Kyitewe mungyipfula ny'kyi? Muichi kyangyikooya ikaa numbenyi ya Awu oko?”
Nawo walemanya kyindo-kyo alewawia-pfo.
Kayenda nawo mṟasa Nasareti, na oe nawekyewaindia; na wamae kawika isho shoose mrimenyi kokye.
Na Yesu kang'ana, echiengeṟika wuṟango, echichihiṟa Ruwa na wandu.

Maka o ikumi na kataanu o ichilyia lya Kaisari Tiberia, kyiyeri Pontio Pilato awei mchilyi o Uyuda, na Herode mangyi o Galyilaya, na Filyipo, mana o wamae, mangyi o Iturea na uruka lo Tirakoniti, na Lyisania, mangyi o Abilene,
kyiyeri kya wukohanyi wung'anyi wo Anasi na Kayafa, Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyileshika ko Yohane mana o Sakaria, kundu kuumu suwaa kulawoṙe maa mṟinga.
Kashika urukyenyi loose lukyeri kufuhi na Yoridan echionguo mbonyi tsa wupatiso wokyeende iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi na ihooṟio maṙeko.
Chandu kyikyiṟeie kyitapunyi kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya,
“Ṟui lya mndu aieṟeṟia nuka,
‘Ṟeyeṟenyi njia ya Mndumii,
goṟotsenyi kundu echiiṙia.
Orio pichi lyechiichuṟo,
na orio fumvu na kyifumvu kyechititiṟo;
handu haleme hechigoṟoka,
na halaharendekyeri herendekyia.
Na wandu woose wechiwona wukyiṟo wo Mndumii.’ ”
Kyasia kawia wuingyi wo wandu walya waleyenda kokye kundu nawapatise, “Nyoe maalea ga njoka, nyi wui alemuikyimbia nyoe iṙicha nyashi-yo iicha?
Kyasia kumbienyi ndunda tsifananyi na iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi; maa mulagambe mrimenyi konyu kye muwoṙe awu, nyi oe Abrahamu, kyipfa ngammbia kye, iwuka kunu magoenyi Ruwa nechiiṙima ienenga Abrahamu wana.
Na wulalu kuṙi soka lyilyiwikyie matsindenyi ga mashiṙi. Kyasia orio ikyiṙi lyilaikumbia ndunda ngyicha lyechimanyo na iwiyitso moṙonyi.”
Wuingyi wulya wo wandu wukommbesa, “Kyasia luwikye kuṙa?”
Kagaluo, echiwawia, “Awoṙe kanzu tsiwi naenengye ulya alawoṙe kanzu; na awoṙe shelya nawewute kuṙo.”
Wesania ukamba nawo wakacha ipatiso, wakammbesa, “Mlosha, luwikye kuṙa soe?”
Kawawia, “Maa mularikye ngoseṟa ya ikyo muwawie.”

Asikari nawo wakammbesa, wechigamba, “A soe luwikye kuṙa?” Kawawia, “Mulaṙuo kyindo kya mndu ko pfinya, maa mulaṙuo mndu mengyenyi kyipfa kya shindo sha wongo, ngoseṟa shikonyi na shilya muitoo cha wori wonyu.”
Kyasia, lyilya wandu waweiweṙelyia kyindo kyechiwutika, woose wechikusaṟa mrimenyi kowo mbonyi tsa Yohane, kokooya oe nyi oe Kristo,

Yohane nalegaluo kawia woose, “Loi inyi ngyimupatisa kui mṟinga, kyaindi naicha mndu awoṙe pfinya kuta inyi, ngilechiiṙima maa ituruchuo ngowa tsa shiaṙu shakye. Oe nemupatisa kui Mumuyo Mweele na kui moṙo.
Oe indo lyakye lyeela shindo lyikeri kuwokonyi kokye, na oe nechiaia muului oose handu hakye heelyia shindo, na isania nganu yakye kyikumbinyi indi muului nechiurumatsa moṙonyi ulekyeruma.”
Kyasia, kui shindo shifoi shetutuma naleongoya wandu mbonyi ngyicha.
Kyaindi lyilya mangyi Herode aleṙeṙio nyi Yohane kyipfa kya Herodia, mka o mono-wamae, na mawicho goose Herode alewuta,
naleengyeṟa-se na wuwicho wungyi wuye ya shoose, kawika Yohane kyipfungonyi.
Kyikawa-ng'u wandu woose wampatiso, na Yesu ampatiso na oe naiterewa, mapuchi galeseia.
Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye yakye kui mfano o mmbiu cha mbuna; ṟui lyikawuka Ruwewu, “Iyoe nyi Mana oko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyapfo.”
Na Yesu amonyi, kyiyeri alewooka ilosha, nawewoṙe cha maka makumi gaṟaaṟu, echikusaṟo kye nyi mana o Yosefu, o Elyi.
O Matati, o Lewi, o Melyikyi, o Yana, o Yosefu.
O Matatia, o Amosi, o Nahomu, o Esilyi, o Nakai.
O Maati, o Matatia, o Semei, o Yosefu, o Yuda.
O Yoana, o Resa, o Serubabelyi, o Shealyitielyi, o Neri.
O Melyikyi, o Adi, o Kosamu, o Elyimadamu, o Eri.
O Yosua, o Elyieseri, o Yorimu, o Matati, o Lewi.
O Simion, o Yuda, o Yosefu, o Yonamu, o Elyiakyimu.
O Melea, o Mena, o Matata, o Natan, o Dawidi.
O Yese, o Obedi, o Boasi, o Salyimone, o Nashon.
O Aminadabu, o Aramu, o Hesiron, o Peresi, o Yuda.
O Yakobo, o Isakyi, o Abrahamu, o Tera, o Nahori.
O Seṟuikyi, o Rakau, o Pelekyi, o Eberi, o Sala.
O Kyenan, o Arifakyisadi, o Semu, o Noe, o Lamekyi.
O Metusela, o Enokyi, o Yaredi, o Mahalalelyi, o Kyenan.
O Enosi, o Seti, o Adamu, o Ruwa.
Na Yesu, amwichuṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele nalewuya iwuka Yoridan, kaṙoo nyi Mumuyo Mweele kyiyeri kya mfiri makumi gaana kundu ko nuka,
echiyesho nyi Mokyiriinzi. Na mfiri-yo nawekuretekyia; na kyiyeri mfiri yekuretekyia ilesia nalewoṙo nyi njaa.
Mokyiriinzi kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mana o Ruwa, wia igoe-lyi lyiwe mkate.”
Yesu kamgaluo, “Kyikyiṟeie kye mndu echiwona moo kui mkate tikyi-pfo.”
Kamṙosia wuye, kamloṟa ngyuuchilyi tsoose tsa wuyana ko kyiyeri kyifuhi.
Mokyiriinzi kammbia, “Ishi shoose ngyechikuenenga, na wung'anyi wosho kyipfa nyi shako na inyi ngyekyeenenga orio mndu chandu ngakunda.
Kyasia iyoe kongyiindia shoose shechiwa shapfo.”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyikyiṟeie ‘India Mndumii Ruwa opfo, umterewe oe amonyi.’ ”
Kamṙuo mṟasa Yerusalemu, kammbikyia wuye ya uweri lo hekalu, kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mana o Ruwa kuwiyitse wanda;
kyipfa kyikyiṟeie,
‘Nechikuṙikyia malaika wakye wakuringye;’ ”
na kye,
“Mawokonyi gawo wechikuwaṙa
ulachekapa ṙende igoenyi.”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, kyikyigambe, “Ulayeshe Mndumii Ruwa opfo.”
Kyasia Mokyiriinzi ammarise shiyesho shoose, kamleka ko kyiyeri kyifuhi.
Yesu kawuya kui pfinya tsa Mumuyo, kayenda Galyilaya; mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana ngyuurukyenyi tsoose tsa mṟasenyi.
Na oe naweiloshia masinagoginyi gawo, echiṟumisho nyi wandu woose.
Kayenda Nasareti, halya-ndu aleembeṟio na mfiri o onyonya kaiṙa na sinagoginyi chandu aweichiwie, kagoṟoka kundu nasome.
Kaenengyio kyitapu kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya, kakyitaṟahuo, kapfula handu haṟeie,
“Mumuyo o Mndumii nai wuye yako,
kyipfa nalengyishumbuo iongoya wakyiwa mbonyi ngyicha
nalengyiṙuma iongoya wapfungo kya ilekyio lyawo,
na shipfupfuṟe iiṙima iwona-se.
Na iashuo walya wawailame.
Na ionguo kya maka o Mndumii umteseṟe.”
Kapfunga kyitapu kyilya kakyienengyia mṟundi ulya, kaṙamia; na wandu woose wawei kulya sinagoginyi wakamwitukuya karii.
Kawooka iwawia, “Inu shiṟeio-shi shaafukyia maṙwinyi ganyu.”
Wakamṟingyishia woose, wechiṟiyio kyipfa kya shindo sha isaṟia aleṙeṙa, wakagamba, “Ichu chi mana o Yosefu-pfoe?”
Kawawia, “Nyi loi mochingyiwia mṙeṙie-chu kye mganga, kukyiṟe kumonyi; mbonyi tsoose luleicho kye tsilewutika Kaperinaumu, uwetsiwute taa iha urukyenyi lopfo kumonyi.”
Kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kye, kuwoṙe moonguo shisuku ekyeiṙikyio urukyenyi lokye amonyi-pfo.”

Kyaindi, kyaloi ngyimmbia, “Kuwewoṙe waka wakusu wafoi urukyenyi lo Isiraelyi kacha kyiyeri kya Elyiya, lyilya ngyina tsileshingo tsilawute mvuo kyiyeri kya maka iṟaṟu na mori iṟandaaṟu, uruka loose lukowaṙa njaa ing'anyi.
Maa Elyiya aleṙumo ko umwi o wakusu-wo-pfo, indi ko mka umwi mkusu o Serepta urukyenyi lo Sidon.
Ngoseṟa, kuwewoṙe wandu wafoi wawewoṙo nyi taambo urukyenyi lo Isiraelyi nyi kacha kyiyeri kya moonguo shisuku Elyisha, maa kuwoṙe aleilyish sile nyi Naiman, mndu o Shamu-pfo.”
Wakaicho nyashi woose wawei kulya sinagoginyi kyiyeri waleicho isho.
Wakamfuna na nja ya mṟi, wakamṙuo mṟasa wuye ya fumvu handu mṟi owo ummbikye kundu wammbiyitse wanda.
Kyaindi oe naleiṙa makyiṙi-gawi gawo kayenda.
Kasoka mṟasa Kaperinaumu, mṟi o Galyilaya, kawalosha mfiri o onyonya.
Wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya malosho gakye, kyipfa ṙeṙo lyakye lyiwewoṙe pfinya.
Na kulya sinagoginyi kuwewoṙe mndu awewoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho. Kafiiṟa kui ṟui lying'anyi,
echigamba, “Leka! Lokukyi, Yesu o Nasareti? Nocha ilurumatsa? Ngyikuichi iyoe nyi wui, Mweele o Ruwa.”
Yesu kamṙeṙia echigamba, “Tsia, mmbukye.” Naaho-ng'u mṟufui ulya mmbicho kamwolotsa makyiṙi-gawi kammbuka kulawoṙe immbutia kyindo kyiwicho.
Wakaṟiyio woose, wakawesana, wechigamba, “Kyindo-kyi nyi kya mbaṟe iha, kyipfa naiṙeṙia waṟufui wawicho ko pfinya na wuiṙimi, wakawuka.”
Mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana koose kulya urukyenyi.
Kawuka kulya sinagoginyi, kaiṙa na kanyi ko Simion. Na mamka o Simion, nawewoṙo nyi isemu, wakamterewa kyipfa kyakye.
Kagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, kaṙeṙia isemu lyilya, lyikamleka; cha ilyi kafuma, kawaṟundia.
Na lyilya kuleila, wandu woose wawewoṙe wandu waluoe ndoṟe tsa mbaṟe tsoose walewaende na kokye, kayekyia mawoko wuye ya orio umwi owo kawakyiṟa.
Waṟufui wawicho nawo wakawuka ko wandu wafoi; wechikalagatsa na igamba, “Iyoe nyi Mana o Ruwa.” Kawaṙeṙia, alawalekyie iṙeṙa, kyipfa walemmanya kye oe nyi Kristo.
Na lyilya kulekya nalefuma kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, wuingyi wo wandu waweimpfula wakashika kokye, wakatambagana imshingyia alawukye kowo.
Kawawia, “Kyangyikooya ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa mṟi ingyi taa, kyipfa nyi kyipfa kya ikyo ngyileṙumo.”
Kyasia, naweionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha masinagoginyi ga Galyilaya.
Kyiyeri awekyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Kyenesareti wuingyi wo wandu wukokuumbia kufui iaṙanyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na oe alawone maa handu hegalukyia.
Kawona ngalawa tsiwi tsikyeri mbai ya nduwa, kyaindi weṙeia makunga waweisanja ndusu tsawo.
Kaiṙa na ngalawenyi imwi, nayo nyi ya Simion, kammbia, naiṙuo kuleshi kyitutu na halya mbai ya nduwa iya. Kaṙamia, kalosha wuingyi wo wandu akyeri ngalawenyi.
Na ammarise iṙeṙa, nalewia Simion, “Ṙuonyi ngalawa mṟasa handu nduwa iyendie wanda kuta hengyi, musotse ndusu tsanyu muwaṙe makunga.”
Simion kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, ang'anyi, luwinie kyio kyoose lulawone kyindo, kyaindi kui ṙeṙo lyapfo ngyesotsia ndusu nduwenyi.”
Kyasia; wammbute kuṙo wakawaṙa makunga gafoi mnu, ndusu tsawo tsikawooka iṙumbuka.
Wakatsinia walya waweiṟunda nawo wawekyeri kulya ngalawenyi ya kawi, wachewatarama. Wakacha, wakaichuṟa ngalawa tsilya tsitsiwi, mṟasa tsikakyiṟesoṟowia.
Simion Petiro ammbone kuṙo, naleoloka maṙendenyi ga Yesu, echigamba, “Wuka koko, kyipfa inyi nyi mndu mnyamaṟi, Mndumii.”
Kyipfa naleṟiyio, oe na walya wawei na oe woose, kyipfa kya chandu walewaṙa makunga gafoi.
Na wuṙo taa kyilewa ko wana wa Sebedayo, wawekyeṟunda hamwi na Simion. Yesu kawia Simion, “Ulaowuoe. Wookyia wulalu nowamoṙega wandu.”
Na wammbikyie ngalawa tsawo mbai ya ipalyipalyi, wakaṙa shoose wakamwosha.
Na kyiyeri awei mṟinyi umwi kyiiṙi kya mṟi iya hawewoṙe mndu awoṙo nyi taambo. Na oe lyilya alewona Yesu naleoloka na ndewu, kamterewa echigamba, “Mndumii, kokunda, nochiiṙima ingyiilyisha.”
Na oe kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kampaaya echigamba, “Ngyikundi, ila.” Cha ilyi taambo lyakye lyikammbuka.
Kamwima alawie mndu, indi kammbia, “Yenda undekuloṟa ko mkohanyi; undewuta ko iilyiro lyapfo chandu Mose agambie, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
Kyaindi mbonyi tsakye tsikaengyeṟa iṙunganana, wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wakasanzia handu hamwi, wamwaṙanyie na ikyiṟo ndoṟe tsawo.
Kyaindi oe nalelekana nawo, kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, kandeterewa.

Na kyiyeri kyilya naweilosha, na Mafarisayo na walosha wa uwawaso waweṙamie ho, wawewukyie orio kyikaṟo kya Galyilaya, na Uyuda, na Yerusalemu. Na pfinya tsa Mndumii tsiwekyeri ho kundu naiṙime ikyiṟa.
Wakacha wandu waṙuṙe mndu kyitaṟenyi awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi wakundi imṙuo numba wammbikyie mbele yakye.
Na lyilya waleuṟa ṙaawa lyemṙuo numba kyipfa kya wuingyi wulya wo wandu, waleṙooya kai, wakatocha kai iya, wakamsotsa oe na kyitaṟa kyakye makyiṙi-gawi mbele ya Yesu.
Na oe lyilya alewona iiṙikyia lyawo, nalewia ulya aluoe, “Mbuya-ko, omhooṟio maṙeko gapfo.”
Kyasia walosha walya wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo wakawooka iwesana, wechigamba, “Nyi wui ichu ailahia Ruwa? Nyi wui echiiṙima ihooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi sile nyi Ruwa amonyi?”
Na Yesu aichi makusaṟo gawo, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi mukusaṟa shiwicho mrimenyi konyu?
Kyipfa nyi kyiha kyii kyaangu, nyi igamba ‘Omhooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo,’ ang'u nyi igamba, ‘Amka uyende?’

Kyaindi muiṙime imanya kye Mono-Adamu nawoṙe wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo hooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi, (nalewia ulya awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi) ‘Ngakuwia, amka ukuṙikye kyitaṟa kyapfo uyende kanyi kopfo.’ ”
Cha ilyi kagoṟoka mbele yawo, kakuṙika kyilya awelee wuye yakyo, kayenda kanyi kokye, echiana Mndumii.
Wakaṟiyio woose, wakang'anyisa Ruwa; wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, wechigamba, “Inu lowona mbonyi tsa maṟiyisho.”
Numa ya isho kawuka pfo kawona mosania ukamba, ekyelago Lewi, aṙamie handu hesania ukamba, kammbia, “Ngyiosha.”
Kaṙa shoose, kaamka kamwosha.
Na Lewi kamwachikyia shelya shifoi kanyi kokye. Napfo kuwewoṙe wuingyi wufoi wo wesania ukamba na wandu wengyi waweilya hamwi nawo.
Mafarisayo na walosha wawo wa mawawaso wakanunuwia wanalosho wakye, wechigamba, “Ny'kyilyi muilya na inyo hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi?”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Walya walaluoe wekyepfula mganga-pfo, sile walya waluoe.
Ngyilecha ilaga walya wasumganyi-pfo indi wanyamaṟi waiṙime iṙumbuya.”
Nawo wakammbia, “Wanalosho wa Yohane wekyekuretekyia kafong'ui na iterewa. Na wuṙo taa wanalosho wa Mafarisayo; kyaindi wanalosho wapfo wekyelya na inyo!”
Kyaindi Yesu kawawia, “Mochiiṙima kuṙa iwia wandu walage wolyinyi wakuretekyie wakyeri na monyi wolyi?
Kyaindi kochicha mfiri monyi wolyi echiwuto kowo; nyi lyo-ndu wechikuretekyia.”
Kawawia mfano, “Kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika kyiṙami kya nguwo ngihya nguwonyi ngyiku-pfo. Na kokooya awika naṙumbuo iya ngyihya, na kyiṙami kya nguwo iya ngyihya kyechiwa cha kyilya kyiku-pfo.
Maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika mpfinyo mhya maselelenyi maku-pfo. Na kokooya awika pfo, mpfinyo ulya mhya opaṟa maselela galya, mpfinyo-cho ukopusuka, na maselela gakanyamaṟika.
Kyaindi kyiwaṟi iwika mpfinyo mhya maselelenyi mahya.
Maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyenyo mpfinyo o kacha kalanga mhya-pfo; kyipfa negamba ulya o kacha nyicho ui mcha.”
Kyasia mfiri o onyonya Yesu naweiiṙa maṙemenyi na wanalosho wakye wakawooka itumuo magaa ga nganu na igasusa-susa mawokonyi gawo wakalya.
Naaho-ng'u Mafarisayo waata wakawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muiṟunda kyilai kya sungusinyi mfiri o onyonya?”
Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Mulekulosha ikyo Dawidi alewuta, lyilya alewoṙo nyi njaa, oe na oṙoe?
Chandu aleiṙa na numbenyi ya Ruwa, kalya mkate iya ngyiele, kaenenga na oṙoe kyilawaṟi iilya sile nyi makohanyi wawenyi.”
Kawawia, “Mono-Adamu nyi oe Mndumii o mfiri o onyonya.”
Kyasia mfiri ungyi o onyonya naleiṙa na sinagoginyi kalosha, napfo kuwewoṙe mndu awewoṙe kuwoko ko kulyoe kupfiie ngapfu.
Na walosha wa mawawaso hamwi na Mafarisayo waweimṙega kundu wawone kokooya nekyiṟa mndu mfiri a onyonya; kundu waiṙime iwona kyindo kyemmbusia uwingo.
Kyaindi oe kamanya makusaṟo gawo, kawia ulya awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu, “Nnjo goṟoka iha makyiṙi-gawi.” Kagoṟoka.
Naaho-ng'u Yesu kawawesa, “Nyi sungusinyi iṟunda mecha mfiri o onyonya, ang'u iṟunda mawicho? Ikyiṟa mrima ang'u iurumatsa?”
Kawaitukuya woose echiambuya ngyuura tsoose, kawia mndu ulya, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo.” Kagoṟuo kuwoko, kukochia na iwaṙa pfinya cha kuwooka.
Wakasuo mnu, wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi wawutie kyi Yesu.
Kyasia mfiri iya naleyenda fumvunyi kundu nandeterewa, kalaa kyiṙombo kyio kyoose echiterewa Ruwa.
Na kyiyeri kya kyingoto kalaga wanalosho wakye; kasambuṟa ikumi na wawi kyiiṙi kyawo, kawalaga wasu.
Simion, ulya alemlaga rina lya kawi Petiro, Anderea, mono-wamae, Yakobo na Yohane, Filyipo na Baritolomayo.
Na Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo o Alyifayo, na Simion ekyelago Selote.
Na Yuda o Yakobo, na Yuda Isikariote, na oe nyi oe alemṟiinga.

Kasoka hamwi nawo, kagoṟoka handu ha rendewele, hamwi na wanalosho wakye wafoi. Na wuingyi wo wandu walewuka Uyuda koose na Yerusalemu, na mbai ya Tiro na Sidon; walecha imwaṙanyia na ikyiṟo ndoṟe tsawo.
Na walya waweituuro nyi waṟufui wawicho walekyiṟo.
Na wuingyi wulya woose wuwekundi impaaya kyipfa pfinya tsekyiṟa tsiwewuka kokye na ikyiṟa woose.
Kapaluo meso kaambuya wanalosho wakye, kagamba,
“Wagusu nyoe mui wakyiwa wa mrima,
kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwewu nyi wonyu.
Wagusu nyoe muwoṙo nyi njaa wulalu,
kyipfa mochiiguṙa.
Wagusu nyoe muifiiṟa wulalu, kyipfa mochiseka.”
“Wagusu nyoe ilyi wandu wemsuo, na imshingyia nja, na imlahia, na inyamaṟa rina lyanyu, kyipfa kya Mono-Adamu.
Chihiyonyi mfiri-cho na ishoonga-shonga, kyipfa wori wonyu wung'anyi Ruwewu, kyipfa nyi wuṙo waawu wawo walewutia weonguo shisuku.
Kyaindi, ochia lonyu muwoṙe masaa,
kyipfa wori wonyu mulemuambilyia.
Ochia lonyu nyoe muigutsu wulalu kyipfa mochiicho njaa.
Ochia lonyu nyoe muiseka wulalu, kyipfa mochikapa ṟanyi na ifiiṟa.
Ochia lonyu nyoe ilyi wandu woose wechimuenenga kyiṟumi,
kyipfa nyi wuṙo waku wawo walewutia weonguo shisuku wa wongo.”
“Kyaindi ngyimmbia nyoe muingyiaṙanyia, kundenyi washituwa wanyu, wutienyi mecha walya wamsuuye nyoe.
Wikyienyi mboṟa walya waimpfulutsa nyashi, terewienyi walya waimuilama nyoe.
Mndu kakukapa ura lumwi, mgalutsie ura lo kawi, na mndu akusoka ijoho lyapfo, ulamwime maa iwale.
Enenga orio mndu akuterewa, na mndu akusoka shindo shapfo maa ulalangye nakuwiyiṟie.
Na kyilya mukundi wandu wammbutie nyoe, na wuṙo mochiwawutia.
Kyipfa mukokunda walya wamukundi nyoe, moloṟa kyi? Kyipfa maa wanyamaṟi na wuṙo wekyekunda walya wawakundi.
Na nyoe mukowutia shicha walya wekyemmbutia shicha moloṟa kyi? Maa wanyamaṟi na wuṙo wekyewuta.
Mukoakuya mndu kyindo na kunu mukundi iwona kyindo kowo moloṟa kyi? Maa wanyamaṟi wekyeakuya wanyamaṟi kundu wawiyiṟio wuṙo.
Indi kundenyi washituwa wanyu. Wutenyi shicha, na mukoakuya mulakunde itoo kyindo, na wori wonyu woching'ana. Na nyoe mochiwa wana wa ai wuye, kyipfa oe namcha ko walya walekyemwana, na wawicho.
Kyasia, wenyi wandu wekyehooṟia chandu Awu-yonyu ai mohooṟia.”
“Maa mulaanduye, na nyoe mochianduyo-pfo. Mulagambe kye wandu wengyi wawawicho kundu mulagambo kye muwawicho. Lekyienyi na nyoe mochilekyio.
Enengyenyi wandu shindo, na nyoe mochienengo. Kyiyeṟo kyiichuo na itsindo, na ipaayo-payo mṟasa ipusuka, nyikyo wandu wechimuenenga nyoe. Kyipfa kyiyeṟo kyilya kyilya mochiyeṟa ny'kyo mochiyeṟio.”
Kawawia mṙeṙie, “Ngyesa kyipfupfuṟe kyechiiṙima isongoya kyipfupfuṟe? Shechioloka mkuwenyi shoose shishiwi-pfoe?
Manalosho ekyeng'ania mlosha okye-pfo, kyaindi orio mndu aafutsia nechiwa cha mlosha okye.
Kyasia, ny'kyilyi uiambuya kyiunana kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo, na mriti-cho ukyeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo ulauambuye?

Ang'u nowia kuṙa mono-womoo, ngyileka ngyiwute kyiunana ipfo risonyi kopfo ulaiambuya mriti ukyeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo kumonyi? Iyoe mkulembecheṟi, wuta kuwooka mriti-cho ipfo risonyi lyapfo, naaho-ng'u ochiwona necha iwuta kyiunana kyilya kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo.”
“Kyipfa kuwoṙe ikyiṙi lyicha lyekyekumbia ndunda ngyiwicho-pfo; maa ikyiṙi lyiwicho lyekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha-pfo.
Kyipfa orio ikyiṙi lyekyemanyika kui ndunda tsalyo; kyipfa wandu wekyehaa sabibu mshenyi ang'u ndunda ngyicha tseloṙa nduonyi-pfo.
Mndu mcha kyiseyesoenyi kyicha nekyewuta shicha. Na mndu mmbicho kyiseyesoenyi kyiwicho nekyewuta shiwicho. Kyipfa ṙumbu lya mndu lyekyeṙeṙa shilya shiichuṟie mrima okye.”
“Ny'kyilyi mungyilaga, Mndumii, Mndumii, kyaindi mulawute shilya ngyigamba?
Orio mndu echa na koko na iaṙanyia maṙeṙo gako na igaosha, ngyemuloṟa mfano okye.
Mfano okye nyi cha mndu alewika numba, kasuma wanda na iwika urende wuye ya iṟaṟa; na kyiyeri kulecha mra ung'anyi, mfu ukokapa numba iya ko pfinya, ulaiṙime iiolotsa, kyipfa ingyiwikye necha.
Kyaindi ulya aleicho alawute kuṙo, mfano okye nyi cha mndu alewika numba handu halawoṙe iṟaṟa, mfu ukosoka ko pfinya, ikaoloka cha ilyi; na inyamaṟo lyayo lyikawa lying'anyi.”
Na kyiyeri alemarisa iwawia maṙeṙo gakye goose naleiṙa na Kaperinaumu.
Na mṟundi o mchilyi umwi naweluoe mnu, kufuhi na ipfa; na oe nawemkundi mnu.
Kyiyeri aleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, naleṙuma wameeku wa Kyiyuda kokye imterewa nache nakyiṟe mṟundi okye.
Nawo kyiyeri waleshika ko Yesu, walemterewa mnu, wechigamba, “Ichu nawaṟi ummbutie kyindo-kyi,
kyipfa nakundi mnu wandu waṙu na oe naleluwikyia sinagogi.”

Kyasia Yesu kayenda hamwi nawo. Na lyilya awei kufuhi na numba ya mchilyi ulya, mchilyi ulya naleṙuma mbuya yakye ko Yesu, kammbia, “Mndumii, maa ulakuwinishe, kyipfa inyi ngyiwaṟi iyoe uiṙe na numba koko-pfo.
Koikyo ngyilewona kyingyiwaṟi icha ngyimonyi na kopfo-pfo; kyaindi gamba ṙeṙo lyimwi tikyi, na mṟundi oko nechichia.
Cha kyipfa inyi nyi mndu ngyiwoṙe wuchilyi. Ngyiwoṙe asikari wanda yako; ngawia ichu ‘yenda’; na ichu ‘nnjo’ nekyecha; na kyisinga kyako, ‘wuta kuṙi’, kyekyewuta.”
Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho isho, naleṟiyio, kaindukyia wuingyi wulya wo wandu, kawia walya wawemwosha, “Ngammbia ngyilandewone iiṙikyia lying'anyi kuṙi, kunu Isiraelyi-pfo.”
Na walya waleṙumo kyiyeri walewuya na kanyi, wakakooya mṟundi ulya amchia.
Numa ya iho naleyenda mṟasa mṟi umwi okyelago Nain, na wanalosho wakye hamwi na wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukooshana na oe.
Na kyiyeri aletikyira kufuhi na moongo o mṟi, hawewoṙe mndu apfiie aweiṙoo nja, nyi kyimuumwi kya mndu mka umwi mkusu, na wandu wafoi wa mṟi ulya wawei hamwi na oe.
Kyiyeri Mndumii alemmbona nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kammbia, “Maa ulafiiṟe.”
Katikyira, kapaaya jeneza lyilya; walya wawelyiṙuṙe wakatirima. Kagamba, “Manakye, ngakuwia, amka.”
Ulya awepfiie kaamka, kaṙamia, kawooka iṙeṙa. Kamwenengyia wamae.
Wuowu wukowawaṙa woose, wakaṟumisha Ruwa, wechigamba, “Moonguo shisuku ang'anyi nacha na koṙu, na Ruwa naambuya wandu wakye.”
Mbonyi-tsi tsakye tsikaṙunganana Uyuda koose, na ngyuuruka tsoose tsa mṟasenyi.
Wanalosho wa Yohane wakamwendie mbonyi tsa isho shoose.
Naaho Yohane kalaga wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye, kawaṙuma ko Yesu, echiwesa, “Iyoe nyi ulya aicha, ang'u luweṙelyie ungyi?”
Nawo kyiyeri waleshika kokye, walegamba, “Yohane Mpatisi naluṙuma kopfo, echigamba, ‘Iyoe nyi ulya aicha, ang'u luweṙelyie ungyi?’ ”
Na kyiyeri kyilya kyilya nalekyiṟa wandu wafoi ndoṟe tsawo, na wawaolokyie nyi ngyuukyiwa, na waṟufui wawicho, na shipfupfuṟe shifoi shikaiṙima iwona.

Naaho-ng'u kagaluo, kawawia, “Yendenyi mundeongoya Yohane shilya mushiicho na ishiwona. Shipfupfuṟe shienengo iwona, shileeta shichumia, wawoṙo nyi taambo waiilyiṟo, wapfu maṙwi waiicho, wapfu waiṟutso, na wakyiwa waiongoyo Mbonyi Ngyicha.
Agusu orio mndu alammbihie kyipfa kyako.”
Kyasia wanalosho wa Yohane wamuyende, Yesu nalewooka iongoya wuingyi wo wandu mbonyi tsa Yohane, “Mulefuma iyenda nuka iambuya-pfo kyi? Unyatsi lochiṙeṙemsho nyi mkuma?
Kyaindi mulefuma indewona kyi? Mndu amṟikye nguwo tsa wusuṟi? Manyenyi kye wandu waṟee nguwo tsa wusuṟi wakyeri numbenyi tsa kyimangyi.
Kyaindi mulefuma indewona kyikyi? Nyi iwona moonguo shisuku? Yee loi ngammbia, na akyeri ang'anyi kuta moonguo shisuku.
Ichu nyi oe shiṟeio shilegamba,
‘Ngyiṙuma mndu oko
mbele ya ushangu lopfo,
echisungusia njia yapfo mbele yapfo.’ ”
“Inyi ngammbia, kyiiṙi kya walya wawafee nyi waka kuwoṙe ang'anyi kuta Yohane Mpatisi-pfo. Kyaindi akyeri mtutu Wumangyinyi wo Ruwewu nang'anyi kuta oe.”
Wandu woose na wesania ukamba kyiyeri waleicho isho, waleṟingyishia loi ya Ruwa kyipfa walepatiso wupatiso wo Yohane.
Kyaindi Mafarisayo na walosha wa mawawaso, walelega iwuta kyilya Ruwa awekundi wawute, kyipfa wawewapatise nyi Yohane-pfo.
Mndumii kagamba, “Ngyilyingatsane na kyikyi wandu wa rika-lyi? Nyi kyikyi kyikyeri chawo?
Wakyeri cha wana waṙamie sangaṙa na ilagana, wechigamba, ‘Lulekapa mtoṟiṟo maa muleshina-pfo. Lulekapa ṟanyi, maa mulefiiṟa-pfo.’
Kyipfa Yohane Mpatisi nalecha alailya mkate maa alainyo mpfinyo, na nyoe mukogamba, nawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho.
Mana o Adamu nalecha echilya na inyo; na nyoe mukogamba, ichu nawoṙe ndewu, na nekyenyo mpfinyo, mbuya ya wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi.
Na wuṟango wo Ruwa womanyika kye wuwoṙe wuloi ko wana wakye woose.”
Mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya Mafarisayo nalemlaga nalye kyelya kanyi kokye. Kaiṙa na numba ko Mfarisayo ulya, kaṙamia ilya kyelya.
Na mndu mka umwi o mṟi ulya, awei mnyamaṟi, kyiyeri aleicho kye naṙamie numba ko Mfarisayo ulya, naleende kyimkyepe kyiwewoṙe mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha.
Kagoṟoka numa kufuhi na maṙende gakye, echifiiṟa, kawooka itonyitsia Yesu mcheṟeṟe maṙendenyi gakye, na imwanguo kui njui tsakye echimkomba-komba maṙende na imshia mafuṙa galya.
Kyasia, Mfarisayo ulya alemlaga ammbone kuṙo, nalegamba mrimenyi kokye, mndu-chu kokooya awei moonguo shisuku, naweimanya mndu mka-chu aimpaaya nyi wui, na oe nyi o mbaṟe iha, kye nyi mnyamaṟi.
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Simion, ngiwoṙe kyindo ngikundi ikuwia.” Kagamba, “Mlosha, gamba.”
Kagamba, “Mndu umwi ekyeakuya nawewoṙe wasile wawi, umwi naweriko dinari magana gataanu, na o kawi makumi gataanu.
Nawo kyiyeri walawewoṙe kyemtaa nalewahooṟia woose wewawi. Kyiiṙi kya iwo wawi nyi wui emkunda ngoseṟa?”
Simion kagaluo kagamba, “Ngakusaṟa nyi ulya alemhooṟia tsifoi.” Kammbia, “Nogaluo necha.”

Kagalukyia mndu mka ulya kawia Simion, “Uwonyi mndu mka-chu? Ngyileiṙa na kanyi kopfo, ulengyienenga mṟinga o sanja maṙende gako-pfo; indi ichu naitonyitsia mcheṟeṟe maṙende gako na ianguo maṙende gako kui njui tsakye.
Iyoe ongyikomba-pfo; kyaindi ichu wookyia ngashika iha aṙa ingyikomba maṙende gako-pfo.
Oshia mṙoe oko mafuṙa-pfo; indi ichu nashia maṙende gako mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngakuwia, nahooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsakye tsifoi, kyipfa nakunda mnu, kyaindi ulya ahooṟio kyitutu, icho nekyekunda kyitutu.”
Naaho kawia mndu mka ulya, “Nohooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo.”
Nyi lyo-ng'u walya waweilya hamwi na oe walewooka ikusaṟa mrimenyi kowo, “Nyi wui ichu tane ahooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi?”
Kawia mndu mka ulya, “Iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa. Yenda na ufoṟo.”
Kyikawa-ng'u numa ya iho naweitenga-tenga mṟinyi na shikaṟonyi echionguo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na walya ikumi na wawi wawei hamwi na oe.
Na waka waata wawewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho na ndoṟe wakakyiṟo; nawo nyi Maria ekyelago Makyidalena, alewuto waṟufui wawicho mfungaaṙe,
na Yoana, mka o Kusa, mṟundi mṟango o Herode, na Susana, na wengyi wafoi, wawemṟundia kui masaa gawo.
Kyiyeri wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wulekuumbia na wandu walya walewuka orio mṟi wechicha na kokye, nalewawia kui mfano,
“Moolyia mbeu nalefuma indewaaya mbeu tsakye. Na oe kyiyeri aweiwaaya, tsingyi tsileoloka kufuhi na njia, tsikachumo-chumo, na shileye sha ngyinenyi shikatsilya.
Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe iṟaṟa; kyiyeri tsilewooka iṙo tsikauma ko iuṟa teri ngyicha.
Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe msha, na msha iya ikaṙo hamwi natso ikatsiilama.
Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha; tsikaṙo, tsikakumbia orio imwi igana.” Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa isho naleṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi echigamba, “Awoṙe maṙwi geaṙanyia naaṙanyie.”
Wanalosho wakye wakammbesa kyimaṙuma kya mfano-cho.
Kagamba, “Nyoe muwaenengye imanya shiṟika sha Wumangyi wo Ruwa; indi wengyi nyi kui mfano, kundu wakaambuya walawone, na wakaicho walamanye.
Na mfano-cho kyitambuluo kyacho nyi ikyi, mbeu nyi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Walya wa kufuhi na njia nyi walya wekyeicho, numa Satana nekyecha karakuo Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa mrimenyi kowo, walacheiṙikyia na ikyia.
Na walya wa iṟaṟenyi nyi walya wekyeicho na iambilyia Ṙeṙo-lyo lya Ruwa kui sia; nawo wawoṙe mri-pfo. Wekyeiṙikyia kyiyeri kyifuhi, na kyiyeri kya iyesho wekyewuya na numa.
Na tsileoloka mshenyi, nyi walya waleicho na kyiiṙi kya iyenda wakailamo nyi wulembi wo masaa, na ichihiyo lya wuyana, walakumbie ndunda ngyicha.
Na tsilya tsa terinyi ngyicha nyi walya wekyeicho na iambilyia Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa mrimenyi kowo na kui iindia wekyelyiaṙanyia na ilyiwaṙa, numa wekyekumbia ndunda wechikarishia.”
“Kuwoṙe mndu ekyekoṟa taa na iishikyia na kyindo numa kaiwikyia handu hakuṟiikyie-pfo, indi nekyeiwikyia handu hakuirie, kundu ilyimikyie woose wechiiṙa na ipfo numba.
Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyishikyie maa kyikuṟiikyie kyilechimanyika-pfo.
Ambuyenyi-ng'u chandu muiaṙanyia, kyipfa awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na ulya alawoṙe kyindo nechisoko maa kyilya kyitutu awoṙe.”
Wamae na wana wa wamae wakayenda kokye, walaiṙime ishika kufuhi na oe kyipfa kya wuingyi wo wandu.
Kaendio mbonyi, echiwio, “Womoo na wana wa womoo wagoṟokyi nja wakundi ikuwona.”
Kagaluo, kawawia, “Wama oko na wana wa wama wako nyi iwo waiaṙanyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na iosha kyilya lyikundi.”
Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri kyimwi kyiiṙi kya mfiri iya naleṙooya ngalawenyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Luambaṙe mṟasa molyolya o nduwa.” Wakayenda.
Nawo kyiyeri waweiyenda, oe nalelaa maṙoe. Kukocha kyiwiṟi kulya nduwenyi, kyikashikyia ngalawa iya, ikawooka iichuo mṟinga, wakawa ndengyenyi.
Wakayenda kokye wakamwamtsa, wechigamba, “Mndumii, ung'anyi, Mndumii ung'anyi, luisia.” Kaamka, kaṙeṙia kyiwiṟi na mṟinga ulya o nduwa shikatsia sau, kukowaṙa itsia lying'anyi.
Kawawia, “Lyookwi iiṙikyia lyanyu?” Wakaowuo, wakatandiṟi, wechigamba wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Ichu nyi wui aṙeṙia shiwiṟi na mṟinga, nasho shikamwaṙanyia?”
Wakashika mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya uruka lo Wakyerasi, iambuyana na Galyilaya.
Na oe kyiyeri alesoka ngalawenyi, nalekarisana na mndu awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho; alawendeṟae nguwo mfiri ifoi, maa awekyekaa kanyi-pfo, indi kundu awekyelaa nyi kundu kuwekuṟikye wandu wapfiie.
Na kyiyeri alewona Yesu nalekalagatsa na ioloka wanda mbele yakye na iṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Ngyiwoṙe kyikyi na iyoe, Yesu, Mana o Ruwa ai wuye? Ngyikuterewa ulangyituure.”

Kyipfa nalekoaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho nawukye mndu ulya. Kyipfa nawekyemmbaṙa kyiyeri kyifoi, mṟasa kawamoringo kyipfungonyi, echipfungo na mshe na ngowa; kaṙumbuo shipfungo shilya, kaṟichiṟo nyi mṟufui ulya mmbicho mṟasa nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.
Yesu kammbesa, “Rina lyapfo nyi wui?” Kagamba, “Rina lyako nyi ulyimalyi.” Kyipfa waṟufui wawicho wafoi wawemmboṙe.
Wakamterewa kawawuta alawafune wayende ṟungunyi.
Kyasia, iho hawewoṙe poo lya nguwe tsifoi tsiweilyiso fumvunyi, wakamterewa nawaenengye momu waiṙe na kulya nguwenyi. Kawaiṙikyia.
Waṟufui walya wawicho wakawuka mndu ulya wakaiṙa na kulya nguwenyi, na poo lyilya lyikaiṟimika iwinyi, tsikasokyia nduwenyi, tsikapfiia mṟingyenyi.
Kyiyeri walyisi walewona kyindo kyilewutika, waleṙicha, wakaonguo mbonyi-tso mṟinyi na handu hengyi hoose.
Wandu wakafuma indewona ikyo kyilewutika, wakayenda ko Yesu, wakawona mndu ulya alewuto waṟufui wawicho aṙamie maṙendenyi ga Yesu, aṟee nguwo na makusaṟo gakye gai mecha, wakaowuo.
Walya walekowammbona waleonguo chandu ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho alekyiṟo.
Na wandu wa uruka lo Wakyerasi lui mbai ya halya walemterewa nawukye kowo, kyipfa walewoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi. Kyasia na oe kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kawuya.
Na mndu ulya alewuto waṟufui wawicho nalemterewa naoshane na oe; kyaindi oe nalesamana na oe echigamba,
“Wuya na kanyi kopfo; undeonguo maṟiyisho Ruwa alekuwutia.” Kayenda echionguo kulya mṟinyi koose, maṟiyisho gang'anyi Yesu alemmbutia.
Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alewuya wuingyi wo wandu wulemwambilyia kui sia, kyipfa waweimmbeṙelyia woose.
Na mndu umwi ekyelago Yairo kacha, na oe nawei ang'anyi o sinagogi. Kaoloka maṙendenyi ga Yesu, kamterewa naiṙe na kanyi kokye;
kyipfa mana okye o kyika nawei kufuhi na ipfa, na nyi mana kyimuumwi kokye, awewoṙe cha maka ikumi na iwi. Na kyiyeri aweiyenda wuingyi wo wandu wulemwiṟiwia.
Na mndu mka umwi, awekyechoṟa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na iwi, [alekoammbuta masaa gakye goose echienenga waanga] alaiṙime ikyiṟo nyi mndu oose,
nalekaa kyanuma ko Yesu kapaaya ikyechu lya iwale lyakye; na cha ilyi ichoṟa lyakye lyikaṙumbuka.
Yesu kagamba, “Nyi wui angyipaaya?” Kyasia kyiyeri wandu woose wamlege, Petiro nalemmbia, “Mndumii ang'anyi, wuingyi-wu wo wandu wukuiṟiwie na ikupeṟeetsa.”
Yesu kagamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu angyipaaya, kyipfa ngyikuichuoe pfinya tsangyiwuka.”
Mka ulya ammbone kye echiiṙima ikuṟiika-pfo, kacha eṙeṙema, kaoloka mbele yakye, kamwongoya mbele ya wandu woose, kyimaṙuma kya impaaya, na chandu alewekyiṟo cha ilyi.
Kammbia, “Mana, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa. Yenda na ufoṟo.”
Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa isho, kukocha mndu awuka kanyi ko ulya ang'anyi o sinagogi, kammbia, “Mana opfo ampfa; maa ulawinishe mlosha.”
Kyaindi lyilya Yesu aleicho isho, nalemgaluo, “Maa ulaowuoe. Iṙikyia tupu, na oe nechichia.”
Kyiyeri aleshika kanyi ko ulya ang'anyi o sinagogi alelekyia mndu iiṙa na kulya numba sile nyi Petiro, Yohane, Yakobo, na awu o mana ulya na wamae-pfo.
Na wandu woose wawefiiṟa na ikapa ṟanyi. Kawawia, “Maa mulafiiṟe, ichu apfa-pfo, indi nalaa maṙoe tupu.”
Wakamseka mnu, kyipfa walemanya kye awempfa.
Kammbaṙa kuwoko, kaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Mana, goṟoka.”
Moo okye ukommbiyilyia na oe cha ilyi kagoṟoka. Kagamba naenengo kyelya.
Wafee wakye wakaṟiyio mnu, kyaindi kawaima walawie mndu kyindo kyilewutika.
Yesu kalaga walya ikumi na wawi kawaenenga wuiṙimi na pfinya yechilyia waṟufui woose wawicho na ikyiṟa ndoṟe.
Kawaṙuma waonguo Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na ikyiṟa waluoe.
Kawawia, “Mulaṙuo kyindo ilyi moyenda kyaro, upoi maa kyikuchu, maa mkate, maa heleri; maa umwi onyu alaṙuo kanzu tsiwi.
Na orio numba mochiiṙa napfo kaenyi pfo mṟasa kyiyeri mochiwuka pfo iyenda mṟi ungyi.
Na walya walechimuambilyia, ilyi mochiwuka ipfo mṟinyi, kute-kutenyi kyilulyi kyikyeri maṙendenyi ganyu, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
Wakayenda wakatenga-tenga shikaṟonyi, wechionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, na ikyiṟa wandu handu hoose.
Na Mangyi Herode kaicho mbonyi tsa isho shoose shilewutika, kaiṟewe mnu kyipfa wandu wengyi walegamba kye Yohane naṟuka ko wapfu;
na wengyi kye nyi Elyiya awoneka, na wengyi kye nyi umwi o weonguo shisuku wa kacha aṟuka.
Kyaindi Herode kagamba, “Yohane ngyilemṙumbuo mṙoe, kyasia nyi wui ichu ngyiichuoe mbonyi-tsi tsake?” Kakunda immbona.
Kyasia kyiyeri wasu walya walewuya walemwongoya mbonyi tsoose tsilewutika; kawaṙuo kayenda nawo handu hakuṟiikyie mṟasa mṟi umwi okyelago Betisaida.
Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wulemanya, wulemwosha, kawaambilyia, kawamoṙeṙa nawo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, kakyiṟa walya wawelangyie ikyiṟo.

Na mnengyeṟi ukowooka iolokyia, walya ikumi na wawi wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Samana na wuingyi-wu wo wandu kundu wayende shikaṟo sha mṟasenyi na iha, wawone handu helaa na shelya kyipfa iha handu lukyeri nyi nuka mreesi.”
Kawawia, “Waenengyenyi kyelya.” Wakagamba, “Luwoṙe kyindo kya ngoseṟa sile nyi mkate itanu na makunga gawi-pfo; ang'u lundewuṟa shelya ko wandu-wa woose.”
Kyipfa wasoṟo wawekyeri ho wawei cha shiku shitaanu. Kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ṟamiṟenyi wandu kui nzengye, orio nzengye wandu makumi gataanu.”
Wakawuta kuṙo, wakawaṟamiṟa woose.
Kawuta mkate iya itanu na makunga galya gawi, kaambuya wuye ruwewu kashiwikyia mboṟa, kapeṟenguo, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye kundu wagawie wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
