Ilya-ngama kawona Yesu echicha na kokye, kagamba, “Aikyi Kyiondo kya Ruwa, kyechiwuta ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wuyana!
Ichu nyi oe ngyileṙeṙa mbonyi tsakye kye, ‘Kuicha mndu numa yako, alengyisongoya; kyipfa nawekyeri pfo ngyilafeo.’
Maa inyi ngyiwemwichi-pfo; kyaindi kundu naṟingyishio ko wandu wa Isiraelyi inyi ngyilecha ngyechipatisa kui mṟinga.”
Lyingyi-se Yohane kaṟingyishia, echigamba, “Ngyilewona Mumuyo echisoka cha mbeta awuka ruwewu; na oe kaṙamia wuye yakye.
Maa inyi ngyilemmanya-pfo; kyaindi oe alengyiṙuma ipatisa kui mṟinga nalengyiwia, ‘Ulya ochiwona Mumuyo echisoka na iṙamia wuye yakye, icho nyi oe ekyepatisa kui Mumuyo Mweele.’
Na inyi ngammbona, lyingyi-se ngaṟingyishia kye ichu nyi Mana o Ruwa.”
Ilya-ngama-se Yohane nawegoṟokyi hamwi na wanalosho wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye.
Kaambuya Yesu echumia, kagamba, “Aikyi Kyiondo kya Ruwa!”
Wanalosho walya wawi wakaicho eṙeṙa wakayenda halya-ndu Yesu awekyeri.
Yesu kainduka, kawawona wechicha na kokye, kawawia, “Muipfula kyi?” Wakammbia, “Rabi (kyimwi na igamba, Mlosha), nyi kwi okyekaa?”
Kawawia, “Nnjonyi, na nyoe mowona.” Wakayenda, wakawona handu ekyekaa, wakakaa kokye mfiri ulya. Na nyi-we cha kyiyeri kya saa kumi.
Anderea, mono-wama o Simion Petiro, nawei umwi o wanalosho walya wawi waleicho ulogo lo Yohane na iosha Yesu.
Icho nalewona Simion kuwooka mono-wama okye oe amonyi, kammbia, “Lommbona Mesia.” (Kyimwi na igamba, Kristo).
Kamṙuo ko Yesu. Na Yesu kamwambuya, kammbia, “Iyoe nyi Simion, mana o Yohane; na iyoe nochilago Kyefa (kyimwi na igamba Petiro ang'u Igoe)”
Ilya-ngama nawekundi iyenda Galyilaya, na oe kawona Filyipo. Yesu kammbia, “Ngyiosha.”
Na Filyipo nawekyeri mndu awukyie Betisaida, mṟi Anderea na Filyipo wawekyekaa.
Filyipo kawona Natanaelyi kammbia, “Lommbona ulya mbonyi tsakye tsingyiṟeie mawawasonyi ga Mose na weonguo shisuku, Yesu mana o Yosefu, mndu o Nasareti.”
Natanaelyi kammbia, “Kyindo kyicha kyeiṙima iwuka Nasareti?” Filyipo kammbia, “Nnjo uwone.”
Kyasia Yesu kawona Natanaelyi echicha na kokye, kaonguo mbonyi tsakye, “Aichu Muisiraelyi loi loi, awoṙe ngyeṟo maa ale-pfo.”
Natanaelyi kammbia, “Noiṙima kuṙa ingyimanya?” Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyiyeri Filyipo alandekulage ukyeri halya wanda ya mfumu ngyilekuwona.”
Natanaelyi kamgaluo, kagamba, “Rabi, iyoe nyi Mana o Ruwa, nyi oe mangyi o Isiraelyi.”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyipfa ngyilekuwia, ngyilekuwona wanda ya mfumu, noiṙikyia? Nochiwona shindo shing'anyi kuta ishi.”
Kammbia, “Loi, loi ngammbia, mochiwona mapuchi geseia na malaika wa Ruwa wechiṙooya na isokyia wuye ya Mana o Adamu.”
Na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu kuwewoṙe wolyi kulya Kana, mṟi o Galyilaya; na mama o Yesu nawekyeri ho.
Na Yesu nalekoalago na wolyinyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
Na kyiyeri mpfinyo uleṙumbukyia, mama o Yesu kammbia, “Wawoṙe mpfinyo-pfo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Mama, ny' kyikyi luwoṙe inyi na iyoe? Kyiyeri kyako kyilandeshikye-pfo.”
Wamae kawia waṟundi, “Kyindo kyoose echimmbia, wutenyi.”
Kyasia kuwewoṙe shigondi shiṟandaaṟu sha magoe, shiweshiwikye pfo kui muichiwie o Wayuda o samba kyimṟumoe, orio kyimwi kyiwoṙe cha madewe gaṟaaṟu.
Yesu kawawia, “Ichuṟenyi shigondi-shi mṟinga.” Nawo wakashiichuṟa pacha.
Kawawia, “Wulalu ṙahienyi, muṙooye monyi kyila.” Wakaṙuo.
Na kyiyeri monyi kyila aleria mṟinga ulya ulewa mpfinyo, (maa alamanye kundu ulecha kyaindi waṟundi waweichi, walya waleṙahia mṟinga-cho) nalelaga monyi wolyi,
kammbia, “Orio mndu mawookyionyi nekyeṟeyeṟa mpfinyo mcha; na wandu wakamnyo nakamwi nekyeende mpfinyo umwipale. Iyoe nokooma mpfinyo mcha mṟasa wulalu.”
Kyindo-kyi kya kuwooka kya kyiṟiyisho Yesu nalekyiwuta kulya Kana ya Galyilaya, kaṟingyishia mng'ano okye, na wanalosho wakye wakamwiṙikyia.
Numa ya isho kasoka mṟasa Kaperinaumu, oe na wamae na wana wa wamae na wanalosho wakye; wakakaa pfo mfiri ngyaangu.
Na Pasaka ya Wayuda iwekyeri kufuhi; na Yesu kaṙo mṟasa Yerusalemu.
Kawona halya hekalunyi wandu waweikumba umbe na moondo na mbeta, na weilacha heleri waṙamie.
Kaachikyia msharite, kawafuna woose kulya hekalunyi, na moondo na umbe; kaola-ola heleri tsa weilacha heleri, kapfuluo mesa tsawo;
kawia walya waweikumba mbeta, “Wutenyi ishi iha. Mulagaluo numba ya Awu oko iwa numba ya mbucha.”
Wanalosho wakye wakakumbuo kye kyikyiṟeie, “Ikunda lyako ko mbonyi tsapfo lyechingyirumatsa.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakagaluo wakammbia, “Nyi kyiṟingyishio kyiha ululoṟa kye nuiwuta ishi?”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Unduonyi hekalu-lyi na inyi ngyelyiwika mfirinyi iṟaṟu.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakagamba, “Hekalu-lyi lyilewiko kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana na iṟandaaṟu, na iyoe nochilyiwika mfirinyi iṟaṟu?”
Kyaindi oe naleonguo mbonyi tsa hekalu lya mmbiu okye.
Koikyo kyiyeri aleṟuka ko wapfu, wanalosho wakye wakakumbuo kye nalegamba kuṙo, wakaiṙikyia kyiṟeio na kyindo kyilya Yesu alekyionguo.
Na kyiyeri awekyeri Yerusalemu kyiyeri kya Pasaka wandu wafoi waleiṙikyia rina lyakye, kyiyeri walewona shiṟiyisho alewuta.
Kyaindi Yesu alewaiṙikyia-pfo kyipfa nalemanya kyikyeri mrimenyi kowo;
kyipfa kuwewoṙe kyimaṙuma kya mndu iṟingyishia mbonyi tsa mndu-pfo; kyipfa oe amonyi nalemanya shikyeri mrimenyi ko mndu.
Kuwewoṙe mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya Mafarisayo ekyelago Nikodemo, awei msongoru o Wayuda.

Mndu-cho nalecha na ko Yesu kyio, kammbia, “Rabi, luichi kye iyoe nyi mlosha uwukyie ko Ruwa; cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iwuta shiṟiyisho-shi uiwuta iyoe-pfo, sile kokooya Ruwa nakyeri na mndu-cho.”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, mndu alandefeo lya kawi echiiṙima iwona Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.”
Nikodemo kammbia, “Mndu neiṙima kuṙa ifeo amku? Neiṙima iwuya na wosinyi ko wamae nafeo-se lya kawi?”
Yesu kamgaluo, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, mndu alandefeo kui mṟinga na Mumuyo echiiṙima iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
Kyikyifee nyi mmbiu nyi mmbiu; na kyikyifee kui Mumuyo nyi mumuyo.
Ulaṟiyio kyipfa ngakuwia, kyikuwaṟi ifeo lya kawi.
Mkuma okyekuma handu ukundi, na ṟui lya mkuma-cho nokyelyiicho, kyaindi uichi kundu owuka ang'u uiyenda-pfo. Na wuṙo mbonyi tsa orio mndu afeo kui Mumuyo.”
Nikodemo kagaluo, kammbia, “Mbonyi-tsi tseiṙimika kuṙa?”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nyi mlosha o Isiraelyi na mbonyi-tsi utsiichi-pfo?
Ny'kyaloi ngakuwia kye, kyilya lukyiichi lukyionguo, na kyilya lulekyiwona lukyiṟingyishia. Kyaindi maa wuṟingyishi woṙu muwuiṙikyia-pfo.
Kokooya ngamuongoya mbonyi tsa wuyanenyi mulaiṙikyie, moiṙikyia kuṙa ngamuongoya mbonyi tsa ruwewu?
Maa kuwoṙe mndu alemṙo na ruwewu sile Mana o Adamu ulya alesoka iwuka ruwewu-pfo.”
“Na chandu Mose aleira njoka iya kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, na wuṙo Mana o Adamu awaṟi iiro;
kundu orio mndu aiṙikyie nawaṙe moo o mlungana kui oe.
Cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo Ruwa alekunda wuyana, katana awuta Mana okye kyimuumwi, kundu orio mndu amwiṙikyie alaṙekye, indi nawaṙe moo o mlungana.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa aleṙuma Mana wuyanenyi kundu naanduye wuyana-pfo, indi wuyana wukyiṟo kui oe.
Amwiṙikyie oe echianduyo-pfo; alaiṙikyie amwanduyo; cha kyipfa aiṙikyia rina lya Mana kyimuumwi o Ruwa-pfo.
Na ilyi nyilyo ianduyo; kye ngyeela ilecha na wuyanenyi, na wandu wakakunda meema kuta ngyeela; kyipfa mawuto gawo gawemawicho.
Kyipfa orio mndu ekyewuta shindo shiwicho nasuuye ngyeela, maa ekyecha na ngyeelenyi-pfo, mawuto gakye galachemanyika naṟoṟomo.
Indi ulya ekyewuta kyindo kya loi nekyecha na ngyeelenyi, kundu mawuto gakye gawono na pata kye gawuto kui Ruwa.”
Numa ya isho Yesu na wanalosho wakye waleyenda mṟasa uruka lo Uyuda; katsinda pfo hamwi nawo, echipatisa.
Yohane na oe naweipatisa ipfo Ainon, kufuhi na Salyimu, kyipfa ipfo kuwewoṙe mṟinga ushikyie; na wandu wakayenda kokye, wakapatiso.
Cha kyipfa Yohane alekoawiko kyipfungonyi-pfo.
Kyasia wanalosho wa Yohane wakagaluana na Myuda umwi kya mbonyi tsa isanjo mrima.
Wakayenda ko Yohane, wakammbia, “Rabi, ulya awekyeri hamwi na iyoe molyolya o Yoridan, ulya uleṟingyishia mbonyi tsakye, naipatisa, na wandu woose waiyenda kokye.”
Yohane kagaluo, kagamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu echiiṙima imanya kyindo kyoose sile Ruwa amwenenga wuiṙimi-pfo.
Nyoe mungyiṟingyishia kye ngyilegamba ‘Inyi chi oe Kristo-pfo, indi ngileṙiko oe alacha.’
Ulya awoṙe mono-kyika ailayiko nyi monyi wolyi; kyaindi mbuya ya monyi wolyi, ulya ekyegoṟoka na imwaṙanyia, nekyechihiyo kyipfa kya ṟui lya monyi wolyi. Kyasia sia yako yaafukyia.
Kyiwaṟi oe iwaṙa kyiṟumi kying'anyi na kyako ititia.”
“Ulya acha awuka wuye, icho nakyeri wuye ya shoose. Ulya akyeri o wuyana, kanyi kokye nyi wuyanenyi, na oe nekyeṙeṙa shindo sha wuyanenyi. Ulya aicha awuka ruwewu nakyeri wuye ya shoose.
Shilya aleshiwona na ishiicho nyisho aiṟingyishia, kyaindi maa kuwoṙe mndu aiiṙikyia wuṟingyishi wokye-pfo.
Ulya aleiṙikyia wuṟingyishi wokye naloṟa na pata kye Ruwa nyi loi.
Cha kyipfa ulya amṙume nyi Ruwa nekyeonguo mbonyi tsa Ruwa; cha kyipfa ekyeenengyia Mumuyo kui iehia-pfo.
Awu nakundi Mana, na oe nawikyie shoose mawokonyi gakye.
Aiṙikyie Mana nawoṙe moo o mlungana; alaiṙikyie Mana echiwona moo-pfo, indi nyashi ya Ruwa yechimwolokyia.”
Kyiyeri Mndumii alemanya kye Mafarisayo wamuicho kye Yesu naigalutsia wandu wafoi ura lokye na iwapatisa kuta Yohane,
(kyaindi Yesu alepatisa-pfo, indi wanalosho wakye),
nalewuka Uyuda, kayenda-se mṟasa Galyilaya.
Na oe kyiwemmbaṟi naiṙe kyiiṙi kya Samaria.
Kyasia kashika mṟinyi o Samaria, okyelago Sikari, kufuhi na ṙema lyilya Yakobo alekoaenenga Yosefu mono-kye.
Na iho hawewoṙe kyisima kya Yakobo. Kyasia Yesu, kyipfa kyaro kyilekokyamwenenga iwina, kaṙamia halya kyisimenyi. Na nyi-we cha saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto.
Mndu mka o kyisamaria kacheṙahia mṟinga. Yesu kammbia, “Ngyienenga mṟinga ngyinyo.”
Cha kyipfa wanalosho wakye waweiyenda mṟinyi iguṟa kyelya.
Kyasia mndu mka ulya o Kyisamaria kammbia, “Kyawa kuṙa iyoe Myuda iterewa mṟinga koko na inyi nyi mndu mka o Kyisamaria?” (Kyipfa Wayuda na Wasamaria wekyekaa handu hamwi-pfo).
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kokooya uweichi kyindo Ruwa ekyeenengyia, na nyi wui aikuwia ‘Ngyienenga mṟinga ngyinyo’, nuwechimterewa oe, na oe nawechikuenenga mṟinga uwoṙe moo.”
Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, uwoṙe kyindo kyeṙahia-pfo, na kyisima kyikyileshi. Nyi kwi owona mṟinga-cho uwoṙe moo?
Ngyesa iyoe nung'anyi kuta awu oṙu, Yakobo, aleluenenga kyisima-kyi, na oe kanyo pfo mṟinga, na wana wakye taa, na shima shakye?”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Orio mndu anyo mṟinga-chu nechiwoṙo-se nyi nyoṙa;
kyaindi orio mndu echinyo mṟinga ulya ngyechimwenenga inyi echiwoṙo nyoṙa nyi mṟasa mlungana-pfo. Indi mṟinga ulya ngyechimwenenga ochiwa shoka ya mṟinga ochimwenenga moo o mlungana.”
Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyienenga mṟinga-cho, ngyilawoṙo nyi nyoṙa, maa ngyilache-se iṙahia iha.”
Yesu kammbia, “Yenda undelaga mii opfo, uche na oe na iha.”
Mndu mka ulya kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyiwoṙe mii-pfo.” Yesu kammbia, “Nogamba necha, ‘Ngyiwoṙe mii-pfo’;
kyipfa ulemkaa na wasoṟo wataanu, na ulya ukyeri na oe wulalu chi mii opfo-pfo. Iho nogamba loi.”
Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyiwonyi kye nui moonguo shisuku!
Waku waṙu waleindia Ruwa iha fumvunyi, na nyoe mokyegamba kye ipfo Yerusalemu nyi handu luwaṟi iindia pfo Ruwa.”
Yesu kammbia, “Mama, ngyiiṙikyia. Kyiyeri kyiicha mulechiiṙima iindia Ruwa iha fumvunyi, maa kulya Yerusalemu.
Nyoe muindia kyindo mulakyiichi; soe luindia kyindo lukyiichi; cha kyipfa wukyiṟo wuwukyie ko Wayuda.
Kyaindi kyiyeri kyiicha, na wulalu kyikyeri ho, wandu wechiindia necha Awu mumuyonyi na wuloinyi. Cha kyipfa Awu naipfula wandu cha iwo wamwindie.
Ruwa nyi Mumuyo na iwo wekyemwindia kyiwawaṟi imwindia mumuyonyi na wuloinyi.”
Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Ngyiichi kye Mesia naicha (ekyelago Kristo); na oe ilyi echicha, nechilutambuluya shindo shoose.”
Yesu kammbia, “Inyi ngyiṙeṙa na iyoe nyi oe.”
Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya wanalosho wakye wakacha, wakaṟiyio kyipfa naweiṙeṙa na mndu mka; kyaindi kuwoṙe alegamba, “Nuipfula kyi?” Ang'u “Ny'kyilyi uiṙeṙa na oe-pfo?”
Kyasia mndu mka ulya kaṙa kyitongoṟima kyilya kyakye, kayenda mṟinyi, kawia wandu,
“Nnjonyi muwone mndu angyiwia shindo shoose ngyilewuta. Ngyesa ichu chi oe Kristo-pfoe?”
Kyasia wandu wakawuka mṟinyi wakayenda ko Yesu.
Kyiyeri-kyo ikyo wanalosho wakye walemterewa, wechigamba, “Rabi, lya kyelya.”
Kawawia, “Inyi ngyiwoṙe kyelya mulakyiichi nyoe.”
Kyasia wanalosho wakye wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Ngyesa kuwoṙe mndu amwendie kyelya?”
Yesu kawawia, “Kyelya kyako ny'kyo ikyi, ngyiwute shilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi, ngyiafutsie iṟunda lyakye.
Ngyesa mokyegamba, ‘Hatsugai mori ina kyiyeri kyesambuo kyishikye-pfoe?’ Inyi ngammbia, kye maṙema gamshika kyiyeri kyesambuo.
Na ulya mosambuo nekyeambilyia wori, na isania shilyimu kyipfa kya moo o mlungana; kundu ulya ekyewaaya na ulya ekyesambuo waiṙime ichihiyo handu hamwi.
Cha kyipfa iho ṙeṙo-lyo lyekyewa loi, ‘Umwi nekyewaaya ungyi kasambuo.’
Inyi ngyilemṙuma musambuo shilya mulaleshiwinia. Wengyi walewina, nyoe mowona kyiira kyipfa waleṟunda kui wuragari.”
Na kulya mṟinyi Wasamaria wafoi walemwiṙikyia kyipfa kya ulogo lo mndu mka ulya, aleṟingyishia kye, “Nalengyiwia shindo shoose ngyilewuta.”
Kyasia Wasamaria walya kyiyeri waleyenda kokye, wakamterewa nakae kowo; na oe kakaa pfo mfiri iwi.
Wandu wafoi ngoseṟa wakawaṙa iiṙikyia kyipfa kya ulogo lokye.
Wakawia mndu mka ulya, “Wulalu loiṙikyia, maa chi kyipfa kya maṙeṙo gapfo tupu-pfo, maa soe loicho luwenyi. Lyingyi-se luichi kye kyaloi ichu nyi oe Mkyiṟa o wuyana.”
Na numa ya mfiri iya iwi nalewuka pfo, kayenda Galyilaya.
Cha kyipfa Yesu amonyi naleṟingyishia kye moonguo shisuku nekyeindio kundu koose sile kulya urukyenyi kokye.

Kyasia kyiyeri aleshika Galyilaya, Wagalyilaya walemwambilyia; cha kyipfa walewona shindo shoose alewuta ipfo Yerusalemu kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi; kyipfa Wagalyilaya-wo walekowayenda Yerusalemu kyipfa kya mṟumoe o Pasaka.
Kyasia naleshika-se Kana ya Galyilaya, halya-ndu alekoagaluo mṟinga ukowa mpfinyo. Na kuwewoṙe mchilyi umwi mono-kye aweluoe kulya Kaperinaumu.
Mchilyi-cho kyiyeri aleicho kye Yesu nacha awuka uruka lo Uyuda mṟasa Galyilaya, naleyenda kokye, kamterewa nandekyiṟa mono-kye; kyipfa nawekyeri kufuhi na ipfa.
Kyasia Yesu kammbia, “Mulandewone shiṟiyisho na ṟigo tsifoi maa ale-pfoe?”
Mchilyi ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, nnjo mono-ko alapfa.”
Yesu kammbia, “Yenda; mono-pfo nai na moo.” Mndu ulya kaiṙikyia kyindo kyilya alewio nyi Yesu, na oe kayenda.
Na kyiyeri aweiyenda, masinga gakye gakamwambilyia, gechigamba kye mono-kye nai na moo.
Kyasia kawawesa mbonyi tsa saa alewooka iwa ungyi-ungyi; nawo wakammbia, “Ukou, saa mfungaaṙe, isemu lyilemleka.”
Kyasia awuye kamanya kye nyi saa iya iya Yesu alemmbia, “Mono-pfo nai na moo.” Kaiṙikyia oe na woose wa kanyi kokye.
Ikyo nyi kyiṟiyisho kya kawi Yesu alekyiwuta, kyiyeri alekoawuka uruka lo Uyuda ishika Galyilaya.
Numa ya isho, Yesu kayenda Yerusalemu mṟumoenyi o Wayuda.
Na ipfo Yerusalemu kufuhi na moongo o moondo hawewoṙe iruwa lya mṟinga, lyekyelago Betisata ko mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, nalyo lyiwewoṙe mbuo tsitaanu.
Ipfo mbuonyi kuwewoṙe wandu wafoi mnu waluoe wawelee pfo, shipfupfuṟe, shiwete, na wapfiie ngapfu, [wechiweṙa mṟinga uchemkye.

Cha kyipfa kuwewoṙe kyiyeri malaika ekyesoka awuka ruwewu, kaiṙa na kulya iruwenyi lya mṟinga kapaaya na ifoga mṟinga ulya. Kyasia ulya echiwa o kuwooka iiṙa napfo numa ya mṟinga-cho ifoika nawekyekyia ndoṟe ilekoyammbaṙa.]
Na iho hawewoṙe mndu aweluoe kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaṟaaṟu na nyanya.
Kyiyeri Yesu alewona mndu-chu alee, na Yesu aichi kye nawekyeri kuṙo mfiri ifoi, nalemmbia, “Nukundi ichia?”

Mndu ulya aweluoe kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, inyi ngyiwoṙe mndu mongyiwikyia ipfo iruwenyi lya mṟinga kyiyeri malaika ekyepaaya na ifoga mṟinga-pfo. Kyiyeri inyi ngacha, mndu ungyi nekyesonguo isokyia pfo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Goṟoka, ukuṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo, uyende.”
Cha ilyi mndu ulya kawaṙa pfinya, kakuṙika ikondoṟo lyakye, kayenda. Na mfiri-cho nyi-we mfiri o onyonya.
Kyipfa kya ikyo Wayuda wakawia ulya alekyiṟo, “Inu nyi mfiri o onyonya, maa chi sungusinyi kopfo ikuṙika ikondoṟo-pfo.”
Kawagaluo kagamba, “Ulya angyikyiṟa nyi oe angyiwia, ‘Kuṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo, uyende.’ ”
Kyasia wakammbesa, “Ulya akuwia ‘Kuṙikye, uyende,’ nyi wui?”
Kyaindi ulya alekyiṟo alemmanya nyi wui-pfo; kyipfa Yesu nalekoamlekana nawo, cha kyipfa handu halya hawewoṙe wandu wafoi.
Numa ya isho Yesu kamkooya hekalunyi, kammbia, “Ambuya, ommbaṙa pfinya; ulawute-se wunyamaṟi, ulacheolokyio nyi kyindo kyiwicho ngoseṟa.”
Mndu ulya kayenda, kaongoya Wayuda kye nyi Yesu amkyiṟa.
Cha kyipfa kya ikyo Wayuda wakalyisa Yesu wukyiwa, kyipfa nalewuta isho mfiri o onyonya.
Kawagaluo, kawawia, “Awu oko naiṟunda mṟasa wulalu, na inyi ngyiṟunda.”
Kyasia kyipfa kya ikyo Wayuda wakaengyeṟa ilanga immbaaga, chi kyipfa alefunja iwawaso lya mfiri o onyonya tupu-pfo, indi hamwi na isho nalelaga Ruwa Awu okye, echikuloṟa kye nalyingananyi na Ruwa.
Kyasia Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, Mana eiṙima iwuta kyindo amonyi sile kyilya awonyi Awu ewuta-pfo; cha kyipfa shoose ekyewuta oe, nyisho Mana ekyewuta.
Cha kyipfa Awu nakundi Mana na oe nekyemloṟa shoose ekyewuta; maa maṟunda gang'anyi kuta isho ngoseṟa nechimloṟa, kundu nyoe muiṙime iṟiyio.
Kyipfa chandu Awu ekyeṟutsa wapfu na iwaenenga moo, na wuṙo Mana echienenga moo walya akundi iwawutia kuṙo.
Lyingyi-se Awu ekyeanduya mndu oose-pfo, indi naenengyie Mana ianduya lyoose;
kundu wandu woose waindie Mana chandu wekyeindia Awu. Mndu alekyeindia Mana ekyeindia Awu ulya alemṙuma-pfo.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ulya aicho ṙeṙo lyako na iiṙikyia ulya alengyiṙuma nawoṙe moo o mlungana; maa echianduyo-pfo, indi ammbuka upfunyi na iira na moonyi o mlungana.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, kyiyeri kyiicha, nakyo kyamcha, wapfu wechiicho ṟui lya Mono-Ruwa, na walya wechilyiaṙanyia wechiwaṙa moo.
Kyipfa chandu Awu awoṙe moo o mlungana, na wuṙo aleenenga mana wuiṙimi wo waṙa moo o mlungana.
Na oe kamwenenga wuchilyi wo ianduya kyipfa nyi Mono-Adamu.
Mulaṟiyio kyipfa kya maṙeṙo-ga; cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyiicha, kyiyeri wandu woose wakyeri shilomenyi wechiicho ṟui lyakye.
Nawo wechiwuka shilomenyi; walya walewuta shindo shicha wawone moo o mlungana na walya walewuta shiwicho waanduyo.”

“Inyi ngyeiṙima iwuta kyindo ngyimonyi-pfo. Chandu ngyekyeicho nyi wuṙo ngyekyeanduya; na ianduya lyako nyi lya sungusinyi, cha kyipfa ngyekyewuta kyilya ngyikundi inyi-pfo, indi kyilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi.
Inyi ngakuṟingyishia ngyimonyi wuṟingyishi woko chi loi-pfo.
Kuwoṙe ungyi aingyiṟingyishia; na inyi ngyiichi kye kyilya aingyiṟingyishia nyi kya loi.
Nyoe muleṙuma wandu ko Yohane, na oe kaṟingyishia wuloi.
Kyaindi inyi ngyiambilyia wuṟingyishi ko wandu-pfo; indi ngyigamba ishi kundu nyoe muiṙime ikyia.
Yohane nawekyeri cha taa iwuta ngyeela, na nyoe mulechihiyo kyipfa kya kyilya alegamba.
Kyaindi wuṟingyishi ngyiwoṙe inyi wung'anyi kuta wulya wo Yohane; cha kyipfa maṟunda galya Awu alengyienenga ngyigaṟunde gangyiṟingyishia kye Awu nalengyiṙuma.
Na Awu ulya alengyiṙuma nangyiṟingyishia. Ṟui lyakye mulandelyiicho kyiyeri kyoose maa fana yakye muleiwona-pfo.
Maa ulogo lokye lukyeri mrimenyi konyu-pfo, cha kyipfa nyoe muiṙikyie ulya oe alemṙuma-pfo.
Mokyekulosha mbonyi tsa shiṟeio shiele, cha kyipfa mokyekusaṟa kye kyiiṙi kyasho mochiwona moo o mlungana; na shiṟeio-sho shagamba mbonyi tsako.
Maa mukundi icha na koko muwone moo o mlungana-pfo.
Inyi ngyipfula iṟumisho nyi wandu-pfo.
Kyaindi ngamanya kye nyoe muwoṙe ikunda lya Ruwa mrimenyi konyu-pfo.
Inyi ngyilecha kui rina lya Awu oko kyaindi nyoe muingyiambilyia-pfo; ungyi kacha kui rina lyakye amonyi, icho mochimwambilyia.
Moiṙima kuṙa iiṙikyia nyoe muiṟumishana nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, na kyiṟumi kyilya kyiwukyie ko Ruwa alawoṙe amng'anyie muikyipfula-pfo?
Mulakusaṟe kye inyi ngyechimshitakyi mbele ya Awu; kuwoṙe echimshitakyi, nyi oe Mose, ulya muikusaṟa nechimtarama.
Cha kyipfa kokooya muleiṙikyia Mose, muwechingyiiṙikyia inyi; cha kyipfa Mose naleṟeia mbonyi tsako.
Kyaindi mulandeiṙikyie shiṟeio shakye, mochiiṙikyia kuṙa ulogo loko?”
Numa ya isho Yesu naleyenda molyolya o Nduwa ya Galyilaya iwekyelago Tiberia.
Na kyisanzionyi kying'anyi kya wandu kyikamwosha, cha kyipfa walewona shiṟiyisho alewutia wandu waluoe.
Na Yesu kaṙooya fumvunyi, kaṙamia pfo hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
Na Pasaka, mfiri ung'anyi o Wayuda, uwekyeri kufuhi.
Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alewona ṟiima lying'anyi lya wandu lyechicha na kokye nalewia Filyipo, “Luguṟe kwi mkate kundu wandu-wa waiṙime ilya?”
Na naleṙeṙa kuṙo kundu namyeshe; cha kyipfa naweichi kyindo echiwuta.
Filyipo kamgaluo, kagamba, “Mkate ya woguru wo dinari magana gawi gewashika maa kokooya orio umwi alya kyitung'tu-pfo.”
Anderea, umwi o wanalosho wakye, mono-wama o Simion Petiro, kammbia,
“Iha hawoṙe mana awoṙe mkate itanu na makunga gawi, kyaindi ishi ny'kyikyi ko wandu wafoi cha iwa?”
Yesu kagamba, “Wienyi wandu waṙamie.” Na handu halya hawewoṙe maṟa gafoi. Kyasia wasoṟo wakaṙamia, cha shiku shitaanu woose piu.
Yesu kaira mkate iya, kaana, kagawia walya waweṙamie; kagawa na makunga galya taa chandu orio mndu alekunda.
Nawo kyiyeri waleiguṙa, nalewia wanalosho wakye, “Sanienyi shifunjoe-sho shatsugaa, kyilaṙekye maa kyimwi.”
Kyasia wakasania shifunjoe sha mkate iya itanu shiletsugaa wandu wamlye, wakaichuṟa mkunja ikumi na iwi.
Kyasia kyiyeri wandu walya walewona kyiṟiyisho alewuta, walegamba, “Loi ichu nyi moonguo shisuku ulya aicha wuyanenyi.”
Naaho-ng'u, aichi kye wawekundi ichemmbaṙa kundu wamgaluo mangyi, nalelekana nawo, kayenda-se fumvunyi alaṙuṙanyi na mndu.
Kyiyeri kya kyukonyi wanalosho wakye wakasoka na kulya nduwenyi,
wakaṙooya ngalawenyi, wakawooka iambaṙa iyenda Kaperinaumu. Napfo kuwemmbaṙa meema, kyaindi Yesu alekoamcha-pfo.
Na nduwa ikawooka ifoika kyipfa mkuma ung'anyi uweikuma.
Wanalosho walekowamuyenda cha mailyi tsiṟaaṟu tsiina kyiyeri walewona Yesu echumia wuye ya mṟinga na itikyira kufuhi na ngalawa iya; wakaowuo.
Na oe kawawia, “Nyi inyi, mulaowuoe.”
Kyasia wakamwitsa na kulya ngalawenyi; na cha ilyi ngalawa iya ikashika uruka lulya waweiyenda.

Mfiri ulya uleosha kyisanzionyi kya wandu wawegoṟokyi molyolya o nduwa walewona kye kuwewoṙe ngalawa ingyi kulya sile imwi tupu-pfo. Ngoseṟa walewona kye Yesu aleiṙa na kulya ngalawenyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye-pfo, indi wanalosho waleyenda wo wawenyi.
(Kyaindi kukocha ngalawa tsingyi iwuka Tiberia mṟasa kufuhi na handu halya walekowalyiia mkate, kyiyeri Mndumii Yesu aleana).
Kyasia wandu wa kyisanzionyi, kyiyeri walewona kye Yesu akyeri pfo maa wanalosho wakye-pfo, waleiṙa na ngalawenyi wo wawenyi, wakayenda Kaperinaumu wechipfula Yesu.
Na kyiyeri walemmbona molyolya o nduwa, walemmbia, “Rabi, iyoe nocha indi na iha?”
Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, nyoe muingyipfula, chi kyipfa mulewona shiṟiyisho-pfo, indi kyipfa mulelya mkate iya mukoiguṙa.

Mulapfuṟukane ipfula kyelya kyekyenyamaṟika, indi pfulenyi kyelya kyilekyesia kyekyeende moo o mlungana; kyelya kyilya Mana o Adamu echimuenenga cha kyipfa icho nyi oe aṟingyishio nyi Ruwa kye nyi o sungusinyi.”
Kyasia wakammbia, “Luwikye kuṙa kundu luiṙime iṟunda maṟunda ga Ruwa?”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ilyi nyilyo iṟunda lya Ruwa, mumwiṙikyie ulya aleṙumo nyi oe.”
Wakammbia, “Kyasia nuiwuta kyiṟingyishio kyiha, kundu luwone lukuiṙikyie? Nuiṟunda kyi?
Waku waṙu walelya Manna kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, chandu kyikyiṟeie, ‘Nalewaenenga kyelya kya ruwewu kundu walye.’ ”
Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ‘Chi Mose alewaenenga kyelya kyilya kya ruwewu-pfo, indi Awu oko naimuenenga nyoe kyelya kya loi kyiwukyie ruwewu.
Cha kyipfa kyelya kya Ruwa nyi kyilya kyisokyie iwuka ruwewu na ienenga wuyana moo o mlungana.’ ”
Kyasia wakammbia, “Mndumii, mfiri yoose uluenengye kyelya-kyi.”
Yesu kawawia, “Inyi nyi kyelya kya moo; ulya acha na koko echiicho njaa maa ale-pfo; na ulya angyiiṙikyie echiwoṙo nyi nyoṙa-pfo.
Kyaindi ngyilemmbia kye momngyiwona indi muiṙikyia-pfo.
Walya Awu angyienenga wechicha na koko; maa kuwoṙe mndu echicha na koko ngyimmbiyitse nja maa ale-pfo.
Cha kyipfa inyi ngyilesoka iwuka ruwewu kundu ngyiwute kyilya ngyikundi-pfo, indi kyilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi.
Na kyilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi nyi ikyi, kye kyiiṙi kya woose angyienengyie ngyilaṙetse maa umwi, indi ngyimṟutse mfiri ulya o furumia.
Cha kyipfa kyilya Awu oko akundi nyi ikyi, kye orio mndu mokusuria Mana na imwiṙikyia, nawaṙe moo o mlungana; na inyi ngyechimṟutsa mfiri ulya o furumia.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakamnunuwia, cha kyipfa nalegamba, “Inyi nyi kyelya kyilesoka iwuka ruwewu.”
Wakagamba, “Ichu chi Yesu, mana o Yosefu, ulya luichi awuye na wamae? Wulalu naigamba kuṙa, ‘Ngyilesoka iwuka ruwewu?’”
Kyasia Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Mulanunuwiane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
Kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima icha na koko sile Ruwa ulya alengyiṙuma amsongoya-pfo; na inyi ngyechimṟutsa mfiri o furumia.
Kyikyiṟeie maloshonyi ga weonguo shisuku, ‘Na woose wekowamlosho nyi Ruwa.’ Kyasia orio mndu aicho na ikulosha ko Awu nekyecha na koko.
Chi kye mndu nawona Awu sile ulya awukyie ko Ruwa-pfo. Icho nyi oe alewona Awu.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ‘Ulya aiṙikyie nawoṙe moo o mlungana.’
Inyi nyi kyelya kya moo.
Waku wanyu walelya Manna kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, wakapfa.
Indi ikyi nyi kyelya kyisokyie iwuka ruwewu, kye mndu kakyilya alapfe.
Ikyi nyi kyelya kyiwoṙe moo kyilesoka iwuka ruwewu; mndu kalya kyelya-kyo, nechiwaṙa moo mlungana. Na kyelya ngyechienengyia inyi nyi mmbiu oko, kundu wuyana wuwaṙe moo.”
Kyasia Wayuda kui nyashi walegaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi wechigamba, “Mndu-chu neiṙima kuṙa iluenenga mmbiu okye luulye?”
Naaho Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mulandelye mmbiu o Mana o Adamu na inyo samu yakye, muwoṙe moo mrimenyi konyu-pfo.
Mndu alya mmbiu oko na inyo samu yako nawoṙe moo o mlungana; na inyi ngyechimṟutsa mfiri o furumia.
Cha kyipfa mmbiu oko nyi kyelya kya loi, na samu yako nyi kyindo kyenyo kya loi.
Mndu alya mmbiu oko na inyo samu yako nekyekaa kyiiṙi kyako na inyi ngyekyekaa kyiiṙi kyakye.
Chandu Awu ai na moo alengyiṙuma inyi, na inyi ngyiwoṙe moo kyipfa kyakye, na wuṙo taa ulya alya mmbiu oko echiwaṙa moo kyipfa kyako.
Ikyi nyikyo kyelya kyisokyie iwuka ruwewu; chi chandu waku walelya wakapfa-pfo; indi mndu alya kyelya-kyo nechiwaṙa moo mlungana.”
Mbonyi-tsi naletsionguo akyeri sinagoginyi, kyiyeri aweilosha, kulya Kaperinaumu.
Kyasia kyiyeri wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye waleicho, walegamba, “Kyindo-kyi kyikyiumu; nyi wui eiṙima ikyiiṙikyia?”
Na Yesu aichi mrimenyi kokye kye wanalosho wakye walenunuwa kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo, kawawia, “Ngyesa kyindo-kyi kyimutewe iilacha iiṙikyia lyanyu?
Kyechiwa-se kuṙa kyiyeri mochiwona Mana o Adamu echiṙo na ruwewu kulya-ndu awekyeri?
Mumuyo o Ruwa nyi oe ekyeenenga wandu moo, pfinya ya mndu iwoṙe kyiiṙa kyoose-pfo. Mbonyi-tsi ngamuongoya nyi Mumuyo, ngoseṟa nyi moo.
Kyaindi kuwoṙe wengyi kyiiṙi kyanyu walawoṙe iiṙikyia.” Cha kyipfa Yesu nalemanya wookyia mawookyionyi nyi wakyi walawoṙe iiṙikyia, na nyi wui echimṟiinga.
Kagamba, “Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia kye kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima icha na koko sile Awu amwenenga wuiṙimi-pfo.”
Kyipfa kya isho wandu wafoi wanaloshonyi wakye wakawuya na numa, walaoshane na oe-se.
Kyasia Yesu kawia walya ikumi na wawi, “Ngyesa na nyoe mukundi ilekana na inyi?”
Simion Petiro kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii! Luyende ko wui? Iyoe nuwoṙe maṙeṙo ga moo o mlungana.
Na soe lommbaṙa iiṙikyia; lyingyi-se lomanya kye iyoe nyi oe Mweele o Ruwa.”
Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyesa ngyilemusambuṟa nyoe ikumi na wawi kyaindi umwi onyu nyi Satana?”
Naleṙeṙa mbonyi tsa Yuda, mana o Simion Isikariote; kyipfa icho nyi oe echimṟiinga; na oe nyi umwi o walya ikumi na wawi.
Numa ya isho Yesu naweichumia urukyenyi lo Galyilaya; kyipfa alekunda iyenda uruka lo Uyuda-pfo, cha kyipfa Wayuda wawekundi immbaaga.
Na mfiri ung'anyi o Wayuda, mfiri ung'anyi o matengo, uwekyeri kufuhi.
Kyasia wana wa wamae wakammbia, “Wuka iha, uyende uruka lo Uyuda, kundu wanalosho wapfo nawo waiṙime iwona maṟunda gapfo.
Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iwuta kyindo kui kyiṟika kokooya nakundi imanyika-pfo. Kyipfa kowuta shindo-shi kuṟingyishie ko wandu wa wuyana.”
Kyipfa maa wana wa wamae walemwiṙikyia-pfo.
Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Kyiyeri kyako kyilandeafukyie-pfo; indi kyiyeri kyanyu orio mfiri kyikyeri ho.
Wandu wa wuyana weiṙima imsuo nyoe-pfo; indi wangyisuuye inyi, cha kyipfa inyi ngyiṟingyishia kye mawuto gawo gamawicho.
Yendenyi mundechihiyo ipfo mṟumoenyi o mfiri ung'anyi; inyi ngyiyenda pfo-pfo; cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyako kyilandeshikye-pfo.”
Na oe amwawie isho, kakaa mfiri ngyaangu kulya Galyilaya.
Na wana wa wamae wamndechihiyo halya-ndu mṟumoe uwekyeri, na oe kayenda ho kui kyiṟika.
Kyasia Wayuda wakampfula kulya mṟumoenyi, wakagamba, “Nyi kwi ai mndu ulya?”
Kukowaṙa mnunuwo ifoi kyipfa kya Yesu kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya. Wengyi wakagamba, “Nyi mndu mcha.” Na wengyi wakagamba, “Chi wuṙo-pfo; nailemba walya wasanzie iha.”
Kyaindi kuwoṙe mndu alemsenda na pata-pfo, kyipfa kya iowuo Wayuda.
Na makyiṙi-gawi ga mṟumoe ulya Yesu kaiṙa na hekalunyi kalosha.
Wayuda wakaṟiyio, wechigamba, “Ichu nawaṙa kuṙa wuṟango na oe asomie-pfo?”
Kyasia Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Malosho gako chi gako inyi-pfo, indi nyi ga ulya alengyiṙuma.
Mndu kakunda iwuta kyilya Ruwa akundi, nechimanya mbonyi tsa malosho-ga, kye gawukyie ko Ruwa, ang'u kye inyi ngyiṙeṙa kui wuchilyi woko inyi ngyimonyi tupu.
Ulya aṙeṙa kui wuchilyi wokye amonyi tupu nekyepfula kyiṟumi kyakye amonyi; indi ulya apfula kyiṟumi kya ulya alemṙuma, icho nyi o loi, maa mrimenyi kokye kuwoṙe wunyamaṟi-pfo.
Ngyesa Mose alemuenenga uwawaso-pfoe? Maa kuwoṙe umwi onyu aiosha uwawaso-pfoe. Ny'kyilyi mukundi ingyiwaaga.”
Wandu wawesanzie halya wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Loi, nuwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho! Nyi wui akundi ikuwaaga?”
Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Inyi ngyilewuta kyindo kyimwi, na nyoe moose muiṟiyio kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo.
Mose nalemuenenga mṟumoe o iṙino kyaindi mṟumoe-cho chi uwukyie ko Mose-pfo, indi nyi ko waku wanyu; na nyoe mfiri o onyonya mokyeṙina mndu.
Kyasia kokooya mndu nekyeṙino mfiri o onyonya, kundu uwawaso lo Mose lulachenyamaṟika, ny'kyilyi mungyisuuya inyi kyipfa ngyilekyiṟa mndu mfiri o onyonya?
Kyasia mulaanduye mndu kui imwambuya ipfo kyanja, indi anduyenyi wandu kui sungusinyi.”
Kyasia wandu waata wa Yerusalemu wakagamba, “Ichu chi ulya wandu waimpfula kundu wammbaage-pfoe?
Kyeambuya chandu aiṙeṙa kulawoṙe iṟikyia kyindo kyaindi wasongoru wa Wayuda waimmbutia kyindo-pfo. Ngyesa kyeiṙima iwa wasongoru-wo wa Wayuda waichi kye ichu nyi oe Kristo?
Ichu luichi nyi kwi awukyie; indi kyiyeri Kristo echicha kuwoṙe aichi kundu awukyie-pfo.”
Kyasia Yesu kakuilenga kulya hekalunyi, kalosha echigamba, “Inyi mungyiichi, na kundu ngyiwukyie muichi; maa ngyilecha kui wuchilyi woko ngyimonyi-pfo. Ulya alengyiṙuma nyi o loi indi mumwichi-pfo.
Inyi ngyimwichi, cha kyipfa ngyiwukyie kokye, na oe nyi oe alengyiṙuma.”
Kyasia wakakunda immbaṙa; kyaindi kuwoṙe mndu alegoṟuo kuwoko kokye immbaṙa-pfo, kyipfa kyiyeri kyakye kyewutio kuṙo kyilekokyamshika-pfo.
Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya wakamwiṙikyia, wakagamba, “Ngyesa kyiyeri Kristo echicha nechiwuta shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho kuta ishi ichu aiwuta?”
Mafarisayo wakaicho wandu walya wechinunuwa kyipfa kya Yesu. Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo wakaṙuma waṟundi kundu wammbaṙe.
Kyasia Yesu kagamba, “Hatsugai kyiyeri kyifuhi ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe; numa ya iho ngyechiyenda ko ulya alengyiṙuma.
Mochingyipfula maa mochingyiwona-pfo; na inyi handu ngyikyeri nyoe moiṙima icha na ho-pfo.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakawesana, “Ichu nechiyenda kwi mṟasa lulechimmbona? Ngyesa nechiyenda mṟinyi ikyeri nja ya uruka loṙu kulya-ndu wandu walai Wayuda wekyekaa na iwalosha?
Nyi kyindo kya mbaṟe iha ikyo aigamba, ‘Mochingyipfula maa mochingyiwona-pfo; na handu ngyikyeri nyoe moiṙima icha na ho-pfo?’ ”
Na mfiri o furumia, mfiri ulya ung'anyi o mṟumoe, Yesu kagoṟoka, kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Mndu kawoṙo nyi nyoṙa, nache na koko nawone kyindo kyenyo.
Ulya angyiiṙikyia inyi, chandu kyikyiṟeie ipfo shiṟeionyi shiele, mfo ya mṟinga uwoṙe moo yechiwuka mrimenyi kokye.”

Kyiyeri Yesu aweiṙeṙa naweionguo mbonyi tsa Mumuyo o Ruwa, walya wamwiṙikyie wechimwambilyia kyiyeri kya numa; cha kyipfa Mumuyo o Ruwa alekoamcha-pfo, cha kyipfa Yesu alekoamwirio wuye na ienengo kyiṟumi-pfo.
Kyasia wandu wengyi kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tso, walegamba, “Loi, ichu nyi oe moonguo shisuku ulya.”
Wengyi walegamba, “Ichu nyi oe Kristo.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Ngyesa Kristo nechiwuka Galyilaya?
Kyikyiṟeie kyiṟeionyi kyiele kye Kristo nechiwuka kyisharinyi kya Dawidi, na iwuka Betilehemu, mṟi ulya Dawidi awekyekaa?”
Kyasia wandu waata kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya wakaṙeṙa Yesu necha, wengyi wakamṙeṙa uwicho.
Waata wakakunda immbara kyaindi kuwoṙe mndu alegoṟuo mawoko gakye kundu nammbaṙe-pfo.
Kyasia waṟundi walya wakayenda ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo. Nawo wakawawesa, “Ny'kyilyi mulamwende?”
Waṟundi walya wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu oose alemgamba shindo-sho ichu agamba-pfo.”
Kyasia Mafarisayo wakawagaluo, wakagamba, “Namlemba maa nyoe?
Nyi wui kyiiṙi kya wasongoru ang'u Mafarisayo amwiṙikyie?”
Kyaindi wandu-wa wasanzie iha walaichi uwawaso wawasese.
Nikodemo (ulya alekoayenda ko Yesu kyiyeri kya ipfo numa, kyipfa nyi umwi o wasongoru-wo) kawawia,
“Iṙuana na uwawaso loiṙima ianduya mndu lulaaṙanyia ny'kyikyi awoṙe kyegamba-pfo; hamwi na ipfula imanya ny'kyikyi akundi iwuta.”
Wakagaluo wakammbia, “Ngyesa na iyoe nuwukyie Galyilaya? Pfula shiṟeionyi shiele umanye kye Galyilaya kochiwuka moonguo shisuku-pfo.”
Waleyenda orio mndu kanyi kokye, na Yesu kayenda mṟasa fumvunyi lya Mseituni.
Na kyiyeri kya ngamenyi lyilya kulekya kaiṙa-se na hekalunyi, na wandu woose wakayenda kokye. Na oe kaṙamia, kawooka iwalosha.
Walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo wakamwendie mndu mka alekooyo wuṟuinyi, wakammbikyia makyiṙi-gawi.
Wakammbia, “Mlosha, mndu mka-chu nakooyo eṟuguyo.
Kyasia, uwawasonyi, Mose naleluwia lukape na magoe waka wa mbaṟe-i iyi. Iyoe nogamba kyi?”
Nawo walegamba kuṙo wechimyesha, kundu wawone kyimaṙuma kyemshitakyi. Kyaindi Yesu kaarama, kaṟeia na kyimnyoe kyakye iho terinyi.
Na kyiyeri waleengyeṟa immbesa, nalewawia “Ulya alawoṙe wunyamaṟi kyiiṙi kyanyu nawe o kuwooka imkapa na igoe.”
Kaarama-se kaṟeia na kyimnyoe kyakye iho terinyi.
Nawo kyiyeri waleicho, wakafuma soṟom soṟom, wechiwooka na ulya mku kuta woose; Yesu kaṙio amonyi, na mndu mka ulya agoṟokyi halya.
Yesu kaamkyia wuye alawone mndu sile mndu mka ulya. Kammbia, “Mndu mka, wookwi walya waweigamba kye numnyamaṟi? Kuwoṙe maa umwi aṙio iha igamba kye nuwaṟi iwoogo?”
Mndu mka ulya kagamba, “Kuwoṙe-pfo, Mndumii.” Yesu kammbia, “Maa inyi ngyikuanduya-pfo. Yenda kyaindi ulawute-se wunyamaṟi.”]
Kyasia Yesu kawia-se Mafarisayo walya, “Inyi nyi ngyeela ya wuyana. Ulya angyiosha inyi nechiwaṙa ngyeela yekyeenenga wandu moo, na echichumia handu hawoṙe meema-pfo.”
Mafarisayo wakammbia, “Iyoe nuikuṟingyishia kumonyi; wuṟingyishi wopfo chi loi-pfo.”

Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Inyi maa chandu ngyikuṟingyishia ngyimonyi, wuṟingyishi woko nyi wo loi; cha kyipfa ngyiichi kundu ngyiwukyie na kundu ngyiyenda; kyaindi nyoe muichi kundu ngyiwukyie maa kundu ngyiyenda-pfo.
Nyoe mokyeanduya kui iambuya mbonyi tsa mmbiu; inyi ngyekyeanduya mndu-pfo.
Na kokooya ngyiwechianduya, ianduya lyako lyechiwa lya loi; cha kyipfa inyi ngyikyeri ngyimonyi-pfo, indi ngyikyeri na ulya alengyiṙuma.
Lyingyi-se uwawasonyi lonyu kyikyiṟeie kye ‘Wuṟingyishi wo wandu wawi nyi wo loi.’
Inyi ngyikuṟingyishia ngyimonyi, na Awu ulya alengyiṙuma naingyiṟingyishia.”
Kyasia wakammbia, “Ookwi Awu opfo?” Yesu kagaluo kagamba, “Inyi mungyiichi-pfo; maa Awu oko mumwichi-pfo. Kokooya muwengyiichi inyi, muwechimanya na Awu oko.”
Mbonyi-tsi naletsiṙeṙa kyiyeri aweilosha hekalunyi, kyiṟinyi kyekooma heleri; maa kuwoṙe mndu alemmbaṙa-pfo, cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyakye kyewutio kuṙo kyilekokyamshika-pfo.
Yesu kawawia-se, “Inyi ngyiwuka iha, na nyoe mochingyipfula; na nyoe mochipfa mowuta wunyamaṟi; na inyi kundu ngyiyenda moiṙima iyenda pfo-pfo.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakagamba, “Ngyesa nechikuwaaga? Cha kyipfa naigamba, ‘Kundu ngyiyenda nyoe moiṙima iyenda pfo-pfo.’ ”
Kawawia, “Nyoe nyi wa iha wanda wuyanenyi, inyi nyi o wuye ruwewu. Nyoe nyi wa wuyana-wu, inyi chi o wuyana-wu-pfo.
Koikyo ngammbia kye mochipfa mowuta wunyamaṟi; cha kyipfa mulandeiṙikyie kye inyi nyi oe ulya ngyigamba kye inyi nyi oe mochipfa mowuta wunyamaṟi.”
Kyasia wakammbia, “Iyoe nyi wui?” Yesu kawawia, “Inyi nyi ulya ngammbia wookyia mawookyionyi kye inyi oe.
Ngyiwoṙe shindo shifoi shegamba na sheanduya kyipfa kyanyu; kyaindi ulya alengyiṙuma nyi o loi, na inyi shilya ngyileicho kokye nyisho ngyishionguo iha wuyanenyi.”
Maa walemanya kye naweiwaongoya mbonyi tsa Awu-pfo.

Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Kyiyeri-kyo mochimarisa iwikyia Mana o Adamu msalabenyi nyi lyo-ndu momanya kye inyi nyi oe ulya ngammbia kye inyi nyi oe; na kye inyi ngyekyewuta kyindo kui iambuya kyilya ngyikundi-pfo, indi chandu Awu alengyilosha nyi wuṙo ngyekyeonguo.
Na ulya alengyiṙuma nakyeri hamwi na inyi; angyiṙeeye ngyimonyi-pfo; cha kyipfa mfiri yoose ngyekyewuta shilya shimchihiṟie.”
Na oe kyiyeri aweionguo isho, wandu wafoi wakamwiṙikyia.
Kyasia Yesu kawia Wayuda walya wawemwiṙikyie, “Mukoosha shilya ngyimulosha, mochiwa wanalosho wako loi loi;
lyingyi-se mochimanya wuloi wo mbonyi tsa Ruwa, na wuloi-wo wochimmbuta wusingyenyi.”
Wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Soe nyi kyishari kya Abrahamu, maa lulandewe watumo wa mndu kyiyeri maa kyimwi-pfo; na iyoe nuigamba, ‘Mochiwuto wusingyenyi?’ ”
Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ‘Orio mndu ekyewuta wunyamaṟi nyi mtumo o wunyamaṟi.’
Mtumo akyeri mndu o mfiri yoose o numba iya ekyeiṟundia-pfo; indi mana nyi mndu o numba-yo mfiri yoose.
Kyasia Mana kammbuta wusingyenyi, mochiwuka wusingyenyi loi loi.
Ngyiichi kye nyoe nyi kyishari kya Abrahamu; kyaindi mukundi ingyiwaaga cha kyipfa kyilya ngyimlosha kyikyeri mrimenyi konyu-pfo.
Shilya ngyileshiwona ko Awu nyisho ngyionguo; na nyoe na wuṙo muwuta shilya muleicho ko awu onyu.”
Wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Awu oṙu nyi oe Abrahamu!” Yesu kawawia, “Kokooya muwei wana wa Abrahamu, muweṟunda maṟunda ga Abrahamu.
Kyaindi wulalu mukundi ingyiwaaga, mndu ammbia kyikyeri kya loi, ngyilekyiicho ko Ruwa. Abrahamu alewuta kuṙo-pfo.
Nyoe muiṟunda maṟunda ga awu onyu.” Nyi lyo-ndu walemmbia, “Soe lulefeo wuṟuinyi-pfo. Soe luwoṙe Awu umwi, nyi oe Ruwa.”
Yesu kawawia, “Kokooya Ruwa awekyeri awu onyu, muwengyikunda inyi; cha kyipfa ngyilewuka ko Ruwa, na inyi ngyilecha; maa ngyilecha kui ikunda lyako ngyimonyi-pfo, indi oe nyi oe alengyiṙuma.
Kyitewe mulaimanya ikyo ngyigamba ny'kyi? Nyi kyipfa nyoe mulaiiṙima imanya malosho gako.

Nyoe nyi wa awu onyu Mokyiriinzi, na lango tsa awu onyu nyitso mukundi itsiosha. Oe nyi mmbaagi wookyia mawookyionyi; maa alandekae ura lo wuloi-pfo, cha kyipfa kokye kuwoṙe wuloi-pfo. Kyiyeri aṙeṙa wongo, nekyeṙeṙa shikyeri shakye amonyi; cha kyipfa oe nekyeṙeṙa wongo na nyi awu o wongo.
Na inyi, cha kyipfa ngyiṙeṙa kyikyeri loi, mungyiiṙikyia-pfo.
Nyi wui kyiiṙi kyanyu angyiṟingyishia kye ngyiwoṙe wunyamaṟi? Na inyi ngaṙeṙa loi, ny'kyilyi nyoe mulaingyiiṙikyia?
Ulya ai o Ruwa nekyeaṙanyia malosho ga Ruwa. Koikyo nyoe muiaṙanyia-pfo cha kyipfa nyoe chi wana wa Ruwa-pfo.”
Wayuda wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Ngyesa soe luigamba loi kye iyoe nyi mndu o Samaria, na iyoe nuwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho-pfoe?”
Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Inyi ngyiwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho-pfo; kyaindi inyi ngyiindia Awu oko, na nyoe mungyiindia-pfo.
Maa inyi ngyipfula kyiṟumi kyako-pfo; kuwoṙe mopfula kyiṟumi na ianduya.
Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia ‘Mndu kaosha kyilya malosho gako gagamba mrima okye ochiwaṙa moo mlungana.’ ”

Kyasia Wayuda wakammbia, “Wulalu lomanya kye nuwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho. Abrahamu alempfa, na weonguo shisuku walempfa; na iyoe nugamba, ‘Mndu kaosha kyilya malosho gako gagamba mrima okye ochiwaṙa moo mlungana.’
Iyoe nung'anyi kuta awu oṙu Abrahamu, alempfa? Weonguo shisuku nawo walempfa. Nukundi ikuloṟa iyoe nyi wui?”
Yesu kagaluo kagamba, “Ngakuṟumisha inyi ngyimonyi, kyiṟumi kyako chi kyindo-pfo. Ekyengyiṟumisha nyi Awu oko, ulya nyoe muigamba kye nyi Ruwa onyu.
Maa nyoe mulemmanya-pfo; kyaindi inyi ngyimwichi. Ngagamba kye ngyimwichi-pfo ngyechiwa mndu ekyeṙeṙa wongo cha nyoe; kyaindi ngyimwichi, na malosho gakye ngyekyegaosha.
Abrahamu, awu onyu, nalechihiyo chandu echiwona mfiri o icha lyako; na oe kauwona kachihiyo.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakammbia, “Nuwewona kuṙa Abrahamu na iyoe ulandewaṙe maa maka makumi gataanu-pfo?”
Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, Abrahamu alafeo, inyi ngyikyeri pfo.”
Kyasia wakaira magoe kundu wamkape nago; kyaindi Yesu kakuṟiika, kawuka kulya hekalunyi.
Na kyiyeri aweiiṙa nalewona mndu awei kyipfupfuṟe wookyia ifeo lyakye.
Wanalosho wakye wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Rabi, nyi wui alewuta wunyamaṟi, mndu-chu ang'u wafee wakye, mṟasa nafeo ai kyipfupfuṟe?”
Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ichu alewuta wunyamaṟi maa wafee wakye-pfo; indi nalefeo ai kyipfupfuṟe kundu wandu waiṙime iwona maṟunda galya Ruwa tupu eiṙima iṟunda.
Kyiwaṟi iṟunda maṟunda ga ulya alengyiṙuma kyiyeri kuwoṙe ngyeela; kyio kyiicha kyiyeri mndu alechiiṙima iṟunda.
Kyiyeri ngyikyeri wuyanenyi, inyi nyi ngyeela ya wuyana.”
Kyiyeri alemarisa igamba isho, nalepuchia maṙa iho wanda, kaachikyia toombo na maṙa galya. Kashia mndu ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe toombo ipfo mesonyi,
kammbia, “Yenda undesamba kulya iruwenyi lya Siloamu.” (Kyimwi na igamba, “Aleṙumo.”) Kyasia mndu ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe kayenda na isamba; kawuya ewona.
Wamṟasa wakye, na walya walekowammbona mfiri ya numa echieṟeṟa, wakagamba, “Ichu chi ulya awekyeeṟeṟa-pfoe?”
Wengyi wakagamba, “Nyi oe.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Ote; kyaindi nafananyi na oe.” Oe amonyi kagamba, “Nyi oe.”
Kyasia wakammbia, “Meso gapfo gaiṙima kuṙa iwona?”
Oe kawagaluo, kagamba, “Mndu ulya ekyelago Yesu naleachikyia toombo, kangyishia mesonyi kangyiwia, ‘Yenda Siloamu undesamba.’ Koikyo ngayenda na isamba, ngaiṙima iwona.”
Wakammbia, “Ny'kwi akyeri?” Kagamba, “Inyi ngyiichi-pfo.”
Kyasia wakaṙuo ko Mafarisayo mndu ulya awekyeri kyipfupfuṟe mfiri ya numa.
Na nyi-we mfiri o onyonya, kyiyeri kyilya Yesu aleachikyia toombo na ienenga mndu ulya iwona.
Kyasia Mafarisayo nawo wakammbesa-se chandu aleiṙima iwona. Kawawia, “Nalengyishia toombo mesonyi, na inyi ngasamba, na wulalu ngyiwona.”

Kyasia Mafarisayo waata wakagamba, “Mndu-cho awukyie ko Ruwa-pfo, cha kyipfa nekyewuta kyilya kyilawaṟi iwuta mfiri o onyonya.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Mndu mnyamaṟi neiṙima kuṙa iwuta shiṟiyisho cha isho?” Walawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi.
Kyasia lya kawi wakawia ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe, “Mbonyi tsiha uigamba tsa ichu akuenenga wuiṙimi wo iwona?” Kagamba, “Nyi moonguo shisuku.”
Kyasia Wayuda walaiṙikyie mbonyi tsilya aweigamba, kye nawei kyipfupfuṟe na numa ya iho kaenengo iwona; mṟasa wakalaga wafee wakye.
Wakawawesa, “Ichu nyi oe mana onyu, ulya mulegamba kye nalefeo ai kyipfupfuṟe? Wulalu naiṙima kuṙa iwona?”
Wafee wakye wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Luichi kye ichu nyi oe mana oṙu, lyingyi-se kye nalefeo ai kyipfupfuṟe;
kyaindi chandu aiwona wulalu luichi-pfo; maa luichi nyi wui alemwenenga wuiṙimi wo iwona-pfo. Mmbesenyi oe amonyi; oe nyi mndu apfulukyie, neiṙima ionguo amonyi.”
Wafee wakye walegamba kuṙo kui iowuo Wayuda; cha kyipfa Wayuda walekowaiṙikyiana kye mndu echigamba kye nyi Kristo, nechiimo momu o yenda sinagoginyi.
Nyikyo kyitewe wafee walya walegamba, “Nyi mndu apfulukyie, mmbesenyi oe.”
Kyasia lya kawi Mafarisayo wakalaga mndu ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe, wakammbia, “Enenga Ruwa kyiṟumi. Soe luichi kye mndu-chu nyi mnyamaṟi.”
Kyasia mndu ulya kagaluo, kagamba, “Kye oe nyi mnyamaṟi ngyiichi-pfo. Ngyiichi kyindo kyimwi tupu: kye inyi ngyiwei kyipfupfuṟe na wulalu ngyiwona.”
Kyasia wakammbia, “Ny'kyikyi alekuwutia? Nalekuenenga kuṙa wuiṙimi wo iwona?”
Kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ngamummbia, maa moiṙikyia-pfo. Ny'kyilyi mukundi iwio-se? Na nyoe mukundi iwa wanalosho wakye?”
Kyasia wakamnyeṟie, wechigamba, “Iyoe nyi manalosho okye; soe nyi wanalosho wa Mose.
Soe luichi kye Ruwa naleṙeṙa na Mose; indi icho luichi kundu awukyie-pfo.”
Mndu ulya kagaluo, kawawia, “Ikyi nyi kyindo kyeṟiyisha! Kye nyoe muichi kundu awukyie-pfo, na oe nalengyienenga wuiṙimi wo iwona!
Luichi kye Ruwa ekyeaṙanyia wanyamaṟi-pfo; indi mndu kawa naowuye na ikunda Ruwa, na iosha kyilya Ruwa akundi, Ruwa nekyemwaṙanyia.
Wookyia kyiyeri-kyo kyilandegambo kye mndu naenenga kyipfupfuṟe wuiṙimi wo iwona, ulya alefeo mbaṟe-yo iyo-pfo.
Kokooya icho alawewukyie ko Ruwa, aweiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose-pfo.”
Wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Iyoe nulefeeyo wunyamaṟinyi nakamwi, na iyoe nuilulosha soe?” Kui nyashi wakamtsindikyia nja ya sinagogi.
Yesu kaicho kye wamtsindikyia nja; na oe kyiyeri alemmbona nalegamba, “Iyoe nuiṙikyie Mana o Ruwa?”
Na oe kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyi wui, Mndumii, ngyiiṙime imwiṙikyia?”
Yesu kammbia, “Omummbona, na oe aiṙeṙa na iyoe nyi oe.”
Kagamba, “Ngaiṙikyia, Mndumii.” Kamwindia.
Yesu kagamba, “Inyi ngyilecha na kunu wuyanenyi ianduya, kundu iwo walaiwona wawone, na walya waiwona wawe shipfupfuṟe.”
Mafarisayo waata wawekyeri hamwi na oe wakaicho isho, wakammbia, “Ngyesa na soe nyi shipfupfuṟe?”
Yesu kawawia, “Kokooya muwei shipfupfuṟe muweiwaṙa wunyamaṟi-pfo; kyaindi wulalu muigamba, ‘Luwonyi,’ kyasia wunyamaṟi wonyu wuengyeṟa ikaa ho.”
Yesu nalewawia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, ulya alaiiṙa na mfiṟigenyi o moondo kui iiṙia moongonyi, kyaindi kaiṙia handu hengyi, icho nyi mbafu na oe nyi msokyi.
Aiṙia moongonyi nyi mlyisi o moondo.
Mringyi o moongo nekyepfunguya mlyisi-cho moongo, na moondo gekyemanya ṟui lyakye; na oe nekyelaga moondo gakye kui marina gawo, na igafumiṟia nja.
Na oe kyiyeri afumiṟia nja moondo-go gakye goose, nekyegasongoya; na moondo galya gekyemwosha, cha kyipfa gaichi ṟui lyakye.
Myenu gechimwosha maa ale-pfo, indi gechimṙicha; cha kyipfa gaichi maṟui ga wayenu-pfo.”
Mfano-cho Yesu nalewawia; kyaindi wo walemanya kyindo aweiwawia-pfo.
Kyasia Yesu kawawia-se, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, inyi nyi moongo o moondo.
Walya walengyisongoya nyi mbafu na wasokyi; kyaindi moondo galewaaṙanyia-pfo.
Inyi nyi moongo. Mndu kaiṙia koko, nechikyia. Nechiiṙa na numba na ifumia nja, na oe nechiiguṙa kando.
Mbafu yekyecha ikusaṟie kyindo kyingyi sile iiwa na iwaaga na inyamaṟa-pfo. Inyi ngyilecha kundu wawaṙe moo, ngoseṟa wauwaṙe pacha.
“Inyi nyi mlyisi mcha. Mlyisi mcha nekyereka moo okye kyipfa kya moondo.
Mndu o wori, maa chi mlyisi-pfo, ulya moondo galai gakye, nekyewona kyisii kyeecha, kaṙa moondo na iṙicha, na kyisii kyekyerakuo ho ondo lyimwi na inyanyaṟitsa igo gengyi.
Icho nekyeṙicha cha kyipfa nyi mndu o wori; maa mbonyi tsa moondo chi kyindo kokye-pfo.
Inyi nyi mlyisi mcha; na walya wakyeri wako ngyiwaichi; na walya wai wako wangyiichi inyi;
chandu Awu angyiichi na chandu ngyiichi Awu. Na inyi ngyekyereka moo oko kyipfa kya moondo.
Ngyiwoṙe na moondo gengyi, galakyeri ga mfiṟiga-chu; na igo nago kyingyiwaṟi igaende na kunu mfiṟigenyi, na ṟui lyako gechilyiaṙanyia. Naaho-ng'u kochiwaṙa poo lyimwi na mlyisi umwi.
Awu nagyikundi, cha kyipfa ngyekyereka moo oko kundu ngyiuambilyie-se numa.
Kuwoṙe mndu ekyengyiwuta moo-chu-pfo, indi inyi ngyimonyi ngyekyeureka. Inyi ngyiwoṙe wuiṙimi wo iureka; ngyiwewoṙe taa wuiṙimi wo iuambilyia-se. Iwawaso-lyi ngyilelyiambilyia ko Awu oko.”
Lyingyi-se kulawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda, kyipfa kya mbonyi tsilya Yesu aleonguo.
Wengyi wakagamba, “Ichu nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho, ngoseṟa nyi msuko; ny'kyilyi muimwaṙanyia?”
Wengyi wakagamba, “Maṙeṙo-ga chi ga mndu awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho-pfo. Ngyesa mṟufui mmbicho neiṙima ienenga shipfupfuṟe wuiṙimi wo iwona?”
Kyasia kulya Yerusalemu kuwewoṙe mṟumoe o iwikyia hekalu mboṟa lya kawi; na nyi-we kyiyeri kya mbeho.
Na Yesu naweichumia-chumia kulya hekalunyi handu hesanzia hawekyelago Solomon.
Kyasia Wayuda wakamwiṟiwia, wakammbia, “Nolyisa mrima yaṙu wukyiwa mṟasa indi? Kokooya iyoe nyi oe Kristo uluwie na pata.”
Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyilemmbia, kyaindi nyoe mulaiṙikyie. Maṟunda-ga ngyiṟunda kui rina lya Awu oko nyigo gaingyiṟingyishia.
Kyaindi nyoe muiṙikyia-pfo, cha kyipfa mukyeri poonyi lya moondo gako-pfo.
Moondo gako gekyemanya ṟui lyako; na inyi ngyiichi moondo-go, nago gekyengyiosha.
Na inyi ngyekyegaenenga moo o mlungana; maa gechiṙeka maa ale-pfo; maa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima igangyisoka-pfo.
Awu oko alegangyienenga nang'anyi kuta woose; maa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima igawuta mawokonyi ga Awu oko-pfo.
Inyi na Awu lukyeri kyindo kyimwi.”
Kyasia Wayuda wakaira-se magoe kundu wamkape nago.
Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyilemumloṟa maṟunda mecha gafoi gawukyie ko Awu, nyi lyiha lyamuenenga ilanga ingyikapa na magoe?”
Wayuda wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Luikukapa na magoe kyipfa kya kyindo kyicha uleṟunda-pfo; indi kyipfa kya ilahia Ruwa, na kyipfa nyi mndu uikuloṟa kye nui Ruwa.”
Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyesa uwawasonyi kyikyiṟeie kye Ruwa nagamba, ‘Nyoe nyi waruwa?’
Kokooya nalelaga waruwa wandu walya waleambilyia shiṟeio shiele; (na shiṟeio shiele sheiṙima iilachika-pfo);
ngyesa ulya Awu alemwilyisha, kamṙuma wuyanenyi, nyoe mummbia ‘Nulahia Ruwa’ cha kyipfa ngyilegamba, ‘Inyi nyi Mono-Ruwa?’
Kokooya ngyilaiṟunda maṟunda ga Awu oko, mulangyiiṙikyie.
Kyaindi ngagaṟunda, maa kokooya mulangyiiṙikyia inyi, iṙikyienyi maṟunda-go; muiṙime imanya kye Awu nai kyiiṙi kyako, na inyi ngyii kyiiṙi kya Awu.”
Wakalanga-se immbaṙa, kyaindi kakuashuo mawokonyi gawo.
Kayenda-se molyolya o Yoridan, mṟasa handu halya Yohane awekyepatisia wandu kyiyeri kya ipfo numa, kakaa pfo.
Na wandu wafoi wakayenda kokye wakagamba, “Loi Yohane alewuta kyiṟingyishio kyoose-pfo, kyaindi mbonyi tsoose Yohane aleonguo tsa ichu tsiwei tsa loi.”
Wandu wafoi wakamwiṙikyia.
Mndu umwi awekyelago Lasaro, awekyekaa Betania, naweluoe. Lasaro-cho nyi-we msacha o Maria na Marita.
Maria nyi oe ulya aleshia Mndumii Yesu mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha, kamwanguo maṙende kui njui tsakye. Nyi oe Lasaro msacha okye aweluoe.
Kyasia washikyi walya wakaṙuma ndumo ko Yesu wakagamba, “Mndumii, ulya umkundi naluoe.”
Na Yesu kyiyeri aleicho, nalegamba, “Ndoṟe-i yechiende upfu-pfo, indi yacha kyipfa kya mng'ano o Ruwa, kundu Mono-Ruwa nang'anyiso kui ndoṟe-yo.”
Na Yesu nawekundi Marita na Maria na Lasaro.
Kyasia kyiyeri aleicho kye naluoe, nalekaa halya-ndu awekyeri mfiri iwi ya ngoseṟa.
Numa ya iho, kawia wanalosho wakye, “Sindenyi-se uruka lo Uyuda.”
Wanalosho walya wakammbia, “Rabi, nyi icho-lyi tikyi Wayuda wawekundi ikukapa na magoe, na iyoe nukundi iyenda-se pfo?”
Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa saa tsa kyingoto chi ikumi na tsiwi-pfoe? Mndu kachumia kyingoto ekyekapa tuulyia-pfo; cha kyipfa nawonyi ngyeela ya mnengyeṟi.
Indi kachumia kyio nekyekapa tuulyia; cha kyipfa ngyeela ikyeri kokye-pfo.”
Nalegamba isho, na numa ya iho kawawia, “Mbuya yaṙu, Lasaro, nalee; kyaindi ngyiyenda ngyiiṙime imwamtsa.”
Kyasia wanalosho walya wakammbia, “Mndumii, kokooya nalee, nechia.”
Kyaindi Yesu naweiwawia mbonyi tsa upfu lokye; nawo wakakusaṟa kye naṙeṙa mbonyi tsa ilaa maṙoe.
Kyasia iho Yesu kawawia na pata, “Lasaro napfa.
Inyi ngachihiyo kyipfa kyanyu kye ngyiwekyeri ipfo-pfo, kundu muiṙikyie. Kyaindi sindenyi kokye.”
Kyasia Tomasi, awekyelago (Wana wawi wawafee kyiyeri kyimwi), kawia wanalosho woṙoe, “Na soe sindenyi, kundu lupfe hamwi na oe.”
Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu aleshika kulya, nalekooya Lasaro amkaa kyilomenyi cha mfiri ina.
Na Betania nyi-we kufuhi na Yerusalemu, cha mailyi tsiwi kuṙi.
Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda walekowacha na ko Marita na Maria, kundu wawawiyiṟie moo kyipfa kya upfu lo msacha owo.
Kyasia, Marita kyiyeri aleicho kye Yesu naicha, naleyenda imwambilyia; na Maria naleṙio kanyi.
Kyasia Marita kawia Yesu, “Mndumii, kokooya uwekyeri iha, msacha-chu oko aweipfa-pfo.
Kyaindi maa wulalu ngyiichi kye orio kyindo oterewa Ruwa nechikuenenga.”
Yesu kammbia, “Msacha opfo nechiṟuka.”
Marita kammbia, “Ngyiichi kye nechiṟuka kyiyeri kya wuṟutsi wo mfiri o furumia.”
Yesu kammbia, “Inyi nyi ulya ekyeende wuṟutsi-wo, na moo. Ulya angyiiṙikyie inyi, maa kapfa, nechiwaṙa moo o mlungana.
Na orio mndu awoṙe moo na ingyiiṙikyia inyi echipfa kyimrima mṟasa mlungana-pfo. Ngyesa nuiṙikyie isho?”
Kammbia, “Yee, Mndumii, inyi ngyiiṙikyie kye iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa, ulya aicha na wuyanenyi.”
Marita amgambe kuṙo kayenda; kaṙuo Maria mbai kagamba, “Mlosha naikulaga.”
Na oe kyiyeri aleicho naleamka faṟa, kayenda ko Yesu.
Na Yesu alekoamwiṙa na kulya kyikaṟonyi-pfo; kyaindi nawekyeri halya-ndu Marita alekoandemwambilyia.
Kyasia Wayuda walya wawekyeri na Maria kanyi, wechimmbiyiṟia moo, kyiyeri walewona chandu aamka faṟa na iyenda, walemwosha; kunu wechikusaṟa kye naweiyenda kyilomenyi nandelyilyia pfo.
Kyasia kyiyeri Maria aleshika halya-ndu Yesu awekyeri, na immbona, naleoloka maṙendenyi gakye, kammbia, “Mndumii, kokooya uwekyeri iha, msacha oko awechipfa-pfo.”
Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alemmbona echilyia, na Wayuda walya waweiṙuṙanyi na oe welyia, nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi, mrima okye ukoiṟewe,
kagamba, “Ny'kwi mommbikyia?” Wakammbia, “Mndumii, nnjo uwone.”
Yesu katonyitsa mcheṟeṟe.
Kyasia Wayuda wakagamba, “Ambuyenyi chandu awemkundi.”
Indi wengyi wakagamba, “Ngyesa ichu aleenenga kyipfupfuṟe kyilya wuiṙimi wo iwona, aleiṙima ishingyia ichu alapfe-pfoe?”
Kyasia Yesu, awoṙo-se nyi fowa mrimenyi, kashika halya kyilomenyi. Nakyo kyiwekyeri usanja, na igoe lyiwelyiyekyie wuye yakyo.
Yesu kagamba, “Wutenyi ho igoe-lyo.” Marita, mshikyi o ulya alepfa, kammbia, “Mndumii, naiṙaa wulalu; kyipfa ammba mnying'a mfiri ina.”
Yesu kammbia, “Inyi ngyilekuwia kye koiṙikyia nochiwona mng'ano o Ruwa?”
Kyasia wakawuta ho igoe lyilya. Yesu kaambuya wuye, kagamba, “Awu, ngakuana cha kyipfa nongyiaṙanyia.
Na inyi ngyilemanya kye uyoe nokyengyiaṙanyia mfiri yoose, kyaindi kyipfa kya wandu-wa waisanzia iha ngyilegamba ishi, kundu waiṙime iiṙikyia kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.”
Na oe amgambe isho, kalaga na ṟui lying'anyi, “Lasaro nnjo na kunu nja!”
Ulya awepfiie kafumia nja, ampfungye sanda maṙende na mawoko, na kyaam kyakye kyikyipfungye na kyitambaa. Na Yesu kawawia “Mpfunguonyi, mumlekye nayende.”
Kyasia Wayuda wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya walecha na ko Maria, na iwona shilya alewuta, wakamwiṙikyia.
Kyaindi wengyi wakayenda ko Mafarisayo, wakawawia shilya Yesu alewuta.
Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo wakalaga wandu na mengyenyi, wakagamba, “Ny'kyikyi luiwuta? Kyipfa mndu-chu naiwuta shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho.
Lukomṙa kuṙi kuṙi, wandu woose wemwiṙikyia; na Waroma weecha walusokye handu haṙu hamwi na uruka loṙu.”
Mndu umwi, kyiiṙi kyawo, Kayafa, awekyeri Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose maka ulya, kawawia, “Nyoe muichi kyindo kyoose-pfo;
maa mukusaṟa kye kyiwaṟi mndu umwi ipfa kyipfa kya wandu, kundu uruka loose lularumare-pfo.”
Na oe aleṙeṙa kuṙo echigamba mbonyi tsakye amonyi-pfo; indi kyipfa awei Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose maka ulya, naleonguo shisuku kye Yesu nechipfa kyipfa kya uruka lulya.
Maa chi kyipfa kya uruka-lo tupu-pfo; kyaindi hamwi na isho nasanie wana woose wa Ruwa wanyanyaṟikyie; kundu wawe wamwi.
Kyasia wookyia mfiri-cho walewika kyikweena kyemmbaaga.

Koikyo Yesu aleyenda-se handu hoose kyiiṙi kya Wayuda orio mndu echimmbona-pfo; indi nalewuka urukyenyi lo Wayuda, kayenda kufuhi na nuka ingyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, mṟasa mṟi okyelago Efraimu; kakaa pfo hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
Na Pasaka ya Wayuda iwekyeri kufuhi, na wandu wafoi wakawuka maṙemenyi wakaṙo iyenda Yerusalemu, mfiri o Pasaka ulandeshikye, kundu wawute kyilya kyechiwailyiṟa kyimṟumoe mesonyi ga Ruwa.
Kyasia wakapfula Yesu, wakawesana kunu wagoṟokyi hekalunyi, wechigamba, “Muwonyi kuṙa? Aicha na kunu mṟumoenyi-pfoe?”
Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo walekowagamba kye mndu kamanya handu akyeri, naende mbonyi, kundu waiṙime immbaṙa.
Kyasia hatsugae mfiri iṟandaaṟu mṟumoe o Pasaka uafukyie, Yesu naleshika Betania, halya-ndu Lasaro awekyeri, ulya Yesu alemṟutsa ko wapfu.
Kyasia wakamwachikyia shelya ipfo Betania; na Marita naweiṟunda pfo, na Lasaro nawekyeri umwi o walya waweilya hamwi na Yesu.
Kyasia Maria kaira panti ya mafura gekyepfaama necha, na ga woguru wung'anyi, kashia Yesu maṙende, kaanguo maṙende-go kui njui tsakye. Numba iya yoose ikaichuo mpfaamo o mafuṙa-go gekyepfaama necha.
Kyasia Yuda Isikariote, umwi o wanalosho wakye, ulya awekundi imṟiinga, kagamba,
“Ny'kyilyi mafuṙa-ga gekyepfaama necha galakumbo dinari magana gaṟaaṟu tsikaenengo wakyiwa?”
Na oe nalegamba kuṙo, chi kyipfa alewonia wakyiwa wukyiwa-pfo; indi kyipfa oe nawei mbafu, na oe nyi oe awekyekooma kyikuchu kya heleri, kakuwutia pfo heleri chandu alekunda.
Kyasia Yesu kagamba, “Mlekyenyi nakumbuo ikyo awuta, kyipfa kyawuto kui ikumbuo mfiri o iṟiko lyako.
Cha kyipfa mfiri yoose muwoṙe wakyiwa; indi mochikaa na inyi mfiri yoose-pfo.”
Kyasia wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda walemanya kye nawekyeri kulya Betania; wakacha, chi kyipfa kya Yesu tikyi-pfo, indi kundu wawone na Lasaro, ulya Yesu alekoamṟutsa ko wapfu.
Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakawika kyikweena kyewaaga Lasaro;
cha kyipfa kyipfa kya Lasaro wandu wafoi walelekana na wang'anyi-wo wa makohanyi, wakaiṙikyia Yesu.
Ilya-ngama wandu wafoi walekowacha kyipfa kya mṟumoe waleicho kye Yesu naicha na Yerusalemu.
Wakafunja maṟamba ga mashiṙi gai cha makangachi, wakafumia nja indemwambilyia. Wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mndumii naṟumisho! Ulya ammbikyie mboṟa aicha kui rina lya Mndumii, Mangyi o Isiraelyi!”
Na Yesu nalekoammbona nzoi, kaṙamia wuye yayo, chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Mulaowuoe wandu wa Yerusalemu;
mangyi onyu naicha, naṙamilyie nzoi.”
Mbonyi-tso wanalosho wakye waletsimanya ipfo mawookyionyi-pfo; kyaindi kyiyeri Yesu aleng'anyiso nyi lyo-ndu walekumbuo kye shiṟeio shiwegambie mbonyi tsakye kuṙo, na kye walemmbutia isho.
Wandu walya wawei na Yesu kyiyeri kyilya alelaga Lasaro na imṟutsa iwuka upfunyi walekowammbia ny'kyikyi kyilekokyawutika.
Na kyipfa kya ikyo wandu wafoi wa kyisanzionyi wakayenda imwambilyia, cha kyipfa waleicho kye nawuta kyindo-kyo kya kyiṟiyisho.
Kyasia Mafarisayo wakawiana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Kuwoṙe kyindo luiria iha-pfo; wandu woose waimwosha.”
Kuwewoṙe Wakyiṟikyi waata kyiiṙi kya wandu walekowayenda Yerusalemu iterewa Ruwa kyiyeri kya mṟumoe ulya o Pasaka.
Kyasia Wakyiṟikyi-wo waleyenda ko Filyipo (awewukyie Betisaida urukyenyi lo Galyilaya), wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Mndumii, soe lukundi iwona Yesu.”
Filyipo kayenda, kawia Anderea; numa ya iho Anderea na Filyipo wakawia Yesu.
Yesu na oe kawagaluo, kagamba, “Kyiyeri kyamshika. Mana o Adamu naṟumisho.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mbeu ya nganu ilandeolokye terinyi, ikapfa, yekyekaa wuṙo chandu iwekyeri; indi ikapfa yekyekumbia ndunda tsifoi.
Ulya akundi mrima okye nechiuṙetsa; na ulya asuuye mrima okye kyiyeri-kyo akyeri kunu wuyanenyi nechiukyiṟa mṟasa moo o mlungana.
Mndu kangyiṟundia nangyioshe; na inyi handu ngyikyeri nyi ho-ndu na mṟundi oko echikaa. Lyingyi-se mndu kangyiṟundia, Awu nechimwindia.”
“Wulalu mrima oko uiṟewe; na inyi ngyigambe kyi? Ngyigambe ‘Awu ungyiwute kyiyeri-kyi kya iyesho lying'anyi?’ Kyaindi ngyilecha na kunu wuyanenyi kyipfa kya kyiyesho-kyi.
Awu, ng'anyisa rina lyapfo.” Kyasia kukocha ṟui lyawuka ruwewu lyikagamba, “Ngalying'anyisa, na inyi ngyechilying'anyisa-se.”
Kyasia wandu wa kyisanzionyi kyiwekyeri kufuhi wakaicho, wakagamba, “Kowaṙa ndiṟimo.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Malaika aṙeṙa na oe.”
Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ṟui-lyo lyacha kyipfa kyako-pfo, indi kyipfa kyanyu.
Wulalu nyi kyiyeri kyeanduya wuyana. Wulalu Satana, mchilyi o wuyana-wu, nechiwiyitso nja.
Na inyi ngairo iwuka kunu urukyenyi ngyechikuruo woose wache na koko.”
Nalegamba isho echiloṟa nyi upfu lo mbaṟe iha echipfa.
Kyasia wandu wa kyisanzionyi wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Soe luleicho uwawasonyi kye Kristo nai pfo mṟasa mlungana; na iyoe nugamba kuṙa kye Mana o Adamu nawaṟi iirio wuye? Mana-cho o Adamu nyi wui?”
Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Ngyeela ikyeri na nyoe kyiyeri kyifuhi. Yendenyi kyiyeri-kyo muwoṙe ngyeela, meema ulachemuolokyia; kyipfa aichumia meemenyi aichi kundu aiyenda-pfo.
Iṙikyienyi ulya ekyeende ngyeela, kyiyeri-kyo akyeri na nyoe, kundu muiṙime iwa wana wa ngyeela.” Isho Yesu naleonguo, kayenda kakuṟiika wandu walammbone.
Maa chandu alewuta shindo shifoi kuṙo sha kyiṟiyisho mbele yawo wandu walemwiṙikyia-pfo;
kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya moonguo shisuku Yesaya alegamba,
“Mndumii, nyi wui aleiṙikyia mbonyi tsaṙu;
na nyi wui Ruwa alemloṟa pfinya tsakye?”
Nyikyo kyitewe wo walaleiṙima iiṙikyia; cha kyipfa Yesaya nalegamba-se,
“Nalewagaluo shipfupfuṟe,
mrima yawo kaiumiṟa;
kundu meso gawo galawone,
na mṙoe yawo ilamanye;
wakangyigalukyia, ngawakyiṟa.”
Mbonyi-tsi Yesaya naletsionguo, cha kyipfa nalewona mng'ano okye, kasenda mbonyi tsakye.

Kyaindi maa kyiiṙi kya wandu wawoṙe rina kyiiṙi kya Wayuda kuwewoṙe wafoi walemwiṙikyia; indi kyipfa kya Mafarisayo waleonguo mbonyi tsakye kulawoṙe iṟikyia-ṟikyia-pfo, kundu walacheimo ikulunga na walya wawekyeyenda sinagoginyi.
Cha kyipfa walekunda iṟumisho nyi wandu kuta iṟumisho nyi Ruwa.
Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi kagamba, “Ulya angyiiṙikyia inyi, angyiiṙikyia inyi-pfo indi naiṙikyia ulya alengyiṙuma.
Na ulya angyiambuya inyi naambuya ulya alengyiṙuma.
Inyi ngyilecha kundu ngyiwe ngyeela ya wuyana, kundu orio mndu angyiiṙikyia inyi alakae meemenyi.
Na mndu kaicho malosho gako alagaoshe, inyi ngyechimwanduya-pfo; kyipfa ngyilecha kundu ngyianduye wuyana-pfo, indi ngyikyiṟe wuyana.
Ulya angyilega inyi, alaambilyie malosho gako, nawoṙe momwanduya; mbonyi-tso ngaonguo nyitso tsechimwanduya mfiri o furumia.
Cha kyipfa inyi ngyileonguo mbonyi tsa mrima oko tupu-pfo; indi Awu alengyiṙuma, oe nalengyiwia shindo ngyechigamba.
Na inyi ngyiichi iwawaso lyakye nyi moo o mlungana. Kyasia isho ngyionguo inyi, chandu Awu alengyiwia, nyisho ngyionguo.”
Kyasia, mṟumoe o Pasaka ulandeafukyie Yesu nalemanya kye kyiyeri kyakye kyewuka kunu wuyanenyi iyenda ko Awu, kyiwemshika. Na nalekunda walya wawekyemwosha kunu wuyanenyi, kawakunda mnu.
Na kyiyeri kya kyelya kya kyukonyi; Mokyiriinzi naleenenga Yuda, mana o Simion Isikariote, ngoo yemṟiinga.
Yesu aichi kye Awu namṙambikyie shoose na kye nawukyie ko Ruwa na oe naiyenda ko Ruwa,
nalewuka halya shelyenyi, kayenda mbai kawuta pfo nguwo tsakye, kaira kyitambaa, kakuinewa kyitsinyi.
Numa ya iho kawika mṟinga pakulyinyi, kawooka isanja wanalosho wakye maṙende, na igaanguo kui kyitambaa kyilya awekuinewie.
Kashika ko Simion Petiro na oe kammbesa, “Mndumii! Iyoe nungyisanja maṙende?”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyindo ngyiwuta ochikyimanya wulalu-pfo; kyaindi nochikyimanya numa ya iha.”
Petiro kammbia, “Iyoe ochingyisanja maṙende maa ale-pfo.” Yesu kammbia, “Ngyilandekusanje maṙende, ukyeri ura loko-pfo.”
Simion Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, chi maṙende gako tupu-pfo, indi sanja na mawoko gako na mṙoe oko taa.”
Yesu kammbia, “Ulya amsambe awoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kyesamba maṙende-pfo, kyipfa namwilyi mmbiu oose; na nyoe momuila kyaindi chi moose-pfo.”
Cha kyipfa nalemanya ulya echimṟiinga; nyikyo kyitewe alegamba, “Chi moose muweelyi-pfo.”
Kyasia amuwasanje maṙende, na iṟaa nguwo tsakye na iṙamia-se halya-ndu waweilyiia kyelya, nalewawia, “Ngyesa momanya isho ngammbutia?”
Nyoe muingyilaga, “Mlosha” na “Mndumii;” moṙeṙa necha, kyipfa nyi wuṙo ngyikyeri.
Kyasia kokooya inyi, ngyikyeri Mndumii na Mlosha, ngamusanja maṙende, na wuṙo kyimmbari isanjana maṙende nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
Cha kyipfa ngamumloṟa chandu mowuta; kundu chandu ngammbutia, na nyoe muwute kuṙo.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mtumo ang'anyi kuta mndumii okye-pfo; maa moṙiko ndumo ang'anyi kuta ulya amṙuma-pfo.
Wulalu momanya isho ngammbia; agusu nyoe kokooya moshiwuta!
Ngyiṙeṙa mbonyi tsa nyoe moose-pfo. Ngyiichi walya ngyilewasambuṟa; kyaindi kyiṟeio kyiiṙime iafukyia; kyiṟeio kyilya kyigambie,
“Ulya alelya kyelya kyako
nawa mokyituwa oko.”
“Wookyia wulalu ngammbia shilya shechiwutika, kyiyeri-kyi shilandewutikye; kundu ilyi shechiwutika muiṙime iiṙikyia kye inyi nyi oe ulya ai pfo wookyia mlungana.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ulya aambilyia mndu oose ngamṙuma, nangyiambilyia inyi; na ulya angyiambilyia inyi naambilyia ulya alengyiṙuma.”
Na Yesu amwonguo isho, naleiṟewe mrimenyi, kaṟingyishia echigamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, umwi onyu nechingyiṟiinga.”
Wanalosho wakaambuyana, walamanye nyi wui aweimsenda.
Na kuwewoṙe umwi o wanalosho wakye, aweṙamie kufuhi na Yesu; Yesu awemkundi.
Kyasia Simion Petiro kamtsinia, kammbia, “Wesa, nyi wui amsenda?”
Kyasia manalosho ulya katikyira kaaramia ura lo Yesu, kammbesa, “Mndumii, nyi wui?”
Kyasia Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyi mndu ulya ngyechikapa itongye kyitelenyi na imwenengyia.” Kakapa itongye kyitelenyi kalyienengyia Yuda, mana o Simion Isikariote.
Yuda amwambilyie itongye lyilya Satana kaiṙa na mrimenyi kokye. Kyasia Yesu kammbia, “Shindo uiwuta shiwute iwinyi.”
Maa kuwoṙe mndu oose kyiiṙi kya walya waweṙamie halya alemanya kyitewe kya immbia kuṙo-pfo.
Cha kyipfa walekusaṟa, kyipfa Yuda awekyekooma kyikuchu kya heleri, Yesu nammbia kye, guṟa shilya lukundi kyipfa kya mṟumoe-chu; ang'u nammbia kye naenengye wakyiwa kyindo.
Kyasia Yuda, amwambilyie itongye lyilya, kawuka halya kyiyeri kyilya kyilya. Na nyi-we kyio.
Yuda amfumie nja, Yesu nalegamba, “Wulalu Mana o Adamu nang'anyiso, na Ruwa nang'anyiso kyiiṙi kyakye.
Ruwa nechimng'anyisa mrimenyi kokye; na oe nechimng'anyisa cha ilyi.
Nyoe wana wako, hatsugai kyiyeri kyitutu ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe; mochingyipfula; na chandu ngyilewia Wayuda kye, ‘Kulya-ndu ngyiyenda moiṙima icha na pfo-pfo’; na wuṙo wulalu ngyimmbia nyoe.
Ngyimuenenga iwawaso lyihya: ‘Mukundane.’ Chandu ngyilemukunda nyoe, na nyoe mukundane wuṙo.
Kuṙo wandu woose wechimanya kye nyoe mowa wanalosho wako, kokooya mokundana nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.”
Simion Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, ny'kwi uiyenda?” Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Kulya-ndu ngyiyenda oiṙima ingyiosha wulalu-pfo; kyaindi nongyiosha numa.”
Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, ny'kyilyi inyi ngyilechiiṙima ikuosha wulalu? Inyi ngyechireka moo oko kyipfa kyapfo.”
Yesu kamgaluo, kammbia, “Ngyesa iyoe nochireka moo opfo kyipfa kyako? Ny'kyaloi ngakuwia, ilying'onyi lyechifuga ulangyikana kaṟaaṟu-pfo.”
“Maa mulaiṟewe mrimenyi konyu; muiṙikyie Ruwa, ngyiiṙikyienyi na inyi.
Kanyi ko Awu oko kuwoṙe kundu kufoi kokaa. Kyilawei kuṙo ngyiwechimmbia; kyipfa ngyindemuṟeyeṟia handu hekaa.
Kyasia inyi ngyindemuṟeyeṟia handu hekaa. Ngyechicha-se ngyimuṙuo koko; kundu handu ngyikyeri, na nyoe mukae ho.
Na kundu ngyiyenda nyoe muichi njia.”
Tomasi kammbia, “Mndumii, soe luichi kundu uiyenda-pfo; luichi kuṙa njia?”
Yesu kammbia, “Inyi nyi njia, na wuloi na moo. Mndu ekyecha na ko Awu, sile kui iiṙia koko-pfo.
Kokooya muwengyiichi inyi, muwechimanya Awu. Wookyia wulalu mumwichi, lyingyi-se momummbona.”
Filyipo kammbia, “Mndumii luloṟe Awu, kyilushikyie.”
Yesu kammbia, “Inyi ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe mfiri yoose, iyoe ulangyimanye Filyipo? Angyiwona inyi nawona Awu. Kyasia iyoe nuigamba kuṙa ‘ululoṟe Awu?’
Uiṙikyie kye inyi ngyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Awu, na Awu nakyeri kyiiṙi kyako? Isho ngyimuongoya wulalu chi makusaṟo gako inyi-pfo kyaindi nyi Awu ulya akyeri kyiiṙi kyako aiṟunda shilya akundi iṟunda.
Iṙikyienyi kye inyi ngyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Awu, na Awu nakyeri kyiiṙi kyako. Mulandeiṙikyie kyipfa kya ikyo iṙikyienyi kyipfa kya shilya ngyiwuta.
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ulya angyiiṙikyia inyi, shindo shilya ngyiwuta, na oe nechishiwuta; yee, na shing'anyi kuta isho nechiwuta cha kyipfa inyi ngyiyenda ko Awu.
Na nyoe, mukoterewa kyindo kyoose kyipfa mukyeri wanalosho wako, ikyo ngyechikyiwuta, kundu Awu nang'anyiso kyiiṙi kya Mana.
Mukoterewa kyindo kyoose kyipfa mukyeri wanalosho wako ngyechikyiwuta.”
“Mukongyikunda mochiosha kyilya mawawaso gako gakundi.
Na inyi ngyechiterewa Awu, na oe nechimuenenga Mtarami ungyi, kundu nakae na nyoe mṟasa mlungana.
Nyi oe Mumuyo o loi; ulya wandu wa wuyana walechiiṙima imwambililyia, cha kyipfa wammbonyi maa wamwichi-pfo; indi nyoe mumwichi, kyipfa nekyekaa konyu; na oe nechikaa mrimenyi konyu.
Ngyechimṙa ngoṙa-pfo. Ngyiicha na konyu.
Hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu wandu wa wuyana walechingyiwona-se; indi nyoe mungyiwonyi. Na kyipfa inyi ngyiwoṙe moo, maa nyoe mochiwaṙa moo.
Mfiri ulya mochimanya kye inyi na Awu oko nyi kyindo kyimwi, na inyi na nyoe nyi kyindo kyimwi.
Ulya aambilyia mawawaso gako na igaosha, icho nyi oe angyikundi; na ulya angyikundi Awu oko nechimkunda; na inyi ngyechimkunda na imloṟa mbonyi tsako na pata.”
Yuda (chi oe Yuda Isikariote-pfo) kammbia, “Mndumii, kyawa kuṙa ukundi iṟingyishia mbonyi tsapfo koṙu na chi ko wandu wa wuyana-pfo?”
Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Mndu kangyikunda nechiosha kyilya malosho gako gakundi; na Awu oko nechimkunda; na soe lochicha na kokye, na iwika kyiṟaṟo kokye.
Mndu alangyikundi, ekyeosha kyilya malosho gako gakundi-pfo; na malosho-go mugaichuoe chi gako-pfo, indi nyi ga ulya alengyiṙuma.”
“Isho nyisho ngyilemuongoya kyiyeri-kyo ngyiwekyekaa konyu.
Kyaindi Mtarami-cho, Mumuyo-cho Mweele, ulya Awu echimṙika kui rina lyako, nechimulosha shoose, na imukumbuṟa shoose ngyilemmbia.
Ngamṙeeya ufoṟo. Ufoṟo loko ngamuenenga. Chandu ngyimuenenga chi wuṙo wuyana wokyeenenga-pfo. Mulaiṟewe mrimenyi konyu, maa mulawaṙe wuowu.
Muleicho kye inyi ngyilemmbia, ‘Ngyiyenda na ngyiicha-se na konyu.’ Kokooya muwengyikundi, muwechichihiyo kyipfa ngyiyenda ko Awu; cha kyipfa Awu nang'anyi kuta inyi.
Na wulalu ngamuongoya isho shilaafukyia kundu ilyi shechiafukyia muiṙime iiṙikyia.
Inyi ngyechiṙeṙa-se na nyoe shindo shifoi-pfo, cha kyipfa Satana, mchilyi o wuyana-wu naicha, na echiiṙima ingyiwutia kyindo-pfo.
Kyaindi wandu wa wuyana wamanye kye ngyikundi Awu; na shilya Awu alengyiwia, nyisho ngyiwuta. Nnjonyi luwukye iha.”
“Inyi nyi msabibu o loi, na Awu oko nyi oe mṙemi.
Orio mbaga ilekyekumbia ndunda ngyekyeimanya; na orio mbaga yekyekumbia ndunda ngyekyeianguo, kundu iengyeṟe ikumbia ndunda.
Nyoe momuila kyipfa kya mbonyi-tsi ngammbia.
Nyoe na inyi luwe kyindo kyimwi. Chandu mbaga ilechiiṙima ikumbia ndunda ilakuwoṙe msabibunyi; na wuṙo taa kyechiwa konyu mulandewe kyindo kyimwi na inyi.
Inyi nyi msabibu; nyoe nyi mbaga; ulya awa kyindo kyimwi na inyi, nekumbia ndunda tsifoi mnu; kyipfa ngyilai ho inyi moiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose-pfo.
Mndu alandewe kyindo kyimwi na inyi nekyewiyitso cha mbaga na iuma; wandu wakatsisania na itsiwiyitsa moṙonyi tsikasenekyia.
Nyoe mukowa kyindo kyimwi na inyi, na malosho gako gakakaa mrimenyi konyu, terewenyi kyindo kyoose mukundi na nyoe mochienengo.
Kuṙo Awu oko neching'anyiso, kyipfa muikumbia ndunda tsifoi mnu; na nyoe mochiwa wanalosho wako.
“Chandu Awu alengyikunda inyi, na chandu ngyilemukunda nyoe, kaenyi ikundenyi lyako.
Mukoosha kyilya mawawaso gako gakundi, mochikaa ikundenyi lyako; chandu inyi ngyekyeosha mawawaso ga Awu oko na ikaa ikundenyi lyakye.
Ngamuongoya isho, kundu sia yako ikae mrimenyi konyu, na sia yanyu iafutsio.
Iwawaso lyako nyi ilyi, mukundane, chandu ngyilemukunda nyoe.
Kuwoṙe awoṙe ikunda lying'anyi kuta ilyi, lya mndu ireka moo okye kyipfa kya mbuya tsakye-pfo.
Nyoe mochiwa mbuya tsako, mukowuta shilya ngammbia.
Ngyimulaga-se watumo-pfo; cha kyipfa mtumo aichi kyindo mndumii okye ekyewuta-pfo; kyaindi ngamlaga mbuya; cha kyipfa shoose ngyileshiicho ko Awu oko ngamuongoya.

Chi nyoe mulengyisambuṟa inyi-pfo, indi nyi inyi ngyilemusambuṟa nyoe; kundu mundekumbia ndunda; na ndunda tsanyu tsiiṙime ikaa ho mfiri yoose; kundu orio kyindo moterewa Awu kui rina lyako namuenengye.
Ishi ngammbia nyoe, muiṙime ikundana.”
“Kokooya wandu wa wuyana wamsuo, manyenyi kye walengyisuo inyi kuwooka.
Kokooya nyoe muwei wandu wa wuyana, wawechimukunda; kyaindi kyipfa nyoe mulakyeri wandu wa wuyana, indi inyi ngyilemusambuṟa nyoe iwuka wandu wa wuyana, kyipfa kya ikyo wandu wa wuyana wamusuuye.
Kumbuonyi mbonyi tsilya ngyilemuongoya, kye mtumo ang'anyi kuta mndumii okye-pfo. Kokooya walengyipfulutsa nyashi, wechimpfulutsa nyashi nyoe; kokooya waleosha malosho gako, wechiosha ganyu taa.
Kyaindi ishi shoose wechimmbutia kyipfa kya rina lyako, cha kyipfa waichi ulya alengyiṙuma-pfo.
Kokooya ngyilalecha na iṙeṙa nawo wawechikumbuṟo kya wunyamaṟi wowo-pfo; kyaindi wulalu wekaria igamba kye waichi kye isho wawekyewuta nyi wunyamaṟi-pfo.
Ulya angyisuuye inyi nasuuye na Awu oko.
Wawechikumbuṟo kya wunyamaṟi wowo kokooya ngyilalewuta kyiiṙi kyawo shindo shilandewuto mndu ungyi oose-pfo; kyaindi wulalu wammbona shilya ngawuta, wakangyisuo inyi na Awu oko.
Kyaindi kundu kyindo kyilya kyikyiṟeie uwawasonyi lowo kyiafukyie, kyindo kyigambie, ‘Walengyisuo wulya.’
Kyaindi kyiyeri-kyo Mtarami-cho echicha, ngyechimṙika iwuka ko Awu, Mumuyo-cho o loi awukyie ko Awu, oe nechingyiṟingyishia.
Na nyoe taa muingyiṟingyishia, cha kyipfa wookyia mawookyionyi muwekyeri hamwi na inyi.
“Mbonyi-tso ngamuongoya kundu mulacheṙetsa iiṙikyia.
Wechimuletsana na walya wekyeyenda masinagoginyi; yee loi kyiyeri kyiicha orio mndu aimbaaga echikusaṟa kye naiindia Ruwa kui iwuta kuṙo.
Na isho wechimmbutia cha kyipfa waichi Awu maa inyi-pfo.
Kyaindi ngamuongoya isho, kundu kyiyeri kyiyeri-kyo kyechicha mukumbuo kye inyi nyilemmbia. Ngyilemmbia isho wookyia mawookyionyi-pfo, cha kyipfa ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe.”
“Kyaindi wulalu inyi ngyiyenda ko ulya alengyiṙuma, maa kuwoṙe umwi onyu aingyiwesa ny'kwi ngyiyenda-pfo.
Indi cha kyipfa ngammmbia isho fowa iichuo mrimenyi konyu.
Kyaindi inyi ngammbia shii loi; mochiwona kyiira inyi ngayenda; cha kyipfa inyi ngyilandeyende, Mtarami-cho echicha na konyu-pfo; indi inyi ngayenda, ngyechimṙika konyu.
Na oe kamcha nechiloṟa wandu wa wuyana kye wekyeṙeko kyiyeri wekyegamba kye waichi mbonyi tsa wunyamaṟi. Kye waichi kyiha kyikyeri kya sungusinyi na kye waichi mbonyi tsa ianduyo nyi Ruwa.
Oe nechiloṟa wandu wa wuyana kye wawoṙe wunyamaṟi, kyipfa walengyiiṙikyia inyi-pfo.
Kye wawoṙe ṙeko kui igamba waichi kyikyeri kya sungusinyi kyipfa ngyiyenda ko Awu, maa mochingyiwona-se-pfo.
Kye wechianduyo kyipfa Satana, mchilyi o wuyana-wu, amwanduyo.
Ngyiwoṙe shindo shifoi shemuongoya, kyaindi moiṙima ishienenga ṙaawa makusaṟonyi ganyu wulalu-pfo.

Kyaindi kyiyeri oe echicha, Mumuyo-cho o loi, nechimusongoya, namushukuye wuloi woose; cha kyipfa echiṙeṙa kui wuchilyi wokye amonyi-pfo, indi shoose echiicho neshionguo, na shindo shiicha nechimuongoya mbonyi tsakye.
Oe nechingying'anyisa inyi; cha kyipfa nechiicho shilya ngyekyegamba na imuongoya.
Na shoose Awu awoṙe nyi shako. Ny'kyo kyitewe ngagamba nechiicho shilya ngyekyegamba na imuongoya.”
“Hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona-pfo; lyingyi-se hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona.”

Kyasia wanalosho wakye waata wakawesana, “Mbonyi tsiha itso aigamba, ‘Hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona-pfo, na lyingyi-se hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mongyiwona?’ Na ‘Cha kyipfa ngyiyenda ko Awu?’ ”
Kyasia wakagamba, “Mbonyi tsiha itso aigamba, ‘hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu?’ Luichi kyindo aigamba-pfo.”
Yesu nalemanya kye wawekundi immbesa; kawawesa, “Ny'kyo muiwesana, kye ngyilegamba, ‘hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona-pfo; na lyingyi-se hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona?’
Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, nyoe mochilyia na ikapa ṟanyi, indi wandu wa wuyana wechichihiyo. Nyoe mochiwoṙo nyi fowa, kyaindi nyi fowa yanyu yechiwa sia.

Mndu mka kyiyeri-kyo aienengo mana, nekyewoṙo nyi fowa kyipfa kyiyeri kyakye kyelya wukyiwa kyaafukyia; kyaindi kamwenengo mana, ekyekumbuo-se wukyiwa wulya-pfo, kyipfa kya sia ya ifeo mndu wuyanenyi.
Kyasia nyoe wulalu muwoṙo nyi fowa; kyaindi inyi ngyechimmbona-se; na mrima yanyu yechichihiyo, na sia yanyu kuwoṙe mndu echimusoka-pfo.
Lyingyi-se mfiri ulya mochingyiwesa kyindo kyoose-pfo. Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mukoterewa Awu kyindo kyoose nechimuenenga kui rina lyako.
Mṟasa wulalu mulandeterewe kyindo kui rina lyako-pfo. Terewenyi, na nyoe mochienengo; kundu muchihiyo nakamwi.”
“Isho ngamuongoya kui mbia. Kyiyeri kyiicha ngyilechiṙeṙa-se na nyoe kui mbia; kyaindi mbonyi tsa Awu ngyechimuongoya na pata.
Na mfiri-cho mochiterewa kui rina lyako; maa ngyimmbia kye inyi ngyechimuterewia ko Awu-pfo;
cha kyipfa Awu namukundi kyipfa nyoe mongyikunda inyi, na iiṙikyia kye inyi ngyilewuka ko Awu.
Ngyilewuka ko Awu, na inyi ngyilecha na kunu wuyanenyi. Lyingyi-se ngyiwuka kunu wuyanenyi; na iyenda ko Awu.”
Kyasia wanalosho wakye wakagamba, “Wulalu nuionguo na pata; uiṙeṙa-se kui mbia-pfo.
Wulalu lomanya kye nuichi shindo shoose; kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kya mndu ikuwesa kyindo-pfo. Koikyo loiṙikyia kye nulewuka ko Ruwa.”
Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa moiṙikyia wulalu?
Kyiyeri kyiicha, nakyo kyamcha, kyiyeri mochinyanyaṟika orio mndu kanyi kokye, na ingyiṙa ngyimonyi. Kyaindi inyi ngyikyeri ngyimonyi-pfo, cha kyipfa Awu nakyeri hamwi na inyi.
Isho ngammbia muiṙime iwaṙa ufoṟo muwaṙanyi na inyi. Kunu wuyanenyi muwoṙe fowa; kyaindi kuwanzenyi; inyi ngyilewinga wuyana.”
Yesu nalegamba mbonyi-tso, kaambuya ruwewu, kagamba, “Awu, kyiyeri kyamshika. Ng'anyisa Mono-pfo, kundu Mono-pfo nakung'anyise iyoe;
chandu ulemwenenga momu o ichilyia wandu, kundu woose ulemwenenga nawaenengye moo o mlungana.
Na moo o mlungana nyi: ‘Wakumanye iyoe, Ruwa o loi kulawoṙe ungyi; na Yesu Kristo ulemṙuma.’
Inyi ngyilekung'anyisa wuyanenyi, iṟunda ulengyiwia ngyiṟunde ngyilelyimarisa.
Na wulalu, Awu, ungying'anyise inyi hamwi na iyoe, kui kyiṟumi kyilya ngyiwewoṙe kyiyeri wuyana wulagumbo.
Walya ulengyienenga kunu wuyanenyi ngyilewashukuya kyiṟumi kyapfo. Wawekyeri wapfo, kowangyienenga, na malosho gapfo wekyegaosha.
Wulalu waichi kye shoose ungyienengyie shiwukyie kopfo.
Cha kyipfa malosho ulengyienenga ngyilewaṙambika; nawo wakagaambilyia, wakamanya loi kye ngyilewuka kopfo, wakaiṙikyia kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.
Inyi ngyiwaterewia iwo; ngyiterewia wandu wa wuyana-pfo; indi iwo ulengyienenga, cha kyipfa iwo nyi wako;
na woose wai wako nyi wapfo; na wai wapfo nyi wako, na inyi ngaṟumisho mrimenyi kowo.
“Maa inyi ngyikyeri-se wuyanenyi-pfo, kyaindi wo wakyeri wuyanenyi, na inyi ngyiicha na kopfo. Awu mweele, kui rina lyapfo ulengyienenga uwaringye iwa, kundu wawaṙane tapu chandu soe lukyeri.
Kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri hamwi nawo, inyi ngyilewaringa kui rina lyapfo ulengyienenga, ngawaambuya; maa kuwoṙe umwi owo aleṙeka-pfo, sile mana ulya o wuṙetsi, kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie.
Na wulalu ngyiicha na kopfo; na mbonyi-tsi ngyitsionguo wuyanenyi, kundu sia yako iafutsio mrimenyi kowo.
Inyi ngyilewaṙambika malosho gako; na wandu wa wuyana walewasuo kyipfa wo chi wa wuyana-pfo, chandu inyi ngyilakyeri o wuyana.
Inyi ngyiterewa kye uwawute kunu wuyanenyi-pfo indi uwaringye walaolotso nyi Satana.
Wo chi wandu wa wuyana-pfo, chandu inyi ngyilakyeri o wuyana.
Uwailyishe kui Ṙeṙo lyapfo. Mbonyi tsapfo nyitso wuloi.
Chandu ulengyiṙuma inyi wuyanenyi, na inyi nyi wuṙo ngyilewaṙuma wuyanenyi.
Na kyipfa kyawo ngakuṙambika kopfo ngyikuṟundie, kundu nawo wakuṙambikye kopfo wakuṟundie, wailyisho nyi Ṙeṙo lyapfo lyii lya loi.
“Maa chi iwo tupu ngyiwaterewia-pfo; kyaindi ngyiterewia na walya wechingyiiṙikyia kyipfa kya malosho gawo.

Woose wawaṙane tapu; chandu iyoe, Awu, ukyeri kyindo kyimwi na inyi, na inyi kyindo kyimwi na iyoe; iwo nawo wawe kyindo kyimwi na soe; kundu wandu wa wuyana waiṙime iiṙikyia kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.
Na inyi mng'ano ulya ulengyienenga ngyilewaenenga; kundu wawaṙane tapu chandu soe luwaṙanyi tapu.
Inyi ngyiwe kyindo kyimwi nawo, na iyoe uwe kyindo kyimwi na inyi, kundu wawaṙane tapu; na wandu wa wuyana wamanye kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma, kowakunda wo chandu ulengyikunda inyi.
Awu, iwo ulengyienenga ngyikundi wakae handu hamwi na inyi orio handu ngyikyeri, waiṙime iwona mng'ano ulengyienenga; cha kyipfa nulengyikunda wookyia wuyana wulagumbo.
Awu, iyoe okyeanduya kulawoṙe ikundia, wandu wa wuyana walekumanya-pfo; kyaindi inyi ngyilekumanya, na iwo wamanya kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.
Na inyi ngyilewaloṟa iyoe nyi wui, lyingyi-se ngyechiengyeṟa iwuta kuṙo, kundu ikunda lyilya ulyiwoṙe koko lyikae mrimenyi kowo na inyi ngyiwe kyindo kyimwi nawo.”
Kyiyeri amwonguoe isho, Yesu nalefuma hamwi na wanalosho wakye iyenda molyolya o kyimfo kyekyelago Kyediron, handu hawewoṙe bustanyi, kaiṙa na ipfo bustanyinyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
Na Yuda, ulya awekundi imṟiinga, naweichi handu halya; cha kyipfa Yesu kafoi nawekyeyenda pfo hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
Kyasia Yuda, aṙuṙanyi na asikari na waṟundi wawewukyie ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo, kayenda pfo, waṙuṙe taa na shimii na shisha.
Kyasia Yesu, aichi shoose shechimmbutikyia, kafuma kulya bustanyinyi, kawawia, “Nyi wui muimpfula?”
Wo wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Nyi Yesu o Nasareti.” Yesu kawawia, “Nyi inyi.” Yuda ulya alemṟiinga nawegoṟokyi hamwi nawo.
