Kyasia kyiyeri alewawia, “Nyi inyi,” walewuya na numa, wakaoloka wanda.
Kawawesa-se, “Muipfula wui?” Wakagamba, “Yesu o Nasareti.”
Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngamummbia kye nyi inyi. Kyasia kokooya muingyipfula inyi, lekyienyi iwa wayende.”
Kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya alekoagamba, “Walya ulengyienenga ngyileṙetsa maa umwi-pfo.”
Kyasia Simion Petiro nawewoṙe ushu, kalusoṟomuo, kamanya nalo mtumo o Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kamṙumbuo kuṙwi ko kulyoe. Na mtumo ulya nawekyelago Malyiko.
Kyasia Yesu kawia Petiro, “Wiyiṟia ushu-lo ipfo kyiṟandenyi. Ngyesa, nokusaṟa ngyikundi ituurika chandu Awu angyiṟeyeṟie ngyituurikye-pfoe?”
Kyasia asikari walya na msongoru o wayuda walewaṙa Yesu, wakampfunga.
Wakamṙuo ko Anasi kuwooka, cha kyipfa nawekyeri watoe o Kayafa, ulya awekyeri Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose maka ulya.
Na Kayafa nyi oe alewia Wayuda kye kyiwechia mndu umwi napfe kyipfa kya wandu wengyi.

Petiro na manalosho ungyi wakayenda ko Yesu. Na manalosho-cho naweichio nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose. Kyipfa kya ikyo oe na Yesu wakaiṙa na handu hesanzia ha numba ya Mkohanyi-cho ang'anyi kuta woose.
Kyaindi Petiro kagoṟoka nja moongonyi. Kyasia manalosho ulya ungyi aweichio nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kafuma, kaṙeṙa na kyisinga kyekyeringa moongo, kaitsa Petiro na numba.
Kyasia kyisinga kyilya, kyiwewoṙe iṟunda lyeringa moongo, kyikawia Petiro, “Ngyesa iyoe ui umwi o wanalosho wa mndu-chu-pfoe?” Na oe kagamba, “Chi inyi-pfo.”
Na watumo walya wa waṟundi wawegoṟokyi mbai weoṙa moṙo; kyipfa kuwewoṙe mbeho. Petiro na oe nawekyeri hamwi nawo, echioṙa moṙo.
Kyasia Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kawesa Yesu mbonyi tsa wanalosho wakye, na mbonyi tsa malosho gakye.
Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Inyi ngaṙeṙa na wandu wa wuyana na pata. Mfiri yoose ngyileloshia sinagoginyi na hekalunyi, handu Wayuda woose wekyesanzia; maa ngyileonguo kyindo kyoose kui kyiṟika-pfo.
Ny'kyilyi ungyiwesa inyi? Wesa walya waleicho ny'kyikyi ngyilewawia; wo waichi kyindo ngyileonguo.”
Kyasia kyiyeri alegamba isho, mṟundi umwi kyiiṙi kya walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi kakapa Yesu ukofi, echigamba, “Nuigaluo kuṙo Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose?”
Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Kokooya ngaṙeṙa uwicho, uṟingyishie wuwicho woko; indi kokooya ngaṙeṙa necha, ny'kyilyi ongyikapa ukofi?”
Kyasia Anasi kamṙuo ko Kayafa ampfungye.
Simion Petiro nawekyeri pfo echioṙa moṙo. Kyasia wakammbia, “Ngyesa iyoe ui umwi o wanalosho wakye-pfoe?” Na oe kakana, kagamba, “Chi inyi-pfo.”
Mtumo umwi kyiiṙi kya walya wa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, na oe nyi o kyishari kya ulya Petiro alemṙumbuo kuṙwi, kagamba, “Ngyilekuwona kulya bustanyinyi hamwi na oe-pfoe?”
Kyasia Petiro kakana-se, na cha ilyi ilying'onyi lyikafuga.

Kyasia wakawuta Yesu ko Kayafa wakamṙuo mṟasa numba ya wuchilyi iwekyelago Praitorio. Napfo kukokya, kyaindi wo waleiṙa na kulya numbenyi-pfo, walachefana kyimṟumoe, wachelemo ilya shelya sha mṟumoe ulya o Pasaka.
Kyasia Pilato kafumia nja, kagamba, “Mogamba wuwicho wo mndu-chu ny'kyikyi?”
Wakamgaluo, wakammbia, “Kokooya ichu alawewoṙe wuwicho luwechimwende na kopfo-pfo.”
Kyasia Pilato kawawia, “Mṙuonyi nyoe, mundemwanduya chandu uwawaso lonyu luwawasie!” Wayuda wakammbia, “Soe luwoṙe momu o iwaaga mndu-pfo.”
Kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya Yesu alekyigamba, echiloṟa nyi upfu lo mbaṟe iha echipfa.
Kyasia Pilato kaiṙa-se na kulya numbenyi ya wuchilyi, kalaga Yesu, kammbia, “Ngyesa iyoe nyi Mangyi o Wayuda?”
Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe nuigamba kuṙo kui makusaṟo gapfo, ang'u wandu wengyi walekuwia mbonyi tsako?”
Pilato kagaluo, kagamba, “Nokusaṟa kye inyi nyi Myuda? Wandu wa uruka lopfo na wang'anyi wa makohanyi nyiwo walekuende na koko. Ny'kyikyi ulewuta?”

Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Wumangyi woko chi wo wuyana-wu-pfo. Kokooya Wumangyi woko wuwekyeri wo wuyana-wu, waṟundi wako wawechikapana kyipfa kyako, kundu wasongoru wa Wayuda walaiṙime ingyiwaṙa. Kyaindi Wumangyi woko chi wo iha-pfo.”

Kyasia Pilato kammbia, “Kokooya nyi wuṙo iyoe nyi Mangyi-ng'ue?” Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nogamba kye inyi nyi Mangyi. Ngyilefeo kunu wuyanenyi kyipfa kya kyindo kyimwi tupu, ionguo mbonyi tsa loi. Orio mndu aichi mbonyi-tso tsa loi nekyeosha shilya ngyekyegamba.”
Pilato kammbia, “Mbonyi tsa loi ny'kyikyi?”
Pilato amṙeṙe na Yesu kawuya-se na ko Wayuda, kawawia, “Inyi ngyiwonyi ṙeko lyoose ko mndu-chu-pfo.
Kyaindi muichiwie inyi ngyimpfunguye mndu umwi kyiyeri kya Pasaka. Kyasia mukundi ngyimpfunguye Mangyi o Wayuda?”
Wakakalagatsa-se, wakagamba, “Chi ichu-pfo! Lukundi Baraba.” Na Baraba-cho nawei msokyi.
Kyasia Pilato kawia asikari wawute Yesu halya wandemkapa na ngowa.
Na asikari-wo wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakaṟika Yesu mṙoenyi kokye, wakamṟika na nguwo ya kyimaande-maande.
Wakayenda halya-ndu awekyeri, wechigamba, “Lokuiṟikyiṟa, Mangyi o Wayuda!” Wakamkapa ngofi.
Numa ya iho Pilato kafumia-se nja, kawawia, “Mndu-chu ngyimwende na konyu, muiṙime imanya kye inyi ngyiwonyi ṙeko lyoose kokye-pfo.”
Naaho-ng'u Yesu kafumia nja, aṟee oṟo iya ya msha, na nguwo iya ya kyimaande-maande. Pilato kawawia, “Lanyoe! Mndu ulya aichu iha!”

Kyasia wang'anyi walya wa makohanyi na waṟundi wawo kyiyeri walemmbona, walekalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mkapie msalabenyi! Mkapie msalabenyi!” Pilato kawawia, “Mṙuonyi nyoe, mundemkapia msalabenyi; cha kyipfa ngyiwonyi ṙeko kokye-pfo.”
Wayuda wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Koṙu soe mndu o mbaṟe-i nawaṟi ipfa, cha kyipfa nalekuloṟa oe nyi Mono-Ruwa.”
Kyasia kyiyeri Pilato aleicho mbonyi-tso kaengyeṟa iowuo.
Kaiṙa-se na kulya numbenyi ya wuchilyi, kawia Yesu, “Iyoe nuwukyie kwi?” Kyaindi Yesu alemgaluo kyindo-pfo.
Kyasia Pilato kammbia, “Uiṙeṙa na inyi-pfoe? Uichi ngyiwoṙe wuiṙimi wo ikupfunguo hamwi na wuiṙimi wo ikukapia msalabenyi?”
Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe uwechiwaṙa wuiṙimi woose wo ingyichilyia, kokooya Ruwa alawekuenengyie wuchilyi-wo-pfo. Koikyo icho angyiende na kopfo nawoṙe ṙeko lying'anyi kuta.”

Na wookyia kyiyeri-kyo Pilato kakunda impfunguo; kyaindi Wayuda wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Kopfunguo ichu, iyoe chi mbuya ya Kaisari-pfo. Orio mndu aikuloṟa cha ilyi oe nyi mangyi akyeri ura lo Kaisari-pfo.”
Kyasia kyiyeri Pilato aleicho mbonyi-tso, nalefumiṟia Yesu nja, kaṙamia kyiṙinyi kyakye kyeanduya, handu hawehaale magoe gang'anyi, hekyelago Gabata, ko mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania.
Na nyi-we mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa ko mṟumoe o Pasaka, kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto. Kawawia, “Lanyoe, Wayuda. Aichu Mangyi onyu!”

Kyasia wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mmbute iha! Mmbute iha! Mkapie msalabenyi!” Pilato kawawia, “Ngyesa mangyi onyu ngyimkapie msalabenyi!” Wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakamgaluo, wakammbia, “Soe luwoṙe mangi sile Kaisari-pfo.”
Kyasia Pilato kawaṙambika Yesu kundu nakapio msalabenyi; nawo wakamwambilyia.
Yesu kafuma, akuṙikyie msalaba okye, mṟasa handu hawekyelago, “Ipoṟong'u” ang'u kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, Golyigota.
Wakamkapia msalabenyi ipfo Golyigota, hamwi na wandu wengyi wawi, umwi ura-lu na umwi ura-lu, na Yesu makyiṙi-gawi.
Na Pilato kaachikyia kyiṟeio, kakyiwikyia halya msalabenyi, kyigambie: “YESU O NASARETI, MANGYI O WAYUDA.”

Kyasia kyiṟeio-kyo kyilewono nyi wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda, kyipfa halya-ndu Yesu alekapio msalabenyi nyi-we kufuhi na mṟi; na kyiṟeio-kyo kyiwekyeri kui mṙeṙie iṟaṟu: Kyiebrania, Kyilatin na Kyikyiṟikyi.
Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Wayuda wakawia Pilato, “Ulaṟeie ‘Mangyi o Wayuda’; ṟeia chandu alegamba ‘Inyi nyi mangyi o Wayuda.’ ”
Pilato kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyeilacha kyilya ngamṟeie-pfo.”

Na asikari walya kyiyeri walekapia Yesu msalabenyi, waleira nguwo tsakye, wakatsigawa kaana, orio asikari ugawi lokye; na kanzu taa. Kyasia kanzu iya iwengyishone-pfo, iwengyilungye-lungye tupu wookyia wuye mṟasa wanda.
Kyasia wakawiana, “Lulairanduo, kyaindi luikapie kuṟu kuha, lumanye yechiwa ya wui. Kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie, kyilya kyigambie,
‘Walegawa nguwo tsako,
na ikunya lyako walelyikapia kuṟu kuha.’ ”
Nyi wuṙo asikari walya walewuta.
Na halya-ndu msalaba o Yesu uwekyeri hawegoṟokyi mama o Yesu na mono-wama o wamae, Maria, mka o Kyileopa, na Maria Makyidalena.
Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alewona wamae, na manalosho ulya awemkundi agoṟokyi kufuhi, nalewia wamae, “Mama, mmbutie cha nyi mono-pfo.”
Numa ya iho kawia manalosho ulya, “Mmbutie cha nyi womoo.” Na wookyia kyiyeri kyilya manalosho ulya kamṙuo kanyi kokye.
Isho shoose shammbutikye, na Yesu aichi kye shoose shammbutika kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie, nalegamba, “Ngyiwoṙo nyi nyoṙa.”
Na halya hawewoṙe pakulyi iwoṙe mpfinyo uwetarang'ia. Kyasia wakawika mpfinyo ulya uwetarang'ia indonyi lyekyeongyia mṟinga wakalyiwikyia kyiṙinyi kyikyeri cha mtemu, wakawikyia Yesu ṙumbunyi kokye.
Yesu amwambilyie mpfinyo ulya uwetarang'ia na iunyo, nalegamba, “Kyammba chandu kyiwaṟi iwa.” Kaaramtsa mṙoe okye, kalekyia moo.

Kyasia Wayuda, kyipfa nyi mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa lya mfiri o onyonya, na kundu mmbiu ilakae msalabenyi mfiri o onyonya, (cha kyipfa mfiri ulya o onyonya uweng'anyi), waleterewa Pilato maṙende ga Yesu na ga walya wawewakapie halya msalabenyi gafunjo-funjo, wawuto halya msalabenyi.
Kyasia asikari wakayenda, wakafunja maṙende ga wandu walya wawi wawewakapie msalabenyi hamwi na Yesu.
Kyaindi kyiyeri waleyenda halya-ndu Yesu awekyeri na iwona kye ampfa, walemfunja maṙende-pfo;
kyaindi asikari umwi nalemkapa pfumu uwarinyi kokye; na cha ilyi hakawuka samu na mṟinga.
(Na ulya alewona kaṟingyishia, na wuṟingyishi wokye nyi wo loi, na oe naichi kye nagamba loi kundu na nyoe muiṙime iiṙikyia).
Cha kyipfa isho shilewutika kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie,
“Kuwoṙe fuo lyakye lyechifunjo-pfo.”
Lyingyi-se kyiṟeio kyingyi kyagamba,
“Wechiwona ulya walemkapa pfumu.”

Isho shoose shammbutikye Yosefu awukyie Arimataya, na oe nyi manalosho o Yesu, (kyaindi kui kyiṟika, kyipfa kya iowuo Wayuda), naleterewa Pilato momu kundu nawute mmbiu o Yesu halya msalabenyi. Na Pilato kamwenenga momu. Kyasia kayenda, kawuta mbiu ulya halya msalabenyi.
Nikodemo na oe kayenda, (ulya alekoayenda ko Yesu mfiri ya numa), aṙuṙe cha shilo makumi gaṟaaṟu sha shindo shekyeshio shindonyi shingyi kundu shilanyamaṟikye.
Kyasia wakaṙuo mmbiu ulya o Yesu, wakauaṟahia sanda na iushia mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha, chandu Wayuda waweichiwie iwuta kyiyeri-kyo waiṟika mndu.
Na halya-ndu alekapio msalabenyi hawewoṙe bustanyi, na ipfo bustanyinyi kuwewoṙe kyilome kyihya, kyilawendeṟiko mndu.
Kyipfa Wayuda waweikuṟeyeṟa ko mfiri o onyonya, wakawika Yesu kulya kyilomenyi, kyipfa kyiwekyeri kufuhi.
Na mfiri o kuwooka o juma Maria Makyidalena naleyenda kulya kyilomenyi, ngamenyi utuko, kyiyeri kulandekye necha; kawona igoe lyilya lyilyiwute halya kyilomenyi.
Kyasia kayenda eṙicha, kashika ko Simion Petiro na ko manalosho ulya ungyi Yesu awemkundi, kawawia, “Wawuta Mndumii Yesu kulya kyilomenyi; maa luichi kundu wammbikyia-pfo.”
Petiro kafuma na manalosho ulya ungyi, wakayenda kulya kyilomenyi.
Wakayenda weṙicha woose wewawi; na manalosho ulya ungyi kaṙicha kuta Petiro, kawa o kuwooka ishika halya kyilomenyi.
Kaarama na iimemia kulya kyilomenyi, kawona pfo shiṙami shilya sha sanda; kyaindi aleiṙa napfo-pfo.
Kyasia Simion Petiro kacha numa yakye, kaiṙa na kulya kyilomenyi; kaambuya shiṙami shilya shiwekyeri pfo;
na kyitambaa kyilya kyiwekyeri mṙoenyi kokye kyiwekyeri handu hamwi na shiṙami shilya-pfo, indi kyiwekyiumbie-umbie haleshi.
Naaho manalosho ulya ungyi awekyeri o kuwooka ishika halya kyilomenyi na oe kawona na iiṙikyia.
Cha kyipfa walekowammanya kyiṟeio kyiwegambie kye Yesu nawaṟi iṟuka-pfo.
Kyasia wanalosho wakayenda-se kanyi kowo.
Kyaindi Maria nawegoṟokyi kufuhi na kyilome kyilya, ura lo nja, echilyia. Kyasia echilyia kuṙo, nalearama na iimemia kulya kyilomenyi.
Kawona malaika wawi, waṟee nguwo ngiilyi, waṙamie, umwi ura lo mṙoenyi na umwi ura lo maṙende lo halya-ndu mmbiu o Yesu uwemlaṟe.
Nawo wakammbia, “Nuilyilyia kyi?” Kawawia, “Kyipfa wawuta Mndumii oko iha; maa ngyiichi kundu wammbikyia-pfo.”
Na amgambe kuṙo, kainduka, kawona Yesu agoṟokyi, indi alamanye kye nyi Yesu.

Yesu kammbia, “Nulyilyia kyi? Nupfula wui?” Na Maria, akusaṟie kye nyi moambuya bustanyi, kammbia, “Mndumii, kokooya nyi iyoe ommbuta kunu kyilomenyi, ngyiwia nyi kwi ommbikyia, na inyi ngyechimmbuta pfo.”
Yesu kammbia, “Maria.” Oe kainduka, kammbia kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania “Raboni! Kyimwi na igamba, ‘Mlosha oko.’ ”
Yesu kammbia, “Ulangyipaaye, cha kyipfa ngyilandeṙo na ruwewu ko Awu-pfo. Kyaindi yenda ko wana wa wama wako uwawie ngyiiṙo na ruwewu ko Awu oko na oe nyi Awu onyu, ko Ruwa oko na oe nyi Ruwa onyu.”
Maria Makyidalena kayenda, kaongoya wanalosho mbonyi kagamba, “Ngawona Mndumii Yesu, na nyi oe angyiwia ishi ngyimuongoya.”
Kyukonyi, mfiri ulya o kuwooka o juma; na halya-ndu wanalosho wawekyeri moongo iwengyishingye kyipfa kya iowuo Wayuda, Yesu kacha kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kawawia, “Ufoṟo lukae konyu.”
Na oe amgambe kuṙo, kawaloṟa mawoko gakye na uwari lokye. Kyasia wanalosho walya wakachihiyo kyiyeri walewona Mndumii Yesu.
Yesu kawawia-se “Ufoṟo lukae konyu. Chandu Awu alengyiṙuma inyi, na inyi ngyimṙuma nyoe.”
Na oe amgambe kuṙo, kawaumuya mṟufui, kawawia, “Ambilyienyi Mumuyo Mweele.
Mndu oose mochimhooṟia wunyamaṟi nechihooṟio loi; na ulya mulamhooṟia echihooṟio-pfo.”
Kyaindi umwi o walya ikumi na wawi Tomasi, awekyelago-se, (Wana wawafee wawi mfiri umwi) awekyeri na woṙoe kyiyeri Yesu alecha-pfo.

Kyasia wanalosho walya wengyi wakammbia, “Lowona Mndumii Yesu.” Kawawia, “Inyi ngyilandewone ngoru tsa msemaari mawokonyi kokye, na iwaṙa halya-ndu msemaari ilemtocha, na iwaṙa uwarinyi kokye halya-ndu pfumu lyilemtocha, ngyechiiṙikyia maa ale-pfo.”
Kyasia, hamwiṙe mfiri nyanya, wanalosho wakye wawekyeri-se numba, na Tomasi nawekyeri hamwi nawo. Yesu kacha, na moongo iwengyishingye. Kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kagamba, “Ufoṟo lukae konyu.”
Numa ya iho kawia Tomasi, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo; ambuya mawoko gako, waṙa uwarinyi koko; molawe mndu alaiṙikyie, indi aiṙikyie.”
Tomasi kagaluo, kammbia, “Mndumii oko na Ruwa oko!”
Yesu kammbia, “Iyoe, kyipfa ongyiwona, noiṙikyia. Wagusu walya walawonyi kyaindi wakaiṙikyia.”
Kyasia kuwoṙe shiṟiyisho shingyi shifoi Yesu aleshiwuta mbele ya wanalosho wakye, shilashiṟeie kunu kyitapunyi.
Kyaindi ishi shileṟeio, kundu muiṙime iiṙikyia kye Yesu nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa; na kui iiṙikyia muwone moo o mlungana kui rina lyakye.
Numa ya isho Yesu nalekuṟingyishia-se ko wanalosho wakye, halya nduwenyi yekyelago Tiberia. Na oe nalekuṟingyishia kuṙi:
Simion Petiro, Tomasi awekyelago-se, (Wana wawafee wawi mfiri umwi), Natanaelyi awukyie Kana ya Galyilaya, wana wa Sebedayo, na wanalosho wengyi wawi, wawekyeri hamwi na oe.
Simion Petiro kawawia, “Ngyindeṙega makunga.” Nawo wakammbia, “Na soe lochiyenda hamwi na iyoe.” Kyasia wakafuma, wakaṙooya ngalawenyi; indi kyio kyilya walewaṙa ikunga maa lyimwi-pfo.
Na lyilya kulekya, Yesu nalegoṟoka mbai ya nduwa, kyaindi wanalosho walemanya kye nyi oe-pfo.
Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Wana wako, muwoṙe kyindo kyelya?” Wakamgaluo, wakammbia, “Ote.”
Kawawia, “Wikyenyi iṟambika ipfo mṟingyenyi ura lo kulyoe lo ngalawa, na nyoe mochiwaṙa makunga.” Wakawuta chandu Yesu alegamba indi kyiyeri-kyo walaiṙime ilyikuruo-se kyipfa kya makunga gafoi.

Kyasia manalosho ulya Yesu awemkundi kawia Petiro, “Nyi Mndumii Yesu.” Na Simion Petiro, kyiyeri aleicho kye nyi Mndumii Yesu, kakuinewa mkoṟoṟi okye (kyipfa nawei kyiṟanguoe), kashoongyia kulya nduwenyi.
Na wanalosho walya wengyi wakacha wakyeri ngalawenyi ingyi, wakyeri cha meta magana gawi wamarise iambaṙa nduwa iya, nawo wechikuruo iṟambika lyilya lyiichuo makunga.
Kyasia kyiyeri waleshika mbai ya nduwa, walewuka kulya ngalawenyi, wakawona moṙo o makaa, na iho moṙonyi hawehawikyie makunga na mkate.
Yesu kawawia, “Endenyi na iha makunga maata mogawaṙa wulalu kuṙi.”

Kyasia Simion Petiro kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kakuruo iṟambika lyilya na handu hagaṙutsu, lyiichuo makunga gang'anyi, igana makumi gataanu na gaṟaaṟu; na maa chandu gawefoi kuṙo, iṟambika lyilya lyileranduka-pfo.
Yesu kawawia, “Nnjonyi mususuo.” Maa kuwoṙe mndu kyiiṙi kya wanalosho walya alekaria immbesa oe nyi wui-pfo; waichi kye nyi Mndumii Yesu.
Yesu kayenda kaira mkate, kawaenengyia, na makunga taa.
Koikyo kyikawa Yesu nawonekyia wanalosho wakye lya kaṟaaṟu numa ya iṟuka ko wapfu.
Kyasia wamlye, Yesu kawia Simion Petiro, “Simion mana o Yohane, ungyikundi kuta iwa?” Kammbia, “Yee, Mndumii, iyoe nuichi kye ngyikukundi.” Kammbia, “Ambuya shiondo shako.”
Kammbia-se lya kawi, “Simion mana o Yohane, ungyikundi?” Kammbia, “Iye, Mndumii, iyoe nuichi kye ngyikukundi.” Kammbia, “Lyisa moondo gako.”
Kammbia-se lya kaṟaaṟu, “Simion mana o Yohane, ungyikundi?” Kammbia, “Mndumii, iyoe nuichi shoose; iyoe nuichi kye ngyikukundi.” Yesu kammbia, “Ambuya moondo gako.”

Kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, kakuwia, kyiyeri uwekyeri manakye, muwekyekuṟeyeṟa na iyenda kundu koose ukundi; kyaindi kyiyeri ochikuo, nochigoṟuo mawoko gapfo, na mndu ungyi nechikuwutia kyilya akunda na ikuṙuo kundu ulakundi.”
Kaonguo mbonyi-tso iloṟa nyi upfu lo mbaṟe iha Petiro echipfa naenengye Ruwa kyiṟumi. Na Yesu amwonguo isho, kawia Petiro, “Ngyiosha.”
Petiro kainduka kawona manalosho ulya awemkunde nyi Yesu echiwaosha (ulya alearamia Yesu kyiyeri kya ilya kyelya kya kyukonyi, kagamba, “Mndumii, nyi wui aikuṟiinga?”)
Kyasia Petiro, kawona manalosho-cho, kawia Yesu, “Mndumii, aa ichu nechiwutio kyi?”
Yesu kammbia, “Kokooya ngyikundi ichu nawaṙe moo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechicha, kyikuwaṟi kyi iyoe? Iyoe ngyiosha.”

Kyasia mbonyi-tso tsikaṙunganana ko walya wawekyeosha Yesu kye manalosho ulya echipfa-pfo. Kyaindi Yesu alewawia kye echipfa-pfo indi nalegamba, “Kokooya ngyikundi ichu nawaṙe moo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechicha, ikyo kyakuenenga kuṙa wukyiwa?”
Ichu nyi manalosho ulya aṟingyishia na iṟeia mbonyi-tsi; na soe luichi kye wuṟingyishi wokye nyi loi.
Kuwoṙe shindo shingyi shifoi Yesu alewuta, shilaleṟeio, kyipfa ngakusaṟa shiweṟeio shoose wuyana uwechiwaṙa handu hewikyia shitapu-sho shoose-pfo.
Tofilo Mkunde, kyitapu kyilya kya kuwooka ngyilekuṙikyia ngyileṟeia mbonyi tsa shindo shoose Yesu alewuta na ilosha.
Mṟasa mfiri ulya aleṙoso na wuye ruwewu, amloṟe kui Mumuyo Mweele wasu walya alewasambuṟa.
Walya alekuṟingyishia kowo, kui iwuta shindo shifoi, numa ya ilyiso wukyiwa, kye nai na moo; echiwawonekyia kyiyeri kya mfiri makumi gaana, na ionguo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa.
Na kyiyeri awekyeri nawo kyisanzionyi nalewawia walawukye Yerusalemu, kyaindi waweṙelyie kyiteṟio kya Awu, kyiteṟio ngyilemuongoya mbonyi tsakyo;
kye Yohane nalepatisa kui mṟinga, indi nyoe mochipatiso kui Mumuyo Mweele numa ya mfiri-i ngyaangu.
Kyasia kyiyeri wawekyeri na Yesu kyisanzionyi, wakammbesa, “Ngyesa, Mndumii kyiyeri-kyi nyi lyo-ndu uiwiyiṟia Isiraelyi Wumangyi?”
Kawawia, “Chi iṟunda lyanyu imanya shiyeri Awu awikyie sile oe amonyi-pfo.
Kyaindi mochiambilyia pfinya, Mumuyo Mweele kamcha na konyu, na nyoe mochingyiṟingyishia Yerusalemu, na urukyenyi loose lo Wayuda, na Samaria, mṟasa matsitsionyi ga uruka.”
Amgambe isho, kyiyeri waweimwambuya kairo, ipuchi lyikammbuta mbele yawo.
Kyiyeri waweiitukuya ruwewu karii, kyiyeri aweiyenda, wandu wawi wakagoṟoka kufuhi nawo, waṟee nguwo tsa uwiṟo,
wakagamba, “Nyoe wandu wa Galyilaya, ny'kyilyi muiambuya ruwewu? Yesu-chu aṙoo iwuka konyu iyenda wuye ruwewu, newuya chandu mommbona echiyenda ruwewu.”
Numa ya iho wakawuya na Yerusalemu iwuka fumvu lyiwekyelago lya Mseituni, lyikyeri kufuhi na Yerusalemu, cha kyilometa kyimwi kuṙi.
Na lyilya waleshika Yerusalemu, wakaṙooya kai, kundu wawekyekaa: Petiro, Yohane, Yakobo, Anderea, Filyipo na Tomasi, Baritolomayo na Matayo, Yakobo o Alyifayo, Simion Selote, na Yuda o Yakobo.
Iwa woose wawei kyindo kyimwi kyiiṙi kya iterewa, hamwi na waka na Maria, wama o Yesu, na wana wa wamae.
Mfiri iya Petiro kagoṟoka kyiiṙi kya walya wawekyeosha Yesu (itala lyawo cha igana na makumi gawi),
kagamba, “Wana wa wama, kyiwewaṟi shiṟeio shiele shiafukyie, shiṟeio Mumuyo Mweele aleshionguo kui ṙumbu lya Dawidi, mbonyinyi tsa Yuda, alesongoya walya walewaṙa Yesu.
Cha kyipfa nawemtale hamwi na soe, kagawio iṟunda-lyi.
(Kyasia mndu-chu naleguṟa ṙema kui woguru wo iwuta wunyamaṟi; kaoloka kapasakana, maula gakye goose gakafumia nja.
Wandu woose wekyekaa Yerusalemu wakamanya mbonyi-tsi; mṟasa ṙema lyilya lyikalago kyikowo Akyelyidama, kyimwi na igamba, ṙema lya samu).
Cha kyipfa kulya kyitapunyi kya shiimbo kyikyiṟeie kye,
‘Kyiṟaṟo kyakye kyechiwaṙa kyindo-pfo,
maa kochiwaṙa mndu echikaa ho-pfo.’
Lyingyi-se kyikyiṟeie,
‘Mndu ungyi naṙuo wuṟundi wokye.’ ”
“Kyasia kyiiṙi kya wandu waleoshana na soe kyiyeri kyoose Mndumii Yesu aweicha na iwuka koṙu,
iwookyia wupatiso wo Yohane, mṟasa mfiri ulya alewuto koṙu iyenda wuye ruwewu, kyiwaṟi umwi owo nawe mṟingyishi o iṟuka lyakye hamwi na soe.”
Wakawika wandu wawi: Yosefu, awekyelago Barisaba, awewoṙe rina lya kawi Yusto, na Matiya.
Numa ya iho wakaterewa, wakagamba, “Iyoe, Mndumii, uichi mrima ya wandu woose, luloṟe nyi wui omsambuṟa kyiiṙi kya iwa wawi,
nawe msu handu ha Yuda; kyipfa Yuda nalelekana na soe kayenda handu alewutikyio kyilya kyimmbaṟi.”
Wakakapa kuṟu kuha isambuṟa Yosefu na Matiya na Matiya kasambuṟo; na oe kawiko handu hamwi na wasu walya ikumi na umwi.
Na kyiyeri mfiri o Pentekoste uleafukyia wawekyeri woose handu hamwi.
Cha ilyi iwuka ruwewu kukocha ndiṟimo cha ndiṟimo tsa mkuma o pfinya, ukoichuṟa numba iya yoose waweṙamie.
Kukowaṙa ngyuulumi tsilekanyi-lekanyi, cha ngyuulumi tsa moṙo ukokaa mṙoenyi ko orio mndu awekyeri halya.
Woose wakaichuṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele, wakawooka iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ingyi, chandu Mumuyo alewaenenga wuiṙimi.
Na kuwewoṙe Wayuda wawekyekaa Yerusalemu, wandu waiṙikyie na iowuo Ruwa, wandu wawukyie orio isanga lya kunu wuyanenyi.
Kyasia kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie halya waleicho ndiṟimo tsilya, wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, cha kyipfa orio umwi naleicho weṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie okye.
Wakaṟiyio woose, wakawiana, “Lanyoe-ko, iwa woose waiṙeṙa chi wandu wa Galyilaya-pfoe?
Kyawa kuṙa soe iicho orio mndu mṙeṙie yaṙu lulefeo nayo?
Wapariti na Wamedi na Waelami, na walya wekyekaa Mesopotamia, Uyuda na Kapadokyia, Ponto na Asia,
Firikyia na Pamfilyia, Misiri na ngyuura tsa Lyibia kufuhi na Kyirene, na wayenu wawukyie Roma, Wayuda na walya wekyeindia Ruwa,
Wakyirete na Waarabu; luichuoe iwa wechionguo kui mṙeṙie yaṙu mawuto gang'anyi ga Ruwa.”
Wakaṟiyio woose, wakawoṙo nyi iwuṟa iiṙikyia, wakawiana, “Shindo-shi shaloṟa kyi?”
Wengyi wakanyeṟe, wechigamba “Wawananzi.”

Kyaindi Petiro kagoṟoka hamwi na wanalosho walya ikumi na umwi, kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, kawawia, “Nyoe wandu wa uruka lo Uyuda, na nyoe moose mokyekaa Yerusalemu, manyenyi mbonyi-tsi muaṙanyie maṙeṙo gako.
Chandu mukusaṟie chi wuṙo-pfo. Wandu-wa wawananzi-pfo, cha kyipfa nyi saa tsiṟaaṟu tsa kyingoto tikyi;
kyaindi mbonyi-tsi nyi tsilya tsilegambo nyi moonguo shisuku Yoelyi,
‘Mfiri yefurumia,
Ruwa nagamba ngyechipusia wandu woose Mumuyo oko,
na wana wanyu wa kyisoṟo na wa kyika wechionguo shisuku;
na wanakye wanyu wechiwona shindo shilandeafukyie;
na wandu waku wechiloṙo.
Yee, na mfiri-yo ngyechipusia waṟundi wako wa
kyisoṟo na wa kyika Mumuyo oko,
nawo wechionguo shisuku.
Na inyi ngyechiloṟa ṟigo wuye ruwewu,
na shindo sheṟiyisha wuyanenyi,
samu na moṙo, na ipuchi lya mtsu ufoi.
Mnengyeṟi ochiwa meema,
na mori ochiwa samu,
mfiri ulya o Mndumii ulacha,
mfiri ung'anyi uichio na pata.
Na orio mndu echipfula Mndumii Ruwa nechikyiṟo.’ ”
“Nyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi, aṙanyienyi mbonyi-tsi: Yesu awukyie Nasareti, mndu Ruwa alemloṟa konyu kui ṟigo na shindo sheṟiyisha, Ruwa aletsiwuta amonyi, chandu nyoe muichi.
Mndu-chu aleṙiko wuyanenyi chandu Ruwa alekunda amonyi, na chandu Ruwa aweṟeyeṟie wookyia kacha, kamṙambika konyu, nyoe mukomkapia msalabenyi, mukombaaga.
Ulya Ruwa alemṟutsa, kammbuta wukyiwenyi wo ipfa, cha kyipfa kyileiṙimika wukyiwa-wo wumpaaye-pfo.
Kyipfa Dawidi naonguo mbonyi tsakye,
‘Ngyilewona Mndumii mbele yako mfiri yoose cha kyipfa
nakyeri ura loko lo kulyoe ngyilasunzukye.
Koikyo mrima oko ulechihiyo ulumi loko lukochihiyo;
lyingyi-se mmbiu oko ukoweṙelyia.
Cha kyipfa echiṙa mrima oko ko wapfu-pfo;
maa echiṙa mndu okye msimiri napuye kyilomenyi-pfo.
Nulengyiloṟa njia tsiendie moonyi o mlungana.’ ”
“Wasoṟo, wana wa wama wako, maa mulangyisuuye, ngyionguo mbele yanyu kulawoṙe wuowu mbonyi tsa awu oṙu, Dawidi, kye nalepfa kaṟiko, na kyilome kyakye kyikyeri koṙu mṟasa inu.
Kyasia kyipfa nyi moonguo shisuku, aichi kye Ruwa nalemwenenga kyaasa, kye kyisharinyi kokye kochiwuka mangyi.
Na oe chandu alesonguo iwona mbonyi-tsi, naleonguo mbonyi tsa iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo, kye mrima okye ochiṙio ko wapfu-pfo, maa mmbiu okye ochipuya kyilomenyi-pfo.
Yesu-cho Ruwa nalemṟutsa, na soe loose lui waṟingyishi.
Kyasia oe, kamṙoso mṟasa kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa, na iambilyia ko Awu kyaasa kyilya kya Mumuyo Mweele, napusuo kyindo-kyi mukyiwonyi na ikyiicho wulalu.
Kyipfa Dawidi aleṙo na ruwewu-pfo; indi oe nalegamba,
‘Ruwa nalewia Mndumii oko,
ṙamia ura loko lo kulyoe,
mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechikuenenga
wuiṙimi wo ichilyia washituwa wapfo.’ ”
“Kyasia wandu woose wa Isiraelyi wamanye na pata kye Ruwa naleenenga Yesu-cho walemkapia msalabenyi wuiṙimi wo iwa Mndumii na Kristo.”
Kyiyeri wandu walya waleicho mbonyi-tso, wakaiṟewe mrimenyi kowo, wakawia Petiro na wanalosho walya wengyi, “Luwute-kyi, wana wa wama waṙu?”
Petiro kawawia, “Ṙumbuyenyi iwuta sha wunyamaṟi, mupatiso orio umwi kui rina lya Yesu Kristo, muiṙime iambilyia ihooṟio lya ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu, na nyoe mochiambilyia kyienengo kya Mumuyo Mweele.
Cha kyipfa kyaasa-kyi nyi kyipfa kyanyu, na ko wana wanyu, na ko walya wai kuleshi, na ko woose wechilago nyi Mndumii oṙu Ruwa wache na kokye.”
Kawaṟingyishia kui maṙeṙo gengyi gafoi mnu na iwaikyimbia, echigamba, “Kaenyi kuleshi na rika-lyi lyilekyeicho.”
Na walya waleicho malosho gakye na igaosha wakapatiso; na mfiri ulya wakaengyeṟika cha wandu shiku shiṟaaṟu.
Mfiri yoose wakaosha malosho ga wanalosho, wakyeri kyindo kyimwi shindonyi shoose, na kyiiṙi kya ilya mkate handu hamwi, na kyiiṙi kya iterewa.
Wanalosho wakawuta shindo shifoi sheṟiyisha na ṟigo, orio mndu kawoṙo nyi wuowu.
Na woose waweiṙikyie Yesu wawekyekaa handu hamwi, na iwuta shindo shoose wakyeri kyindo kyimwi,
wechikumba masaa gawo, na shindo shawo wawewoṙe, na igawia wandu woose orio mndu iṙuana na chandu awekundi.
Na orio mfiri wechiyenda hekalunyi handu hamwi, wechilya mkate numba kui numba, na ilya kyelya kyawo na sia na mrima iwoṙe ilekyia,
wechiṟumisha Ruwa, na ichihiṟa wandu woose. Mndumii kapfumbutsa siṟi orio mfiri ko walya waweikyiṟo.
Kyasia Petiro na Yohane waweiṙo wechiyenda hekalunyi kyiyeri kyeterewa Ruwa, cha saa kyenda.

Na mndu umwi awei kyileeta wookyia kyiyeri alefeo nawekyeendo nyi wandu wakammbikyia orio mfiri moongonyi o hekalu uwekyelago “Moongo Mcha,” kundu naterewe isaṟio nyi walya wawekyeiṙa na ipfo hekalunyi.
Mndu-cho kyiyeri alewona Petiro na Yohane wechiiṙa na hekalunyi naleterewa naenengo kyindo kyemsaṟia.
Na Petiro, kamwitukuya karii, hamwi na Yohane, kagamba, “Ambuya kunu.”
Kawaitukuya, alangyie wamwenengye kyindo.
Kyaindi Petiro kagamba, “Inyi ngyiwoṙe heleri, maa sahapu-pfo, indi kyilya ngyiwoṙe ny'kyo ngyikuenenga. Ko rina lya Yesu Kristo awukyie Nasareti, goṟoka uyende.”
Kammbaṙa kuwoko ko kulyoe, kamwira, na cha ilyi maṙende gakye gakawaṙa pfinya.
Kaamka faṟa kawooka iyenda, kaiṙa na hekalunyi hamwi nawo, kachumia echitoola-toola, na iṟumisha Ruwa.
Wandu woose wakammbona echumia na iṟumisha Ruwa.
Wakammanya, kye oe nyi ulya awekyeṙamia na iterewa shindo shemsaṟia halya moongonyi okyelago “Mcha;” wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya shilya shilewutika kokye.
Kyasia kyiyeri aweinyaia Petiro na Yohane wandu woose wakakuumbia halya-ndu hawekyelago “Itala lya Solomon,” wechiṟiyio mnu.

Na kyiyeri Petiro alewona kuṙo kagaluo wandu walya, kawawia, “Nyoe wandu wa Isiraelyi ny'kyilyi muiṟiyio kyipfa kya shindo-shi? Ang'u ny'kyilyi muluitukuya cha ilyi nyi pfinya tsaṙu tsaenenga mndu-chu wuiṙimi wo ichumia? Maa achia kyipfa soe luiṙikyie Ruwa-pfo.
Ruwa o Abrahamu na o Isakyi na o Yakobo, Ruwa o waku waṙu, nang'anyisa mṟundi okye Yesu, ulya nyoe mulemṟiinga na imkana mbele ya Pilato, kyiyeri aleṙumbuo kye nalekyio.
Indi nyoe mulekana ulya Mweele, ulya alawoṙe tewe, mukokunda ienengo mmbaagi.
Mukowaaga ulya Ang'anyi o moo o mlungana, ulya Ruwa alemṟutsa ko wapfu; na soe nyi waṟingyishi wakye.
Na kui iiṙikyia rinenyi lyakye, rina lyakye lyaenenga pfinya mndu-chu mummbonyi na immanya; na iiṙikyia lyilya lyikyeri kokye nyilyo lyamwenenga moo-chu ulakyeri mti mbele yanyu nyoe moose.
“Kyasia wulalu, wana wa wama, ngyiichi kye mulewuta isho kyipfa mulaweichi, chandu na wasongoru wanyu walewuta.
Kyaindi shindo shilya Ruwa aleshionguo wookyia kacha kui maṙumbu ga weonguo shisuku woose, kye Kristo nechilyiso wukyiwa, naafutsia isho.
Kyasia ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi, muwiyilyie Ruwa, kundu ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu tsiwuto piu, kyiyeri kyilya kyewiyiṟio moo kyipfa kya Mndumii Yesu iṙiko koṙu kyiiṙime iafukyia.
Ruwa naiṙime iṙuma Yesu Kristo ulya muleṟeyeṟio wookyia kacha.
Ulya awaṟi ikaa ruwewu mṟasa kyiyeri shindo shoose shewa shihya, kyiyeri kyikyigambe nyi Ruwa kui ṙumbu lya weonguo shisuku waele wookyia mawookyionyi ga wuyana.
Cha kyipfa loi Mose nalegamba kye Mndumii onyu nechimuenenga moonguo shisuku iwuka ko wana wa wamanyu, cha inyi; mwaṙanyienyi shindonyi shoose echimuongoya.
Na kyechiwa kye orio mndu alechiaṙanyia moonguo shisuku-cho nechirumatso na iwiko kuleshi na wandu wakye.
Yee, na weonguo shisuku woose wookyia Samolyi na walya walecha numa yakye, woose waleṙeṙa, waleonguo mbonyi tsa mfiri-i.
Nyoe mowa wana wa weonguo shisuku na wa mma iya Ruwa alelya na waku wanyu, echiwia Abrahamu, ‘Kyisharinyi kyapfo, mbaṟe tsoose tsa wandu wa wuyana tsechiwikyio mboṟa.
Ruwa, amṟutse mṟundi okye Yesu, nalemṙuma konyu kuwooka, kundu nammbikyie mboṟa kui igalutsa orio umwi onyu nakae kuleshi na wuwicho wokye.’ ”
Na kyiyeri waweiṙeṙa na wandu walya, makohanyi na wachilyi wa hekalu na Masadukayo wakacha,
weiṟewe mrimenyi mnu cha kyipfa wailosha wandu na ionguo mbonyi tsa iṟutso lya wapfu kyiiṙi kya Yesu.
Wakawawaṙa, wakawawika kyipfungonyi mṟasa ngamenyi; cha kyipfa kulekokoila.
Kyaindi wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya waleicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa waleiṙikyia; na itala lya wasoṟo lyikawa cha shiku shitaanu.
Na kyiyeri kulekya wasongoru na wameeku na walosha wa mawawaso ga Mose walesanzia Yerusalemu,
na Anasi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, na Kayafa taa, na Yohane na Iskanda, na woose walya wawei wa kanyi ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose.
Kyiyeri walewawikyia makyiṙi-gawi, wakawawesa, “Nyi kui pfinya tsiha na nyi kui rina lya wui nyoe muiwuta ishi?”
Naaho Petiro, aichuo Mumuyo Mweele, kawawia, “Nyoe wasongoru wa wandu na wameeku wa Isiraelyi;
kokooya loweso inu mbonyi tsa kyindo kyicha mndu ulya mfafa alewutio, chandu alekyiṟo,

manyenyi moose na wandu woose wa Isiraelyi kye kui rina lya Yesu Kristo awukyie Nasareti, ulya nyoe mulemkapia msalabenyi, na Ruwa kamṟutsa ko wapfu, kui rina-lyo mndu-chu nagoṟoka mbele yanyu, awoṙe pfinya.
Oe nyi oe igoe lyilya lyilemino nyi wewika numba,
‘Nalyo lyawiko iwa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.’ ”
“Maa kuwoṙe wukyiṟo kui mndu ungyi oose-pfo, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe rina lyingyi kunu wuyanenyi soe wandu luleenengo lyelukyiṟa-pfo.”
Kyasia kyiyeri walewona wuṟango na wukari wo Petiro na Yohane, na imanya kye nyi wandu walasomie, walaichi shindo shifoi, wakaṟiyio, wakamanya kye wawekyeri hamwi na Yesu.
Na wawonyi ulya alekyiṟo agoṟokyi hamwi nawo walewona kyindo kyegamba-pfo.
Wakawawia wawukye halya mengyenyi, wakachila wawenyi
wechigamba, “Luwutie kyi wandu-wa? Kyipfa kyikyeri na pata ko wandu woose wekyekaa Yerusalemu kye walewuta kyiṟiyisho kying'anyi, maa lochiiṙima ikana-pfo.
Kyaindi kundu mbonyi-tsi tsilamanyike ko wandu, luwaoweshe walaṙeṙe na mndu oose kui rina-lyi.”
Wakawalaga, wakawawia walaṙeṙe maa ale ang'u ilosha kui rina lya Yesu.
Petiro na Yohane wakawagaluo, wakawawia, “Kye nyi sungusinyi mbele ya Ruwa imuaṙanyia nyoe kuta Ruwa, ṙumbuonyi nyoe muwenyi,
kyipfa soe lochiiṙima iṙa ionguo shindo luleshiwona na ishiicho-pfo.”
Nawo kyiyeri walemarisa iwaowesha-se wakawapfunguo, walawone kyindo kyewaenenga iwakapa, kyipfa kya iowuo wandu, cha kyipfa wandu woose waweṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kya isho shilewutika;
kyipfa mndu ulya alewutio kyiṟigyishio kya ikyiṟo nawewoṙe maka makumi gaana na ngoseṟa.
Na kyiyeri walelekyio, wakayenda ko wandu wawo, wakawaongoya mbonyi tsa shindo shoose walewio nyi wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wameeku.
Nawo kyiyeri waleicho wakawia Ruwa kui maṟui gang'anyi na kui mrima umwi, wechigamba, “Mndumii, iyoe nyi oe Ruwa Mopfinya. Nyi iyoe ulegumba ruwewu na uruka na mapalyipalyi na shoose shikyeri pfo.
Na iyoe nuleṙeṙa kui Mumuyo Mweele kui ṙumbu lya mku oṙu Dawidi, mṟundi opfo,
‘Ny'kyilyi wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wailang'aa,
na wandu waikusaṟa shiwicho?
Wamangyi wa wuyana wakuṟeyeṟie,
na wasongoru waichila handu hamwi
chandu wewingana na Ruwa na Kristo okye.’ ”
“Kyipfa nyi loi, Herode na Pontio Pilato hamwi na wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa na wandu wa Isiraelyi, walesanzia kunu mṟinyi, wechichila mbonyi tsa Mṟundi opfo mweele Yesu, ulemshumbuo,
kundu wawute shoose uwekundi shiwutikye wookyia kacha.
Kyasia wulalu, Mndumii, ambuya chandu waiowesha; uenengye waṟundi wapfo ionguo Ṙeṙo lyapfo kui wuṟango na wukari,
ochigoṟuo kuwoko kopfo ikyiṟa; ṟigo na shindo sheṟiyisha shiwutikye kui rina lya Mṟundi opfo mweele Yesu.”
Na wamterewe Ruwa, handu halya wawesanzie hakasunzo-sunzo, woose wakaichuo Mumuyo Mweele, wakaonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kui wuṟango na wukari.
Na wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wawekyeri kyindo kyimwi; maa kuwoṙe maa umwi alegamba kye kyindo kyoose awoṙe nyi kyakye amonyi-pfo; indi shindo shoose waleikanana.
Na wasu wakaṟingyishia na pfinya iṟuka lya Yesu, nawo wakaenengo mboṟa tsifoi.
Maa kuwewoṙe mndu oose kyiiṙi kyawo alawewoṙe kyindo-pfo; cha kyipfa wandu woose wawewoṙe shigamba ang'u numba, walekumba, wakaende woguru wo shindo-sho shilekumbo,
wakaenengyia wasu walya; orio mndu kagawio chandu awekundi.
Na Yosefu, wasu wawekyemlaga Barinaba, (kyimwi na igamba Mana ekyewiyiṟia moo), Mlewi, mndu awukyie Kyipiro,
nawewoṙe ṙema kalyikumba, kaende heleri, katsienengyia wasu.
Kyaindi mndu umwi awekyelago Anania, hamwi na Safira, mka okye, nalekumba masaa,
kaṟika kyifunjoe kya woguru, na mka okye aichi mbonyi-tso kaende kyifunjoe kyilya kyiletsugaa kakyienengyia wasu.
Petiro kagamba, “Anania, ny'kyilyi Satana aichuṟa mrima opfo iwia Mumuyo Mweele wongo, na iṟika kyifunjoe kya woguru wulya wo ṙema?

Kyiyeri ṙema-lyo lyiwekyeri kopfo, lyiwekyeri lyapfo-pfoe? Na lyamkumbo, woguru wolyo chi nuweiṙima iwuta nawo chandu ukundi-pfoe? Kyawa kuṙa kowuta kyindo kya mbaṟe-i iyi? Chi nowia mndu wongo-pfo, indi Ruwa.”
Kyiyeri Anania aleicho mbonyi-tsi kaoloka wanda, kapfa. Kyiyeri wandu waleicho mbonyi-tsi wakawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi.
Wanakye wakafuma, wakampfunga na sanda, wakamfumiṟia nja, wakamṟika.
Hamwiṙe cha saa tsiṟaaṟu, mka okye kacha, alaichi mbonyi tsiwemmbutika.
Petiro kammbia, “Ngyiwia, iwo nyiwo woguru wo ṙema-lyo?” Safira kagaluo, kagamba, “Yee, iwo nyiwo woguru wolyo.”
Petiro kammbia, “Kyawa kuṙa moiṙikyiana iyesha Mumuyo o Mndumii? Walya waṟika mii opfo nyi iho moongonyi wagoṟokyi, nawo wekuṙuo na iyoe taa.”
Cha ilyi Safira kaoloka wanda, kapfa. Wanakye walya wakaiṙa na numba wakakooya ampfa, wakamfumiṟia nja, wakamṟika hamwi na mii okye.
Siṟi yoose ikawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi hamwi na wandu woose waleicho mbonyi-tso.
Na wasu wakawuta shindo shifoi sheṟiyisha hamwi na ṟigo; nawo woose wawewoṙe makusaṟo gamwi wechisanzia kulya italenyi lya Solomon;
na kyiiṙi kya wandu woose kuwoṙe maa mndu umwi alekaria ioshana na wasu-pfo; indi wandu walewaṟumisha.
Walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakaengyeṟika, wasoṟo na waka;
na kyikawa kye wandu wawekyefumiṟia wandu waluoe mṟaṟunyi ung'anyi na iwawikyia majamvinyi na makondoṟonyi, kundu ilyi Petiro echicha, maa kyirinje kyakye kyipaaye umwi owo.
Na wuingyi wo wandu wa mṟi ikyeri mbai ya Yerusalemu wakasanza, wechiende wandu waluoe, na walya wawekyelyiso wukyiwa nyi waṟufui wawicho; nawo woose wakakyiṟo.
Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kafuma na wandu woose wawekyeri hamwi na oe (iwo nyi walya wawekyechilyia hamwi na Masadukayo), wawoṙo nyi wunyenyi.
Wakawaṙa wasu walya wakawawika kyipfungonyi;
kyaindi malaika o Mndumii kyiyeri kya kyio kapfunguo moongo ya numba iya wawewapfungyie, kawawuta pfo, kagamba,
“Yendenyi mundegoṟoka hekalunyi muongoye wandu mbonyi tsoose tsa Moo-chu o mlungana.”
Nawo kyiyeri waleicho wakayenda hekalunyi ngamenyi utuko, wakawooka ilosha.
Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kacha na walya wawekyeri hamwi na oe, wakalaga wandu na mengyenyi, na wameeku woose na wana wa Isiraelyi, wakaṙuma wandu kulya kyipfungonyi kundu waende wasu walya.
Na kyiyeri waṟundi waleshika halya kyipfungonyi walewona wasu walya-pfo wakawuya wakaende mbonyi-tso,
wechigamba, “Numba iya yepfungyia wandu loikooya ingyishingye nakamwi, na waringyi wa numba-yo wagoṟokyi mbele ya moongo; kyaindi kyiyeri lopfunguo moongo-cho lulawone pfo mndu.”
Kyasia msongoru o asikari wekyeringa hekalu na wang'anyi wa makohanyi kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tso, walamanye kyewuta, kye mbonyi-tso tsechiwa kuṙa.
Mndu umwi kawawia, “Wandu walya mulewawika kyipfungonyi wakyeri hekalunyi, wailosha wandu.”
Naaho-ng'u msongoru ulya o asikari wekyeringa hekalu kayenda hamwi na waṟundi, wakawaende, kui iwalemba-lemba, cha kyipfa waleowuo wandu walachewakapa na magoe.
Kyiyeri walewaende wakawawikyia halya mengyenyi. Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kawawesa, echigamba,
“Ngamba lulemuima ilosha kui rina-lyi lya Yesu? Kyaindi nyoe moichuṟa mṟi oose o Yerusalemu na malosho ganyu, na mukundi luwio kye nyi soe lulembaaga.”
Petiro na wasu woṙoe wakagaluo, wechigamba, “Kyiluwaṟi iindia Ruwa kuta wandu.
Ruwa o waku waṙu naleṟutsa Yesu, ulya nyoe mulembaaga na immanyika ikyiṙinyi.
Mndu-cho Ruwa nalemng'anyisa kui kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, nawe Ang'anyi na Mkyiṟa naenengye wandu wa Isiraelyi iṙumbuya na ihooṟio wunyamaṟi.
Na soe lui waṟingyishi wa mbonyi-tsi, hamwi na Mumuyo Mweele ulya Ruwa aleenenga woose wekyemwindia.”
Kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tsi wakawoṙo nyi nyashi mrimenyi kowo, wakachila chandu wewaaga wasu walya.
Kyaindi mndu umwi, Mfarisayo, ekyelago Kamalyielyi, mlosha o uwawaso, awekyeindio nyi wandu woose, kagoṟoka halya mengyenyi, kagamba wasu waṙoo nja kyiyeri kyifuhi,
kawawia, “Nyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi, owuoenyi iwutia wandu kyindo kyiwicho.
Cha kyipfa mfiri ya numa Teuda nalecha, echikuloṟa kye oe nyi mndu ang'anyi, cha wandu magana gaana wakakaa ura lokye; na oe nalewoogo na woose walemwiṙikyia, wakanyanyaṟika wakawa wulya.
Numa ya mndu-cho kulecha Yuda awukyie Galyilaya, mfiri iya yeṟeia wandu marina, kagaluo wandu wafoi wakamwosha, na oe taa kaṙeka na woose walemwiṙikyia wakanyanyaṟika.
Kyasia wulalu ngammbia, kaenyi kuleshi na wandu-wa; walekyienyi; cha kyipfa kokooya mbonyi-tsi ang'u iṟunda-lyi lyiwukyie ko wandu lyechinyamaṟika,
kyaindi kokooya lyiwukyie ko Ruwa mochiiṙima ilyinyamaṟa-pfo; mulachewono cha ilyi muiwingana na Ruwa.”
Wakaiṙikyia kyilya Kamalyielyi alegamba. Nawo kyiyeri walelaga wasu walya, wakawakapa, wakawawia walaloshe kui rina lya Yesu; na numa ya iho wakawalekyia.
Nawo wakawuka halya mengyenyi, wechihiyo cha kyipfa watalo kye wawaṟi isutso kyipfa kya Rina lya Yesu.
Na orio mfiri, hekalunyi na kanyi kowo, waleṙa ilosha na ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha tsa Yesu kye nyi Kristo-pfo.

Na mfiri iya wanalosho waweiengyeṟika, Wayuda wawekyeṙeṙa mṙeṙie o Wakyiṟikyi walenunuwa kyipfa kya Wayuda walya wawekyeṙeṙa Kyiebrania; na kyitewe kyenunuwa nyi kyipfa wakusu wawo walewaṙimika ienengo kyilya wawaṟi.
Walya ikumi na wawi wakalaga wandu woose waweiṙikyie Yesu, wakagamba, “Chi kyicha soe iṙa ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na ikuwinisha na heleri-pfo.
Kyasia, wana wa wama, sambuṟenyi wandu mfungaaṙe kyiiṙi kyanyu, wawaṟingyishie kye wai wecha, waichuo Mumuyo, wawoṙe wuṟango, kundu luwaṙambikye iṟunda-lyi lyeambuya heleri;
na soe luwaṙe iṟunda lyeterewa na ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.”

Kyindo-kyi wasu walegamba kyikachihiṟa woose wawesanzie halya. Wakasambuṟa Stefano, mndu aweichuo iiṙikyia na Mumuyo Mweele, Filyipo, Prokoro, Nikanori, Timoni, Parimena, na Nikolao, mndu aiṙikyie Ruwa, awukyie Antiokyia.
Wakawawikyia mbele ya wasu, na wamterewe wakawayekyia mawoko.
Mbonyi-tsi tsikaṙunganana orio handu; na itala lya wanalosho lyikaengyeṟika mnu kulya Yerusalemu; makohanyi wafoi wakaambilyia iiṙikyia.
Na Stefano, aichuo isaṟia na wuiṙimi, nawekyewuta shindo sha maṟiyisho na ṟigo tsing'anyi mbele ya wandu.

Kyaindi wandu waata wa sinagogi lyiwekyelago sinagogi lya “Wandu walawachilyie nyi kyindo,” na lya Wakyirene, na lya Waisikanderia, na lya walya wa Kyilyikyia na Asia, wakafuma na indegaluana na Stefano;
kyaindi waleiṙima iwingana na wuṟango na Mumuyo-cho aweṙeṙa na oe-pfo,
wakawia wandu wagambe, “Luleicho mndu-chu echiṙeṙa mbonyi tselahia Mose na Ruwa.”
Kui igamba kuṙo wakaende kyituṟu wandunyi na wameeku na walosha wa mawawaso. Wakayenda kokye, wakammbaṙa, wakamṙuo mengyenyi.
Wakapfula waṟingyishi wa wongo, walegamba, “Mndu-chu mfiri yoose nawekyeṙeṙa mbonyi tselahia hekalu na uwawaso;
kyipfa luleicho echigamba kye Yesu-cho awukyie Nasareti nechinyamaṟa hekalu na igaluo miichiwie Mose aleluenenga.”
Wandu woose waweṙamie halya mengyenyi wakamwitukuya karii, wakawona kyaam kyakye kyikyeri cha kyaam kya kya malaika.
Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kagamba, “Ngyesa mbonyi-tsi nyi wuṙo tsikyeri?”
Na oe kagamba, “Wana wa wama wako na waawu wako, aṙanyienyi. Ruwa o kyiṟumi nalecha na ko awu oṙu Abrahamu, kyiyeri awekyeri uruka lo Mesopotamia, kyiyeri alandekae uruka lo Harani,
kammbia, ‘Wuka kunu urukyenyi kopfo na ko wandu wa kyishari kyapfo, uyende mṟasa uruka ngyechikuloṟa.’
Naaho-ng'u kawuka urukyenyi lo Wakalyidayo, kakaa Harani, kawuka pfo awuye ampfe, Ruwa kamsamiṟa mṟasa uruka-lu mukyeri nyoe wulalu.
Maa alemwenenga kyioṟa maa kya kyigamba kyitung'tu-pfo; kyaindi Ruwa nalewika kyaasa kyemwenenga, kyiwe wuchilyinyi wokye, na wa ushari lokye mfiri iweicha maa chandu alawewoṙe mana.
Ruwa kagamba kuṙo, kye wandu wa kyishari kya Abrahamu wechikaa urukyenyi lo wandu wengyi, nawo wewagaluo watumo wawo, na iwawutia shindo shewatuura kyiyeri kya maka magana gaana.
Na wandu wa isanga-lyo lyechimgaluo watumo ngyechiwaanduya, Ruwa nalegamba; na numa ya isho shoose wechiwuka, nawo wechingyiindia handu-ha.
Kamwenenga mma o iṙino. Kyasia Abrahamu kafee Isakyi, kamṙina mfiri o nyanya. Isakyi kafee Yakobo. Yakobo kafee walya ikumi na wawi, waku waṙu.
“Waku-wo waṙu walewoṙo nyi wunyenyi kyipfa kya Yosefu, wakamkumba nayende uruka lo Misiri. Ruwa kakaa hamwi na oe,
kammbuta wukyiwenyi wokye woose, kamwenenga isaṟia mbele ya Farao, mangyi o Misiri; na oe kamgaluo mchilyi o Misiri na o walya wa kanyi kokye.
Kyasia kukowaṙa njaa urukyenyi loose lo Misiri na Kanaan, na ngyuukyiwa tsifoi, maa waku waṙu walewona kyelya kyewashika-pfo.
Na kyiyeri Yakobo aleicho kye kulya Misiri kuwoṙe shelya, kaṙuma waku waṙu lya kuwooka.
Na lyilya alewaṙuma lya kawi Yosefu kawia wana wa wamae kye oe nyi samu yawo Farao kamanya na wa kyishari kya Yosefu.
Yosefu kaṙuma wandu wakalaga Yakobo awuye na wandu wa kyishari kyakye woose, wandu makumi mfungaaṙe na wataanu.
Kyasia Yakobo kasoka mṟasa Misiri, kapfa oe na waku waṙu;
wakaṙoo mṟasa Shekyemu wakaṟiko kulya kyilomenyi Abrahamu alekoakyiguṟa kui woguru wo heleri tsa wana wa Hamori, kulya Shekyemu.
“Kyasia kyiyeri kya kyaasa kyilya Ruwa aleenenga Abrahamu kyiwetikyirie kufuhi, wandu walya wakaengyeṟika mnu kulya Misiri.
Naaho mangyi ungyi alaichi Yosefu kawaṙa uruka kulya Misiri.
Icho kawutia wandu waṙu shindo sha ngyeṟo, na iwutia waku waṙu shindo shiwicho, echiwawia wawiyitse wana wawo wanangu, kundu walakae wuyanenyi.
Kyiyeri-kyo Mose kafeo, na oe nawewoṙe fana ngyicha mnu, kaembeṟo mori iṟaṟu kanyi ko awuye.
Na kyiyeri alewiyitso, mana o Farao o kyika kamṙuo, kammbutia cha mono-kye.
Mose kalosho mbonyi tsoose tsa Wamisiri, kawaṙa wuṟango wo maṙeṙo na mawuto.
Kyiyeri alewaṙa cha maka makumi gaana kaṙumbuo mrimenyi kokye indeiṟikyiṟa wana wa wamae, Waisiraelyi.
Kawona umwi echikapo kamkapania, kataaya kyiṟaache ulya aweionio, kakapa Mmisiri ulya kammbaaga.
Mose nalekusaṟa kye wana wa wamae wawemanya kye Ruwa nechiwakyiṟa kui iiṙia Mose, kyaindi walemanya-pfo.
Mfiri ulya uleosha kakooya Waisiraelyi wawi waweiluyana, kakunda iwasanza, echigamba, ‘Lanyoe wandu! Nyoe chi wana wa mka? Ny'kyilyi muiluyana?’
Kyaindi ulya aweikapa oṙoe kamicha Mose, echigamba, ‘Nyi wui alekuwika iyoe iwa ang'anyi oṙu na moṙumbuo moondu yaṙu?
Ngyesa nukundi ingyiwaaga inyi chandu ulewaaga Mmisiri ulya ukou?’
Mose kaṙicha kyipfa kya mbonyi-tsi, kakaa cha myenu urukyenyi lo Midian, kafee pfo wana wawi.
Na kyiyeri maka makumi gaana ileiṙa, malaika o Mndumii kacha na ko Mose moṙonyi uiaka nguṙunyi, kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga ya fumvu lya Sinai.
Kyiyeri Mose alewona moṙo ulya, kaṟiyio kya shindo shilandeafukyie aweiloṟo, na kyiyeri aletikyira kufuhi kundu naambuye, ṟui lya Ruwa lyikammbia,
‘Inyi nyi Ruwa o waku wapfo, Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi, na Ruwa o Yakobo.’ Mose kaṙeṙema, alakarie iambuya.
Mndumii Ruwa kammbia, ‘Wuta shiaṙu ipfo maṙende kopfo, cha kyipfa handu-ha ugoṟokyi nyi teri ngyiele.
Loi ngawona matuuro ga wandu wako wakyeri Misiri. Ngaicho kyifiiṟo kyawo, na inyi ngasoka na kunu wuyanenyi ngyiwawute pfo. Kyasia wulalu, ngyechikuṙuma mṟasa Misiri.’
“Mose-cho walemlega, wechigamba, ‘Nyi wui alekuwika uwe ang'anyi na moṙumbuo moondu’, nyi oe aleṙumo nyi Ruwa iwa ang'anyi na mkyiṟa, kui iiṙia malaika ulya alecha na ko Mose kyiiṙi kya moṙo ulya.
Icho nyi oe alewawuta Misiri echiwuta shindo sheṟiyisha na ṟigo urukyenyi lo Misiri, na ipalyipalyinyi lya Shamu, na nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana.
Mose-cho nyi oe alewia Waisiraelyi, ‘Mndumii Ruwa onyu nechiwasambuṟia moonguo shisuku, kyiiṙi kya wana wa wamanyu, cha inyi; mwaṙanyienyi oe.’

Oe nyi oe awekyeri siṟinyi nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga hamwi na malaika ulya aleṙeṙa na oe fumvunyi lya Sinai. Lyingyi-se hamwi na waku waṙu; nyi oe aleambilyia mbonyi tsa moo o mlungana naluwie soe.
Mndu-cho waku waṙu walekunda imwindia-pfo, indi walemmichia kuleshi, wakalanga iwuya na Misiri.
Wakawia Aron, ‘Luachikyie waruwa wengyi, wechilusongoya; cha kyipfa Mose-cho, aleluwuta urukyenyi lo Misiri, luichi ny'kyikyi kyammbutikyia-pfo.’
Wakaachikyia ifano lya igache, wakalyiendie shienengo, wakachihiyo kyipfa kya maṟunda ga mawoko gawo.
Kyasia Ruwa kailacha makusaṟo, kawaṙa kundu waterewe na iindia nyenyeri tsa ruwewu, chandu kyikyiṟeie ipfo kyitapunyi kya weonguo shisuku,
‘Ngyesa mulengyiṙasia
maka makumi gaana
nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa
ilawoṙe maa mṟinga
nyoe wandu wa Isiraelyi?
Na nyoe mulekuṙika Hema
lya ruwa ekyelago Molekyi,
na ifano lya nyenyeri tsa ruwa onyu Refani,
mafano muleachikyia na igaterewa
na igaindia.
Na inyi ngyechimusamiṟa
muyende kuleshi na Babelyi.’ ”
“Hema lyilya lya wuṟingyishi lyiwekyeri hamwi na waku waṙu kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, chandu ulya aleṙeṙa na Mose alegamba kye naachikyie hema-lyo iṙuana na mfano ulya aleuwona.
Hema lyilya waku waṙu, kui ienengyiana, walelyiitsa hamwi na Yosua wuchilyinyi wo Masanga galya Ruwa alegafuna mbele ya waku waṙu, mṟasa kyiyeri kya Dawidi;
alewona isaṟia mbele ya Ruwa, na oe naleterewa naenengye Ruwa o Yakobo handu hekaa.
Kyaindi Solomon nalechemmbikyia numba.
Indi ulya ekyekaa wuye ruwewu ekyekaa numbenyi tsingyiwikye kui mawoko-pfo; chandu moonguo shisuku agambie,
‘Ruwewu nyi kyitima kyako kya wuchilyi
na uruka nyi handu heyekyia maṙende gako;
nyi numba iha mochiwika nyoe kyipfa kyako?’
Ruwa nagamba,
‘Ang'u nyi hanga ngyechikaa ngyichihiyo?
Chi inyi ngyilewuta ishi shoose-pfoe?’ ”
“Nyoe shichoi, mulawaṙine mrima maa maṙwi ganyu. Mfiri yoose mulelega Mumuyo Mweele; chandu waku wanyu walewuta, na nyoe nyi wuṙo.

Nyi wui kyiiṙi kya weonguo shisuku waku wanyu walalempfulutsa nyashi? Wo walewaaga walya waleṙumo nyi Ruwa ionguo mbonyi tsa icha lya ulya Msumganyi; ulya nyoe wulalu mowa waṟiingyi wakye, mukommbaaga.
Nyoe muleambilyia uwawaso-lo luleendo na konyu nyi malaika kyaindi mukomina.”
Kyasia kyiyeri wandu wawei halya mengyenyi waleicho shilya Stefano alegamba, wakawoṙo nyi nyashi mrimenyi, wakasuo mnu kyipfa kyakye.
Kyaindi oe aichuo Mumuyo Mweele, kaambuo karii, eambuya ruwewu, kawona mng'ano o Ruwa, na Yesu agoṟokyi ura lo kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.
Kagamba, “Ngyiwonyi ruwewu iṟuukyie, na Mono-Adamu nagoṟokyi kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.”
Wakakalagatsa na ṟui lying'anyi, wakapfinyika maṙwi gawo, wakamshoongyia woose piu,
wakamṙuo nja ya mṟi, wakamkapa na magoe. Na waṟingyishi wakawikyia nguwo tsakye maṙendenyi ga manakye umwi awekyelago Saulyi.
Wakakapa Stefano na magoe, na oe eterewa, kagamba, “Mndumii Yesu, ambilyia mrima oko.”
Kapfiria ndi, kafiiṟa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Mndumii ulawatalyie wunyamaṟi-wu.” Amgambe kuṙo kalekyia moo. Na Saulyi nawewonyi kye iwoogo lyakye nyi necha.
Mfiri ulya kukowaṙa wukyiwa wung'anyi kulya siṟinyi ya Yerusalemu. Wandu woose wa siṟi wakanyanyaṟika urukyenyi lo Uyuda na Samaria, kyaindi wasu walenyanyaṟika-pfo.
Wandu waweiṙikyie Ruwa wakaṟika Stefano, wakakapa ṟanyi ing'anyi mnu kyipfa kyakye.
Saulyi kapfuṟukana irumatsa Siṟi, echiyenda numba kui numba kawaṙa wasoṟo na waka na iwawika kyipfungonyi.
Kyaindi wandu walya wa siṟi walenyanyaṟika wakayenda ipfo na ipfo wechionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Filyipo kasoka kaiṙa na mṟinyi o Samaria kaonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo.
Na wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie halya wakyeri kyindo kyimwi wakaaṙanyia mbonyi tsilya Filyipo alelosha kyiyeri waletsiicho na iwona shiṟiyisho alewuta.
Cha kyipfa waṟufui wawicho walewuka wandu wafoi, wechilyia na ṟui lying'anyi; na wandu wafoi wawepfiie ngapfu, na shileeta, wakakyiṟo.
Kukowaṙa sia ing'anyi kulya mṟinyi.
Na kuwewoṙe mndu umwi, ekyelago Simion, mndu mfiri ya numa awei msawi, echiṟiyisha wandu wa uruka lo Samaria, kui igamba kye oe nyi mndu ang'anyi.
Wandu woose wakaaṙanyia Simion, wookyia mtutu mṟasa ang'anyi, wechigamba, “Ichu nyi wuiṙimi wo Ruwa, wokyelago ‘Wuiṙimi Wung'anyi.’ ”
Wakamwaṙanyia, cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyileshi naleṟiyisha wandu kui wusawi wokye.
Kyaindi kyiyeri waleiṙikyia Filyipo, echionguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na rina lya Yesu Kristo, wakapatiso, wasoṟo na waka.
Na Simion kaiṙikyia kapatiso, kawaṙana tapu na Filyipo; kaṟiyio kyiyeri alewona ṟigo na shindo shing'anyi sheṟiyisha shiweiwutika.
Na wasu wawekyeri Yerusalemu; kyiyeri waleicho kye wandu wa Samaria waambilyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, wakaṙuma Petiro na Yohane.
Na kyiyeri waleyenda, wakaterewia walya waweiṙikyie wuiṙimi wo iambilyia Mumuyo Mweele;
cha kyipfa kuwoṙe maa umwi alekoamwambilyia Mumuyo Mweele-pfo. Wawewapatise tupu kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu.
Naaho-ng'u wakawayekyia mawoko, nawo wakaambilyia Mumuyo Mweele.
Na kyiyeri Simion alewona kye wandu waienengo Mumuyo Mweele kui iyekyio mawoko na wasu, kakunda ienenga wasu heleri, echigamba,
“Ngyienengyenyi wuiṙimi-wu, kundu orio mndu ngyechimyekyia mawoko gako, naambilyie Mumuyo Mweele.”
Kyaindi Petiro kammbia, “Heleri tsapfo tsiṙekye kulu hamwi na iyoe, cha kyipfa nokusaṟa kye masaa geiṙima ikuendie kyienengo kya Ruwa.
Uwoṙe ṙombo kyienengonyi kya ienenga wandu Mumuyo Mweele-pfo cha kyipfa mbele ya Ruwa mrima opfo uwoṙe wunyamaṟi.
Kyasia ṙumbuya wunyamaṟi-wu wopfo, uterewe Mndumii, kundu uhooṟio makusaṟo-ga mawicho uwoṙe mrimenyi kopfo.
Cha kyipfa ngyikuwonyi nuwoṙe wunyenyi wukuenenga iwawio ipfo mrimenyi cha nduu; na lyingyi-se kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi nui cha mndu akyeri kyipfungonyi.”
Simion kagaluo kagamba, “Ngyiterewienyi ko Mndumii, shindo-shi mogamba shilachengyiwutikyia maa kyimwi.”
Na wasu wamṟingyishie na ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii wakawuya na Yerusalemu, wechionguo Ndumi Ngyicha shikaṟonyi shifoi sha Wasamaria.
Malaika o Mndumii kaṙeṙa na Filyipo, kammbia, “Fuma uyende ura lo kyaseri mṟasa njia iya isokyie iwuka Yerusalemu mṟasa Gaza, nayo nyi nuka ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.”

Na oe kafuma, kayenda. Cha ilyi kawona mndu awukyie uruka lo Kushi, awoṙe wuchilyi wanda ya Kandakye, Mangyi o kyika o Kushi, ammbikye iambuya heleri tsoose. Na oe naleyenda Yerusalemu indeterewa Ruwa.
Kawa naiwuya na kanyi, aṙamie ikarinyi lyakye esoma kyitapu kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya.
Mumuyo Mweele kawia Filyipo, “Tikyira kufuhi na ikari-lyi, uwaṙane nalyo.”
Kyasia Filyipo kayenda eṙicha, kaicho mndu ulya o Kushi esoma kyitapu kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya; kammbesa, “Ngyesa numanya isho uisoma?”
Kagamba, “Ngyeiṙima kuṙa imanya mndu alandengyiloṟe?” Katerewa Filyipo naṙooye kulya ikarinyi na iṙamia hamwi na oe.
Na kyifunjoe kya shiṟeio shiele aweisoma nyi ikyi:
“Naleṙoo handu heshinjia cha ondo,
na chandu ondo lyekyetsia sau
mbele ya ulya ailyiṙumbuo mberi,
na wuṙo oe alaiṙeṙa kyindo.
Kyipfa kya ikutitiṟa aleanduyo-pfo.
Nyi wui echiongoya wa kyishari kyakye?
Kyipfa moo okye wuyanenyi ommbuto.”
Mndu ulya o Kushi kagaluo Filyipo, kammbia, “Ngyikuterewa ungyiwie, moonguo shisuku-chu naionguo mbonyi tsa wui; nyi mbonyi tsakye ang'u tsa mndu ungyi?”
Filyipo kamwongoya mbonyi ngyicha tsa Yesu Kristo, echiwooka na kyiṟeio kyilya kyilya mndu ulya o Kushi aweisoma.
Wakaengyeṟa iyenda, wakashika handu hawoṙe mṟinga. Mndu ulya o Kushi kagamba, “Kyeambuya mṟinga-chu; ny'kyikyi kyingyishingyia ngyilapatiso?”
Filyipo kagamba, “Koiṙikyia kui mrima opfo oose, kyechiiṙimika.” Kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngaiṙikyia kye Yesu Kristo nyi oe Mana o Ruwa.”
Kagamba ikari lyilya lyitirimisho; wakasokyia woose wewawi mṟingyenyi na oe kapatiso.
Numa ya iho, kyiyeri walewuka kulya mṟingyenyi, Mumuyo o Mndumii Ruwa karakuo Filyipo; mndu ulya o Kushi alammbone-se. Kayenda kanyi amchihiye.
Kyaindi Filyipo kawono urukyenyi lo Asoto, na kyiyeri aweiiṙa kaonguo Ndumi Ngyicha mṟi yoose, mṟasa kashika Kaisaria.
Kyaindi Saulyi, kaengyeṟa iowesha na ikusaṟa iwaaga wanalosho wa Mndumii Yesu. Kayenda ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose,
katerewa naenengo paruo tsa iyenda Dameskyi, tsingyiṙikye ko walya wawekyesongoya masinagogi, kundu kawona wandu walya wawekyeosha Mndumii Yesu, wasoṟo na waka, nawapfungye na iwaende na Yerusalemu.
Na kyiyeri awei kyaronyi, kyikawa nakyeri kufuhi na Dameskyi. Cha ilyi ngyeela iwukyie ruwewu ikamlyimika ngyuura tsoose.
Kaoloka wanda, kaicho ṟui lyechimmbia, “Saulyi, Saulyi, ny'kyilyi ungyilyisa wukyiwa?”
Kagamba, “Nyi wui iyoe, Mndumii?” Na oe kagamba, “Inyi nyi Yesu ungyilyisa wukyiwa.
Kyaindi goṟoka, uiṙe na mṟinyi, na iyoe nochiwio shikuwaṟi iwuta.”
Na wandu walya wawei kyaro hamwi na oe wakagoṟoka watsie sau, wechiicho ṟui, walawone mndu.
Saulyi kaamka halya wanda, na kyiyeri meso gakye galepfunguka, alewona kyindo-pfo. Wakammbaṙa kuwoko wakamwende mṟasa Dameskyi.
Alawone kyiyeri kya mfiri iṟaṟu; alailya maa inyo kyindo.
Kyasia kulya Dameskyi kuwewoṙe manalosho ekyelago Anania. Mndumii kamlaga akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo. Anania kaiṙikyia kagamba, “Nyi iha ngyikyeri, Mndumii.”
Mndumii kammbia, “Amka, yenda kulya mṟaṟunyi okyelago ‘Mṟaṟu Mgoṟotsu’ undewesa numbenyi ko Yuda mndu ekyelago Saulyi awukyie Tariso; cha kyipfa mndu-cho naiterewa.
Na oe ammbona mndu ekyelago Anania echicha, na imyekyia mawoko, naiṙime iwona-se.”
Kyaindi Anania kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, ngyilemwicho mbonyi tsa mndu-chu ko wandu wafoi, kye alemmbutia wandu walya wapfo wakyeri Yerusalemu shindo shiwicho mnu.
Maa wulalu nawoṙe momu amwenengye nyi wang'anyi wa makohanyi napfungye wandu woose wekyeterewa kui rina lyapfo.”
Kyaindi Mndumii kammbia, “Yenda tupu; cha kyipfa mndu-chu nyi kyindo kyako kyikyisaangye, naonguo mbonyi tsako ko walya walangyiiṙikyie, na ko wamangyi, na ko wandu wa Isiraelyi.
Kyipfa ngyechimloṟa chandu echilyiso ngyuukyiwa tsifoi kyipfa kya iongoya wandu wengyi mbonyi tsako kundu wangyimanye.”

Anania kafuma, kaiṙa na kulya numbenyi Saulyi awekyeri, kamyekyia mawoko echigamba, “Mono-wama, Saulyi, Mndumii nangyiṙuma, Yesu ulya alecha na kopfo ukyeri njienyi icha na kunu Dameskyi, uiṙime iwona-se, uichuṟo Mumuyo Mweele.”
Cha ilyi shindo shikyeri cha masuoe shikaoloka mesonyi gakye, kaiṙima iwona.
Kagoṟoka kapatiso; kalya kyelya, kawaṙa pfinya. Kakaa kulya Dameskyi mfiri ngyaangu, hamwi na wanalosho wawekyeri pfo.
Saulyi akyeri kulya Dameskyi kaonguo mbonyi masinagoginyi, kye Yesu nyi Mana o Ruwa.

Na wandu woose waleicho wakaṟiyio, wakagamba, “Ichu chi ulya awekyelyisa wukyiwa walya wawekyeterewa kui rina lya Yesu kulya Yerusalemu-pfoe? Na alecha na kunu Dameskyi awoṙe makusaṟo igo igo, nawapfungye na iwaṙuo ko wang'anyi-pfoe?”
Saulyi kaengyeṟa iwaṙa pfinya kyiiṙi kya ionguo mbonyi tsa Yesu, kaowesha Wayuda wawekyekaa Dameskyi, echiloṟa na pata kye ulya aweionguo mbonyi tsakye nyi oe Kristo.
Na mfiri ifoi yamuiṙe, Wayuda wakachila chandu wembaaga;
kyaindi ngyeṟo tsawo Saulyi katsimanya. Wakamwotia kyingoto na kyio kundu waiṙime immbaaga.
Wanalosho wakye wakammbika mkunjenyi kyio na imsotsia wanda wechimwitsa dirishenyi.
Na kyiyeri Saulyi aleshika Yerusalemu, nalepfuṟukana ikulunga na wanalosho, nawo wawemwowuye woose walaiṙikyie kye oe nyi manalosho.
Kyaindi Barinaba kaṙuo Saulyi ko wasu, kawawia chandu alewona Mndumii Yesu njienyi, na kye naleṙeṙa na oe, na chandu aleonguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa Yesu kulya Dameskyi kui wuṟango na wukari.
Na Saulyi kakaa hamwi na wasu kulya Yerusalemu echioshana nawo kyiiṙi kya shoose waweiwuta.
Kaonguo mbonyi tsa Mndumii Yesu kui wukari, echiṙeṙa na igaluana na Wayuda wawekyeṙeṙa mṙeṙie o Kyikyiṟikyi. Nawo wakatambagana immbaaga.
Kyaindi kyiyeri walya waweiṙikyie Yesu walemanya mbonyi-tsi wakamṙuo Kaisaria, wakamṙuo nayende Tariso.
Kyasia Siṟi ikawona sia urukyenyi lo Uyuda na Galyilaya na Samaria. Siṟi ikawaṙa pfinya, ikaengyeṟika, yechiindia Mndumii Yesu na iwiyiṟio moo nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
Na kyiyeri Petiro aweitenga-tenga ngyuura tsoose kayenda ko wandu wa Ruwa wawekyekaa Lyida.
Kawona mndu umwi kulya, awekyelago Ainea. Mndu-cho nawelee kyitaṟenyi kyiyeri kya maka nyanya; kyipfa nawepfiie ngapfu ura lumwi.
Petiro kammbia, “Ainea, Yesu Kristo amkukyiṟa. Amka, uale kyitaṟa kyapfo.” Cha ilyi kaamka.
Na wandu woose wawekyekaa Lyida na Sharoni wakammbona, wakaiṙikyia Mndumii Yesu na imwosha.
Na kulya Yafa kuwewoṙe manalosho umwi ekyelago Tabita (kyimwi na igamba Dorikasi ang'u moṟinyi). Mndu mka-chu nawewoṙe mawuto mecha na ienengyia shienengo shetarama wakyiwa.
Kyiyeri kyilya Tabita kaluo, kapfa; na wamumsanje, wakamṙuo kai.
Na kyipfa mṟi o Lyida uwekyeri kufuhi na Yafa, na wanalosho waleicho kye Petiro nakyeri pfo, wakaṙuma wandu wawi kokye, imterewa wechigamba, “Ulakyelyio icha na koṙu.”
Petiro kafuma kaoshana nawo. Kyiyeri aleafukyia, wakamṙuo kulya kai; wakusu woose wakagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, welyia na imloṟa kanzu na nguwo tsilya Dorikasi alepfuma kyiyeri kyilya awekyeri hamwi nawo.
Petiro kawawia woose wafumie nja, kapfiria ndi, katerewa, numa ya iho kapaaya mnying'a ulya o Dorikasi, kagamba, “Tabita, amka.” Dorikasi ulya awepfiie kaambuo, kawona Petiro, kaamka, kaṙamia.
Petiro kalesha kuwoko, kamwira. Na amlage wandu walya wa Ruwa na wakusu kawikyia Dorikasi mbele yawo, ai na moo.
Mbonyi-tsi tsikaṙunganana ko wandu woose wa mṟi o Yafa; wandu wafoi wakaiṙikyia Yesu.
Kyasia Petiro kakaa mfiri ngyaangu kulya Yafa, kanyi ko mndu umwi ekyelago Simion, awekyeachikyia njonyi.
Kulya Kaisaria kuwewoṙe mndu awekyelago Korinelyio, mchilyi o ulyimalyi lokyelago “Kyiitalyia.”
Mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, oe na wandu woose wa kanyi kokye, na oe nawekyeenengyia shienengo shifoi shesaṟia wandu, na nawekyeterewa Ruwa mfiri yoose.
Kawona na pata malaika o Ruwa akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo, cha saa kyenda tsa kyingoto, malaika o Ruwa echicha na kokye na immbia, “Korinelyio!”
Kamwitukuya mnu, kaowuo, kagamba, “Ny'kyikyi kyacha pfo, Mndumii?” Kammbia, “Ruwa naicho shiterewo shapfo na mawuto gapfo mecha gesaṟia wandu na wulalu naigaluo shilya okyemterewa.
Kyasia, wulalu ṙuo wandu Yafa, undelaga Simion, ekyelago Petiro.
Oe nyi myenu o mndu umwi, ekyelago Simion, ekyeachikyia njonyi, ulya numba yakye ikyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi; nekuwia shindo shikuwaṟi iwuta.”
Na malaika ulya aleṙeṙa na oe amyende, Korinelyio kalaga waṟundi wawi kyiiṙi kya waṟundi wakye wa kanyi, na asikari umwi, mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa kyiiṙi kya walya wawekyemṟundia mfiri yoose;
na amwawie chandu shindo shoose shechiwa kawaṙuma iyenda Yafa.
Na ilya-ngama, kyiyeri wawei kyaronyi na ishika kufuhi na mṟi, Petiro naleṙooya kai indeterewa, cha saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto.
Kawoṙo nyi njaa, kakunda ilya; kyaindi kyiyeri waweiṟeyeṟa kyelya, kaloṟo kyindo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo.
Kawona ngyina yeṟuguka, na kyindo kyikyeri cha nguwo ngyilandari kyesoka, kyikasotso mṟasa wuyanenyi kyii cha ilyi kyikyiwaṙe ngyuura tsoose tsiina.
Ipfo kyindonyi kyilesotso kuwewoṙe orio indo lya saka lyiwoṙe maṙende gaana, na mando ga saka gekyekukuruo na ndewu, na shileye sha ngyinenyi.
Numa ya iho kaicho ṟui lyigamba, “Amka, Petiro, ushinje ulye.”
Kyaindi Petiro kagamba, “Maa ale, Mndumii, cha kyipfa ngyilandelye kyindo kyoose kyilawaṟi na kyifanyi kyimṟumoe-pfo.”
Kaicho ṟui lya kawi, lyemmbia, “Molakusaṟe kye kuwoṙe kyindo kyilawaṟi ilyio kokooya Ruwa nagambie shoose shiwaṟi ilyio.”
Kyindo-kyi kyikawutika kaṟaaṟu. Numa ya iho kyindo kyilya kyilekokyasoka ruwewu kyikawuya napfo.

Na kyiyeri Petiro awemṟiyie mrimenyi kokye, echikuwesa shindo shilya aleloṟo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo shiwemmbia kyi, wandu walya Korinelyio alewaṙuma, wammbese mbonyi tsa numba ya Simion, wakagoṟoka mbele ya moongo,
wakalaga; wakawesa kokooya Simion ekyelago Petiro nekyekaa pfo.
Na Petiro naweikusaṟa mbonyi tsa shindo shilya alekoaloṟo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo. Mumuyo kammbia, “Kuwoṙe wandu waṟaaṟu waikupfula.
Kyasia fuma uoshane nawo, molapfiio nyi mṙoe, cha kyipfa nyi inyi ngyilewaṙuma.”
Petiro kayenda ko wandu walya, kagamba, “Nyi inyi mungyipfula. Mocha kyipfa kya kyikyi?”

Wakagamba, “Mchilyi Korinelyio, mndu ulya msumganyi, aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, awoṙe kyiṟumi kyicha ko isanga lyoose lya Wayuda, nalewio nyi malaika mweele iṙuma wandu kopfo, wakuwie uyende kokye, kundu naicho kyilya okyelosha.”
Petiro kaambilyia wayenu walya, wawe wayenu wakye. Na ilya-ngama, Petiro kafuma hamwi nawo, na wandu waata wawekyeosha Yesu kulya Yafa wakaoshana na oe.
Ilya-ngama wakashika Kaisaria. Na Korinelyio naweiwaweṙelyia, asanzie hamwi na wa kyishari kyakye na mbuya tsakye.
Kyiyeri Petiro aletikyira kufuhi Korinelyio kafuma indemwambilyia, kakuwiyitsa maṙendenyi gakye, kamwindia.
Kyaindi Petiro, kamwira, kagamba, “Goṟoka; inyi nyi mndu cha wandu wengyi ngyilawaṟi iindio cha malaika.”
Na echigamba kuṙo kaiṙa na numba, kawona wandu wafoi wasanzie pfo.

Kawawia, “Nyoe muichi kye chi sungusinyi mndu alakyeri Myuda naoshane na mndu o isanga lyingyi maa iyenda kokye-pfo, kyaindi Ruwa nalegyiikyimbia, ngyilagambe kye kuwoṙe mndu afanyi kyimṟumoe alawaṟi ikaa na wandu wengyi-pfo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyilecha lyilya ngyilelago, ngyilalege; kyasia ngammbesa, ny'kyikyi mongyilaiya.”
Korinelyio kagamba, “Mfiri iṟaṟu ileira, kyiyeri-kyi ikyi, kyiyeri kya saa kyenda, ngyiweiterewa kanyi koko; mndu umwi kagoṟoka mbele yako, awoṙe nguwo tsiaka-aka,
kagamba, ‘Korinelyio, shiterewo shapfo shaaṙanyio na shienengo okyeenengyia shiwonio na pata mbele ya Ruwa.
Kyasia, ṙuma wandu kulya Yafa, undelaga Simion ekyelago Petiro, ekyekaa kanyi ko Simion, ekyeachikyia njonyi, kufuhi na mbai ya ipalyipalyi; na oe kacha nechiṙeṙa na iyoe.’
Cha ilyi ngaṙuma wandu kopfo, na iyoe nowuta necha icha. Kyasia soe loose lukyeri iha mbele ya Ruwa, luiṙime iaṙanyia mbonyi tsilya Mndumii alekuwia uluongoye.”
Petiro kawooka iṙeṙa, kagamba, “Loi ngyiichi kye Ruwa awoṙe ikundia-pfo;
indi kyiiṙi kya orio isanga mndu ekyeindia Ruwa na iwuta sha sungusinyi Ruwa nekyemwiṙikyia.
Mbonyi tsilya aleṙooya wana wa Isiraelyi, echionguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa ufoṟo kui Yesu Kristo (nyi oe Mndumii o woose),
kyindo-kyi nyoe mukyiichi, kyileongoyo urukyenyi loose lo Uyuda, kyechiwookyia Galyilaya, numa ya wupatiso wulya Yohane aleonguo mbonyi tsakye.

Mbonyi tsa Yesu awukyie Nasareti, chandu Ruwa alemshumbuo kui Mumuyo Mweele na pfinya; na oe katenga-tenga ipfo na ipfo, echiṟunda iṟunda lyicha na ikyiṟa woose Mokyiriinzi aweiwalyisa wukyiwa; cha kyipfa Ruwa nawekyeri hamwi na oe.
Na soe lui waṟingyishi wa shindo shoose aleshiwuta urukyenyi lo Wayuda na Yerusalemu; ulya walemmbaaga na immanyika ikyiṙinyi.
Icho Ruwa nalemṟutsa mfiri o kaṟaaṟu, kamsaṟia imanyika,
chi ko wandu woose-pfo, indi ko waṟingyishi walekowamsambuṟo nyi Ruwa, nyiwo soe, lulelya na inyo hamwi na oe numa ya iṟuka lyakye iwuka ko wapfu.
Naleluwia luongoye wandu mbonyi ngyicha na iṟingyishia kye ichu nyi oe ammbikye nyi Ruwa nawe moanduya wai na moo na wapfu.
Icho weonguo shisuku woose walemṟingyishia, kye kui rina lyakye orio momwiṙikyia nechihooṟio wunyamaṟi.”
Kyiyeri Petiro aweionguo mbonyi-tso Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye ya woose waleicho kyilya alegamba.
Na Wayuda waweiṙikyie Yesu walekowacha hamwi na Petiro wawuka Yafa waleṟiyio, cha kyipfa maa wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu walesumbo kyienengo kya Mumuyo Mweele.
Cha kyipfa waleicho weṙeṙa mṙeṙie ngyiyenu, na iṟumisha Ruwa. Naaho-ng'u Petiro kagaluo, kagamba,
“Nyi wui eiṙima ishingyia mṟinga, wandu-wa walapatiso? Wandu waambilyie Mumuyo Mweele kyimwi na soe?”
Kagamba wapatiso kui Rina lya Yesu Kristo. Naaho wakamterewa naengyeṟe ikaa kowo mfiri ngyaangu.
Kyasia wasu na wandu waweiṙikyie Yesu kulya urukyenyi lo Uyuda wakamanya kye wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu nawo waambilyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Na Petiro kyiyeri aleṙo iyenda Yerusalemu Wayuda walya wawekundi wandu walakyeri Wayuda wakundi iosha Yesu waṙino wakagaluana na oe,
wechigamba, “Nuleyenda ko wandu walawaṙine kolya nawo.”
Petiro kawooka iwaongoya necha, kagamba,

“Ngyiwekyeri mṟinyi o Yafa, ngyeterewa, ngawa cha mndu ailoṙo. Ngawona kyindo kyisoka ruwewu, cha nguwo ngyilandari yesotso iwuka ruwewu, ikyeri cha ilyi ingyiwaṙe ngyuura tsoose tsiina, kyikashika halya-ndu ngyiwei.
Ngakyiitukuya mnu, ngyekusaṟa, ngawona mando ga saka gawoṙe maṙende gaana; na mando ga nguṙunyi, na galya gekyekukuruo na ndewu, na shileye sha ngyinenyi.
Ngaicho na ṟui lyingyiwia, ‘Petiro, amka, ushinje ulye.’
Ngagamba, ‘Maa ale, Mndumii, cha kyipfa ngyilandelye kyindo kyoose kyifanyi-pfo.’
Ṟui lyilya lyawuka ruwewu lyikangyigaluo lya kawi lyikagamba, ‘Shilya Ruwa agambie shiwaṟi ilyio iyoe ulagambe kye shekyelyio-pfo.’
Kyindo-kyi kyikawutika kaṟaaṟu; numa ya iho ngawona kyindo kyakuruo shindo shilya shoose shikawuya-se na ruwewu.
Kyiyeri kyilya wandu waṟaaṟu wakagoṟoka mbele ya numba iya luwekyeri, waleṙumo koko iwuka Kaisaria.
Mumuyo kangyiwia ngyioshane nawo, ngyilapfiio nyi mṙoe. Wandu-wa waṟandaaṟu waiṙikyie Yesu wakayenda hamwi na inyi, lukoiṙa na numba ko mndu ulya.
Kaluongoya chandu alewona malaika alegoṟoka kanyi kokye na immbia, ‘Ṙuma wandu wayende Yafa, walage Simion ekyelago Petiro,
echikuongoya mbonyi tsechikukyiṟa, iyoe na walya wa kanyi kopfo woose.’
Na kyiyeri ngyilewooka iṙeṙa, Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye yawo chandu alelusokyia soe ipfo mawookyionyi.
Ngakumbuo ṙeṙo lyilya lya Mndumii, chandu alegamba, ‘Yohane nalepatisa kui mṟinga loi, indi nyoe mochipatiso kui Mumuyo Mweele.’
Kyasia kokooya Mndumii Ruwa nalewaenenga wo kyienengo kyilya kyilya aleluenenga soe luiṙikyie Mndumii Yesu Kristo, inyi nyi wui ngyiiṙime iwingana na Ruwa?”
Kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tsi wakatsia sau, wakaṟumisha Ruwa, wechigamba, “Kyasia Ruwa naenenga walya walaiṙikyie Yesu isaṟia lya iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, irumbuya lyekyeende moo o mlungana.”

Kyasia wandu walya walekowanyanyaṟika kyipfa kya wukyiwa wulya wulecha kyipfa kya Stefano iwoogo, wakapfunga kyaro mṟasa Foinikye na Kyipiro na Antiokyia, walaonguoe mbonyi tsa Yesu sile ko Wayuda tikyi.

Kyaindi waata kyiiṙi kya iwo walepfunga kyaro nyi-we wandu wa Kyipiro na Kyirene, nawo kyiyeri waleshika Antiokyia wakaṙeṙa na Wayuda kui mṙeṙie o Kyikyiṟikyi, wechionguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa Mndumii Yesu.
Pfinya ya Mndumii ikakaa hamwi nawo; wandu wafoi wakaiṙikyia wakagalukyia Mndumii.
Mbonyi tsa wandu-wo tsikashika ko wandu wa siṟi ya kulya Yerusalemu; wakaṙuma Barinaba, nayende mṟasa Antiokyia.
Na oe, amshikye na iwona isaṟia lya Ruwa kachihiyo, katerewa wandu woose waoshane na Mndumii kui iiṙikyia lyiwukyie mrimenyi.
Kyipfa nawekyeri mndu mcha aichuo Mumuyo Mweele na iiṙikyia; wandu wafoi wakaengyeṟika ura lo Mndumii.
Numa ya iho kafuma kayenda Tariso indepfula Saulyi;
na amummbone kamwende na Antiokyia. Kyikawa ko kyiyeri kya maka umwi wakasanza hamwi na siṟi na ilosha wandu wafoi. Na wanalosho walelago Wakristiano lya kuwooka halya Antiokyia.
Mfiri iya iya weonguo shisuku walewuka Yerusalemu wakasoka na Antiokyia.

Na kyiyeri lulesanzia handu hamwi, umwi owo ekyelago Agabo kagoṟoka, kaloṟa kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele kye njaa ing'anyi yeecha mfiri ya kufuhi wuyanenyi koose; na njaa-yo ikacha kyiyeri Kyilaudio awewoṙe uruka.
Na wanalosho walya, orio mndu chandu awewoṙe, wakaiṙikyia iṙuo kyindo kyetarama wana wa wamawo kyiiṙi kya iiṙikyia wawekyekaa uruka lo Uyuda.
Wakawuta kuṙo, Barinaba na Saulyi wakaṙumo ko wameeku wa siṟi waṙuṙe kyindo kyilya wanalosho waleenengyia kyetarama woṙiawo.
Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya mangyi Herode kawooka ilyisa wandu waata wa siṟi wukyiwa.
Kawaaga Yakobo, mono-wama o Yohane na ushu.
Na awonyi kye nyi kyindo kyichihiṟie Wayuda kaengyeṟa ilyisa siṟi wukyiwa, kawaṙa na Petiro. Kyiyeri-kyo kyiwekyeri kyiyeri kya mkate ilangyitarang'ishe.
Ammbaṙe Petiro, kammbika kyipfungonyi, kamṙambika ko shikosi sha asikari waana waana, wamringye, akundi immbikyia mbele ya wandu numa ya Pasaka kundu naanduyo.
Kyasia Petiro karingo kulya kyipfungonyi, na siṟi ikaterewa Ruwa kui wuragari kyipfa kyakye.
Na kyiyeri Herode awekundi iwuta Petiro kyipfungonyi, kyio kyilya nawelee makyiṙi-gawi ga asikari wawi, ampfungye na mshe iwi; waringyi wakaringa moongo o numba iya ya ipfungyia wandu.
Cha ilyi malaika o Ruwa kagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, ngyeela ikalyimika kulya kyiṟinyi, kakapa Petiro uwarinyi, kamwamtsa, echigamba, “Amka iwinyi.” Mshe iya ikawuka kulya mawoko kokye.
Malaika kammbia, “Kuṟeyeṟe, ṟaa shiaṙu shapfo.” Kawuta kuṙo. Numa ya iho kammbia, “Ṟaa nguwo tsapfo ungyioshe.”
Kafuma na nja kamwosha, maa alemanya kye nyi loi shilya shilewuto nyi malaika-pfo; indi nalekusaṟa kye nawonyi shindo cha mndu ailoṙo.

Na kyiyeri wamuiṙe handu ha kuwooka na ha hawi hawewoṙe asikari waringyi, wakacha mṟasa moongo o menya o iṙa na mṟinyi, ukoṟuguka umonyi kulawoṙe mndu aupaaya. Wakafumia nja wakyeri njienyi imwi. Cha ilyi malaika ulya kalekana nawo.
Na kyiyeri wuṟango wo Petiro wulemmbiyilyia, kagamba, “Wulalu ngyiichi na pata kye Mndumii naṙuma malaika okye na ingyiwuta wuchilyinyi wo Herode na matuuro galya Wayuda wawekusurie ingyienenga.”
Na kyiyeri aweikusaṟa isho kashika kanyi ko Mariamu, wama o Yohane, ulya rina lyakye lya kawi lyiwekyeri nyi Mariko; na wandu wafoi walekowasanzia pfo weterewa.
Na oe kyiyeri alekapa hodi halya kyichuminyi, kyisinga kyekyelago Roda, kyikacheaṙanyia.
Kyiyeri kyilemanya nyi ṟui lya Petiro, kyikaṟuguo moongo, kyipfa kya ichihiyo; indi kyikakapa mteeṟa, kyikaiṙa na numba kyikawia walya wawekyeri pfo kye Petiro nagoṟokyi halya kyichuminyi.
Wakakyiwia, “Nuisuko.” Kyaindi kyo kyikaengyeṟa igamba nyi loi kye Petiro nawekyeri halya. Wakagamba, “Nyi malaika okye.”
Petiro kaengyeṟa ikapa hodi, na wampfunguo moongo wakammbona, wakaṟiyio.
Na oe kawatsinia watsie, kawaongoya chandu Mndumii alemmbuta kyipfungonyi. Kagamba, “Ndewienyi Yakobo na wandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu mbonyi-tsi.” Kafuma, kayenda handu hengyi.
Na kyiyeri kulekya asikari wakawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi, mbonyi tsa Petiro tsawa kuṙa.
Na kyiyeri Herode alempfula alammbone, nalewesa-wesa waringyi, kagamba wawoogo. Numa ya iho kawuka uruka lo Uyuda kasoka na Kaisaria, kakaa pfo.

Na Herode nawesuuye mnu kyipfa kya wandu wa Tiro na Sidon. Wakayenda kokye wakyeri kyindo kyimwi, na wammbaṙe mbuya na Blasto, awekyeambuya kyiṟi kya Mangyi Herode kyelaa, wakakunda ikaa na wandu ko ufoṟo; cha kyipfa uruka lowo lulewona kyelya iwuka urukyenyi lo Herode.
Kyasia mfiri umwi uwemṟeyeṟe, Herode, kaṟaa nguwo tsa kyimangyi, kaṙamia kyiṙinyi kya wumangyi, kaṙeṙa nawo.
Wandu wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Nyi ṟui lya Ruwa; chi ṟui lya mndu-pfo.”
Cha ilyi malaika o Ruwa kamkapa, cha kyipfa aleenenga Ruwa kyiṟumi-pfo. Shiwoṙoe shikamlya kapfa.
Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyikaengyeṟa imanyika ko wandu wafoi.
Na Barinaba na Saulyi, wamṟunde kyilya kyiwewaṟi iṟunda, wakacha wawuka Yerusalemu, wakacha hamwi na Yohane ekyelago Mariko.

Na kulya siṟinyi ya Antiokyia kuwewoṙe weonguo shisuku na walosha, nawo nyi Barinaba, na Simion ekyelago Nikyeri, na Lukyio awukyie Kyirene, na Manaeni aweongyie wee lyimwi na Mangyi Herode, na Saulyi.
Kyasia kyiyeri iwa waweiterewa Ruwa na ikuretekyia, Mumuyo Mweele kagamba, “Ngyisaangyienyi Barinaba na Saulyi ko iṟunda lyilya ngyilemulagia.”
Naaho-ng'u wamkuretekyie na iterewa, wakawayekyia mawoko, wakawaṙuma.
Kyasia wandu-wo, wamṙumo nyi Mumuyo Mweele, wakasoka na Seleukyia, na iwuka pfo wakaiṙa ipalyipalyinyi mṟasa Kyipiro.
Na kyiyeri wawekyeri Salami wakaonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa masinagoginyi ga Wayuda, nawo wawekyeri na Yohane cha mṟundi owo.
Wamuiṙe kyiiṙi kya Kyipiro mṟasa Pafo, wakawona mndu umwi, msawi, moonguo shisuku o wongo, Myuda awekyelago Bar-Yesu.
Mndu-chu nawekyeri hamwi na mchilyi Serikyio Paulo, mndu mṟango. Mchilyi-cho kalaga Barinaba na Saulyi wache na kokye, kakunda iicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Kyaindi Elyima, msawi ulya (kyipfa ikyo ny'kyo rina lyakye lyagamba), kagaluana nawo, akundi ilemba mchilyi ulya naṙe iiṙikyia Yesu.
Kyaindi Saulyi ang'u Paulo, aichuo Mumuyo Mweele, kamwitukuya karii,
kagamba, “Iyoe uwoṙe ngyeṟo na wuwicho woose, mana o Mokyiriinzi, mokyituwa o wusumganyi woose, okyeṙa igaluo wuloi wo Mndumii wuwe wongo?
Ruwa nechikukapa na ikuanduya; na iyoe nochipfa meso, ulewona kyindo kyoose.” Cha ilyi rundu lya meema lyikamwolokyia katenga-tenga na ipfula mndu mommbaṙa kuwoko na imsongoya.
Naaho-ng'u mchilyi ulya, kyiyeri alewona shawutika, kaiṙikyia, echiṟiyio kyipfa kya malosho ga Mndumii.
Numa ya iho Paulo na oṙoe wakawooka kyaro kya ipalyipalyinyi, wakawuka Pafo wakashika Perikye, urukyenyi lo Pamfilyia. Yohane kalekana nawo kawuya na Yerusalemu.
Kyaindi wo wakawuka Perikye, walaiṙe-se ipalyipalyinyi, wakashika Antiokyia, mṟi o uruka lo Pisidia, wakaiṙa na sinagoginyi mfiri o onyonya, wakaṙamia.

Numa ya isoma kyitumbuṟe kya uwawaso na kyitapu kya weonguo shisuku, wasongoru wa sinagogi wakaṙuma mndu kowo na iwawia, “Wana wa wama kyiiṙi kya iiṙikyia, kokooya muwoṙe ṙeṙo lyetarama wandu-wa, lyionguonyi.”
Paulo kagoṟoka, kawatsinia, kagamba, “Nyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi, na nyoe muowuye na ikunda Ruwa, aṙanyienyi.
Ruwa o wandu wa Isiraelyi nalesambuṟa waku waṙu, kawaenenga mng'ano, kyiyeri wawekyekaa cha wayenu urukyenyi lo Misiri, na kui pfinya yakye kawawuta pfo, kawasongoya.
Na kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana kakarishia mkaṟo yawo ngyiwicho kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.
Na amrumatse masanga mfungaaṙe urukyenyi lo Kanaan kawaenenga uruka-lo luwe kyioṟa ko kyiyeri kya maka cha magana gaana na makumi gataanu;
numa ya iho kawaenenga wamangyi wookyia kacha kyiyeri kya Samolyi.
Numa ya iho wakaterewa ienengo mowaṙa uruka. Ruwa kawaenenga Saulyi, mana o Kyishi, mndu o kyishari kya Benyamen, kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana.
Na amwawute Saulyi, kasambuṟa Dawidi nawe mowaṙa uruka lowo, ulya alemṟingyishia, echigamba, ‘Ngawona Dawidi, mana o Yese, mndu achihiṟie ngoo yako, echiwuta shilya ngyikundi shoose.’
Kyisharinyi kya Dawidi Ruwa naleendie wandu wa Isiraelyi Mkyiṟa, Yesu, chandu alewika kyaasa.
Yohane aweiongoya wandu woose wa Isiraelyi mbonyi ngyicha tsa wupatiso wo iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, kyiyeri oe Yesu alandeche.
Na Yohane kyiyeri aweimarisa iṟunda lyakye nalegamba, ‘Mokusaṟa inyi nyi wui? Inyi chi oe-pfo. Kyaindi kuicha umwi numa yako, ulya inyi ngyilawaṟi ituruchuo ukowa lo shiaṙu shakye.’ ”
“Wana wa wama wako, wana wa kyishari kya Abrahamu, na iwo wai konyu waowuye na ikunda Ruwa, Ṙeṙo lya wukyiṟo-wu lyaendo na koṙu nyi mndu Ruwa amṙumie.
Cha kyipfa walya wekyekaa Yerusalemu, na wasongoru wawo, kyipfa walalemmanya oe, maa imanya malosho ga weonguo shisuku gekyesomo orio mfiri o onyonya, walegaafutsia kui imwanduya.
Maa chandu walalewona kyimaṙuma kyemmbaaga wakaterewa Pilato nawoogo.
Na wammbute shoose shiweshigambe kye shechimmbutikyia, wakamsotsa halya msalabenyi, wakammbika kyilomenyi.
Kyaindi Ruwa kamṟutsa ko wapfu;
mfiri ifoi kawono akyeri na walya walecha na oe iwuka Galyilaya mṟasa Yerusalemu, walya wulalu wekyemṟingyishia mbele ya wandu.
Na soe lokyemuongoya mbonyi ngyicha tsa kyaasa kyilya waku waṙu waleenengo,
kye Ruwa naleafutsia kyaasa-kyo ko wana waṙu, kui iṟutsa Yesu; chandu kyikyiṟeie Kyiimbonyi kya Kawi,
‘Iyoe nyi oe Mono-ko,
inyi inu ngawa Awuyo.’ ”
“Lyingyi-se kye nalemṟutsa ko wapfu, kundu alapfe na ipuo. Nalegamba kuṙi,
‘Ngyemuenenga nyoe shindo shiele
sha Dawidi shikyeri sha loi.’ ”
“Koikyo handu hengyi nagambie,
‘Ochilekyia mweele opfo napfe na ipuo-pfo;’ ”
“Cha kyipfa Dawidi naleṟundia Ruwa kyiyeri kyakye, naaho kapfa kaṟiko hamwi na waku wakye na mmbiu okye ukopuo;
indi ichu aleṟutso nyi Ruwa nalepfa indi alepuo-pfo.
Kyasia kyimanyikye konyu, wana wa wama wako, kye kui rina lya Yesu muongoyo mbonyi tsa ihooṟio wunyamaṟi.
Na kui oe orio momwiṙikyia nekyetalo kye namsumganyi shindonyi shoose alechiiṙima italo kye namsumganyi kui uwawaso lo Mose.
Kyasia, kuringyenyi mulachewutikyio mbonyi iya ilegambo shiṟeionyi sha weonguo shisuku,
‘Aṙanyienyi, nyoe mokyemina
kyilya Ruwa agambie,
ṟiyionyi na ipfa
cha kyipfa kyilya ngyiwuta inu
nyi kyindo mulechikyiiṙikyia
maa kyiyeri mndu amuongoya.’ ”
Na kyiyeri Paulo na Barinaba waweiwuka halya Sinagoginyi wakawaterewa waongoyo mbonyi-tso mfiri o kawi o onyonya.
Kyiyeri walya wawesanzie sinagoginyi walelekana, Wayuda na wandu wafoi waweowuye Ruwa na imkunda wakaoshana na Paulo na Barinaba waleṙeṙa nawo wechiwakarisha wakae isaṟienyi lya Ruwa mfiri yoose.
Na mfiri o kawi o onyonya, wandu wafoi iwuka mṟinyi koose, wakasanzia handu hamwi kundu waicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Indi Wayuda, kyiyeri walewona wuingyi wo wandu, wakawoṙo wunyenyi, wakakangyila kyilya Paulo alekoagamba, wechigamba chi loi-pfo na ilahia.

Paulo na Barinaba wakaṙeṙa kui wukari, wakagamba, “Kyiwewaṟi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyiongoyo konyu kuwooka; kyaindi kyipfa mulyitsindikyia kuleshi, na ikuicho mrimenyi konyu kye muwaṟi moo o mlungana-pfo, wulalu luyenda ko wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo Mndumii aleluwia, echigamba,
‘Ngakuwika uwe ngyeela ya wandu walaichi Ruwa
kundu wuyana woose wuwone wukyiṟo.’ ”
Kyiyeri wandu walaichi Ruwa waleicho isho wakachihiyo, wakang'anyisa Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na walya wawewaṟeyeṟie moo o mlungana wakaiṙikyia.
Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyikaṙunganana kulya urukyenyi koose.
Kyaindi Wayuda wakaamtsa shiloyano kyiiṙi kya waka waowuye na ikunda Ruwa, waka wawoṙe rina na wasoṟo wawoṙe kyiṟumi, wakawanzia wandu wakape Paulo na Barinaba; wakawamichia nja ya uruka lulya lowo.
Nawo wakaambutsa kyilulyi maṙendenyi gawo, wakayenda mṟinyi okyelago Ikonio.
Na wanalosho waleichuo sia na Mumuyo Mweele.
Kyiyeri wawei kulya Ikonio wakaiṙa na sinagoginyi lya Wayuda; na chandu waleonguo mbonyi, Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi wafoi wakaiṙikyia Yesu.
Kyaindi Wayuda walelega iiṙikyia Yesu wakawutia wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu shindo sha kyinyala na ienenga walya waweiṙikyie Yesu ipfuluko mrimenyi.
Kyasia wakakaa pfo kyiyeri kyileshi, wechiṙeṙa kulawoṙe wuowu mbonyi tsa Mndumii, aleṟingyishia Ṙeṙo lya isaṟia lyakye, echiwasaṟia ṟigo na shindo sha maṟiyisho shiwutikye kui shilya aweiwuta.
Kyaindi wandu wa kulya mṟinyi walawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi. Iwa wakakaa ura lo Wayuda, na wengyi ura lo Wasu.
Na kyiyeri wandu waata walaweiṙikyie Yesu na Wayuda, hamwi na wasongoru wawo waleṙumbuo iwawutia shindo sha kyinyala na iwakapa na magoe,
nawo wakamanya mbonyi-tso, waleṙicha wakayenda Lyistira na Deribe, mṟi ya Lyikaonia, na ngyuuruka tsa mṟasenyi;
wakakaa pfo, wechionguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
Na kulya Lyistira kuwewoṙe mndu umwi, mfiri maṙende, awei kyiwete wookyia kyiyeri alefeo, alawendechumie maa ale.
Mndu-cho naleicho Paulo kyiyeri aweilosha. Paulo kamwitukuya karii na iwona kye nawoṙe iiṙikyia lya ikyiṟo,
kagamba na ṟui lying'anyi, “Goṟoka necha kui maṙende gapfo.” Mndu ulya kagoṟoka faṟa kayenda.
Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu walewona kyindo Paulo awuta wakakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, wechigamba kui mṙeṙie o Kyilyikaonia, “Waruwa wacha na koṙu wakyeri cha wandu.”
Wakalaga Barinaba Seu na Paulo Herime, cha kyipfa nyi oe aweiṙeṙa.
