Mkohanyi o Seu, ulya hekalu lyakye lyiwekyeri mbele ya mṟi, kaende umbe na oṟo tsa shiwaṟo mṟasa kyichuminyi, akundi ienengyia kyiṙaso hamwi na wuingyi wo wandu wuwekyeri halya.
Kyaindi kyiyeri Barinaba na Paulo walemanya mbonyi-tsi wakaranduo nguwo tsawo, wakayenda weṙicha wakakulunga na wuingyi wulya wo wandu, wakakalagatsa,

wechigamba, “Lanyoe, ny'kyilyi muiwuta ishi? Soe lukyeri wandu cha nyoe. Lumuongoya mbonyi ngyicha, kundu mugalukye na iṙa shindo sha wuwicho na iyenda ko Ruwa ai na moo, alegumba ruwewu na uruka na mapalyipalyi na shoose shikyeri pfo.
Ulya nyoe kyiyeri kya kacha kyileiṙa aleṙa masanga goose gawute chandu gakundi.
Kyaindi aleṙa imuṟingyishia-pfo, cha kyipfa nalewuta shindo shicha, echimuenenga mvuo iwuka ruwewu na kyiyeri kya shilyimu, echiigutsa mrima yanyu shelya na sia.”
Maa chandu wasu walegamba isho, waleiṙima ishingyia wandu walya walaweiṙikyie Yesu iwaenenga shiṙaso-pfo.
Kyaindi Wayuda wakacha wawuka Antiokyia na Ikonio, wakawanzia wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie halya wakakapa Paulo na magoe, wakamkuruya nja ya mṟi, wakusaṟie kye ampfa.
Kyaindi kyiyeri wanalosho wawemwiṟiwie, kagoṟoka, kaiṙa na mṟinyi; na ilya-ngama kafuma, kayenda mṟasa Deribe waṙuṙanyi na Barinaba.
Na wamuonguo Ndumi Ngyicha kulya mṟinyi, na igaluo wandu wafoi wakawa wanalosho, wakawuya mṟasa Lyistira na Ikonio na Antiokyia,
wechikarisha mrima ya wanalosho na iwawia wakae kyiiṙi kya Iiṙikyia lyilya, na kye kyiluwaṟi iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa kui njia ya matuuro gafoi.
Na wamsambuṟe wameeku wa siṟi kulya siṟinyi, na iterewa hamwi na ikuretekyia, wakawawika mawokonyi ga Ruwa ulya wawemwiṙikyie.
Wakaiṙia Pisidia wakashika Pamfilyia.
Na numa ya ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kulya Perikye wakayenda mṟasa Atalyia.
Na iwuka kulya Atalyia wakawuya na Antiokyia weiṙia ipalyipalyinyi. Kulya Antiokyia nyipfo waleterewio isaṟia lya Ruwa kui iṟunda lyilya walekowamlyimarisa.

Kyiyeri waleshika kulya Antiokyia walewia wandu wa siṟi wasanzie handu hamwi, wakawaongoya shindo shoose Ruwa aleshiwuta hamwi nawo, na kye Ruwa nalepfunguya moongo o iiṙikyia wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu.
Wakakaa kulya Antiokyia kyiyeri kyileshi, hamwi na wanalosho.
Kukocha wandu wawukyie uruka lo Uyuda wakalosha walya waweiṙikyie Yesu, wechigamba, “Mulandeṙino chandu kyikyeri muichiwie o Mose mochiiṙima ikyiṟo-pfo.”

Kyasia numa ya Paulo na Barinaba iwingana na wandu-wa na igaluana nawo mnu, wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakagamba kye Paulo na Barinaba na wandu wengyi waangu waṙo iyenda Yerusalemu ko wasu na wameeku wa siṟi kyipfa kya mbonyi-tso tsa iṙino.
Kyasia, wawaṙume nyi siṟi, wakaiṙia uruka lo Foinikye na Samaria, wechionguo mbonyi tsa chandu wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu walemwiṙikyia; wakachihiṟa mnu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu.
Kyiyeri waleshika Yerusalemu wakaambilyio nyi siṟi na wasu na wameeku wa siṟi, nawo wakawaongoya shindo shoose Ruwa alewuta hamwi nawo.
Kyaindi wandu waata wawekyeri miiṙikyienyi ya Mafarisayo waweiṙikyie wakagoṟoka, wechigamba, “Kyiwaṟi iwaṙina na iwawia waoshe uwawaso lo Mose!”
Wasu na wameeku wa siṟi wakasanzia handu hamwi kundu waiṙime ikusaṟa kya mbonyi-tsi.

Na numa ya wandu wafong'ui igamba kyilya wawekusaṟie Petiro kagoṟoka, kawawia, “Wana wa wama, nyoe muichi kye wookyia mfiri ya ipfo numa Ruwa nalengyisambuṟa kyiiṙi kyanyu kundu ngyiongoye wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na ilyiiṙikyia.
Na Ruwa, aichi mrima ya wandu, kamṟingyishia, echimuenenga nyoe Mumuyo Mweele chandu aleluenenga soe.
Maa aleluwutia soe kyindo kyilafananyi na kyilya alewawutia-pfo, echiwailyisha mrima yawo kui iiṙikyia.
Kyasia wulalu ny'kyilyi muiyesha Ruwa na iṙika wanalosho ṟio lyilemeri, ṟio waku waṙu maa soe lulaiṙima ilyiṙuo?
Indi luiṙikyie kye lochikyia kui isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu cha wo.”

Kyasia wandu walya woose wawesanzie halya wakatsia tsii, wakaaṙanyia Barinaba na Paulo wechiwaongoya mbonyi tsa ṟigo na shindo sha maṟiyisho, Ruwa alewuta kui ulogo kyiiṙi kya walya walaweiṙikyie Yesu.
Na iwo wamtsie Yakobo kagaluo, echigamba, “Wana wa wama wako ngyiaṙanyienyi,
Simion naluongoya chandu Ruwa ipfo mawookyionyi aleloṟa chandu ekyeembeṟa wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu kundu nasambuṟe wandu kyiiṙi kyawo kyipfa kya rina lyakye.
Na maṙeṙo ga weonguo shisuku gaṙuana na isho, chandu kyikyiṟeie,
‘Numa ya shindo-sho ngyechiwuya
na inyi ngyechiwika-se
numba ya Dawidi ileoloka.
Ngyechiiwuta kyiiṙi kya ioloka lyayo,
na inyi ngyechiigoṟotsa.
Kundu wandu waṙio ho wapfule Mndumii,
na masanga goose galeongoyo mbonyi tsako,
Ruwa nagamba, ekyeonguo mbonyi-tsi mṟasa mlungana.’ ”
“Kyipfa kya ikyo inyi ngaṙumbuo kuṙi, lulalyise wukyiwa wandu walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kyiyeri waigalukyia Ruwa.
Indi luwaṟeie paruo kye wakushowe na ukoe lo mafano, na wuṟui, na nyama tsa mando gapfa kui ipfumbo, na samu.
Cha kyipfa wookyia kacha Mawawaso ga Mose gekyelosho orio mṟi na isomo masinagoginyi orio mfiri o onyonya.”

Kyasia kyikachihiṟa wasu na wameeku wa siṟi yoose isambuṟa wandu kyiiṙi kyawo na iwaṙika Antiokyia hamwi na Paulo na Barinaba, nawo nyi iwa: Yuda awekyelago Barisaba, na Sila, wawekyeri wasongoru kyiiṙi kya walya waweiṙikyie Yesu. Wakaṟeia paruo na iiṙuo kui mawoko gawo wawenyi. Paruo-yo ilegamba kuṙi:
“Soe wasu na wandu waku waiṙikyie Yesu, ko wana wa wamaṙu wakyeri Antiokyia na Shamu, na Kyilyikyia, wai wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu; lomuiṟikyiṟa.
Cha kyipfa luleicho kye wandu walewuka koṙu walemulyisa wukyiwa kui maṙeṙo gawo, wechiṙetsa mrima yanyu, wandu soe lulalewaṙuma.
Soe lowona nyi kyicha, lukyeri kyindo kyimwi, isambuṟa wandu na iwaṙika konyu hamwi na wakunde waṙu Barinaba na Paulo,
wandu walereka moo yawo kyipfa kya rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Kyasia loṙuma Yuda na Sila, wechimuongoya mbonyi-tso itso.
Cha kyipfa kyilechihiṟa Mumuyo Mweele na soe, lulamuṙikye nyoe ṟio mulawaṟi iṙiko,
kyimwi na immbia mukushowe na shindo shoose shileṙasio mafano, na samu, na nyama tsa mando gapfa kui ipfumbo, na wuṟui. Mukowuta kuṙo, mowuta necha. Lomukundia orio kyindo kyicha.”
Na iwo wamuenengo momu wakasoka na Antiokyia; na numa ya iwia wandu woose wasanzie handu hamwi wakawaenengyia paruo iya.
Nawo wamuisome wakachihiyo kyipfa kya iwiyiṟio moo lyilya.
Lyingyi-se Yuda na Sila, cha kyipfa wo nyi weonguo shisuku, wakaongoya walya waweiṙikyie Yesu shindo shifoi shewakarisha.
Na wamkae pfo kyiyeri kyileshi taa, walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakawaenenga momu wayende na ufoṟo, wawuye na ko walya walewaṙuma.
Kyaindi Sila kawona nyi kyicha ikaa pfo.
Na Paulo na Barinaba wakakaa kulya Antiokyia, wechilosha na ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, hamwi na wandu wengyi wafoi.
Hamwiṙe mfiri ngyaangu Paulo kawia Barinaba, “Luwuye wulalu lundeambuya walya waiṙikyie Yesu kulya mṟinyi luleonguo Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, lumanye mbonyi tsawo.”
Barinaba kakunda Yohane awekyelago Mariko nayende hamwi nawo.
Indi Paulo alewona nyi kyicha iyenda na icho walemṙa kulya Pamfilyia-pfo, kyipfa alalekunda ioshana nawo mṟasa mafurumionyi.
Kyasia hakaamka igaluana kyiiṙi kyawo mṟasa wakalekana. Barinaba kaṙuo Mariko, wakaiṙia ipalyipalyinyi iyenda Kyipiro.
Kyaindi Paulo kasambuṟa Sila, kafuma, walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wechimterewia, naenengo isaṟia lya Mndumii.
Kaiṙia Shamu na Kyilyikyia, echikarisha siṟi.
Kyasia kashika Deribe na Lyistira, na iho hawewoṙe manalosho umwi ekyelago Timoteo, mana o Mndu mka Myuda aweiṙikyie Yesu; kyaindi awuye nawekyeri Mkyiṟikyi.
Mndu-cho naleṟingyishio wucha na wandu waweiṙikyie Yesu wawekyekaa Lyistira na Ikonio.
Paulo kawia Timoteo naoshane na oe, kamṙuo kamṙina kyipfa kya Wayuda wawekyeri ngyuura tsilya; cha kyipfa woose waweichi kye awuye nyi Mkyiṟikyi.
Kyasia kyiyeri waweiiṙa kyiiṙi kya mṟi iya, wakawaenenga mawawaso galya galewuka ko wasu na wameeku wa siṟi wakyeri Yerusalemu, kundu wagaoshe.
Siṟi tsikawaṙa pfinya kyiiṙi kya Iiṙikyia lyilya, wandu waiṙikyie Yesu wakaengyeṟika orio mfiri.
Wakaiṙa urukyenyi lo Firikyia na Galatia, wechiimo nyi Mumuyo Mweele, walaonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kulya Asia.
Kyiyeri waleshika mṟasenyi na Misia, wakatambagana iyenda Bitinia, kyaindi Mumuyo o Yesu alawaenengye momu.
Wakaiṙa Misinia wakasoka na Tiroa.
Kyiyeri kya kyio Paulo kaloṟo kyindo kyilandewono, akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo. Nalewona mndu awukyie Makyedonia agoṟokyi, echimterewa, na immbia, “Ambaṙa, uche na Makyedonia ulutarame.”
Kyasia amloṟo kyindo-kyo, cha ilyi lukokunda iyenda Makyedonia, cha kyipfa lulewona na pata kye Ruwa nalulagie luwaongoye Mbonyi Ngyicha.
Lukyeri ngalawenyi lukowuka Tiroa, lukoshika Samotirakye, na ilya-ngama lukoshika Neapolyi;
na iwuka pfo lukoshika Filyipi, mṟi ung'anyi o Makyedonia, handu Waroma walekowasamia; lukokaa kyiiṙi kya mṟi-chu mfiri ngyaangu.
Na mfiri o onyonya lukoyenda nja ya mṟi, lukoyenda mbai ya mfo, handu lulekusaṟa kye hai hecha hewika kyiterewo; lukoṙamia, lukoṙeṙa na waka wawesanzie halya.

Mndu mka umwi ekyelago Lyidia, ekyekumba ṟangyi ya kyimaande-maande, mndu awukyie Tiatira, aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, kaluaṙanyia, ulya Mndumii alemwenenga imanya mrimenyi kokye, naambilyie na iiṙikyia malosho ga Paulo.
Na ampatiso, oe na walya wa kanyi kokye, kaluterewa, echigamba, “Kokooya mowona ngyiiṙikyie Ruwa, iṙenyi na kanyi koko mukae pfo. Kawatsindika wawute kuṙo.”
Kyiyeri luweiyenda handu heterewa Ruwa, kyisinga kyimwi kyiwewoṙo nyi mṟufui o ilasha kyikakarisana na soe, kyisinga kyileendie wandumii wakyo kyiira kying'anyi kui iṟunda lya ilasha.
Kyikaosha Paulo na soe, kyikakalagatsa, kyechigamba, “Wandu-wa nyi waṟundi wa Ruwa, wekyemuongoya mbonyi tsa wukyiṟo.”
Kyikawuta isho mfiri ifoi. Kyaindi Paulo kawihiyo mnu, kainduka kawia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, “Ngakuwia kui rina lya Yesu wuka mndu-chu.” Kammbuka kyiyeri kyilya kyilya.
Kyasia wandumii wa kyisinga kyilya kyiyeri walewona kyiira kyawo kyeṙeka wakawaṙa Paulo na Sila wakawakuruo mṟasa sangaṙa mbele ya wandu wa mṟi.
Wakawaṙuo ko weṙumbuo moondu, wakagamba, “Wandu-wa waifanyiṟa mnu mṟi oṙu, nawo nyi Wayuda.
Lyingyi-se waionguo mbonyi tsa miichiwie ilakyeri sungusinyi koṙu iiambilyia maa iiosha, cha kyipfa soe nyi Waroma.”
Wuingyi woose wo wandu wawekyeri halya wakafuma wakayenda halya-ndu Paulo na Sila wawekyeri, weṙumbuo moondu wakawawuta nguwo ko pfinya, wakagamba wakapo na ngowa.
Na wamuwakape mnu, wakawawiyitsa kyipfungonyi, wakawia mringyi o numba iya yepfungyia wandu nawaringye mnu.
Na mringyi ulya amwicho kyilya alewio kawawika kyiṟinyi kya makyiṙi-gawi, kapfungyia maṙende gawo matsindenyi.
Kyaindi kyiyeri kya kyio kya mayeleyele Paulo na Sila waweiterewa Ruwa na imwimbia shiimbo sha imṟumisha, na wandu wengyi wawewawikye kulya kyipfungonyi waweiwaaṙanyia.
Cha ilyi kukowaṙa mṙeṙemo ung'anyi o uruka, numba iya ikakupaaya-paya yoose, na kyiyeri kyilya kyilya moongo ikaṟuguka, na shindo shiwepfungyie walya wawei kulya kyipfungonyi shikalekyia.
Mringyi ulya o numba yepfungyia wandu kaamka, na oe kyiyeri alewona kye moongo iṟugukyie, kaira ushu kundu nakuwaage, akusaṟie kye walya wawewawikye kyipfungonyi waṙicha.
Indi Paulo kaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Ulakuwaage, cha kyipfa soe loose lukyeri iha.”
Kagamba taa tsiendo, kashoongyia numba, echiṙeṙema kui wuowu, kaolokyia Paulo na Sila.
Numa ya iho kawafumiṟia nja, kagamba, “Wandumii wako, kyingyiwaṟi ngyiwute kyikyi ngyiiṙime ikyia?”
Wakammbia, “Iṙikyia Mndumii Yesu, na iyoe nochikyia hamwi na wandu wa kanyi kopfo.”
Wakamwongoya Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, oe na wandu woose wawekyeri kanyi kokye.
Kyio kyilya kyilya kawaambilyia kanyi kokye, kawasanja shifaṟa shawo, numa kapatiso, oe na wandu wakye woose kyiyeri kyilya kyilya.
Kawaitsa na kanyi kokye, kawaenenga kyelya, kachihiyo mnu, oe na wandu wa kanyi kokye woose, kyipfa nalekoamwiṙikyia Ruwa.
Kyiyeri kulekya weṙumbuo moondu wakaṙuma wasongoru wa asikari, wechigamba, “Lekyenyi wandu walya wayende.”
Mringyi ulya o numba iya yepfungyia wandu kawia Paulo mbonyi-tsi echigamba, “Weṙumbuo moondu waṙuma wandu kundu wampfunguo; kyasia wulalu fumienyi nja, muyende kui ufoṟo.”

Paulo kammbia, “Walukapa mbele ya wandu woose kulawoṙe iluanduya, na soe lui Waroma, lyingyi-se waluwika kyipfungonyi; na wulalu wakundi iluwuta pfo kui kyiṟika? Chi wuṙo maa ale-pfo. Wache wo wawenyi wacheluwuta pfo.”
Wasongoru wa asikari wakaongoya weṙumbuo moondu mbonyi-tsi; nawo wakaowuo, kyiyeri waleicho kye iwo nyi Waroma.
Wakacha wakawaterewa; na wamuwafumiṟie nja, wakawaterewa wawukye kulya mṟinyi.
Nawo wakawuka kyipfungonyi, wakaiṙa na kanyi ko Lyidia; na wammbonane na wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakawawiyiṟia moo, wakawuka kulya.
Wamuiṙe mṟinyi ya Amfipolyi na Apolonia wakashika Tesalonikye, handu hawewoṙe sinagogi lya Wayuda.
Na Paulo chandu kyiwekyeri kyiṙo kyakye, kaiṙa na halya-ndu wawekyeri, na kyiyeri kya mfiri iṟaṙu yeonyonya kagaluana nawo, echitambuluo shiṟeio shiele,
echiwawia kye kyiwewaṟi Kristo ilyiso wukyiwa, na iṟuka ko wapfu; na kye Yesu ulya Paulo aweiwaongoya mbonyi tsakye nyi oe Kristo.
Wandu wengyi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda walya wakaiṙikyia, wakaoshana na Paulo na Sila; na Wakyiṟikyi waweiṙikyie Ruwa, wafoi mnu hamwi na waka wawoṙe rina.
Na Wayuda wakawoṙo nyi wunyenyi, wakasania wandu wa mbocha, wakaende kyituṟu mṟinyi. Wakayenda ko wandu wa kanyi ko Yason, wakakunda iwaṙuo mbele ya wandu wa mṟi.

Na kyiyeri walalewakooya kanyi, wakakuruo Yason na wandu waata wa walya waweiṙikyie Yesu, wakawaṙuo mbele ya wasongoru wa mṟi, wechikalagatsa, wechigamba, “Wandu-wa waipfuluo-pfuluo wuyana washika na kunu taa,
na Yason nawaambilyia kanyi kokye; na iwa woose waiwuta shindo shilaṙuṙanyi na mawawaso ga Kaisari, wechigamba kye kuwoṙe mangyi ungyi ekyelago Yesu.”
Wakaowesha wandu walya wawesanzie halya na wasongoru wa mṟi kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tsi.
Nawo wamtose Yason na oṙoe wakawaleka wakayenda.
Cha ilyi wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakaṙuma Paulo na Sila kyiyeri kya kyio, wakayenda mṟasa Beroya. Nawo kyiyeri waleshika pfo wakaiṙa na Sinagoginyi lya Wayuda.

Wandu-wa wawewoṙe ngaruo cha walya wa Tesalonikye-pfo, cha kyipfa waleambilyia ndumo iya kui mrima mkyesi, wakakulosha shiṟeio shiele orio mfiri, kundu wamanye kokooya mbonyi na wuṙo tsikyeri chandu Paulo alewawia.
Kyasia wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kyawo wakaiṙikyia, na waka wa kyikyiṟikyi wawoṙe rina, na wasoṟo waangu.
Kyaindi kyiyeri Wayuda wa Tesalonikye waleicho kye Paulo naonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa maa kulya Beroya, wakayenda pfo, wakafoga-foga na iowesha wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie pfo.
Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya walya waiṙikyie Yesu wakaṙuma Paulo nayende mṟasa mbai ya ipalyipalyi; indi Sila na Timoteo wakaṙio kulya Beroya.
Kyaindi walya waleimia Paulo wakayenda na oe mṟasa Atene; nawo wamuambilyie mawawaso geṙuo ko Sila na Timoteo, kye walakyelyio imwosha, wakalekana na Paulo.
Kyiyeri Paulo aweiwaweṙelyia kulya Atene na iwona chandu mri-cho uweichuo mafano, nalewihiyo mnu mrimenyi kokye.
Kyasia sinagoginyi kagaluana na Wayuda na walya waweiṙikyie Ruwa, na walya walegaluana na oe sangaṙa orio mfiri.

Na wandu waata wawekyelosha malosho ga Waepikureo na Wastoiko, wakagaluana na oe. Wengyi wakagamba, “Tondo-lyi lyikundi igamba kyi?” Wengyi wakagamba, “Nai cha mndu aionguo mbonyi tsa waruwa wengyi, cha kyipfa naweionguo mbonyi tsa Yesu na iṟutso lya wapfu.”
Wakammbaṙa, wakamṙuo Areopago, wechigamba “Ngyesa loiṙima imanya mbonyi-tsi ngyiyenu uilosha tsagamba kyi?
Cha kyipfa nuiluendie shindo shiyenu, na lukundi imanya shindo-shi shagamba kyi.”
Cha kyipfa wandu wa Atene na wayenu wawekyekaa pfo wawewoṙe kyiyeri kyeaṙanyia kyindo kyoose kyiyenu-pfo.
Paulo kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi ga Areopago, kagamba, “Nyoe wandu wa Atene! Kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tsi ngyiwonyi kye nyoe nyi wandu mokyekuwinisha mnu na mbonyi tsa waruwa…

Cha kyipfa kyiyeri ngyiweiiṙa ipfo na ipfo na iwona kundu mokyeterewa waruwa, ngyilewona alyitaṟe ingyiṟeie: ‘KO RUWA LULAMWICHI’ Kyasia inyi ngyimuongoya mbonyi tsa ulya nyoe mokyemwindia kulawoṙe immanya.
“Ruwa nalegumba wuyana na shindo shoose shikyeri-pfo. Oe, cha kyipfa nyi Mndumii o ruwewu na uruka, ekyekaa mahekalunyi gamawikye kui mawoko;
maa ekyeṟundio kui mawoko ga wandu cha ilyi nauṟie kyindo kyoose-pfo; cha kyipfa nyi oe ekyeenenga wandu woose moo na mṟufui na shindo shoose.

Na oe iwuka mndu umwi nalegumba mbaṟe tsa wandu tsoose, wakae urukyenyi koose. Oe amonyi wookyia mawookyionyi kawawikyia kyiyeri kyileiṙima iilacho kyekaa kunu wuyanenyi, na iwaloṟa nyi ura luha lochiwa kanyi kowo.
Kundu wapfule Ruwa, maa kokooya nyi kui ipaaya-paya cha shipfupfuṟe, wammbone, maa chandu alekyekaa kuleshi na soe.
Cha kyipfa kui pfinya ya Ruwa lokyeenengo moo na ichumia, lukowa chandu lukyeri. Chandu wandu waata kyiiṙi kyanyu wekyeṟeia mashairi walegamba, ‘Cha kyipfa soe nyi wana wa Ruwa.’
Kyasia, cha kyipfa soe lukyeri wana wa Ruwa, kyiluwaṟi ikusaṟa kye iwa cha Ruwa nyi kyindo kyikyeri cha sahapu ang'u igoe, shindo shishiachikyie kui wuiṙimi na ngyuuṟango tsa wandu-pfo.
“Kyasia, kyiyeri kyilya kya kacha kya wutondo Ruwa nalewa cha ilyi alawonyi; indi wulalu naiwia wandu woose wa orio handu waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi.

Cha kyipfa nawikyie mfiri echianduya wandu woose kunu wuyanenyi kulawoṙe ikundia; na echianduya wandu-wo nyi ulya Ruwa amsambuṟie. Na Ruwa naloṟie wandu woose kye nechiwuta kuṙo, kui imṟutsa ko wapfu.”
Kyasia kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi tsa iṟutso lya wapfu wengyi wakanyeṟe; na wengyi wakagamba, “Lochikuaṙanyia-se lyingyi.”
Kyasia Paulo kalekana nawo.
Wandu waata wakawaṙana na oe, wakaiṙikyia Yesu. Kyiiṙi kyawo nyi-we Dionisio, mndu awukyie Areopago, na mndu mka umwi ekyelago Damari, na wandu wengyi hamwi nawo.
Numa ya iho, Paulo kawuka Atene kashika Korinto.

Kawona Myuda umwi ekyelago Akyila, amfee Ponto; na oe nacha iwuka uruka lo Italyia mfiri ngyaangu ilekoyaiṙa hamwi na mka okye awekyelago Pirisikyila, cha kyipfa Kyilaudio nalewia Wayuda woose wawukye Roma, na oe kacha na kowo.
Kyipfa iṟunda lyawo nyi-we lyimwi, kakaa kowo, kaṟunda hamwi nawo, cha kyipfa wawewoṙe wuṟango wo ipfuma mahema.
Orio mfiri o onyonya kagamba shilya awekusaṟie sinagoginyi, kapfuṟukana ikuruo Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi wagalukyie ura lokye.
Na Sila na Timoteo wamsokye iwuka Makyedonia, Paulo alawute kyindo kyingyi kyoose sile iṟingyishia Wayuda kye Yesu nyi Kristo.

Kyiyeri walekaṟuana na oe na ilahia Ruwa, kakuta-kuta nguwo tsakye, kawawia, “Kokooya mokuṙetsa nyoe muwenyi wuwicho-wo nyi wonyu na chi wo wandu wengyi-pfo. Inyi ngyiwoṙe wuwicho-pfo na wookyia wulalu ngyindeongoya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa wandu walya walaiṙikyie Yesu.”
Kawuka pfo kaiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu ekyelago Tito Yusto, mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, mndu numba yakye iwekyeri mṟasenyi na sinagogi.
Na Krispo, ang'anyi o sinagogi, kaiṙikyia Mndumii hamwi na wandu wa kanyi kokye woose. Kyiyeri Wakorinto wengyi waleicho wakaiṙikyia Yesu, wakapatiso.
Kyiyeri kya kyio, Paulo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo, kaicho Mndumii emmbia, “Molaowuoe, indi ṙeṙa, maa ulatsie,
cha kyipfa inyi ngyikyeri na iyoe, maa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima ikukapa-pfo; cha kyipfa inyi ngyiwoṙe wandu wafoi kunu mṟinyi.”
Kakaa pfo kyiyeri kya maka umwi na mori iṟandaaṟu echilosha Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Na kyiyeri Galyio awekyeri mchilyi o Akaya Wayuda woose piu wakakapa Paulo, wakamwende na handu heanduya wandu,
wechigamba, “Mndu-chu naikuruo wandu kundu waiṙikyie Ruwa kyilaṙuṙanyi na chandu kyikyeri sungusinyi.”
Na Paulo kyiyeri awekundi iṙeṙa, Galyio kawia Wayuda, “Kokooya kyiwekyeri kyindo kya kyinyala ang'u kya ngyeṟo ngyiwicho, lanyoe Wayuda, kyiwechiwa sungusinyi inyi ikaa ura lonyu.

Indi kokooya kyindo mukusaṟie nyi mbonyi tsa maṙeṙo na marina na shindo chandu shiwaṟi iwa sungusinyi konyu, ngamṙeeya kyindo-kyi, cha kyipfa inyi ngyikundi igamba nyi kyiha kyikyicha ang'u nyi kyiha kyilakyicha-pfo.”
Kawafuna wawukye mbele ya halya-ndu awekyeṙamia kaanduya wandu.
Nawo woose wakawaṙa Sostene, ang'anyi o sinagogi, wakamkapa mbele ya handu halya heanduya wandu. Maa Galyio alewona mbonyi-tso kye nyi kyindo-pfo.

Numa ya iho Paulo kaengyeṟa ikaa pfo mfiri ifoi, naaho kasamana na walya waweiṙikyie Yesu, kayenda Shamu eiṙia ipalyipalyinyi. Pirisikyila na Akyila wakayenda hamwi na oe, ammbute njui ipfo Kyenkrea; cha kyipfa nalekoalya nyamu mbele ya Ruwa iwuta kuṙo.
Wakashika Efeso, kawaṙa pfo. Oe kaiṙa na sinagoginyi, kagaluana na Wayuda.
Kyiyeri walekunda nakae kyiyeri kyileshi ngoseṟa, aleiṙikyia-pfo.
Indi nalesamana nawo, echigamba, “Ngyewuya-se na konyu, Ruwa kangyienenga wuiṙimi wo iwuta kuṙo.” Kawuka Efeso, eiṙia ipalyipalyinyi,
na amshikye Kaisaria, kaṙo na Yerusalemu, kaiṟikyiṟa siṟi naaho kasoka na Antiokyia.
Na amkae pfo mfiri ngyaangu, kafuma, kaiṙa urukyenyi lo Galatia na Firikyia, mṟi kui mṟi, echikarisha wanalosho.
Kyasia Myuda umwi ekyelago Apolo, awemfee Iskanderia, mndu aichi shindo shifoi, kashika Efeso; na oe nawoṙe wuragari wo ikulosha shiṟeio.
Mndu-cho nawemloshe mbonyi tsa Mndumii, na kyipfa mrima okye uwelangyie nakamwi, kawooka iṙeṙa na ilosha mbonyi tsa Yesu kui sungusinyi, maa kuṙo naweichi wupatiso wo Yohane tikyi.
Akyeri sinagoginyi kawooka iṙeṙa kulawoṙe wuowu; na kyiyeri Pirisikyila na Akyila waleicho eṙeṙa wakamṙuo kowo, wakamwongoya mbonyi tsa Mndumii necha ngoseṟa.

Na kyiyeri awekundi iambaṙa nayende mṟasa Akaya, wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakamtarama, wakaṟeia wanalosho walya paruo kundu wamwambilyie. Na oe kyiyeri aleshika katarama mnu walya walekowamwiṙikyia kui isaṟia lya Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa nalewinga Wayuda nakamwi mbele ya wandu woose, echiloṟa kui maṙeṙo ga shiṟeio kye Yesu nyi Kristo.
Kyiyeri Apolo awekyeri Korinto, Paulo, amwiṙie ngyuurukyenyi tsikyeri kuleshi na ipalyipalyi, kashika Efeso, kakooya wanalosho waangu wawekyeri pfo;
kawawesa, “Kyiyeri muleiṙikyia Yesu muleambilyia Mumuyo Mweele?” Wakamgaluo wakagamba, “Ote. Maa luleicho kye kuwoṙe Mumuyo Mweele-pfo.”
Kawawesa, “Kokooya nyi wuṙo mulepatiso kui wupatiso wuha?” Wakagamba, “Kui wupatiso wo Yohane.”
Paulo kagamba, “Yohane nalepatisa kui wupatiso wo itocha wunyamaṟi, echiwia wandu waiṙikyie Yesu Kristo ulya echicha numa yakye.”
Kyiyeri waleicho kuṙo wakapatiso kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu.
Na Paulo, amwayekyie mawoko, Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye yawo; wakawooka iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ngyihya na ionguo shisuku.
Na itala lyawo nyi-we wasoṟo ikumi na wawi.
Kaiṙa na sinagoginyi, kaṙeṙa kui wukari kyiyeri kya mori iṟaṟu, echigaluana na wandu, na iwakuṙuo waiṙikyie mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa.

Kyaindi wengyi wakalega iiṙikyia, wechilahia Njia iya Mndumii aleloṟa. Kyasia Paulo kalekana nawo, kaṙuo wanalosho walya, kagaluana na wandu orio mfiri inumbenyi lying'anyi lyeloshia wandu lya mndu umwi ekyelago Tirano.
Mbonyi-tsi tsikawutika kyiyeri kya maka iwi, mṟasa wandu woose, Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi, wawekyekaa Asia wakaicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Ruwa kaenenga Paulo wuiṙimi wo iwuta shindo sha maṟiyisho mnu;
maa wandu waluoe wakaendio shitambaa na nguwo tsiwukyie mmbiunyi o Paulo, wakachia ndoṟe tsawo, na waṟufui wawicho wakawuka kowo.

Wayuda waata wawekyetenga-tenga, wandu wawewoṙe iṟunda lya ifuna waṟufui wawicho, wakatambagana isenda rina lya Mndumii Yesu kyipfa kya walya wawewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, wechigamba, “Kui rina lya Yesu ulya Paulo ekyeonguo mbonyi tsakye wuka mndu-chu!”
Hawewoṙe wana mfungaaṙe wa mndu umwi ekyelago Skyewa, Myuda awei mkohanyi ang'anyi, walewuta kuṙo.
Mṟufui ulya mmbicho kawagaluo, kawawia, “Yesu ngyimwichi na Paulo ngyimwichi, kyaindi nyoe nyi wakyi?”
Na mndu ulya awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho kashoongyia wana wawi kyiiṙi kya walya mfungaaṙe, kawawinga, mṟasa wakafuma kulya numbenyi weṙicha, wakyeri kyiṟanguoe na wawafaṟe.
Wayuda woose wakamanya mbonyi-tsi na Wakyiṟikyi woose wawekyekaa Efeso, woose wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, na rina lya Mndumii Yesu lyikang'anyiso.
Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakacha wakatocha wunyamaṟi, wechiṟingyishia mawuto gawo.

Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya wawekyewuta shindo sha wusawi wakasania shitapu shawo, wakashikoṟa mbele ya wandu woose; wakaachikyia matala ga woguru wosho, wakawona kye nyi-we cha shilyingyi shiku makumi gaṟaaṟu na shiina.
Nyi wuṙo wandu wafoi waleengyeṟa iicho Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, lyechiwinga chandu wandu wafoi walelyiaṙanyia.
Mbonyi-tso tsamsie, Paulo kaṙumbuo mrimenyi kokye iyenda Makyedonia na Akaya mṟasa Yerusalemu, echigamba, “Ngamkaa pfo kyingyiwaṟi iwona na Roma taa.”
Kaṙuma wandu wawi kyiiṙi kya walya walemtarama iyenda Makyedonia, nawo nyi Timoteo na Erasto, oe amonyi kakaa Asia kyiyeri kyifuhi.
Kyiyeri-kyo kukoamka kyituṟu kying'anyi kyiiṙi kya Njia iya Mndumii aleilora.
Cha kyipfa mndu umwi, ekyelago Demetirio, awekyetsana heleri; na iwika shihekalu sha heleri sha Aritemi, nawekyeenenga waaria kyiira kying'anyi.
Kasania waaria-wo, hamwi na wengyi wawoṙe iṟunda lyilya, kagamba, “Lanyoe wasoṟo, muichi kye wunjama woṙu wokyewuka kyiiṙi kya iṟunda-lyi.

Lyingyi-se muwonyi na iicho kye chi kyiiṙi kya Efeso tupu-pfo indi urukyenyi loose lo Asia taa, Paulo-cho nalelemba wandu wafoi na iilacha makusaṟo gawo, echigamba kye iwo wekyeachikyio kui mawoko chi waruwa-pfo.

Chi igamba kye iṟunda lyaṙu lyikyeri ndengyenyi ya ipiṟo tikyi-pfo; indi na hekalu lya ruwa o kyika akyeri ang'anyi, Aritemi, lyiwono chi kyindo-pfo, na Aritemi naiwuto mng'ano okye, ulya wandu woose wa Asia na wuyana woose wekyemwowuo na imwindia.”
Kyiyeri waleicho isho wakawoṙonyi nyashi ing'anyi, wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Aritemi o Waefeso nang'anyi!”
Mṟi oose ukowaṙa kyituṟu, wakayenda weṙicha wakaiṙa na handu ha temo wakyeri kyindo kyimwi, wammbaṙe Gayo na Arisitariko, wandu wa Makyedonia wawei kyaronyi hamwi na Paulo.
Na Paulo kyiyeri awekundi iiṙa na wandunyi, wanalosho walemlekyia nawute kuṙo-pfo.
Na wasongoru waata wa Asia, wawekyeri mbuya tsakye wakaṙuma wandu kokye, wechimterewa alaiṙe na handu halya ha temo.
Kyasia wengyi waweilyia kuṙi na wengyi kuṙi; cha kyipfa kyisanzionyi kyilya kyilekokyafoika-foika, na wandu wengyi halya kyisanzionyi walemanya kyitewe kya isanzia handu hamwi-pfo.
Wakawuta Iskanda kulya kyisanzionyi, Wayuda wechimmbikyia mbele ya wandu. Iskanda kawatsinia na kuwoko, akundi iloṟa mbele ya wandu chandu alawewoṙe wuwicho woose.
Kyaindi kyiyeri walemanya kye oe nyi Myuda, wakakalagatsa woose piu kui ṟui lyimwi kyiyeri cha kya saa tsiwi, wechigamba, “Aritemi o Waefeso nang'anyi!”

Na kyiyeri kaṟanyi o mṟi ammbie wandu watsie tsii, kagamba, “Lanyoe wasoṟo wa Efeso, nyi mndu uha alaichi kye mṟi o Efeso nyi moambuya hekalu lya Aritemi akyeri ang'anyi, na moambuya igoe lyilya lyiele lyileoloka iwuka ruwewu?
Kyasia kyipfa mbonyi-tsi tsilechiiṙima igambo kye chi loi-pfo, kyimmbaṟi iololyia; mulawute kyindo mulaselyie maṙima.
Cha kyipfa moende wandu-wa walaiwie shindo sha hekalu maa ilahia ruwa oṙu o kyika.
Kyasia kokooya Demetirio na waaria wakyeri hamwi na oe wawoṙe ṙeṙo kyipfa kya mndu-chu, mengye tsikyeri-pfo, na wachilyi wakyeri pfo; koikyo waṙuane mengyenyi.
Indi mukopfula ṙeṙo lyoose shindonyi shingyi, shechiachikyio nyi kyisanzionyi kya raia, kyisanzionyi kyekyeṟunda chandu kyiwaṟi.
Cha kyipfa luwoṙe ndenga ya iṙoo mengyenyi kyipfa kya kyituṟu kya inu, kyituṟu kyaamka kulawoṙe kyimaṙuma; na kyiiṙi kya ṙeṙo-lyo, loiṙima igamba kye kuwewoṙe kyimaṙuma kyeamtsa kyituṟu-pfo.”
Amgambe isho kawia wandu wayende kanyi.
Kyiyeri mtiṟi ulya uletsia, Paulo kaṙuma wanalosho wandelago, kawakarisha na isamana nawo; numa ya iho kayenda mṟasa Makyedonia.
Na oe amwiṙie ngyuura tsilya na iwiyiṟia wandu moo kui maṙeṙo gafoi, kashika uruka lo Wakyiṟikyi.
Amkae pfo kyiyeri kya mori iṟaṟu, na Wayuda immbikyia ngyeṟo, kakunda iyenda shamu kui njia ya ipalyipalyinyi. Kyasia kaṙumbuo iwuya kui njia ya Makyedonia.
Wandu-wa wakaoshana na oe; Sopatiro, awukyie Beroya, mana o Piro, na Arisitariko na Sekundo, wandu wa Tesalonikye; na Gayo, mndu o Deribe, na Timoteo; na Tikyiko na Tirofimo, wandu wa Asia.
Indi wandu-wo walekowasonguo wakaluweṙelyia Tiroa.
Soe lukopfunga kyaro, numa ya mṟumoe o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe, lukowuka Filyipi, lukowakooya Tiroa, kyaro kya mfiri itanu, lukokaa pfo mfiri mfungaaṙe.
Na mfiri o kuwooka o juma, kyiyeri lulesanzia handu hamwi kundu lulye mkate o Mndumii, Paulo nalewalosha, akundi iyenda kyaro ilya-ngama, na oe kalosha mṟasa kyio kya mayeleyele.
Hawewoṙe taa tsifoi halya kai, handu luwesanzie.
Manakye umwi, ekyelago Eutiko, naweṙamie dirishenyi, kawoṙo nyi maṙoe mnu; na kyiyeri Paulo aleengyeṟa ilosha, kafooyo nyi maṙoe kaoloka iwuka kai ya kaṟaaṟu iyenda wuye; kairo ampfe.
Paulo kasoka kulya kai, kaarama, kamchunguṟia, kagamba, “Kutsienyi, kyipfa moo ukyeri kyiiṙi kyakye.”
Kaṙooya-se kulya kai, kapeṟenguo mkate, kalya, kaengyeṟa ilosha mṟasa ngamenyi utuko, naaho kawuka halya.
Wakaende manakye ulya, ai na moo, wakakuicho iwiyiṟio moo mnu.
Kyaindi soe lukosonguo iyenda ngalawenyi, lukoiṙa ipalyipalyinyi iyenda Aso, lukusurie iṙa pfo Paulo; cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo alekoaluwia. Oe amonyi nalekunda iyenda na maṙende.
Kyiyeri alelukooya kulya Aso, lukommbika kulya ngalawenyi, na numa ya iho lukoshika Mitilene.
Lukowuka pfo na ilya-ngama lukoshika handu haambuyanyi na mṟi okyelago Kyio. Mfiri o kaṟaaṟu lukoafukyia Samo, lukokaa Tirogilyio, mfiri o kaana lukoshika Mileto.

Paulo nawekundi iiṙa Efeso akyeri ngalawenyi, kundu alachekyelyio kulya Asia; cha kyipfa awewoṙe kyiyeri kya iretsa-pfo. Nawekundi ishika Yerusalemu iwinyi mfiri o Pentekoste, kokooya kyiwechiiṙimika.
Iwuka Mileto Yesu kaṙuma wandu iyenda Efeso, kalaga wameeku wa siṟi.
Kyiyeri waleshika kokye, kawawia, “Nyoe muichi wookyia mfiri ya kuwooka kyiyeri ngyilecha na kunu Asia, chandu ngyiwekyeri konyu mfiri yoose,
ngyechiṟundia Mndumii kui wusimiri woose, na kui mcheṟeṟe, na shiyesho shilengyichia kui ngyeṟo tsa Wayuda.
Kye ngyileṙa imuongoya kyindo kyoose kyechimuendie nyoe kyiira-pfo, kyaindi ngyilemulosha kulawoṙe iṟikyia kyindo, na numba kui numba,
ngyechiṟingyishia Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi watochie Ruwa wunyamaṟi na iiṙikyia Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Kyasia, wulalu ngyiyenda Yerusalemu, Mumuyo Mweele engyitsindika mrimenyi, ngyilamanya shindo shechingyiwutikyia pfo;
kyaindi Mumuyo mweele mṟi kui mṟi nekyengyiṟingyishia echigamba kye ngyuukyiwa tsifoi tsingyiweṙa.
Kyaindi ngyiwonyi moo oko kye nyi kyindo kya woguru koko kuta iafutsia iṟunda lyilya Yesu alengyienenga-pfo. Iṟunda ngyileenengo nyi ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa isaṟia lya Ruwa.
Na wulalu inyi ngyiichi kye nyoe moose ngyilemuongoya mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, ngayenda ipfo na ipfo, mochingyiwona-se-pfo.
Koikyo ngamuṟingyishia moose mfiri-chu o inu, kye kokooya maa umwi onyu aṙeka ngyiwoṙo pfo-pfo.
Cha kyipfa ngyileṙa imuongoya mbonyi tsa orio kyindo Ruwa akundi-pfo.
Ringyenyi mrima yanyu, na poo-lyo lyoose, lyilya Mumuyo Mweele alemusambuṟa nyoe mulyiambuye, muiṙime ienenga Siṟi yakye kando, Siṟi aleigaluo yakye amonyi kui upfu lokye.
Ngyiichi kye ngammbuka iha, wandu walang'a cha shisii wechicha na konyu, wanyamaṟe Siṟi.
Lyingyi-se kyiiṙi kyanyu nyoe kochiwuka wandu, wechiṙeṙa shindo sha wuṙetsi, walembe wanalosho wakae ura lowo.
Koikyo laenyi kyiṙombo, mochikumbuo kye maka iṟaṟu, kyio na kyingoto, ngyileṙa iṙeṙia orio umwi onyu, ngyechilya wukyiwa wung'anyi mnu-pfo.”
“Kyasia, wulalu ngamuṙambika ko Ruwa, na kui ṙeṙo lya isaṟia lyechiiṙima imtarama na imuenenga kyioṟa hamwi na woose wawailyishe mrimenyi kowo.
Ngyilelanga heleri maa sahapu maa nguwo tsa mndu-pfo.
Nyoe muichi kye ngyileṟunda kui mawoko gako ngawona kyengyitarama hamwi na walya wawekyeri hamwi na inyi.
Kui iṟunda na wuragari ngyilemloṟa kye kyimmbaṟi itarama wandu wafofo, na ikumbuo maṙeṙo ga Mndumii Yesu, chandu alegamba, ‘Nanga ienengyia kuta iambilyia.’ ”
Kyiyeri Paulo amgambe kuṙo kapfiria ndi, katerewa hamwi nawo woose.
Wakafiiṟa woose, wakachunguṟia Paulo, wakamkomba-komba,
wechiwihiyo mnu kyipfa kya kyilya alegamba, kye wechimmbona-se-pfo. Wakamwimia mṟasa wakamsitsa ngalawenyi.
Kyiyeri lomlekane nawo, lukoiṙia ipalyipalyinyi lukoshika Kosi, na ilya-ngama lukoshika Rodo na iwuka pfo lukoshika Patara,
lukowona ngalawa iambaṙa mṟasa Foinikye lukoṙooya pfo. Lukoengyeṟa iiṙia ipalyipalyinyi na
kyiyeri lulewona kyiṟingyiti kya Kyipiro lukokyiṙa ura lo kumoso; lukoyenda mṟasa Shamu lukosoka na Tiro. Cha kyipfa ipfo nyipfo ngalawa yaṙu iweisotsia mlari oyo.
Lommbone wanalosho lukokaa pfo mfiri mfungaaṙe, nawo wakawia Paulo kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo alayende Yerusalemu.
Na kyiyeri mfiri mfungaaṙe ilesia lukofuma lukoyenda mṟasa nja ya mṟi, lukopfiria ndi mbai ya ipalyipalyi lukoterewa;
na lomsamane lukoṙooya ngalawenyi, nawo wakawuya na kanyi kowo.
Na kyiyeri lulemarisa kyaro kyaṙu iwuka Tiro lukoshika Tolemai; lukoiṟikyiṟa walya waweiṙikyie Yesu lukokaa kowo mfiri umwi.
Ilya-ngama ngamenyi lukofuma, lukoshika Kaisaria, lukoiṙa na kanyi ko Filyipo, mndu awekyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, awekyeri umwi o walya mfungaaṙe, lukokaa kokye.
Mndu-cho nawewoṙe wana waana wa kyika, wakyega, wawekyeonguo shisuku.
Kyasia kyiyeri luwekyeri pfo mfiri ifoi, moonguo shisuku umwi ekyelago Akabo kacha awuka uruka lo Uyuda.

Kyiyeri aleshika halya-ndu luwekyeri kaira mkanda o Paulo, kapfunga nacho maṙende na mawoko gakye, kagamba “Mumuyo Mweele nagamba kuṙi, ‘Nyi wuṙo Wayuda wa Yerusalemu wechipfunga monyi o mkanda-chu, nawo wechimṙambika ko wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu.’ ”
Kyasia kyiyeri luleicho kuṙo, soe na wandu wa handu halya, lukomterewa alayende Yerusalemu.

Nyi lyo-ndu Paulo alelugaluo na iluwia, “Ny'kyikyi muiwuta kui ifiiṟa na ingyienenga wuowu? Cha kyipfa inyi, hamwi na iwiko kyipfungonyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie iwoogo kulya Yerusalemu kyipfa kya rina lya Mndumii Yesu.”
Kyiyeri alelega kyilya luwemmbia, lukotsia, lochigamba, “Kyilya Mndumii akundi kyiwutikye.”
Numa ya mfiri iya lukoira shindo shaṙu lukoṙo na Yerusalemu.
Wanalosho waata wa Kaisaria wakaoshana na soe, wakaṙuo Mnasoni awukyie Kyipiro, awei manalosho o kacha ulya lulekaa kokye.
Kyiyeri luleshika Yerusalemu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakaluambilyia na sia.
Na ilya-ngama Paulo kayenda ko Yakobo hamwi na soe, na wameeku woose wa siṟi wawekyeri pfo.
Lomuwaiṟikyiṟe, kawaongoya shindo shoose kyimwi kyimwi Ruwa alewuta kyiiṙi kya walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kui iṟunda lya Paulo.
Nawo kyiyeri waleicho wakaṟumisha Ruwa, wakammbia, “Mono-wama oṙu, nuwonyi chandu Wayuda waleiṙikyia Yesu wakyeri shiku shifoi, na woose wawoṙe wunyenyi mnu kyipfa kya uwawaso.
Nawo wammbio mbonyi tsapfo, kye nuilosha Wayuda woose wekyekaa ngyuurukyenyi tsa wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu iṙa malosho ya Mose, ochiwawia walaṙine wana wawo, maa iosha miichiwie ya Wayuda.
Kyasia ny'kyikyi? Loi wechimanya kye nocha.
Koikyo wuta ikyi luikuwia. Kuwoṙe wandu waana kyiiṙi kyaṙu wawikyie kyaasa.

Ṙuo wandu-wo, usanjo hamwi nawo, mulawaṙe ukoe mbele ya Ruwa; na itaa kyilya kyiwaṟi itoo kundu wasanjo, wawute njui mṙoenyi yawo, wandu woose waiṙime imanya kye mbonyi tsilya tsapfo walewio chi kyindo-pfo, indi iyoe nuiwuta chandu kyiwaṟi na iosha uwawaso.
Kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa wandu walaweiṙikyie waleiṙikyia Yesu, luleṟeia na iṙumbuo kye wakushowe mrima yawo na shindo shishiṙasie mafano, na samu, na kyindo kyikyiwaage kui ipfumbo, na wuṟui.”
Naaho-ng'u Paulo kalaga wasoṟo walya, na ilya-ngama kasanja mrima okye hamwi nawo, kaiṙa na hekalulyi, echionguo kyindo kyiwaṟi iwuto mfiri iya ya isanjo, mṟasa kyienengo kyiwuto kyipfa kyawo.
Kyasia kyiyeri mfiri iya mfungaaṙe iwekyeri kufuhi na iafukyia, Wayuda wawewukyie Asia wakammbona akyeri hekalunyi, wakatuṟutsana wandu woose, wakammbaṙa,

wakakalagatsa, na igamba, “Lanyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi lutaramenyi. Ichu nyi oe mndu ulya ekyelosha wandu woose orio handu, chandu kyilaṙuṙanyi na isanga lyaṙu maa uwawaso, maa miichiwie ya handu-ha. Lyingyi-se, ngoseṟa ya isho, naitsa Wakyiṟikyi na hekalunyi, kafanyiṟa kyimṟumoe handu-ha haele.”
Cha kyipfa walekowawona Tirofimo, mndu awukyie Efeso, akyeri mṟinyi hamwi na Paulo, wakakusaṟa kye Paulo namwitsa na hekalunyi.
Mṟi oose ukowa kyituṟu, cha ilyi wandu woose wakasanzia handu hamwi, wakawaṙa Paulo wakamkuruo, wakammbuta hekalunyi, na kulawoṙe iṙetsa ṙaawa moongo ikashingo.
Na kyiyeri waweipfula chandu wembaaga, mbonyi tsikashika ko msongoru o asikari wa shiṙa kye mṟi oose o Yerusalemu ofoika.
Kulawoṙe iṙetsa kyiyeri kawuta asikari na wachilyi, kayenda Yerusalemu eṙicha. Kyiyeri wandu walewona msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa wakaṙa ikapa Paulo.
Numa ya iho msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa katikyira kufuhi na Paulo, kammbaṙa, kagamba napfungo na mshe iwi; kawesa, “Nyi wui ichu? Ny'kyikyi awuta?”

Wengyi wuingyinyi wulya wo wandu wakakalagatsa wegamba ikyi na wengyi kyingyi. Kyasia kyiyeri msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa alelemo imanya mbonyi kyipfa kya kyikalagatso kyilya, kagamba naitso na moombonyi.
Kyasia kyiyeri Paulo aleshika shitengunyi alaiṙime itikyira; koikyo asikari walya wakamyekyia mayewenyi kyipfa kya kyituṟu kya ṟiima lyilya.
Kyipfa ṟiima lying'anyi lya wandu lyilemwosha, wechikalagatsa na igamba, “Mmbaage!”
Paulo amwitso na kulya moombonyi kawia msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa, “Ngyiwoṙe momu o kuwia kyindo?” Na oe kagamba, “Iyoe nuichi mṙeṙie o Kyikyiṟikyi?
Iyoe chi Mmisiri ulya mfiri ya ipfo numa aleenenga wandu shiku shiina isuana, wandu wawekyelago Wawaagi, kowasongoya iyenda kundu ko nuka ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga?”
Paulo kagamba, “Inyi nyi Myuda, mndu awukyie Tariso, mṟi o Kyilyikyia, mndu awukyie mṟinyi uwoṙe rina. Ngyikuterewa ungyienengye momu ngyiṙeṙe na wandu-wa.”
Kyasia, kyiyeri alemwenenga momu, Paulo kagoṟoka halya shitengunyi, katsinia wandu wa mṟi ulya; na kyiyeri waletsia sau, kaṙeṙa nawo kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, echigamba,
“Lanyoe wasoṟo, wana wa wama wako na waawu wako, ngyiaṙanyienyi ngyechiloṟa mbele yanyu wulalu, chandu ngyilammbicho.”
Kyiyeri waleicho eṙeṙa nawo kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania wakaengyeṟa itsia, na oe kagamba,

“Inyi nyi Myuda, ngyilefeo Tariso, mṟi o Kyilyikyia, indi ngyileng'anyisio kunu mṟinyi, ngyikyeri manalosho o Kamalyielyi. Ngalosho chandu kyiwaṟi mawawaso goose ga waku waṙu, ngawa mndu ekyepfuṟukania Ruwa chandu nyoe mukyeri inu.
Ngalyisa wukyiwa wandu walya wekyeosha njia iya ya Mndumii ngawapfunga na iwawaaga, ngyechiwawika kyipfungonyi, wasoṟo na waka.

Chandu Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose aingyiṟingyishia, na wameeku woose wa mengye, walya ngyilewuta paruo kowo, ngayenda Dameskyi, kundu ngyiende wandu waiṙikyie Yesu wakyeri pfo, wawapfungye, kundu walyiso wukyiwa.”
“Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri kyaronyi, ngyikyeri kufuhi na Dameskyi, kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto, cha ilyi ngyeela ing'anyi ilewuka ruwewu, ikangyilyimika ngyuura tsoose.
Ngaoloka wanda, ngaicho ṟui lyechingyiwia, ‘Saulyi Saulyi, ny'kyilyi ungyilyisa wukyiwa?’
Ngagaluo ngagamba, ‘Iyoe nyi wui, Mndumii?’ Kangyiwia, ‘Inyi nyi Yesu o Nasareti, ulya iyoe umlyisa wukyiwa.’
Na walya wawekyeri hamwi na inyi walewona ngyeela-yo, kyaindi waleicho ṟui lya ulya aleṙeṙa na inyi-pfo.
Ngagamba, ‘Ngyiwute kyi, Mndumii?’ Mndumii kangyiwia, ‘Goṟoka, uiṙe na Dameskyi, na ipfo nochiwio mbonyi tsa shindo shoose shishigambe ushiṟunde.’
Na kyiyeri ngyilepfa meso kyipfa kya mng'ano o ngyeela iya, walya wawekyeri hamwi na inyi wakangyiwaṙa mawoko wakangyiṙuo Dameskyi.
Kyasia mndu umwi, Anania, mndu akundi na iowuo Ruwa kui iosha mawawaso, aleṟingyishio wucha nyi Wayuda woose wawekyekaa pfo,
kacha na koko, kagoṟoka kufuhi na inyi, kangyiwia, ‘Mono-wama oko, Saulyi, wona.’ Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya ngawona, ngamwitukuya.
Kagamba, ‘Ruwa o waku waṙu nakusambuṟa iyoe uiṙime imanya shilya akundi, na iwona ulya awoṙe wusumganyi, na iicho kyindo agamba.
Cha kyipfa nochiwa mṟingyishi okye ko wandu woose, o shindo-sho ulewona na iicho.
Kyasia wulalu, ny'kyikyi uweṙa? Goṟoka, upatiso, usanjo maṙeko gapfo, uterewe kui rina lyakye.’ ”
“Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri ngyiwewuya na Yerusalemu, kyiyeri ngyiweiterewa ngyikyeri hekalunyi, ngawa cha mndu ailoṙo.
Ngammbona, na oe kangyiwia, ‘Pfuṟukana uwukye Yerusalemu iwinyi, cha kyipfa wechiiṙikyia wuṟingyishi wulya wo mbonyi tsako ochiwaenenga-pfo.’
Na inyi ngagamba, ‘Mndumii, iwo waichi kye inyi ngyilewika kyipfungonyi walya wakuiṙikyie na iwakapa orio sinagoginyi.
Na kyiyeri mṟingyishi opfo Stefano alewoogo, inyi ngyiwegoṟokyi kufuhi, ngyiwonyi nyi necha kyilya waweiwuta, na iambuya nguwo tsa walya walembaaga.’
Na oe kangyiwia, ‘Yenda, cha kyipfa inyi ngyechikuṙuma uyende kuleshi ko wandu walangyiiṙikyie.’”
Wakamwaṙanyia mṟasa kyiyeri alegamba kuṙo, wakaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, wechigamba, “Wuta mndu-chu iha. Nawaṟi iwoogo!”
Kyiyeri waweikalagatsa na ikucha-kucha nguwo tsawo na iputsa kyilulyi,
ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kagamba naitso na kulya moombonyi, echigamba, “Naweso mbonyi tsakye kui imkapa na ngowa, kundu namanye kyitewe kya imkalagatsia kuṙi.”
Na kyiyeri wamumpfungye na shigowo, Paulo kawia mchilyi ulya awegoṟokyi kufuhi, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi ikapa mndu ai Mroma alaanduyo?”
Kyiyeri Mchilyi ulya aleicho, kayenda kawia ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa, echigamba, “Nukundi iwuta kyi? Cha kyipfa mndu-chu nyi Mroma.”
Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kacha, kammbesa, “Kyengyiwia; iyoe nyi Mroma?” Kagamba, “Yee.”
Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kagaluo, kagamba, “Inyi ngyilewa raia o uruka-lu kui ienengyia heleri tsifoi.” Paulo kagamba, “Wafee wako inyi nyi Waroma wookyia ngyilandefeo.”
Kyasia walya wawekuṟeyeṟie immbesa wakawuka halya wakamleka. Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa na oe kaowuo, kyiyeri alemanya kye nyi Mroma, na kyipfa alempfunga.

Ilya-ngama, ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa akundi imanya wuloi, nyi kyikyi kyileenenga Wayuda igamba kye Paulo nammbicho, kampfunguo, kawia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wandu woose wa mengyenyi wasanzie handu hamwi. Kaende Paulo, kammbikyia mbele yawo.
Paulo kaitukuya wandu walya wa halya mengyenyi karii, kagamba, “Wana wa wama wako, inyi kui mrima muyendelyi nakamwi ngyilekaa mbele ya Ruwa mṟasa inu.”
Anania, mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kawia walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi walachuoe Paulo ṙumbunyi.
Naaho Paulo kammbia, “Ruwa nechikukapa iyoe kyiambasa kyikyishie chokaa. Iyoe nukyeri iha ingyianduya chandu mawawaso gagambie, na kunu iyoe nugamba ngyikapo, kyindo mawawaso galagambie?”
Walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi, wakagamba, “Nulahia Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose o Ruwa mcho?”
Paulo kagamba, “Ngamanya-pfo, wana wa wama, kye oe nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose; cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Maa ulaṙeṙe uwicho msongoru o wandu wapfo.’ ”

Kyiyeri Paulo alemanya kye kyitumbuṟe kyimwi nyi Masadukayo, na kyitumbuṟe kyingyi nyi Mafarisayo, kakuilenga na ṟui lyakye halya mengyenyi kagamba, “Wana wa wama wako, inyi nyi Mfarisayo, mana o Mfarisayo. Inyi ngyianduyo kyipfa kya ikusuria iṟutso lya wapfu.”
Kyiyeri alemarisa igamba kuṙo Masadukayo na Mafarisayo wakaluyana, wandu walya wawesanzie halya walawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi.
Cha kyipfa Masadukayo wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu maa malaika maa mumuyo-pfo; indi Mafarisayo wekyeiṙikyia isho shoose.

Hakawaṙa kyikalagatso kying'anyi. Walosha wengyi wa mawawaso ga Mose wawekyeri ura lo Mafarisayo wakagoṟoka, wakaṙeṙa, wechigamba, “Luwonyi wuwicho woose ko mndu-chu-pfo; indi kokooya mumuyo ang'u malaika naṙeṙa na oe, nyi kyikyi?”
Kyiyeri halewaṙa iluyana lying'anyi, asikari ulya o shiṙa kaowuo Paulo alachepaṟika kawi, kawia asikari wache wammbute halya ko pfinya, na imwitsa na moombonyi.
Kyio kyilya Mndumii kagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, kagamba, “Kuwanze; cha kyipfa chandu uleṟingyishia mbonyi tsako Yerusalemu, kyikuwaṟi ingyiṟingyishia kuṙo kulya Roma.”
Kyiyeri kulekya Wayuda wakawaṙa kyama, wakalya nyamu kye wechilya maa inyo kyindo kyoose mṟasa wawaage Paulo-pfo.
Na iwo walelya nyamu-yo nyi-we wandu ngoseṟa ya makumi gaana.
Nawo wakayenda ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu, wakagamba, “Lolya nyamu, lulalye kyindo maa inyo kyindo kyoose mṟasa luwaage Paulo.
Kyasia wulalu nyoe na wameeku wa mengye wienyi ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa namsotse na konyu, cha ilyi mukundi imanya mbonyi tsakye necha ngoseṟa; na soe lukuṟeyeṟie immbaaga alashika konyu.”
Mho o Paulo kaicho mbonyi tsa imlaalyia, kayenda kaiṙa na kulya moombonyi kaongoya Paulo mbonyi-tso.
Paulo kalaga mchilyi umwi, kagamba, “Ṙuo manakye-chu ko ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa; kyipfa ngyiwoṙe kyindo kyemmbia.”
Kyasia kamṙuo ko ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, kammbia, “Paulo, ulya ammbikye kyipfungonyi, nalengyilaga kangyiwia ngyikuendie manakye-chu kyipfa nawoṙe kyindo akundi ikuwia.”
Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kammbaṙa kuwoko kayenda na oe mbai, kammbesa kui kyiṟika, “Ny'kyikyi ukundi ingyiwia?”
Kagamba, “Wayuda waṙumbuo ikuterewa usotse Paulo ngama, ummbikye mbele ya mengye, cha ilyi wakundi imanya mbonyi tsakye necha ngoseṟa.
Kyasia iyoe ulaiṙikyie; cha kyipfa wandu ngoseṟa ya makumi gaana waimlaalyia; walyiie nyamu walalye maa inyo kyindo kyoose mṟasa wammbaage; nawo wulalu wakuṟeyeṟie, wechiweṙelyia kyaasa kyapfo.”
Kyasia ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kalekyia manakye ulya nayende, echimmbia, “Ulawie mndu oose kye nongyiongoya ishi.”

Kalaga wachilyi watutu wawi, kawawia, “Ṟeyeṟenyi asikari magana gawi iyenda Kaisaria, na asikari makumi mfungaaṙe wekyechumia waṙamie wuye ya farasi, na asikari magana gawi wawoṙe mapfumu, lukoshika saa tsiṟaaṟu tsa kyio wawe wamkuṟeyeṟa.
Kawawia wakuṟeyeṟe iṙuo Paulo na imsitsa kyipuo ko mchilyi Filekyisi.”
Kaṟeia paruo igambie kuṙi:
“Kyilaudio Lyisia, ko Filekyisi, mchilyi awoṙe rina. Ngakuiṟikyiṟa!
Mndu-chu nalewoṙo nyi Wayuda, wakakyiṟemmbaaga; naaho-ng'u ngayenda hamwi na kyikosi kya asikari ngamkyiṟa, kyiyeri ngyilemanya mbonyi kye oe nyi Mroma.
Na inyi ngyikundi imanya kyindo kyilewaenenga imshitakyi, ngamsotsa na immbikyia mengyenyi.
Ngawona naweshitakyio kyipfa kya mbonyi tsa mawawaso ga Mose; maa aleshitakyio kyipfa kya kyindo kyoose kyechiiṙima imwenenga iwoogo ang'u iwiko kyipfungonyi-pfo.
Na kyiyeri ngyileendio mbonyi kye kuwoṙe ngyeṟo tsewaaga mndu-chu, cha ilyi ngamṙika kopfo, ngawia na walya walemshitakyi waonguo mbonyi tsakye mbele yapfo. Ngakukundia mecha.”
Kyasia asikari walya wakaṙuo Paulo chandu walewio, wakamṙuo mṟasa ko Antipatiri kyio.
Na kyiyeri kulekya wakaṙa asikari walya wekyechumia waṙamie wuye ya farasi wayende handu hamwi na oe, nawo wakawuya na kulya moombonyi.
Na walya kyiyeri waleshika Kaisaria, na ienenga mchilyi paruo iya, wakawika Paulo mbele yakye.
Na oe amwisome, kawawesa, “Mndu-chu nyi o uruka luha?” Kyiyeri alewio kye nawukyie Kyilyikyia,
kagamba, “Ngyechiicho kyindo ukundi igamba kyiyeri wechicha walya walekushitakyi.” Kagamba naringo akyeri numbenyi ya Herode ya wuchilyi.
Hamwiṙe mfiri itanu, Anania, Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kayenda hamwi na wasongoru wa wandu, na mndu ekyekania wandu mengyenyi ekyelago Teritulo, wakaongoya mchilyi mbonyi tsa Paulo.

Na oe kyiyeri alelago, Teritulo kawooka ishitakyi Paulo, echigamba, “Kyipfa wuchilyi wopfo wokyeluendie ufoṟo iyoe Filekyisi uwoṙe rina, na kyipfa kya wusongoru wopfo shindo shiwicho kunu urukyenyi loṙu shekyeachikyio,
kyasia lochiambilyia orio kyiyeri na orio handu, lochigamba haika.
Kyaindi ngyilakutuure nawi, ngakuterewa uluaṙanyie shindonyi shaangu kui wucha wopfo.
Cha kyipfa lowona mndu-chu kye namlang'a, nekyewooka wuṟiingyi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda woose wuyanenyi; lyingyi-se nyi msongoru o mwiṙikyie o Wanasorayo.
Na lyingyi-se naletambagana ifanyiṟa hekalu kyimṟumoe; lukommbaṙa [lukokunda imwanduya kui mawawaso gaṙu.
Kyaindi Lyisia, ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, kacha, kammbuta koṙu ko pfinya,
kagamba walya wawemshitakyi wache na kopfo.] Iyoe kumonyi kui imsoruo-soruo noiṙima imanya mbonyi tsa shindo shaluenenga imshitakyi.
Wayuda nawo wakamshitakyi, wechigamba kye nyi wuṙo mbonyi-tsi tsikyeri.”
Kyiyeri mchilyi alemtsinia kundu naṙeṙe, Paulo nalegamba, “Cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye iyoe nui moṙumbuo moondu o uruka-lu ko maka ifoi, ngyiloṟa chandu ngyilammbicho kui mrima uwoṙe sia.
Kyipfa noiṙima imanya kye halandeiṙe mfiri ikumi na iwi wookyia ngyileṙo na Yerusalemu indeterewa-pfo.
Wandu-wa walengyiwona hekalunyi, ngyegaluana na mndu, ang'u iamtsa kyituṟu kyisanzionyi, maa sinagoginyi maa mṟinyi-pfo.
Maa weiṙima iṟingyishia shindo-shi shiwaenenga wulalu ingyishitakyi-pfo.

Indi kyindo ngyigamba kopfo nyi kye kui Njia iya ya Mndumii waigamba nyi ya wongo, ngyekyeindia Ruwa o waku waṙu, ngyiiṙikyie shoose shiṙuṙanyi na uwawaso na shilya shishiṟeie shitapunyi sha weonguo shisuku.
Ngyiwoṙe ikusuria ko Ruwa, ikusuria maa iwo wailyiweṙelyia, kye kochiwaṙa iṟutso lya wapfu, wasumganyi na walawasumganyi taa.
Na inyi ngyekyetambagana iichiwia kyindo-kyi ngyiwaṙe mrima ulawoṙe mti mbele ya Ruwa na mbele ya wandu mfiri yoose.
Hamwiṙe maka ifoi ngyilecha ngyiendie wandu wa uruka loko shienengo.
Wakangyiwona hekalunyi ngyepfuṟukania mbonyi-tsi, ngyimwilyi peṟu kyimṟumoe, maa ngyiwewika kyisanzionyi maa iamtsa kyituṟu-pfo; kyaindi kuwewoṙe Wayuda waata wawukyie Asia;
wawaṟi iwa iha mbele yapfo ingyishitakyi, kokooya wawoṙe kyindo kyoose kyiwicho waigamba ngyilewuta.
Ang'u wandu-wa wawenyi wagambe, nyi ṙeko lyiha walelyiwona koko kyiyeri ngyilegoṟoka mengyenyi,
sile kyipfa kya ṟui-lyi lyimwi, kyiyeri ngyilegoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, na igamba, ‘Kyipfa kya iṟutso lya wapfu ngyianduyo mbele yanyu inu.’ ”

Kyasia Filekyisi kafunja kyisanzionyi kyilya, cha kyipfa naweichi necha nakamwi mbonyi tsa Njia ya Mndumii iya Paulo aweiṙeṙa mbonyi tsayo, kagamba, “Kyiyeri Lyisia, ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, echicha ngyeṙumbuo moondu onyu.”
Kawia mchilyi ulya kye Paulo naringo; indi nawaṙe ṙaawa, na mbuya tsakye waenengo momu o mmbutia kyilya akundi.
Hamwiṙe mfiri ngyaangu, Filekyisi kacha aṙuṙanyi na mka okye, Durusila, awei Myuda, kagamba Paulo nalago kaaṙanyia mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia Yesu Kristo.
Na Kyiyeri Paulo aweionguo mbonyi tsa wusumganyi, na iwa na meena, na ianduyo lyiicha, Filekyisi kaowuo kagaluo, kagamba, “Wulalu yenda, na inyi ngawona ṙaawa ngyekulaga.”
Hamwi na isho nalekusaṟa kye Paulo nechimwenenga heleri; koikyo nalemlaga kafoi kaṙeṙa na oe.
Na kyiyeri maka iwi ileiṙa Filekyisi kaambilyia Porikyio Festo nawaṙe wuchilyi handu ha Filekyisi. Na Filekyisi akundi Wayuda wamkunde kaṙa Paulo kyipfungonyi.
Hamwiṙe mfiṟi iṟaṟu wookyia Festo awa mchilyi, kawuka Kaisaria kaṙo na Yerusalemu.
Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose na wang'anyi wa Wayuda wakamwongoya mbonyi tsa Paulo,
wakamterewa nawawutie wucha kui igamba Paulo naendo na Yerusalemu, kundu waiṙime imlaalyia njienyi na immbaaga.
Kyaindi Festo kagaluo kagamba kye Paulo nairingo kulya Kaisaria; na kye oe nawekuṟeyeṟie iyenda pfo mfiri ya kufuhi.
Kagamba, “Walya wawoṙe wuchilyi konyu wasokye hamwi na inyi wandemshitakyi, kokooya mndu-chu nawoṙe ṙeko lyoose.”
Kyiyeri Festo amkae kowo cha mfiri ikumi kasoka na Kaisaria; na ilya-ngama kaṙamia halya-ndu awekyeṙamia eanduya wandu, kagamba Paulo naendo.
Kyiyeri alecha, Wayuda walya walesoka iwuka Yerusalemu wakagoṟoka kufuhi na oe wakasenda wuwicho wokye wufoi kyaindi walaleiṙima iwuṟingyishia.
Paulo, echiloṟa chandu alammbicho, kagamba, “Inyi ngyilefunja iwawaso lyoose lya Wayuda-pfo; maa lya mbonyi tsa hekalu, maa lya mbonyi tsa Kaisari-pfo.”
Kyaindi Festo akundi iloṟa kye namcha ko Wayuda kagaluo Paulo, echigamba, “Ngyesa nukundi iyenda Yerusalemu, undeanduyo pfo mbele yako kyipfa kya shindo-shi?”
Paulo kagamba, “Inyi ngyigoṟokyi iha mbele ya kyiṙi kya Kaisari kyeanduya, nyiho hangyiwaṟi ianduyo. Ngyileṙekyio Wayuda kyindo kyoose, chandu iyoe uichi mnu-pfo.

Kyasia kokooya ngyileṙeko kyindo kyeiṙima ingyienenga iwoogo, ngyilega ipfa-pfo. Indi kokooya wuwicho-wu waingyisendia chi loi-pfo, kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima ingyiṙambika kowo-pfo. Ngyikundi mbonyi-tsi tsako tsiṙoo ko Kaisari.”
Kyasia Festo kyiyeri alemarisa iṙeṙa na wandu wa mengye kagaluo, kagamba, “Kyipfa nokunda mbonyi-tsi tsapfo tsiṙoo ko Kaisari, nochiyenda ko Kaisari.”
Hamwiṙe mfiri ngyaangu mangyi Akyiṟipa na Berinikye wakashika Kaisaria, wakaiṟikyiṟa Festo.
Na wamkae pfo mfiri ifoi, Festo kaongoya mangyi mbonyi tsa Paulo, echigamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu umwi iha Filekyisi alemṙa kyipfungonyi;
ulya kyiyeri awekyeri Yerusalemu wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu walengyiongoya mbonyi tsakye, wakundi naanduyo.
Ngawagaluo ngawawia kye chi kyiṙo kya Waroma ienengyia mndu oose ashitakyio alawonana kuwooka na walya wamshitakyi, na ienengo ṙaawa lyeloṟa chandu alawoṙe wuwicho wulya aiwio nawoṙe-pfo.
Koikyo kyiyeri walesanzia iha ngyilekyelyio-pfo; kyipfa ilya-ngama ngyileṙamia halya-ndu ngyekyeṙamia ianduya wandu ngagamba mndu-cho naendo.
Na kyiyeri walya walemshitakyi walegoṟoka, walegamba kyindo kyoose kyakye kyiwicho chandu ngyilekusaṟa-pfo.
Indi wawewoṙe shindo shifoi walewesa kyipfa kyakye na kyipfa kya mwiṙikyie owo wawenyi, mbonyinyi tsa mndu umwi ekyelago Yesu, alekoampfa, ulya Paulo alegamba kye nai na moo.
Na inyi ngyilamanye necha chandu ngyepfula wuloi wo mbonyi-tsi, ngammbesa kokooya nakundi iyenda Yerusalemu nandeanduyo pfo kyipfa kya shindo-shi.
Kyaindi kyiyeri Paulo alegamba kye nakundi naanduyo nyi Kaisari, ngagamba naringo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechimṙuo ko Kaisari.”
Akyiṟipa kawia Festo, “Na inyi ngyiwekundi iicho mndu-chu.” Kagamba, “Nomwicho ngama.”

Kyiyeri kulekya Akyiṟipa kacha hamwi na Berinikye wekutuuta mnu, wakaiṙa na handu halya heaṙanyia moondu ya wandu. Naweṙuṙanyi taa na wachilyi wang'anyi na wandu wawoṙe rina wa mṟi ulya. Festo kagamba Paulo naendo.

Paulo amwendo Festo kagamba, “Mangyi Akyiṟipa, na nyoe moose mukyeri hamwi na soe iha, kyeambuyenyi mndu-chu, ulya wandu woose wa ipfo Yerusalemu na iha taa walekunda ngyiwatarame, wechikalagatsa kye nawaṟi iwoogo iwinyi.
Kyaindi inyi ngyilewona kye awutie kyindo kyoose kyechimwenenga iwoogo-pfo; na oe amonyi kyiyeri alekunda ianduyo nyi Kaisari, ngamṙika kokye.

Na inyi mbonyinyi tsakye ngyilewona kyindo kya loi kyeṙikyia Kaisari-pfo. Koikyo ngamwende na iha mbele yanyu, maa mbele yapfo iyoe, mangyi Akyiṟipa, kundu lukomruwa-ruwa mbonyi tsakye ngyiwone kyindo kyeṟeia.
Cha kyipfa ngyiwonyi nyi kyindo kyilawoṙe wuṟango iṙika mndu akyeri kyipfungonyi kulawoṙe iloṟa nyi wuwicho wuha awio kye nawoṙe.”
Akyiṟipa kawia Paulo, “Nuwoṙe momu ionguo mbonyi tsapfo.” Naaho Paulo kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kaloṟa chandu alammbicho, echigamba,
“Mangyi Akyiṟipa! Ngyikuichuoe iwaṙa isaṟia mrimenyi, kyipfa inu mbele yapfo ngyiloṟa chandu ngyilammbicho, kyiiṙi kya wuwicho wulya Wayuda walegamba kye ngyiwoṙe.
Iyoe kyipfa uichi mnu miichiwie ya Wayuda na shindo shoose wawoṙe shewesa, ngyikuterewa ungyiaṙanyie kulawoṙe iwina.
“Cha kyipfa Wayuda woose wangyiichi wookyia ngyii manakye, shindo shiwekyeri urukyenyi loko ipfo Yerusalemu wookyia mawookyionyi,
wangyiichi mnu wookyia mawookyionyi, kokooya wakunda iṟingyishia, kye ngyiwekyeri Mfarisayo kui iosha mawawaso gaṙu ga iindia Ruwa kulawoṙe iloloma maa ale.
Na wulalu ngyigoṟokyi iha ianduyo kyipfa kya iweṙelyia kyaasa waku waṙu waleenengo nyi Ruwa.
Kyaasa wandu waṙu wa mbaṟe ikumi na tsiwi waiweṙelyia ikyikooya, wechiterewa Ruwa na iana. Na inyi, mangyi mkunde, Wayuda waigamba kye ngyimmbicho kyipfa kya iweṙelyia-lyo.
Ny'kyilyi konyu kyawa kyindo kyilechiiṙimika, kye Ruwa nekyeṟutsa wapfu?
Loi, inyi ngyilewona mrimenyi koko kye kyingyiwaṟi iwuta shindo shifoi shelyisa wukyiwa walya wekyeosha Yesu awukyie Nasareti;
na inyi ngawuta isho kulya Yerusalemu; ngyilewika wandu wafoi wa Ruwa kyipfungonyi, ngamwenengo momu na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na kyiyeri walewoogo ngyilegamba nyi sungusinyi.
Na kafoi masinagoginyi goose ngyilewalyisa wukyiwa, ngawaitika ilahia Ruwa; ngakapo nyi nyashi kyipfa kyawo cha msuko, ngawalyisa wukyiwa maa mṟinyi ya wuyenunyi.”
“Kyasia kyiiṙi kya iṟunda-lyo kyiyeri ngyiweiyenda Dameskyi, ngyiwoṙe wuchilyi wo wang'anyi wa makohanyi;
mangyi mkunde, naaho-ng'u kyiyeri kya kyingoto njienyi ngawona ngyeela yewuka ruwewu, iiṟie ngyeela ya mnengyeṟi, yengyilyimika inyi, na walya waweioshana na inyi ngyuura tsoose.
Lukooloka wanda loose, ngaicho ṟui lyeṙeṙa na inyi kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, ‘Saulyi! Saulyi! Ny'kyilyi ungyilyisa wukyiwa? Nyi kyuumu kopfo ikuhuuya kyiṙinyi.’
Na inyi ngagamba, ‘Iyoe nyi wui, Mndumii?’ Mndumii kangyiwia, ‘Inyi nyi Yesu, ulya iyoe umlyisa wukyiwa.
Kyaindi amka, ugoṟokye na maṙende gapfo, cha kyipfa ngacha na kopfo kyipfa kya ikyi, ngyikuwikye uwe mṟundi na mṟingyishi o shindo-shi uleshiwona, na shindo ochishiwona koko na shilya ngyechikuloṟa.
Ngyechikukyiṟa iwuka wandu wa Isiraelyi na wandu walangyiiṙikyie wechiiṙima ikuwutia kyindo-pfo, walya ngyechikuṙuma kowo.

Uwapfunguoe meso, na iwaweṟutsa waṙe meema na iyenda saenyi, waṙe pfinya tsa Satana na iyenda ko Ruwa; naaho-ng'u Ruwa nawahooṟie ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo na wechikaa halya-ndu walya Ruwa awailyishie wechikaa kui ingyiiṙikyia inyi.’ ”
“Koikyo, mkunde mangyi Akyiṟipa, ngyilelega shindo shilya sha ruwewu ngyileloṟo ngyikyeri cha mndu ailoṙo-pfo,

indi ngyileonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kuwooka ko wandu wa Dameskyi na Yerusalemu, na urukyenyi loose lo Uyuda, na ko wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, kye waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi na igalukyia Ruwa, wechiwuta shilya shiṙuṙanyi na iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.
Kyipfa kya isho Wayuda wakangyiwaṙa ngyikyeri hekalunyi wakatambagana ingyiwaaga.

Kyasia cha kyipfa ngawona kyitarama kyiwukyie ko Ruwa ngyigoṟokyi iha inu ngyeṟingyishia wana watutu na wandu wang'anyi, maa ngyigamba kyindo sile shilya weonguo shisuku na Mose waleonguo-pfo. Shindo walegamba kye shechiwa,
kye Kristo nawaṟi ilyiso wukyiwa na kye oe kuwooka kui iṟutso ko wapfu nechionguo mbonyi tsa ngyeela ko wandu wakye na ko wandu walamwiṙikyie.”
Kyiyeri Paulo aweloṟa chandu alammbicho, Festo kaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Paulo, numsuko! Isoma mnu lyilekuenenga wusuko.”
Kyaindi Paulo kagamba, “Festo monyi kyiṟumi, ngyimsuko-pfo. Ngyiṙeṙa shindo sha loi ngyilamsuko maa ale.

Cha kyipfa mangyi naichi mbonyi-tsi, na inyi ngyeiṙima iṙeṙa na oe kulawoṙe wuowu, cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye kuwoṙe kyindo maa kyimwi kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tsi alakyiichi-pfo; kyipfa kyindo-kyo kyilewutika kyiṟika-pfo.
Mangyi Akyiṟipa, ngyesa uiṙikyie malosho ga weonguo shisuku-pfoe? Ngyiichi kye nuiṙikyie.”
Akyiṟipa kawia Paulo, “Kui maṙeṙo maangu nokusaṟa kye noiṙima ingyigaluo ngyiwe Mkristiano?”

Paulo kagaluo, kammbia, “Ngyiterewa Ruwa kye, kokooya nyi kui maṙeṙo maangu ang'u kui maṙeṙo gafoi, chi iyoe tupu-pfo indi na iwo woose waingyiaṙanyia inyi wawe cha inyi, kyaindi ngyiterewa mulawiko kyipfungonyi cha inyi.”
Mangyi na mchilyi na Berinikye na walya waweṙamie hamwi nawo wakagoṟoka.
Na kyiyeri walewuka halya wakawiana, “Mndu-chu aiwuta kyindo kyoose kyechimwenenga ipfungo ang'u iwoogo-pfo.”
Akyiṟipa kawia Festo, “Mndu-cho naweiiṙima ilekyio, kokooya alalegamba kye moondu okye uṙoo ko Kaisari.”

Kyasia kyiyeri kyilegambo kye lupfungye kyaro kya iiṙa ipalyipalyinyi mṟasa Italyia, wakaṙambika Paulo na wandu walya wengyi wawekyeri kyipfungonyi ko mchilyi umwi ekyelago Yulyio, awukyie kyikosinyi kya Agusto.
Lukoṙooya ngalawenyi ya Adiramitio iwekuṟeyeṟie iyenda mṟasa mṟi ya Asia ikyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi. Lukowooka kyaro, Arisitariko awukyie Makyedonia mṟinyi o Tesalonikye akyeri hamwi na soe.
Ilya-ngama lukoafukyia Sidon. Yulyio kaloṟa Paulo isaṟia lying'anyi kui imwenenga momu o yenda ko mbuya tsakye kundu wamwenengye shilya awekundi.
Iwuka Sidon lukopfunga kyaro lukoyenda mṟasa Kyipiro kundu kyiwiṟi kyilakukape, cha kyipfa shiwiṟi shiweng'anyi.
Kyiyeri luleira ipalyipalyinyi ura lo Kyilyikyia na Pamfilyia, lukoshika Mira, mṟi o Lyikyia.
Na ipfo mchilyi ulya kakooya ngalawa iya ya Iskanderia, ikuṟeyeṟie iyenda Italyia; kaluṙosia pfo.
Lukoyenda kyimbung'ho mfiri ifoi, lukoshika mṟasa Nido kui ilya wukyiwa; cha kyipfa kyiwiṟi kyiwelushingyia, lukoiṙa seri ya Kyirete, lukoambuyana na Salyimone.
Lukoiṙa lochilya wukyiwa, mbaimbai ya ipalyipalyi lukoshika handu hekyelago “Handu hecha Heringa Ngalawa.” Kufuhi na handu-ho hawoṙe mṟi okyelago Lasea.
Na kyiyeri kyileshi kyamwiṙe, na kyaro wulalu kyikawaṙa ngataṟa tsifoi, cha kyipfa mfiri ya ikuretekyia ilekoyaiṙa, Paulo kawaikyimbia,
kawawia, “Wasoṟo, ngyiwonyi kye kyaro-kyi kyechiwaṙa ngataṟa na iṙetsa shifoi. Lochiṙetsa shindo na ngalawa tupu-pfo, indi na moo yaṙu taa.”
Kyaindi mchilyi ulya kaaṙanyia msongoru o ngalawa iya na monyi ngalawa kuta shilya Paulo alegamba.

Na kyipfa kyilawechiiṙimika ikaa kulya mṟinyi ukyeri kufuhi na ipalyipalyi kyiyeri kya mbeho, wandu wafoi wakagamba kye nyi kyicha iwuka pfo waiṙime ishika Foinikye, kokooya kyechiiṙimika, na ikaa pfo kyiyeri kya mbeho. Na nyi-we mṟi o Kyirete, iambuyana na ngyuura tsilya mkuma okyechia.
Na kyiyeri mkuma ulewooka ikuma, wakusaṟie kye wawona shilya wawelangyie iwona, wakawooka kyaro, wakaiṙa kufuhi na Kyirete, mbaimbai ya ipalyipalyi.
Hamwiṙe kyiyeri kyifuhi mkuma ung'anyi cha kyiwiṟi okyelago Eurakyilo ukokuma.
Ngalawa ikakapo nyi mkuma ulya, na kyipfa ilelemo iwingana na mkuma-cho, ukoiṙuo.
Na lochiiṙa iwinyi kufuhi na kyiṟingyiti kyekyelago Kauda, lukoiṙima iiṟicha kyingalawa ngalawa iya yaṙu iwekyekyikuruo, kyaindi lochilya wukyiwa mnu.

Wamuiṟiche kyingalawa kyilya kyitutu, wakapfunga ngalawa iya luwekyeri kui iitsa kyigowo wanda yayo, nawo wechiowuo walachewoṙo mlelyenyi o ipalyipalyinyi kufuhi na uruka lo Siriti, wakaenenga mkuma momu o waṙuo chandu ulekunda.
Na kyipfa luweikapo mnu nyi kyiwiṟi kyilya, ilya-ngama wakawooka iwiyitsa mlari ipalyipalyinyi.
Mfiri o kaṟaaṟu wakawiyitsa shindo sha ngalawa kui mawoko gawo wawenyi.
Mfiri ifoi mnengyeṟi maa nyenyeri shilewoneka-pfo; na kyiwiṟi kying'anyi kyikalukapa. Kyasia lukowona lokyia maa ale-pfo.

Na kyiyeri walekowamkaa kyiyeri kyileshi walalya kyelya, Paulo kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kagamba, “Wasoṟo, kyiwemmbaṟi ingyiaṙanyia lulapfunga kyaro iwuka Kyirete na iwona ndenga na iṙetsa shindo shifoi kuṙi.
Wulalu ngammbia, kuwanzenyi, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu maa umwi kyiiṙi kyaṙu echiṙeka sile ngalawa tupu-pfo.
Cha kyipfa kyio kya inu malaika o Ruwa ulya inyi ngyikyeri okye, na oe nyi oe ngyekyemwowuo na imterewa, nalegoṟoka kufuhi na inyi,
kangyiwia, ‘Ulaowuoe, Paulo, kyikuwaṟi igoṟoka mbele ya Kaisari. Lyingyi-se, Ruwa nakuenengyie wandu woose ukyeri kyaronyi hamwi nawo.’
Kyasia, wasoṟo, mulakuinaṙie; cha kyipfa ngyiiṙikyie Ruwa, kye shindo shechiwa wuṙo chandu ngawio.
Kyaindi mkuma ochiluṙuo kyiṟingyitinyi kyilyiwe.”

Na kyio kyimwi, hamwiṙe mfiri ikumi na ina, kyiyeri mkuma uweluwiyitsa ipfo na ipfo ipalyipalyinyi lya Adiria, cha kyio kya mayeleyele, waṟundi wa ngalawa wakakusaṟa kye wai kufuhi na handu hagaṙutsu.

Wakatonyitsa kyindo kyesenguṙa chandu ipalyipalyi lyiyendie wanda wakakooya ipalyipalyi lyiwewoṙe meta makumi gaana iyenda wanda. Wakayenda mbele kyitutu wakayesha-se wakakooya nyi meta makumi gaṟaaṟu.
Wakaowuo mkuma ulachewawiyitsa handu hawoṙe maṟaṟa, wakaolotsa kulya mringyenyi shindo shoose shiina shekyetirimisha shindo shekyeiṙa mringyenyi, wakaterewa kukye.

Na kyiyeri waṟundi wa ngalawa wawekundi iṙicha na iṙa ngalawa iya, wechisotsa kyingalawa kyiwekyepfungyio halya ngalawenyi cha ilyi wawekundi itonyitsa kulya mṟingyenyi kyindo kyekyetirimisha shindo shekeiṙa mṟingyenyi,
Paulo kawia ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa hamwi na asikari, “Iwa walandekae kunu ngalawenyi moiṙima ikyia-pfo.”
Kyasia asikari wakaṙumbuo shigowo shilya sha kyingalawa kyilya wakakyiṙa kyiolokye.
Na kyiyeri kuweikya Paulo katerewa woose walye kyelya, echigamba, “Inu nyi mfiri o ikumi na kaana moweṙelyia na ikuretekyia, mulalya kyindo kyoose.
Kyasia ngamuterewa mulye kyelya, cha kyipfa kyemukyiṟa; kyipfa kuwoṙe maa uchui lo mṟoe o mndu maa umwi lochiṙeka-pfo.”
Amgambe kuṙo kaira mkate, kaana Ruwa mbele yawo woose, kaupeṟenguo, kawooka ilya.
Naaho-ng'u woose walakuinaṙie-se, wakalya kyelya.
Na soe luwekyeri kulya ngalawenyi nyi-we wandu magana gawi na makumi mfungaaṙe na waṟandaaṟu.
Kyiyeri wamuiguṙe wakaanguṟa mlari ya ngalawa, kui iwiyitsa mlari-yo ipalyipalyinyi.
Kyiyeri kulekya walemanya uruka lulya-pfo, indi walewona handu hagaṙutsu kyimcholenyi kya mṟinga o ipalyipalyi, wakawiana watirimishe ho ngalawa, kokooya kyiweiṙimika.

Wakawiyitsa shindo shilya shekyetirimisha shindo shekyeiṙa mṟingyenyi, wakashiṙa ipalyipalyinyi, hamwi na iṟawisha shigowo shekyepfunga kyindo kyesongoya ngalawa, wakapfunga kyindo kyewaṙa mkuma halya ngalawenyi, wakayenda halya-ndu hagaṙutsu.
Kyaindi wakashika handu mapalyipalyi gawi gakooyanyi, wakatirimisha ngalawa, ura loyo lo mbele lukokuwaṙa lulakupaaye, indi ura loyo lo numa luweluanuoe kui pfinya tsa kyiwiṟi kya ipalyipalyinyi.
Makusaṟo ga asikari gakawa iwaaga walya wawewawikye kyipfungonyi, mndu alaiṙime iiṙa mṟingyenyi iṙicha.
Indi ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, akundi ikyiṟa Paulo, kawashingyia, walawute chandu wawekusaṟie, kawia walya weiṙima iiṙa mṟingyenyi wawookye ikuwiyitsa ipalyipalyinyi, washikye handu hagaṙutsu,
na walya waletsugaa, wengyi waṙamilyie mbau na wengyi waṙamilyie shindo shingyi sha ngalawa. Na kuṙo wandu woose wakaiṙima ishika handu hagaṙutsu kyipuo.
Kyiyeri lomkyie, nyi lyo-ndu lulemanya kye kyiṟingyiti kyilya kyekyelago Melyita.
Wandu wa uruka-lo wakaluloṟa isaṟia lyilewa igamba. Cha kyipfa waleatsa moṙo, wakaluambilyia loose, kyipfa kya mvuo ilekapa na kyipfa kya mbeho.
Kyiyeri Paulo awesania mlari o ngwi na iuwika moṙonyi, njoka ikafuma kulya ngwinyi kyipfa kya moṙo ulya, nayo ikakuoṟowia kuwokonyi kokye.

Kyiyeri wandu wa kyiṟingyiti kyilya walewona njoka iya inenewie kuwokonyi ko Paulo wakawiana, “Mndu-chu aṙeeye alakyeri mmbaagi-pfo. Maa chandu alekyia ndenga tsa ipalyipalyinyi ruwa ekyelago Wusumganyi eṙa alembaaga-pfo.”
Kyaindi Paulo kakutia-kutia njoka iya moṙonyi ilammbutie kyindo kyoose.
Wo wakakusaṟa kye nechishimba ang'u ioloka wanda kui ipfa cha ilyi; na wamumwitukuye mnu, na iwona kye kuwoṙe kyindo kyoose kyiwicho kyiwemmbutikyia-pfo, wakainduka, wakagamba kye oe nyi ruwa.
Kufuhi na handu halya hawewoṙe maṙema ga msongoru o kyiṟingyiti kyilya, awekyelago Pubilyio. Mndu-chu naleluambilyia kui mrima uwoṙe umbuya, kalugaluo wayenu wakye kyiyeri kya mfiri iṟaṟu.
Kyikawa-ng'u awu o Pubilyio nawewoṙo nyi homa na iaṟaka samu. Paulo kaiṙa na halya-ndu awekyeri, katerewa, kayekyia mawoko gakye wuye yakye, na imkyiṟa.
Isho shammbutikye wandu wengyi wawewoṙe ndoṟe kulya kyiṟingyitinyi wakacha wakakyiṟo.
Nawo wakaluindia mnu. Kyasia kyiyeri lulewooka kyaro kya iiṙa ipalyipalyinyi wakawikyia ngalawenyi shindo shilya luwekundi.
Hamwiṙe mori iṟaṟu lukoyenda lukyeri ngalawenyi ya mṟi o Iskanderia, ngalawa ilekoyakaa halya kyiṟingyitinyi kyiyeri kya mbeho. Na ngalawa-yo iwekyelago “waruwa wawi.”
Lukoshika Sirakusa, lukokaa mfiri iṟaṟu.
Iwuka pfo lukotenga lukoshika Rekyio; hamwiṙe mfiri umwi mkuma ukokuma iwuka ura lo kyaseri, na ilya-ngama lukoafukyia Puteolyi.
Lukokooya pfo wandu waata waiṙikyie Yesu, wakaluterewa lukae nawo mfiri mfungaaṙe; na kuṙo lukoshika Roma.

Na iwuka pfo, kyiyeri walya waiṙikyie Yesu waleicho mbonyi tsaṙu, wakacheluambilyia, wakacha mṟasa Sangaṙa ya Apiyo na numba tsiṟaaṟu tseambilyia wayenu. Kyiyeri Paulo alewawona naleana Ruwa, kokuicho pfinya ing'anyi mrimenyi.
Kyiyeri luleiṙa na Roma Paulo naleenengo momu o ikaa amonyi hamwi na asikari alemringa.

Kyikawa-ng'u hamwiṙe mfiri iṟaṟu kalaga wang'anyi wa Wayuda wasanzie handu hamwi, na wammbute kuṙo, kawawia, “Wana wa wama wako, maa chandu ngyilalewuta kyindo kyoose kyilaṙuṙanyi na miichiwie ya wandu waṙu ang'u miichiwie ya waku waṙu, ngyilewiko mawokonyi ga Waroma, ngyimpfungye wookyia Yerusalemu.
Na iwo wamungyisoruo-soruo walekunda ingyilekyia, cha kyipfa kuwewoṙe kyimaṙuma kyoose kya inyi iwoogo-pfo.
Kyaindi kyiyeri Wayuda walegamba kyilya wawekusaṟie ngyileitiko iṙuo mbonyi-tsi ko Kaisari. Chi kye ngyiwewoṙe kyindo kyiwicho ngyeiṙima igamba kye wandu wa uruka loko walewuta-pfo.
Kyasia kyipfa kya ikyo, ngamulaga muchengyiambuya na iṙeṙa na inyi; cha kyipfa ngyimfungye na mshe-chu kyipfa kya kyilya wandu wa Isiraelyi waiweṙelyia.”
Walya wakammbia, “Soe luleambilyia paruo tsiwoṙe mbonyi tsapfo iwuka Uyuda-pfo; maa kuwoṙe maa mndu umwi aiṙikyie Yesu aleshika iha na iluendie mbonyi ang'u igamba kyindo kyoose kyiwicho kyapfo-pfo.
Kyaindi lukundi iicho chandu uwonyi iyoe; cha kyipfa mbonyi tsa wandu-wa iyoe ukyeri umwi owo kyimanyikyie koṙu kye tsiṙeṙe uwicho orio handu.”

Wamteṟiane na Paulo mfiri wechiwaṙa kyisanzionyi na oe wandu wafoi mnu wakacha na kulya numbenyi awekyekaa. Kawaongoya necha na iṟingyishia Wumangyi wo Ruwa, echiwaikyimbia kui mbonyi tsa Yesu, na mbonyi tsa mawawaso ga Mose na ga weonguo shisuku, wookyia ngamenyi mṟasa kyukonyi.
Wengyi wakaiṙikyia shilya shilegambo kyaindi wengyi waleiṙikyia-pfo.
Na kyiyeri walawewoṙe makusaṟo gamwi, wakayenda, kyiyeri Paulo amgambe kye, “Mumuyo Mweele naleṙeṙa necha na waku waṙu, kui ṙumbu lya moonguo shisuku Yesaya,
echigamba,
‘Yenda ko wandu-wa, undewawia,
Iicho moicho, indi momanya-pfo,
na iwona mowona, indi momanya-pfo.
Cha kyipfa mrima ya wandu-wa irumai,
na maṙwi gawo nyi gamalemeri iicho,
na washingyie meso gawo;
walacheicho kui maṙwi gawo.
Na imanya kui mrima yawo,
na iilacha makusaṟo gawo, ngawakyiṟa.’ ”
“Kyasia manyenyi kye wukyiṟo-wu wo Ruwa wuleṙoo ko wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, nawo wechiiṙikyia!” [
Amgambe kuṙo, Wayuda wakayenda, wechiwesana shindo shifoi wenyi ko wenyi.]
Paulo kakaa kyiyeri kya maka iwi kulya numbenyi awekyekaa, kaambilyia wandu woose wawekyeyenda kokye,
echionguo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na ilosha mbonyi tsa Yesu Kristo, kulawoṙe wuowu, na kulawoṙe mndu alemshingyia.
Paruo-i yawuka koko inyi Paulo, mṟundi o Yesu Kristo, alelago nawe msu, na iteseṟo naonguoe Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa;
nayo nyiyo Ruwa alekoamwenenga kyaasa kui ṙumbu lya weonguo shisuku shiṟeionyi shiele.
Mbonyi tsa Mono-kye alefeo kyisharinyi kya Dawidi,
na iṟingyishio kui wuiṙimi iwa Mana o Ruwa, kui mbaṟe ya ngoo ya wuele, kui iṟutso lya wapfu, Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu.
Icho ai kye kyiiṙi kyakye luleambilyia isaṟia na ndumo kundu masanga goose gaiṙime iindia kui iiṙikyia kyipfa kya rina lyakye.
Na kyiiṙi kya iwo nyoe mulewa wasambuṟe wa Yesu Kristo;
ko woose wakyeri Roma, wawakunde nyi Ruwa, walelago wawe wandu wa Ruwa. Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo luwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Kuwooka ngyiana Ruwa oko kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo kyipfa kyanyu nyoe moose, kyipfa iiṙikyia lyanyu lyiongoyo wuyanenyi koose.
Kyipfa Ruwa, ichu ngyekyemterewa na imwindia kui mrima oko kyiiṙi kya Ndumi Ngyicha ya Mono-kye, nyi mṟingyishi oko chandu ngyekyemukumbuo kulawoṙe itsia,
mfiri yoose shiterewonyi shako, ngyechiterewa ngyiche na konyu mfiri ya kufuhi, Ruwa kakunda ingyigoṟokyia kyaronyi kyako.
Kyipfa ngyilangyie mnu immbona nyoe, ngyiiṙime imuenenga kyisumbo kya mrimenyi, kundu mukarisho mulalolome.
Kyimwi na igamba, luwiyiṟiane moo inyi na nyoe, orio mndu kui iiṙikyia lya oṙoe, lyanyu na lyako.

Kyaindi wana wa wama wako, ngyikundi muṙe mulamanya kye kafong'ui ngyilekunda icha na konyu; indi maa mṟasa wulalu ngyilalekyio, kundu ngyiiṙime igaluo wandu konyu wagalukyie Kristo taa. Chandu ngyiwoṙe wandu wagalukyie Kristo iwuka ko wandu wa masanga walai wa kunu Roma.
Ngyiriko nyi Wakyiṟikyi na walakyeri Wakyiṟikyi, ngyiriko nyi waṟango na matondo.
Koikyo, ko ura loko, inyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha maa konyu nyoe mokyekaa Roma.
Kyipfa ngyiwonia sonu Ndumi Ngyicha-pfo; kyipfa nyi wuiṙimi wo Ruwa wokyeende wukyiṟo, ko orio mndu aiṙikyie, ko Myuda kuwooka, na ko Mkyiṟikyi taa.
Kyipfa wusumganyi wo Ruwa wuloṟo kyiiṙi kyakye; wookyia mawookyionyi ga iiṙikyia mṟasa mafurumionyi; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Awoṙe wusumganyi nechikaa kui iiṙikyia.”
Cha kyipfa nyashi ya Ruwa ilemanyika na pata iwuka Ruwewu kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi na wuwicho woose wo wandu wekyewingana na wuloi kui wuwicho.
Kyipfa mbonyi tsa Ruwa tsiichio tsamanyika mrimenyi kowo kyipfa Ruwa nalewaloṟa na pata.

Kyipfa wookyia kyiyeri Ruwa alegumba wuyana wandu weiṙima imanya na pata kye pfinya tsakye nyi tsa mlungana na kye nai Ruwa loi. Mbonyi tsi tsekyeiṙima iwono-pfo kyaindi tsekyemanyika. Wandu weiṙima imanya mbonyi-tsi tsa Ruwa kyipfa kya shindo Ruwa agumbie. Kyipfa kya ikyo wechiiṙima ikuwaṙa na kyindo kyoose kyiiṙi kya shilya wawutie-pfo.
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri walemanya Ruwa walemṟumisha cha kye oe nyi Ruwa maa imwana-pfo; indi waleṙekyia maloshonyi gawo ga wongo, na mrima yawo iwoṙe wutondo ikawiko meema.
Wechikuloṟa kye waṟango waletondoka.
Wakagaluo kyiṟumi kya Ruwa alekyepfa kui mafano ga mndu, shileye, na ga mando ga saka, na shekyekukuruo na ndewu.
Kyipfa kya isho Ruwa nalewaṙa langonyi tsa mrima yawo, waoshe ukoe, mṟasa wakawutiana shindo sha sonu kui mmbiu yawo.
Cha kyipfa walegaluo wuloi wo Ruwa iwa wongo, wakapfiria ndi kyindo Ruwa agumbie, wakawaṙima Ruwa ekyeṟumisho mlungana. Amen.
Koikyo Ruwa nalewaṙa waoshe lango tsawo tsa sonu. Waka wakailacha mkaṟo wakawutiana mbonyi tsa wolyi kui mmbiu yawo, kyindo kyilawaṟi iwa kuṙo.
Wasoṟo nawo na wuṙo wakaṙa iwuta mbonyi tsa wolyi na waka chandu kyiwaṟi wookyia mawookyionyi, wakalangana, wasoṟo wechiwuta shilawaṟi, wakaambilyia ngapo mrimenyi kowo, ngapo ikyeri wori wawaṟi.
Na chandu walelega iwika Ruwa ngyuuṟangonyi tsawo, Ruwa nalewaṙa waoshe ngyuuṟango tsawo tsilawoṙe kyiira, wawute shilawaṟi iwuta.
Wawoṙe wuwicho wo orio mbaṟe, wunyamaṟi na lango na wuwicho. Wawoṙe wunyeng'i, na uwaagi, na wuṟiingyi, na wulembi; wandu wa makusaṟo mawicho, wekyeṙeṙa wengyi.
Wekyeiria woṙiawo wongo, wasuuye Ruwa, wawoṙe tiri, wekyekushela, wekyeṙamia kyiṙombo kyeṙeṙa wongo, walekyeindia wafee wawo.
Walaichi kyindo, walekyeafutsia shilya wateṟie, walakundi wandu wa kanyi kowo, walawoṙe isaṟia.
Waichi mnu ianduyo lya wusumganyi wo Ruwa, kye wekyewuta isho wawaṟi upfu, wekyewuta isho; maa chi isho tupu-pfo, indi wakaiṙikyiana na walya wekyewuta waṙo.
Koikyo, iyoe mndu uianduya oṙoo uwoṙe kyegamba-pfo. Kyipfa isho uanduya ungyi nukuanduya kumonyi kye nunyamaṟie; kyipfa iyoe uianduya nuiwuta shilya shilya.
Na soe luichi kye ianduyo lyiwukyie ko Ruwa nyi lya sungusinyi ko iwo wekyewuta isho.
Iyoe mndu, okyeanduya walya wekyeṟunda isho na iwuta isho isho kumonyi, nokusaṟa nochiiṙima iṙicha ianduyo lyiwukyie ko Ruwa?
Ang'u nuimina wucha wokye wufoi na wusimiri wokye na ikarishia lyakye, ulamanye kye wucha wo Ruwa wukukuruo uiṙime iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi?
Indi kyipfa kya wuumu wopfo, na kui mrima opfo ulawoṙe iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, nuiengeṟa nyashi ya Ruwa kopfo mfiri ulya o nyashi ya Ruwa na iloṟo lya chandu Ruwa ekyeanduya kulawoṙe ikundia.
Echitaa orio mndu iṙuana na mawuto gakye.
Walya kui wusimiri kyiiṙi kya iwuta mecha waipfula mng'ano na kyiṟumi na ikaa ho mlungana, wechienengo moo o mlungana.
Na walya wawoṙe wuṟiingyi, walekyeindia wuloi, indi wakaiṙikyiana na mbaka, wewona nyashi na isuo lying'anyi;
matuuro na wukyiwa wuye ya orio mndu ekyewuta mawicho, Myuda kuwooka na Mkyiṟikyi taa.
Indi mng'ano na kyiṟumi na ufoṟo ko orio mndu ekyewuta shicha, Myuda kuwooka na Mkyiṟikyi taa;
kyipfa kuwoṙe ikundia ko Ruwa-pfo.
Kyipfa iwo woose walenyamaṟa kulawoṙe mawawaso weṙeka kulawoṙe mawawaso, na woose walemyamaṟa waichi mawawaso, weanduyo kui mawawaso.
Kyipfa chi woose wekyeicho mawawaso wai wasumganyi mbele ya Ruwa-pfo, indi nyi walya wekyewuta kyilya mawawaso gakundi wechitalyio wusumganyi.
Kyipfa ilyi wandu wa Masanga walawoṙe mawawaso wekyewuta kui mkaṟo yawo shilya shikyeri uwawasonyi, walawoṙe mawawaso wakuenenga mawawaso wawenyi.
Iwo wailoṟa iṟunda lya uwawaso luluṟeie mrimenyi kowo na kyilya kyikyeri mrimenyi kowo kyechiwaṟingyishia, na makusaṟo gawo gawenyi gechiloṟa kye wawawicho ang'u wawawicho-pfo,
mfiri ulya Ruwa echianduya makusaṟo ga kyiṟika ga wandu, iṙuana na Ndumi-i Ngyicha ya Kristo Yesu ngyilemuongoya.
Kyaindi iyoe, kokooya nuilago Myuda na ikusuria uwawaso, na ikushela kyiiṙi kya Ruwa,
na imanya kyilya akundi, na iiṙikyia mbonyi ngyicha, na iyoe numloshe mawawasonyi,
na imanya loi kye iyoe kumonyi nyi msongoru o shipfupfuṟe, ngyeela ya iwo wakyeri meemenyi,
mlosha o matondo, na wana wanangu, awoṙe wuṟango na wuloi uwawasonyi;
kyasia iyoe uilosha ungyi, okulosha kumonyi-pfoe? Iyoe uionguo kye mndu alaiwe, nuiiwa kumonyi?
Iyoe ugamba mndu alaṟuguye ang'u alaṟuguyo, nuiṟuguya ang'u iṟuguyo kumonyi? Iyoe nusuuye mafano ga waruwa na kunu nuikugaluo mnjama kui iiwa mahekalunyi ga waruwa?
Iyoe okyekushelyia mawawaso, nokyefunjia Ruwa kyiṟumi kyakye kui ifunja uwawaso?
Kyipfa rina lya Ruwa lyilahio wandunyi walaiṙikyie Ruwa kyipfa kyanyu, chandu kyikyiṟeie.
Kyipfa iṙino lyiwoṙe kyiira kokooya ui mndu okyewuta kyilya mawawaso gakundi. Kyaindi kowa mofunja mawawaso iṙino lyapfo lyawa cha ilyi ulamṙine.
Kyasia kokooya icho alamṙine nekyeosha shilya uwawaso luwawasie, ngyesa iṙa iṙino lyakye lyechitalo cha nyi iṙino-pfoe?
Na icho alamṙine wookyia kuwooka, ekyeosha kyilya uwawaso lukundi, echikuanduya iyoe umṙine, konyamaṟa uwawaso-pfoe?
Kyipfa oe chi Myuda ai Myuda kyanja tupu-pfo, maa iṙino chi lyilya lya kyanja tupu mmbiunyi-pfo.
Indi oe nyi Myuda ai Myuda o mrimenyi; na iṙino nyi lya mrima, Mumuyonyi o Ruwa, chi shiṟeionyi-pfo. Uwawaso-lo kyiṟumi kyalo kyilekyewuka ko wandu indi ko Ruwa.
Kyasia Myuda nawoṙe-kyi kya ngoseṟa? Na iṙino lyiwoṙe kyiiṙa kyiha?
Lyiwoṙe kyiiṙa ngoseṟa ko njia tsoose. Kya kuwooka nyi kyipfa wawaenengye ulogo lo Ruwa.
Nyi kyikyi-ng'u, kokooya wandu waata walaleiṙikyia? Aa ilega iiṙikyia lyawo lyechiilacha shilya Ruwa ateṟie?
Maa ale; kundu Ruwa nawono nyi o loi, na orio mndu nyi o wongo; chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Kundu umanyikye kye nuwoṙe wusumganyi
maṙeṙonyi gapfo,
undewinga kyiyeri kya ianduyo.”
Kyaindi kokooya wuwicho woṙu wuṟingyishia wusumganyi wo Ruwa, lugambe kyikyi? Ruwa nyi mmbicho aiende nyashi? (Ngyigamba kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu.)
Ote! Kyipfa iho Ruwa neiṙima kuṙa ianduya wuyana?
Kyaindi kokooya loi ya Ruwa yaengyeṟa iṟingyishia mng'ano okye kyipfa kya iṙeṙa wongo lyako, ny' kyilyi inyi ngyiengyeṟa ianduyo kye ngyimnyamaṟi?
Kyitewe ny' kyi lulagambe (chandu luleirio, na chandu wengyi waigamba na pfinya kye kyi wuṙo luigamba), luwute shiwicho kundu kuche mecha? Ruwa nechiwaolotsia ngapo chandu wawaṟi iwutio.
Kyasia ny' kyikyi-ng'u? Lukyeri wecha kuta wengyi? Ote! Maa ale. Cha kyipfa lomshitakyi Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi kye wawachilyie nyi wunyamaṟi taa.
Chandu kyikyiṟeie kye,
“Kuwoṙe msumganyi maa umwi-pfo.
Kuwoṙe aichi-pfo,
kuwoṙe aipfula Ruwa-pfo.
Woose waṙekyie,
kuwoṙe aiwuta mecha-pfo, ote! Maa umwi.
Uṟoo lowo nyi kyilome kyilakyishikyie,
kui ngyuulumi tsawo walewika ngyeṟo
wekyeṙeṙa shindo shikyeri cha uṟoi lo njoka.
Maṙumbu gawo gaichuo seso ngyiwicho.
Maṙende gawo gaipfuṟukana iwaaga wandu.
Wunyamaṟi na ikapa kawi shikyeri njienyi tsawo.
Maa njia ya ufoṟo waleimanya-pfo.
Maa wakuloshie iowuo na ikunda Ruwa-pfo.”
Kyasia luichi kye mbonyi tsoose uwawaso lugambie ko walya wawachilyie nyi uwawaso, kundu orio mndu nawio natsie, na wuyana woose wuchilyio nyi ianduyo lya Ruwa.
Kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu oose echitalo kye namsumganyi mbele yakye kui iwuta shilya mawawaso gakundi-pfo, kyipfa mawawaso gekyeenenga mndu imanya wunyamaṟi.
Kyaindi wulalu, wusumganyi wo Ruwa womanyika kulawoṙe mawawaso. Wuṟingyishio kui uwawaso na malosho ga weonguo shisuku.
Nyi wusumganyi wo Ruwa wukyeri kui njia ya iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo ko woose waiṙikyie. Kyipfa kuwoṙe kya mbaṟe ingyi-pfo.
Kyipfa woose wawutie sha wunyamaṟi na mng'ano o Ruwa otitia kowo.
Waitalyio wusumganyi walaitaa kyindo kui isaṟia lyakye, kui njia ya wukyiṟo wukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Ichu Ruwa amwummbikye nawe kyisanza kui njia ya iiṙikyia samunyi yakye, kundu naloṟe wusumganyi wokye, kyipfa kya ilekyia wusimirinyi wo Ruwa maṙeko goose galesonguo iwuto.
Naiṙime iloṟa wusumganyi wokye kyiyeri-kyi, kundu nawe msumganyi na momtalyia wusumganyi icho aiṙikyie Yesu.
Kyasia ikushela nyi kwi lyikyeri-ng'u? Lyashingyio nja. Kui iwawaso lya mbaṟe iha? Kui iwawaso lya mawuto? Ote! Indi kui iwawaso lya iiṙikyia.
Kyasia, luwonyi kye mndu nekyetalyio wusumganyi kui iiṙikyia kulawoṙe iwuta shilya mawawaso gakundi.
Aa ngyesa Ruwa nyi Ruwa o Wayuda tupu? Chi Ruwa o wandu walakyeri Wayuda taa-pfoe? Yee, nyi Ruwa o walakyeri Wayuda taa.
Kokooya loi Ruwa nyi umwi, echitalyia wusumganyi walya wawaṙine iiṙikyienyi, na walya walawaṙine nechiwatalyia wusumganyi kui njia ya iiṙikyia-lyo ilyo.
Kyasia, ngyesa luilacha mawawaso kui iiṙikyia-lyo? Ote! Cha kyipfa luindia mawawaso chandu gawaṟi iindio.
Kyasia, lugambe luṙa mbonyi tsa Abrahamu, awu oṙu?
Kyipfa kokooya Abrahamu naletalyio wusumganyi kyipfa kya mawuto gakye, nawoṙe kyekushelyia; indi chi mbele ya Ruwa-pfo.
Kyipfa shiṟeio shagamba-kyi? Abrahamu naleiṙikyia Ruwa, kyikatalyio kokye kye nyi wusumganyi.
Kyaindi ko mndu aiṟunda, wori wokye wokyetalo nyi isaṟia-pfo, indi kye nyi sile.
Kyaindi ko mndu alaiṟunda, indi kaiṙikyia ulya aimtalyia wusumganyi mndu alakundi na iowuo Ruwa, iiṙikyia lya mndu-cho lyatalo kye nyi wusumganyi.
Chandu Dawidi alegamba agusu mndu ulya Ruwa amtalyia kye namsumganyi kulawoṙe mawuto,
“Agusu wawahooṟie maṙeko gawo
na ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo tsilatsisende nyi Ruwa.
Agusu mndu ulya Mndumii alaimtalyia ngyuunyamaṟi.”
Kyasia ngyesa sia-yo nyi ko iwo wawaṙine, ang'u nyi ko iwo walawaṙine taa? Kyipfa luigamba kye ko Abrahamu iiṙikyia lyakye lyiletalo kye nyi wusumganyi.
