Ngyesa naletalyio kuṙa-ng'u? Nyi kyiyeri amṙino ang'u alandeṙino? Chi numa ya iṙino-pfo, indi alandeṙino.

Na oe naleambilyia kyindo-kyi kyeloṟa kye namṙine, iṟingyishia lya wusumganyi wulya wo iiṙikyia awelyiwoṙe alandeṙino. Naiṙime iwa awu o woose waiṙikyie, maa chandu walawaṙine, kundu nawo wawetalyio wusumganyi taa.
Lyingyi-se nawe awu o wandu waṙine, na chi ko iwo waṙine tikyi-pfo, indi walya wekyeosha ndifo tsa mwiṙikyie o awu oṙu, Abrahamu, awewoṙe wookyia kyiyeri alandeṙino.
Kyipfa kyaasa kyilya kye nechiwa mokyioṟa o wuyana Abrahamu na kyishari kyakye waleenengo chi kui mawawaso-pfo indi kui wusumganyi waletalyio kui iiṙikyia.
Kyipfa kokooya walya wa mawawaso nyiwo weoṟa, iiṙikyia lyawa wulya, na kyaasa kyailachika.
Kyipfa mawawaso nyigo gekyeende nyashi, cha kyipfa kulawoṙe mawawaso kuwoṙe ṙeko-pfo.

Koikyo kyaasa kyiwukyie iiṙikyienyi, kyiwe kui njia ya isaṟia, kundu kyaasa kyilya kyilalolome ko shishari shoose. Chi ko walya wa uwawaso tikyi-pfo, indi na ko walya wai wa iiṙikyia lya Abrahamu; akyeri awu oṙu soe loose;
(chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Ngyilekuwika uwe awu o Masanga gafoi;”) mbele ya Ruwa ulya alemwiṙikyia, moenenga wapfu moo, ekyeloṟa maa shindo shilakyeri pfo.
Na oe naleiṙikyia echiweṙelyia kyindo kyilechiiṙima iweṙelyio, kundu naiṙime iwa awu o masanga gafoi, chandu kyiwekyiṙeṙe kye, “Nyi wuṙo kyechiwa kyishari kyapfo.”
Oe alawemfofo iiṙikyienyi, nalekusaṟa kya mmbiu okye ulekoompfa (ammbaṙe cha maka igana), na Sara awewoṙe wuiṙimi wo waṙa mana-pfo.
Kyaindi awonyi kyaasa kya Ruwa alekapa kawi kui iṙa iiṙikyia-pfo, indi naleenengo pfinya kui iiṙikyia, echiṟumisha Ruwa.
Echimanya kye loi Ruwa neiṙima iṟunda shilya aweteṟie.
Koikyo kyikatalyio kokye kye nyi wusumganyi.
Kyaindi kyikyiṟeie kye nyi Abrahamu tupu aletalyio wusumganyi-pfo;
indi na kyipfa kyaṙu soe lochitalyio kuṙo taa, soe luiṙikyie icho aleṟutsa Yesu Mndumii oṙu ko wapfu.
Ulya alewuto kyipfa kya maṙeko gaṙu, na iṟutso kundu luiṙime italyio wusumganyi.
Kyasia lukomtalyio wusumganyi uwukyie iiṙikyienyi luwaṙe ufoṟo na Ruwa, kui njia ya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Ulya kui oe lulewona kui njia ya iiṙikyia ikooya isaṟia-lyi lugoṟokyi kyiiṙi kyalyo; na ichihiyo ikusurienyi lya mng'ano o Ruwa.
Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi luchihiyo taa ngyuukyiwenyi; luichi kye wukyiwa, iṟunda lyakye nyi iende wusimiri.
Na iṟunda lya wusimiri nyi ikarisho lya mrima. Na iṟunda lya ikarisho lya mrima nyi ikusuria.
Na ikusuria lyekyeende sonu-pfo; cha kyipfa ikunda lya Ruwa lyamletsio mrimenyi koṙu kui Mumuyo Mweele luleenengo soe.
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyilya lulawewoṙe pfinya, ilyi kyiyeri kyileafukyia, Kristo nalepfa kyipfa kya wanyamaṟi.
Cha kyipfa nyi kyindo kyuumu; mndu ipfa kyipfa kya mndu msumganyi. Kyaindi kyeiṙimika mndu ikaria ipfa kyipfa kya mndu awoṙe mawuto mecha.
Indi Ruwa naloṟa ikunda lyakye oe amonyi koṙu soe, kyipfa Kristo nalepfa kyipfa kyaṙu, kyiyeri luwei wanyamaṟi.
Kyasia ngoseṟa mnu lukomtalyio wusumganyi samunyi yakye, nelushingyia lulaolokyio nyi nyashi ya Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa kokooya kyiyeri luwewoṙe kyituwa na Ruwa lulesanzo kui upfu lo Mono-kye; ngoseṟa mnu lukomsanzo lochikyiṟo kui moo okye.
Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi na ichihiyo kyiiṙi kya Ruwa kui Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, ulya kui oe wulalu loambilyia isanzo-lyo.
Koikyo, kokooya kui mndu umwi wunyamaṟi wulecha na wuyanenyi, na kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi-wo kukocha upfu; na kuṙo upfu lukoshika ko wandu woose kyipfa woose walewuta wunyamaṟi.
Kyipfa kyiyeri mawawaso galawendewiko wunyamaṟi wuwekyeri wuyanenyi, indi wunyamaṟi wokyetalo kulawoṙe mawawaso-pfo.
Kyaindi upfu lulechilyia wookyia Adamu mṟasa Mose, nalo lulechilyia maa iwo walawekyewuta wunyamaṟi wufananyi na ṙeko lya Adamu, akyeri mfano okye oe echicha.

Kyaindi kyisumbo kyilya kyiwekyeri cha ṙeko lyilya-pfo. Cha kyipfa kokooya kyipfa kya iṙeko lya ulya umwi wafoi walepfa, ngoseṟa mnu isaṟia lya Ruwa na kyienengo kyikyeri isaṟienyi lyakye mndu umwi Yesu Kristo kyileengyeṟika kyipfa kya walya wafoi.

Maa chandu mndu ulya umwi alewuta wunyamaṟi chi kyimwi na kyienengo kyilya-pfo. Cha kyipfa ianduyo lyilecha kui njia ya mndu umwi lyikaende ngapo; indi kyisumbo kya isaṟia kyilecha kyipfa kya maṙeko gafoi, kyikaende italyio wusumganyi.

Kyipfa kokooya kui iṙeko lya mndu umwi upfu lulechilyia kyipfa kya ulya umwi, ngoseṟa mnu iwo wekyeambilyia isaṟia lyifoi, na kyienengo kyilya kya wusumganyi, wechichilyia moonyi kui ulya umwi, Yesu Kristo.
Kyasia-ng'u, kokooya kui ṙeko lyimwi wandu woose waleanduyo ngapo, na wuṙo kui iṟunda lyimwi lya wusumganyi wandu woose waletalyio wusumganyi wuwoṙe moo.
Kyipfa kokooya kui inyamaṟa lya mndu umwi wandu wafoi walewiko wandunyi wawoṙe wunyamaṟi, na wuṙo kui iindia lya mndu umwi wandu wafoi wechisanzio kyiiṙi kya wawoṙe wusumganyi.
Indi mawawaso galecha kundu ṙeko lyilya lying'ane mnu. Na kyiyeri wunyamaṟi wuleengyeṟika, isaṟia lyiwefoi ngoseṟa;
kundu kye chandu wunyamaṟi wulechilyia upfunyi, na wuṙo kui njia ya wusumganyi isaṟia lyichilyie mṟasa moo o mlungana kui Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu.
Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Lukae wunyamaṟinyi kundu isaṟia lyiengyeṟe ifo?
Maa ale! Soe lulawoṙe-se moo o wuta sha wunyamaṟi lochikaa-se luṙa wunyamaṟinyi?
Muichi kye soe loose lulepatiso kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu lulepatiso upfunyi lokye?
Kyasia luleṟiko hamwi na oe kui njia ya wupatiso upfunyi lokye, kundu luwaṙe moo ngyihya nakamwi chandu Awu aleṟutsa Kristo iwuka upfunyi kui pfinya yakye ing'anyi.
Cha kyipfa chandu lulelungana na oe mfanonyi o upfu lokye na wuṙo lowelungana na oe mfanonyi o iṟuka lyakye.
Luichi mbonyi-tsi kye, mkaṟo oṙu o kacha ulekapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe, kundu mmbiu o wunyamaṟi uilachikye lulachilyio-se nyi wunyamaṟi.
Kyipfa oe alepfa naletalyio wusumganyi kuleshi na wunyamaṟi.
Kyaindi lui kye lulepfa hamwi na Kristo, luiṙikyie kye lochiwaṙa moo hamwi na oe;
luichi kye Kristo kamṟuka ko wapfu epfa-se-pfo, maa upfu lomchilyia-se-pfo.
Kyipfa kui ipfa lyakye, wunyamaṟi woiṙima-se imchilyia-pfo; indi kulya oe iwaṙa moo, nawaṙa moo ko Ruwa.
Na wuṙo maa nyoe kutalenyi kye muwapfu ko mbonyi tsa wunyamaṟi, na wai na moo ko Ruwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Kyasia, wunyamaṟi wulachilyie mmbiunyi yanyu yekyepfa mṟasa mukoosha lango tsayo.
Maa mulaengyeṟe iwuta shiwungo shanyu shiwe shisha sha mbaka ko wunyamaṟi. Indi kuwutenyi muwenyi ko Ruwa cha wai na moo numa ya ipfa, na shiwungo shanyu ko Ruwa iwa shisha sha wusumganyi.
Kyipfa wunyamaṟi wochimuchilyia nyoe-pfo, cha kyipfa muwachilyie nyi mawawaso-pfo, indi muwachilyie nyi isaṟia.
Kyasia ny'kyikyi-ngu? Luwute wunyamaṟi kyipfa lulawachilyie nyi mawawaso indi isaṟia? Ote!

Muichi kye icho muiwuta mrima yanyu kokye iwa waṟundi wakye kyiiṙi kya imwindia, mowa waṟundi wakye ulya muimwindia, kokooya nyi wuṟundi wo wunyamaṟi wokyeende upfu, ang'u kokooya nyi wuṟundi wo wuindi wokyeende wusumganyi.
Kyaindi Ruwa naano, cha kyipfa muwewachilyie nyi wunyamaṟi, indi muleindia kui mrima yanyu mbaṟe iya ya wuṟango wulewiko wumchilyie.
Na mommbiko kuleshi na wunyamaṟi, mukochilyio nyi wusumganyi.

Ngyiṙeṙa kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu kyipfa kya wufofo wo mmbiu yanyu. Cha kyipfa chandu mulewuta shiwungo shanyu shiṟunde mbonyi tsa ukoe na wunyamaṟi muiṙime iwuta wunyamaṟi, na wuṙo-ng'u wulalu wutenyi shiwungo shanyu shiṟunde sha wusumganyi muiṙime iyeṟemtso.
Kyipfa kyiyeri muwewachilyie nyi wunyamaṟi, muwekyeri kuleshi na wusumganyi.
Kyasia nyi kyiira kyiha-ng'u mulewona mfiri iya ko shindo-sho shimuriisa sonu wulalu? Kyipfa mafurumionyi ga shindo-sho nyi upfu.
Kyaindi wulalu mukomlekyio, na iwa kuleshi na wunyamaṟi, na iwa waṟundi wa Ruwa, muwoṙe kyiira kyanyu, nyikyo iilyisho, na mafurumionyi gakyo nyi moo o mlungana.
Kyipfa wori wo wunyamaṟi nyi upfu, indi kyisumbo kya Ruwa nyi moo o mlungana kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
Wana wa wama wako, muichi (kyipfa ngyiṙeṙa na iwo waichi mawawaso), kye mawawaso gekyechilyia mndu ilyi akyeri na moo?
Kyipfa mndu mka awoṙe mii nampfungye nyi mawawaso ko ulya amwalyikyie kyiyeri akyeri na moo. Indi kapfa ulya amwalyikyie, nalekyio iwuka iwawasonyi lya wolyi.

Kyasia kyiyeri mii okye akyeri na moo, kokooya mka-chu awaṙa mii ungyi nekyelago mṟui. Indi mii okye kapfa, nalekyio, eshingyio-se nyi iwawaso lyilya-pfo, na oe chi mṟui-se-pfo, maa kaalyiko nyi mii ungyi.
Na wuṙo, wana wa wama wako, nyoe taa muwoṙe-se moo o osha uwawaso-pfo, kyipfa mukyeri kyoonyi kya mmbiu o Kristo, muiṙime iwa masaa ga ungyi, ulya aleṟuka ko wapfu, kundu soe lukumbie ndunda ko Ruwa.
Kyipfa kyiyeri luwekyeri na mbaṟe ya mmbiu, lango tsa wunyamaṟi tsiwekyeri pfo kyipfa kya uwawaso, tsileṟunda mmbiunyi yaṙu lukopfa.
Indi wulalu lolekyio iwuka uwawasonyi, luwoṙe-se moo o osha wunyamaṟi wulya wuleluchilyia-pfo, kundu soe luiṙime iṟunda mbaṟenyi ngyihya ya Mumuyo o Ruwa, chi mbaṟenyi ya kacha ya kyiṟeio-pfo.
Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Uwawaso nyi wunyamaṟi? Ote! Indi ngyiweiṙima imanya wunyamaṟi sile nyi kui mawawaso-pfo; cha kyipfa kokooya uwawaso lulalegamba “Ulalangye” gyiwechimanya ilanga-pfo.
Kyaindi wunyamaṟi wulewona ṙaawa ko iwawaso lyilya, wukowuta mrimenyi koko orio mbaṟe ya ilanga. Kyipfa wunyamaṟi kulawoṙe mawawaso upfiie.
Na inyi ngyiwekyeri na moo ipfo mawookyionyi kulawoṙe mawawaso, indi kyiyeri iwawaso lyilya lyilecha, wunyamaṟi wulewaṙa pfinya na inyi ngapfa.
Ngawona iwawaso lyilya lyekyeende moo kye koko inyi lyileende upfu.
Kyipfa wunyamaṟi, kui iwona ṙaawa ko iwawaso lyilya, wulengyilemba, koikyo wukongyiwaaga.
Kyasia uwawaso lungyiele. Na iwawaso lyilya lyilyiele, na lya wusumganyi, na lyilyicha.

Kyasia-ng'u ngyesa, lyilya lyikyeri lyicha lyiwekyeri upfu koko inyi? Ote! Indi wunyamaṟi, kundu wuwono kye nyi wunyamaṟi loi, wulengyiwaaga kui iwawaso lyilya lyicha, kundu kui iwawaso lyilya wunyamaṟi wuengyeṟe iwiha mnu.
Cha kyipfa luichi kye uwawaso mawookyionyi galo nyi mrimenyi; indi inyi nyi mndu o mmbiunyi, ngyimchilyie nyi wunyamaṟi.
Kyipfa ngyiichi kyindo ngyiwuta-pfo; cha kyipfa kyilya ngyikundi, ngyikyiwuta-pfo; indi kyilya ngyikyisuuye nyikyo ngyekyewuta.
Kyaindi kokooya ngawuta kyilya ngyilakyikundi, ngaiṙikyia kye iwawaso lyilya lyilyicha.
Kyasia wulalu chi inyi mrimenyi koko ngyiwuta ikyo-pfo, indi nyi wunyamaṟi wulya wukyeri mrimenyi koko.
Cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye mrimenyi koko, lugambe mmbiunyi oko, kokyekaa kyindo kyicha-pfo cha kyipfa ikunda ngyikundi, indi iwuta kyindo kyicha ngiiṙima-pfo.
Cha kyipfa kyilya kyicha ngyikyikundi ngyikyiwuta-pfo; indi kyilya kyiwicho ngyilakyikundi nyikyo ngyekyewuta.
Kyasia kokooya kyilya ngyilakyikundi nyikyo ngyikyiwuta, chi inyi mrimenyi koko ngyikyiwuta-pfo, indi nyi wunyamaṟi wulya wukyeri mrimenyi koko.
Kyasia ngawona iwawaso-lyi, kye koko inyi ngyikundi iwuta kyindo kyicha, kuwoṙe lyilyiwicho.
Cha kyipfa mrimenyi koko ngyimchihiye kyipfa kya iwawaso lya Ruwa.
Kyaindi shiwungonyi shako, ngyiwonyi iwawaso lyikyeri kuleshi, lyikapana shiṙa na iwawaso lyilya lya wuṟango woko, na ingyiwaṙa ko pfinya kui iwawaso lyilya lya wunyamaṟi lyikyeri shiwungonyi shako.
Ochia loko, mkyiwa inyi, nyi wui echingyiletsa na mmbiu-chu o upfu?
Ngyiana Ruwa, kui Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu. Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, inyi ngyimonyi kui wuṟango woko ngyiṟundia iwawaso lya Ruwa, indi kui mmbiu oko iwawaso lya wunyamaṟi.
Kyasia-ng'u, wulalu, kuwoṙe ianduyo lya ngapo ko iwo wakyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu-pfo.
Cha kyipfa iwawaso lya Mumuyo o moo ulya ukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu lyilengyilekyia, kuleshi na iwawaso lya wunyamaṟi na upfu.

Kyipfa shilya shilekyeiṙimika kui iwawaso, kyipfa kya ilyi lyiwewoṙe wufofo kyipfa kya mmbiu, Ruwa kui iṙuma Mana okye amonyi kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu ui o wunyamaṟi, na kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi, naleanduya wunyamaṟi mmbiunyi.
Kundu shilya shishigambe mawawasonyi, shiafutsio mrimenyi koṙu soe, lulekyekaa kui iosha mbonyi tsa mmbiu, indi mbonyi tsa mrima.
Cha kyipfa walya wekyeosha mmbiu wekyekusaṟa mbonyi tsa mmbiu; indi walya wekyeosha mrima wekyekusaṟa mbonyi tsa mrima.
Cha kyipfa kyindo mmbiu ukundi nyi upfu; indi kyindo mrima ukundi nyi moo na ufoṟo.
Cha kyipfa kyilya mmbiu ukundi nyi kyituwa ko Ruwa, kyipfa kyekyeindia iwawaso lya Ruwa-pfo, maa kyeiṙima ilyiindia-pfo.
Walya wekyeosha mmbiu wechiiṙima ichihiṟa Ruwa-pfo.
Kyaindi kokooya Mumuyo o Ruwa nakyeri mrimenyi konyu, nyoe muiosha mmbiu-pfo; indi muiosha Mumuyo. Kyaindi kokooya mndu oose alawoṙe Mumuyo o Kristo, icho chi okye-pfo.
Na Kristo akyeri mrimenyi konyu, mmbiu yanyu iwoṙe-se moo o osha wunyamaṟi-pfo; indi mrima yanyu ikyeri na moo kyipfa kya wusumganyi.

Kyaindi kokooya Mumuyo okye ulya aleṟutsa Yesu ko wapfu nakyeri mrimenyi konyu, ulya aleṟutsa Kristo Yesu ko wapfu naiṟutsa na mmbiu yanyu ikyeri mbaṟenyi ya ipfa, kui Mumuyo okye akyeri mrimenyi konyu.
Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, wana wa wama, lui wasile, chi wa mmbiu lukae na moo kui iosha mbonyi tsa mmbiu-pfo.
Kyipfa kokooya mokaa na moo kui iosha mbonyi tsa mmbiu, mukundi ipfa; indi kokooya mowaaga mawuto ga mmbiu kui Mumuyo, mokaa na moo.
Cha kyipfa woose wekyesongoyo nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa, iwo nyiwo wana wa Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa Mumuyo ulya Ruwa amuenengyie omugaluo nyoe watumo na imuenenga wuowu-pfo; indi muleambilyia Mumuyo o imugaluo wana, na kui Mumuyo-cho luilaga Papa, nyi kyimwi na igamba Awu.
Mumuyo oe amonyi nekyeṟingyishia hamwi na mrima yaṙu, kye soe nyi wana wa Ruwa.
Na kokooya soe nyi wana, kyasia, soe nyi weoṟa mboṟa tsa Ruwa, wekyeoṟa hamwi na Kristo. Yee, lochituuro hamwi na oe kundu luweiṙima ing'anyiso hamwi na oe.
Cha kyipfa ngyitala matuuro ga kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu kye chi kyindo cha mng'ano ulya ochiloṟo koṙu-pfo.
Cha kyipfa shigumbe shoose shiweṙelyia kui sia ing'anyi iloṟo lya wana wa Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa shigumbe shoose shilewiko wanda ya kyindo kyilawoṙe kyiira; chi kui ikunda lyasho-pfo, indi kyipfa kyakye oe aleshiwika kyiiṙi kya ikusuria.
Kyipfa shigumbe-sho shimonyi nasho shechiwiko handu halawoṙe ichilyio na iwuto wutumonyi wo inyamaṟika, mṟasa shiiṙe handunyi halawoṙe ichilyio ha mng'ano o wana wa Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa luichi kye shigumbe shoose taa shiwawio handu hamwi, nasho shiwoṙe fowa cha ya mndu mka aienengo mana handu hamwi maa wulalu.
Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi maa soe luwenyi luwoṙe shindo shikyeri ndunda tsa kuwooka tsa Mumuyo, soe taa luiwawio mrimenyi koṙu, lochiweṙelyia iwa wana, nyi kyimwi na wukyiṟo wo mmbiu yaṙu.
Cha kyipfa lulekyiṟo kui kyindo kyiweṙelyio, kyilawonio. Indi kyindo kyiweiweṙelyio kyikammboneka, kuwoṙe-se iweṙelyia-pfo. Cha kyipfa nyi wui ekyeweṙelyia kyilya akyiwonyi?
Indi lukoweṙelyia kyindo lulakyiwonyi, lokyiweṙelyia kui wusimiri.
Na wuṙo Mumuyo na oe nekyelutarama wufofo woṙu, kyipfa luichi iterewa chandu kyiluwaṟi-pfo; indi Mumuyo amonyi nekyeluterewia kui isumkyia lyilechiiṙima isendo.
Na oe ai moruwa-ruwa mrima, naichi kyilya Mumuyo akundi cha kyipfa nekyeterewia wandu wa Ruwa chandu Ruwa akundi.
Na soe luichi kye shindonyi shoose Ruwa nekyeṟunda hamwi na walya wamkundi kyiiṙi kya iwanenga mecha, kyimwi na igamba soe luwalage chandu Ruwa akundi.
Kyipfa walya awewaichi wookyia mawookyionyi, nalewasambuṟa wookyia mawookyionyi wafananyisho na mfano o Mono-kye, kundu oe nawe mmbele o wana wa wama wafoi.
Na walya alewasambuṟa wookyia mawookyionyi, iwo kawalaga; na walya alewalaga, iwo kawatalyia wusumganyi; na walya alewatalyia wusumganyi, iwo kawang'anyisa.
Kyasia lugambe kyi kyipfa kya isho? Ruwa akyeri ura loṙu, nyi wui eiṙima iluwutia kyindo kyiwicho?
Ulya alalelekyia Mono-kye amonyi, indi kammbuta kyipfa kyaṙu soe loose nechilemo kuṙa iluenenga necha shindo shoose hamwi na oe?
Nyi wui echiṙuo mengyenyi wasambuṟe wa Ruwa? Ruwa nyi oe aiwatalyia wusumganyi.
Nyi wui eiṙima igamba kye nawaṟi iolotsio ngapo? Kristo Yesu nyi oe alepfa; yee, na ngoseṟa ya isho, naleṟuka ko wapfu, na oe naṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa. Ngoseṟa nyi oe ailuterewia.
Nyi wui echiluletsana na ikunda lya Kristo? Ngyesa nyi fowa, ang'u wukyiwa, ang'u kyiwi, ang'u njaa, ang'u iwuṟa nguo, ang'u ndenga, ang'u ushu?
Chandu kyikyiṟeie kye,
“Kyipfa kyapfo luiwoogo kyingoto puti,
luwatale cha moondo geshinja.”
Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tso tsoose luiwinga, na ngoseṟa ya iwinga, kui ulya alelukunda!
Cha kyipfa ngammanya kui wuloi kye, maa upfu, maa moo, maa malaika, maa wawoṙe wuchilyi, maa shikyeri pfo, maa shilya shechiwa pfo, maa wawoṙe wuiṙimi,
maa shikyeri wuye, maa shikyeri wanda, maa kyindo kyingyi kyoose kyikyigumbe kyechiiṙima iluletsana na ikunda lya Ruwa lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu-pfo.
Ngyiṙeṙa loi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo, mrima oko ongyiṟingyishia Mumuyonyi Mweele,
kye ngyiwoṙo nyi fowa ing'anyi na mawawio galekyesia mrimenyi koko.
Kyipfa ngyiweiṙima iterewa inyi ngyimonyi iseso nyi Ruwa na iletsano na Kristo kyipfa kya wana wa wama wako, kyishari kyako kyimmbiu.
Iwo wakyeri Waisiraelyi wawoṙe kulya ilago nyi wana, na kyiṟumi kyilya; na shiteṟio, na ienengo uwawaso, na iindia na iterewa Ruwa, na shaasa shakye.
Iwo wakyeri wachuku wa waku, na kyiiṙi kya iwo kulewuka Kristo kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu. Nyi oe akyeri wuye ya shindo shoose, Ruwa, ekyeano shiyeri shoose. Amen.
Chi kye Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyailachika-pfo. Kyipfa wandu Ruwa asambuṟie chi Waisiraelyi tikyi-pfo.
Maa wailago wana kyipfa kya ilyi wakyeri wa ushari lo Abrahamu-pfo, indi, “Kyiiṙi kya Isakyi ushari lopfo lochilago.”
Kyimwi na igamba chi wana wa mmbiu wai wana wa Ruwa-pfo, indi wana wa kyaasa kyilya wekyetalo kye nyi wa ushari.
Cha kyipfa mbonyi tsa kyaasa nyi itsi: “Kyiyeri cha ikyi ngyechicha, na Sara nekoamwenengo mana.”
Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi Rebeka na oe, amwire mana kui mii umwi, na oe nyi Isakyi, awu oṙu,
(kyipfa walandefeo wana walya, maa walandewute kyindo kyicha ang'u kyiwicho, kundu kyindo Ruwa akundi kui isambuṟa kyigoṟokye, chi kyipfa kya mawuto-pfo, indi kyipfa kya kyilya ulya ailaga akundi),
nalewio kuṙi: “Ang'anyi nechiṟundia mtutu.”
Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Ngakunda Yakobo, indi Esau ngamsuo.”
Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Kuwoṙe wuwicho ko Ruwa? Ote!
Kyipfa naiwia Mose, “Ngyehooṟia ulya ngemhooṟia; ngyesaṟia ulya ngyemsaria.”
Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, chi wuiṙiminyi wo ulya akundi, maa wo ulya aikapa mteeṟa-pfo; indi wo Ruwa ulya aihooṟia.
Kyipfa shiṟeio shagamba kya Farao kye, “Ngyilekugoṟotsa kyipfa kya ikyi, kundu ngyiloṟe pfinya tsako kopfo, rina lyako lyiongoyo urukyenyi koose.”
Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, akunda imhooṟia nekyemhooṟia, na akunda imwenenga mrima muumu nekyemgaluo muumu.
Kyasia, nongyiwia, “Ny'kyilyi Ruwa aiengyeṟa igamba kye luwoṙe tewe? Cha kyipfa nyi wui ekyewingana na kyilya oe akundi?”
Ote! Chi wuṙo-pfo, iyoe mndu. Iyoe nyi wui uigaluo Ruwa? Ngyesa kyindo kyigumbe kyiwie ulya alekyigumba, “Ny'kyilyi ongyigumba kuṙi?”
Ang'u moachikyia shinungu ngyesa achilyie teri, kui ṙombo lyimwi lya teri iachikyia kyindo kyimwi kyiwaṙe kyiṟumi na kyingyi kyilawoṙe kyiṟumi-pfoe?
Kyasia ny' kyikyi-ng'u, kokooya Ruwa kui ikunda iloṟa nyashi yakye, na iṟingyishia wuiṙimi wokye, kui ikarishia lying'anyi, naleṙuana na walya wawewaṟi inyamaṟo nyi nyashi ya Ruwa.
Lyingyi-se, kundu naṟingyishie wung'anyi wo kyiṟumi kyakye kui shindo shilya sha isaṟia, aleshiachikyia wookyia kacha shiwaṙe kyiṟumi.
Nyi soe-ng'u alelulaga. Chi wandu wai Wayuda tikyi-pfo, indi na wandu walai Wayuda taa.
Nyi chandu awegambie ipfo ko Hosea,
“Ngyelaga wandu wako walya walakyeri wandu wako,
na mkunde oko ulya alakyeri mkunde oko,
Lyingyi-se kyechiwa handu halya walewio,
nyoe chi wandu wako-pfo,
iho welago wana wa Ruwa ai na moo.”
Yesaya na oe naiṙeṙa kya Isiraelyi, echigamba,
“Itala lya wana wa Isiraelyi,
maa chandu lyikyeri cha
mlelya o ipalyipalyi,
nyi matsugaṟo gawo tikyi gechikyiṟo.
Kyipfa Mndumii kulawoṙe iṙetsa kyiyeri nechianduya wandu woose wa Wuyana,
echimarisa na iṙumbuo.”
“Lyingyi-se chandu Yesaya alesonguo iṙeṙa,
‘Kokooya Mndumii o ngyuulyimalyi alaleluṙeeya ushari,
luwewa cha Sodoma,
luwechifananyisho na Gomora.’ ”
Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Kye wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa, walekyeosha wusumganyi; walewona wusumganyi; kyaindi nyi wusumganyi wulya wukyeri wo iiṙikyia.
Indi Isiraelyi wechiosha iwawaso lya wusumganyi walewona iwawaso lyilya-pfo.
Kyipfa kya kyikyi? Kyipfa walelyiosha kui njia ya iiṙikyia-pfo, indi cha ilyi kye nyi kui njia ya mawuto. Wakakapa tuulyia halya igoenyi lyekyeenenga wandu ikapa ṙende,
chandu kyileṟeio,
“Ngyiwika Sion
igoe lyekyeenenga wandu ikapa ṙende
na iṟaṟa lyekyeolotsa.
Na orio echimwiṙikyia echirigo nyi sonu-pfo.”
Wana wa wama wako, kyindo ngyilangyie mnu mrimenyi koko, na kyiterewo kyako ko Ruwa, nyi kyipfa kyawo kundu wakyiṟo.
Cha kyipfa ngyiwaṟingyishia kye wawoṙe wuragari kyipfa kya Ruwa, indi chi kyiiṙi kya wuṟango-pfo.
Cha kyipfa, walaichi wusumganyi wo Ruwa, na wakundi iṟingyishia wusumganyi wowo wawenyi, walechilyio nyi wusumganyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
Cha kyipfa Kristo amche kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya uwawaso-pfo; kundu orio aiṙikyie natalyio wusumganyi.
Cha kyipfa Mose naleṟeia kui wusumganyi wuwukyie kui mawawaso, kye mndu ekyewuta isho nechiwaṙa moo kui isho.
Indi wusumganyi wulya wokyewono kui iiṙikyia wogamba kuṙi: “Maa ulagambe mrimenyi kopfo, nyi wui echiṙo iyenda Ruwewu?” (Nyi kyimwi na isotsa Kristo na wanda).
Ang'u, “Nyi wui echisoka iyenda ko waṟumu?” (Nyi kyimwi na iṙosia Kristo wuye, iwuka ko wapfu.)
Kyaindi wusumganyi wogamba kuṙa? Ṙeṙo lyilya lyikyeri kufuhi na iyoe, ṙumbunyi lyapfo, na mrimenyi opfo, nyi ṙeṙo lyilya lya iiṙikyia lokyelyionguo.
Cha kyipfa, koṟingyishia Yesu kui ṙumbu lyapfo kye nyi Mndumii, na iiṙikyia mrimenyi kopfo kye Ruwa nalemṟutsa ko wapfu, nochikyiṟo.
Cha kyipfa kui mrima mndu nekyeiṙikyia mṟasa kawona wusumganyi, na kui ṙumbu nekyeṟingyishia kawona wukyiṟo.
Cha kyipfa kyiṟeio kyagamba, “Orio momwiṙikyia echiwona sonu-pfo.”
Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mbaṟe ingyi ko Myuda na Mkyiṟikyi-pfo, kyipfa oe nyi Mndumii o woose, awoṙe wunjama ko woose wekyemlaga;
kyipfa orio mndu echilaga rina lya Mndumii nechikyiṟo.
Kyasia wamlage kuṙa icho walamwiṙikyie? Lyingyi-se wamwiṙikyie kuṙa icho walandemwicho? Lyingyi-se wamwicho kuṙa icho kulawoṙe moonguo mbonyi?
Lyingyi-se weonguo mbonyi kuṙa walawaṙume? Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Gamecha cha kyikyi maṙende ga iwo wekyeonguo mbonyi tsa mecha.”
Kyaindi chi woose waleindia mbonyi iya ngyicha-pfo, kyipfa Yesaya naigamba, “Mndumii, nyi wui aleiṙikyia mbonyi tsaṙu?”
Kyasia iiṙikyia lyekyecha kui kyilya mndu aiicho; na kyilya mndu aiicho kyekyecha kui ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Kristo.
Kyaindi ngyigamba, ngyesa wo waleicho-pfoe? Yee waleicho.
“Ṟui lyawo lyileṙunganana wuyanenyi koose,
na maṙeṙo gawo mṟasa matsitsionyi ga wuyana.”
Indi ngyigamba, ngyesa Waisiraelyi walemanya-pfoe? Kya kuwooka Mose naigamba,
“Ngyewawika wunyenyi kui wandu walakyeri Isanga,
kui isanga lyilaichi kyindo ngyewapfulutsa nyashi.”
Na Yesaya awoṙe wuṟango na wukari wung'anyi, naigamba,
“Ngyilekooyo nyi iwo walekyengyipfula,
ngyileṟingyishio ko iwo walaiwesa mbonyi tsako.”
Indi ko Isiraelyi naigamba, “Kyingoto puti ngyilewaleshia mawoko wandu walawoṙe wuindi na walekyeicho.”
Kyasia, ngyiwesa, ngyesa Ruwa naletsindikyia wandu wakye kuleshi? Ote! Kyipfa maa inyi nyi mndu o Isiraelyi, umwi o washari wa Abrahamu, mndu o mbaṟe ya Benyamen.
Ruwa aletsindikyia wandu wakye kuleshi awewaichi wookyia mawookyionyi-pfo. Ang'u muichi kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi shiṟeio ko mbonyi tsa Elyiya-pfoe? Chandu aishitakyi Waisiraelyi mbele ya Ruwa.
“Mndumii, wawaaga weonguo shisuku wapfo, wanyamaṟa alyitaṟe tsapfo, na inyi ngaṙio ngyimonyi, nawo waingyipfula wangyiwaage.”
Indi Ruwa nalemgaluo kuṙa? “Ngyiwoṙe wandu shiku mfungaaṙe walekyepfiria ndi mbele ya Baalyi.”
Kyasia na wuṙo kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu, kuwoṙe mtsugaṟo o wandu wasambuṟe kui isaṟia.
Kyaindi kokooya nyi kui isaṟia, kyewa-se kui mawuto-pfo, ang'u iho isaṟia lyiwechiwa-se isaṟia-pfo.
Kyasia kyawa kuṙa-ng'u? Kyindo kyilya Isiraelyi aweikyipfula alekyiwona-pfo, indi walya walesambuṟo walekyiwona, na wengyi waleming'a.
Chandu kyiwekyiṟeie, Ruwa nalewaenenga mrima mlemeri, mṟasa maa maṙwi galaicho, mṟasa inu.
Na Dawidi naigamba,
“Shelya shawo shiwe mṙego o wawaṙa,
waolokye na ianduyo
Meso gawo gawiko meema
walaiṙime iwona
moongo yawo ilemekye shiyeri shoose.”
Kyasia ngyiwesa, ngyesa walekapa ṙende mṟasa waolokye piu? Ote! Kyaindi kui ṙeko lyawo wukyiṟo wuleafukyia ko walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa, kundu wo wawenyi wawoṙo nyi wunyeng'i.
Kyasia, kokooya ṙeko lyawo lyawa nyi wunjama wo wuyana, na wufofo wowo wo kyimrima wuleende mboṟa ing'anyi ko wandu wa masanga wengyi, ngyesa kyechiwa ngoseṟa iafutsia lyawo-pfoe?
Kyaindi ngyiṙeṙa na nyoe, mui wandu walakyeri Wayuda. Kyasia, chandu ngyikyeri msu o wandu walakyeri Wayuda, ngyiṟumisha iṟunda lyako.
Kofia ngyeiṙima iwaenenga wunyenyi wandu wa samu yako ngyimonyi na ikyiṟa wandu waata.
Kyipfa kokooya iwiyitso lyawo lyileende kyisanza kya wuyana na Ruwa, ngyesa iiṙikyio lyawo lyechiwa-kyi sile nyi moo ko walya walempfa?
Lyingyi-se kokooya kyifunjoe kyikyienengye Ruwa, na wuṙo mkate oose; na itsinde lyikawa nyi lya Ruwa, na wuṙo maa mbaga tsalyo.
Kyaindi kokooya mbaga tsingyi tsilemanyo, na iyoe mseituni o nguṙunyi nuleṙongo kyiiṙi kyatso, kowa mbumbu imwi ya ikyiṙi lya mseituni na wucha wolyo,
maa ulakushele kyiiṙi kya mbaga tsilya, ang'u kokooya nukushela, chi iyoe uṙuṙe itsinde-pfo, indi nyi itsinde lyikuṙuṙe iyoe.
Kyasia nogamba, mbaga tsilya tsilemanyo kundu ngyipario ho inyi.
Nyi kyicha. Galemanyo kyipfa kya ilemo iiṙikyia lyawo; na iyoe nugoṟokyi kui iiṙikyia lyapfo. Maa ulakushele, indi uowuo.
Cha kyipfa kokooya Ruwa alalelekyia mbaga tsa kuwooka, maa ekulekyia iyoe-pfo.
Kyasia, ambuya-ng'u, wucha na wulang'a wo Ruwa; ko walya waolokyie wulang'a; indi kopfo iyoe wucha wo Ruwa, kokaa kyiiṙi kya wucha-wo; sile nyi wuṙo, iyoe taa nowiyitso kuleshi.
Na iwo taa, wakaṙa wufofo wowo wo iiṙikyia, wechiṙongo, cha kyipfa Ruwa neiṙima iwaṙonga-se.

Cha kyipfa kokooya iyoe nulemanyo kowuto mseituninyi, ukyeri mseituni o nguṙunyi wookyia mawookyionyi, numa koṙongo mbaṟe ingyi, mseituninyi ui mcha; chi ngoseṟa walya wakyeri mseituni mcha wookyia mawookyionyi iiṙima iṙongo mseituninyi owo wawenyi-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa wana wa wama wako, ngyikundi mulamanye wuṟikyi-wu-pfo, kundu mulachekusaṟa kye mulawaṟango; kye wuumu wo Waisiraelyi nyi kundu masanga gengyi gamanye Ruwa.
Koikyo Waisiraelyi woose wechikyiṟo; chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Mkyiṟa nechicha awuka Sion,
neletsana Yakobo na washituwa wakye.
Na ikyi nyikyo kyiteṟio kyako nawo,
llyi ngyechiwahooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.”
Kyasia ko mbonyi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha walewa washituwa kyipfa kyanyu; indi kyipfa kya isambuṟo walewa nyi wakunde kyipfa kya waku waṙu.
Cha kyipfa shisumbo sha Ruwa shiwoṙe isumkyia-pfo, maa ilago lyasho.
Kyipfa kokooya chandu nyoe kacha mulelega Ruwa, kyaindi wulalu mulewona isaṟia kui ilega lyawo;
na wuṙo maa wo walelega wulalu, kundu kui nyoe isaṟio nawo wasaṟio.
Kyipfa Ruwa nalewawika handu hamwi woose kyiiṙi kya ilega kundu nawasaṟie woose.
Chandu wunjama na wuṟango na imanya lya Ruwa shikyeri, ianduya lyakye lyekyemanyika-pfo, maa njia tsakye tsechiwa isoruo-soruo-pfo!
Kyipfa nyi wui aichi kyindo Mndumii akusaṟie? Ang'u nyi wui alemmba mlosha okye?
Ang'u nyi wui alemwenenga kyindo kuwooka, na oe namtae-se?
Cha kyipfa shindo shoose shiwukyie kokye, shikyeri pfo kui pfinya tsakye; lyingyi-se shiwuya na kokye. Kyiṟumi nyi kyakye shiyeri shoose. Amen.
Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, ngyimuterewa, kui ihooṟia lya Ruwa, wutenyi mmbiu yanyu iwe kyiṙaso kyiwoṙe moo, kyiele, kyechihiṟa Ruwa, ilyi nyilyo iindia na iterewa Ruwa lyilyicha na lya loi.
Maa mulaoshe mbaṟe ya wuyana-wu; indi mugalukye kundu Ruwa naiṙime igaluo makusaṟo ganyu. Iho nyi lyo-ndu moiṙima imanya kyilya Ruwa akundi, imanya kyilya kyii kyicha, kyemchihiṟa na kyikyiafutsie.
Cha kyipfa kui isaṟia ngyileenengo ngyiwia orio mndu akyeri konyu alakusurie kyindo kya ngoseṟa kuta chandu awaṟi ikusuria; indi nawaṙe meena chandu Ruwa agawie orio mndu meena o iiṙikyia.
Kyipfa chandu mmbiunyi umwi luwoṙe shiwungo shifoi, maa shiwungo shoose shekyeṟunda iṟunda lyimwi-pfo;
na wuṙo na soe chandu lukyeri wafoi lukyeri mmbiu umwi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, na shiwungo, orio umwi ko oṙoe.
Kyasia cha kyipfa luwoṙe shisumbo sha orio mndu mbaṟe yakye, iṙuana na chandu luleenengo isaṟia; kokooya nyi ionguo shisuku, luonguo shisuku iṙuana na iiṙikyia.
Kokooya nyi maṟunda lukae maṟundenyi gaṙu. Molosha, kyiiṙi kya ilosha lyakye;
motutuma, kyiiṙi kya itutuma lyakye; motarama oṙoe, kui mrima mkyesi; mogoṟokyia, kui wuragari; mosaṟia, kui sia.
Ikunda lyilawaṙe wukulembecheṟi. Suonyi kyikyeri kyiwicho, oshanenyi na kyikyeri kyicha.
Kui ikunda lya mono-wama, mukundane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi; kui kyiṟumi mochisongoṟa woṙianyu.
Kui wuragari, chi waṙoko-pfo, muwoṙe wuragari mrimenyi konyu; mochiṟundia Ruwa.
Kui ikusuria, mochichihiyo; fowenyi, mochiweṙelyia; kyiiṙi kya iterewa, kyiyeri kyoose.
Mochitarama wandu wa Ruwa shilya wakundi; kui iambilyia wayenu, mochipfuṟukana.
Wikyienyi mboṟa walya waimsuiṟa; wikyienyi mboṟa, maa mulasese.
Chihiyonyi hamwi na iwo waichihiyo; fiiṟenyi hamwi na walya waifiiṟa.
Muiṙikyiane shilya mukusurie nyoe wenyi ko wenyi. Maa mulakusurie shindo shing'anyi, indi muiṙikyie iwinisho nyi mbonyi tsifofo. Maa mulakushelyie wuṟango.
Maa mulatae mndu wuwicho ko wuwicho. Ṟundenyi shindo shicha mbele ya wandu woose.
Kokooya kyechiwa, ko ura lonyu, mukae ufoṟonyi na wandu woose.
Wakunde, maa mulatae kyiṟaache, indi seiyenyi nyashi ya Ruwa; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Kyiṟaache nyi kyako inyi; inyi ngyetaa,” Mndumii nagamba.
Kyaindi, mokyituwa opfo awoṙo nyi njaa, mwenengye kyelya; amwangari, mwenengye kyindo kyenyo; kyipfa kowuta kuṙo, nowika makaa ga moṙo mṙoenyi kokye.
Wuwicho wulakuwingye, indi uwingye wuwicho kui wucha.
Orio mndu naindie wuchilyi na wang'anyi wa uruka, kyipfa kuwoṙe wuchilyi wulawukyie ko Ruwa-pfo; na wulya wukyeri pfo wuwukyie ko Ruwa.
Koikyo molega awoṙe wuchilyi urukenyi na iwingana na kyilya Ruwa awawasie, na walya wekyewingana na oe wechianduyo.

Kyipfa walya wekyechilyia wekyeowesha wandu kyipfa kya mecha-pfo, indi kyipfa kya mawuto mawicho. Kyasia nukundi ulaowuo awoṙe wuchilyi? Wuta shindo shicha na iyoe nochienengo kyiṟumi na iyoe nochiwona kyiṟumi kokye.

Cha kyipfa oe nyi mṟundi o Ruwa kopfo kyipfa kya mecha. Indi kyiyeri owuta shindo shiwicho, owuo, kyipfa aiṙuo ushu wulya-pfo; cha kyipfa nyi mṟundi o Ruwa, ekyetaa kyiṟaache ulya ekyewuta shindo shiwicho kyipfa kya nyashi.
Koikyo kyikuwaṟi iindia, chi kyipfa kya nyashi iya tupu-pfo, indi na kyipfa kya kyilya mrima ukundi.
Lyingyi-se kyipfa kya ikyo taa mokyetaa kodi; kyipfa wo nyi waṟundi wa Ruwa, wechikaa iṟundenyi-lyo ilyo.
Enengyenyi woose kyilya kyiwawaṟi, mndu o kodi, kodi; mndu o ukamba, ukamba; awaṟi iṙeṙemio, iṙeṙemio; awaṟi wuindi, wuindi.
Maa mulariko nyi mndu kyindo kyoose, sile ikundana; cha kyipfa mokunda oṙoe naafutsia mawawaso.
Kyipfa kulya igamba, Ulaṟuguye ang'u ulaṟuguyo, Ulawaage, Ulaiwe, Ulalangye; na kuwoṙe iwawaso lyingyi lyoose, lyasanzo na ṙeṙo-lyi, kye, “Kunda momṟasa opfo cha iyoe kumonyi.”
Ikunda lyekyewutia momṟasa kyindo kyiwicho-pfo. Kyasia ikunda nyilyo lyaafutsia mawawaso.
Yee, lukomanya kyiyeri, kye kyiyeri kyeamka maṙoenyi kyamwafukyia; cha kyipfa wulalu wukyiṟo woṙu wukyeri kufuhi na soe kuta lyilya lulewooka iiṙikyia.
Kyio nyi iiṙa kyii kyingoto kyamtikyira kufuhi; kyasia luṙe mawuto ga meema, na iṟaa shisha sha ngyeela.
Chandu kyiwaṟi iwuto kyingoto luchumie kui wuyendelyi wucha. Chi kui ilya na ielewetsa na wunanzi-pfo, chi kui ukoe na wuṟui-pfo, chi kui shiloyano na wunyenyi-pfo.
Indi irenyi shisha sha Mndumii Yesu Kristo, maa mulaambuye mmbiu, mṟasa muamtse lango tsacho.
Mndu awoṙe iiṙikyia lyifofo, mwambilyienyi, indi mulamwanduye makusaṟo gakye.
Mndu umwi nawoṙe iiṙikyia, nekyelya shoose; kyaindi ulya akyeri mfofo nekyelya mboka tsa maṟa.
Ulya ekyelya alaanduye ulya alailya; kyipfa Ruwa naiṙikyiana na oe.
Iyoe nyi wui uianduya mṟundi o mndu ungyi? Ko mndumii okye amonyi ulya nekyegoṟoka ang'u ioloka. Yee, nechigoṟotso cha kyipfa Mndumii neiṙima imgoṟotsa.
Mndu umwi nekyewona kye mfiri yoose ifananyi-pfo. Ungyi nekyewona mfiri yoose ifananyi. Orio mndu nawute chandu wuṟango wokye womloṟa.
Ulya mong'anyisa mfiri, nekyeung'anyisa ko Mndumii; na molya, nekyelya ko Mndumii, cha kyipfa naana Ruwa; lyingyi-se, ulya alekyelya ailya ko Mndumii-pfo, na oe taa naiana Ruwa.
Kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu kyiiṙi kyaṙu ai na moo kyipfa kyakye amonyi, maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyepfa kyipfa kyakye-pfo.
Cha kyipfa kokooya lokaa na moo, lui na moo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, ang'u kokooya lopfa, lopfa ko Mndumii. Kyasia kokooya lokaa na moo ang'u kokooya lopfa, soe nyi masaa ga Mndumii.
Kyipfa Kristo nalepfa kawaṙa-se moo kyipfa kya ikyi, nachilyie wapfu na wai na moo taa.
Kyaindi iyoe ngyesa ny'kyilyi uianduya mono-womoo? Ang'u ngyesa iyoe ny'kyilyi uimina mono-womoo? Cha kyipfa soe loose lochigoṟoka mbele ya kyiṙi kya ianduyo kya Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie,
“Chandu ngyikyeri na moo, Mndumii nagamba,
orio mndu nepfiria ndi mbele yako,
na orio ulumi lochisenda Ruwa.”
Kyasia nyi wuṙo, orio mndu kyiiṙi kyaṙu echiwuta mbonyi tsakye amonyi mbele ya Ruwa.
Kyasia lulaengyeṟe ianduyana, indi nanga mowuta ianduya lya mbaṟe-i, mndu alawute kyindo kyetewe mono-wamae ang'u kyemwolotsa.

Ngyiichi, ngoseṟa ngyimṟingyishie mnu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu, kye kuwoṙe kyindo kyifanyi kyimṟumoe wookyia mawookyionyi gakyo-pfo; kyaindi ko ulya awona kyindo kyifanyi kyimṟumoe, ko mndu-cho kyindo kyilya kyifanyi kyimṟumoe.
Na mono-womoo kawoṙo nyi fowa kyipfa kya kyelya, noṙa ichumia ikundenyi. Kui kyelya kyapfo ulanyamaṟe mndu ulya Kristo alepfa kyipfa kyakye.
Kyasia, wucha-wo wonyu wulasendo kui wuwicho.
Kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwa chi ilya maa inyo-pfo, indi nyi wusumganyi na ufoṟo na sia Mumuyonyi Mweele.
Kyipfa ulya aiṟundia Kristo mbonyi-tso tsekyechihiṟa Ruwa, na lyingyi-se nekyeiṙikyio nyi wandu.
Kyasia kokooya nyi wuṙo, luoshe mbonyi tsa ufoṟo na mbonyi tsiwoṙe kyiira kui ikarishana.
Kyipfa kya kyelya ulanyamaṟe iṟunda lya Ruwa. Loi, shoose shishicha; indi nyi uwicho ko mndu ilya na ikuicho uwicho mrimenyi.
Nyi kyicha iṙa ilya nyama maa inyo mpfinyo maa iwuta kyindo kyoose kyetewe mono-womoo naolokye.
Iiṙikyia lyilya uwoṙe ukae nalyo mrimenyi kopfo mbele ya Ruwa. Nanga mndu ulya alekyekuanduya mrimenyi kokye kui kyindo kyilya ekyekyiiṙikyia.
Kyaindi awoṙe ikapa kawi, kokooya alya naanduyo kye nanyamaṟie, kyipfa alya kui iiṙikyia-pfo. Na orio kyindo kyilawukyie iiṙikyienyi nyi wunyamaṟi.
Kyasia kyiluwaṟi soe luwoṙe pfinya iṙuo wufofo wo iwo walawoṙe pfinya, maa kyiluwaṟi iwuta shindo sheluchihiṟa soe luwenyi-pfo.
Orio mndu kyiiṙi kyaṙu nachihiṟe momṟasa okye, naambilyie wucha, kundu naiṙime ikarisha iiṙikyia lyakye.
Cha kyipfa Kristo alewuta shindo shekuchihiṟa amonyi-pfo; indi chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Shilahio shawo walekulahia iyoe shilengyikooya inyi.”
Cha kyipfa shoose shilesonguo iṟeio shileṟeio kundu shiluloshe soe; kundu kui wusimiri na iwiyiṟio moo lya shiṟeio luiṙime iwaṙa ikusuria.
Na Ruwa ai o wusimiri na iwiyiṟia moo namuenengye ikusuria kyindo kyimwi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi kui mfano o Kristo Yesu;
kundu kui mrima umwi na kui ṙumbu lyimwi muiṙime iṟumisha Ruwa, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Koikyo muambilyiane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, chandu na Kristo aleluambilyia, kundu Ruwa nang'anyiso.
Kyipfa ngyigamba kye Kristo ammba mṟundi o mma o iṙino kyipfa kya wuloi wo Ruwa, kundu naṟingyishie shiteṟio waku waṙu waleenengo.
Lyingyi-se kundu wandu walakyeri Wayuda waṟumishe Ruwa kyipfa kya ihooṟia lyakye; chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Koikyo ngyekuana wandunyi walakyeri Wayuda,
na inyi ngyeimbia rina lyapfo.”
Lyingyi-se nagamba,
“Chihiyonyi, wandu walakyeri Wayuda,
hamwi na wasambuṟe wa Ruwa.”
Lyingyi-se,
“Nyoe wandu moose mulakyeri Wayuda,
ṟumishenyi Mndumii
nyoe wandu moose, mng'anyisenyi.”
Na lyingyi-se Yesaya nagamba,
“Kochiwaṙa mndu kyisharinyi kya Yese,
na oe nechichilyia wandu walakyeri Wayuda,
nawo wechikusuria kokye.”
Kyasia-ng'u Ruwa mokusuria namuichuṟe nyoe sia yoose na ufoṟo iiṙikyienyi, kundu muengyeṟikye mnu iwaṙa ikusuria, pfinyenyi tsa Mumuyo Mweele.
Wana wa wama wako, inyi ngyimonyi ngyileṟingyishio kui mbonyi tsanyu kye mui wandu wecha, muwaenengye wuṟango woose; lyingyi-se moiṙima itutumana.
Indi ngyimuṟeia, kui wukari ngoseṟa ngyuurenyi tsingyi tsa paruo-i, cha imukumbuṟa, kui isaṟia lyilya ngyileenengo nyi Ruwa,

kundu ngiwe mṟundi o Kristo Yesu wandunyi walakyeri Wayuda. Ngyiṟundie Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa iṟunda lya wukohanyi, kundu wandu walakyeri Wayuda wawe kyiano kyechiambilyio, kyikamwilyiṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
Kyasia, ngyiwoṙe kyimaṙuma kyewona kyiṟumi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu mbele ya Ruwa.
Kyipfa ngyekaria igamba kyindo Kristo alakyiwutie kui iṟunda lyako-pfo, wandu walakyeri Wayuda waiṙime iindia kui iṙeṙa ang'u kui mawuto,
kui pfinya tsa kyiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho, pfinyenyi tsa Mumuyo Mweele; mṟasa kyikawa wookyia Yerusalemu, na mṟasenyi mṟasa Ilyiriko, ngamwonguo Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo chandu kyiwaṟi.
Na wuṙo-se ngyechitambagana ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, ngyilaonguo handu rina lya Kristo lyammarise igambo, ngyilachewika numba wuye ya mndu ungyi.
Indi chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Walya walandeongoyo mbonyi tsakye wechiwona,
na walya walandeicho wechimanya.”
Ny'kyo kyitewe ngyileimo kyiyeri kyifoi ngyilache na konyu.
Kyaindi wulalu, cha kyipfa kulawoṙe-se kyindo kyingyishingyie ngyuura tsa kunu, lyingyi-se wookyia maka ifoi ngyilangyie icha na konyu;
kyiyeri kyoose ngyechipfunga kyaro kyeyenda Spania [ngyeecha na konyu]. Cha kyipfa ngyikusurie immbona nyoe kyaronyi kyako, na iṙoo kyaro na nyoe, mrima oko uchihiyo kyitutu kyipfa kyanyu.
Indi wulalu ngyiyenda Yerusalemu, ngyechiṟundia wandu wa Ruwa;
kyipfa kyachihiṟa wandu wa Makyedonia na Akaya wasanie kyindo kyetarama wandu wa Ruwa wai wafofo ipfo Yerusalemu.

Yee, kyachihiṟa wandu wa Makyedonia, lyingyi-se wairiko nyi wandu walya wafofo wa Yerusalemu. Cha kyipfa kokooya wandu walakyeri Wayuda waleambilyia iwuka kowo shindo sha mrima, kyawakooya wo iwatarama kui shienengo sha kyiwuyana.
Ngammarisa iṟunda-lyo na iwaenengyia kyilya kyilesanio kyipfa kyawo, ngyeiṙia konyu ngyechiyenda Spania.
Ngyiichi kye ngacha na konyu ngyemuendie mboṟa ing'anyi ya Kristo.
Kyasia-ng'u, wana wa wama wako, ngyimuterewa kyipfa kya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, na kyipfa kya ikunda lyekyeendo nyi Mumuyo, pfuṟukanenyi hamwi na inyi shiterewonyi shanyu kyipfa kyako mbele ya Ruwa.
Terewenyi kundu ngyilakapo nyi walya walaiṙikyie Yesu urukyenyi lo Uyuda, na lyingyi-se kundu iṟunda ngyiwoṙe ipfo Yerusalemu lyiiṙikyio nyi wandu wa Ruwa.
Ngyiiṙime ishika konyu kui sia, chandu Ruwa akundi, ngyiiṙime ionyonya hamwi na nyoe.
Ruwa o ufoṟo nawe na nyoe moose. Amen.
Ngyimanyisha konyu mshikyi oṙu Foibe; akyeri mṟundi siṟinyi ya Kyenkrea.
Mwambilyienyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, chandu kyiwaṟi wandu wa Ruwa mumwenengye orio kyindo kyoose echikunda konyu; cha kyipfa oe nataramie wandu wafoi, kawengyitarama na inyi taa.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Pirisikyila na Akyila, wandu wai waṟundi hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu,
wawekuṟeyeṟie maa iwoogo kyipfa kyako. Iwo ngyiwaana, maa chi inyi tikyi-pfo, indi na siṟi tsa wandu woose walakyeri Wayuda taa. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi na siṟi ikyeri numbenyi kowo.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Epaineto, mkunde oko, aleambilyia Yesu kulya Asia.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Maria, ulya alekulyisa wukyiwa mnu kyipfa kyanyu.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Andironiko na Yunia, washari wako, walepfungo hamwi na inyi, wandu waichio kyiiṙi kya wasu; nawo walengyisongoya inyi iwa Wakristiano.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Ampilyiato, mkunde oko kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Urubano, mndu aiṟunda hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, na Stakyisi, mkunde oko.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Apele, amwiṙikyie kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi wandu wa kanyi ko Aristobulo.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Herodioni, ushari loko. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi wandu wa kanyi ko Narikyiso, wai kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Turufaina na Turufosa, wawoṙe wuragari kyiiṙi kya Mndumii. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Perisisi, mkunde alewika wuragari mnu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Ṟufo, msambuṟe kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, na wamae akyeri nyi wama oko taa.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Asinkoito, Filekoni, Herime, Patiroba, Herima, na wana wa wama wakyeri hamwi nawo.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Filoloko na Yulyia, Nerea na mshikyi okye; na Olyimpa, na wandu wa Ruwa woose wakyeri hamwi nawo.
Iṟikyiṟanenyi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi chandu wandu waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana. Siṟi tsoose tsa Kristo tsamuiṟikyiṟa.
Wana wa wama wako, ngyimuterewa ambuyenyi walya wawoṙe wuṟiingyi na mbonyi tseolotsa wengyi kui malosho galaṙuṙanyi na shilya mulekulosha. Kushowenyi nawo.
Kyipfa wandu wa mbaṟe-yo waiṟundia Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo-pfo, indi nyi ndewu tsawo wawenyi; na kui maṙeṙo ga wulembi na maṙeṙo gekuloṟa kye wawecha kundu wakundo, wailemba wandu wanyotsu.
Kyipfa wuindi wonyu wuleshika ko wandu woose. Kyasia ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyanyu, kyaindi ngyikundi nyoe muwaṙe wuṟango shindonyi shicha na iwa matondo shindonyi shiwicho.
Na Ruwa o ufoṟo nechirumatsa Satana wanda ya maṙende ganyu iwinyi.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na nyoe [Amen.]
Timoteo, mṟundi hamwi na inyi, namuiṟikyiṟa, na Lukyio, na Yason, na Sasipatiro, washari wako.
Inyi Teritio, ngyileṟeia paruo-i, ngamuiṟikyiṟa kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Gayo, ulya alengyiambilyia na ngyikyeri kokye hamwi na Siṟi yoose taa wamuiṟikyiṟa. Erasto, moambilyia heleri tsa mṟi, na Kwarito mono-wama oṙu, wamuiṟikyiṟa.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na nyoe moose. Amen.]

Wulalu naṟumisho ulya echiiṙima imukarisha, iṙuana na Ndumi Ngyicha ngyileonguo kya wucha wo Yesu Kristo, kyilyingananyi na kyilya kyiwekuṟiikyie wookyia kyiyeri kyileshi kyileiṙa. Wulalu Ruwa nashukuo
na pata kui shiṟeio sha weonguo shisuku, kyikamanyika ko masanga goose chandu Ruwa o mlungana alegamba, kundu waindie Iiṙikyia.
Nyi oe Ruwa, kulawoṙe ungyi awoṙe wuṟango cha oe. Kyiṟumi nyi kyakye kui Yesu Kristo, mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Inyi Paulo ngyikyeri msu o Yesu Kristo, chandu Ruwa akundi, ngaṟeia paruo-i na Sositene, mono-wama oṙu,
ko siṟi ya Ruwa ikyeri Korinto. Walya wawailyishe kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo, wawalage wawe wandu wa Ruwa, hamwi na woose wekyeterewa kui rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo orio handu, Mndumii owo na oṙu.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo uwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Ngyiana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu, kyipfa kya isaṟia lya Ruwa muleenengo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Kyipfa kyiiṙi kya orio kyindo mulewa wanjama kyiiṙi kyakye, mbonyinyi tsoose, na wuṟangonyi woose.
Chandu wuṟingyishi wo Kristo wulemanyika konyu;
mṟasa mulauṟe kyienengo kyoose, mochiweṙelyia mnu kyiyeri Ruwa echishukuo Yesu Kristo;
ulya echimukarisha nyoe mṟasa mafurumionyi, kundu mfiri ulya mulawio kye mulewuta kyindo kyiwicho.
Ruwa nekyeafutsia shilya agamba, ulya alemulaga nyoe mukae handu hamwi na Mono-kye, Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu.
Kyasia wana wa wama wako, ngamuterewa, kui rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, nyoe muṙeṙe kyindo kyimwi; maa halawaṙe nduutsano, indi muwaṙe makusaṟo gamwi.
Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama wako, walya wa kanyi ko Kyiloe wangyiwia kye kuwoṙe wuṟiingyi konyu.
Kyasia, kyindo ngyigamba nyi ikyi, kye orio mndu o konyu nekyegamba, “Inyi nyi o ura lo Paulo,” na “Inyi nyi o ura lo Apolo,” na “Inyi nyi o ura lo Kyefa,” na “Inyi nyi o ura lo Kristo.”
Ngyesa Kristo nakyeri shindo shiwi? Ngyesa Paulo nalekapio msalabenyi kyipfa kyanyu? Ang'u ngyesa mulepatiso kui rina lya Paulo?
Ngyiana, kyipfa ngyilepatisa mndu konyu sile Krispo na Gayo-pfo;
mndu alachegamba kye mulepatiso kui rina lyako.
Lyingyi-se ngyilepatisa wandu wa kanyi ko Stefano. Ngoseṟa ya iwo, ngyiichi kokooya ngyilepatisa mndu oose ungyi-pfo.
Kyipfa Kristo alengyiṙuma kundu ngyipatise-pfo, indi ngyionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha; maa chi kui wuṟango wo maṙeṙo-pfo, upfu lo Kristo msalabenyi lulacheewa lo wulya.
Cha kyipfa mbonyi tsa upfu lo Yesu msalabenyi ko walya waiṙeka nyi wutondo, indi soe luikyiṟo luichi kye nyi pfinya ya Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie,
“Ngyechinyamaṟa wuṟango wo walya wawoṙe wuṟango,
na ngyuuṟango tsa walya wawoṙe wuṟango ngyetsilega.”
Nyi kwi awoṙe wuṟango akyeri? Nyi kwi mlosha o mawawaso akyeri? Nyi kwi moende shigaluano akyeri? Ngyesa Ruwa alegaluo wuṟango wo wuyana iwa wutondo-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa wuṟangonyi wo Ruwa, wandu wa wuyana walandeiṙime imanya Ruwa kui wuṟango wokye, Ruwa nalekunda ikyiṟa waiṙikyie Ruwa kui wutondo wo mbonyi tsilya tsilosho.
Cha kyipfa Wayuda wakundi kyiṟingyishio, na Wakyiṟikyi waipfula wuṟango;
indi soe luonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo, alekapio msalabenyi. Ko Wayuda nyi kyindo kyeolotsa mndu, na ko wandu walai Wayuda nyi wutondo;
indi ko walya wekyelago Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi, nyi Kristo, pfinya na wuṟango wo Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa wutondo wo Ruwa wuwoṙe wuṟango ngoseṟa ya wulya wo wandu, na wufofo wo Ruwa wuwoṙe pfinya ngoseṟa ya wulya wo wandu.
Kyipfa, wana wa wama wako, kumbuonyi ilago lyanyu, kye chi wafoi wawoṙe wuṟango wo kyimmbiu-pfo; chi wafoi wawoṙe pfinya-pfo; chi wafoi wawoṙe rina wawalage-pfo.
Indi Ruwa nalesambuṟa matondo ga wuyana nariise sonu wawoṙe wuṟango. Lyingyi-se Ruwa nalesambuṟa shindo shifofo sha wuyana kundu nariise sonu shilya shiwoṙe pfinya.
Lyingyi-se Ruwa nalesambuṟa shindo shifafa sha wuyana na shishimine, yee, shindo shilai pfo, kundu shilya shikyeri pfo shilakae pfo;
orio mndu oose alachekushela mbele ya Ruwa.
Indi kui oe nyoe moiṙima iwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, alefeo koṙu cha wuṟango wuwukyie ko Ruwa, na wusumganyi, na wuele, na wukyiṟo;
kundu chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Ulya aikushela na nakushele kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.”
Kyasia, wana wa wama, kyiyeri ngyilecha na konyu, ngyilecha imuongoya shiṟika sha Ruwa kui maṙeṙo mecha ang'u wuṟango-pfo.
Kyipfa ngyileṙumbuo mrimenyi ngyilamanye kyindo kyoose konyu sile Yesu Kristo, na oe nalekapio msalabenyi.
Na inyi ngyiwekyeri konyu wufofonyi na wuowunyi na iṙeṙema lying'anyi.
Na mbonyi tsako na ilosha lyako lya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kuwei kui maṙeṙo ga wuṟango wokyekuruo ngyuuṟango tsa wandu-pfo, indi kui iloṟa kye Mumuyo o Ruwa naweiṟunda na pfinya,
kundu iiṙikyia lyanyu lyilawe wuṟangonyi wo wandu, indi pfinyenyi tsa Ruwa.
Kyaindi kuwoṙe wuṟango luwuonguoe ko walya wapfulukyie kyimrima; indi chi wuṟango wo wuyana-wu-pfo, maa wo iwo waichilyia wuyana-wu, wekyeilachika-pfo.
Indi lokyeonguo wuṟango wo Ruwa kui kyiṟika, wuṟango wulya wuwuṟikye, wulya Ruwa awekundi luuonguo wookyia mawookyionyi, kundu lung'anyiso.
Wuṟango walya wachilyie wuyana-wu walawuichi maa umwi; kyipfa kokooya wawewuichi, wawechikapia msalabenyi Mndumii o mng'ano-pfo.
Kyaindi, chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Shindo shilya riso lyilaleshiwona,
maa kuṙwi kulaleshiicho (Maa iiṙa na mrimenyi ko mndu),
shindo shilya Ruwa aleṟeyeṟia wamkundi.”
Kyaindi Ruwa nalushukuya soe kui Mumuyo. Kyipfa Mumuyo nekyeruwa-ruwa shoose, maa shindo sha Ruwa shikuokyie-okyie.
Cha kyipfa nyi wui kyiiṙi kya wandu aichi mbonyi tsa wandu sile mrima o mndu ukyeri kyiiṙi kyakye? Na wuṙo na mbonyi tsa Ruwa kuwoṙe atsiichi sile Mumuyo o Ruwa-pfo.
Kyaindi soe luleambilyia mrima o wuyana-pfo, indi Mumuyo awukyie ko Ruwa, kundu luiṙime imanya shilya Ruwa akusaṟie.
Na isho lushionguo, chi kui maṙeṙo gamaloshe kui wuṟango wo kyimndu-pfo, indi gamaloshe nyi Mumuyo, lochitambuluo mbonyi tsa mrimenyi kui maṙeṙo ga mrimenyi.
Kyasia mndu alakyeri o kyimrima ekyeambilyia shindo sha Mumuyo o Ruwa-pfo; cha kyipfa kokye icho nyi wutondo, maa eiṙima ishimanya-pfo, cha kyipfa shekyemanyika kui njia ya kyimrima.
Kyaindi mndu o kyimrima nekyemanya shoose, maa oe kuwoṙe mndu ekyemmanya-pfo.
Kyipfa chandu shiṟeio shiele shigambie, “Nyi wui alemanya kyindo Mndumii akundi, namloshe?” Kyaindi soe luwoṙe makusaṟo ga Kristo, kyipfa lokyekusaṟa cha Kristo.
Kyaindi, wana wa wama wako, inyi ngyileiṙima iṙeṙa na nyoe cha wandu wawoṙe mkaṟo ya kyimrima-pfo, indi cha wandu wawoṙe mkaṟo ya kyimmbiu, cha wana wanangu kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Ngyilemuenenga maruwa, ngyilemuenenga kyelya-pfo; cha kyipfa mulekomokyiiṙima-pfo. Yee, maa wulalu mokyiiṙima-pfo,

cha kyipfa mṟasa wulalu nyoe nyi wandu wa mkaṟo ya kyimmbiu. Kyipfa kokooya konyu kuwoṙe wunyenyi na wuṟiingyi, ngyesa nyoe chi wandu wa mkaṟo ya kyimmbiu-pfoe? Lyingyi-se mokyewuta kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu?
Kyipfa kyiyeri-kyo mndu umwi ekyegamba, “Inyi nyi o ura lo Paulo,” na ungyi, “Inyi nyi o ura lo Apolo,” ngyesa nyoe chi wandu-pfoe?
Kyasia Apolo nyi wui? Na Paulo nyi wui? Nyi waṟundi walya kui wo muleiṙikyia Ruwa na orio mndu chandu Ruwa alemuenenga wuiṙimi.
Inyi ngyilewaaya, Apolo kanyosa; indi mong'anyisa nyi Ruwa.
Koikyo mowaaya chi kyindo-pfo, maa monyosa, indi Ruwa ekyeng'anyisa.
Kyasia ulya mowaaya, na ulya monyosa nyi kyindo kyimwi, kyaindi orio mndu nechiambilyia wori wokye iṙuana na wukyiwa alelya.
Kyipfa soe lukyeri waṟundi hamwi na Ruwa; nyoe nyi ṙema lya Ruwa, nyi numba ya Ruwa.

Iṙuana na isaṟia lya Ruwa ngyileenengo, inyi cha msongoru o wewika numba wawoṙe wuṟango, ngyilewika urende, na mndu ungyi naiwika numba wuye ya urende-lo. Kyaindi orio mndu naambuye chandu aiwika numba wuye ya urende-lo.
Kyipfa urende lungyi kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iluwika, sile nyi lulya lulemmbiko, lukyeri nyi Yesu Kristo-pfo.
Kyaindi kokooya mndu awika numba wuye ya urende-lo, sahapu ang'u heleri ang'u magoe ga woguru, ang'u mashiṙi ang'u maṟa ang'u nyatsi, iṟunda lya orio mndu lyechimanyika na pata.
Kyipfa mfiri ulya o ianduyo ochiloṟa iṟunda-lyo na pata cha kyipfa lyechiloṟo moṙonyi; na moṙo ulya ochiyesha iṟunda lya orio mndu, nyi lya mbaṟe iha.
Iṟunda lya mndu alyiwikyie wuye ya urende-lo lyilanderumatso nyi moṙo, nechiambilyia wori.
Iṟunda lya mndu lyikarumatso nyi moṙo, nechiwaṙa wanda; indi oe nechikyiṟo; kyaindi nyi cha kui moṙo.
Muichi kye nyoe mowa hekalu lya Ruwa, na kye Mumuyo o Ruwa nekyekaa mrimenyi konyu?
Kokooya mndu anyamaṟa hekalu lya Ruwa, Ruwa nechinyamaṟa mndu-cho. Cha kyipfa hekalu lya Ruwa nyi lyiele, nalyo nyi nyoe.
Mndu alakulembe amonyi. Kokooya mndu awona kye nawoṙe wuṟango kyiiṙi kyanyu kunu wuyanenyi, nawe tondo, kundu naiṙime iwa mndu awoṙe wuṟango.
Kyipfa wuṟango wo wuyana-wu nyi wutondo mbele ya Ruwa. Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Oe nyi oe ekyewaṙa wawoṙe wuṟango ngyeṟonyi tsawo.”
Na lyingyi-se, “Mndumii naichi makusaṟo ga wawoṙe wuṟango kye chi ga sungusinyi-pfo.”
Kyasia, mndu oose alakushelyie wandu. Cha kyipfa shoose nyi shanyu;
kye nyi Paulo, ang'u Apolo, ang'u Kyefa; ang'u wuyana, ang'u moo, ang'u upfu; ang'u shindo shilya shikyeri pfo wulalu, ang'u shilya shekoshikyeri pfo ipfo-ndu luiyenda; shoose nyi shanyu.
Na nyoe nyi wandu wa Kristo, na Kristo nyi o Ruwa.
Mndu naluwone kye lukyeri waṟundi wa Kristo, na wandu Ruwa awaenengyie iṟunda lyeonguo wuloi wokye wukuṟiikyie.
Iho-se kyindo kyikyikunde waṟundinyi wa mbaṟe-i nyi mndu naafutsie kyilya ateṟie.
Kyaindi koko inyi chi kyindo maa ale nyoe mukongyianduya-pfo, maa kui ianduya lya kyimndu, maa ngyianduya mrima oko-pfo.
Kyipfa ngyiwoṙe kyimaṙuma kyewona kye ngyiwoṙe wuwicho mrimenyi koko-pfo, kyaindi ngyiwono kye ngyiwoṙe wusumganyi kyipfa kya ikyo-pfo; indi ekyengyianduya inyi nyi Mndumii.

Kyasia nyoe mulangyianduye kye ngyimmbicho kyipfa kya kyindo kyoose kyiyeri kyilashika, mṟasa ilyi Mndumii echicha; ulya echiloṟa shilya shikuṟiikyie meemenyi, na iloṟa makusaṟo gakyeri mrimenyi; nyi lyo-ndu orio mndu echiwona kyiṟumi kyakye ko Ruwa.

Kyasia, wandu muiṙikyie Ruwa, shindo-shi ngashiwuta kui mfano o inyi na Apolo kyipfa kyanyu, kundu kye kui mfano oṙu muiṙime ikulosha shilya shishiṟeie; kundu umwi onyu alakushele kyipfa kya ichu, na imina oṙoe.
Kyipfa nyi wui echiloṟa chandu ulafananyi na ungyi? Na iyoe nuwoṙe kyikyi ulaikyiambilyia? Kyaindi kokooya nuleambilyia, nuikushelyia kyi kye uleambilyia-pfo?
Momuiguṙa, momuwona wunjama, momchilyia soe lulakyeri ho. Yee, ngyesa muweichilyia, kundu soe na soe luchilyie hamwi na nyoe!
Kyipfa ngakusaṟa kye Ruwa nalelusambuṟa soe wasu mafurumionyi, cha wandu wawaanduye wawoogo; cha kyipfa lowa kyindo kyesetsa wandu; ko malaika na wandu.
Soe luwatondo kyipfa kya Kristo, kyaindi nyoe muwoṙe wuṟango kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Soe luwafofo, kyaindi nyoe muwoṙe pfinya; nyoe muwoṙe kyiṟumi, indi soe luindio-pfo.
Maa kyiyeri kya wulalu, luwoṙo nyi njaa na nyoṙa, lukyeri kyiṟanguoe, lukapo nzina, lyingyi-se luwoṙe kanyi-pfo.
Lya wueṟa luilya wukyiwa lochiṟunda kui mawoko gaṙu luwenyi. Lukolahiyo lokyewikyia mboṟa, lukowihiṟo lokyekarishia;
lukoirio sha wongo lokyeṙeṙa kya wandu necha. Lowa cha mboshia tsa wuyana na shindo shoose shishilege mṟasa inu.
Ngyimuṟeia ishi kundu ngyimuendie wusutsu-pfo; indi imtutuma cha wana ngyiwakundi.
Cha kyipfa maa kokooya muwoṙe walosha shiku ikumi kyiiṙi kya Kristo muwoṙe waawu wafoi-pfo. Kyipfa inyi ngyilemfee kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu kui njia ya Ndumi Ngyicha.
Kyasia, ngamterewa mungyioshe inyi.

Kyipfa kya ikyo ngaṙuma Timoteo konyu, akyeri mono-ko mkunde, ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, echimukumbuṟa njia tsako tsoose tsikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo, chandu ngyekyelosha orio handu kyiiṙi kya orio siṟi.
Kyasia wengyi walekushela cha ilyi ngyilaicha na konyu.
Kyaindi ngyechicha iwinyi, kokooya ngaringo, na inyi ngyechimanya, chi shindo sha walya walekushela tupu-pfo, indi na pfinya tsawo.
Cha kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwa wokyeloṟo moonyi ya wandu kui shilya waiwuta kuta kui shilya waiṙeṙa.
Mukundi kuṙa? Ngyiche na konyu na msengye, ang'u ngyiche ikundenyi na mrimenyi o wuhoo?
Kuwoṙe mbonyi tsiṙeṙo orio handu kye konyu kuwoṙe wuṟui, wuṟui wo mbaṟe ilakyeri maa ko walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa, kye mndu nakae na mka o awuye.
Na nyoe mokyekushela, maa mokyewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi-pfo, kye nawuto konyu ulya awuta kyindo kya mbaṟe-yo.
Cha kyipfa loi, ngyilakyeri konyu kyimmbiu, kyaindi ngyikyeri konyu kyimrima, inyi ngyimonyi ngamwanduya ulya awuta kyindo-kyo, cha ilyi ngyikyeri pfo.
Rinenyi lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu, nyoe musanzie handu hamwi na mrima oko, hamwi na wuiṙimi wo Mndumii oṙu Yesu;
iṙambika Satana mndu-cho, kundu mmbiu ulyiso wukyiwa, kundu na mrima ukyiṟo mfiri ulya Mndumii Yesu echicha.
Ikushela lyanyu chi kyindo kyicha-pfo. Muichi kye chachu kyitung'tu yekyetarang'isha itongye lyoose?
Kyasia, kusanjenyi, muwute chachu iya ya kacha, muiṙime iwa itongye lyihya, muwe cha mulawawikye chachu. Cha kyipfa Kristo, Kyiondo kyaṙu kya mṟumoe o Pasaka amṙaso.
Kyasia luwaṙe mṟumoe, chi kui chachu ya kacha-pfo, maa kui chachu ya wuwicho-pfo, indi kui shindo shilechitarang'ia, nyiwo wuilyi wo mrima na wuloi.
Ngyilemuṟeia kyiiṙi kya paruo-i, kye mulakusanze-sanze na waṟui.
Ngyigamba maa mulakusanze-sanze maa ale na waṟui wa wuyana-wu-pfo, ang'u na wawoṙe wulanga, ang'u na wasokyi, ang'u na wekyeindia mafano-pfo; kyipfa kuṙo muwaṟi iwuka wuyanenyi.

Kyaindi, chandu mbonyi tsikyeri, ngyilemuṟeia kye mulakusanze-sanze na mndu oose ekyegamba oe nyi mndu aiṙikyie Ruwa, kokooya nyi mṟui ang'u nawoṙe wulanga ang'u nekyeindia mafano ang'u nekyelahia ang'u nekyenango ang'u msokyi; mndu o mbaṟe-i mulaiṙikyie maa ilya na oe.
Kyipfa kyingyiwaṟi kuṙa ianduya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa? Nyoe mokyeanduya walya waiṙikyie Ruwa-pfoe?
Kyaindi walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa, oe amonyi nechiwaanduya. Nyoe wutenyi ulya mmbicho kyiiṙi kyanyu.
Ngyesa kokooya kuwoṙe mndu konyu awoṙe moondu na oṙoe nekaria iṙuo moondu-cho mbele ya wandu walawasumganyi, na chi mbele ya wandu wa Ruwa-pfo?
Ang'u muichi kye wandu wa Ruwa wechianduya wandu wa wuyana? Na kokooya wandu wa wuyana wechianduyo nyi nyoe, ngyesa muwaṟi ianduya maa shindo shitutu-pfoe?
Muichi kye lochianduya maa malaika-pfoe? Na kokooya nyi wuṙo chi loiṙima ngoseṟa ianduya shindo sha iha wuyanenyi-pfoe?
Kyasia, mukyeri handu heṙeṙia moondu ya iha wuyanenyi, mokyewika walya walawoṙe kyiira siṟinyi iwa weṙumbuo moondu yanyu?
Ngyigamba kuṙo ngyiiṙime imuriisa sonu. Ngyesa nyi wuṙo, kye konyu kuwoṙe maa mndu umwi awoṙe wuṟango eiṙima iṙumbuo moondu o wana wa wamae?
Indi mokyeṙuana mengyenyi, wandu muiṙikyie Ruwa, mbele ya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
Kyasia nyi wufafa wung'anyi konyu kye muṙuana mengyenyi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi. Kyipfa chi nanga iilamo-pfoe? Kyipfa chi necha isoko masaa ganyu-pfoe?
Indi kyilaṙuṙanyi na ikyo mokyeilama wandu na iwasoka masaa gawo; yee, maa wana wa wama wanyu.
Ang'u muichi kye wandu wawicho wechioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo? Maa mulakulembe. Waṟui wechioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo. Maa wekyeindia mafano, maa wekyewuta shindo shiwicho na wandu wa nguwo tsawo,
maa mbafu, maa wawoṙe wulanga, maa wekyenango, maa wekyelahia, maa wasokyi.
Na waata kyiiṙi kyanyu wawekyeri wandu wa mbaṟe-i; kyaindi mulesanjo, kyaindi muleilyisho, kyaindi muletalo kye muwasumganyi rinenyi lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, na Mumuyonyi o Ruwa oṙu.
Ngyiwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose ngyikundi, kyaindi chi shoose shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo. Ngyiwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose, kyaindi inyi ngyechiwa mtumo o kyindo kyoose-pfo.

Shelya shiwaṟi ikaa ndewunyi, na ndewu iwaṟi iwaṙa shelya; kyaindi Ruwa nechinyamaṟa shoose shishiwi, ndewu na shelya. Kyaindi mmbiu uwaṟi iwa o wuṟui-pfo indi o iṟundia Mndumii, na nyi Mndumii ekyeembeṟa mmbiu.
Na Ruwa naleṟutsa Mndumii, na lyingyi-se nechiluṟutsa soe kui wuiṙimi wokye.
Ngyesa muichi kye mmbiu yanyu nyi shiwungo sha Kristo-pfoe? Kyasia ngyiwute shiwungo sha Kristo na ishigaluo sha iṟai? Ote!
Ang'u muichi kye ulya amlungye na iṟai nakyeri mmbiu umwi na oe? Kyipfa shiṟeio shiele shigambie, “Iwo wawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi.”
Kyaindi ulya amlungye na Mndumii nakyeri kyindo kyimwi na oe mrimenyi kokye.
Kaenyi kuleshi na wuṟui. Orio ṙeko mndu ekyewuta nyi nja ya mmbiu okye; indi ulya awuta shindo sha wuṟui nawuta kyindo kyechinyamaṟa mmbiu okye amonyi.
Ang'u muichi kye mmbiu yanyu nyi hekalu lya Mumuyo Mweele akyeri mrimenyi konyu, muleenengo nyi Ruwa-pfoe? Maa nyoe chi masaa ganyu muwenyi-pfo;
kyipfa muleguṟo kui woguru wung'anyi. Kyasia wulalu, ṟumishenyi Ruwa kui mmbiu yanyu.
Kyasia ko mbonyi tsa shindo shilya mulengyiṟeia, nyi necha mndu msoṟo alaalyikye.
Kyaindi kyipfa kya wuṟui orio mndu msoṟo nawaṙe mka okye amonyi, na orio mndu mka nawaṙe mii okye amonyi.
Mii naenengye mka okye kyilya kyimmbaṟi, na wuṙo na mka naenengye mii okye kyilya kyimmbaṟi.
Mka eiṙima igamba kye mmbiu okye nyi okye amonyi-pfo, indi mmbiu okye nyi o mii okye. Na wuṙo mii alechiiṙima igamba kye mmbiu okye nyi okye amonyi, indi mmbiu okye nyi o mka okye.
Maa mulaimane, sile kofia kyiyeri moiṙikyiana ko kyiyeri kyifuhi, kundu muwone ṙaawa lyeterewa Ruwa; mukooyane-se kyimmbiu, Satana alachemuyesha kyipfa kya iuṟa meena.
Kyaindi ngyigamba isho, iloṟa makusaṟo gako tikyi, na chi kui imuitika-pfo.
Indi kyindo ngyikundi nyi kye wandu woose wawe chandu inyi ngyikyeri. Kyaindi orio mndu nawoṙe kyienengo kyakye amonyi kyiwukyie ko Ruwa, ichu kuṙi na ichu kuṙi.
Kyaindi ngawia walya walandealyikye, na wakusu, nyi nanga wakae chandu inyi ngyikyeri.
Kyaindi kokooya walechiiṙima ikarishia, waalyikye; kyipfa nyi nanga ialyika kuta iwaṙa lango.
Kyaindi walya walemualyika, ngawawia; maa iho chi inyi-pfo indi nyi Mndumii; mka alalekane na mii okye;
kyaindi kokooya nalekana na oe, maa alaalyiko, ang'u naiṙikyiane na mii okye; lyingyi-se mii alaṙe mka okye.
Kyaindi wandu wengyi ngawawia inyi, maa chi Mndumii-pfo; kye kokooya mndu aiṙikyie Ruwa nawoṙe mka alaiṙikyie Ruwa, na mka-cho nakundi ikaa na oe, alalekane na oe.
Na mndu mka, awoṙe mii alaiṙikyie Ruwa, na mii-cho nakundi ikaa na oe, alalekane na mii okye.

Cha kyipfa mii ulya alaiṙikyie Ruwa nekyeendo na ko wandu wa Ruwa kui njia ya isanzo na mka okye, na mka alaiṙikyie Ruwa nekyewa kyiwungo kya wandu wa Ruwa kui njia ya mii okye. Kokooya kyilawekyeri kuṙo, wana wanyu wawechiwa wana wa wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa o loi; kyaindi wulalu nyi wandu wa Ruwa.

Kyaindi ulya alaiṙikyie Ruwa kakunda ilekana na ulya aiṙikyie Ruwa, kyikuwiie kuṙo. Iho mii ang'u mka aiṙikyie Ruwa neiṙima iwuta chandu akunda. Wakulekanie ko ufoṟo kyipfa Ruwa nalelulaga luwe wandu wa ufoṟo.
Cha kyipfa nomanya kuṙa, iyoe mndu mka, kokooya nochikyiṟa mii opfo? Ang'u nomanya kuṙa, iyoe mndu msoṟo, kokooya nochikyiṟa mka opfo?
Kyaindi chandu Ruwa alegawia orio mndu, na chandu Ruwa alelaga orio mndu, nawute kuṙo. Nyi wuṙo ngawia siṟi tsoose.
Ngyesa mndu mlyiwe alelago amṙino-pfoe? Alawe cha ilyi alamṙine. Mndu mlyiwe nalelago alaṙino? Kyasia alaṙino.
Iṙino chi kyindo-pfo, na iṙa iṙino chi kyindo-pfo; kying'anyi nyi iosha mawawaso ga Ruwa.
Orio mndu nakae chandu awei lyilya alelago.
Ngyesa nulelago uwe mtumo? Maa ulawone nyi kyiwicho. Kyaindi koiṙima iwa cha mndu alaichilyio nyi kyindo, wa cha mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo.
Cha kyipfa ulya alelago kyiiṙi kya Mndumii ai cha mtumo, icho ai mtumo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii-pfo. Na wuṙo ulya alelago alai mtumo, icho nyi mtumo o Kristo.
Muleguṟo kui woguru; maa mulawe watumo wa wandu.
Wana wa wama wako, orio mndu nakae mbele ya Ruwa akyeri chandu awei lyilya alelago.
Ko mbonyi tsa walya walawaalyikye na walaalyikyie Mndumii angyiwiie kyindo kyoose-pfo, kyaindi ngyigamba kya makusaṟo gako inyi ngyimonyi, inyi ngyileenengo isaṟia lya Mndumii iwa mndu msimiri.
Kyasia, ngyiwonyi nyi necha, kyipfa kya wukyiwa wukyeri pfo, kye nyi necha mndu nakae chandu akyeri.
Ngyesa numlungye tapu na mka opfo? Maa ulakunde iletsano. Numletsane? Maa ulapfule mka.
Kyaindi kokooya oalyika onyamaṟa-pfo; maa mana o kyika kaalyiko anyamaṟa-pfo. Kyaindi wandu cha iwo mmbiu yawo yechiwalyisa wukyiwa; na inyi ngyikundi iwashingyia walalye wukyiwa.
Kyaindi, wana wa wama, ngagamba kuṙi, kyiyeri kyitsugai kyikyileshi-pfo. Kyasia wookyia wulalu walya wawoṙe waka wawe cha ilyi walawoṙe;
na walya wailyia cha ilyi walailyia; na walya waichihiyo cha ilyi walaichihiyo; na walya waiguṟa cha ilyi walawoṙe kyindo.
Na walya wekyekuwinisha na wuyana cha ilyi walaikuwinisha mnu na wuyana; kyipfa shindo sha wuyana-wu shiiṙa.
Kyaindi ngyikundi kulawaṙe shindo shemuṟaisha. Ulya alaalyikyie nekyekuwinisha na shindo sha Mndumii, nachihiṟe kuṙa Mndumii;
indi ulya aalyikyie nekyekuwinisha na shindo sha wuyana-wu, chandu echihiṟa mka okye.

Lyingyi-se mana o kyika chi kyimwi na mndu mka mwalyikye-pfo. Ulya alamwalyikye nekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa Mndumii, naiṙime iwa mweele kyimmbiu na kyimrima. Kyaindi ulya amwalyikye nekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wuyana-wu, chandu echichihiṟa mii okye.
Ngagamba isho kundu ngyimuenengye kyiira, chi kye ngyimuoṟowie kyigowo-pfo indi kyipfa kya shilya shichihiṟie, lyingyi-se muiṙime iṟundia Ruwa kulawoṙe shindo shingyi shimkuruo nyoe.

Kyaindi mndu oose kawona kye aiiṙima ikarishia mbele ya ulya akundi imwalyika-pfo, kokooya lango tsakye tsa mmbiu tsing'anyi, na nyi wuṙo kyiwaṟi iwa, nawute chandu akundi; waalyikane, kuwoṙe wuwicho-pfo.
Kyaindi ulya alawoṙe lango, aichi ikarishia na ikuringa, kuwoṙe mndu aimwitika ialyika-pfo. Lyingyi-se kokooya mrimenyi kokye nakusaṟie ikaa na oe cha mndu akundi imwalyika, nechiwuta necha.
Kyasia aalyika ulya akundi imwalyika nawuta necha, na ulya akuringa alaalyikye nawuta necha ngoseṟa.
Mndu mka namlungye tapu na mii okye kyiyeri mii okye ai na moo; kyaindi kokooya mii okye apfa, neiṙima ialyiko na mndu oose amkundi; kyiiṙi kya Mndumii tupu.
Kyaindi nanga oe kakaa chandu akyeri. Nyi wuṙo ngyiwonyi inyi; na inyi ngakusaṟa kye inyi ngyiwoṙe Mumuyo o Ruwa.
Na mbonyi tsa shindo shaṙasio mafano, luichi kye soe loose luwoṙe wuṟango. Wuṟango wokyeende makushelo, indi ikunda lyekyekarisha iiṙikyia.
Mndu kakusaṟa kye naichi kyindo, aichi kyindo kyoose chandu kyimmbaṟi imanya-pfo.
Kyaindi mndu kakunda Ruwa, icho Ruwa namwichi.
Kyasia ko mbonyi tsa ilya shindo shaṙasio mafano; luichi kye ifano chi kyindo kunu wuyanenyi-pfo, na kye kuwoṙe Ruwa ungyi sile umwi tupu-pfo.
Cha kyipfa maa chandu kuwoṙe wekyelago waruwa, ruwewu ang'u wuyanenyi, chandu kuwoṙe waruwa wafoi na wandumii wafoi;

kyaindi koṙu soe Ruwa nyi umwi tupu, akyeri Awu, ulya shindo shoose shiwukyie kokye, na soe lokyekaa kokye. Kuwoṙe na Mndumii umwi Yesu Kristo, ulya kui oe shindo shoose shilegumbo, na soe lulegumbo kui oe.

Indi wuṟango-wu wukyeri ko wandu woose-pfo. Kyaindi wengyi kui iichiwia ifano lyilya wekyelya cha ilyi nyi kyindo kyikyiṙasie mafano, wuṟango wowo wo imanya kyicha na kyiwicho wuwufofo, na wekyefana kyimṟumoe.
Kyaindi kyelya kyekyeluṙuo mbele ya Ruwa-pfo; kyipfa lulalye losoko kyindo-pfo; maa lukolya loengyeṟio kyindo-pfo.
Kyaindi ambuyenyi wuiṙimi-wu wonyu wo iwuta kyoose mokunda wulachetewe walya wafafa wanyamaṟe.

Cha kyipfa mndu kakuwona iyoe uwoṙe wuṟango, ochilya kyelya hekalunyi lya ifano, ngyesa wuiṙimi wokye wo imanya kyicha na kyiwicho, kookoya namfofo, kyechimanyika mṟasa oe nalye shindo shishiṙasie mafano-pfoe?
Na ulya amfofo nechirumatso kui wuṟango wopfo, na oe nyi mndu Kristo alepfa kyipfa kyakye.
Koikyo mukotewe wana wa wama wanyu wakanyamaṟa, na inyamaṟa wuiṙimi wufofo wo manya kyicha na kyiwicho, monyamaṟia Kristo.
Koikyo kyelya kyikatewe mono-wama oko nanyamaṟe, loi ngyechilya nyama mṟasa mlungana-pfo, ngyilachetewe mono-wama oko nanyamaṟe.
Ngyesa inyi chi mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo kyoose-pfoe? Inyi chi msu-pfoe? Inyi ngyilewona Yesu Mndumii oṙu-pfoe? Nyoe chi kyilyimu kya inyi iṟundia Mndumii-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa kokooya inyi ngyilakyeri msu ko wandu wengyi, nyi msu konyu nyoe; cha kyipfa nyoe muwalungye na Mndumii kyaloṟa na pata kye inyi nyi msu.
Ikyo nyikyo kyindo ngagaluo ko walya waingyiwesa.
Ngyesa luwoṙe wuiṙimi wo ilya na inyo-pfoe?
Luwoṙe wuiṙimi wo iṙuo hamwi na soe mka mkristiano, cha wasu-wo wengyi na wana wa wama wa Mndumii na Kyefa-pfoe?
Ang'u ngyesa, nyi inyi ngyimonyi na Barinaba lulawoṙe wuiṙimi wo iṟunda?
Nyi asikari uha ekyeyenda shiṙenyi kyiyeri kyoose kulawoṙe ienengo wori? Nyi wui ekyewaaya sabibu alekyelya ndunda tsa kyilya awaaya? Ang'u nyi wui ekyelyisa shima alekyenyo maruwa ga shima shilya?
Ngyesa ngyigamba isho kyipfa kya wuiṙimi wo kyimndu? Ang'u uwawaso lokyegamba isho-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa mawawasonyi ga Mose kyikyiṟeie, “Umbe ikutarama iṟunda ulaiime ilya.” Ngyesa iho Ruwa nekyeambuya mbonyi tsa umbe?
Ang'u naigamba kuṙo kyipfa kyaṙu? Yee, shileṟeio kyipfa kyaṙu; kyipfa ulya ekyeṙema nawaṟi iṙema kulawoṙe ipfiio nyi mṙoe; na ulya aihuo shindo nawaṟi ienengo ṙombo lyakye.
Kokooya soe lulemuṙongyia shindo sha kyimrima, ngyesa nyi kyindo kying'anyi lukosambuo shindo shanyu sha kyimmbiu?

Kokooya wandu wengyi wawoṙe ugawi kyiiṙi kya wuiṙimi-wu, soe chi ngoseṟa-pfoe? Indi lulekuwinisha iiṙia kyindo kyoose iwuka konyu-pfo. Lulekarishia shindo shoose lulacheshingyia Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Yesu Kristo.
Muichi kye walya wekyeṟunda maṟunda ga hekalunyi wekyelya shindo sha hekalu, na walya wekyeṟundia shindo alyitaṟenyi wawoṙe ṙombo lyawo shindonyi sha alyitaṟe?
Na Mndumii wuṙo nagambie kye walya wekyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha waenengo kando kawo ipfo Nduminyi Ngyicha.
Kyaindi inyi ngyilewuta shindo-sho maa kyimwi-pfo. Maa ngyiṟeia isho kundu kyiwe kuṙo koko-pfo; kyipfa nanga ngapfa kuta mndu oose igamba kye ikushela lyako chi lya sungusinyi-pfo.
Kyipfa maa kokooya ngyekyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, ngyiwoṙe kyindo kyeiṙima ingyienenga ikushela-pfo; kyipfa Ruwa nangyiwiie ngyiwute kuṙo. Lyingyi-se ochia loko ngyilandeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
Kyipfa ngaṟunda iṟunda-lyi kulawoṙe iitiko ngyiwoṙe wori; indi kokooya nyi kui iitiko, Ruwa nangyisambuṟie ngyiringye iṟunda lyakye.
Kyasia wori woko nyi kyikyi? Nyi iwu, kye kyiyeri ngyionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, ngyechiwuta kuṙo kulawoṙe itosa kyindo, kyaindi kui iṟunda necha na wuiṙimi woko ngyiwoṙe Nduminyi Ngyicha.
Kyipfa, maa chandu ngyilakyeri mtumo o mndu oose, ngyekyekugaluo cha ilyi ngyikyeri mtumo o wandu woose, kundu ngyigalutsie ura lo Yesu wandu wafoi ngoseṟa.

Ngyiwekyeri cha Myuda ko Wayuda, kundu ngyigalutsie Wayuda ura lo Yesu. Ko walya wakyeri wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso, ngyilewa cha ilyi ngyichilyio nyi mawawaso (maa chandu inyi ngyimonyi ngyilamchilyie nyi mawawaso), kundu ngyigalutsie ura lo Yesu walya wakyeri wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso.

Ko walya walawoṙe mawawaso ngyilewa cha ngyilawoṙe mawawaso (chi kye ngyilawoṙe mawawaso mbele ya Ruwa-pfo, indi ngyiwoṙe mawawaso mbele ya Kristo), kundu ngyigalutsie ura lo Yesu walya walawoṙe mawawaso.
Ko wafofo ngyilewa mfofo, kundu ngyigalutsie wafofo ura lo Yesu. Ngyilewa orio kyindo ko wandu woose, kundu kui njia tsoose ngyiiṙime ikyiṟa wandu.
Na inyi ngyekyewuta shindo shoose kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha kundu ngyikae handu hamwi na wandu wengyi.
Ngyesa muichi kye walya wekyeṙicha, wekyekapa mteeṟa woose, kyaindi ekyeambilyia iṟikoso nyi umwi-pfoe? Kapenyi mteeṟa kuṙo kundu muenengo iṟikoso.
Na orio mndu ekyeṙicha nekyekuima shindo shifoi. Kyasia iwo wekyewuta kuṙo kundu waambilyie iṟikoso lyekyenyamaṟika; indi soe lokyeambilyia iṟikoso lyilekyenyamaṟika.
Maa inyi ngyiṙicha kuṙo, chi cha mndu alawoṙe kundu aiṙicha napfo-pfo. Ngyikapana nzina wuṙo, chi cha mndu aikapa kyindo kyilakyeri ho-pfo;
indi ngyilyisa mmbiu oko wukyiwa na iuwinisha; kyilacheewa, ngamuongoya wandu wengyi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, inyi ngyiwe mndu molego.
Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama, ngyikundi mulemo imanya kye waku waṙu wawekyeri woose wanda ya ipuchi; woose wakaiṙa ipalyipalyinyi.
Woose wakapatiso wawe wa Mose ipuchinyi na ipalyipalyinyi.
Woose wakalya kyelya kyilya kyilya kya mrima.
Woose wakanyo kyindo kyilya kyilya kya mrima; cha kyipfa walenyo iwuka kulya iṟaṟenyi lyilewaosha; na iṟaṟa-lyo lyiwei nyi Kristo.
Kyaindi wafoi kyiiṙi kyawo, walechihiṟa Ruwa-pfo, koikyo wakarumatso nukyenyi ngyuumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.
Kyasia shindo-shi shiwekyeri mfano koṙu, kundu soe lulawe wandu welanga shindo shiwicho, chandu walya nawo walelanga.
Maa mulawe weindia mafano, chandu wengyi nawo wawekyeri; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Wandu waleṙamia ilya na inyo, na numa ya iho wakagoṟoka wateme.”
Maa lulawute shindo sha wuṟui, chandu wandu wengyi wawo walewuta, wakapfa mfiri umwi wandu shiku makumi gawi na shiṟaaṟu.
Maa lulayeshe Mndumii, chandu wengyi wawo walemyesha, wakaumaṙo nyi njoka.
Maa lulanunuwe, chandu wengyi wawo walenunuwa, wakarumatso nyi malaika o upfu.
Kyasia shindo-sho shilewutika kowo kui mfano, shikaṟeio kundu shiluikyimbie soe, wa shiyeri-shi shikyeri kufuhi na mafurumionyi.
Koikyo akusaṟie kye nagoṟokyi naambuye necha alaolokye.

Nyoe muleyesho, sile kyiyesho kyilya kyekyecha na ko wandu woose-pfo. Indi Ruwa nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia. Ruwa ulya alechimuṙa nyoe muyesho kuta wuiṙimi wonyu. Kyaindi hamwi na kyiyesho kyilya nechiwika na moongo o fumia, kundu muiṙime ikarishia.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, wakunde wako, kushowenyi na iindia mafano.
Ngyigamba kuṙo kyipfa ngyiṙeṙa na wandu waṟango. Ngyimuitika iiṙikyia ishi ngyigamba-pfo; indi kusaṟenyi nyoe muwenyi.
Kyiṙoo kyilya kya kyilaayo kyiele lokyeana Ruwa kyipfa kyakyo chi samu ya Kristo lokyeinyo handu hamwi-pfoe? Mkate ulya lokyeupeṟenguo, chi mmbiu o Kristo lokyeulya handu hamwi-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa mkate nyi umwi, soe lui wafoi lukyeri mmbiu umwi; cha kyipfa soe loose lokyeambilyia kyifunjoe kya mkate umwi.
Wonenyi Waisiraelyi-wo chandu wawekyeri mbaṟe ya mmbiu; walya wekyelya shiṙaso. Ngyesa wekyeikanana shiṙaso-pfoe?
Kyasia ngyigambe kyi? Kye kyilya kyaṙasio mafano nyi kyindo? Ang'u kye mafano nyi kyindo?
Chi wuṙo-pfo, kyaindi shindo shoose wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu wekyeṙasa wekyeshienenga waṟufui wa Satana, maa chi Ruwa-pfo; na inyi ngyikundi muṟundie masatana-pfo.
Moiṙima inyo kyindo iwuka kyiṙoonyi kya Mndumii na kyiṙoonyi kya waṟufui wa Satana-pfo.
Ang'u lokusaṟa loiṙima imina Ruwa lulechiolotsio ngapo? Ngyesa luwoṙe pfinya kuta oe?
Kuwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose, indi chi shoose shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo. Kuwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose, indi chi shoose shekyetarama siṟi-pfo.
Mndu alapfule kyiira kyakye amonyi, indi kyiira kya oṙoe.
Orio kyindo kyekyekumbo sangaṙa lyenyi kulawoṙe iwesa-wesa; maa mulaikulyisa wukyiwa mrimenyi kui ikusaṟa nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho.
Kyipfa, “Wuyana nyi isaa lya Mndumii na shoose shikyeri pfo.”

Na mndu alaiṙikyie Ruwa kakunda muyende kanyi kokye, na nyoe mukokunda iyenda, lyenyi orio kyindo moenengo kulawoṙe iwesa-awesa; maa mulaikulyisa wukyiwa mrimenyi kui ikusaṟa nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho.
Kyaindi mndu kammbia, “Kyindo-kyi kyawuto kyiwe kyiṙaso,” maa mulalye, kyipfa kya ulya ammbia na kyipfa kya makusaṟo ga mrimenyi, nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho;

chi kyipfa kyapfo-pfo indi kyipfa kya icho ungyi ammbia mbonyi-tso. Kyipfa kulya inyi iwa mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo kulaanduyo nyi makusaṟo ga mndu kye nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho. Chi kyipfa kyapfo-pfo indi kyipfa kya ulya ungyi ammbia mbonyi-tso. Kyipfa kulya inyi iwa mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo kuleanduyo nyi makusaṟo ga mndu kye nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho.
Kokooya inyi ngawona kyitumbuṟe kyako kya isaṟia, kyitewe ngyilahiyo ny'kyi?
Kyasia, kyiyeri muilya, ang'u muinyo, ang'u muiwuta kyindo kyoose, wutenyi kuṙo kui ienenga Ruwa kyiṟumi.
Maa mulatewe Wayuda maa Wakyiṟikyi maa siṟi ya Ruwa wawute kyindo kyiwicho.
Nyi wuṙo chandu inyi ngyekyechihiṟa wandu woose shindonyi shoose, ngyilalepfula kyiira kyako ngyimonyi, indi kyiira kya wandu wafoi, kundu wakyiṟo.
Ngyioshenyi chandu na inyi ngyekyeosha Kristo.
Kyasia ngyimuiring'isha nyoe, cha kyipfa mulengyikumbuo shindonyi shoose, na nyoe muleosha shilya muleambilyia ko waku wanyu wuṙo chandu ngyilemuenengyia shilya ngyileambilyia.
Kyaindi ngyikundi mumanye kye msongoru o mndu msoṟo nyi Kristo, na msongoru o mndu mka nyi mndu msoṟo, na msongoru o Kristo nyi Ruwa.
Orio mndu msoṟo kyiyeri aiterewa Ruwa, ang'u kyiyeri aiṙeṙa mbele ya wandu, na oe namshikyie mṙoe, nairiisa mṟoe okye sonu.
Indi orio mndu mka kyiyeri aiterewa Ruwa, ang'u kyiyeri aiṙeṙa mbele ya wandu, mṙoe okye ulamshikyie, nairiisa mṙoe okye sonu; cha kyipfa nyi kyimwi na ulya ammbute njui.
Kyipfa mndu mka alandeshikyio nawuto njui. Ang'u kokooya nyi sonu mndu mka iwuto njui tsakye ang'u iṟemo nashikyio.
Kyipfa loi mndu msoṟo awaṟi ishikyio mṙoe-pfo, kyipfa oe nyi mfano o mng'ano o Ruwa. Kyaindi mndu mka nyi mng'ano o mndu msoṟo.
Kyipfa mndu msoṟo alewuto ko mndu mka chandu mndu mka alewuto ko mndu msoṟo-pfo.
Maa mndu msoṟo alegumbo kyipfa kya mndu mka chandu mndu mka alegumbo kyipfa kya mndu msoṟo-pfo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo mndu mka nawaṟi ishikyia mṙoe okye iloṟa kye namwenengye momu o wuta shilya malaika wekyeambuya.
Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kuwoṙe mndu mka kulawoṙe mndu msoṟo-pfo; maa kuwoṙe mndu msoṟo kulawoṙe mndu mka-pfo.
Kyipfa chandu mndu mka alewuka ko mndu msoṟo, na wuṟo mndu msoṟo na oe nekyefeo nyi mndu mka; na shindo shoose shiwukyie ko Ruwa. Anduyenyi nyoe muwenyi mrimenyi konyu.
Ngyesa kyichihiṟie mndu mka naterewe Ruwa mṙoe okye ulamshikyie?
Ngyesa chandu mndu amugumbe kyimlosha kye mndu msoṟo kawaṙa njui tsileshi nyi sonu kokye-pfoe?
Kyaindi mndu mka kawaṙa njui tsileshi nyi kyiṟumi kokye. Cha kyipfa namwenengye njui-tso tsileshi kundu tsikae handu ha nguwo.
Kyaindi mndu oose kakunda iende wuṟiingyi, soe luwoṙe mkaṟo cha iyo-pfo, maa siṟi tsa Ruwa.
Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya immbia ishi, ngyimuiṟing'isha nyoe-pfo, kyipfa kyiyeri-kyo mokyesanzia handu hamwi mokyewuta kuṙo kyipfa kya wucha-pfo indi kyipfa kya wuwicho.
Cha kyipfa kuwooka kyiyeri mokyesanzia handu hamwi cha siṟi ngyiichuoe kye mukyeri kyindo kyimwi-pfo; na inyi ngyiiṙikyie ikyo piu-pfo;
cha kyipfa kyiwaṟi konyu kuwaṙe iṙeṙa wongo; kundu walya wawalage loi wamanyikye konyu.
Kyasia kyiyeri mosanzia handu hamwi moiṙima ilya kyilaayo kya Mndumii-pfo;
cha kyipfa orio umwi nekyesonguo iwuta kyelya kyakye kyiiṙi kya ilya-lyo; mṟasa kyikawa ichu nawoṙo nyi njaa na ichu namnanzi.

Ngyesa muwoṙe numba yelyiia kyelya kya Mndumii na yenyooya shindo shenanza-pfoe? Ang'u mumina Siṟi ya Mndumii, na iriisa sonu iwo walawoṙe kyindo? Ngyimmbie? Ngyimuiring'ishe nyoe? Ote! Ngyimuiring'isha kyipfa kya isho-pfo.
Cha kyipfa inyi ngyileambilyia ko Mndumii shilya ngyilemuenenga nyoe. Kye Mndumii Yesu kyio kyilya aleṟiingo naleira mkate,
na oe amwane Ruwa kaupeṟenguo, kagamba, “Ichu nyi mmbiu oko ummbute kyipfa kyanyu; wutenyi kuṙi kui ingyikumbuo inyi.”
Na wuṙo numa ya ilya kaira kyiṙoo, echigamba, “Kyiṙoo-kyi nyi mma mhya samunyi yako; wutenyi kuṙi orio kyiyeri muinyo, kui ingyikumbuo.”
Kyipfa orio kyiyeri muilya mkate-chu na inyo iwuka kunu kyiṙoonyi, muonguo mbonyi tsa upfu lo Mndumii mṟasa kyiyeri echicha.
Kyasia orio mndu alawaṟi alya mkate-cho, ang'u inyo iwuka ipfo kyiṙoonyi kya Mndumii, nalahia Ruwa ko mbonyi tsa upfu lo Yesu msalabenyi.
Kyaindi mndu nakuwese mrimenyi kokye kokooya mbonyi tsikyeri necha, naaho nalye mkate na inyo iwuka kyiṙoonyi.
Kyipfa alya na inyo, nekyelya na inyo ianduyo lya mrima okye, kokooya alemo imanya mmbiu o Mndumii nyi kyikyi.
Kyipfa kya ikyo kuwoṙe wandu wafoi konyu waluoe na wafafa, na waata walempfa.
Kyipfa kokooya loambuya kuwooka kyilya kyikyeri mrimenyi koṙu kuwoṙe kyindo kyeiṙima iluenenga ianduyo kyiyeri-kyo luilya Kyilaayo kya Mndumii-pfo.
Indi kyiyeri loanduyo, lotoṟisho nyi Mndumii, kundu nyashi ya Ruwa wawaṟi wandu wa wuyana ilacheluolokyia.
Koikyo, wana wa wama wako, kyiyeri mosanzia handu hamwi muiṙime ilya, muweṙane.

Mndu kawoṙo nyi njaa, nalye kanyi kokye; kundu kyiyeri-kyo mosanzia handu hamwi mulachewuta shindo shechienenga Ruwa imuolotsia ngapo yakye. Na isho shatsugaa ngyechishiachikyia kyiyeri-kyo ngyechicha.
Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, ko mbonyi tsa shisumbo sha mrimenyi, ngyikundi muṙe mulamanya-pfo.
Muichi kye kyiyeri muwei wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, muwekyeosha mafano galekyeṙeṙa, chandu muwekyesongoyo nyi makusaṟo ganyu.
Koikyo ngammbia kye kuwoṙe mndu ekyeṙeṙa Mumuyonyi o Ruwa igamba, “Yesu namsese,” maa mndu eiṙima igamba, “Yesu nyi Mndumii,” sile Mumuyonyi Mweele-pfo.
Kyasia kuwoṙe mbaṟe tsifoi tsa shisumbo indi Mumuyo nyi ulya ulya.
Lyingyi-se kuwoṙe mbaṟe tsifoi tsa maṟunda, na Mndumii nyi ulya ulya.
Naaho-ng'u kuwoṙe mbaṟe tsifoi tseṟunda, indi Ruwa nyi ulya ulya ekyeṟunda maṟunda goose kyiiṙi kya woose.
Kyaindi orio mndu nekyeenengo nyi Ruwa imanya kye Mumuyo nakyeri ho, kui ienengana kyiira.
Kyipfa mndu umwi kui Mumuyo namwenengye wunyotsu; na ungyi iṙeṙa kui wuṟango chandu Mumuyo ulya ulya akundi.
Ungyi iiṙikyia Mumuyonyi ulya ulya; na ungyi shisumbo shekyiṟa waluoe Mumuyonyi ulya umwi.

Na ungyi mawuto ya maṟiyisho; na ungyi ionguo shisuku na ungyi wuiṙimi wo manya nyi shisumbo shiha shiwukyie ko Mumuyo na nyi shiha shilawukyie ko Mumuyo; ungyi mbaṟe tsa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi; na ungyi itambaluo mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
Kyaindi maṟunda-ga goose gekyeṟundo nyi Mumuyo-cho umwi, ulya ekyegawia orio mndu chandu akundi oe.
Chandu mmbiu ukyeri umwi, nacho uwoṙe shiwungo shifoi, na shiwungo shoose sha mmbiu-cho, maa chandu shifoi, nyi mmbiu umwi, nyi wuṙo na Kristo.
Cha Kyipfa Mumuyonyi umwi soe loose lulepatiso iwa mmbiu umwi. Kye lui Wayuda, ang'u kye lui Wakyiṟikyi; kokooya lui watumo ang'u wandu lulawachilyie nyi mndu; na soe loose luleletsio Mumuyo umwi.
Cha kyipfa mmbiu chi kyiwungo kyimwi-pfo, indi nyi shifoi.
Kuṙende kukogamba, “Kyipfa inyi ngyilai kuwoko, inyi chi o mmbiu-pfo;” ngyesa kuṙende-ko koṙa iwa kyiwungo kya mmbiu kyipfa kya ikyo-ng'ue?
Na kuṙwi kukogamba, “Kyipfa inyi ngyilai riso, inyi chi o mmbiu-pfo;” ngyesa kuṙwi-ko koṙa iwa kyiwungo kya mmbiu kyipfa kya ikyo-ng'ue?
Kokooya mmbiu oose owa riso, ny'kyikyi kyeaṙanyia? Kokooya mmbiu oose owa kuṙwi ny'kyikyi kyepfaamiṟa?
Indi Ruwa nawikyie shiwungo orio kyimwi mmbiunyi chandu alekunda.
Kyaindi kokooya shiwungo shoose shiwei kyiwungo kyimwi, mmbiu uwekaa kwi?
Kyaindi wulalu shiwungo nyi shifoi, indi mmbiu nyi umwi.
Na riso lyeiṙima iwia kuwoko, “Ungyiwoṙie kyiiṙa-pfo;” maa lyingyi-se mṙoe oiṙima iwia maṙende, “Mungyiwoṙie kyiira-pfo.”
Indi ngoseṟa mnu shiwungo shilya sha mmbiu shekyekusaṟo kye shishifofo mnu shiwoṙe kyiira ngoseṟa.
Na shiwungo shilya sha mmbiu shekyekusaṟo kye nyi sha wusutsu, shiwungo-sho lokyeshienenga mng'ano ngoseṟa; na shiwungo shaṙu shilawoṙe wucha nyi shiwoṙe wucha ngoseṟa mnu.
Cha kyipfa shiwungo shaṙu shiwoṙe wucha shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo; indi Ruwa nagumbie mmbiu, na ienenga mng'ano ngoseṟa kyiwungo kyilakyicha,
kundu mmbiu ulaṙe iwa kyindo kyimwi, indi shiwungo shitaramane, orio kyiwungo na oṙoe.
Na kyiwungo kyimwi kyikawawio, shiwungo shoose shekyewawio hamwi nakyo; na kyiwungo kyimwi kyikang'anyiso, shiwungo shoose shekyechihiyo hamwi nakyo.
Kyasia nyoe mowa mmbiu o Kristo, na shiwungo orio kyimwi handu hakyo.

Na Ruwa nawikyie wengyi Siṟinyi, wa kuwooka wasu, wa kawi weonguo shisuku, wa kaṟaaṟu walosha; numa ya iho shindo sheṟiyisha, shisumbo sha ikyiṟa waluoe, na itaramana, na wusongoru, na mbaṟe tsa iṙeṙa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
Ngyesa woose nyi wasu? Woose nyi weonguo shisuku? Woose nyi walosha? Woose wekyewuta shindo sheṟiyisha?
Woose wawoṙe shisumbo shekyiṟa waluoe? Woose wekyeṙeṙa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi? Woose wekyetambuluo mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi?
Kundenyi mnu mrimenyi konyu iwona shisumbo shicha kuta isho. Maa kuṙo ngyimuloṟa nyoe njia ngyicha.
