Ngaṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ya wandu na ya malaika, kokooya ngyilawoṙe ikunda, ngawa cha menya iwuta ṟui na mmanga uiṙeṙa.
Lyingyi-se ngaiṙima ionguo shisuku na imanya shiṟika shoose na wuṟango woose; ngawaṙa iiṙikyia lying'anyi ngaiṙima maa isamiṟa fumvu, kokooya ngyilawoṙe ikunda, inyi chi kyindo-pfo.
Lyingyi-se ngawuta masaa gako goose iigutsa wakyiwa; lyingyi-se ngaenengyia mmbiu oko ukoṟo nyi moṙo, kokooya ngyilawoṙe ikunda, ngyeiria ho kyindo-pfo.
Ikunda lyekyekarishia, lyekyesaṟia. Ikunda lyiwoṙe wunyeng'i-pfo. Ikunda lyekyekutuuta maa lyekyekushela-pfo.
Lyekyeṙa iwaṙa wupfereri-pfo; lyekyepfula shindo shalyo lyimonyi-pfo; lyiwoṙe isuo-pfo; lyekyetala mawicho-pfo.
Lyekyechihiyo kyipfa kya wuwicho-pfo, indi lyekyechihiyo hamwi na wuloi.
Lyekyekarishia shoose; lyekyeiṙikyia shoose; lyiwoṙe ikusuria; lyekyekarishia shoose.
Ikunda lyekyekaa mlungana; indi kuwoṙe ionguo shisuku ionguo-lyo lyechiiṙa. Kukowaṙa iṙeṙa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi mṙeṙie-yo yechisia. Kukowaṙa ngyuuṟango, tsechisia.
Cha kyipfa lokyemanya mbashu-mbashu; na lokyeonguo shisuku mbashu-mbashu;
kyaindi kyiyeri-kyo kyilya kyilakyeri mti kyechicha, kyilya kyii mbashu-mbashu kyechisia.
Kyiyeri ngyiwei mana mnangu, ngyileṙeṙa cha mana mnangu, ngyilemanya cha mana mnangu, ngyilekusaṟa cha mana mnangu. Wookyia kyiyeri ngyilewa mndu apfulukyie, ngyileṙa shindo shilya sha wututu.

Kyipfa kyiyeri kya wulalu luwonyi kui kyiyewo cha maushe-ushe. Kyiyeri kyilya lochiwona ushangu kui ushangu. Kyiyeri kya wulalu ngyiichi mbashu-mbashu. Kyiyeri kyilya ngyechimanya mnu chandu inyi ngyiichio mnu.
Kyasia, wulalu hatsugaa iiṙikyia, ikusuria na ikunda; ishi shiṟaaṟu, na kyiiṙi kya isho kying'anyi kuta shoose nyi ikunda.
Pfulenyi ikunda, na ikunda mnu iwona shisumbo sha mrimenyi, kyaindi ngoseṟa muiṙime ienengo kyisumbo kyeonguo shisuku.
Cha kyipfa ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, ekyeṙeṙa na wandu-pfo, indi nekyeṙeṙa na Ruwa. Kyipfa kuwoṙe ekyemanya-pfo; kyaindi naṙeṙa mbonyi tsa shiṟika mrimenyi kokye.
Indi ulya ekyeonguo shisuku, naṙeṙa na wandu mbonyi tsewatarama, na iwawiyiṟia moo, na iwakarisha.
Ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi nekyekarisha iiṙikyia lyakye amonyi; indi ekyeonguo shisuku nekyetarama siṟi.

Na inyi ngyikundi nyoe moose muṙeṙe kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, kyaindi ngoseṟa muiṙime ionguo shisuku; kyipfa ulya ekyeonguo shisuku nang'anyi kuta ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, sile kokooya nekyetambuluo, kundu siṟi iiṙime itaramika.

Indi wulalu, wana wa wama, ngacha na konyu na iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, ngyemtarama kyi, sile kokooya ngyiṙeṙa na nyoe kui njia ya itambuluo, ang'u kui njia ya wuṟango, ang'u kui njia ya ionguo shisuku, ang'u kui njia ya malosho?
Maa shindo shilawoṙe moo kyiyeri shekyewuta ṟui, kokooya nyi mtoṟiṟo, kokooya nyi kyinubi, shikawuta maṟui gafananyi kyemanyika kuṙa kyiimbo kyiimbo kui mtoṟiṟo ang'u kui kyinubi?
Cha kyipfa iraa lyikawuta ṟui lyilamanyikyie, nyi wui echikuloṟa kye nakuṟeyeṟie ikapana shiṙa?
Na wuṙo nyoe, mulandeṙeṙe kyindo kyilawoṙe wuṟikyi, kyindo-kyo kyiṙeṙa kyemanyika kuṙa? Kyipfa mowa muiṙeṙa wulya tupu.
Loi kuwoṙe maṟui ga mbaṟe tsifoi wuyanenyi, maa kuwoṙe maa lyimwi lyilawoṙe kyindo lyikundi igamba-pfo.
Kyasia ngyilandemanye kyindo ṟui lyilya lyigamba ngyewa cha tondo ko ulya aiṙeṙa; na ulya aiṙeṙa newa tondo koko.
Nyi wuṙo na nyoe, kyipfa mulangyie mnu iwa wandu wawoṙe shisumbo sha mrima, kundenyi kye muengyeṟe mnu iwaṙa shisumbo-sho kundu siṟi itaramikye.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi naterewe ienengo wuiṙimi wo itambuluo.
Kyipfa ngaterewa Ruwa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, mrima oko okyeterewa, kyaindi wuṟango woko wuwoṙe ndunda-pfo.
Kyasia kyawa-ng'u kuṙa? Ngyechiterewa kui mrima, lyingyi-se ngyeterewa kui wuṟango taa. Ngyechiimba kui mrima, lyingyi-se ngyechiimba kui wuṟango taa.
Cha kyipfa iyoe kowikyia mboṟa kui mrima, ulya aṙamie handu ha tondo nechiiṙikyia kuṙa, “Amen,” numa ya iana lyapfo, alaichi isho ugamba?
Kyipfa nyi loi, iyoe nuana necha, indi ulya ungyi aitaramika-pfo.
Ngyiana Ruwa kye ngyiṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi kuta nyoe moose.
Kyaindi siṟinyi ngyikundi iṙeṙa maṙeṙo gataanu kui wuṟango woko, ngyiiṙime ilosha wengyi, ngoseṟa ya iṙeṙa maṙeṙo shiku ikumi kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
Wana wa wama wako, wuṟango wonyu wulawe cha wo wana watutu; kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa wuwicho wenyi cha wana wanangu, indi wuṟango wonyu wuwe cha wo wandu wapfulukyie.
Kyikyiṟeie uwawasonyi,
“Ngyechiṙeṙa na wandu-wa kui wandu wa mṙeṙie ingyi,
na kui maṙumbu ga wayenu,
maa kuṙo wechingyiaṙanyia-pfo,
Ruwa nagamba.”
Kyasia, mṙeṙie-i nyi kyiṟingyishio, chi ko walya waiṙikyie-pfo, indi ko walya walaiṙikyie. Kyaindi ionguo shisuku chi kyipfa kya walya walaiṙikyie-pfo, indi kyipfa kya walya waiṙikyie.
Kokooya siṟi yoose isanzie handu hamwi, na wandu woose waṙeṙe kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi naaho kukocha wandu walaiṙikyie na matondo, ngyesa wechigamba kye muwasuko-pfoe?
Kyaindi woose wakaonguo shisuku, na mndu alaiṙikyie, ang'u mtondo kacha, kyilya kyigambo kyechimloṟa wunyamaṟi wokye, na nechianduyo nyi walya aichuoe weonguo shisuku.
Shiṟika sha mrima okye shechimanyika; na kuṙo nechiterewa na iana Ruwa, echioloka na ndewu, na igamba kye Ruwa nakyeri konyu loi.

Kyasia, wana wa wama, kyawa kuṙa? Kyiyeri-kyo mosanzia handu hamwi, orio umwi nawoṙe Kyiimbo, nawoṙe malosho, nawoṙe kyindo Ruwa amshukuya, nawoṙe mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, nawoṙe itambuluo mṙeṙie iya wandu walaiichi. Shindo shoose shiwutikye kui kyimaṙuma kya ikarisha iiṙikyia.
Kokooya mndu aiṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, waṙeṙe wandu wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu, chi ngoseṟa ya iho-pfo. Lyingyi-se orio mndu naṙeṙe kyiyeri kyakye, na umwi natambuluo.
Kyaindi kokooya kulawoṙe motambuluo, mndu natsie alaṙeṙe siṟinyi, naṙeṙe na mrima okye; lyingyi-se na Ruwa.
Na weonguo shisuku waṙeṙe wawi, ang'u waṟaaṟu, na wengyi watambuluo.
Kyaindi ungyi aṙamie kashukuyo kyindo, ulya o kuwooka natsie.
Cha kyipfa nyoe moose moiṙima ionguo shisuku umwi umwi, kundu woose waiṙime ikulosha, na woose wawiyiṟio moo.
Na mumuyo ya weonguo shisuku yekyeindia weonguo shisuku.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa chi Ruwa o kyituṟu na ngapano-pfo indi o ufoṟo; wuṙo chandu kyiwaṟi iwa siṟinyi tsa wandu wa Ruwa.
Waka watsie siṟinyi; kyipfa wawoṙe momu o ṙeṙa-pfo; indi waindie, chandu uwawaso logamba.
Nawo wakakunda ikulosha kyindo kyoose, wawese wamii wawo kanyi kowo; kyipfa nyi sonu mndu mka iṙeṙa siṟinyi.
Ang'u, ngyesa Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyilewuka konyu ang'u icha na konyu nyoe muwenyi?
Mndu kakuwona kye oe nyi moonguo shisuku ang'u mndu o kyimrima, namanye isho ngamuṟeia, kye nyi mawawaso ga Mndumii.
Kyaindi mndu kawa tondo, na nawe tondo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, wana wa wama, kundenyi mnu ienengo ionguo shisuku, maa mulashingyie iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
Kyaindi shindo shoose shiwutikye kui wucha na kui wuyendelyi.
Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, ngamukumbuṟa mbonyi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha ngyilemuongoya; iya muleiambilyia, na kyiiṙi kyayo mugoṟokyi;
na kui yo muikyiṟo; kokooya muiosha mbonyi tsilya ngyilemuongoya; sile kokooya muleiṙikyia kya wulya.
Cha kyipfa ngyilemuenenga iho mawookyionyi shilya ngyileambilyia inyi ngyimonyi, kye Kristo nalepfa kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, chandu shiṟeio shiele shagamba.
Na kye naleṟiko; na kye naleṟuka mfiri o kaṟaaṟu, chandu shiṟeio shiele shagamba.
Na kye nalewonekyia Kyefa; lyingyi-se na walya ikumi na wawi.
Numa ya iho nalewonekyia wandu wekyeosha Yesu ngoseṟa ya magana gataanu; na kyiiṙi kya iwo wafoi wai na moo mṟasa wulalu; indi waata walempfa.
Numa ya iho kachia Yakobo; lyingyi-se na wasu woose.
Na mafurumionyi ga wandu woose nalengyichia inyi, cha mndu alefeo kyilakyeri kyiyeri kyakye.
Kyipfa inyi ngyimtutu kuta wasu woose, ngyilawaṟi ilago msu, cha kyipfa ngyilelyisa Siṟi ya Ruwa wukyiwa.
Kyaindi kui isaṟia lya Ruwa ngawa kuṙi chandu ngyikyeri; na isaṟia lyikyeri koko chi wulya-pfo, indi ngyileengyeṟa mnu iṟunda kuta wo woose; maa chi inyi-pfo, indi nyi isaṟia lya Ruwa hamwi na inyi.
Kyasia, kokooya nyi inyi, kokooya nyi walya, nyi wuṙo lokyeonguo mbonyi, na nyi wuṙo muleiṙikyia.
Kyasia, kokooya mbonyi tsa Kristo tsigambo kye naleṟuka ko wapfu, ny'kyilyi wandu waata kyiiṙi kyanyu waigamba kye kuwoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu-pfo.
Kyaindi kokooya kulawoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu, Kristo na oe aleṟuka-pfo.
Lyingyi-se kokooya Kristo alaleṟuka, kyasia ionguo mbonyi lyaṙu nyi wulya na iiṙikyia lyanyu nyi wulya.
Yee, na soe lowa cha waṟingyishi wa wongo wa Ruwa; cha kyipfa luleṟingyishia kye Ruwa naleṟutsa Kristo, ulya alalemṟutsa, kokooya wapfu walekyeṟutso.
Kyipfa kokooya wapfu walekyeṟutso, Kristo na oe aleṟuka-pfo.
Na kokooya Kristo alaleṟuka, iiṙikyia lyanyu nyi lya wulya; muwekyeri ngyuunyamaṟinyi tsanyu.
Na iho walya walepfa waiṙikyie Kristo waleṙeka.
Kokooya nyi kyiiṙi kya moo-chu tikyi lulekusuria Kristo, soe nyi wakyiwa kuta wandu woose.
Kyaindi wulalu Kristo naṟuka ko wapfu, iloṟa na pata kye na wuṙo Ruwa echiṟutsa walya wapfiie.
Kyipfa kokooya upfu luleendo nyi mndu, na wuṙo iṟutso lya wapfu lyileendo nyi mndu.
Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kya Adamu woose wekyepfa, na wuṙo kyiiṙi kya Kristo woose wechienengo moo.
Kyaindi orio umwi handu hakye; o kuwooka iṟuka ko wapfu nyi Kristo; numa walya wakyeri wa Kristo, kyiyeri echicha.
Iho nyiho mafurumionyi, kyiyeri echienenga Ruwa Awu Wumangyi wokye; kyiyeri echiwinga pfinya tsa mumuyo yekyechilyia wuyana.
Cha kyipfa kyiwaṟi nachilyie oe, mṟasa nawingye washituwa woose.
Mokyituwa o mafurumionyi echiwingo nyi upfu.

Chandu shiṟeio shiele shagamba, “Nalewika shindo shoose wanda ya wuchilyi wokye.” Kyaindi kyiyeri echigamba, “Shindo shoose shawingo,” nyi kyindo kyii na pata kye ulya alemmbingyia shindo shoose akyeri ho-pfo.
Kyasia, shindo shoose shikammbingo na iwiko wanda yakye, nyi lyo-ndu Mana o Adamu amonyi na oe echiwiko wanda ya ulya alewika shindo shoose wanda yakye, kundu Ruwa nawe shoose kyiiṙi kya shoose.
Ang'u ngyesa walya wekyepatiso kyipfa kya wapfu wewika kuṙa? Kokooya wapfu walekyeṟutso maa ale, kyitewe kyepatiso kyipfa kyawo nyi kyikyi?
Na soe kyitewe lukyeri ngataṟenyi orio saa ny'kyi?
Yee, wana wa wama, ikushela-lyi lyako ngyikyeri nalyo kyipfa kyanyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu, ngyekyepfa orio mfiri.
Kokooya, kui mboṟa ya kyimndu, kulya Efeso ngyilekapana na wandu wawicho cha mando ga saka, ngyiwoṙe kyiiṙa kyiha? Wapfu walandeṟutso, lulye na inyo, kyipfa ngama lochipfa.
Maa mulalembo nyi wandu. Wandu wawicho wekyenyamaṟa mkaṟo mcha.
Ambuyenyi necha; maa mulawute kya wunyamaṟi; cha kyipfa wengyi waichi Ruwa-pfo. Ngyigamba isho kundu ngyimuriise sonu.
Kyaindi kofia mndu negamba, “Wapfu wekyeṟutso kuṙa? Nawo wekyecha na mmbiu uha?”
Iyoe tondo! Kyilya okyeṙonga kyekyewaṙa moo kyilandepfe-pfo.
Na kyilya okyekyiṙonga, okyeṙonga mmbiu ulya uicha-pfo, indi nokyeṟonga mbeu tikyi, kokooya nyi ya nganu ang'u ingyi;
kyaindi Ruwa nekyeienenga mmbiu chandu akundi, na orio mbeu mmbiu oyo.
Mmbiu yoose chi mmbiu umwi-pfo; indi mmbiu ingyi nyi ya wandu, ingyi nyi ya mando ga saka, ingyi nyi ya shileye, ingyi ya makunga.
Lyingyi-se kuwoṙe mmbiu ya ruwewu, na mmbiu ya wuyanenyi; kyaindi mng'ano o iya ya ruwewu wufananyi na mng'ano o iya ya wuyanenyi-pfo.
Kuwoṙe mng'ano o mnengyeṟi, na mng'ano o mori, na mng'ano ungyi o nyenyeri; kyipfa mng'ano o nyenyeri imwi na ingyi ufananyi-pfo.
Na wuṙo na iṟutso lya wapfu. Kyekyeṙongo kyinyamaṟikyie, kyekyeṟutso kyilanyamaṟikyie.
Kyekyeṙongo sonunyi, kyekyeṟutso mng'anonyi. Kyekyeṙongo wufafenyi, kyekyeṟutso pfinyenyi.
Kyekyeṙongo mmbiu o teri, kyekyeṟutso mmbiu o mumuyo. Kokooya kuwoṙe mmbiu o teri, na o mumuyo taa ukyeri pfo.
Nyi wuṙo kyikyiṟeie, “Mndu o kuwooka, Adamu, nalewa kyindo kyiwoṙe moo, Adamu o mafurumionyi nyi mumuyo okyeende moo.”
Kyaindi okyesongoya ulya o mumuyo-pfo, indi ulya o teri; numa ya iho okyecha ulya o mumuyo.
Mndu o kuwooka nalewuka urukyenyi, nyi o teri. Mndu o kawi nalewuka ruwewu.
Chandu akyeri ulya o teri, nyi wuṙo wakyeri walya wa teri; na chandu akyeri ulya o ruwewu, nyi wuṙo wakyeri walya wa ruwewu.
Na chandu luleṙuo fana yakye ulya o teri, na wuṙo lochiṙuo fana yakye ulya akyeri o ruwewu.
Wana wa wama wako, shindo ngyigamba nyi ishi, kye mmbiu na samu sheiṙima ioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo. Maa kyindo kyinyamaṟikyie ioṟa kyindo kyilanyamaṟikyie-pfo.
Ngammbia kui kyiṟika; lochipfa loose-pfo, kyaindi loose lochiilachika,
na cha mndu akyema, kyiyeri kya iraa lya mafurumionyi; kyipfa iganda lyechikapo, na wapfu wechiṟutso, walanyamaṟikye, na soe lochiilachika.
Kyipfa kyiwaṟi mmbiu-chu okyenyamaṟika ulanyamaṟikye, na ichu okyepfa ulapfe.
Kyasia kyiyeri mmbiu-chu okyenyamaṟika ulechinyamaṟika, na mmbiu-chu okyepfa ulechipfa, nyi lyo-ndu kyeafukyia kyindo kyilya kyikyiṟeie,
“Upfu lulemeṟo kui iwinga.
Iwinga lyapfo nyi kwi lyikyeri iyoe upfu?
Iwawio lyapfo nyi kwi lyikyeri, iyoe upfu?
Iwawio lya upfu nyi wunyamaṟi,
na pfinya ya wunyamaṟi nyi uwawaso.”
Kyaindi Ruwa naano, ekyeluenenga iwinga kui Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Kyasia, wana wa wama wakunde, kuwanzenyi, mulalolome, muengyeṟe mnu iṟundia Mndumii mfiri yoose, cha kyipfa muichi kye iṟunda lyanyu chi wulya kyiiṙi kya Mndumii-pfo.
Ko mbonyi tsa isania heleri tsetarama wandu wa Ruwa walya waiṙikyie Yesu, chandu ngyilewia siṟi tsa Galatia, na nyoe wutenyi kuṙo.
Orio mfiri o Ruwa orio mndu konyu nakoome kyiseyesoe, iṙuana na chandu awona; kundu heleri-tso tsilasanio kyiyeri ngyechicha.
Na inyi ilyi ngyeafukyia ngyeṙuma walya mochiwasambuṟa waṙuṙe paruo, waṙuo Yerusalemu heleri tsilya mosania.
Na kyikachia na inyi ngyiyende, wechiyenda na inyi.
Kyaindi ngyechicha na konyu, ngamuiṙia uruka lo Makyedonia; kyipfa ngyiiṙia Makyedonia.
Kofia ngyechikaa konyu. Yee, kofia kyiyeri kyoose kya mbeho, muiṙime ingyiṙuo kundu koose ngyechiyenda.
Kyipfa ngyikundi iwonana na nyoe wulalu-pfo, nyi ikuiṙia tupu, cha kyipfa ngyikusaṟie ikaa konyu kyiyeri kyitutu, Mndumii kangyienenga wuiṙimi wo wuta kuṙo.
Kyaindi ngyechikaa Efeso mṟasa kyiyeri kya Pentekoste;
cha kyipfa ngaenengo ṙaawa lying'anyi na lyicha mnu, na kuwoṙe wengyi waiwingana na inyi.
Kyaindi Timoteo kacha, nakae konyu kulawoṙe wuowu; kyipfa naiṟundia Mndumii cha inyi ngyimonyi.
Kyasia mndu oose alammine, kyaindi muimienyi kui ufoṟo, kundu nache na koko; kyipfa ngyimmbeṙelyia nawuye hamwi na wana wa wama waṙu.
Kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa Apolo, mono-wama oṙu, ngyilemterewa mnu nayende konyu hamwi na wana wa wama-wo waṙu; ulya kyilakyeri makusaṟo gakye iyenda wulalu; indi nechicha ilyi ewona ṙaawa.
Laenyi kyiṙombo, mulalolome Iiṙikyienyi, waṙenyi wukari wo kyisoṟo; muwaṙe wuṟango.
Shindo shanyu shoose shiwutikye ikundenyi.

Lyingyi-se, wana wa wama, ngamterewa; (muichi wandu wa kanyi ko Stefana kye nyi wandu wa kuwooka kulya Akaya walegalutso wakaiṙikyia Yesu. Wandu-wa wakuwikyie nakamwi iṟundenyi lyetarama wandu wa Ruwa.)
Indienyi wandu cha iwo, na orio mndu ekyeṟunda na ikulyisa wukyiwa hamwi nawo.
Na inyi ngachihiyo kyipfa kya icha lya Stefana na Foritunato na Akaiko; kyipfa iwa walengyienenga kui mrima shilya mulalengyienenga.
Kyipfa walechihiṟa mrima oko, na mrima yanyu taa; kyasia manyenyi mnu wandu cha iwo.
Siṟi tsa Asia tsamuiṟikyiṟa. Akyila na Pirisikyila wamuiṟikyiṟa mnu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, hamwi na siṟi ikyeri kanyi kowo.
Wana wa wamanyu wekyeosha Yesu iha wamuiṟikyiṟa. Iṟikyiṟanenyi chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
Ikyi nyi kyiiṟikyiṟo kyako Paulo ngaṟeia ngyimonyi.
Mndu oose alakundi Mndumii nawe namsese. Maranata (kyimwi na igamba Mndumii oṙu naicha.)
Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu lyiwe na nyoe.
Ikunda lyako lyiwe hamwi na nyoe moose kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Inyi Paulo, ngyikyeri msu o Kristo Yesu chandu Ruwa akundi, na Timoteo mono-wama oṙu; ngaṟeia paruo-i ko siṟi ya Ruwa ikyeri Korinto, hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa woose wakyeri urukyenyi loose lo Akaya.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, Awu o isaṟia, Ruwa o iwiyiṟia moo lyoose;
ekyeluwiyiṟia moo ngyuukyiwenyi tsaṙu tsoose kundu na soe luiṙime iwawiyiṟia moo walya wakyeri ngyuukyiwenyi tsa mbaṟe tsoose, kui iwiyiṟio moo-lyo, lokyewiyiṟio moo nyi Ruwa.
Kyipfa chandu matuuro ga Kristo gaiengyeṟika koṙu, na wuṙo iwiyiṟio moo lyaṙu lyiengyeṟika kui rina lya Kristo.

Kyaindi kokooya soe lukyeri wukyiwenyi wung'anyi, nyi kyipfa kya iwiyiṟio moo lyanyu na wukyiṟo wonyu; ang'u kokooya lowiyiṟio moo, nyi kyipfa kya nyoe iluwiyiṟia moo; lyekyeṟunda iṟunda lyayo kui ikarishia matuuro galya galya lokyetuuro soe.
Na ikusuria lyaṙu kyipfa kyanyu lyilolomie-pfo, lochimanya kye chandu muwekyeri wandu walewetuuro nyi matuuro galya, na wuṙo mulewewutio iwiyiṟio moo lyilya.

Kyipfa, wana wa wama, lukundi muṙe mulamanya mbonyi tsa wukyiwa wulya wung'anyi wulelukooya kulya Asia-pfo. Kye lulelemio mnu kuta chandu luwechiiṙima, mṟasa lukopfiiyo nyi mṙoe kye luwechiiṙima-se ikaa na moo-pfo.
Yee, soe luwenyi luwewoṙe ianduyo lya upfu mrimenyi koṙu, kundu lulachekusuria kya mrima yaṙu, indi lukusurie Ruwa, moṟutsa wapfu.
Alelukyiṟa soe upfunyi lung'anyi kuṙo; lyingyi-se nelukyiṟa. Ulya lulekusuria kye neengyeṟa ilukyiṟa.
Na nyoe mukotaramana na soe kyipfa kyaṙu kyiiṙi kya iterewa, kundu kyipfa kya kyisumbo kyilya luenengo soe kui itarama wandu wafoi, wandu wafoi waane kyipfa kyaṙu.

Cha kyipfa ikushela lyaṙu nyi ilyi, iṟingyishia lya kyilya mrima yaṙu iwonyi kye kyikyicha, kye kui wuele na ngoo ngyiilyi iwukyie ko Ruwa; chi kui wuṟango wo mmbiu-pfo, indi kui isaṟia lya Ruwa; lulewaṙa mchumie wuyanenyi, na ngoseṟa konyu nyoe.
Kyipfa luimuṟeia nyoe kyindo, sile kyilya muisoma, na ikyiṟingyishia-pfo; na inyi ngyikusurie kye mochiṟingyishia isho mṟasa mafurumionyi.
Na wuṙo chandu muleṟingyishia mbonyi tsaṙu kyitutu, kye soe nyi kyimaṙuma kya ikushela lyanyu, chandu nyoe mukyeri koṙu, mfiri ulya Mndumii oṙu Yesu echicha lya kawi.
Na inyi ngiwoṙe ikusuria-lyo ngiwekundi ishika konyu iho kuwooka, kundu muwone kyisumbo kya kawi;
na iiṙa konyu ngyiyende mṟasa Makyedonia. Na lyingyi-se iwuka Makyedonia ngyiwuye na konyu muṙuo ṟio lya kyaro kyako kya iyenda Uyuda.

Kyasia, kyiyeri ngyilekunda iwuta isho, ngyesa ngyileilacha kyilya ngyiweteṟie? Ang'u isho ngyikundi iwuta ngyikundi ishiwuta kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu kye shiwe kuṙi koko, igamba “Yee, yee,” na chi “Ote, ote-pfo?”
Kyaindi chandu Ruwa ai msimiri, ṙeṙo lyaṙu konyu chi “Yee” na “Ote-pfo.”
Kyipfa Mana o Ruwa, Kristo Yesu, ulya mbonyi tsakye muleongoyo nyi soe, kyimwi na igamba, “Inyi na Silyiwano na Timoteo,” awekyeri “Yee” na “Ote-pfo;” indi kyilaṙuṙanyi na ikyo oe nyi “Yee” ya Ruwa.
Kyipfa shaasa shoose sha Ruwa shikyeri kokye nyi “Yee.” Lyingyi-se kyipfa kya ikyo kokye oe nyi “Amen;” Ruwa naiṙime iṟumisho kui soe.
Kyasia ulya ekyelukarisha hamwi na nyoe kui Kristo, na ilushia mafuṙa, nyi Ruwa,
na oe nyi oe aleluwika kyiṟingyishio kyiwoṙe mfano okye kyaluenenga Mumuyo mrimenyi yaṙu.
Kyaindi inyi ngyilaga Ruwa nawe mṟingyishi o mrima oko, kye, kui iwawonia wukyiwa ngyilandeshikye Korinto-pfo.
Chi kye luichilyia iiṙikyia lyanyu-pfo; indi lukyeri watarami wa sia yanyu; kyipfa kui iiṙikyia lyanyu mugoṟokyi.
Kyaindi mrimenyi koko ngyilekusuria kuṙi, ngyilache-se na konyu kui ikuinaṙia.
Kyipfa inyi ngamtewe mukokuinaṙia, kyasia nyi wui engyichihiṟa inyi sile nyi ulya inyi ngamwenenga ikuinaṙia?
Na inyi ngyilemṟeia kyindo-kyo ikyo, kundu kyiyeri ngyechicha ngyilacheenengo ikuinaṙia nyi walya kyiwengyiwaṟi ichihiyo kyipfa kyawo; ngyechimukusuria nyoe moose kye sia yako nyi yanyu moose taa.
Ngyilemuṟeia paruo kui mcheṟeṟe ifoi na mrima uwoṙe fowa na ikuinyṙia lying'anyi. Chi kye muwaṙe ikuinaṙia-pfo, indi muiṙime imanya ikunda lyako konyu chandu lying'anyi.
Kyaindi kokooya mndu atewe oṙoe iwaṙa ikuinaṙia, angyitewe inyi tikyi-pfo, indi kui ura lumwi (ngyilacheewa ṟio mnu ko mndu), namutewe nyoe moose iwaṙa ikuinaṙia.
Ianduyo lyilya mndu-cho aleenengo iwuka ko wandu wafoi lyimshikyie.
Maa kyilaṙuṙanyi na isho, nyi nanga mumhooṟie na immbiyiṟia moo, mndu cha icho alachemeṟo nyi ikuinaṙia lyakye lying'anyi mnu.
Koikyo ngyimuterewa mumṟingyishie ikunda lyanyu.
Kyipfa ngyileṟeia kyipfa kya ikyo taa, kundu ngyimanye na pata konyu kye muleindia shindo shoose.
Kyaindi kokooya mohooṟia mndu kyindo kyoose, na inyi ngyewemhooṟia; kyipfa maa inyi, kookoya ngahooṟia mndu kyindo kyoose, ngamhooṟia kyipfa kyanyu mbele ya Kristo.
Satana alaenengo ṙaawa lyelulemba; cha kyipfa lolemo imanya ngyeṟo tsakye-pfo.
Kyasia kyiyeri ngyileshika Tiroa kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo, Mndumii kangyipfunguya moongo.
Ngyilewona sia mrimenyi koko-pfo, kyipfa ngyilewona mono-wama oko Tito-pfo, indi ngyilesamana nawo, ngafuma iyenda Makyedonia.
Kyaindi Ruwa naano, ekyeluenenga ichihiyo kyipfa kya wuwinzi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, na iloṟa mpfaamo mcha o ulogo lo Kristo handu hoose kui iṟunda lyaṙu.
Cha kyipfa soe nyi mafuṙa ga Kristo, gekyepfaama necha, mbele ya Ruwa, ko iwo waikyiṟo, na ko iwo waiṙeka.
Ko iwo wa kawi mpfaamo o upfu okyeende upfu; ko iwo wa kuwooka mpfaamo o moo okyeende moo. Na oe nyi wui echiiṙima shindo-sho?
Cha kyipfa soe chi kyimwi na wandu wafoi wekyekapa mbucha na ulogo lo Ruwa-pfo. Soe luonguo ulogo lo Ruwa kui wuwaṙami wo mrima cha wandu waleṙumo nyi Ruwa, luwalungye na Kristo.
Ngyesa luwooka-se ikushela luwenyi? Ang'u lukundi-se cha iwo wengyi, paruo tsiwoṙe kyiṟumi tsiche na konyu, ang'u iwuka konyu?
Nyoe nyi paruo yaṙu yeloṟa soe luwaṙume nyi siṟi, ingyiṟeie mrimenyi koṙu, imanyikyie na pata na isomo nyi wandu woose.
Muṟingyishio kye mowa paruo iwukyie ko Kristo lulemṙambika nyoe, ingyiṟeie chi kui wiino-pfo, indi na Mumuyo o Ruwa ai na moo; chi shibaunyi sha magoe-pfo; indi shibaunyi shikyeri nyi mrima ya nyama.
Na ikusuria-lyo lulyiwoṙe mbele ya Ruwa kui njia ya Kristo.
Chi kye soe lochiiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose kui pfinya tsaṙu luwenyi-pfo, wuiṙimi woṙu woose wuwukyie ko Ruwa.
Na oe nyi oe alelutarama iwa waṟundi wa mma mhya; chi wa kyiṟeio-pfo, indi wa Mumuyo; cha kyipfa kyiṟeio kyekyewaaga, indi Mumuyo okyekyiṟa.

Kyasia, kokooya iṟunda lya upfu lyilekolyaṟeio na itaricho magoenyi, lyilecha mng'anonyi, mṟasa Waisiraelyi walaiṙime iitukuya kyaam kya Mose karii, kyipfa kya mng'ano o kyaam kyakye, nacho nyi-we mng'ano uweiilachika.
Ngyesa iṟunda lya Mumuyo lyechiengyeṟika iwa mng'anonyi-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa kokooya iṟunda lya ianduyo lyiwoṙe mng'ano, iṟunda lya wusumganyi lyiwoṙe mng'ano o ngoseṟa.
Kyipfa maa lyilya lyileng'anyiso lyiwewoṙe mng'ano kuṙi-pfo, kyipfa kya mng'ano uiengyeṟika mnu.
Cha kyipfa kokooya lyilya lyiweilachika lyiwewoṙe mng'ano, ngoseṟa mnu lyilya lyekyekaa ho mlungana lyiwoṙe mng'ano ung'anyi ngoseṟa.
Kyasia, kyipfa luwoṙe iweṙelyia lya mbaṟe-i luwika wuragari na wukari wung'anyi.
Na soe chi chandu Mose alewika kyindo wuye ya kyaam kyakye, kundu Waisiraelyi walaitukuye mnu mafurumionyi ga kyilya kyiweilachika-pfo;

indi makusaṟo gawo galewiko meema. Kyipfa maa mṟasa inu, kyiyeri Mma Mku okyesomo, kyindo-kyo kyeshikyia kyaam kyekyeweṙio ho. Kyimwi na igamba kye, kyileloṟo kye kyindo-kyo kyeshikyia kyewuto ho kyiiṙi kya Kristo-pfo.
Indi mṟasa inu, kyiyeri uwawaso lo Mose lokyesomo, kyindo-kyo kyekyeṙio mrimenyi kowo.
Indi kyiyeri kyoose wechigalukyia Mndumii, kyindo kyilya kyeshikyia kyaam kyewuto ho.
Kyasia “Mndumii” nyi oe Mumuyo; kyaindi handu akyeri Mumuyo o Mndumii, iho nyi ho-ndu hawoṙe ikaa kulawoṙe ichilyio nyi kyindo.

Kyaindi soe loose, kui kyaam kyilakyishikyie nyi kyindo, luloṟa mng'ano o Mndumii, cha mng'ano uwukyie kyiyewonyi, lokyeilacho luwe cha mfano-cho icho, iwuka mng'ano mṟasa mng'ano ung'anyi ngoseṟa cha mng'ano uwukyie ko Mndumii, akyeri Mumuyo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, cha kyipfa luwoṙe iṟunda-lyi, chandu lulewona isaṟia, luiloloma-pfo.

Kyaindi lulelega mbonyi tsa sonu tsikuṟiikyie, maa luichumia kui mtambo-pfo, maa isanza-sanza Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na wongo, indi kui iṟingyishia loi lukuloṟa kye luwoṙe wusumganyi, kyilya mrima ya wandu iwonyi kye kyikyicha kyeluṟingyishia mbele ya Ruwa.
Kyaindi kookoya Ndumi-i Ngyicha luionguo ikuṟiikyie, yakuṟiika ko iwo waiṙeka;
wakyeri kye kyiiṙi kyawo ruwa o wuyana-wu naleshingyia makusaṟo ga iwo walaiṙikyie, walachekooyo nyi ngyeela ya Ndumi Ngyicha ya mng'ano okye Kristo akyeri fana ya Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa lukuongoya mbonyi luwenyi-pfo, indi Kristo Yesu kye nyi Mndumii; na soe luwenyi kye lukyeri waṟundi wanyu kyipfa kya Yesu.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa, icho alegamba, “Ngyeela yewaa iwuka meemenyi,” nyi oe alewaa mrimenyi koṙu, naluenengye ngyeela ya wuṟango wo mng'ano o Ruwa kyaamunyi kya Yesu Kristo.
Kyaindi luwoṙe wunjama-wu shindonyi sha teri, kundu pfinya ing'anyi ya wuiṙimi iwe ko Ruwa, maa chi iwuka koṙu-pfo.
Ngyuura tsoose luilya wukyiwa, indi luiwingo-pfo; lukapa kawi, indi luiloṟa lupfiiyo nyi mṙoe-pfo.
Lusuiṟo, indi luṙio kulawoṙe itaramo-pfo; luwiyitso wanda, indi luirumatso-pfo.
Mfiri yoose luṙuṙe mmbiunyi yaṙu iwoogo lya Yesu, kundu moo o Yesu uṟingyishio mmbiunyi yaṙu.
Kyipfa soe lukyeri na moo, mfiri yoose lokyewuto lupfe kyipfa kya Yesu, kundu moo o Yesu uṟingyishio mmbiunyi yaṙu yekyepfa.
Kyasia iho upfu lokyeṟunda, mrimenyi koṙu, indi moo mrimenyi konyu.
Kyaindi cha kyipfa luwoṙe Mumuyo ulya ulya o iiṙikyia; chandu kyileṟeio, “Ngyileiṙikyia, na kyipfa kya ikyo ngyileṙeṙa.” Soe na soe luiṙikyie, na kyipfa kya ikyo luṙeṙa.
Luichi kye ulya aleṟutsa Mndumii Yesu nechiluṟutsa na soe hamwi na Yesu, na iluende na mbele yakye hamwi na nyoe.
Cha kyipfa mbonyi tsoose nyi kyipfa kyanyu, kundu isaṟia-lyo lyikaengyeṟika mnu, ko iwo wakyeri wafoi kyiano kyiengyeṟikye, na Ruwa nang'anyiso.
Koikyo luiloloma-pfo; indi maa chandu kyanja mmbiu yaṙu iloṟa iuṟa pfinya; mrimenyi koṙu lukokohoka orio mfiri.
Kyipfa matuuro gaṙu gai maangu, gakyeri ga kyiyeri kyifuhi tikyi, gekyeluwutia mng'ano o mlungana uingyikyie mnu.
Lulaambuye shekyewono indi shilya shilekyewono. Shilya shekyewono shekyekaa kyiyeri kyifuhi, indi shilya shilekyewono shekyekaa mlungana.
Cha kyipfa luichi kye mmbiu yaṙu lukyeri nayo iha wuyanenyi ikamnyamaṟika, luwoṙe numba iwukyie ko Ruwa, numba ilangyiwikye kui mawoko, ikyeri ya mlungana ruwewu.
Kyipfa kyiiṙi kya numba-i luiwawio lochilanga mnu ienengo kanyi koṙu kuwukyie ruwewu;
kundu lukomṟiko mmbiu ungyi lochiwono lui-se kyiṟanguoe-pfo.
Cha kyipfa soe lukyeri kyiiṙi kya mmbiu-i luwawio, lochilemio; chi kye lukundi iwuta mmbiu-chu okyepfa-pfo, indi lulangyie iṟiko ulya ulekyepfa, kundu kyilya kyekyepfa kyimeṟo piu nyi moo.
Kyasia ulya aleluṟeyeṟia isho nyi Ruwa, na oe naleluenenga Mumuyo okye moluringa.
Kyasia mfiri yoose luwoṙe wukari; lyingyi-se luichi kye, kyiyeri lukyeri iha na mmbiu-chu, lukyeri kuleshi na Mndumii.
(Kyipfa lokyekaa kui iiṙikyia, chi kui iwona-pfo.)
Kyaindi luwoṙe mrima ngyikarishe; na soe luwonyi nyi nanga ilekana na mmbiu-i na ikaa hamwi na Mndumii.
Koikyo-se, kokooya lukyeri iha ang'u lukyeri iha-pfo, luipfuṟukana imchihiṟa oe.
Kyipfa kyalukooya soe loose iloṟo halya kyiṙinyi kya ianduyo kya Kristo, kundu orio mndu naambilyie wori wo shindo alewuta kyimmbiu, chandu alewuta, kye shicha ang'u shiwicho.
Kyasia lukomanya iowuo Ruwa, lukuruo wandu; indi loṟingyishio mbele ya Ruwa. Na inyi ngyikusurie kye luwaṟingyishie mrimenyi konyu taa.

Kyipfa luikushela luwenyi mbele yanyu-se-pfo, indi lumuenenga kyimaṙuma kya ikushela kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu muiṙime iwaṙa kyindo kyeloṟa mbele ya iwo waikushela ko shindo sha nja tikyi, maa chi shindo sha mrimenyi-pfo.
Kyipfa kokooya luwasuko nyi kyipfa kya Ruwa; ang'u kokooya lulawasuko, nyi kyipfa kyanyu.
Kyipfa ikunda lya Kristo lyiluchilyia kyipfa lowona kuṙi, kye umwi nalepfa kyipfa kya woose, kyasia walepfa woose.
Lyingyi-se nalepfa kyipfa kya woose, kundu wai na moo walawe-se na moo kyipfa kya mrima yawo wawenyi, indi kyipfa kyakye oe alepfa kaṟuka kyipfa kyawo.
Na kyawa soe wookyia wulalu luichi mndu oose kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu-pfo. Maa chandu soe lulemanya Kristo kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu, kyaindi wulalu lumwichi-se kuṙo-pfo.
Na kyawa kye, mndu kakaa kyiiṙi kya Kristo nawa mndu mhya; sha kacha shaiṙa, shoose shawa shihya.
Kyaindi shoose taa shiwukyie ko Ruwa alelusanza soe na oe kui Kristo. Na oe naleluenenga iṟunda lyesanza wandu na Ruwa.
Ulogo loṙu nyi kye Ruwa naisanza wandu woose na oe kui Kristo. Ruwa aletala ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo-pfo. Na naluenenga ulogo lo sanza washituwa.
Kyasia soe luiṙeṙa handu ha Kristo, cha ilyi Ruwa naiterewa kui maṙumbu gaṙu, lumuterewa nyoe kyipfa kya Kristo musanzo na Ruwa.
Oe alaichi wunyamaṟi nalemmbuta kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu soe luiṙime iwa wusumganyi wo Ruwa kui oe.
Na soe lukoṟunda handu hamwi na oe lumuterewa maa mulaambilyie isaṟia lya Ruwa wulya.
(Cha kyipfa naigamba,
“Kyiyeri kyiiṙikyie ngyilekuaṙanyia,
mfiri o wukyiṟo ngyilekutarama.”
Kyiyeri kyiiṙikyie nyi wulalu; mfiri o wukyiṟo nyi wulalu.)
Maa lulawe wandu wetewe wengyi ioloka kyindonyi kyoose, kundu ṙeko lyilawono iṟundenyi lyaṙu.
Indi orio kyindonyi luiwuta luwone kyiṟumi kyicha, cha waṟundi wa Ruwa; kui wusimiri wung'anyi, wukyiwenyi, fowenyi, matuuronyi.
Ngaponyi, shipfungonyi, wuṟiingyinyi, ilya wukyiwa, ilaa kyiṙombo, ikuretekyia.
Mkaṟonyi ngyicha, wuṟangonyi, isimiria, wupfererinyi, Mumuyonyi Mweele, ikundenyi lyilawoṙe wukulembecheṟi.
Ṙeṙonyi lya loi, pfinyenyi ya Ruwa; kui shisha sha wusumganyi sha kuwoko ko kulyoe na sha kuwoko ko kumoso.
Kui kyiṟumi na sonu; kui iṙeṙo uwicho na iṙeṙo necha; cha wandu wailemba, indi lukyeri wandu wa loi.
Cha walaichio, indi waichio mnu; cha waipfa, ate lukyeri na moo; cha waitoṟisho, indi walaiwoogo.
Cha wandu wawoṙo nyi fowa, indi mfiri yoose luwoṙe sia; cha wakyiwa indi lochiiritsa wafoi; cha walawoṙe kyindo, indi luwoṙe shido shoose.
Luilosha kulawoṙe wuowu konyu nyoe Wakorinto. Mrima yaṙu yaloṟa ikunda konyu.
Mrima yaṙu yamukunda nyoe, indi mrima yanyu mukoishinga.
Kyasia kundu mutae iṙuana na chandu muleambilyia (ngaṙeṙa na nyoe cha wana watutu) na mrima yanyu iweloṟe ikunda taa.
Maa mulasanzo hamwi na walaiṙikyie, chandu kyilai sungusinyi; kyipfa kuwoṙe umbuya o mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya wusumganyi na wunyamaṟi? Lyingyi-se hawoṙe isanza lya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya ngyeela na meema?
Kuwoṙe iiṙikyiana lya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya Kristo na ulya Mmbicho? Ang'u ulya aiṙikyie nawoṙe kyi hamwi na ulya alaiṙikyie?
Lyingyi-se hawoṙe iiṙikyiana lya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya hekalu lya Ruwa na ifano? Cha kyipfa soe nyi hekalu lya Ruwa akyeri na moo; chandu Ruwa alegamba kye,
“Ngyechikaa mrimenyi kowo
na ichumia kyiiṙi kyawo
na inyi ngyewa Ruwa owo,
nawo wechiwa wandu wako.”
Koikyo,
“Wukyenyi kyiiṙi kyawo,
mukae kuleshi nawo, Mndumii nagamba,
Maa mulapaaye kyindo kyifanyi,
na inyi ngyemuambilyia.
Ngyewa Awu konyu,
na nyoe mochiwa wana koko
wa kyisoṟo na wa kyika,
Mndumii Mopfinya nagamba.”
Kyasia-ng'u, wakunde wako, cha kyipfa luwoṙe shaasa-sho, lusanje mrima-i yaṙu ilekane na ukoe loose lo mmbiu na mrima, kunu lochiafutsia wuele kui iindia Ruwa.
Luenengyenyi ṙaawa mrimenyi. Lulelyiiya mndu oose mbaka-pfo, maa lulenyamaṟa mndu-pfo, maa lulandewutie mndu kyindo kundu luwone ho kyiira-pfo.
Ngyiṙeṙa kyindo-kyo kundu ngyimuanduye nyoe kye muwoṙe ṙeko-pfo; cha kyipfa ngamsonguo igamba kye, nyoe mukyeri mrimenyi koṙu maa kui ipfa handu hamwi, na ikaa na moo handu hamwi.
Ngyiwoṙe wukari wung'anyi konyu; ngyiwoṙo nyi ikushela lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu. Ngyiichuo nyi iwiyiṟio moo, wukyiwenyi woṙu woose ngaichuo sia ya ngosera.
Cha kyipfa maa kyiyeri luleshika Makyedonia wukyiwa wulya mmbiu yaṙu iweilya wuleanguha-pfo, indi lulewona wukyiwa ngyuura tsoose. Nja kuwewoṙe shiṙa, na mrimenyi fowa.
Kyaindi Ruwa, ekyewiyiṟia wafofo moo, naleluwiyiṟia moo kui icha lya Tito.
Maa chi kui icha lyake tikyi-pfo, indi chandu alewiyiṟio moo nyi nyoe, echiluwia mbonyi tsa ilanga lyanyu, na ṟanyi yanyu, na wuragari wonyu kyipfa kyako, mṟasa ngaengyeṟa ichihiyo.
Cha kyipfa maa chandu paruo iya yako ilemuendie fowa ngyiwihiyo mrimenyi-pfo; maa kokooya ngyilewihiyo mrimenyi, ngyiwonyi kye paruo iya ilemuendie fowa, kyiyeri kyifuhi tikyi.

Wulalu ngyimchihiye, chi kyipfa kya nyoe iwona fowa-pfo, indi kyipfa kya ilyi mulewona fowa, mṟasa mukoṙumbuya wunyamaṟi. Kyipfa mulewona fowa kyipfa kya Ruwa, kundu mulaṙetse kyindo kyipfa kya kyindo lulewuta soe.
Iwona fowa lyikyeri kui mbaṟe ya Ruwa lyekyeende iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi wokyeende wukyiṟo wulawoṙe isumkyia indi fowa ya wuyana yekyeende upfu.

Wulalu moiṙima iwona kyindo kyekyeendo nyi iwona fowa chandu Ruwa akundi. Nyoe moiṙima wulalu iwa wandu wawoṙe ipfuṟukana, wawoṙe kyindo kyegamba. Mokyeṙumbuko nyi maṙima na iowuo; mokyepfuṟukana na iwona kye kya wusumganyi kyiṟundo. Nyoe moloṟa na pata kye muwoṙe ṙeko kyiiṙi kya ikyi ngyigamba-pfo.
Kyasia, maa chandu ngyilemuṟeia paruo, ngyileṟeia kyipfa kya ulya alenyamaṟa, maa chi kyipfa kya ulya alewutio kuṙo-pfo, indi ipfuṟukana lyanyu kyipfa kyaṙu lyiiṙime iṟingyishio konyu mbele ya Ruwa.
Koikyo lulewiyiṟio moo. Lyingyi-se kyiiṙi kya iwiyiṟio moo lyaṙu lulechihiyo mnu ngoseṟa kyipfa kya sia ya Tito; kyipfa nyoe moose mulechihiṟa mrima okye.
Cha kyipfa kokooya ngyilekushela mbele yakye kyindonyi kyoose kyipfa kyanyu, ngyilewona sonu-pfo; indi chandu lulemmbia mbonyi tsoose kui wuloi, na wuṙo ikushela lyaṙu mbele ya Tito lyiwei lya loi.
Na ikunda lyakye konyu lyekyeengyeṟika ngoseṟa, kyiyeri ekyekumbuo iindia lyanyu nyoe moose, chandu mulemwambilyia kui wuowu na iṙeṙema.
Ngachihiyo, kyipfa kyiiṙi kya orio kyindo ngyechiiṙima ikusuria konyu.
Lyingyi-se, wana wa wana waṙu, lummbia ulogo lo isaṟia lya Ruwa, siṟi tsa Makyedonia tsileenengo;
kyipfa kyiyeri waweiyesho kui wukyiwa wung'anyi, sia yawo na wufofo wowo wung'anyi mnu wuleengyeṟa wunjama wo ilekyia lyawo.
Kyipfa ngyimuṟingyishia kye, kui pfinya tsawo, na ngoseṟa ya pfinya tsawo, kulawoṙe iitiko nyi mndu walewuta shindo shawo;
wechiluterewa mnu ko mbonyi tsa isaṟia-lyi, na iṟunda-lyi lyeṟundia wandu wa Ruwa.
Lyingyi-se walewuta kuṙi chi chandu luwekusurie tikyi-pfo, indi kuwooka waleṙambika mrima yawo ko Mndumii; na koṙu taa, iṙuana na chandu Ruwa akundi.
Mṟasa lukoikyimbia Tito naafutsie isaṟia-lyi konyu chandu oe alekoalyiwooka.
Kyaindi chandu muwoṙe shindo shifoi, iiṙikyia, iṙeṙa, na wuṟango, na wuragari woose, na ikunda lyanyu koṙu soe; kyasia na wuṙo muambilyie wuingyi wo isaṟia-lyi taa.
Ngyiṙeṙa kundu ngyimutsindikye-pfo, indi kui wuragari wo wandu wengyi ngyimanye wusimiri wo ikunda lyanyu.
Kyipfa mommanya isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, maa chandu awekyeri mnjama, kyipfa kyanyu, nalewa mkyiwa kundu nyoe muiṙime iwa wanjama kui wufofo wokye.
Na inyi kyipfa kya ikyo, ngyigamba kuṙi, kyachia ko ura lonyu muwookye iwuta shilya mulewooka maka ulesia. Nyoe muwekyeri wa kuwooka iwuta kuṙo.
Kyaindi wulalu afutsienyi kyindo-kyo; kundu chandu muwelangyie itarama, pfuṟukanenyi kuṙo chandu mochiiṙima, muafutsie.
Kyipfa kokooya mndu awoṙe mrima o tarama, Ruwa nekyeambilyia kyilya echiiṙima iwuta, ekyerika kya ngoseṟa-pfo.
Kyipfa ngyigamba isho, kundu wengyi wachihiyo na nyoe muwone wukyiwa-pfo;
indi mbonyi tsiwe necha; kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu wuingyi wonyu wutarame iuṟa lyawo, kundu na wuingyi wowo wumutarame nyoe kyiyeri nyoe mulawoṙe; kundu mbonyi tsiwe necha.
Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Alesania shifoi, aleengyeṟikyio-pfo, maa ulya alesania shitutu aleuṟa kyindo-pfo.”
Kyaindi Ruwa naṟumisho, ulya mowika wuragari wulya wulya kyipfa kyanyu mrimenyi ko Tito.
Kyipfa naleambilyia loi iikyimbio lyilya ngoseṟa. Lyingyi-se echiwika wuragari, nalepfunga kyaro kya iyenda konyu kulawoṙe iitiko.
Na hamwi na oe lukoṙuma mono-wama ulya kyiṟumi kyakye Nduminyi Ngyicha kyileṙunganana siṟinyi koose.
Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi nalesambuṟo nyi siṟi na iyenda kyaro hamwi na soe mbonyinyi tsa isaṟia-lyi, lulyiṟundia, kundu Mndumii naṟumisho, ikuṟeyeṟa lyaṙu lyimanyikye.
Lochikuringa na kyindo-kyi, mndu alachewona ṙeko lyaṙu mbonyinyi tsa kyisumbo-kyi lukyiṟundia;
lukosonguo ikusaṟa gai mecha, chi mbele ya Mndumii tikyi-pfo, indi na mbele ya wandu.
Na soe hamwi nawo loṙuma mono-wama oṙu lulemmbona kyiyeri kyileshi kye nawoṙe wuragari, na wulalu nawoṙe wuragari ngoseṟa mnu kyipfa kya ikusuria lying'anyi awoṙe konyu.
Kyasia mndu kakunda mbonyi tsa Tito, oe nyi mongari oko, na mndu ngyekyeṟunda na oe kyipfa kyanyu; na mndu kakunda mbonyi tsa wana wa wama waṙu, wo nyi wandu wawaṙume nyi siṟi, na mng'ano o Kristo.
Kyasia waloṟenyi mbele ya siṟi wuloi wo ikunda lyanyu, na ikushela lyaṙu kyipfa kyanyu.
Ko mbonyi tseṟundia wandu wa Ruwa kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma ngyimuṟeie-pfo.
Kyipfa ngyiichi ikuṟeyeṟa lyanyu; ikuṟeyeṟa ngyekyekushelyia kyipfa kyanyu ko wandu wa Makyedonia, kye Akaya iwekuṟeyeṟie maka oose; na wuragari wonyu wulekarisha wafoi.
Kyaindi ngyileṙuma wana wa wama-wo, kundu ikushela lyaṙu kyipfa kyanyu lyilailachikye kyiiṙi kya kyindo-kyi; muiṙime ikuṟeyeṟa chandu ngyilegamba,
kundu wandu wa Makyedonia wakacha hamwi na inyi, wakamukooya mulakuṟeyeṟie, soe lulacherigo nyi sonu (lulagambe nyoe), kyiiṙi kya mbaṟe-yo iyo ya ikusuria.

Kyasia ngyilewona kyangyikooya ngyitutume wana wa wama-wa wasonguoe ishika konyu, na iachikyia iwinyi kyisumbo kyanyu mulekyiteṟia wookyia kacha, kundu kyiwe kyamuṟeyeṟo, na kuṙi kyiwe cha kyienengo, maa chi cha kyindo kyekyeenengyio kui iitiko-pfo.
Kyaindi ngyigamba kyindo-kyi, “Mowaaya shaangu nesambuo shaangu; mowaaya kui ilekyia nesambuo kui ilekyia.”
Orio mndu nawute chandu akusurie mrimenyi kokye, chi kui ikuinaṙia, maa chi kui iitiko-pfo; kyipfa Ruwa nakundi ulya ekyeenengyia kui mrima mkyesi.
Na Ruwa neiṙima imuenenga orio mboṟa iingikyie, kundu nyoe mfiri yoose muiṙime iwaṙa orio kyindo mukundi, na muwoṙe orio kyindo mukundi muiṙime ienengyia kulawoṙe iehia.
Chandu kyikyiṟeie,
“Oe nekyeenengyia kui ilekyia,
kaenenga wakyiwa
wusumganyi wokye wokaa mlungana.”
Na ulya ekyeenenga mbeu mndu mowaaya, na mkate uwe kyelya, nemuenenga mbeu tsewaaya na itsiengyeṟa, na oe nechiengyeṟa shilyimu sha wusumganyi wonyu.
Mochiiritso shindonyi shoose muiṙime iwaṙa ilekyia lyoose, lyekyeenenga Ruwa wandu wafoi waimmbia haika kyipfa kya shienengo shanyu wekyeambilyia iwuka koṙu.
Kyipfa iṟunda-lya iṟunda-lyi chi lyetarama wandu wa Ruwa shindo shilya wauṟie tikyi-pfo, indi lyekyeengyeṟika mnu iwaṙa kyiira kui iana lying'anyi Ruwa ekyeenengo.
Cha kyipfa mukoyesho kui iṟunda-lyo, waiṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kya wuindi wonyu kui iṟingyishia Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo, na kyipfa kya ilekyia lyanyu mulewaambutsia wo na wandu woose.
Nawo wawenyi, wechiterewa kyipfa kyanyu, wamukundi mnu mrimenyi kowo kyipfa kya isaṟia lya Ruwa lyileingyikyi mnu konyu.
Ruwa naano kyipfa kya kyienengo kyakye, lulawoṙe maṙeṙo geonguo mbonyi tsakyo.
Kyasia, inyi Paulo ngyimonyi ngyimuterewa kui wuhoo na wuyendelyi wo Kristo, inyi ngyikyeri msimiri ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe, indi ngyilakyeri ho ngyiwoṙe wuṟango na wukari konyu.
Yee, ngyiterewa kye ngyikyeri ho ngyilawaṙe wuṟango na wukari cha wulya ngyiwoṙe ko walya wekyelushitakyi kye soe lokyeosha shindo sha kyiwuyana.
Kyipfa maa chandu luosha shindo sha kyiwuyana, lokyekapana shiṙa kui mbaṟe ya kyiwuyana-pfo;
(kyipfa shisha sha shiṙa shaṙu chi sha kyiwuyana-pfo, indi shiwoṙe pfinya kyiiṙi kya Ruwa mṟasa iunduo moombo;)
lochinyamaṟa makusaṟo na orio kyindo kyekyeshingyia, kyekyeshingyia wuṟango wo Ruwa, na lochichilyia orio mndu naiṙime iindia Kristo.
Lyingyi-se lukowa lukuṟeyeṟie itaa kyiṟaache wuwicho woose, kyiyeri iiṙikyia lyanyu lyeafukyia.
Ambuyenyi shikyeri mbele ya meso ganyu. Mndu kawona oe amonyi kye nyi mndu o Kristo, nawekusaṟe kuṙi taa mrimenyi kokye, kye chandu oe akyeri mndu o Kristo, nyi wuṙo na soe.
Kyipfa maa ngakushela ngoseṟa kyitutu kyipfa kya wuchilyi woṙu (luleenengo nyi Ruwa, luiṙime imugoṟotsa maa chi imuolotsa-pfo), ngyerigo nyi sonu-pfo;
ngyilachewono cha ilyi kye ngyikundi imuowesha kui paruo tsako.
Kyipfa wekyegamba, paruo tsakye tsingyikari na tsioweshie; indi akyeri amonyi kyimmbiu namfofo, na maṙeṙo gakye chi kyindo-pfo.
Mndu o mbaṟe-yo iyo nakusaṟe kuṙi, kye kyindo kyilya lokyeṟeia paruonyi lulakyeri na nyoe nyikyo lochiwuta lukyeri na nyoe.

Cha kyipfa lochikaria ikutala hamwi na wandu waata wa iwo wekyekushela wawenyi, maa ikulyingatsana nawo-pfo. Wandu wekyekuloṟa kye wo nyi kyiyeṟo kyekuyeṟa, na wandu wekyekulyingatsana wo wenyi ko wenyi nyi matondo.
Kyaindi soe luikushela ngoseṟa ya chandu kyiwaṟi koṙu-pfo; indi chandu kyiwaṟi kyiyeṟo kyilya kyikyiwikye nyi Ruwa, nakyo nyi ishika mṟasa konyu.
Kyipfa luikulandaṟa luwenyi kuta chandu kyiwaṟi-pfo, cha ilyi lulaishika konyu nyoe; cha kyipfa lulesonguo ishika mṟasa konyu Nduminyi Ngyicha ya Kristo.
Maa luikushela kuta chandu kyiwaṟi, kyipfa kya iṟunda lya wandu wengyi-pfo; indi ikusuria lyaṙu nyi kye chandu iiṙikyia lyanyu lyiengyeṟika, iṟunda lyaṙu konyu lyeng'ana,
kundu luiṙime ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha ngyuurukyenyi tsingyi kuleshi na nyoe; kulawoṙe ikushelyia iṟunda lyiṟunde nyi wandu wengyi.
Kyaindi ulya mokushela, nakushele kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Kyipfa mndu moiṙikyio chi ulya ekyekushela-pfo, indi nyi ulya ekyeṟumisho nyi Mndumii.
Nanga muweṙuana na inyi wutondonyi woko kyitutu! Yee, muṙuane na inyi.
Kyipfa ngyimunyeng'ia, wunyeng'i wo Ruwa; kyipfa ngyilemukosia msoṟo umwi, kundu ngyiendie Kristo mana mkyega mcha.
Kyaindi ngyiowuo; chandu njoka iya ilelemba Eva kui ngyeṟo tsayo, ilachenyamaṟa makusaṟo ganyu, mukoṙa wunyotsu na wucha wonyu ko Kristo.

Kyipfa mndu oose kacha eonguo Yesu ungyi lulalemwonguo soe, ang'u mukoambilyia mumuyo ungyi alakyeri cha ulya muleambilyia, ang'u ndumi ngyicha ingyi ilakyeri cha iya muleambilyia, muwuta necha iṙuana na oe!
Kyipfa ngakusaṟa kye kuwoṙe kyindo wasu wang'anyi wawoṙe ngyilakyiwoṙe inyi-pfo.
Kyaindi maa kokooya inyi nyi mndu alaichi iṙeṙa, ikyo chi mbaṟe yako wuṟangonyi-pfo, indi ko orio kyindo luleṟingyishio konyu.
Ngyesa ngyilenyamaṟa kui iindia kundu nyoe mung'anyiso, kyipfa kya ilyi ngyilewaongoya Ndumi Ngyicha kulawoṙe wori?
Ngyilesoka siṟi tsingyi masaa gawo, ngawuta kowo kyindo kyako kyelyio kundu ngyimuṟundie nyoe.

Na inyi kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe na ipfula kyindo kyengyitarama, ngyilewa ṟio ko mndu-pfo. Kyipfa wana wa wama walewuka Makyedonia walengyienenga orio kyindo ngyiwekundi; na inyi mbonyinyi tsoose ngyilekuringa ngyilacheewa ṟio konyu maa ale. Lyingyi-se ngyekuringa.
Chandu loi iya ya Kristo ikyeri mrimenyi koko, kuwoṙe mndu echiiṙima ingyiima ikushela mṟasenyi ya Akaya-pfo.
Kyitewe ny' kyi? Ngyesa nyi kyipfa nygilamukundi nyoe? Ruwa naichi.
Kyaindi kyindo ngyiwuta ngyekyiwuta, kundu ngyiwingane na iwo waipfula ṙaawa walawone, kundu kyindo-kyo waikushelyia wawono wakyeri cha soe.
Kyipfa wandu wa mbaṟe-yo-iyo nyi wasu wa wongo, wekyeṟunda kui ngyeṟo, wekyekuloṟa cha ilyi nyi wasu wa Kristo.
Maa chi kyindo kyeṟiyio-pfo. Kyipfa Satana oe amonyi nekyekuloṟa cha ilyi nyi malaika o ngyeela.
Kyasia chi kyindo kying'anyi waṟundi wakye ikuloṟa cha ilyi nyi waṟundi wa wusumganyi wakyeri kye ifurumia lyawo lyechiwa kyimwi na maṟunda gawo-pfo.
Ngyigamba-se, mndu alakusaṟe kye inyi ngyimtondo. Kyaindi maa mukokusaṟa kyako kuṙo, mungyiambilyie cha tondo; kundu na inyi ngyiiṙime ikushela kyitutu.
Kyindo ngyiṙeṙa kyiwukyie ko Mndumii-pfo, indi nyi cha kya wutondo, kui wukari-wu wo ikushela.
Cha kyipfa wafoi waikushela kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu na inyi ngyekushela.
Nyoe, kyipfa muwaṟango, mokyeṙuana na matondo kui sia.
Kyipfa mokyeṙuana na mndu echimmbika wutumonyi, na immbutia shindo shiwicho sha orio mbaṟe maa imukapa ipfo kyaam.
Ngyiṙeṙa kui mbaṟe ya wufofo cha ilyi luwewafofo. Kyaindi kokooya mndu awoṙe wuṟango na wukari kyindonyi kyoose (ngyiṙeṙa kyitondo), maa inyi ngyiwoṙe wuṟango na wukari.
Wo nyi Waebrania? Na inyi taa. Wo nyi Waisiraelyi? Na inyi taa. Wo nyi wa kyishari kya Abrahamu? Na inyi taa.

Wo nyi waṟundi wa Kristo? (Ngyiṙeṙa cha msuko), inyi nyi ngoseṟa. Wukyiwenyi nyi ngoseṟa mnu; shipfungonyi nyi ngoseṟa mnu; kyiiṙi kya ikapo nyi ngoseṟa na kuta; kyiiṙi kya ikyia upfu kyiyeri kyileshi.
Ko Wayuda kataanu ngyilekapo ka makumi gaṟaaṟu na kyenda.
Kaṟaaṟu ngyilekapo na upoi; lyimwi ngyilekapo magoe; kaṟaaṟu ngyilenyamaṟikyio nyi ngalawa; kyingoto puti na kyio taṟaṟa ngyikyeri mṟingyenyi.

Kui iyenda kyaro kafoi; ngataṟa tsa mfo; ngataṟa tsa wasokyi; ngataṟa iwuka ko Wayuda woṙia; ngataṟa iwuka ko wandu wa masanga gengyi; ngataṟa tsa mṟinyi; ngataṟa tsa nukyenyi ngyuumu suwa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga; ngataṟa tsa ipalyipalyinyi; ngataṟa tsa wambuya wa wongo.
Wukyiwenyi na matuuronyi; ilaa kyiṙombo kafoi; njaenyi na wuangarinyi; kyiiṙi kya ikuretekyia kafoi; mbehonyi na iṙio kyiṟanguoe.
Kulawoṙe ionguo shindo shingyi shifoi, orio mfiri ngyiwoṙe maṟunda ga iambuya siṟi tsoose.
Nyi wui akyeri mfofo, na inyi ngyilawe mfofo? Nyi wui aletewo na mndu inyamaṟa na inyi ngyilawihiyo?
Kyikangyikooya ikushela, ngyekushelyia wufofo woko.
Ruwa, Awu o Mndumii Yesu, awaṟi kyiṟumi mṟasa mlungana, naichi kye ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo.
Ipfo Dameskyi mchilyi o mangyi Areta naweiringa mṟi o Wadameskyi, kundu nangyiwaṙe;
na inyi ngasotso dirishenyi lya kyiambasa ngyikyeri kyikapunyi, ngakyiṟo iwuka mawokonyi gakye.
Kyangyikooya ikushela, maa chandu kyilakyicha; kyaindi ngyegamba shindo Mndumii alengyiloṟa ngyikyeri cha mndu ailoṙo na ingyishukuya.

Ngyiichi mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, hamsia cha maka ikumi na ina wulalu (kye nawekyeri kyiiṙi kya mmbiu ngyiichi-pfo; kye nawekyeri nja ya mmbiu ngyiichi-pfo; Ruwa naichi). Mndu-cho naleirio wuye mṟasa ngyinenyi ya kaṟaaṟu.
Na inyi ngyiichi mndu-cho, (kye nawekyeri kyiiṙi kya mmbiu ngiichi-pfo; kye nawekyeri nja ya mmbiu ngiichi-pfo; Ruwa naichi).
Kye naleiro mṟasa Paradiso, kaicho maṙeṙo galekyeiṙima iṙeṙo, galakyeri sungusinyi mndu igaṙeṙa.
Ko mbonyi tsa mndu cha icho ngyekushela; kyaindi kyipfa kyako ngyekushela-pfo, sile mbonyinyi tsa wufofo woko.
Kyipfa kokooya ngyiwekundi ikushela ngyiwechiwa tondo-pfo, kyipfa ngyegamba loi. Kyaindi ngyekushela-pfo, kundu mndu alachengyitalyia ngoseṟa ya isho awonyi koko ang'u ishiicho koko.

Na kyimaṙuma ngyilaiṙime ikushela na ielewetsa kyipfa kya shilya ngyileshukuyo, ngyileenengo kyindo kyewawiṟa mmbiu mbaṟe ya msha, kyindo kyikyeri cha mndu amṙume nyi Satana kundu nangyikape, ngyilachekushela na ielewetsa.
Kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo ngyileterewa Mndumii kaṟaaṟu kye kyingyiwukye.
Na oe kangyiwia, “Isaṟia lyako lyikushikyie; kyipfa wuiṙimi woko wokyeafukyia wufofonyi.” Kyasia ngyekushelyia wufofo woko kui sia ing'anyi, kundu wuiṙimi wo Kristo wukae na inyi.
Koikyo ngyichihiṟo nyi wufofo, shilahio, ngyuukyiwa tsa orio mbaṟe, kyipfa kya Kristo. Kyipfa kyiyeri ngyikyeri mfofo nyi lyo-ndu ngyiwoṙe pfinya.
Ngawa tondo, nyi nyoe mulengyitewe. Kyipfa kyiwekyiwaṟi nyoe mungyiṟumishe, kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo wasu wang'anyi walengyiiṟa nakyo-pfo, maa chandu ngyilakyeri kyindo.
Nyi loi shiṟingyishio shekyeoshana na wasu shileṟundika konyu kui wusimiri woose, kui shiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho na ṟigo.
Kyipfa nyi kyikyi muleuṟa kuta siṟi tsingyi, sile nyi ilyi ngyilalewa ṟio konyu? Ngamuterewa mungyihooṟie wuwicho-wu.

Ambuyenyi kye nyi lya kaṟaaṟu inyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie icha na konyu, maa ngyechiwa ṟio konyu-pfo. Kyipfa ngyipfula masaa ganyu-pfo, indi ngyimupfula nyoe; kyipfa kyiwaṟi wana ikooma kyiseyesoe ko wafee-pfo, indi wafee ko wana.
Na inyi kui sia ing'anyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie iwuta kyoose ngyiwoṙe, maa ikuwuta inyi ngyimonyi kyipfa kya mrima yanyu. Ngyesa mongyikunda kyitutu kyipfa kya ilyi inyi ngyimukundi mnu-pfoe?
Kyaindi kyikuwiie kuṙo, inyi ngyilewa ṟio konyu-pfo; indi nyoe muigamba kye kui iwa mṟango ngyilewawaṙa kui ngyeṟo.
Ngyesa kuwoṙe mndu oose ngyilemṙuma konyu, ngammbia namtose kyindo?
Ngyileikyimbia Tito, ngaṙuma mono-wama ulya hamwi na oe. Ngyesa Tito nalemtosa kyindo? Ngyesa lulechumia kui Mumuyo ulya ulya na ndifonyi tsilya tsilya-pfoe?
Mokusaṟa kye maa wulalu luṙeṙa mbonyi tsekuringa konyu! Mbele ya Ruwa luiṙeṙa kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Na isho shoose, wakunde, nyi kyipfa kya imukarisha nyoe.

Kyipfa ngiowuo, ngyilachemukooya chandu ngyilakundi imukooya mukongyiwona konyu chandu mulawekusurie ingyiwona ngyilachekooya kofia nyi wuṟiingyi na wunyeng'i, na nyashi, na maluyano, na iiriana wongo, na iṙeṙana, na makushelo, na kyituṟu.
Na inyi ilyi ngyechicha-se, Ruwa oko alachengyienenga irigo nyi sonu konyu, na inyi ngyisuo kyipfa kya wafoi waleṙeko wookyia iho, walaṙumbuye wunyamaṟi wo ukoe, na wuṟui, na lango tsingyi tsa sonu.
Nyi kamba lya kaṟaaṟu inyi icha na konyu. Kui maṙumbu ga waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu orio ṙeṙo lyechimanyika na pata.
Ngasonguo immbia, na chandu ngyiwekyeri ho lya kawi, na wuṙo maa wulalu ngyilakyeri ho, ngyimmbia na pata iwo walewuta sha wunyamaṟi wookyia kyiyeri-kyo, na wengyi woose, kye ngacha, ngyehooṟia-pfo.
Cha kyipfa muipfula chandu Kristo akyeri, icho aiṙeṙa mrimenyi koko, ulya alakyeri mfofo konyu, indi nawoṙe pfinya mrimenyi konyu.
Kyipfa nalewoogio msalabenyi, wufafenyi, kyaindi nai na moo kui pfinya tsa Ruwa. Kyipfa maa soe lukyeri wafafa kyiiṙi kyakye; indi lochikaa na moo hamwi na oe kui pfinya tsa Ruwa.
Kuruwe-ruwenyi muwenyi kye mukyeri iiṙikyienyi. Kuṟingyishienyi muwenyi. Ang'u muichi muwenyi kye Yesu Kristo nakyeri mrimenyi konyu? Sile molego.
Kyaindi ngyikusurie kye momanya kye soe lulelego-pfo.
Na soe luiterewa Ruwa, maa mulawute kyindo kyoose kyiwicho. Chi kundu soe lukuloṟe kye luwaiṙikyie-pfo, indi nyoe muwute kyilya kyikyicha, maa chandu soe lukyeri cha wandu walelego.
Kyipfa loiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose kyilakyeri kya loi-pfo, indi kyipfa kya wuloi.
Kyipfa luchihiyo, kokooya soe lukyeri wafofo, na nyoe muwoṙe pfinya. Lyingyi-se loterewa muwe wandu waafutsie kyiiṙikyia.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, ngyiṟeia ishi ngyilakyeri ho, kundu ngyikyeri ho, ngyilaṟunde kui wuchilyi wulya ngyileenengo nyi Mndumii, kui ikarisha mrima maa chi iinyamaṟa-pfo.
Numa ya iho, wana wa wama, nakonyu. Muafutsie, muwiyiṟio moo. Kusurienyi kyimwi, mukae ufoṟonyi. Na Ruwa o ikunda na ufoṟo nechikaa hamwi na nyoe.
Iṟikyiṟanenyi chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
Wandu wa Ruwa woose wamuiṟikyiṟa.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, na ikunda lya Ruwa, na isanza lya Mumuyo Mweele, lyikae na nyoe moose.
Inyi Paulo, ngaṟeia paruo-i, ngyikyeri msu (chi msu o wandu maa amṙume nyi mndu-pfo, indi amṙume nyi Yesu Kristo, na Ruwa Awu alemṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu),
na woose waiṙikyie Yesu wakyeri hamwi na inyi loiṟikyiṟa siṟi tsoose tsa Galatia.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu, na ko Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Ulya alereka mrima okye kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, kundu nalukyiṟe mawicho ga kunu wuyanenyi lukyeri wulalu, chandu Ruwa, Awu oṙu, alekunda.
Kyiṟumi kyikae na oe, mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Ngyimṟiyie kyipfa muiṙa iwinyi kuṙo ulya alemulaga isaṟienyi lya Kristo, na igalukyia malosho ga mbaṟe ingyi gaigambo kye nyi ndumi ngyicha.
Kuwoṙe ndumi ngyicha ingyi-pfo; kyaindi kuwoṙe wandu waipfuṟukana wakundi iilacha Ndumi Ngyicha ya Yesu Kristo.
Kyaindi kokooya soe ang'u malaika o ruwewu amulosha shindo shingyi shilakyeri shilya lumuongoya, nawusio kyiseso.
Chandu lulesonguo igamba, na wulalu ngyigamba-se, mndu oose kamuongoya ndumi ngyicha ingyi ilakyeri iya muleambilyia koṙu, mndu-cho nawusio kyiseso.
Kyipfa wulalu ngyesa ngyikundi ikundo nyi wandu? Ote! Kyindo ngyikundi nyi ikundo nyi Ruwa. Kyipfa kokooya ngyiwekundi mṟasa wulalu ichihiṟa wandu, ngyiwechiwa mṟundi o Kristo-pfo.
Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama wako, Ndumi-yo Ngyicha ngyilemuongoya, ngyimmbia kye ilewuka ko wandu-pfo.
Cha kyipfa ngyileiambilyia ko wandu, maa ilosho nyi mndu-pfo, indi kui ishukuyo nyi Yesu Kristo.
Kyipfa muleicho mbonyi tsa mkaṟo yako wookyia mawookyionyi kyiyeri ngyiwekyeindia Ruwa chandu Wayuda wekyemwindia; kye ngyilelyisa Siṟi ya Mndumii wukyiwa wuelewetsie, ngyetambagana iinyamaṟa.
Na inyi wandunyi wa rika lyako inyi ngyiwekyeri mbele kuta wengyi kyipfuṟukanionyi kyeindia Ruwa chandu Wayuda wekyemwindia, ngatambagana mnu iosha shilya ngyileambilyia ko waku wako.
Kyaindi Ruwa alengyisaanga wookyia wosinyi ko wama oko, kangyilaga kui isaṟia lyakye;
kyiyeri alewona nyi necha iṟingyishia Mono-kye mrimenyi koko, kundu ngyiongoye walya walaiṙikyie Yesu mbonyi tsakye; maa ngyileyenda ko mndu oose immbesa kyindo-pfo.
Maa ngyilekunda iyenda Yerusalemu ko walya walengyisongoya iwa wasu-pfo; indi ngyileyenda uruka lo Waarabu na numa ya iho ngawuya-se na Dameskyi.
Numa ya iho; hamwiṙe maka iṟaṟu, ngaṙo iyenda Yerusalemu kundu ngyiwonane na Kyefa, ngakaa kokye mfiri ikumi na itanu.
Kyaindi ngyilewona msu ungyi sile Yakobo, mono-wama o Mndumii-pfo.
Na isho ngyimuṟeia nyoe, ambuyenyi, mbele ya Ruwa, ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo.
Numa ya iho ngyileyenda ngyuura tsa Shamu na Kyilyikyia.
Kyaindi ngyilewono kyaam kyako nyi siṟi tsa Uyuda tsiwekyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo-pfo;
indi waleicho tupu kye icho mfiri ya ipfo numa awekyewalyisa wukyiwa, wulalu naionguo mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia alelyinyamaṟa ilyi kacha.
Wakaṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kyako.
Numa ya iho, hamwiṙe maka ikumi na ina, ngaṙo-se iyenda Yerusalemu ngyiṙuṙanyi na Barinaba na Tito.

Na inyi ngyileyenda kyipfa ngyileshukuyo ngawia wandu Ndumi Ngyicha iya ngyekyeongoya walya walakyeri Wayuda, kyaindi kui kyiṟika ko walya wawoṙe kyiṟumi, kyilacheewa kofia ngyiṙicha wulya, ang'u ngyileṙicha wulya.
Kyaindi Tito awekyeri hamwi na inyi, na oe nyi Mkyiṟikyi, aleitiko iṙino-pfo.

Indi kyipfa kya wandu walekuloṟa kye waiṙikyie Yesu na kunu waweiṙikyie-pfo, wandu walekulunga na soe kui kyiṟika kundu wamanye mbonyi tsaṙu soe lulawachilyie nyi kyindo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, kundu ilyi numa waluwikye wusingyenyi.
Kyaindi kyipfa kya iringa ulogo lo Ndumi Ngyicha luleiṙikyia waluchilyie maa ale-pfo, kundu wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha wukae na nyoe.

Kyaindi walya wawoṙe kyiṟumi na kye wawoṙe rina (ngyilesaṟa wawei kuṙa-pfo kyipfa koko shilyingananyi shoose; na Ruwa ekyeambuya kyaam kya mndu-pfo); ngagamba iwo wawoṙe kyiṟumi walengyiengyeṟia kyindo-pfo.
Indi kyilaṙuṙanyi na isho, kyiyeri walewona kye ngyimṙambikye Ndumi Ngyicha ya wandu walakyeri Wayuda, chandu Petiro aleṙambiko Ndumi Ngyicha ya Wayuda;
(kyipfa ulya aleenenga Petiro wuiṙimi wo iwa Msu o Wayuda nyi oe alengyienenga na inyi wuiṙimi wo iyenda ko walya walakyeri Wayuda.)

Lyingyi-se kyiyeri walemanya isaṟia lyilya ngyileenengo; Yakobo, na Kyefa, na Yohane, wawoṙe kyiṟumi kye nyi ngoe, waleiṙikyia iṟunda hamwi na inyi na Barinaba; kundu soe luyende ko walya walakyeri Wayuda, nawo wayende ko Wayuda.
Indi waleluwia luwute kyindo kyimwi, lutarame wakyiwa, na ikyo ngyilekyiṟunda kui wuragari.
Kyaindi kyiyeri Kyefa alecha na Antiokyia, ngyilegaluana na oe ushangu kui ushangu, kyipfa nawewaṟi ianduyo.
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri wandu waata wawukyie ko Yakobo walawendeche, naweilya handu hamwi na wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu; kyaindi kyiyeri wo walecha, kawuya na numa, kalekana nawo, kunu echiowuo Wayuda.
Na Wayuda-wo, wengyi wakaowuo hamwi na oe, mṟasa na Barinaba kawaṙa wukulembecheṟi chawo.

Kyaindi, kyiyeri ngyilewona kye mkaṟo yawo iṙuṙanyi necha na wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha-pfo, ngyilewia Kyefa mbele ya wandu woose, “Kokooya iyoe ukyeri Myuda nuosha miichiwie ya wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, maa chi ya Wayuda-pfo, ny'kyilyi uitika wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu iosha miichiwie ya Wayuda?”
Soe lukyeri Wayuda kui ifeo, maa chi waṙeko wawukyie ko walya walakyeri Wayuda-pfo,

luichi kye mndu ekyetalyio wusumganyi kui mawuto ga mawawaso-pfo, indi kui iwaṙa iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu. Soe luleiṙikyia Kristo Yesu kundu lutalyio wusumganyi kui iiṙikyia Kristo, maa chi kui mawuto ga mawawaso-pfo; kyipfa kui mawuto ga mawawaso kuwoṙe mndu echitalyio wusumganyi-pfo.
Kyaindi kokooya soe luwenyi, kui ipfula italyio wusumganyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, lulewono kye luwanyamaṟi, ngyesa Kristo nawa mṟundi o wunyamaṟi? Ote!
Kyipfa ngawika-se shilya ngyilemshiunduo, ngaloṟa kye inyi ngyimonyi nyi mṙeko.
Kyipfa inyi ko mbonyi tsa mawawaso ngyipfiie kundu ngyiwaṙe moo kyipfa kya Ruwa.

Ngyilekapio msalabenyi hamwi na Kristo; kyaindi ngyiwoṙe moo; maa chi inyi-se-pfo, indi Kristo nai na moo mrimenyi koko. Na moo ngyiwoṙe wulalu mmbiunyi ngyiuwoṙe kyiiṙi kya iiṙikyia Mana o Ruwa, ulya alengyikunda kareka moo okye kyipfa kyako.
Ngyikundi iwiyitsa kuleshi ikunda lya Ruwa ko wandu-pfo; kyipfa kokooya wusumganyi wokyewono kui njia ya mawawaso, kyasia Kristo nalepfa wulya.
Lanyoe Wagalatia mulawoṙe wuṟango, nyi wui alemloga, nyoe walya Yesu Kristo alemuloṟa na pata kye nalekapio msalabenyi?
Ngyikundi ikulosha kyindo kyimwi konyu. Ngyesa muleambilyia Mumuyo Mweele kui mawuto ga mawawaso ang'u kui iicho Ndumi Ngyicha na iiṙikyia Yesu?
Ngyesa mulewa matondo mbaṟe-i iyi? Mommbookye kui Mumuyo, mukundi iafutsia kui pfinya tsanyu muwenyi?
Ngyesa molya wukyiwa wung'anyi kuṙi wulya? Loi chi wulya-pfo. Kyilya kyilemmbutikyia kyiwaṟi imuenenga ikusaṟa chandu kyiweng'anyi.
Kyasia, ulya ekyemuenenga Mumuyo na iwuta shindo sha maṟiyisho kyiiṙi kyanyu, ngyesa nekyewuta kuṙo kui mawuto ga mawawaso, ang'u kui iicho Ndumi Ngyicha yekyeende iiṙikyia Yesu?
Chandu Abrahamu aleiṙikyia Ruwa katalyio wusumganyi.
Kyasia manyenyi-ng'u kye walya wawoṙe iiṙikyia, iwo nyiwo wana wa Abrahamu.

Na kyiṟeio kyiele, chandu kyilewona wookyia kacha kye Ruwa nechitalyia wusumganyi walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kui iiṙikyia, kyileongoya Abrahamu Mbonyi Ngyicha kyiyeri kya kacha igamba, “Kyiiṙi kyapfo iyoe walya walaiṙikyie Yesu wechiwona mboṟa.”
Kyasia iwo wakyeri wa iiṙikyia wekyewona mboṟa hamwi na Abrahamu awekyeri mndu awoṙe iiṙikyia.
Cha kyipfa woose wakyeri wa mawuto ga mawawaso, wakyeri kyisesonyi; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Namsese ulya alekyeosha shindo shoose shikyeri kyitapunyi kya uwawaso.”
Nyi kyindo kyiichio na pata kye kuwoṙe mndu ekyetalyio wusumganyi mbele ya Ruwa kui mawawaso-pfo; cha kyipfa, “Mndu msumganyi nechiwaṙa moo kui iiṙikyia.”
Na uwawaso lulecha kui iiṙikyia-pfo, indi, “Ekyewuta isho nechiwaṙa moo kyiiṙi kya isho.”
Kristo naleluwuta kyisesonyi kya uwawaso, cha kyipfa naleseso kyipfa kyaṙu; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Orio mndu amkapie msalabenyi namsese.”
Kundu kye mboṟa ya Abrahamu ikooye walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo, luiṙime iambilyia kyaasa kya Mumuyo kui njia ya iiṙikyia.
Wana wa wama wako, ngyiṙeṙa kyimndu. Maa chandu kyikyeri nyi kyaasa kya wandu, kyaasa kyikammbiko, kuwoṙe mokyiilacha ang'u ikyiengyeṟa-pfo.
Kyasia Abrahamu naleenengo shaasa hamwi na ulya alemfee. Aigamba, “Ko walya alefee” cha ilyi nyi wafoi-pfo, indi cha ilyi nyi umwi, “Ko ulya ochimfee,” kyimwi na igamba Kristo.
Kyindo ngyigamba nyi ikyi, kyaasa kyilewiko mawookyionyi nyi Ruwa, uwawaso lulecha maka magana gaana na makumi gaṟaaṟu numa ya kyaasa-kyo loiṙima iilacha kyaasa-kyo-pfo.
Cha kyipfa kyioṟa kyikawa nyi kui mawawaso, kyikyewa-se kyaasa-pfo; kyaindi Ruwa nalesaṟia Abrahamu kui njia ya kyaasa.
Kyasia uwawaso nyi kyikyi-ng'u? Uwawaso luleṙiko kyipfa kya maṙeko, mṟasa nache icho amwenengye kyaasa-kyo; kyaasa kyileendo nyi malaika kyiyeri Mose alewa mndu Ruwa alemṙuma ko wandu.
Kyasia ulya akyeri moṙumo chi moṙumo ko mndu umwi-pfo; indi Ruwa nyi umwi.
Kyasia, ngyesa uwawaso lokyewingana na shaasa sha Ruwa? Ote! Cha kyipfa kokooya mawawaso gekyeende moo galaleṙiko, loi wusumganyi wuwechiwono kui mawawaso.
Kyaindi kyiṟeio kyiele kyagamba kye wuyana woose wuwuchilyie nyi wunyamaṟi kundu iwo waiṙikyie waenengo kyaasa kui iiṙikyia waenengo kyaasa-kyo kui iiṙikyia Yesu Kristo.
Kyaindi kyiyeri iiṙikyia lyilya lyilawendeche luwewachilyie nyi mawawaso, lukowa cha wandu wakyeri kyipfungonyi, mṟasa kyiyeri kyeiṙikyia Yesu kyechicha, kyiyeri Ruwa echiloṟa.
Koikyo uwawaso lowa msongoru moluende na ko Kristo, kundu lutalyio wusumganyi kui iiṙikyia.
Kyaindi kokooya iiṙikyia lyilemcha, lukyeri-se wanda ya msongoru-pfo.
Cha kyipfa nyoe moose mowa wana wa Ruwa kui njia ya iiṙikyia Kristo Yesu.
Kyipfa nyoe moose muwapatise kyiiṙi kya Kristo muṟee Kristo.
Kuwoṙe-se Myuda maa Mkyiṟikyi-pfo. Kuwoṙe-se mtumo ang'u alakyeri mtumo-pfo. Kuwoṙe-se mndu msoṟo maa mndu mka-pfo. Kyipfa nyoe moose mowa kyindo kyimwi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Na kokooya nyoe nyi wandu wa Kristo, kyasia mowa wana wa Abrahamu, na weoṟa iṙuana na kyaasa.
Kyaindi ngagamba kye mokyioṟa, kyiyeri kyoose ai mana, nakyeri cha mtumo, kyiyeri awuye ammbiie kyindo echioṟa.
Indi nakyeri wuchilyinyi wo walya wawawikye wamwambuye na imwenenga shilya akundi mṟasa kyiyeri awuye echigamba kye kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kyewika wandu weambuya mokyioṟa-cho-pfo.
Na wuṙo na soe, kyiyeri luwekyeri wana watutu, lukowa watumo wa mumuyo ichilyie wuyana.
Na lyilya kyiyeri kyilya kyiwekyikunde kyileafukyia, Ruwa naleṙuma Mono-kye, ulya alefeo nyi mndu mka, nafeo wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso,
kundu nakyiṟe walya wawewachilyie nyi mawawaso, kundu soe luiṙime iambilyia iwa wana.
Na kyipfa nyoe mowa wana, Ruwa naleṙuma Mumuyo o Mono-kye mrimenyi konyu, ekyegamba, “Aba,” kyimwi na igamba Awu.
Kokooya nyi wuṙo, iyoe chi mtumo-se-pfo indi nukyeri mana; na kokooya nukyeri mana, kyasia nukyeri mokyioṟa ko Ruwa.
Kyaindi kyiyeri kyilya, kyipfa mulaweichi Ruwa, muleṟundia shindo shilakyeri waruwa.
Indi wulalu mommanye Ruwa, ang'u ngoseṟa Ruwa imumanya nyoe, nyi kyikyi kyitewe kyewiyilyia malosho ga mawookyionyi gamafofo, gai mti, galya mukundi igaṟundia-se?
Mokyekuwinisha na mfiri, na mori, na shiyeri, na maka.
Ngyikusaṟa mnu kyipfa kyanyu, kyilawe kofia ngyilekuwinisha wulya kyipfa kyanyu.
Wana wa wama wako, ngamterewa, muwe cha inyi, kyipfa inyi nyi cha nyoe. Mulengyilyiia mbaka kyindonyi kyoose-pfo.
Kyaindi muichi kye ngyilemuongoya Ndumi Ngyicha lya kuwooka kyipfa kya wufafa wo mmbiu.
Na kyiyesho kyilempaaya nyoe mmbiunyi oko mulekyimina maa ikyilega-pfo, indi mulengyiambilyia cha malaika o Ruwa, cha Kristo Yesu.
Kyasia, nyi kyikyi kyammbutikye kyeiṙima igaluo ishi shoose? Kyipfa ngyiṟingyishia kye, kokooya kyiwechiiṙimika, muwekuluo meso ganyu, mungyienengye inyi.
Ngyesa ngawa mokyituwa onyu kyipfa ngyimmbia shikyeri sha loi?
Iwo wawoṙe ilanga lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, kyaindi chi kui njia ngyicha-pfo, indi wakundi imshingyia nja, kundu kye nyoe muwalangye wo.
Na nyi kyindo kyicha iwaṙa wunyeng'i kyipfa kya kyindo kyicha mfiri yoose, maa chi kyiyeri ngyikyeri na nyoe tupu-pfo.
Mbuya tsako wakunde, walya kyipfa kyawo ngyiwoṙe iwawio lying'anyi mrimenyi mṟasa muwe cha Kristo;
ngyilangyie kui mrima oko oose ikaa halya-ndu mukyeri wulalu, kundu ngyiilachikye na iloṟa lyako chandu ngyimukundi.
Ngyiwienyi, nyoe mukundi ichilyio nyi mawawaso. Ngyesa mokyeicho kyindo mawawaso gagamba-pfoe?
Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie kye Abrahamu nawewoṙe wana wawi, umwi alefee na kyisinga, na umwi na mka o wolyi.
Kyaindi mana ulya o kyisinga nalefeo kui mmbiu, na ulya o mka o wolyi kui kyaasa.
Shindo-shi shekyeṙeṙo kui mfano; cha kyipfa iwa wawi nyi cha mma ya mbaṟe tsiwi; mma umwi iwuka fumvu lya Sinai, okyewaṙa wana kui wusinga, na mma-cho nyi Hajiri.
Kyipfa Hajiri nyi cha fumvu lya Sinai lyikyeri urukyenyi lo Waarabu, lyilyingananyi na Yerusalemu ya wulalu; cha kyipfa nekyeṟunda hamwi na wana.
Indi Yerusalemu ya wuye nyi mka ulya o wolyi, na oe nyi oe wama oṙu soe.
Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie,
“Chihiyo, iyoe muumba, ulekyewaṙa wana;
kuilengye na ṟui lying'anyi, ufiiṟe,
iyoe ulawoṙe fowa cha ya mndu mka aienengo mana.
Kyipfa wana wa ulya amṙe amonyi nyi wafoi
kuta wa ulya awoṙe mii.”
Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, cha Isakyi, soe nyi wana wa kyaasa.
Kyaindi chandu kyiyeri kyilya ulya alefeo kui mmbiu alelyisa wukyiwa ulya alefeo kui Mumuyo, nyi wuṙo kyikyeri maa wulalu.
Kyaindi kyiṟeio kyiele kyagamba kuṙa? “Funa kyisinga na mono-kyo, cha kyipfa mana o kyisinga echioṟa maa ale hamwi na mana o mka o wolyi-pfo.”
Koikyo, wana wa wama wako, soe chi wana wa kyisinga-pfo indi nyi wana wa ulya ai mka o wolyi.
Kyiiṙi kya iwa wana wa mka o wolyi Kristo nalelugaluo wandu walakyeri wuchilyinyi wo kyindo kyoose. Koikyo maa mulalolome, maa ichilyio-se nyi wutumo.
Inyi Paulo ngammbia nyoe kye, mukoṙino, Kristo echiwaṙa kyiira konyu-pfo.
Lyingyi-se ngyiṟingyishia orio mndu ekyeṙino kye nyi iṟunda lyakye iafutsia uwawaso loose.
Muwasaangye nyi Kristo, nyoe mukundi italyio wusumganyi kui mawawaso, mooloka na iwuka isaṟienyi.
Kyipfa soe kui Mumuyo luiweṙelyia ikusuria lya wusumganyi kui njia ya iiṙikyia.
Kyipfa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu iṙino, maa iṙa iṙino lyiwoṙe kyiira kyoose-pfo, indi iiṙikyia lyekyeṟunda kui ikunda.
Muweitambagana necha; nyi wui alemushingyia mulaindie wuloi?
Chi Ruwa alemushingyia-pfo, kyipfa nyi oe ekyemlaga muyende kokye.
Chachu kyitung'tu yekyetarang'isha itongye lyoose.
Kyiiṙi kya Mndumii ngyikusaṟie kye moiṙima iwaṙa makusaṟo ga mbaṟe ingyi-pfo. Kyaindi mndu oose aimuenenga wuowu nechianduyo.
Na inyi, wana wa wama wako, kokooya ngyionguo mbonyi tsa iṙino, ny'kyilyi ngyilyiso wukyiwa mṟasa wulalu? Kokooya ngyiweionguo kuṙo ilosha lyako kye Kristo nalepfa msalabenyi lyiwewa lya wulya.
Ngyiwechihiyo mnu kokooya iwo waimfoga-foga wawekuletsana na nyoe nakamwi.
Kyipfa nyoe, wana wa wama, mulelago muwe wandu mulawachilyie nyi kyindo. Kyaindi kulya iwa wandu walawachilyie nyi kyindo kulawe kyimaṙuma kyeosha lango tsa mmbiu, indi ṟundianenyi kui ikunda.
Kyipfa uwawaso loose lukyeri kyindonyi kyimwi tupu, nakyo nyi ikyi, “Ukunde momṟasa opfo chandu ukukundi kumonyi.”
Kyaindi mukowika cha mando ga saka, ambuyenyi mularumatsane.
Kyasia ngagamba, chilyionyi nyi Mumuyo Mweele; maa mulawute kyilya mrima yanyu ikundi tupu.
Cha kyipfa mmbiu okyelanga ochiwingana na Mumuyo, na Mumuyo iwingana na mmbiu; kyipfa ishi shekyeṙuana-pfo, na moiṙima iwuta shilya mukundi-pfo.
Kyaindi mukosongoyo nyi Mumuyo, mukyeri wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso-pfo.
Kyasia mawuto ga mmbiu gai na pata, nyigo iga: wuṟui, ukoe na lango tsa sonu,
iindia mafano, wusawi, isuana, iluyana, wunyeng'i, nyashi, wuṟiingyi, nduutsano, iṙeṙa wongo.
Wunanzi, ilya na ielewetsa, na shindo shifananyi na isho; kyiiṙi kya isho ngammbia kulawoṙe ikyelyio, chandu ngyilemummbia kye wandu wekyewuta shindo sha mbaṟe-yo wechioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
Kyaindi ndunda tsa Mumuyo nyi ikunda, sia, ufoṟo, ikarishia, kyiṙo kyicha, itarama wakyeri wukyiwenyi, iwuta kyilya mndu ateṟia,
wuhoo, iwaṙa meena. Kuwoṙe iwawaso lya mbonyi tsa shindo cha isho-pfo.
Na iwo wakyeri wa Kristo Yesu wekyechilyio-se nyi lango tsa mmbiu yawo-pfo.
Mumuyo naluenengyie moo, koikyo lumwenengye momu o iluchilyia.
Maa lulakushele wulya, lochisouana na iwoniana wunyeng'i.
Wana wa wama wako, mndu kaasha kyindonyi kyoose, nyoe mukyeri wa Mumuyo mmbiyiṟenyi kui ngoo ya wuhoo, ochikuringa mrima opfo ulacheyesho.
Taramanenyi na iosha iwawaso lya Kristo.
Kyipfa mndu kakuwona kye nyi kyindo, na oe chi kyindo-pfo, nakulemba mrimenyi kokye.
Kyaindi orio mndu naeneng'ene iṟunda lyakye amonyi, nyi lyo-ndu eiṙima iwaṙa kyimaṙuma kyekushela mrimenyi kokye tupu, maa chi ko oṙoe-pfo.
Kyipfa orio mndu nechikuṙika mlari okye amonyi.
Manalosho naongoye mlosha okye shindo shicha shoose.
Maa mulakulembe, Ruwa chi tondo-pfo; cha kyipfa kyilya mndu awaaya nyikyo echisambuo.
Kyipfa ulya awaaya kui mmbiu okye, mmbiunyi okye nechisambuo wunyamaṟi; indi ulya awaaya kui Mumuyo, Mumuyonyi nechisambuo moo o mlungana.
Lyingyi-se maa lulalemo iwuta shindo shicha; kyipfa lochisambuo ilyi kyiyeri kyechishika, lulandewine.
Koikyo iṙuana na chandu lowona ṙaawa luwutie wandu shindo shicha; ngoseṟa walya waiṙikyie Yesu.
Chandu inyi ngyimonyi ngyimuṟeia paruo wulalu,
woose wakundi iwono kye nyi wandu wecha ko mbonyi tsa mmbiu nyiwo waimuitika iṙino; kundu walalyiso wukyiwa nyi msalaba o Kristo tikyi.
Cha kyipfa maa walya wawaṙine wekyeosha kyilya mawawaso gakundi-pfo; indi wakundi nyoe muṙino, waiṙime ikushelyia mmbiu yanyu.
Kyaindi inyi, ote, ngyilakushelyie kyindo kyoose sile msalaba o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, ulya ulengyienenga inyi iṙa iosha mbonyi tsa wuyana.
Cha kyipfa iṙino ang'u iṙa iṙino chi kyindo-pfo, indi kyindo kying'anyi nyi iwa mndu mhya.
Na woose wechiwaṙa mkaṟo iṙuṙanyi na ikyo, ufoṟo lukae kowo na iwoniana wukyiwa, yee ko wandu woose wa Ruwa.
Wookyia wulalu mndu alangyilyise wukyiwa; cha kyipfa ngyiṙuṙe ngoru tsa Kristo mmbiunyi koko.
Wana wa wama wako, isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na mrima yanyu. Amen.
Inyi Paulo, ngyikyeri msu o Kristo Yesu chandu Ruwa akundi, ngaṟeia paruo-i konyu nyoe wandu wa Ruwa wakyeri [Efeso] waiṙikyie Kristo Yesu.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, aleluwikyia mboṟa kui mboṟa tsoose tsa mrimenyi, wuyanenyi wo mumuyo, kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Chandu alelusambuṟa kyiiṙi kyakye kyiyeri wuyana wulawendegumbo, kundu luwe wandu wa Ruwa, wandu walawoṙe mti mbele yakye ikundenyi.
Cha kyipfa nalesonguo ilusambuṟa, kundu nalugaluo wana wakye kui njia ya Yesu Kristo, iṙuana na kyilya akundi.
Mng'ano o isaṟia lyakye uṟumisho, alelusaṟia kyiiṙi kya icho Mkunde.
Kyiiṙi kyakye kui samu yakye, luwoṙe wukyiro woṙu, ihooṟio wunyamaṟi, iṙuana na isaṟia lyakye lying'anyi.
Na oe naleluengyeṟia ikyo wuṟangonyi woose na wunyotsu;
amluloṟe kyiṟika kya kyilya akundi, iṙuana na kyilya akundi kyiiṙi kya icho.
Nyi kyimwi na igamba kye, iende wusongoru wo kyiyeri kyiafukyie nesanzia handu hamwi shindo shoose kyiiṙi kya Kristo, shindo sha ruwewu na shindo sha wuyanenyi taa. Yee, kyiiṙi kya icho.
Na kyiiṙi kyakye soe taa lulewiko kyioṟa, kunu lochisambuṟo wookyia mawookyionyi iṙuana na kyilya oe akundi, ekyewuta shindo shoose iṙuana na kyilya akundi.
Na soe kyiiṙi kya icho luiṙime iwa kyiṟumi kya mng'ano okye, soe lulesonguo iwikyia Kristo ikusuria lyaṙu.
Na nyoe taa kyiiṙi kya icho momuicho ulogo lo loi, Ndumi Ngyicha ya wukyiṟo wonyu. Lyingyi-se momumwiṙikyia oe, na iwiko fana nyi Mumuyo ulya o kyaasa akyeri Mweele.
Nyi oe akyeri mogoṟokyia kyioṟa kyaṙu, kundu naende wukyiṟo wo Wumangyi wokye, wuwe kyiṟumi na mng'ano okye.
Kyipfa kya ikyo maa inyi, wookyia ngyileicho mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu, na ikunda lyanyu ko wandu wa Ruwa woose,
ngyekyeṙa iana kyipfa kyanyu-pfo; ngyemukumbuo shiterewonyi shako.
Ruwa o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, Awu o mng'ano, namuenengye nyoe Mumuyo o wunyotsu na o ishukuyo kui Mumuyo kyiiṙi kya immanya oe.
Ruwa naṟuguo mrima yanyu iiṙime iwona, mumanye ikusuria lya ilaga lyakye chandu lyikyeri; na wusuṟi wo mng'ano wo kyioṟa kyakye wandunyi wa Ruwa chandu wukyeri.
Na wucha wo wung'anyi wo wuiṙimi wokye mrimenyi koṙu luiṙikyie chandu wukyeri; kui iṙuana na iwuta lya pfinya tsa wuiṙimi wokye;
alewuta kyiiṙi kya Kristo lyilya alemṟutsa ko wapfu, kammbika kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe ruwewu;
wuye mnu kuta Wumangyi woose, na wuchilyi na pfinya, na orio rina lyekyesendo, maa chi kunu wuyanenyi tupu-pfo, indi wulya wuicha taa.
Kawika shindo shoose wuchilyinyi wo Kristo, kammbika nawe mṙoe wuye ya shindo shoose kyipfa kya Siṟi; ikyeri
nyiyo mmbiu okye, na iafutsia lyakye oe ekyeenenga shindo shoose iafutsio koose.
Na nyoe muwewapfu kyipfa kya iuṟa wuindi na ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu.
Ngyuunyamaṟi muletsiwuta kacha kui iosha mchilyi ang'anyi o waṟufui wa ngyinenyi, mṟufui ulya o Satana aiṟunda maṟunda wulalu kyiiṙi kya walya waiwingana na Ruwa;
wakyeri kye kacha, soe loose luleweṟunda kui isanza nawo, langonyi tsa mmbiu yaṙu, kyiyeri luleosha lango tsa mmbiu na makusaṟo gaṙu, lukowa kui mwichiwie oṙu wana wa nyashi kyimwi na iwo wengyi.
Kyaindi Ruwa kyipfa akyeri o isaṟia lying'anyi, kui ikunda lyakye lying'anyi alelukunda;
mṟasa kyiyeri kyilya luwekyeri wapfu kyipfa kya maṙeko gaṙu; naleluṟutsa hamwi na Kristo; kyimwi na igamba kye, mulekyiṟo kui isaṟia.
Kaluṟutsa hamwi na oe, kaluṟamiṟa hamwi na oe wuyanenyi wo ruwewu, kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Kundu kyiiṙi kya shiyeri-sho shiicha naloṟe ielewetsa lya isaṟia lyakye kui wucha wokye koṙu soe kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Cha kyipfa mulekyiṟo kui isaṟia, kui njia ya iiṙikyia; chi kui ipfuṟukana lyanyu-pfo, nyi kyisumbo kya Ruwa;
maa chi kui mawuto-pfo, mndu oose alachekushela.
Kyipfa nyi wuṙo luwagumbe, lulegumbo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, luwute mawuto mecha, igo wookyia kacha Ruwa alegaṟeyeṟa kundu luwute luṙo.

Kyipfa kya ikyo kumbuonyi kye kacha nyoe, muwewafee cha wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa. Wayuda wekyemulaga, “Wandu walawaṙine,” Wayuda walya wekyegamba kye wo nyi “Wandu waṙine,” kyimwi na igamba kye, nyi iṙino lya mmbiu lyilyiwute kui mawoko.
Kyiyeri-kyo kya kacha mulawewoṙe Kristo, muwelekanyi na mbaṟe ya Isiraelyi, wayenu walawoṙe shiteṟio sha kyaasa kyilya. Muwewoṙe ikusuria-pfo, maa muweichi Ruwa-pfo.
Kyaindi wulalu, kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, nyoe muwekyeri kuleshi iho mawookyionyi, mowa kufuhi kui samu ya Kristo.
Kyipfa oe nyi oe ufoṟo loṙu, aleluwutia soe luwekyeri wawi lukowa umwi; kafunja kyiambasa kya makyiṙi-gawi kyiweluletsanie.
Na oe ammbute kyituwa kyilya kui mmbiu okye; nyigo mawawaso ga shindo wandu wawaṟi iwuta na walawaṟi iwuta; kundu nawikye iwo wawi wawe mndu umwi mhya kyiiṙi kyakye; kaende ufoṟo.
Kawasanza woose wewawi na Ruwa mmbiunyi umwi, kui njia ya msalaba, amrumatse kyituwa kyilya kui msalaba-cho.
Kacha kacheonguo ufoṟo konyu nyoe muwekyeri kuleshi, na ufoṟo ko walya wawekyeri kufuhi.
Cha kyipfa kokye soe loose lulewona njia yetikyira kufuhi na Awu Mumuyonyi umwi.
Kyasia wookyia wulalu nyoe chi wayenu maa wandu waikuiṙia-pfo, indi nyoe nyi wandu walakyeri wayenu hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa, wandu wa kanyi ko Ruwa.
Muwawikye urendenyi lo wasu na weonguo shisuku, na Kristo Yesu amonyi nyi igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.
Kyiiṙi kyakye numba yoose iwaṙanyi necha na ing'ana mṟasa iwe hekalu lyiele kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Kyiiṙi kyakye nyoe muwawikye handu hamwi ikaa kanyi ko Ruwa Mumuyonyi.
Kyipfa kya ikyo inyi Paulo nyi mpfungo o Kristo Yesu kyipfa kyanyu nyoe wandu mulaiṙikyie Ruwa;
kokooya mulemuicho mbonyi tsa isaṟia lya Ruwa ngyileenengo kyipfa kyanyu.
Kye kui ishukuyo nyi Mumuyo ngyileloṟo kyiṟika-kyo chandu ngyilesonguo iṟeia kui maṙeṙo maangu.
Koikyo mukogasoma, moiṙima imanya shindo ngyiichi kyiiṙi kya wuṟikyi-wu wo Kristo.
Kyiṟika-kyo kyilaleloṟo wandu wa marika gengyi; chandu waleloṟo kui Mumuyo wasu wakye waele na weonguo shisuku kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu Mumuyonyi.
Kye wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa nyi weoṟa handu hamwi na soe wa kyioṟa kyimwi, na wa mmbiu umwi, na iambilyia hamwi kilya Ruwa aleteṟia, kyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu kui njia ya Ndumi Ngyicha.
Ndumi-yo Ngyicha ngyilewiko mṟundi oyo, iṙuana na kyisumbo kya isaṟia lya Ruwa ngyileenengo iṙuana na iṟunda lya wuiṙimi wokye.
Inyi, ngyikyeri mtutu kuta ulya akyeri mtutu o wandu wa Ruwa woose, ngyileenengo isaṟia-lyi lyeongoya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wunjama wo Kristo wulekyeiṙima iyeṟo;
na iloṟa ngyeela ko wandu woose wamanye mbonyi tsa wuchilyi wo kyiṟika-kyo kyikyeri kye wookyia shiyeri shoose kyiwekyiṟikye kyiiṙi kya Ruwa alegumba shindo shoose.
Kundu wulalu, kui njia ya Siṟi, wunyotsu wo Ruwa wukyeri wo mbaṟe tsifoi wumanyikye na ngyuumangyi na wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo Mumuyo,
iṙuana na ikusuria lya mlungana alelyikusuria kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
Kyiiṙi kyakye luwoṙe wuṟango na wukari na wuiṙimi wo tikyira kufuhi ikusurienyi kui njia ya imwiṙikyia.
Kyasia ngyiterewa maa mulapfiiyo nyi mṙoe kyipfa kya ngyuukyiwa tsako kyipfa kyanyu, tsikyeri mng'ano konyu.
Koikyo ngyipfiria Awu ndi,
icho akyeri kye kui rina lyakye wuawu woose wo ruwewu na wo wuyanenyi wuisendo.
Namutarame, iṙuana na wunjama wo mng'ano okye, ikarisha kui pfinya, kui iṟunda lya Mumuyo okye, naengyeṟe imukarisha.
Kristo nakae mrimenyi konyu kui iiṙikyia, muwakarishe ikundenyi.
Kundu muiṙime imanya handu hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa woose chandu ikunda lya Kristo lyilyilandari, na chandu lyiwoṙe wuleshi wo iyenda wuye na wo iyenda wanda.
Na imanya ikunda lya Kristo lyieṟie wuṟango woose chandu lying'anyi, muiṙime iafutsia kui iafutsio lyoose lya Ruwa.
Kyasia naṟumisho oe ekyeiṙima iṟunda shindo sha maṟiyisho mnu kuta shoose lokyeterewa na ikusaṟa, iṙuana na pfinya iṟunda maṟunda mrimenyi koṙu.
Yee, naṟumisho Siṟinyi na kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu mṟasa marika goose ga mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Koikyo ngyimuterewa, inyi ngikyeri mpfungo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, mukae chandu kyiwaṟi kyilya mulelagio.
Kui wuindi woose na wuhoo, kui wusimiri, mochiwanzana ikundenyi;
na ipfuṟukana iwa mbumbu imwi kui iwaṙana kui ufoṟo.
Mmbiu umwi, na Mumuyo umwi, chandu mulewelago ikusurienyi lyimwi lya kyilya mulelagio.
Mndumii umwi, iiṙikyia lyimwi, wupatiso wumwi.
Ruwa umwi, na oe nyi Awu o wandu woose, akyeri Mndumii o shoose, ekyeṟunda kyiiṙi kya shoose na akyeri shindonyi shoose.
Kyaindi orio umwi oṙu naleenengo isaṟia iṙuana na kyiyeṟo kya kyisumbo kya Kristo.
Chandu shiṟeio shiele shigambie,
“Lyilya aleṙo na ruwewu,
nalewinga na isoka Satana walya awewachilyie
kaenenga wandu shienengo.”
Kyasia ṙeṙo-lyo, “Iṙo na ruwewu,” lyagamba-kyi kokooya sile nyi igamba kye na oe taa nalesoka mṟasa wanda ya uruka?
Na icho alesoka nyi oe aleirio wuye mnu kuta ngyina tsoose, kundu naichuṟe shindo shoose.
Na oe nalesambuṟa wengyi iwa wasu; na wengyi iwa weonguo shisuku; na wengyi iwa wainjilisti; na wengyi iwa walyisi na walosha;
kyipfa kya iafutsia wandu wa Ruwa, kundu maṟunda getaramana gaṟundikye, mṟasa mmbiu o Kristo ukarisho.
Mṟasa na soe loose luiṙime iwa mbumbu imwi kui iiṙikyia na imanya mnu Mana o Ruwa, mṟasa iwa wandu waafutsie kyiiṙikyia, na wapfulukyie cha Kristo.
Kundu lulawe-se wana watutu, lochiwiyitso ipfo na ipfo, na iṙoo nyi orio mkuma o malosho geṙetsa, kui ngyeṟo tsa wandu, kui mbiṟi, lochiosha njia tsa wulembi.
Kyaindi luṙeṙe loi ikundenyi na ing'ana mṟasa lumkooye shindonyi shoose, oe akyeri mṙoe, Kristo.
Kui oe mmbiu oose ochilungo na iwaṙana kui wutarami wo orio kyiwungo, iṙuana na iṟunda lya orio kyiwungo; iṟunda lyekyeṙosa mmbiu uiṙime ikukarisha umonyi ikundenyi.
Kyasia ngyigamba kuṙi, lyingyi-se ngyiṟingyishia kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, wookyia wulalu maa mulawute chandu wandu wekyewuta, wuwichonyi wo makusaṟo gawo.
Walya ngyuuṟango tsawo tsilewiko meema, nawo walewiko kuleshi na moo o Ruwa, kyipfa kya wutondo wukyeri mrimenyi kowo, kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yawo.
Wakyeri kye wakampfa ngapfu wekyekuwika mbonyinyi tsa ukoe waiṙime iwuta orio kyindo kya wunyamaṟi kui ilanga.
Indi nyoe, chi wuṙo mulekulosha ko Kristo-pfo.
Mulemuicho mukolosho kyiiṙi kyakye, chandu loi ikyeri kyiiṙi kya Yesu.
Ṙenyi mbonyi tsa mchumie o kuwooka o mndu o kacha, okyenyamaṟika kui iosha lango tsekyelemba.
Mugalutso muwe wandu wahya ikusurienyi lya mrima yanyu.
Muwaṙe mchumie o mndu mhya, ulegumbo kui mbaṟe ya Ruwa wusumganyinyi na wuelenyi wo loi.
Kyasia ṙenyi wongo, muṙeṙe loi orio mndu na momṟasa okye; kyipfa soe lukyeri shiwungo, orio umwi kyiwungo kya oṙoe.
Kaponyi nyi nyashi, indi mulanyamaṟe; mnengyeṟi ulaolokyie nyashi ilandesie.
Maa mulaenengye Mokyiriinzi ṙaawa.
Mwiwi alaiwe-se; indi nanga apfuṟukana, echiwika wuragari wo iṟunda lyicha kui mawoko gakye amonyi, nawaṙe kyindo kyetarama mndu alawoṙe.
Ṙeṙo lyoose lyiwicho lyilawukye maṙumbunyi ganyu, indi lyilyicha lyeiṙima itarama ulya alangyie ṙeṙo lyicha, kundu lyienengye isaṟia walya wechilyiicho.
Maa mulaenengye ikuinaṙia Mumuyo ulya Mweele o Ruwa; akyeri kye kokye mulewiko fana yeṟingyishia mṟasa mfiri o ikyiṟo.
Isuo lyoose lying'anyi na nyashi tsoose na ikalagatsa na shilahio shilakae konyu, hamwi na wuwicho wo orio mbaṟe.
Lyingyi-se taramanenyi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi mochiwoniana fowa mrimenyi, muhooṟiane chandu na Ruwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo alemuhooṟia nyoe.
Koikyo oshenyi Ruwa, cha wana wakunde.
Muchumie ikundenyi, chandu na Kristo alemukunda nyoe, lyingyi-se kareka moo okye kyipfa kyaṙu, kyiano na kyiṙaso ko Ruwa, iwa mpfaamo o kyindo kyekyepfaama necha.
Kyaindi wuṟui wulawono konyu maa ale, maa ukoe loose, maa ilanga, chandu kyiwaṟi wandu wa Ruwa.
Maa sonu, maa maṙeṙo ga wutondo, maa ngaruo; isho shekyechihiṟa-pfo; indi nanga iana.
Kyipfa mbonyi-tsi mutsiichi necha, kye kuwoṙe mṟui maa mndu o wuilala wo wolyi, maa mndu awoṙe wulanga, nyi oe moindia ifano, awoṙe kyioṟa Wumangyinyi wo Kristo na Ruwa-pfo.
Mndu alamulembe kui maṙeṙo galawoṙe kyiira; cha kyipfa, kyipfa kya ikyo nyashi ya Ruwa yekyeolokyia wana wa wunyamaṟi.
Kyasia mulakae handu hamwi nawo.
Cha kyipfa kacha nyoe muwekyeri meema, indi wulalu mowa ngyeela kyiiṙi kya Mndumii. Wutenyi cha wana wa ngyeela;
kyipfa ndunda ya ngyeela nyi wuchenyi woose na wusumganyinyi na loi;
mochipfuṟukana ikulosha nyi kyikyi kyekyechihiṟa Mndumii.
Mulakae handu hamwi na wandu wawoṙe mawuto ga meema galawoṙe ndunda, indi mugaṙeṙie.
Kyipfa isho shiwutika kowo kui kyiṟika, nyi sonu maa ishigamba.
Kyaindi shoose shishiṙeṙie shekyeloṟo nyi ngyeela; kyipfa orio kyindo kyikyiloṟe nyi ngyeela.
Koikyo shiṟeio shagamba,
“Amka, iyoe uirengyera,
uṟukye ko wapfu,
na Kristo nekulyimikyia.”
Kyasia ambuyenyi necha chandu muiwuta; chi cha wandu walawaṟango-pfo indi cha wandu waṟango.
Mochiwuta necha mfiri-i cha kyipfa shiyeri-shi sha wulalu nyi sha mawicho.
Kyipfa kya ikyo mulawe matondo, indi mumanye ny'kyikyi Mndumii akundi.
Lyingyi-se mulanango mpfinyo, kyipfa wuwoṙe mbonyi tsa ukoe, indi muichuṟo nyi Mumuyo.
Ṙeṙenyi kui shiimbo shetembecheṟa mrima. Imbienyi Mndumii na ianga mrimenyi konyu;
