na iana Ruwa Awu mfiri yoose kyipfa kya shindo shoose, rinenyi lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo;
orio mndu echiṟundia oṙoe necha kyiiṙi kya iindia Kristo.
Lanyoe waka, indienyi wamii wanyu cha iindia Mndumii oṙu.
Cha kyipfa mii nyi mṙoe o mka, chandu Kristo na oe nyi mṙoe o Siṟi; na oe nyi mkyiṟa o mmbiu.
Kyaindi chandu Siṟi yekyeindia Kristo, nyi wuṙo waka nawo waindie wamii wawo shindonyi shoose.
Lanyoe wasoṟo, kundenyi waka wanyu, chandu Kristo na oe alekunda Siṟi, kareka moo okye kyipfa kyayo;
kundu nailyishe Siṟi na iisanja kui mṟinga Ṙeṙonyi.
Naiṙime ikuenenga oe amonyi Siṟi iwoṙe kyiṟumi ilawoṙe ṙeko ang'u kyindo kyoose kyiwicho, indi iwe ngyiele ilawoṙe maṙeko.
Wuṙo wuṙo wasoṟo kyawakooya ikunda waka wawo cha mmbiu yawo wawenyi. Akunda mka nakukunda amonyi.
Kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu asuuye mmbiu okye handu hoose-pfo; indi nekyeuenenga kyelya na iuambuya necha, chandu Kristo na oe aiwutia Siṟi.
Kyipfa soe lukyeri shiwungo sha mmbiu okye.
Kyipfa kya ikyo mndu nechiṙa awuye na wamae, naoshane na mka okye, na iwo wewawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi.
Wuṟikyi-wu wung'anyi; indi inyi ngyiṙeṙa mbonyi tsa Kristo na Siṟi.
Kyaindi orio mndu nakunde mka okye chandu akukundi amonyi, maa mka alaṙe iindia mii okye.
Lanyoe wana, indienyi wafee wanyu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, kyipfa iwu nyiwo wusumganyi.
India awuyo na womoo. Iwawaso-lyi nyilyo iwawaso lya kuwooka lyiwoṙe kyaasa,
uwone ona, ukae mfiri ifoi wuyanenyi.
Na nyoe waawu, maa mulasouoe wana wanyu; indi waṙosenyi kyiiṙi kya iowuo na iindia Mndumii.
Nyoe watumo, indienyi iwo wai wandumii wanyu kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu, kui wuowu na iṙeṙema, kui ikutitiṟa mrimenyi, cha iindia Kristo.
Maa chi kui wutumo wo meso tikyi cha waikukomba ko wandu-pfo; indi cha watumo wa Kristo, mowuta shechihiṟa Ruwa kui mrima.
Kui ikusuria lyicha cha iṟundia Mndumii maa chi mndu-pfo.
Mochimanya kye orio kyindo kyicha mndu echiwuta neenengo ikyo ikyo nyi Mndumii, kokooya nyi mtumo ang'u ote.
Na nyoe wandumii wawutienyi wo isho isho, mochiṙa iwaowesha, kunu mochimanya kye oe akyeri Mndumii owo na onyu nakyeri ruwewu, maa kokye kuwoṙe ikundia-pfo.
Mafurumionyi, engyeṟenyi iwaṙa wukari kyiiṙi kya Mndumii na wuiṙiminyi wo pfinya tsakye.
Ṟaenyi shisha shoose sha Ruwa, muiṙime iwingana na ngyeṟo tsa Satana.
Kyipfa ikapana lyaṙu soe chi na wandu-pfo; indi nyi na ngyuumangyi na pfinya, na wang'anyi wa meema-chu, nguulyimalyi tsa waṟufui wawicho wuyanenyi wo waṟufui.
Kyipfa kya ikyo irenyi shisha shoose sha Ruwa, muiṙime iwingana mfiri ya mawicho na mukommarisa shoose, igoṟoka.
Kyasia goṟokyenyi, mukuinewie loi shitsinyi, na iṟaa wusumganyi kyipootenyi,
na iwa wandu wakuṟeyeṟie iyenda ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha ya ufoṟo.
Ngoseṟa ya shoose mochiambilyia ngawo ya iiṙikyia, iya kui iyo mochiiṙima irumisha mfi yoose ya moṙo ya mmbicho ulya.
Lyingyi-se ambilyienyi wukyiṟo wukyeri cha kofia yanyu ya menya, na Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa cha ushu muenengo nyi Mumuyo.
Kui shiterewo shoose mochiterewa orio kyiyeri Mumuyonyi, mochilaa kyiṙombo kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo, mochiterewia wandu wa Ruwa woose;
na kyipfa kyako taa, ngyienengo pfinya yeonguo kundu ngyiiṙime iloṟa wandu kyiṟika kyilya kya Ndumi Ngyicha.
Ndumi Ngyicha iya kyipfa kyayo inyi ngyiṙeṙa handu ha Kristo maa chandu ngyimpfungye, ngyiwaṙe wuṟango na wukari wo ionguo chandu kyingyiwaṟi ionguo.
Kyasia kundu nyoe muiṙime imanya mbonyi tsako, Tikyiko, mono-wama mkunde, aiṟunda na soe, akyeri msimiri kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, nemumanyisha shindo shoose.
Ulya ngyimṙuma konyu kyipfa kya ikyo muiṙime imanya mbonyi tsaṙu, na oe nawiyiṟie mrima yanyu moo.
Ufoṟo lukae na wana wa wama waiṙikyie Yesu, na ikunda, hamwi na iiṙikyia, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Isaṟia lyikae na woose wakundi Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo kui njia ilawoṙe inyamaṟika.
Paulo na Timoteo, waṟundi wa Kristo Yesu, lomuṟeia paruo nyoe wandu wa Ruwa moose kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, mukyeri Filyipi, hamwi na maaskofu na mashemasi.
Isaṟia lyiwe konyu na ufoṟo luwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Ngyiana Ruwa oko orio kyiyeri ngyekyemukumbuo,
mfiri yoose orio kyiyeri ngyekyemuterewia nyoe moose, ngyechiterewa kui sia,
kyipfa kya iwaṙana lyanyu iṟundenyi lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, wookyia mfiri ulya o kuwooka mṟasa inu.
Na inyi ngyikyiiṙikyie nyikyo ikyi, kye ulya alewooka iṟunda lyicha mrimenyi konyu nechilyiafutsia mṟasa mfiri Yesu Kristo echiwuya.

Wuṙo wuṙo chandu kyikyeri iṟunda lyako ikusaṟa ishi kyipfa kyanyu moose; cha kyipfa nyoe mukyeri mrimenyi koko; cha kyipfa kyipfungonyi kyako na iṟundenyi lyeringa kyiṟumi kya Ndumi Ngyicha, na iiṟingyishia, nyoe moose muleambilyia isaṟia-lyi hamwi na inyi.
Kyipfa Ruwa nyi mṟingyishi oko, ngyimkundi nyoe chandu Yesu Kristo amkundi.
Na ikyi nyikyo kyiterewo kyako, kye ikunda lyiengyeṟikye, wuṟangonyi na imanya lyoose;
muiṙime iambilyia gai mecha; kundu muiṙime iwaṙa mrima ilawoṙe ukoe, kulawoṙe ṙeko, mṟasa mfiri ulya Yesu Kristo echiwuya;
muwaichuṟe shindo shicha shilya Yesu tikyi eiṙima imuenenga wuiṙimi wo ishiwuta, kui mng'ano na kyiṟumi kya Ruwa.
Kyaindi, wana wa wama wako, ngyikundi mumanye kye shindo shoose shilengyiwutikyia nyi kyipfa kya ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, maa asikari woose wekyeringa numba iya Kaisari ekyekaa ilyi ai maṟundenyi na wandu wengyi woose waichi kye inyi ngyikyeri kyipfungonyi kyipfa ngyii mṟundi o Kristo.
Na wana wa wama wengyi wakyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo, wechikarisho nyi iwiko lyako kyipfungonyi, waleengyeṟa mnu ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kulawoṙe wuowu.
Wengyi waionguo mbonyi tsa Kristo, kyipfa kya wunyeng'i na wuṟiingyi; na wengyi kui makusaṟo mecha.
Iwa wekyeonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo kui ikunda, waichi kye ngyimmbikye ngyiringye kyiṟumi kya Ndumi Ngyicha.
Indi wengyi wekyeonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo kui wuṟiingyi, maa chi kui mrima mwilyi-pfo, wakusaṟie kye kui iwuta kuṙo wechiengyeṟa ngyuukyiwa tsa iwiko lyako kyipfungonyi.
Ikyo wakundi ingyiwutia koko chi kyindo-pfo. Kyaindi ko orio njia, kokooya nyi kui ngyeṟo, ang'u kokooya nyi kui wuloi, mbonyi tsa Kristo tsigambo; koikyo ngyichihiyo, yee, na inyi ngyechichihiyo.
Kyipfa ngyiichi kye ishi shengyigalukyia shiwe wukyiṟo woko, kyipfa kya shiterewo shanyu na kyitarama kyiwukyie ko Mumuyo o Yesu Kristo ngyechiwa mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo;

chandu ngyileweṙelyia mnu, na ikusuria, kye ngyechirigo nyi sonu maa ale-pfo, indi kui wusimiri woose, cha mfiri yoose, na wulalu nyi wuṙo Kristo echienengo kyiṟumi mmbiunyi koko; kokooya ngyii na moo, ang'u ngyipfiie.
Cha kyipfa koko inyi iwaṙa moo nyi Kristo, na ipfa nyi kyiira.
Indi kokooya iengyeṟa iwaṙa moo kyimmbiu koko inyi nyi ndunda tsa iṟunda lyicha, kyasia, ngyiichi nyi kyindo kyiha ngyesambuṟa-pfo.
Kuwoṙe shindo shiwi shingyikuruo. Ngyikundi iyenda ngyikae na Kristo; kyipfa nyi necha ngoseṟa.
Indi iengyeṟa ikaa iha wuyanenyi nyi kyindo kying'anyi ngoseṟa kyipfa kyanyu.
Na inyi ngyikusurie isho, ngyiichi kye ngyechikaa hamwi na nyoe, kundu muiṙime ichihiyo iiṙikyienyi;
mṟasa muengyeṟe ikushela kyiiṙi kya Kristo kyipfa kyako, kyipfa kya ikaa lyako hamwi na nyoe-se.

Kyaindi mkaṟo yanyu iwe chandu malosho ga Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo gakundi, kundu ngacha na immbona nyoe, maa ngyilakyeri ho, ngyiicho mbonyi tsanyu, kulawoṙe iloloma kye mugoṟokyi Mumuyonyi umwi, kui mrima umwi mochikapania iiṙikyia lya Ndumi Ngyicha;
maa muowuye washituwa wanyu kyindonyi kyoose-pfo. Kowo iwo nyi kyiṟingyishio kya iṙeka, indi konyu nyoe nyi kyiṟingyishio kya wukyiṟo, wulya wuwukyie ko Ruwa.
Kyipfa muwaenengye kyipfa kya Kristo, chi imwiṙikyia tupu-pfo, kyaindi na ilyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kyakye;
mochiwaṙa iwingana lyilya lyilya mulelyiwona koko, na iicho kye ngyiwoṙe mṟasa wulalu.
Kyasia kokooya kuwoṙe iwiyiṟiana moo kyiiṙi kya Kristo, kokooya kuwoṙe ikarishana kui ikunda, kokooya kuwoṙe iwaṙana Mumuyonyi, kokooya kuwoṙe iwoniana wukyiwa,
ngyienengyenyi sia ing'anyi, kundu muwe na makusaṟo gamwi, wandu muwoṙe ikunda lyimwi, wawoṙe mrima umwi, mochikusaṟa iwuta kyindo kyimwi.
Maa mulawute kyindo kyoose kui iwingana ang'u kui makushelo; indi kui wupfereri, orio mndu nawone oṙoe kye nawoṙe kyiira kuta oe.
Mndu alakuwinishe kyipfa kya shindo shakye amonyi, indi nakuwinishe kyipfa kya shindo sha oṙoe.
Waṙenyi makusaṟo galya galya Yesu Kristo awewoṙe;
ulya ipfo mawookyionyi awei Ruwa, kyaindi alalewona kulya iwa kyimwi na Ruwa kye nyi kyindo kyemwenenga ikuyeṟa na Ruwa;
kyaindi nalekuloṟa kye awoṙe mng'ano oose-pfo, kawa cha mtumo, kafanana na mndu.
Lyingyi-se, kyiyeri alewono ai cha mndu, nalepfereria, kawaṙa wuindi mṟasa upfunyi, yee, upfu lo msalabenyi.
Koikyo lyingyi-se Ruwa nalemwiria wuye, kamwenenga Rina lyiiṟie orio rina;
kundu kui iiṙia ko Yesu shindo shoose shipfirie ndi, sha ruwewu, sha wuyanenyi, na sha wanda ya wuyana;
na kundu orio mndu nagambe kye YESU KRISTO NYI MNDUMII, kui mng'ano o Ruwa Awu.
Kyasia wakunde wako, chandu mulepfereria mfiri yoose, chi kyiyeri inyi ngyiwekyeri ho tupu-pfo, indi wulalu ngoseṟa mnu ngyilakyeri ho, afutsienyi wukyiṟo wonyu muwenyi kui iowuo na iṙeṙema.
Cha kyipfa nyi oe Ruwa aiṟunda maṟunda mrimenyi konyu, iambilyia lyanyu na iṟunda lyanyu, kui iafutsia makusaṟo gakye mecha.
Ṟundenyi shindo shoose kulawoṙe inuṟia maa iwingana,

muiṙime iwa wana wa Ruwa walaiwio kye wawawicho, maa walekyelemba, walawoṙe tewe rikyenyi lyilekyeicho, lyilakyeri njienyi ya sungusinyi. Walya kyiiṙi kyawo muwonekanyi cha ilyi mukyeri shimii wuyanenyi,
mochiosha mbonyi tsekyeende moo, ngyiwone kyimaṙuma kya ikushela mfiri ulya Kristo echiwuya, kye ngyileṙicha wulya maa ikuwinisha wulya-pfo.
Yee, maa kokooya ngyechiwoogo na kuṙo ngyiwe cha samu yawuto iwe kyiṙaso kyilya iiṙikyia lyanyu lyekyeenenga Ruwa. Ngachihiyo; lyingyi-se ngachihiyo hamwi na nyoe moose.
Na nyoe wuṙo chihiyonyi; lyingyi-se chihiyonyi hamwi na inyi.
Kyaindi ngyikusaṟie kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo iṙuma Timoteo nache na konyu mfiri ya kufuhi, na inyi ngyiwiyiṟio moo, ngyiichi mbonyi tsanyu.
Kyipfa ngyiwoṙe mndu ungyi awoṙe makusaṟo gamwi na inyi, echikuwinisha mnu na nyoe-pfo.
Kyipfa woose waikuwinisha na mbonyi tsawo wawenyi, chi sha Kristo Yesu-pfo.
Kyaindi muichi kyiṟumi kyakye, kye naleṟunda handu hamwi na inyi iṟundenyi lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, cha mana o awu okye.
Kyasia, ngyikusaṟie iṙuma icho iwinyi, kyiyeri-kyo ngyechimanya shindo shechingyiwutikyia.
Na inyi ngyiiṙikyie kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kye na inyi ngyechicha mfiri ya kufuhi.
Kyaindi ngyilewona kyingyiwaṟi iṙuma Epafurodito konyu, mono-wama oko, alewuka konyu icheṟunda handu hamwi na inyi.
Cha kyipfa nalangyie mnu immbona nyoe na nalewihiyo mnu mrimenyi kyiyeri aleicho kye momanya mbonyi tsa ndoṟe yakye.
Cha kyipfa naweluoe nakamwi, ai kufuhi na ipfa; kyaindi Ruwa nalemmbonia wukyiwa; maa chi oe amonyi tupu-pfo, indi na inyi taa; ngyilawaṙe ikuinaṙia lyielewetsie.
Koikyo ngapfuṟukana mnu imṙuma, kundu ilyi mochimmbona-se muiṙime ichihiyo, na inyi ngyianguhiṟio ikuinaṙia lyako.
Kyasia muambilyienyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kui sia yoose, mochiwona wandu cha ichu kye nyi wandu wawoṙe rina.
Cha Kyipfa kyipfa kya iṟunda lya Kristo nalekyiṟe-pfa; na nalewuta isho shoose kundu ngyienengo kyitarama nyoe mulaleiṙima ingyienenga.
Numa ya iho, wana wa wama wako, chihiyonyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii. Imuṟeia mbonyi tsilya tsilya chi kyindo kyilengyienenga nyashi-pfo, indi nyi kyindo kyechimuenenga kyiira nyoe.
Kushowenyi na wandu wakyeri cha shite, walya wekyewuta shindo shiwicho. Kaenyi kuleshi na walya wekyeitika wandu iṙino.
Kyipfa soe luwaṙine loi, soe lokyeana na iterewa Ruwa kui Mumuyo, na ikushela kyipfa kya Kristo Yesu, maa lokyekusuria mmbiu-pfo.
Kyaindi inyi ngyeiṙima ikusuria mmbiu. Mndu oose kawona kye nawoṙe kyimaṙuma kya ikusuria mmbiu, inyi ngyekusuria mmbiu ngoseṟa.
Ngyileṙino mfiri o nyanya, nyi Mwisiraelyi, o mbaṟe ya Benyamen, waku wako woose nyi-we Waebrania, na ko mbonyi tsa iosha uwawaso inyi nyi Mfarisayo.
Ko mbonyi tsa ipfuṟukana, ngyilepfuṟukana loi ilyisa Siṟi wukyiwa, na kui iwaṙa wusumganyi kyipfa kya iosha kyilya mawawaso gakundi ngyiwewoṙe tewe-pfo.
Kyaindi shindo shilya shiwewoṙe kyiiṙa koko ngyileshiwona nyi shindo sha wulya kyipfa kya Kristo.

Yee, ngoseṟa ya isho, ngyiwonyi shindo shoose nyi sha wulya kyipfa kya wucha wung'anyi mnu wo imanya Kristo Yesu, Mndumii oko; ulya kyipfa kyakye ngyileṙetsa shindo shoose ngyechishiwona kye nyi mboshia kundu ngyiwone Kristo.

Lyingyi-se ngyilungo tapu na oe, ngyilawaṙe wusumganyi woko ngyimonyi wulya mndu ekyewona kui iosha mawawaso, indi ngyiwaṙe wusumganyi wulya wokyewono kui iiṙikyia lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo, wusumganyi wulya wuwukyie ko Ruwa, kui iiṙikyia.
Kundu ngyimmanye oe, na wuiṙimi wo iṟuka lyakye, na ilya wukyiwa wulya alelya, ngyechifananyisho na ipfa lyakye;
kundu ngyiiṙime kui njia yoose ishika mfiri o iṟutso lya wapfu.
Chi kye ngamshika, ang'u ngamwafutsia-pfo; indi ngyipfuṟukana iṙicha kundu ngyiiṙime irakuo iṟikoso lyilya Yesu Kristo awelyikusaṟie mṙoenyi kokye kyiyeri alengyigaluo ngawa mndu okye.
Wana wa wama, ngyikusaṟie mrimenyi koko kye ngamrakuo iṟikoso-lyo-pfo; indi ngyiwuta kyindo kyimwi tupu; ngyechiwaṙima shilya shikyeri numa na ipfuṟukania shilya shikyeri mbele.
Ngyiengyeṟa iṙicha, ngyikooye iṟikoso lya moo mhya, ulya Ruwa alengyilagia kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Kyasia soe lukyeri wandu waafutsie kyimrima lukusaṟe isho; na maa mukokusaṟa shindo shingyi kyindonyi kyoose, Ruwa nechimushukuya na ilyo.
Kyaindi luengyeṟe iwuta iṙuana na shilya luleosha mṟasa iho.
Wana wa wama wako, ngyioshenyi inyi, muambuye na iosha walya wekyewuta shilya lulemummbia.
Kyipfa ngyilemummbia kafoi na wulalu ngyimmbia-se kui mcheṟeṟe kye kuwoṙe wandu wafoi mkaṟo yawo yekyenyamaṟa kyimaṙuma kya Yesu ipfa halya msalabenyi.
Mafurumionyi gawo nyi irumatso, ruwa owo nyi lango tsa mmbiu, wekyekushelyia shindo sha sonu, na iwinia shindo sha kunu wuyanenyi.
Cha kyipfa soe nyi wandu wa ruwewu; lyingyi-se luiweṙelyia na macha gang'anyi, Mkyiṟa Mndumii Yesu Kristo;
echiilacha mmbiu oṙu o wufofo, uiṙime ifanana na mmbiu okye o kyiṟumi, kui wuiṙimi wulya echiiṙima ichilyia nawo shindo shoose.
Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, wakunde wako, ngyiwoṙe ilanga lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, sia yako na iṟikoso lyako, koikyo goṟokyenyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kulawoṙe iloloma, wakunde wako.
Ngaterewa Euodia, ngaterewa na Sintikye, wawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.

Yee, ngyikundi na iyoe taa, mongari o loi, utarame waka-wo; cha kyipfa walepfuṟukana hamwi na inyi ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, na Kyilementi, na walya wengyi waleṟunda hamwi na inyi, walya marina gawo gakyeri kyitapunyi kyiwoṙe marina ga walya wawoṙe moo o loi uwukyie ko Ruwa.
Chihiyonyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii mfiri yoose; lyingyi-se ngagamba, chihiyonyi.
Wuhoo wonyu wumanyikye ko wandu woose. Mndumii nakyeri kufuhi.
Maa mulakuwinishe kyipfa kya kyindo kyoose; indi kyiyeri muiterewa Ruwa kyilya mukundi wutenyi kuṙo muwoṙe mrima iwoṙe iana.
Na ufoṟo lo Ruwa, luiṟie wuṟango woose lochiringa mrima yanyu na makusaṟo ganyu kyipfa muwalungye na Kristo Yesu.

Naaho-ng'u, wana wa wama, kyindo kyoose kyikyeri kya loi, kyoose kyilai kya sonu, kyoose kyikyeri kya wusumganyi, kyoose kyilawoṙe ukoe, kyoose kyechihiṟa, kyoose kyiwoṙe kyiṟumi kyicha; kokooya kuwoṙe wucha woose, kukowaṙa kyiṟumi kyoose kyicha, kusaṟenyi kyipfa kya shindo sha mbaṟe-yo.
Shindo mulekulosha koko na ishiambilyia, na ishiicho na ishiwona koko, shiwutenyi; na Ruwa o ufoṟo nechikaa hamwi na nyoe.
Ngyilechihiyo mnu kyipfa kya Mndumii, cha kyipfa mafurumionyi mowiyiṟa-se makusaṟo ganyu kyipfa kyako, chandu muwekyekusaṟa mbonyi tsako; kyaindi mulawone ṙaawa.
Chi ngyigamba kuṙo kyipfa ngyiuṟie kyindo-pfo; kyipfa ngyikuloshie ishiko na shilya ngyiwoṙe.
Ngyiichi iuṟa nyi kyikyi na ngyiichi iwaṙa nyi kyikyi. Kyiiṙi kya shindo shoose ngyilelosho iiguṙa na iicho njaa, iwaṙa shindo shifoi na iuṟa.
Ngyekyeiṙima shindo shoose kyiiṙi kya ulya ekyengyienenga pfinya.
Kyaindi mulewuta necha, kyiyeri mulelya wukyiwa hamwi na inyi.

Na nyoe taa, nyoe muwenyi muichi, lanyoe Wafilyipi, kye mawookyionyi ga Ndumi ngyicha, kyiyeri ngyilewuka Makyedonia, kuwoṙe siṟi ingyi ilekaa hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya ienengyia na iambilyia, sile nyoe-pfo.
Cha kyipfa maa kulya Tesalonikye mulengyiendie shindo shengyitarama kafong'ui.
Chi kye ngyikundi iambilyia shisumbo tikyi-pfo indi ngyikundi iwona ngoseṟa ya shindo shilya shicha mulemmbuta.

Kyaindi ngyiwoṙe shindo shoose na ielewetsa; lyingyi-se ngyiichuo pacha. Ngyileambilyia ko Epafurodito shindo shoose shilewuka konyu, mpfaamo o shindo shekyepfaama necha, kyienengo kyikyiiṙikyie na kyichihiṟie Ruwa.
Na Ruwa oko nechimuenenga na imuichuṟia pacha orio kyindo muuṟie iṙuana na wunjama wokye, kyiṟuminyi kya Yesu Kristo.
Wulalu Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu oṙu, mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu iṟikyiṟenyi orio mndu o Ruwa. Walya waiṙikyie Yesu wakyeri hamwi na inyi wamuiṟikyiṟa.
Wandu wa Ruwa woose wamuiṟikyiṟa, ngoseṟa walya wa kanyi ko Kaisari.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo lyikae na mrima yanyu.
Inyi Paulo, ngyikyeri msu o Kristo Yesu, chandu Ruwa akundi, na Timoteo, mono-wama oṙu,
ngamuṟeia paruo nyoe wana wa wama wai wandu wa Ruwa, waafutsie kyilya Ruwa ateṟie kyiiṙi kya Kristo, wakyeri Kolosai. Isaṟia lyikae konyu, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu.
Luiana Ruwa, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, mfiri yoose lochimuterewia,
wookyia luleicho mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, na ikunda muwoṙe ko wandu wa Ruwa woose.
Kyipfa kya ikusuria mulewikyio kyiseyesoe ruwewu; muleicho mbonyi tsalyo kacha ko mbonyi tsa loi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha;
ileshika konyu, chandu kyikyeri wuyanenyi koose; na ikumbia ndunda na ing'ana, chandu ing'ana konyu taa, wookyia mfiri ulya muleicho mukomanya mnu isaṟia lya Ruwa kyiiṙi kya loi.
Chandu mulelosho na Epafura, mongari oṙu mkunde iṟundenyi, akyeri mṟundi ekyeafutsia kyilya Ruwa ateṟie ko Kristo kyipfa kyanyu;
na oe naleluongoya ikunda lyanyu Mumuyonyi.
Kyipfa kya ikyo maa soe, wookyia mfiri ulya luleicho, luwika shiterewo kyipfa kyanyu, kundu muichuṟio imanya lya mrimenyi ko ikunda lyakye wuṟangonyi woose na imanyisho lya mrimenyi.
Mukae chandu Mndumii akundi, mochimchihiṟa piu; mochikumbia ndunda kui orio iṟunda lyicha, na iengyeṟika wuṟangonyi wo Ruwa.
Mochitaramo kui wuiṙimi woose, iṙuana na pfinya ya mng'ano okye, muiṙime iwaṙa wusimiri wo orio mbaṟe na ikarishia hamwi na ichihiyo.
Mochiana Awu, alemuenenga iambilyia kyitumbuṟe kya kyioṟa kya wandu wa Ruwa ngyeelenyi.
Na oe nalelukyiṟa iwuka pfinyenyi tsa meema, kalusamiṟa na iluṙuo Wumangyinyi wo Mana o ikunda lyakye;
akyeri kye kyiiṙi kyakye luwoṙe wukyiṟo, nyi kyimwi na igamba kye, ihooṟio lya wunyamaṟi.
Kristo nyi mfano o Ruwa alekyewono,
mmbele o shindo shoose shishigumbe.
Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kyakye shindo shoose shilegumbo;
shikyeri ruwewu na shikyeri urukyenyi,
shekyewono na shilekyewono;
kokooya nyi shiṙi sha mng'ano,
ang'u wumangyi, ang'u wuchilyi;
shindo shoose shilegumbo kui njia yakye na kyipfa kyakye.
Na oe nawekyeri pfo kyiyeri shindo shoose
shilawendegumbo,
na shindo shoose shekyewaṙana kyiiṙi kyakye.
Na oe nyi oe mṙoe o mmbiu, o Siṟi;
na oe nyi mawookyionyi,
nyi o kuwooka iṟutso ko wapfu,
kundu nawe msongoru kyiiṙi kya shoose.
Cha kyipfa kyilechihiṟa iafutsio lya Ruwa lyoose
lyikae kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Na kyiiṙi kyakye isanza shindo shoose na oe amonyi,
amwende ufoṟo kui samu ya msalaba okye;
kokooya nyi shindo shikyeri urukyenyi,
ang'u shikyeri ruwewu.
Na nyoe muwekyeri ipfo mawookyionyi kuleshi na Ruwa, lyingyi-se washituwa wakye makusaṟonyi ganyu, kui mawuto ganyu mawicho, namusanza wulalu;
mmbiunyi o nyama yakye, kui ipfa lyakye, kundu namuende na mbele yakye, nyoe wandu wa Ruwa, mulawoṙe maṙeko maa italyio kyindo kyiwicho.

Mukokuwaṙa na isaṟia lyilya tikyi, muwawikye wuye ya urende, mukokarisho; mulandeilacho na iṙa ikusuria lya Ndumi Ngyicha muleicho mbonyi tsayo, ileongoyo ko shindo shoose shigumbe shikyeri wuyanenyi, ikyeri kye inyi Paulo ngyiwekyeri mṟundi oyo.

Wulalu ngyimchihiye kyipfa kya matuuro ngyiwoṙe kyipfa kyanyu. Lyingyi-se ngyiafutsia mmbiunyi koko shilya shilaleafutsio sha matuuro ga Kristo, kyipfa kya mmbiu okye, kyimwi na igamba kye nyi Siṟi yakye.
Siṟi inyi ngyikyeri mṟundi oyo, iṙuana na iṟunda lya Ruwa, alengyiṙambika, na ngyileenengo kyipfa kya kyiira kyanyu, ngyiafutsie Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Wuṟikyi wulya wuwewuṟikye shiyeri shoose sha kacha na wookyia shishari shoose, indi wulalu woloṟo ko wandu wa Ruwa.
Iwo Ruwa alekunda iwamanyisha chandu wukyeri wunjana wo mng'ano wo wuṟikyi-wu kyiiṙi kya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa nawo nyi Kristo mrimenyi konyu, ikusuria lya mng'ano.
Icho luionguo mbonyi tsakye, lochiikyimbia orio mndu, na ilosha orio mndu wuṟangonyi woose, luiṙime iende orio mndu aafutsie iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Na inyi ngyikuwinisha kui kyindo-kyo ikyo, ngyechipfuṟukana iṙuana na pfinya ing'anyi iwukyie ko Kristo, ekyeṟunda kyiiṙi kyako.
Kyipfa ngyikundi mumanye chandu ngyiwoṙe ipfuṟukana lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, na kyipfa kya walya wa Laodikyia, na walya walandengyiwone kyaam kyako kyimmbiu.
Kundu wawiyiṟio moo mrima yawo, wechisanzo ikundenyi wawone wunjama woose wo imanya kui wuloi, waiṙime imanya nakamwi wuṟikyi wo Ruwa, kyimwi na igamba kye nyi Kristo;
akyeri kye kyiiṙi kyakye oe shiseyesoe shoose sha wuṟango na imanya shishiṟikye.
Ngyigamba mbonyi-tsi, mndu alachemulemba kui maṙeṙo ga wulembi.
Kyipfa maa chandu ngyilakyeri ho kyimmbiu, kyaindi ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe kyimrima, ngyechihiyo na iwona wuyendelyi wonyu na igoṟoka lyanyu kulawoṙe iloloma lya iiṙikyia lyanyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Kyasia chandu muleambilyia Kristo Yesu, Mndumii, wutenyi kuṙo kyiiṙi kyakye;
muwalungye tapu na oe, muwakarishe kui iiṙikyia, chandu mulelosho, mochiengyeṟa iana.

Mndu alachemuṙetsa kui wuṟango wokye na wulembi wulawoṙe kyiira, kui mbaṟe ya malosho ga shilya wandu wekyeambilyia ko waku wawo, kui mbaṟe ya malosho ga kuwooka ga wuyana, maa chi kui mbaṟe ya Kristo-pfo.
Kyipfa kyiiṙi kyakye nyi pfo-ndu iafutsia lyoose lya Ruwa lyikyeri, kui mbaṟe ya kyimmbiu.
Na nyoe muafutsie iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kyakye oe akyeri mṙoe o wumangyi woose na wuchilyi.
Kyiiṙi kyakye muleṙino kui iṙino lyilekyewuto kui mawoko, kui iṙa lango tsa mmbiu, kui iṙino lya Kristo.
Mukoṟiko hamwi na oe wupatisonyi, na kyiiṙi kya wupatiso-wo mukoṟutso hamwi na oe, kui iiṙikyia pfinya tsa Ruwa alemuṟutsa ko wapfu.
Na nyoe kyiyeri muwepfiie kyipfa kya maṙeko ganyu na kyipfa kya ilyi mulawekyeri Wayuda, nalemuṟutsa hamwi na oe, amluhooṟie maṙeko goose.
Amfurunje kyiṟeio kyiwekyiṟeie kyeluṙuo mengyenyi kui ianduya lyakye, lyiwewoṙe kyituwa koṙu; kalyiwuta lyilakae-se ho, kalyikapia msalabenyi,
amsokye wachilyi wa meema wumangyi na wuchilyi wowo, na iwamichia numa yakye kui wukari kundu orio mndu nawone, echiloṟa chandu alewawingyia msalabenyi.
Kyasia, mndu alamuanduye nyoe shelyenyi ang'u shindonyi shenyo, ang'u kyipfa kya mfiri ung'anyi ang'u iiṙa lya mori, ang'u mfiri o onyonya.
Mbonyi-tso nyi kyirinje kya mbonyi tsiicha, indi mmbiu nyi o Kristo.
Mndu alamusokye wori wonyu, kui iindia chandu akukundia amonyi tikyi, na iindia malaika, echikuloṟa shindonyi amloṟe indi shilai sha loi echikushela, kui wuṟango wokye wo kyimmbiu.
Maa alawaṙe Mṙoe, ukyeri kye kui icho mmbiu oose uigutso na isanzo kui shiwungo na mri ya mmbiu, okyeng'ana kui chandu Ruwa akundi.
Kyasia kokooya mulepfa hamwi na Kristo mukoṙa malosho galya ga kuwooka ga wuyana, ny'kyilyi muichilyio nyi mawawaso cha wandu wakyeri wuyanenyi, kunu mochiosha mawawaso na malosho ga wandu?
Mulawaṙe, mulasonje, mulapaaye!
(Shindo-sho shoose shiwoṙe kyiira kawi-pfo.)

Mbonyi-tso tsiloṟie cha ilyi tsiwoṙe wuṟango, mbaṟenyi ya wuyendelyi wo iterewa Ruwa muleachikyia muwenyi, na kyiiṙi kya ipfereria, na kyiiṙi kya ichilyia mmbiu kui wulang'a nakamwi, kyaindi tsiwoṙe kyiira kyoose kyiiri kya ichilyia lango tsa mmbiu-pfo.
Kyasia, mukyeri kye muleṟutso hamwi na Kristo, pfulenyi shindo shikyeri ruwewu, kundu Kristo akyeri, naṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.
Kusaṟenyi shikyeri wuye, chi shikyeri urukyenyi-pfo.
Cha kyipfa mulepfa, na moo onyu umṟikye hamwi na Kristo kyiiṙi kya Ruwa.
Ilyi Kristo echiloṟo na pata, akyeri moo oṙu, nyi lyo-ndu na nyoe mochiloṟo hamwi na oe mng'anonyi.
Kyasia, lekanenyi na shindo wandu wa wuyana wawoṙe: wuṟui, ukoe, lango ngyiwicho, makusaṟo mawicho, na ilanga iwaṙa sha ngoseṟa, nyiwo wuyendelyi wo iindia mafano.
Kyipfa kya shindo-sho nyashi ya Ruwa yekyeolokyia walya walekyemwindia.
Kyiiṙi kya isho maa nyoe taa mulewuta kyiyeri kya kacha, kyiyeri shilemuchilyia.
Kyaindi wulalu wikyienyi kuleshi na nyoe ishi shoose: nyashi, na isuo lying'anyi, na uwicho, na shilahio, na maṙeṙo ga wusutsu ṙumbunyi konyu.
Maa mulawiane wongo, cha kyipfa moṙa nakamwi mkaṟo o kacha, hamwi na mawuto gacho,
mochiṟaa mkaṟo mhya. Ikyi nyikyo kyindo kyihya Ruwa ulya alekyigumba aikyigumba orio mfiri kui mfano okye, kundu namuenengye pfinya ya immanya nakamwi.
Iho kuwoṙe Mkyiṟikyi maa Myuda-pfo, iṙino maa iṙa iṙino-pfo, muyenu maa tondo, mtumo maa ulya alakyeri mtumo-pfo, indi Kristo nyi shoose, na kyiiṙi kya shoose.
Kyasia, kyipfa mommbe wasambuṟe wa Ruwa, wandu wa Ruwa wakunde, ṟaenyi mrima o isaṟia, mkaṟo mcha, wupfereri, wuhoo, ikarishia.
Mochiṙuana na ihooṟiana, mndu awoṙe kyimaṙuma kyesuuya oṙoe, chandu Mndumii alemuhooṟia nyoe, nyi wuṙo na nyoe.
Ngoseṟa ya isho shoose waṙenyi ikunda, lyikyeri nyilyo lyaafutsia iiṙikyia.
Na ufoṟo lo Kristo luloṟe kyilya kyiwaṟi mrimenyi konyu, nyikyo mulelagio mmbiunyi umwi; lyingyi-se muwe wandu wekyeana.
Ṙeṙo lya Kristo lyiingyikye mrimenyi konyu na wuṟangonyi woose, mochiloshana na itutumana kui shiimbo, na shiimbo shetembecheṟa mrima; kunu mochiimbia Ruwa kui iana mrimenyi konyu.
Na orio kyindo mochiwuta, kui ṙeṙo ang'u kui iṟunda, wutenyi shoose rinenyi lya Mndumii Yesu, mochiana Ruwa Awu kui oe.
Nyoe waka, indienyi wamii wanyu, chandu kyichihiṟie kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Nyoe wasoṟo, kundenyi waka wanyu maa mulawihiyo kyipfa kyawo.
Nyoe wana, indienyi wafee wanyu shindonyi shoose, kyipfa kyindo-kyi kyichihiṟie kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Nyoe waawu, mulasouoe wana wanyu, walachepfiiyo nyi mṙoe.
Nyoe watumo, indienyi iwo wakyeri kye kui mmbiu nyi wandumii wanyu, mbonyinyi tsoose. Chi kui wutumo wo meso, cha waikulembecheṟa ko wandu-pfo, indi kui mrima ukutitiṟie, mochiindia Mndumii.
Kyoose mochiwuta, wutenyi kui mrima, cha iṟundia Mndumii, maa chi cha iwutia wandu-pfo,
muichi kye moambilyia ko Mndumii wori wo kyioṟa. Muiṟundia Mndumii Kristo.
Kyipfa molya mbaka netoo wori wo ilya mbaka, maa kuwoṙe ikundia-pfo.
Nyoe wandumii, enengyenyi watumo wanyu kyikyeri kya sungusinyi na kya wuloi, muichi kye maa nyoe muwoṙe Mndumii ruwewu.
Mfiri yoose terewenyi, mochilaa kyiṙombo kyiterewonyi na iana.
Mochiluterewia na soe taa, kye Ruwa nalupfunguye moongo kui Ṙeṙo lyilya lyakye, luonguo wuṟikyi wo Kristo, ngyimpfungye kyipfa kya wuṟikyi-wo,
kundu ngyiwuloṟe na pata, chandu kyingyiwaṟi iṙeṙa.
Kaenyi kui wuṟango mbele ya iwo walaiṙikyie Yesu, mochiambuya mndu alaṙetse kyiyeri.
Maṙeṙo ganyu gawaṙe wuindi mfiri yoose, gai mecha, muiṙime imanya chandu kyimmbaṟi igaluo orio mndu.
Tikyiko, mono-wama mkunde, mṟundi ekyeapfutsia kyilya ateṟia, mongari oko kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, nemuongoya mbonyi tsako tsoose.
Icho ngamṙuma konyu kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo ikyo, kundu mumanye mbonyi tsaṙu, na oe nammbiyiṟie moo mrima yanyu.
Hamwi na Onesimo, mono-wama mkunde ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia, akyeri mndu o konyu. Iwo wemuongoya mbonyi tsoose tsa iha koṙu.
Arisitariko, ampfungye hamwi na inyi, namuiṟikyiṟa; na Mariko, washiṙie o Barinaba, icho muleambilyia mawawaso kui mbonyi tsakye; kashika konyu mwambilyienyi.
Na Yesu ekyelago Yusto; iwa nyi Wakristiano wa Kyiyuda. Lyingyi-se iwo nyiwo wawenyi waiṟunda hamwi na inyi kyipfa kya Wumangyi wo Ruwa; nawo walengyiwiyiṟia moo.

Epafura, akyeri mndu o konyu, mṟundi o Yesu Kristo, namuiṟikyiṟa, echipfuṟukana mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu shiterewonyi shakye, kundu kye mugoṟokye muafutsie iiṙikyia na iṟingyishio mnu shindonyi shoose Ruwa akundi.
Kyipfa ngyimṟingyishia kye nawoṙe wuragari wung'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, na kyipfa kya iwo wakyeri Laodikyia, na kyipfa kya iwo wakyeri Hierapolyi.
Luka mganga ulya mkunde, na Dema, wamuiṟikyiṟa.
Iṟikyiṟenyi wana wa wama wakyeri Laodikyia, na Nimfa, na Siṟi ikyeri numbenyi yakye.
Paruo-i ikamsomo konyu wonenyi kye yasomo siṟinyi ya Walaodikyia taa; na iya ya Laodikyia isomo nyi nyoe.
Wienyi Arikyipo, “Ringa mnu iṟunda lyilya uleenengo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, kundu ulyiafutsie.”
Kyiiṟikyiṟo kyako inyi Paulo, ngaṟeia ngyimonyi. Kumbuonyi ipfungo lyako. Isaṟia lyikae hamwi na nyoe.
Inyi Paulo na Silyiwano na Timoteo lumuṟeia paruo nyoe siṟi ya Watesalonikye, ikyeri kyiiṙi kya Ruwa Awu, na kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu Kristo. Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo.
Lokyeana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu nyoe moose, lochimusenda shiterewonyi shaṙu.
Maa lokyeṙa ikumbuo iṟunda lyanyu lya iiṙikyia, na wukyiwa wonyu ikundenyi, na wusimiri wonyu na ikusuria lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, mbele ya Ruwa Awu oṙu-pfo.
Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama muwakunde nyi Ruwa, luichi kya wusambuṟe wonyu.

Kye Ndumi Ngyicha lulemuongoya iwekyeri kui maṙeṙo tikyi-pfo, indi na kui pfinya, na Mumuyonyi Mweele, kui iṟingyishia na pata kye ulogo-lu nyi lo loi. Chandu muichi chandu mkaṟo yaṙu iwekyeri konyu, kyipfa kyanyu.
Na nyoe mukoluosha na iosha Mndumii, momuambilyie Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kyiiṙi kya ilya wukyiwa, hamwi na sia ya Mumuyo Mweele.
Mṟasa mukowa mfano mcha ko wandu woose waiṙikyie Yesu urukyenyi lo Makyedonia na Akaya.
Kyipfa iwuka konyu Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyileṟuma, chi Makyedonia na Akaya tupu-pfo, indi na orio handu iiṙikyia lyanyu muwoṙe ko Ruwa lyileshika; maa kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma soe ionguo kyindo kyoose-pfo.
Cha kyipfa wo wawenyi waionguo mbonyi tsaṙu, chandu mbonyi tsaṙu tsilewa kyiyeri lulecha na konyu; na chandu muleindukyia Ruwa mukolekana na mafano, kundu muṟundie Ruwa ai na moo, o loi.
Na iweṙelyia Mono-kye iwuka Ruwewu, ulya alemṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu, na oe nyi Yesu, echilushingyia lulaolokyio nyi nyashi ya Ruwa iya iicha.
Kyipfa nyoe muwenyi, wana wa wama, muichi chandu lulecha na konyu, kye kulewa wulya-pfo.
Kyaindi kuwooka lomulyiso wukyiwa na iinyalo, chandu muichi, kulya Filyipi, lulekaria kyiiṙi kya Ruwa imuongoya nyoe Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa, kui iikapania mnu.
Cha kyipfa imterewa lyaṙu muambilyie ulogo lokyeonguo chi lya wuṙetsi, maa chi lya ukoe, maa lya ngyeṟo-pfo;
indi chandu luleenengo momu o ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, nyi wuṙo luonguo. Chi cha wandu waichihiṟa wandu-pfo, indi waichihiṟa Ruwa ekyeluyeṟa mrimenyi koṙu.
Kyipfa chandu muichi lulewaṙa maṙeṙo gepfula ikundo maa kyiyeri kyifuhi-pfo. Maa maṙeṙo gemuiring'ishia kya wongo gawewoṙe kyimaṙuma kyeṟika wuehi wo mrima yaṙu-pfo, na Ruwa nyi oe mṟingyishi.
Lulepfula kyiṟumi ko wandu, maa konyu, maa ko wandu wengyi kyiyeri luwewoṙe wuiṙimi wo iwa ṟio konyu cha wasu wa Kristo-pfo.
Indi luwekyeri wandu wahoo kyiyeri luwekyeri na nyoe, chandu mfee ekyeambuya wana wakye amonyi.
Na wuṙo na soe lochiṙuana na nyoe kui ikunda lying'anyi, lulewoṙo nyi sia imuenenga, chi Ndumi Ngyicha tupu-pfo, indi na moo yaṙu taa, cha kyipfa mowa wakunde waṙu.
Kyipfa wana wa wama, mukumburie wukyiwa woṙu na iṟaisho lyaṙu; cha kyipfa kyingoto na kyio luleṟunda lulacheewa ṟio ko mndu o konyu oose, lukomuongoya kuṙo Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa.
Nyoe nyi waṟingyishi, na Ruwa taa, chandu lulekaa konyu nyoe muiṙikyie Yesu, kui wuele, na kui wusumganyi, kulawoṙe igamba kye lowuta kyindo kyiwicho.
Na wuṙo, chandu muichi, chandu luleṙeṙia orio umwi onyu chandu Awu ekyeṙeṙia wana wakye amonyi, lochimukarisha na imuṟingyishia nyoe,
kundu mkaṟo yanyu iṙuane na chandu Ruwa akundi, ulya ekyemulaga nyoe kundu muiṙe na Wumangyinyi wokye na kyiṟumi kyakye.

Kyipfa kya ikyo na soe lokyeana Ruwa orio kyiyeri, cha kyipfa kyiyeri muleambilyia ndumo ya Ruwa muleiicho koṙu, muleiambilyia chi cha ulogo lo wandu-pfo, indi cha ulogo lo Ruwa; na nyi wuṙo ulogo-lo lukyeri; lokyeṟunda taa mrimenyi konyu nyoe muiṙikyie.

Kyipfa nyoe, wana wa wama, muwekyeri wandu wa siṟi tsa Ruwa tsikyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda, kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu; cha kyipfa mulelyiso wukyiwa wulya wulya iwuka ko wandu wa uruka lonyu muwenyi, wukyiwa mulelyiso nyi Wayuda.
Walya walewaaga Mndumii Yesu, na weonguo shisuku, na ilulyisa soe wukyiwa; maa wekyechihiṟa Ruwa, maa iṙuana na wandu-pfo.
Kunu wechilushingyia lulaṙeṙe na wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu waiṙime ikyiṟo; kundu waafutsie ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo mfiri yoose. Kyaindi Ruwa naiwaanduya kui nyashi.
Kyaindi soe, wana wa wama, lulekanyi na nyoe kyiyeri kyifuhi, lulekanyi na nyoe kyimmbiu indi chi kyimrima-pfo, lulelanga mnu immbona nyoe.
Koikyo lulekunda icha na konyu, yee, inyi Paulo, lya kuwooka na lya kawi Satana kalushingyia.
Kyipfa ikusuria lyaṙu ang'u sia yaṙu, ang'u iṟikoso lya ikushela, nyi kyikyi? Ngyesa chi nyoe, mbele ya Mndumii oṙu Yesu kyiyeri kya icha lyakye-pfoe?
Kyipfa nyoe nyi kyiṟumi kyaṙu, na sia yaṙu.
Kyasia kyiyeri lulaleiṙima ikarishia ngoseṟa, lulewona nyi kyicha iṙio Atene soe luwenyi.
Lukoṙuma Timoteo mono-wama oṙu, mṟundi o Ruwa iṟundenyi lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo, kundu namukarishe nyoe na immbiyiṟia moo ko mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu;
mndu alaowesho nyi ngyuukyiwa-tsi; kyipfa nyoe muwenyi muichi kye luwaṟi ikooyana natso.
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri luwekyeri konyu lulesonguo immbia kye lochilya wukyiwa, chandu kyilewutika, na nyoe muichi.
Koikyo na inyi kyiyeri ngyilaleiṙima ikarishia-se, ngyileṙuma mndu kundu ngyimanye iiṙikyia lyanyu, Satana alache namuyeshe, na ilya wukyiwa lyanyu lyikawa lyiwoṙe kyiira-pfo.

Kyaindi kyiyeri Timoteo alecha na koṙu iwuka konyu, naleluendie mbonyi ngyicha tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu na ikunda lyanyu na kye mokyelukumbuo necha mfiri yoose, mulangyie iluwona chandu soe lulangyie immbona.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, wana wa wama, mbonyi tsanyu tsileluwiyiṟia moo, ngyuukyiwenyi tsaṙu tsoose, kui iiṙikyia lyanyu.
Cha kyipfa wulalu luwoṙe moo, kokoooya nyoe mulaloloma kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Kyipfa nyi kyikyi loiṙima iana nakyo Ruwa imtaa kyilya alemmbutia nyoe, kui sia iya luichihiyo kyipfa kyayo, kyipfa kyanyu mbele yanyu na mbele ya Ruwa;
kyio na kyingoto kyiyeri lokyeterewa kui ipfuṟukana lying'anyi luiṙime immbona nyoe, na iichuṟia shilya iiṙikyia lyanyu lyilashiwoṙe?
Kyasia Ruwa amonyi, Awu oṙu, na Mndumii oṙu Yesu, nalusongoye njienyi lushikye konyu.
Mndumii namusongoye nyoe na imuengyeṟia ikunda, nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, na ko wandu woose chandu na soe lumkundi nyoe.
Naiṙime itarama mrima yanyu ilalolome ilawaṙe kyindo kyoose mndu eiṙima igamba kye ingyiwicho, wuelenyi mbele ya Ruwa, Awu oṙu, kyiyeri kya icha lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa woose.

Kyatsugaa ho, wana wa wama, luimuterewa na imuikyimbia kye muwaṙe mkaṟo iṙuṙanyi na shilya Mndumii Yesu akundi; chandu mulewona na ishiicho koṙu nyi wuṙo muwaṟi iwuta muchihiṟe Ruwa; chandu mokyewuta, wutenyi kuṙo na ngoseṟa.
Cha kyipfa muichi nyi shindo shiha lulemmbia mushiwute kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu.
Kyipfa isho nyisho Ruwa akundi shiwutikye, iilyisho lyanyu, mukushowe na wuṟui.
Orio umwi onyu naiṙime ichilyia lango tsa mmbiu okye wuelenyi na wuindi;
chi kui mkaṟo ya lango ngyiwicho, cha wandu walaichi Ruwa-pfo.
Mndu alalembe oṙoe maa imṙekyio kyiiṙi kya kyindo-kyi-pfo; cha kyipfa Mndumii nyi oe ekyetaa kyiṟaache kya ishi shoose; chandu lulemmbia kuwooka, lukoṟingyishia mnu.
Kyipfa Ruwa alelulagia wuṟui-pfo, indi luwe wandu wawailyishe.
Kyasia ulya ailega, ailega mndu-pfo indi Ruwa, ekyemuenenga nyoe Mumuyo okye Mweele.
Ko mbonyi tsa ikundana, kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kya imuṟeia-pfo; kyipfa nyoe muwenyi muwaloshe nyi Ruwa ikundana.
Cha kyipfa mukundi wana wa wama woose wakyeri urukyenyi loose lo Makyedonia. Kyaindi lomuterewa, wana wa wama, muengyeṟe ikundana.
Lyingyi-se mutambagane iṙa iṙicha-ṙicha, na iṟunda maṟunda ganyu, na iṟunda kui mawoko ganyu muwenyi, chandu lulemmbia;
kundu muwaṙe mkaṟo ngyicha mbele ya walya walakyeri poonyi lya walya waiṙikyie Yesu, maa mulatengye-tengye mochieṟeṟa.
Kyaindi, wana wa wama, lukundi muṙe mulamanya mbonyi tsa iwo wapfiie-pfo, mulachewuta ho iwihiyo mrimenyi cha wengyi walawoṙe ikusuria.
Kyipfa kokooya loiṙikyia kye Yesu nalepfa kaṟuka, na wuṙo walya wapfiie waiṙikyie Yesu, Ruwa nechiwaṟutsa cha Yesu.
Koikyo lummbia ishi kui Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, kye soe lui ho na moo, lochitsugaa ho mṟasa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mndumii; ny'kyaloi lochisongoya walya walempfa-pfo.
Cha kyipfa Mndumii amonyi nechisoka iwuka ruwewu, na wandu wechiicho ṟui lying'anyi lyilaga, na ṟui lya msongoru o malaika, na iganda lya Ruwa; na walya walepfa waiṙikyie Kristo wechiṟutso kuwooka.
Naaho-ng'u soe lui ho na moo, luletsugaa ho, Ruwa nechilurakuo na iluṙosia handu hamwi mapuchinyi; kundu luambilyie Mndumii ruwewu; na kuṙo lochikaa hamwi na Mndumii mlungana.
Kyasia, wiyiṟianenyi moo kui maṙeṙo-ga.
Kyaindi, wana wa wama, ko mbonyi tsa shiyeri, kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kyemuṟeia-pfo.
Kyipfa nyoe muwenyi muichi na pata kye Mndumii nechicha kyiyeri mulakusaṟie chandu mbafu yekyecha kyio.
Kyiyeri wandu waigamba, “Kuwoṙe ufoṟo na kuwoṙe ndenga-pfo,” nyi lyo-ndu irumatso lyechicha kulawoṙe mndu akusaṟie, chandu fowa yekyecha na ko mndu mka mnene, na kya loi wechikyia-pfo.
Indi nyoe, wana wa wama, mukyeri meemenyi, mṟasa Yesu nache kyiyeri mulakyikusaṟie chandu mbafu yekyewuta-pfo.
Cha kyipfa nyoe moose mowa wandu wekyewuta shindo cha ilyi orio kyindo kyekyeṟundo ngyeelenyi; soe chi wandu wekyewuta shindo meemenyi-pfo.
Kyasia lulalae maṙoe cha wandu wengyi, indi lulae kyiṙombo, na iwaṙa meena.
Kyipfa walya wekyelaa maṙoe wekyelaa kyio, na walya wekyenango taa wekyenango kyio.

Kyaindi soe lokyewuta shindo cha ilyi orio kyindo kyekyewuto ngyeelenyi, luwaṙe meena, kunu lochiwaṙa iiṙikyia na ikunda na lukusurie nakamwi ikyiṟo nyi Ruwa, na ikyo kyechiwa kyindo kyeringa mṙoe yaṙu ilakapo nyi kyindo.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa alalekunda ilukapa kui nyashi yakye, indi luwone wukyiṟo, kui Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo;
ulya alepfa kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu luwaṙe moo hamwi na oe, kokooya lulee kyiṙombo ang'u kokooya lulee maṙoe.
Kyasia, wiyiṟianenyi moo na iloshana orio mndu na oṙoe, chandu muiwuta.
Kyaindi, wana wa wama, lukundi mumanye walya wekyekutuura kyipfa kyanyu, na imugoṟokyia nyoe kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, na imuikyimbia;
muwaindie mnu ikundenyi, kyipfa kya maṟunda gawo. Waṙenyi ufoṟo nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
Wana wa wama, lomuterewa, ṙeṙienyi walya walawoṙe wuyendelyi wucha; karishenyi wafofo, iṟichenyi wafafa; karishienyi wandu woose.
Kuringyenyi mndu oose alatae oṙoe kyiwicho awutio; indi mfiri yoose oshenyi kyilya kyikyicha, nyoe wenyi ko wenyi na ko wandu woose.
Chihiyonyi mfiri yoose;
terewenyi kulawoṙe itsitsia;
anenyi kyipfa kya orio kyindo; kyipfa isho nyisho shilya Ruwa akundi shiwutikye konyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Mularumishe Mumuyo Mweele;
mulamine ionguo shisuku;
yeshenyi shindo shoose; wutenyi kyilya kyikyicha.
Kushowenyi na wuwicho wa orio mbaṟe.
Ruwa o ufoṟo amonyi namuilyishe nakamwi, na nyoe mrima yanyu na ngoo tsanyu na mmbiu yanyu, muwe wandu mulawoṙe ṙeko, kyiyeri kya icha lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Ulya alemulaga nyoe nechiwuta, kyipfa nekyewuta shilya ateṟia.
Wana wa wama, luterewienyi.
Iṟikyiṟenyi wana wa wama chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
Ngammbia kui wuchilyi wo Mndumii, woose waiṙikyie Yesu wasomio paruo-i.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na nyoe.
Inyi Paulo hamwi na Silyiwano, na Timoteo, loṟeia paruo-i ko siṟi ya Watesalonikye, ikyeri kyiiṙi kya Ruwa Awu, na kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo uwukyie ko Ruwa Awu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Wana wa wama, kyalukooya iana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu, chandu kyiwaṟi, cha kyipfa iiṙikyia lyanyu lyiengyeṟika mnu, na ikunda lya orio mndu konyu ko oṙoe lyang'ana.
Mṟasa na soe luwenyi lukushela kyipfa kyanyu siṟinyi tsa Ruwa kyipfa kya isimiria lyanyu, na iiṙikyia muwoṙe fowenyi tsanyu tsoose na wukyiwa wung'anyi muikarishia.
Nyikyo kyiṟingyishio kya sungusinyi kya ianduyo lyikyeri wusumganyi wo Ruwa, kundu mutalyio kye kyimmbaṟi iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa, iwo womuenenga ilyiso wukyiwa.
Cha kyipfa nyi necha mbele ya Ruwa ilyisa wukyiwa walya waimulyisa wukyiwa nyoe;
na imutaa nyoe muilyiso wukyiwa sia hamwi na soe; kyiyeri kya iloṟo lya Mndumii Yesu iwuka ruwewu hamwi na malaika wa wuiṙimi wokye.
Nesoka moṙonyi wuiaka; kunu echitaa kyiṟaache iwo walaichi Ruwa, na iwo walaindie Ndumi Ngyicha ya Mndumii oṙu Yesu.
Wechianduyo kui irumatso lya mlungana, iwiko kuleshi na kyaam kya Mndumii na mng'ano o pfinya tsakye.
Oe kyiyeri echicha kundu nang'anyiso wandunyi wa Ruwa, na kochiwaṙa iṟiyio lying'anyi kyiiṙi kya woose waleiṙikyia mfiri ulya (kyipfa wuṟingyishi woṙu wuleiṙikyio konyu.)
Koikyo lumuterewia nyoe mfiri yoose, kundu Ruwa oṙu namutale kye muwaṟi ilago lyanyu, kaafutsia orio njia ya wucha na orio iṟunda lya iiṙikyia kui pfinya.
Rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu lying'anyiso mrimenyi konyu, na nyoe kyiiṙi kyakye, kui isaṟia lya Ruwa oṙu na lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Kyasia, wana wa wama, lumuterewa, ko mbonyi tsa icha lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, na ikuumbia lyaṙu mbele yakye,
kye maa mulaiṟewe iwinyi mṟasa iṙa iwuta kyilya mukundi, maa mulaowesho, kui mumuyo, maa kui ṙeṙo, maa kui paruo ikusaṟo kye nyi yaṙu, cha ilyi kye mfiri Mndumii aicha lya kawi ulemcha.
Mndu oose ulamulembe kui mbaṟe yoose; kyipfa mfiri-cho uicha-pfo, mṟasa kuche kuwooka Ikana Ruwa, kaloṟo na pata mndu ulya molega kilya Ruwa awawasie, mana ekyekana Ruwa.
Ulya ekyewingana, ekyekuiria oe amonyi wuye ya orio kyindo kyekyelago Ruwa ang'u ikundo na iindio; mṟasa oe amonyi iṙamia hekalunyi lya Ruwa, kakuloṟa oe amonyi cha ilyi kye oe nyi oe Ruwa.
Ngyesa mukumburie kye kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe ngyilemmbia isho-pfoe?
Na wulalu kyishingyie mukyiichi, ulya naiṙime iloṟo na pata kyiyeri kyakye.
Kyipfa wuṟikyi wulya wo iwingana wuiṟunda wulalu; kyaindi kuwoṙe ashingyie wulalu mṟasa kyiyeri ewuto ho.
Iho nyi ho-ndu eloṟo-ng'u ulya alewie Ruwa, ulya Mndumii Yesu emmbaaga kui mṟufui o ṙumbu lyakye, na imrumatsa kui iloṟo lya oe ikaa pfo.
Ulya akyeri kye icha lyakye nyi kui pfinya ya Satana, kui wuiṙimi woose, na shiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho ga wongo.
Na wulembinyi woose wo wunyamaṟi ko iwo waiṙeka; cha kyipfa waleiṙikyia ikunda loi iya waiṙime ikyiṟo-pfo.
Koikyo Ruwa naiwaendie pfinya ya iṙeka, waiṙikyie wongo;
kundu waanduyo woose walaleiṙikyia loi, indi wawechihiyo kyipfa kya iwuta wunyamaṟi.

Kyaindi kyalukooya soe iana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu, wana wa wama mulekundo nyi Mndumii, cha kyipfa Ruwa nalemusambuṟa wookyia mawookyionyi muambilyie wukyiṟo, kyiiṙi kya iilyisho nyi Mumuyo, na iiṙikyia loi;
alemulagia nyoe kui Ndumi Ngyicha yaṙu, kundu luambilyie mng'ano o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Kyasia, wana wa wama waṙu, goṟokyenyi kulawoṙe iloloma, muoshe shilya muleambilyia kui malosho gaṙu, kokooya nyi kui maṙeṙo, ang'u kui paruo yaṙu.
Na Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo amonyi, na Ruwa Awu oṙu, alelukunda kaluenenga iwiyiṟio moo lya mlungana na ikusuria lyicha, isaṟienyi,
namuwiyiṟie moo na imukarisha orio ṙeṙonyi na iṟundenyi lyicha.
Lyefurumia, wana wa wama, luterewienyi, Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii lyiengyeṟikye na ing'anyiso chandu kyikyeri konyu.
Lundekyiṟo iwuka ko wandu wulawoṙe wusumganyi, wawicho, kyipfa chi woose wawoṙe iiṙikyia-pfo.
Kyaindi Mndumii nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia, echimukarisha na imuringa mulatewo nyi mmbicho ulya.
Na soe lukusurie Mndumii ko mbonyi tsanyu, kye muiwuta shilya lulemmbia, lyingyi-se kye mochishiwuta.
Mndumii namusongoye mrima yanyu muambilyie ikunda lya Ruwa na wusimiri wo Kristo.
Wana wa wama waṙu, lummbia rinenyi lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, kaenyi kuleshi na mono-wama alaiosha kyilya muleambilyia koṙu.
Muichi muwenyi chandu kyimmbaṟi iluosha; cha kyipfa lulewaṙa mkaṟo mmbicho konyu-pfo.
Maa lulelya kyelya ko mndu oose kui imteng'elyia-pfo indi kui wukyiwa na matuuro, kyio na kyingoto luleṟunda, kundu mndu oose o konyu alaluenengye kyindo kulawoṙe imtaa.
Chi kye lulawewoṙe pfinya ya imuitika muluenengye shindo-pfo, kundu nyoe mukuloshie koṙu, muluoshe.
Cha kyipfa maa kyiyeri kyilya luwekyeri konyu lulemmbia kyindo-kyi, kye kokooya mndu alakundi iṟunda kyindo, kyasia, alalye kyelya.
Kyipfa luichuoe kye kuwoṙe wandu konyu walawoṙe mkaṟo mcha, wawoṙe maṟunda-pfo, kyaindi wekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wandu wengyi.
Kyasia luwia iwo na iwatutuma kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, waṟunde maṟunda kui wuramiri na ilya kyelya kya msino owo wawenyi.
Kyaindi nyoe, wana wa wama, maa mulapfiiyo nyi mṙoe kyiiṙi kya iwuta shindo shicha.
Na kokooya mndu oose alaosha malosho gaṙu gakyeri iha paruonyi kushowenyi na mndu-cho, maa mulaṙeṙe na oe, naiṙime irigo nyi sonu;
kyaindi mulamtale cha mokyituwa, kyaindi mtutumenyi cha mono-wama.
Wulalu, Mndumii o ufoṟo amonyi namuenengye ufoṟo kyiyeri kyoose kui njia tsoose. Mndumii nawe hamwi na nyoe moose.
Shiiṟikyiṟo shako inyi Paulo, inyi ngyimonyi. Ikyi nyikyo kyindo kyeloṟa orio paruo; nyi kuṙo ngyekyeṟeia.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae na nyoe moose.
Inyi Paulo, msu o Kristo Yesu, kui iwawaso lya Ruwa Mkyiṟa oṙu na Kristo Yesu, ulya lukuwoṙe na oe tapu;
ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Timoteo, mana oko mkunde iiṙikyienyi. Isaṟia lyikae kopfo, na ihooṟia, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
Ngyilekuterewa ukae Efeso, kyiyeri ngyiweiyenda Makyedonia, kundu uime wandu wengyi walaloshe shindo shingyi.

Walaṙetsie shiyeri shawo mbonyinyi tsa wongo na marinenyi gafoi ga waku wawo, shekyeenenga wandu iwesa shindo shifoi sha wutondo. Shindo-sho shiwoṙe ṙaawa kyindonyi Ruwa aluṟeyeṟie-pfo, kyindo lukyiichi kui iiṙikyia.
Kyaindi kyimaṙuma kya iwawaso-lyo nyi ikunda lyiwukyie mrimenyi mwilyi na makusaṟonyi mecha, na iiṙikyia lyilawoṙe wukulembecheṟi.
Wengyi walaichi isho waleosha shindo shiwicho;
wakundi iwa walosha wa mawawaso, maa chandu walaichi shilya waigamba maa shindo shilya waionguo kulawoṙe wuowu.
Kyaindi luichi kye mawawaso nyi kyindo kyicha, kokooya mndu agakusuria kui njia ikyeri ya sungusinyi.

Aichi kyindo-kyi kye mawawaso chi galeṙiko kyipfa kya wandu wasumganyi-pfo indi kyipfa kya wanyamaṟi, na walakyeri wayendelyi, na wekyefunja mawawaso ga Ruwa, na walya walekyeindia shindo shiele, na wekyewaaga wafee wawo, na wawaagi.
Na waṟui, na wekyelaa na wandu wa nguwo tsawo, na wekyeiwa wandu, na wekyeṙeṙa wongo, na wekyelya nyamu kui wongo; na kuwoṙe kyindo kyingyi kyoose kyilaṙuṙanyi na malosho gawoṙe moo.
Chandu kyikyionguoe Nduminyi Ngyicha ya kyiṟumi kya Ruwa ekyeṟumisho, Ndumi Ngyicha ngyileenengo iṟunda lyeionguo.
Na inyi ngyiana Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu, alengyienenga pfinya cha kyipfa alengyiwona kye ngyekyeafutsia shilya ngateṟia, kangyiwika iṟundenyi lyakye.

Maa chandu ipfo mawookyionyi ngyiwekyelahia, mndu ekyelyisa wandu wukyiwa, ngyilekyeaṙanyia shilya ngyiwio; kyaindi ngyileenengo isaṟia cha kyipfa ngyilewuta kuṙo kui wutondo, na kyipfa kya iuṟa iiṙikyia.
Na isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu lyileengyeṟika mnu, hamwi na iiṙikyia na ikunda lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Nyi kyindo kya loi, na kyiwaṟi iiṙikyio nakamwi, kye Kristo Yesu nalecha na wuyanenyi nakyiṟe wanyamaṟi; walya o kuwooka ai nyi inyi.

Kyaindi kyipfa kya ikyo ngyilewona isaṟia, kundu mrimenyi koko inyi o kuwooka, Yesu Kristo naṟingyishie wucha wokye wulekyesia; ngyiwe kyindo walya wechimwiṙikyia wechikyiambuya, wawone moo o mlungana.
Wulalu ko Mangyi o shiyeri shoose, alekyerumatso, alekyewono na meso, Ruwa alawoṙe ungyi ai cha oe, kokye kuwaṙe wuindi na kyiṟumi mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Mono-ko, Timoteo, gakuenenga iwawaso-lyi lyiwe kyiseyesoe, kyipfa kya mbonyi tsapfo tsa ionguo shisuku, kundu kyiiṙi kya isho ukapane shiṙa shilya shicha.
Uwe mndu awoṙe iiṙikyia na makusaṟo mecha, galya wandu wengyi walegatakulyia kuleshi, wakarumara ko mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia.
Kyiiṙi kya iwo kuwoṙe Himenayo na Iskanda, walya ngyilewaṙambika Satana, kundu nawakape, na kui iwutio kuṙo wakuloshe walalahie Ruwa.
Kyasia kyindo kying'anyi kuta shoose nyi iterewiana, iterewa Ruwa shilya lukundi, na iana Ruwa kyipfa kya mboṟa tsakye. Isho shiwutikye kyipfa kya wandu woose;
kyipfa kya wamangyi na wawoṙe wuchilyi, luwe wandu walakyeri ndengyenyi na wawoṙe ufoṟo, kyiiṙi kya iindia Ruwa na wandu woose.
Ikyi nyi kyindo kyicha, nakyo nyi kyindo kyikyikunde mbele ya Ruwa Mkyiṟa oṙu,
ulya akundi wandu woose wakyiṟo, na iiṙima imanya shikyeri sha loi.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa nyi umwi, na ulya ekyesanza Ruwa na wandu nyi umwi, mndu ulya ai Kristo Yesu.
Ulya alekuwuta amonyi kundu naendie wandu woose wukyiṟo; ikuwuta lyileloṟa kyiyeri Ruwa akundi ikyiṟa wandu woose.
Na inyi kyipfa kya wukyiṟo-wo ngyilewiko ngyiwe moonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na msu (ngyiṙeṙa loi, ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo), mlosha o wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa iiṙikyienyi na wuloi.
Kyasia ngyikundi wasoṟo waloshe siṟinyi, wawoṙe mrima ngyiwaṙami. Waire mawoko ilyi waiterewa Ruwa, kulawoṙe ikapo nyi nyashi ang'u igaluana.
Na wuṙo waka wakuchope kui nguwo, wakushikyie necha, hamwi na wupfereri wucha, na mrima uwoṙe meena; chi kui ioka njui, maa iṟaa shindo sha sahapu na lulu, maa nguwo tsa woguru wung'anyi-pfo;
indi kui mawuto mecha, chandu kyiwaṟi waka wekyeloṟa kye waowuye na ikunda Ruwa.
Mndu mka nakuloshe alaiamtsa kyituṟu, echipfereria nakamwi.
Ngyienenga mndu mka momu o ilosha maa o ichilyia mndu msoṟo-pfo, indi nawe mndu alaiamtsa kyituṟu.
Cha kyipfa Adamu nyi oe alegumbo kuwooka, na Eva kagumbo numa.
Maa Adamu alelembo-pfo, indi mndu mka nalelembo nakamwi kaṙeko.
Kyaindi mndu mka nechikyiṟo kui iwaṙa wana, kokooya awaṙa iiṙikyia Yesu na ikunda na iilyisho, hamwi na mrima uwoṙe meena.
Nyi kyindo kya loi kye mndu kakunda iṟunda lya askofu, nalanga kyindo kyicha.
Kyasia kyiwaṟi askofu nawe mndu alekyegambo kye nawoṙe wuwicho woose, mii o mka umwi, awoṙe meena na wuṟango, mndu muyendelyi, ekyeambilyia wandu, aichi ilosha.
Chi mndu aichiwie wunanzi-pfo, chi mndu ekyekapa wandu-pfo; indi nawe mhoo. Chi mndu mogaluana kui maṙeṙo, maa mndu akundi heleri-pfo.
Mndu ekyechilyia necha kanyi kokye, aichi itoṟisha wana;
(kyimwi na igamba, mndu alawoṙe wuiṙimi wo ichilyia kanyi kokye, neiṙima kuṙa iambuya Siṟi ya Ruwa?)
Maa alawe mndu aleilachika na iosha Yesu mfiri ya kufuhi, alachekushela kaanduyo chandu Mokyiriinzi alekushela kaanduyo.
Lyingyi-se nawaṟi iṟingyishio wucha na wandu walya walakyeri poonyi lya walya waiṙikyie Yesu, kundu alachewuta shindo sha sonu na iwingo nyi Mokyiriinzi.

Na wuṙo mashemasi wawe wandu wawoṙe mkaṟo yechienenga wandu iwaindia. Chi wandu wekyegamba ikyi inu na kyingyi ngama-pfo. Chi wandu wekyenyo mpfinyo mnu-pfo. Chi wandu wawoṙe wulanga wo masaa ga sonu-pfo.
Wechiosha malosho ga iiṙikyia Yesu kui mrima ngyiwaṙami.
Iwa taa wayesho kuwooka, naaho waṟunde iṟunda lya mashemasi; wammbono kye wawoṙe tewe-pfo.
Na wuṙo waka wawo wawaṙe mkaṟo yechienenga wandu iwaindia. Chi wandu wekyeiria wengyi shindo sha wongo-pfo. Wandu wawoṙe meena, wekyeafutsia shoose wateṟia.
Mashemasi wawe mamii wa mka umwi, wechitoṟisha wana wawo necha, na kanyi kowo.
Cha kyipfa wekyeṟunda necha iṟunda lya ushemasi wekyewona rina lyicha, na wekyeiṙima ionguo kulawoṙe wuowu mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Ngyikuṟeia isho ngyikusaṟie icha na kopfo mfiri ya kufuhi.
Kyaindi ngakyelyio, umanye chandu kyiwaṟi wandu iwuta kyiyeri-kyo wakyeri numbenyi ya Ruwa, ikyeri Siṟi ya Mndumii ai na moo, ngoe na urende lo loi.
Na loi kyiṟika kya iowuo na ikunda Ruwa nyi kyindo kying'anyi.
“Ruwa naleṟingyishio mmbiunyi,
kamanyika nawoṙe wusumganyi Mumuyonyi,
kawono nyi malaika.
Mbonyi tsakye tsikagambo
ko walya walaiṙikyie Yesu,
wandu wa wuyana wakamwiṙikyia,
kaṙoo wuye ruwewu kyiṟuminyi.”

Kyasia Mumuyo naiṙeṙa na pata kye shiyeri sha mafurumionyi wandu wengyi wechikuletsana na iiṙikyia, wechiaṙanyia mumuyo ngyiwicho yekyelemba, na malosho ga wandu waikuloṟa cha ilyi wawoṙe Mumuyo o Ruwa kyaindi wawachilyie nyi Satana.
Kui wukulembecheṟi wo wandu wekyeṙeṙa wongo, na mrima ipfiie ngapfu kyipfa ingyichilyie nyi Satana.
Wechilosha kye wandu walaalyikye ang'u ialyiko, na iwawia walalye shelya shilyiwe, shilya Ruwa aleshigumba, na soe luiṙikyie Yesu imanya wuloi kye luwaṟi iana Ruwa kyiyeri loambilyia shindo-sho.
Cha kyipfa orio kyindo Ruwa agumbie kyikyicha, maa kuwoṙe kyiwaṟi ilego-pfo, kokooya kyaambilyio kui iana.
Kyipfa kyikyiilyishe kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na kui iterewa.
Ukumbuṟe wandu shindo-sho, na iyoe nochiwa mṟundi mcha o Kristo Yesu, na mndu uichiwie mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia, na malosho mecha galya uleosha.
Indi malosho galaṙuṙanyi na galya ya Ndumi Ngyicha ugalege, na iyoe ukuichiwiṟe iwaṙa iowuo na ikunda Ruwa.

Cha kyipfa ikuichiwiṟa iwaṙa pfinya tsa mmbiu kuwoṙe kyiira kyitutu, kyaindi iowuo na ikunda Ruwa shindonyi shoose nyi kyindo kyicha. Kyimwi na igamba, nuwoṙe kyiteṟio kya moo o wulalu, na ulya ochikouipfo mfiri-yo iicha.
Nyi kyindo kya loi nakamwi, na kyiwaṟi iiṙikyio nyi woose wekyeosha Yesu,
kye lokyekulyisa wukyiwa na itambagana kyipfa kya ikyo, na luwikyie ikusuria lyaṙu ko Ruwa ai na moo, akyeri Mkyiṟa o wandu woose, ngoseṟa o walya waiṙikyie.
Shindo-sho ushigambe na ishilosha.
Mndu oose alamine wundaka wopfo, indi uwaṙe mkaṟo mcha mbele ya walya waiṙikyie Yesu, kyiiṙi kya iṙeṙa na ikundenyi na ufoṟo na mkaṟonyi ulawoṙe ukoe lo wuṟui.
Mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechicha, upfuṟukane kyiiṙi kya ikulosha shiṟeio shiele na iikyimba na ilosha.
Ulaṙe iṟunda na kyisumbo kyilya uwoṙe, umwenengye kui ionguo shisuku na kui iyekyio mawoko nyi wameeku wa siṟi.
Isho ukusaṟe kyipfa kyasho; ushioshe; kundu wandu woose wamanye handu ushikyie.
Ringa mrima opfo, na malosho gapfo. Ulalekane na shindo-sho; kyipfa kui iwuta kuṙo nochikyiṟa mrima opfo na mrima ya walya wechiicho shilya uilosha.
Ulaṟoṟome mndu meeku, indi ṙeṙa na oe cha awu opfo; na ndaka cha wana wa womoo.
Ṙeṙa na wakyeku cha wamama wapfo; wana wa kyika cha washikyi wapfo; kui mkaṟo ulawoṙe ukoe lo wuṟui.
Uindie wakusu wai wakusu wa loi.
Kyaindi mkusu kokooya nawoṙe wana ang'u wachuku, wakuloshe kuwooka iwuta shilya wawaṟi iwutia wa kanyi kowo, na itaa wafee wawo. Cha kyipfa nyi kyindo kyichihiṟie mbele ya Ruwa.
Kyasia, ulya ai mkusu o loi, namṙe amonyi, icho nakusurie Ruwa, na oe orio mfiri nekyeterewa kyingoto na kyio.
Indi, ulya alekyeringa mrima okye napfiie maa chandu ai na moo.
Shindo-sho taa ushigambe, kundu mndu oose alagambe kye walya owawia wawoṙe ṙeko.
Kyaindi mndu oose alekyeambuya walya wakyeri wakye, ngoseṟa walya wa kanyi kokye, nakana Iirikyia, lyingyi-se nammbicho kuta mndu alaiṙikyie Yesu.
Mkusu alatalo nyi mkusu sile awaṙa maka makumi gaṟandaaṟu; na oe nai mka o mii umwi.

Na oe naṟingyishio kye nawoṙe mawuto mecha; kokooya naleambuya na iṙosa wana necha, kokooya naleambilyia wayenu, kookoya nalekutitiṟa mṟasa kaanguo wandu wa Ruwa maṙende, kokooya naletarama wandu wailyiso wukyiwa, kokooya nalewika wuragari iṟundenyi lyicha.
Indi wakusu wakoho ulawatale kye nyi wakusu, kyipfa wakang'anyio nyi lango kyilaṙuṙanyi na malosho ga Kristo, wakundi ialyiko.
Nawo wechianduyo kyipfa waṙa iiṙikyia lyilya lyawo lya kuwooka.

Lyingyi-se, hamwi na isho, wekyekulosha iṙokuo, wechitenga-tenga numba kui numba. Maa chi waṙoko tupu-pfo; kyaindi wekyeṙeṙa shindo shekyeende kyituwa na wekyesuma-suma shindo sha wandu wengyi wechiṙeṙa shindo shilawawaṟi iṙeṙa.
Kyasia ngyikundi wakusu, walawaku, waalyiko, wafee wana, wachilyie kanyi kowo; kundu walaenengye mokyituwa ṙaawa lyegamba kye luwoṙe ṙeko.
Cha kyipfa wengyi wamuilachika na iosha Satana.
Mndu mka aiṙikyie, kokooya nawoṙe wakusu, nawatarame oe amonyi, kundu siṟi ilalemio; kundu siṟi itarame walya wakyeri wakusu wa loi.
Wameeku wa siṟi wekyechilyia necha na watalo kye wawaṟi iindio ngoseṟa, ngoseṟa walya wekyekuwinisha iṙeṙa mbele ya wandu na ilosha.
Kyipfa kyiṟeio kyiele kyagamba, “Maa ulaime umbe ilya ilyi ikutarama ihuo nganu.” Na lyingyi-se, “Mṟundi nawaṟi wori wokye.”
Molaiṙikyie kyiyeri oicho kye mndu meeku nawuta kyindo kyiwicho, sile kokooya noicho waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu wegamba kuṙo.
Walya wekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi orio kyiyeri uwaṟoṟome mbele ya wandu woose kundu na wengyi waowuo.
Ngakuwia mbele ya Ruwa, mbele ya Kristo Yesu, na mbele ya malaika wasambuṟe, uwute isho kulawoṙe ianduya kui iṙimaṙima. Ulawute kyindo kyoose kui ikundia.
Ulayekyie mndu mawoko kui iṙimaṙima, maa ulakuwikye ngyuunyamaṟinyi tsa wandu wengyi. Uringye mrima opfo ulafanyiṟo nyi ukoe.
Wookyia wulalu ulanyo mṟinga tupu-pfo kyaindi nyo mpfinyo kyitutu, kyipfa kya ndewu yapfo, na ndoṟe-tso tsekyekutuura orio kyiyeri.
Ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu wengyi tsiwonio na pata, na tsiwasongoya iyenda kyianduyonyi, kyaindi ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu wengyi tsechiwono kyiyeri kyilya kyeanduya kyilashika-pfo.
Na wuṙo mawuto mecha gawonio na pata; maa kokooya galawonio nyi wandu chi kyindo kyeiṙima ikuṟiika-pfo.
Wandu woose waiṙikyie Yesu wawapfungye nyi mshe ya wusinga, wawone wandumii wawo kye wawaṟi iindio mnu, rina lya Ruwa lyilamino hamwi na malosho gaṙu.

Na walya wawoṙe wandumii waiṙikyie Yesu walawamine cha kyipfa nyi wana wa wama kyiiṙi kya Yesu; indi nyi kyicha wawaṟundie, cha kyipfa wandumii-wo wekyewona kyiira kya iṟunda lyawo wawa wandu wakunde.
Uloshe na itutuma shindo-shi. Mndu oose kalosha mbonyi tsingyi, alaiṙikyie mbonyi tsiwoṙe moo o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, maa malosho galaṙuṙanyi na iowuo na ikunda Ruwa,

mndu-cho nakushela. Maa aichi kyindo kyoose-pfo; indi nawoṙe wusuko wo ikunda igaluana na iluyana kui maṙeṙo, maṙeṙo gekyeende wunyeng'i, shiloyano, shilahio, na ikusaṟa kye mndu ungyi nawuta kyindo kyiwicho.
Na igaluana lya maṙeṙo lya wandu wanyamaṟikyie mṙoe yawo, walaichi wuloi, kunu wechikusaṟa kye iowuo na ikunda Ruwa nyi njia ya iwona kyiira.
Kyaindi iowuo na ikunda Ruwa hamwi na iṙa ilanga shindo shifong'ui nyi kyindo kyiwoṙe kyiiṙa kying'anyi.
Cha kyipfa lulecha na wuyanenyi luwoṙe kyindo-pfo; lyingyi-se lochiwuka pfo luwoṙe kyindo-pfo.
Indi lukowaṙa kyelya na nguwo lulapfule-pfule-se shindo sha ngoseṟa.
Kyaindi iwo wakundi iwaṙa masaa wekyeoloka shiyeshonyi na mṙegonyi, na langonyi tsingyi tsa maai, tsekyelyisa wukyiwa, tsekyeolotsa wandu wuṙetsinyi na wunyamaṟinyi.
Kyipfa mri o mawicho ga orio mbaṟe nyi ikunda heleri. Nyi kui ikunda mnu heleri wandu waata walelekana na iiṙikyia wechikulyisa ngyuukyiwa tsifoi.
Indi iyoe mndu o Ruwa, uṙiche shindo-sho; uoshe wusumganyi, iowuo na ikunda Ruwa, iiṙikyia, ikunda, wusimiri, na wuhoo.
Kapana shiṙa shilya shicha sha iiṙikyia. Waṙa moo ulya o mlungana ulelagio nyi Ruwa kyiyeri ulegamba na pata iiṙikyia lyapfo mbele ya waṟingyishi wafoi.
Ngakuwia mbele ya Ruwa ekyeringa shindo shoose, na mbele ya Kristo Yesu, alegamba iiṙikyia lyakye mbele ya Pontio Pilato,
kye uringye iwawaso-lyi kulawoṙe tewe, kulawoṙe mndu igamba kye nowuta kyindo kyiwicho, mṟasa kyiyeri Ruwa echishukuo Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Kyiyeri oe amonyi echikuṟingyishia kyiyeri kyikashika, ulya aleṟumisho, awoṙe pfinya oe amonyi, Mangyi o wamangyi, Mndumii o wandumii.
Ulya alekyepfa, akyeri ngyeelenyi ilekyeiṙima irumisho; maa kulawoṙe mndu alemummbona, maa eiṙima immbona. Kyiyeri kyoose naenengo kyiṟumi na pfinya mṟasa mlungana. Amen.

Walya wakyeri wanjama wa wuyana wo wulalu uwawie walakushele, maa walakusurie wunjama wowo wukyeri cha mboshia, indi wakusurie Ruwa ekyeluenenga shindo shoose kulawoṙe iehia kundu luṟunde nasho kui sia.
Wawute shindo shicha, wawe wanjama kui iwuta wucha, waenengyie masaa gawo, wakae na wandu wengyi kui mrima;
kunu wechikooma kyiseyesoe kyiwe urende lucha ko kyiyeri kyiicha, kundu wawone moo o loi.
Iyoe Timoteo, ringa kyilya Ruwa alekuṙambika, ukushowe na malosho galaṙuṙanyi na galya ga wandu wekyeindia Ruwa, ga wutondo, na maṙeṙo ga wutondo gekyelago malosho kui wongo;
galya wengyi wekyegaṙeṙa wakaasha Iiṙikyia. Isaṟia lyikae na nyoe moose.
Inyi Paulo, msu o Kristo Yesu, iṙuana na chandu Ruwa akundi, kyipfa kya kyaasa kya moo ukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu;
ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Timoteo, mono-ko mkunde. Isaṟia lyikae kopfo, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
Ngyiana Ruwa, ngyekyemwindia na imterewa kui mrima mmbaṙami wookyia kacha lya waku wako, chandu ngyekyekukumbuo iyoe kyiyeri kyoose, kyiiṙi kya iterewa lyako kyio na kyingoto.
Na inyi ngyilangyie mnu ikuwona, ngyechikumbuo mcheṟeṟe yapfo, kundu ngiichuo sia;
ngyechikumbuo iiṙikyia uwoṙe lyilawoṙe wukulembecheṟi lyiwekyeri kuwooka ko wakyekuyo ekyelago Loisi, na ko womoo ekyelago Eunikye, na inyi ngyiichi kye maa iyoe nulyiwoṙe.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyikukumbuṟa, ulanyamaṟe kyisumbo kya Ruwa, kyikyeri mrimenyi kopfo kui iyekyio mawoko gako.
Kyipfa Ruwa aleluenenga mrima o wuowu-pfo, indi o pfinya na o ikunda na uwoṙe meena.
Kyasia ularigo nyi sonu kyipfa kya iṟingyishia lyaṙu. Ularigo nyi sonu kyipfa kyako inyi mpfungo okye, indi ukarishie mawicho hamwi na inyi kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha, iṙuana na pfinya ya Ruwa.
Ulya alelukyiṟa kalulaga kui ndago ngyiele; chi iṙuana na mawuto gaṙu soe-pfo; indi na kyilya oe akundi na isaṟia lyakye. Isaṟia-lyo luleenengo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu wookyia mlungana.
Na wulalu lyiṟingyishio kui iloṟo lya Mkyiṟa oṙu Kristo Yesu; alegalutsa upfu, na ishukuo moo na kulawoṙe inyamaṟika, kui Ndumi iya Ngyicha;
ikyeri kye kyipfa kyayo ngyilewiko ngyiwe moonguo mbonyi na msu na mlosha.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyileolokyio matuuro-ga maa ngyirigo nyi sonu-pfo; kyipfa ngyiichi icho ngyimwiṙikyie, na imanya piu kye neiṙima iringa kyilya ngyilekooma kokye mṟasa mfiri ulya.
Osha necha kui wuragari mbonyi tsiwoṙe moo uletsiicho koko, iiṙikyienyi lya ikunda lyikyeri kyiiri kya Kristo Yesu.
Ringa kyindo kyilya kyicha kui Mumuyo Mweele ekyekaa mrimenyi koṙu.
Nuichi kyindo-kyi, kye woose wakyeri wa Asia walengyiṙicha. Kyiiṙi kyawo kuwoṙe Fikyelo na Herimokyene.
Mndumii naenengye isaṟia walya wa ura lo Onesifoṟo, kyipfa kafoi nalengyichihiṟa, maa alerigo sonu nyi kyipfa kya ilyi ngyiwempfungye-pfo,
indi kyiyeri awekyeri iha Roma, nalengyipfula kui wuragari kangyiwona.
Mndumii namwenengye iwona isaṟia mbele ya Mndumii mfiri ulya o ianduyo. Na chandu alengyiṟundia kulya Efeso, iyoe nuichi mnu.
Kyasia iyoe, mono-ko, uwaṙe wukari isaṟienyi lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Na shindo shilya uleshiicho koko mbele ya waṟingyishi wafoi, isho ushiṙambikye wandu wasimiri wechiiṙima ilosha wengyi.
Ulye wukyiwa hamwi na inyi, cha asikari mcha o Kristo Yesu.
Kuwoṙe mndu ekyekapana shiṙa ekyekuwika shindonyi sha wuyana-pfo, kundu nachihiṟe ulya alemṟeia nawe asikari.
Maa mndu kawingana temonyi ekyeenengo kyindo kyeloṟa nammbinzi, sile awingana kulawoṙe ngyeṟo-pfo.
Kyiwaṟi mṙemi awoṙe wukyiwa wo maṟunda nawe o kuwooka iambilyia ṙombo lya ndunda.
Manya mnu isho ngyigamba, cha kyipfa Mndumii nekuenenga wuṟango mbonyinyi tsoose.
Kumbuo Yesu Kristo aleṟuka ko wapfu, o mbaṟe ya Dawidi chandu malosho gako ga Ndumi-i Ngyicha gaigamba.
Na inyi kyiiṙi kyayo ngyiletuuro mṟasa ipfungo cha mndu awutie mawicho; kyaindi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyekyepfungo-pfo.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyikarishia mbonyi tsoose, kyipfa kya wasambuṟe, kundu nawo waambilyie wukyiṟo wulya wukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, hamwi na mng'ano o mlungana.
Nyi mbonyi iwaṟi iiṙikyio, cha kyipfa
kokooya lopfa hamwi na oe,
lochiwaṙa moo hamwi na oe taa.
Kokooya losimiria,
lochichilyia hamwi na oe.
Kokooya lomkana oe,
na oe nelukana soe.
Kokooya soe lulaiṙikyie,
oe nekyeṙio ho kui iiṙikyio;
cha kyipfa echiiṙima ikukana amonyi-pfo.
Uwakumbuṟe mbonyi-tso, ochiwaikyimbia mbele ya Ruwa, walawaṙe iwingana kui maṙeṙo, galawoṙe kyiira, indi gekyenyamaṟa walya wekyegaicho.
Pfuṟukana iloṟa kye numwiṙikyie nyi Ruwa, mṟundi alawoṙe kyitewe kyerigo nyi sonu, na ilosha necha Ndumi Ngyicha.
Kaa kuleshi na mbonyi tsilawoṙe kyiira, tsilakyeri tsa mwiṙikyie o india Ruwa; kyipfa wechiengyeṟika ngoseṟa kyiiṙi kya iwuta shiwicho
na mbonyi tsawo tseṙunganana cha pee lyilekyechia. Kyiiṙi kya iwo kuwoṙe Himenayo na Fileto,
waleguṟa wuloi wulya wo Ndumi Ngyicha wechigamba kye mfiri o furumia ulemcha, mṟasa iilacha iiṙikyia lya wandu wafoi.
Kyaindi urende lo Ruwa luluikare, na mbonyi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha tsingyiṟeie wuye yalo:
“Mndumii naichi wai wakye
na lyingyi-se, orio mndu ekyesenda Rina lya Mndumii
naṙe wunyamaṟi.”
Kyasia numbenyi kuwoṙe shindo sha sahapu na heleri tikyi-pfo, indi na sha shiṙi, na sha teri. Shingyi shiwoṙe kyiṟumi, shingyi shiwoṙe-pfo.
Kyasia kokooya mndu nakuilyisha kui ikushowa na isho, nechiwa kyindo kyewona kyiṟumi, kyikyisanje, kyiwoṙie Mndumii kyiira, kyikyiachikyie kui orio iṟunda lyicha.
Kyaindi ṙicha lango tsa wundakyenyi, undeosha wusumganyi, na iiṙikyia, na ikunda, na ufoṟo, hamwi na walya wekyeindia Mndumii kui mrima mmbaṙami.
Kyaindi ulege maṙeṙo gesoruo-soruo ga kyitondo, galawoṙe wuṟango, ochimanya kye gekyeende maluyano.
Lyingyi-se kyiwaṟi mṟundi o Mndumii iwa mndu moluyana-pfo; indi iwa muoloru ko wandu woose, eiṙima ilosha, aichi ikarishia;
echiikyimbia kui wuoloru iwo waiwingana na oe, kundu kokooya kyaiṙimika, Ruwa nawaenengye iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi na imanya wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha.
Waiṙime-se iwiyiṟio makusaṟo mecha, na ikuashuo mṙegonyi o Mokyiriinzi, walya waleṙego nyi Mokyiriinzi, mṟasa iwuta shilya akundi.
Kyaindi umanye mbonyi-tsi kye mfiri ya mafurumionyi kowaṙa shiyeri sha ngataṟa.
Kyipfa wandu wechiwa nyi wandu wakukundi wawenyi, wakundi heleri, wekyekuiring'isha, wawoṙe tiri, wekyelahia, walekyeindia wafee wawo, walekyeana, wa kyiwuyana.
Walakundi wandu wa kanyi kowo, walakundi isanzo na walya waluyanyi nawo, wekyeiria woṙoe shindo sha wongo, walekyeiṙima ichilyia lango, walang'a, walakundi mecha.
Wekyeṟiinga woṙoe, walekyeicho, wekyekushela, wakundi sia tsa wuyana kuta ikunda Ruwa.
Wawoṙe mbaṟe ya iowuo na ikunda Ruwa, kyaindi wechikana pfinya tsakye. Iwo taa ukushowe nawo.
Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kya iwo kuwoṙe walya wekyekuwika numbenyi tsa wandu, na iwaṙa pfo waka wai matondo wawoṙe maṟio ga wunyamaṟi, waleṙoo nyi lango tsa orio mbaṟe;
wechikulosha mfiri yoose, indi walaiṙime maa ale iwaṙa wuṟango wo loi.
Na chandu Yane na Yambre walewingana na Mose, na wuṙo na iwa waiwingana na wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha. Nyi wandu wanyamaṟikyie mṙoe yawo, wawalege kyipfa kya iuṟa iiṙikyia.
Kyaindi wechishika kuleshi nawi-pfo, kyipfa wutondo wowo wochimanyika na pata ko wandu woose, chandu na wutondo wo iwo wulewemanyika.
Indi iyoe noosha malosho gako, na mchumie oko, na kyilya ngyikundi, na iiṙikyia, na wusimiri,

na ikunda, na ikarishia. Lyingyi-se na ngyuukyiwa na matuuro gako. Shindo shilengyikooya kulya Antiokyia, kulya Ikonio, na kulya Lyistira. Orio mbaṟe ya wukyiwa wung'anyi ngyilekarishia; na Mndumii nalengyikyiṟa iwuka isho shoose.
Yee, na woose wakundi iwaṙa mkaṟo yeowuo na ikunda Ruwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu wechipfulutso nyashi.
Kyaindi wandu wawicho na walya wekyelemba wechiengyeṟika, na iengyeṟa iwa wawicho, wechilemba na ilembo.
Indi iyoe ukae kyiiṙi kya shindo shilya ulelosho na iṟingyishio, cha kyipfa nuichi nyi wakyi ulekulosha kowo.
Na kye wookyia wututu nulemanya shiṟeio shiele, isho shechiiṙima ikuṟangusha mṟasa uambilyie wukyiṟo kui iiṙikyia lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
Orio kyiṟeio kyiwoṙe mṟufui o Ruwa, kyikyicha kyelosha, na iikyimbia wandu kyipfa kya maṙeko gawo, na kui ilosha wandu wawe wusumganyinyi.
Kundu mṟundi o Ruwa nawe mndu aafutsie echiiṙima iṟunda orio iṟunda lyicha.
Ngyikuwia mbele ya Ruwa na Kristo Yesu, echianduya wai na moo na wapfiie; kui iloṟo lyakye na kui Wumangyi wokye,
onguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa ukuṟeyeṟe kyiyeri kyicha na kyiyeri kyilakyicha kopfo. Ṟoṟoma kui pfinya, na iikyimbia kui wusimiri woose na malosho.
Kyipfa kuicha kyiyeri wechilega malosho gawoṙe moo; indi kui iosha kyilya wakundi wawenyi wepfula walosha wawo wafoi, cha kyipfa wawoṙe maṙwi gesoruo-soruo shindo.
Nawo wekaa kuleshi walacheicho mbonyi tsa loi, na iindukyia malosho ga wongo.
Indi iyoe uwaṙe meena shindonyi shoose. Karishia mawicho, ṟunda iṟunda lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, ṟunda kyilya kyikuwaṟi cha mṟundi o Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa wulalu inyi ngyiambilyia matuuro ga upfu, na kyiyeri kya ipfa lyako kyashika.
Ngyilekapana shiṙa ngyicha, kyaro ngamkyimarisa, Iiṙikyia ngyilelyiringa.
Numa ya iho Ruwa nangyikoomie oṟo ya wusumganyi, iya Mndumii moanduya awoṙe wusumganyi echingyienenga mfiri ulya, maa chi inyi tupu-pfo, indi na wandu woose taa wakundi iwona iloṟo lyakye.
Pfuṟukana icha na koko iwinyi.
Kyipfa Dema nalengyiṙa echikunda wuyana-wu wo wulalu, kapfunga kyaro iyenda Tesalonikye. Kyiresikye nayenda Galatia; Tito nayenda Dalyimatia.
Nyi Luka amonyi tikyi akyeri iha hamwi na inyi. Uwute Mariko uche na oe, kyipfa nangyiwoṙie kyiira iṟundenyi.
Kyaindi Tikyiko ngyilemṙuma Efeso.
Ijoho lyilya ngyileṙa ko Karipo ipfo Tiroa, kyiyeri uicha ulyiende, na shitapu shilya, ngoseṟa shilya sha njonyi.
Iskanda, ulya akyeri mnganya, naleloṟa wuwicho wung'anyi koko; Mndumii nemtaa iṙuana na mawuto gakye.
Na iyoe ukushowe na oe, cha kyipfa nalelega mnu maṙeṙo gaṙu.
Kyiyeri kyilya ngyilegoṟotso mengyenyi lya kuwooka kuwoṙe mndu alegoṟoka ura loko-pfo, indi woose walengyiṙa. Ngyiterewa walatalyio ṙeko kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo.
Kyaindi Mndumii nalegoṟoka ura loko kangyienenga pfinya, kundu kui iṟunda lyako mbonyi tsilya tsigambo nakamwi, mṟasa woose walaiṙikyie Ruwa waicho; na inyi ngakyiṟo iwuka upfunyi.
Mndumii nengyikyiṟa na orio kyindo kyiwicho, na ingyiringa mṟasa ngyishikye Wumangyinyi wo Ruwewu. Mng'ano ukyeri kokye mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Ngyiiṟikyiṟia Pirisikyila na Akyila, na walya wa kanyi ko Onesifoṟo.
Erasto nalekaa Korinto. Tirofimo ngyilemṙa kulya Mileto, aluoe.
Pfuṟukana uche kyiyeri mbeho ilandeche. Eubulo, Pude, Lyino, Kyilaudia na wana wa wama waiṙikyie Yesu woose taa wakuiṟikyiṟa.
Mndumii nakae hamwi na mrima opfo. Isaṟia lyikae hamwi na nyoe.
Inyi Paulo, mṟundi o Ruwa, na msu o Yesu Kristo; kyipfa kya ionguo iiṙikyia lya wasambuṟe wa Ruwa, na wuṟango wo wuloi wulya wokyeende iowuo na ikunda Ruwa.
Kyiiṙi kya ikusuria lya moo o mlungana, ulya Ruwa alekyeṙeṙa wongo aleluteṟia wookyia wuyana wulagumbo.
Kashukuo Ṙeṙo lyakye kui kyiyeri kyakye kyiiṙi kya ulogo lulya ngyileṙambiko inyi kui iwawaso lya Mkyiṟa oṙu Ruwa.
Ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Tito, mono-ko nakamwi iiṙikyienyi lyaṙu. Isaṟia lyikae kopfo na ufoṟo shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na Kristo Yesu Mkyiṟa oṙu.
Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyilekuṙa Kyirete, kundu uachikyie shindo shilya shiwewaṟi iachikyio, na iwika wameeku wa siṟi kyiiṙi kya orio mṟi chandu ngyilekuwia,
kokooya mndu alalegambo kye nawoṙe wuwicho woose, na oe nyi mii o mka umwi, nawoṙe wana waiṙikyie, walekyegambo kye nyi waṟui ang'u walawoṙe wuindi.

Kyipfa kyiwaṟi askofu nawe nyi mndu alekyegambo kye nawoṙe wuwicho woose. Alawe mndu mokushela, cha kyipfa nyi mndu ekyeringa iṟunda lya Ruwa. Alawe mndu ekyepfula ichihiṟa mrima okye. Alawe mwanguhu ikapo nyi nyashi, alawe mnanzi ang'u mndu moluyana. Alawe mndu awoṙe wulanga wo sonu wo masaa ga sonu.
Indi nawe mndu ekyeambilyia wandu, akundi iwuta kyilya kyikyicha, awoṙe meena, awoṙe wusumganyi, mweele, aichi ichilyia lango tsa mrima okye.
Iiṙikyia chandu amloshe naiṙime ikarisha wandu kui malosho gawoṙe moo, na iwinga walya wekyekana ulogo-lo.
Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe wandu wafoi walawoṙe wuindi, wawoṙe mbonyi tsa wutondo, walembi, na ngoseṟa Wayuda waiṙikyie Yesu.
Wawaṟi iimo walaṙeṙe. Iwo wekyefoga-foga woose wa kanyi ko wandu, wechilosha shindo shilawawaṟi kyipfa kya ipfula masaa ga sonu.
Mndu awukyie kowo, moonguo shisuku owo wawenyi, nagambie, “Wakyirete nyi wandu wekyeṙeṙa wongo mfiri yoose, mando mawicho ga saka, wawang'anyie ndewu na wawaṙoko.”
Wuṟingyishi-wo nyi loi. Kyipfa kya ikyo uwaṙeṙie kui wulang'a, kundu wawe wandu wapfulukyie iiṙikyienyi;
walaaṙanyie malosho ga Kyiyuda, maa mawawaso ga wandu wekyekaa kuleshi na shilya shikyeri sha loi.
Shindo shoose shishicha ko walya wawecha; kyaindi kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyicha ko walya wafanyi kyimṟumoe-pfo, walya walawoṙe iiṙikyia; indi ngyuuṟango tsawo tsifanyi kyimṟumoe, na makusaṟo gawo taa.
Waigamba kye waichi Ruwa, indi mawuto gawo gaimkana. Wawoṙe shindo shekyesuiṟa, wawoṙe wuindi-pfo, maa wawoṙe kyiira kyindonyi kyoose-pfo.
Kyaindi iyoe onguo shindo shiwaṟi malosho galamasanze-sanze na shindo shingyi.
Kye wameeku wawe wandu wawoṙe meena, wawoṙe mkaṟo yechienenga wandu iwaindia, wawoṙe wuṟango, wapfulukyie kyiiṙikyia na ikundenyi na wusimirinyi.
Na wuṙo na wakyeku wawaṙe mkaṟo o wuele. Walawe wandu wekyeiria wandu shindo sha wongo, walawe wandu wekyenyo mpfinyo wufoi, indi wawe wandu wekyelosha shindo shicha.
Kundu waenengye waka wakoho wuṟango, wakunde wamii wawo, na ikunda wana wawo;
na iwa wandu wawoṙe meena, iṙa wuṟui, wekyeṟunda kanyi kowo, wekyewuta kyilya kyikyicha, iindia wamii wawo; kundu Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyilamino.
Na wuṙo na wanakye uwatutume iwa na meena;
shindonyi shoose, iyoe kumonyi ochiloṟa mfano o mawuto mecha, na maloshonyi gapfo ochiloṟa wuloi na kulawoṙe temo,
na mbonyi tsiwoṙe moo tsilechiiṙima igambo kye tsiwoṙe tewe, kundu ulya ekyekana narigo nyi sonu, cha kyipfa awoṙe kyindo eiṙima igamba kyipfa kyaṙu-pfo.
Walya wakyeri shisinga waindie wandumii wawo, wechiwachihiṟa shindonyi shoose. Walawe wandu wekyegaluo kyiyeri wawio kyindo.
Walawe wandu wekyeiwa; indi waafutsie kyilya wateṟia, kundu wachope malosho ga Mkyiṟa oṙu Ruwa shindonyi shoose.
Kyipfa isaṟia lya Ruwa lyekyekyiṟa wandu woose lyamloṟo.
Nalyo lyilulosha ilega wuwicho na lango tsa kyiwuyana; luiṙime iwaṙa moo na meena, na wusumganyi, na iowuo na ikunda Ruwa, kyiiṙi kya wuyana-wu wo wulalu.
Lochiambuya ikusuria lyiwoṙe mboṟa na iloṟo kyiṟumi kya Kristo Yesu, Ruwa ang'anyi na Mkyiṟa oṙu;
ulya alereka moo okye kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu nalukyiṟe lulaolokyio nyi mawicho ga mbaṟe tsoose, na iilyisha wandu wawe wakye oe amonyi, walya wawoṙe wuragari mawutonyi mecha.
Onguo shindo-sho, ikyimbia na iṟoṟoma kui wuchilyi woose; mndu oose alakumine.
Ukumbuṟe wandu ipfereria ko walya wawoṙe pfinya na wuchilyi, na iindia, na orio kyiyeri ikuṟeyeṟa ko orio iṟunda lyicha.
Walalahie mndu oose, walaluyane, wawe wandu wekyewuta kyilya kyikyicha, wechiloṟa wuhoo woose ko wandu woose.

Kyipfa mfiri ya ipfo numa maa soe luwewoṙe wuṟango-pfo. Luwewanyamaṟi, luwalembe, kunu lochiosha lango na shindo sha mamoona sha mbaṟe tsifoi, lochiwaṙa mkaṟo ya wuwicho na wunyeng'i, lochisuiṟana na isuana.
Kyaindi wucha wo Mkyiṟa oṙu Ruwa, na ikunda lyakye ko wandu, kyiyeri lyileloṟo, nalelukyiṟa.
Chi kyipfa kya mawuto ga wusumganyi lulewuta soe-pfo; indi kui isaṟia lyakye, kui isanjo na ifeo lya kawi na kui iwa wahya Mumuyonyi Mweele.
Ulya alelupusia kulawoṙe iehia, kui njia ya Yesu Kristo Mkyiṟa oṙu;
kundu lukotalyio wusumganyi kui isaṟia lyakye, luiṙime iwa weoṟa wa moo o mlungana, chandu ikusuria lyaṙu lyikyeri.
Nyi kyindo kya loi; na shindo-sho ngyikundi ushionguo na pfinya, kundu walya waleiṙikyia Ruwa wakumbuo ikaa mawutonyi mecha. Isho shishicha; lyingyi-se shiwoṙe kyiira ko wandu.
Kyaindi kushowe na maṙeṙo ga wutondo, shindo shileambilyio ko waku, shiluyano na ikapana kyipfa kya uwawaso. Kyipfa isho shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo. Lyingyi-se nyi shindo sha wulya.
Mndu ekyelosha shindo sha wongo komumṙeṙia lya kuwooka na lya kawi, mlege;
uichi kye mndu cha icho naṙekyie; lyingyi-se naiwuta kya wunyamaṟi, kyipfa nakuanduya oe amonyi.
Kyiyeri ngyechiṙuma Aritema kopfo ang'u Tikyiko, tambagana icha na koko kunu Nikopolyi; cha kyipfa ngyikusaṟie ikaa kunu kyiyeri kya mbeho.
Sena, ulya aichi mbonyi tsa iṙeṙa moondu, na Apolo, uwatarame kyaronyi kyawo, walauṟe kyindo kyoose.
Wandu waṙu nawo wakuloshe iwuta shindo shicha orio kyiyeri, ko shindo shilya shiwaṟi tikyi; walacheewa wandu waiṟunda wulya.
Wandu woose wakyeri hamwi na inyi wakuiṟikyiṟa. Luikanyie iiṟikyiṟa walya walukundi iiṙikyienyi. Isaṟia lyikae hamwi na nyoe moose.
Inyi Paulo, mpfungo o Kristo Yesu, na Timoteo akyeri mono-wama oṙu, ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Filemon, mkunde oṙu, mṟundi hamwi na soe,
na ko Afia, mono-wama oṙu, na ko Arikyipo, asikari oṙiaṙu, na ko siṟi ikyeri numbenyi yapfo.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa, Awu oṙu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
Ngyiana Ruwa oko mfiri yoose, ngyechikukumbuo shiterewonyi shako;
ngyechiicho mbonyi tsa ikunda lyapfo na iiṙikyia uwoṙe ko Mndumii Yesu na ko wandu wa Ruwa woose;
kundu kui iwaṙana lya iiṙikyia lyaṙu na iyoe luṟunde iṟunda lyakye; kyiiṙi kya orio imanya kyindo kyicha kyikyeri koṙu, kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Kyipfa ngyiwewoṙe sia ing'anyi na iwiyiṟio moo kyipfa kya ikunda lyapfo, cha kyipfa mrima ya wandu wa Ruwa ilewiyiṟio moo nyi iyoe, mono-wama oṙu.
Koikyo, maa chandu ngyiwoṙe wukari kyiiṙi kya Kristo ikuwia kyikuwaṟi;
kyaindi kyipfa kya ikunda ngyikuterewa, cha kyipfa nyi chandu ngyikyeri, Paulo ngyikyeri meeku, na wulalu mpfungo o Kristo Yesu taa.
Ngyikuterewa kyipfa kya mono-ko kyiiṙi kya Kristo, Onesimo;
akyeri kye kacha awewoṙe kyiira kopfo-pfo, indi wulalu nawoṙe kyiira mnu kopfo, iyoe na inyi taa.
Ngyilemṙuma kopfo, oe amonyi, kyipfa ngyimkundi mnu.
Inyi ngyiwekundi nakae koko, naiṙime ingyiṟundia handu hapfo kyiiṙi kya iwiko kyipfungonyi kyipfa kya ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
Kyaindi ngyilekunda iwuta kyindo kyoose ulakyikundi iyoe-pfo, kundu kye wuindi wopfo wulacheewa wuitiko, indi kui iiṙikyia kumonyi.
Kyipfa, kofia nyikyo kyitewe alewiko kuleshi na iyoe ko mfiri ngyaangu, kundu ukae na oe-se mlungana.
Wookyia wulalu, chi cha mtumo-pfo, indi ngoseṟa ya mtumo, mono-wama mkunde; koko inyi mnu, na kopfo iyoe ngoseṟa mnu, mmbiunyi na kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
Kyasia kokooya ongyiwona inyi ngyiwoṙe iwaṙana na iyoe, ambilyia ichu kyimwi na inyi ngyimonyi.
Na kokooya nakuwutia kyindo kyiwicho, ang'u nuimrika kyindo, ungyiwese inyi.
Inyi Paulo ngaṟeia kui kuwoko koko ngyimonyi, inyi ngyechitaa. Ngyikuwia kye nuwoṙe sile yako kyipfa ngyilekukyiṟa kyimrima-pfo.
Yee, mono-wama oko, ngyiwone kyiira kopfo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii; uwiyiṟie moo mrima oko kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
Kyipfa kya ilyi ngyiiṙikyie wuindi wopfo ny'kyo kyimaṙuma ngakuṟeia, ngyiichi kye nochiwuta ngoseṟa ya isho ngyigamba.
Na hamwi na isho ungyiṟeyeṟie handu hekaa; kyipfa ngyikusurie kye kui shiterewo shanyu mochitaramo ingyiwona.
Epafura, ampfungye hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, nakuiṟikyiṟa;
na Mariko, Aristariko, Dema, na Luka, wekyeṟunda hamwi na inyi.
Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na mrima yanyu.
Kyiyeri kya kacha Ruwa naleṙeṙa na waku waṙu kafong'ui na kundu kufong'ui, iiṙia ko weonguo shisuku;
mafurumionyi ga mfiri-i naleṙeṙa na soe kyiiṙi kya Mono-kye alemmbika nawe mokyioṟa o shindo shoose, lyingyi-se kui oe nalegumba wuyana.

Oe nekyeloṟa chandu Ruwa awoṙe mng'ano, fana ya mrima okye, echiṙuo shindo shoose kui iwawaso lya wuiṙimi wokye, amwende ihooṟio lya ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu, naleṙamia ura lo kulyoe lo ulya ang'anyi kuta woose.
Ruwa nalesambuṟa Mono-kye nawe ang'anyi kuta malaika, chandu rina lyilya Ruwa alemwenenga lying'anyi kuta lya malaika.
Cha kyipfa nalewia malaika uha kyiyeri kyoose,
“Iyoe nyi mono-ko,
inyi inu ngakufee?”
Na lyingyi-se,
“Inyi ngyechiwa awu kokye,
na oe nechiwa mana koko?”
Na lyingyi-se, kyiyeri aende Mono-kye o kuwooka na wuyanenyi nagamba,
“Malaika woose wa Ruwa wampfirie ndi.”
Na ko mbonyi tsa malaika nagamba,
“Ekyegaluo malaika wakye iwa cha shiwiṟi,
na waṟundi wakye iwa cha moṙo mlang'a.”
Kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa Mana nagamba,
“Kyitima kyapfo kya wuchilyi, hoi Ruwa,
nyi kya mlungana na mlungana.
Na upoi lo Wumangyi wopfo
nyi upoi lo wusumganyi.
Nukundi wusumganyi
nosuo shituṟu
koikyo Ruwa, Ruwa opfo, nakushumbuo,
kakuenenga kyiṟumi kying'anyi kuta woṙoo.”
Na lyingyi-se,
“Iyoe, Mndumii, ipfo mawookyionyi nulewika
ngyuurende tsa uruka,
na ruwewu nyi iṟunda lya mawoko gapfo.
Isho shechinyamaṟika,
Indi iyoe nochikaa mlungana.
Na shoose shechikuo cha nguwo.
Na cha nguwo nochishilema-lema,
natso tsechiilachika.
Kyaindi iyoe nyi ulya ulya
na mfiri yapfo yechisia-pfo.”
Ngyesa kuwoṙe malaika alemmbia kyiyeri kyoose
“Uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe,
mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechiwika washituwa wapfo
wuchilyinyi wopfo?”
Ngyesa malaika nyi wakyi? Chi walya wekyeṙumo iṟundia walya wekyeoṟa wukyiṟo-pfoe?
Koikyo kyiluwaṟi iosha nawi shilya luleicho lulacheṙeko.
Cha kyipfa kokooya kyindo kyilya kyilegambo nyi malaika kyilawelolomie, na orio mndu alemina kyindo-kyo naleanduyo chandu kyiwaṟi,
ngyesa soe, loiṙima kuṙa ikyia ianduyo lukomina ulogo-lu lung'anyi kuṙi lo wukyiṟo? Ulogo lulegambo kuwooka nyi Mndumii, naaho lukomanyika koṙu na ko walya waleicho.
Ruwa na oe echiṟingyishia hamwi nawo kui ṟigo na shiṟiyisho na pfinya tsa mbaṟe tsifoi, na kui igawa shisumbo sha Mumuyo Mweele, chandu alekunda oe amonyi.
Kyipfa Ruwa alewika malaika wachilyie uruka lulya luicha na luionguo mbonyi tsalo-pfo, indi mndu umwi naleṟingyishia kuṙi handu halyiwe echigamba,
“Mndu nyi kyikyi tane omkumbuo?
Ang'u mana o mndu mṟasa umwambuye?
Nulemgumba kawa mtutu kuta malaika,
numwenengyie kyiṟumi na mng'ano,
nummbikyie wuye ya maṟunda goose.
Na imgaluo mchilyi o shindo shoose.”
