Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kya iwika shindo shoose wuchilyinyi wokye uletsugaṟa kyindo ulalekyiwika wuchilyinyi wokye-pfo. Kyaindi wulalu lulandewone shindo shoose shechiwiko wuchilyinyi wokye-pfo;
indi lowona ulya alegumbo kawa mtutu kuta malaika, Yesu, kyipfa kya mawawio ga upfu, amwenengye kyiṟumi na mng'ano, kundu kui isaṟia lya Ruwa napfe kyipfa kya orio mndu.

Cha kyipfa kyiwemmbaṟi oe, ulya kyipfa kyakye na kui oe shindo shoose shilegumbo, kundu naenengye wandu wafoi wekyemwosha wuiṙimi wo iwona kyiṟumi kyakye, iafutsia msongoru ang'anyi o wukyiṟo wowo kui njia ya ilya wukyiwa.
Kyipfa ulya ekyeilyisha na walya wekyeilyisho woose wawukyie ko mndu umwi. Kyipfa kya ikyo ekyerigo nyi sonu iwalaga wana wa wamae-pfo.
Nekyegamba,
“Ngyechionguo mbonyi tsapfo ko wana wa wama wako,
siṟinyi ngyechikuṟumisha.”
Na lyingyi-se,
“Ngyechiwa ngyikumsurie oe.”
Na lyingyi-se,
“Inyi ngyikyeri iha na wana-wa
ngyileenengo nyi Ruwa.”
Kyasia, cha kyipfa wana-wa nyi wandu wawoṙe mmbiu na samu, maa oe nalewewa wuṙo, kundu kui njia ya upfu nanyamaṟe ulya awewoṙe pfinya tsa upfu, Mokyiriinzi,
na kui iwuta kuṙo nalekyie walya wawei watumo kyipfa kya iowuo upfu moo yawo yoose.
Kyipfa nyi loi kye ekyetarama malaika-pfo indi nekyetarama walya wa kyishari kya Abrahamu.
Koikyo kyiwemmbaṟi ifananyisho na wana wa wamae shindonyi shoose, naiṙime iwa mkohanyi ang'anyi awoṙe isaṟia, ekyeafutsia kyilya ateṟia iṟundenyi lya Ruwa, nahooṟie wandu wakye ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
Na cha kyipfa oe amonyi nalelyiso wukyiwa kyiyeri aleyesho, neiṙima itarama walya wekyeyesho.
Koikyo wana wa wama mui wandu wa Ruwa, muleiṙikyia ndago ya ruwewu, kusaṟenyi mnu mbonyi tsa msu na Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose o shilya lokyeṟingyishia. Yesu,
awekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia ko ulya alemsambuṟa naṟunde iṟunda lyakye, chandu Mose na oe awekyeri, kyiyeri alesongoya wandu wa Ruwa.
Kyipfa Yesu natalo kye nawaṟi kyiṟumi ngoseṟa kuta Mose, chandu ulya ekyewika numba awoṙe woguru kuta numba-yo.
Kyipfa orio numba ingyiwikye nyi mndu; indi ulya aleachikyia shindo shoose nyi Ruwa.
Na Mose loi naleafutsia shilya aleteṟia kyiyeri alesongoya wandu woose wa Ruwa cha mṟundi, nawe wuṟingyishi wo shindo shechigambo numa ya iho,
indi Kristo, cha mana ekyechilyia numba ya Ruwa; ulya numba yakye ikyeri nyi soe, kokooya loengyeṟa iwaṙa wuṟango na wukari na ikushela lya iweṙelyia lyaṙu mṟasa mafurumionyi.
Koikyo, chandu Mumuyo Mweele agamba,
“Inu, kokooya moicho ṟui lyakye.
Maa mulaumiṟe mrima yanyu,
chandu waku wanyu walelega Ruwa,
kyiyeri kya iyesho
kulya nukyenyi ngyuumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga,
Kyiyeri-kyo waku wanyu walengyiyesha,
wakawona mawuto gako maka makumi gaana.
Koikyo rika-lyi lyilengyipfulutsa nyashi,
ngagamba, mfiri yoose nyi wandu
wawoṙe mrima iṙekyie;
walemanya mbonyi tsako-pfo.
Chandu ngyilelya nyamu kui nyashi,
‘Wechiiṙa na handu hako heonyonyia-pfo.’ ”
Ambuyenyi, wana wa wama, maa umwi onyu alawaṙe mrima mmbicho ulawoṙe iiṙikyia; kui ikuletsana na Ruwa ai na moo.
Kyaindi mututumane orio mfiri; kundu maa umwi onyu alawaṙe mrima muumu kui wulembi wo wunyamaṟi.
Cha kyipfa lowa wandu wekyekaa handu hamwi na Kristo, kokooya lokuwaṙa tapu na kyilya luleloṟa kyiyeri lulewooka iiṙikyia Yesu mṟasa mafurumionyi.
Iho-ndu kyekyegambo,
“Inu kokooya moicho ṟui lyakye
Maa mulaumiṟe mrima yanyu,
cha kyiyeri kyilya kyelega Ruwa.”
Kyipfa nyi wakyi walengyipfulutsa nyashi, kyiyeri waleicho? Chi walya walewuka Misiri wechisongoyo nyi Mose-pfoe?
Lyingyi-se nyi wakyi walepfulutsa Ruwa nyashi maka makumi gaana? Chi walya waleṙeko, walya mnying'a yawo ileoloka nukyenyi ngyuumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga?
Lyingyi-se nyi wakyi Ruwa alewalyiia nyamu kye wechiiṙa na handu hakye heonyonyia, sile walya walemlega?
Kyasia, lowona kye waleiṙima iiṙa na kulya urukyenyi-pfo kyipfa walelega iiṙikyia Ruwa.
Kyasia, kokooya kuwoṙe kyaasa kya iiṙa na handu ha Ruwa heonyonyia, luowuoe, maa umwi oṙu alechewono kye nawuṟa kyaasa-kyo.
Kyipfa nyi loi, maa soe taa luleongoyo mbonyi ngyicha chawo. Kyaindi mbonyi-tso wandu waleicho tsilewatarama kyindo-pfo kyipfa tsileṙuana na iiṙikyia lya mrimenyi ko walya waleicho-pfo.
Kyipfa soe luiṙikyie luiṙa na handu ho heonyonyia; chandu alegamba,
“Chandu ngyilelya nyamu kui nyashi,
wechiiṙa na handu hako heonyonyia-pfo.”
Maa chandu maṟunda galya galemarisika wookyia kyiyeri ngyuurende tsa wuyana tsilewiko.
Cha kyipfa handu halyiwe nagambie kuṙi ko mbonyi tsa mfiri o mfungaaṙe, “Mfiri o mfungaaṙe naleonyonya, kaṙa maṟunda gakye goose.”
Na iho naho taa, “Wechiiṙa na handu hako heonyonyia-pfo.”
Kyasia kyipfa ṙeṙo-lyi lyatsugaa ho kye kuwoṙe wandu wechiiṙa na handu-ho heonyonyia, na walya waleongoyo mbonyi-tso kyiyeri kya kacha, walelemo iiṙa na handu ho heonyonyia kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi wowo,
nawika-se mfiri mlyiwe, echigamba, kyiiṙi kya Dawidi numa ya kyiyeri kyileshi kuṙi, “Inu; chandu kyikyigambe wookyia kacha,
‘Inu kokooya moicho ṟui lyakye,
Maa mulaumiṟe mrima yanyu.’ ”
Kyipfa kokooya Yosua alewaenenga sia, awechiionguo-se mfiri ungyi kyiyeri kya numa-pfo.
Kyasia, hatsugae sia ya mfiri o onyonya ko wandu wa Ruwa.
Kyipfa oe aleiṙa na halya-ndu heonyonyia naonyonya amonyi iṟundenyi lyakye, chandu Ruwa aleonyonya iṟundenyi lyakye.
Kyasia, lupfuṟukane iiṙa na kyiiṙi kya sia-yo, kundu kye mndu oose alacheoloka cha wandu-wo walaleindia Ruwa.

Kyipfa Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyiwoṙe moo, lyingyi-se lyiwoṙe pfinya; lyingyi-se lyilyiohi kuta ushu loose lo mmbega kuwi; lyingyi-se lyekyekoṟa mṟasa lyikaiṙima iletsana mrima na ngoo, na shiwungo na mafuṙa gakyeri ipfo shiwungonyi; lyingyi-se lyilyianguhu imanya makusaṟo na kyilya mrima ukundi.
Maa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyeri na moo kyilakyishukuoe mbele ya Ṙeṙo-lyo-pfo, kyaindi shindo shoose shikyeri kyiṟanguoe na shishishukuoe mesonyi gakye ulya awoṙe shindo shaṙu.
Kyasia, kokooya luwoṙe Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose aleiṙa na ruwewu, Yesu Mono-Ruwa, luoshe mnu shilya lokyeṟingyishia.
Cha kyipfa luwoṙe mkohanyi alechiiṙima iṙuana na soe shindonyi shaṙu sha wufofo-pfo; kyaindi oe naleyesho kyimwi na soe shindonyi shoose, indi alewuta kya wunyamaṟi-pfo.
Kyasia, lutikyire kyitimenyi kya isaṟia kulawoṙe wuowu, kundu luenengo isaṟia, na iwona isaṟia lyelutarama kyiyeri lulawoṙe shindo shilushikyie.
Kyipfa orio Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose amsambuṟe iwuka ko wandu nammbikye kyipfa kya wandu mbonyinyi tsa Ruwa, kundu nawute shienengo kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi.
Echiiṙima iṙuana kui wuhoo na walya walaichi na walya waiṙeka, cha kyipfa oe amonyi nawoṙe mbaṟe ya wufofo;
na kyipfa kya ikyo kyimmbaṟi, cha kyipfa kya wandu, wuṙo kyipfa kya mrima okye amonyi, iwuta shienengo kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi.
Na kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima ikuenenga amonyi kyiṟumi-kyi-pfo, sile ulya ekyelago nyi Ruwa, cha Aron.
Na wuṙo Kristo na oe alekuṙosa mrimenyi kokye na iṙuo kyiṟumi kya iwa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose-pfo, kyaindi nyi Ruwa alemmbia,
“Iyoe nyi Mono-ko
inu ngawa Awu opfo.”
Chandu agambie handu hengyi,
“Nochiwa mkohanyi mlungana
cha Melyikyisedekyi.”
Yesu, mfiri-yo awei na moo, naleeṟeṟia Ruwa, echifiiṟa na itonyitsa mcheṟeṟe, Ruwa echiiṙima imkyiṟa na immbuta upfunyi, kaaṙanyio chandu awekyeri mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa;
na, maa chandu akyeri Mana, nalekulosha iindia kui wukyiwa alelya.
Na oe amṟingyishio kye naafutsio, kawa ulya ekyekyiṟa wandu mlungana ko wandu woose wekyemwindia.
Numa ya iho namsende na Ruwa iwa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose cha Melyikyisedekyi.
Ulya luwoṙe shindo shifoi sheonguo kyipfa kyakye; na nyi kyindo kyuumu ishionguo cha kyipfa mowa wandu waṙoko iaṙanyia.

Cha kyipfa, kokooya kyimmbaṟi iwa walosha, (kyipfa kyiyeri kying'anyi kyamwiṙa), muwaṟi ilosho na mndu malosho ga kuwooka ga mbonyi tsa Ruwa. Na nyoe kyipfa mukyeri cha wana wanangu muwewaṟi maruwa maa chi kyelya kyikari-pfo.
Cha kyipfa orio mndu ekyenyo maruwa aichi mnu mbonyi tsa wusumganyi-pfo, cha kyipfa nyi mana mnangu.
Kyaindi kyelya kyikari nyi ko wandu wapfulukyie kyiiṙikyia, walya wekyeiṙima imanya kyicha na kyiwicho.

Kyipfa kya ikyo, lukoṙa ionguo malosho ga kuwooka ga Kristo, lupfuṟukane lushikye masiionyi ga kyaro. Maa lulaṙeṙe-se mbonyi tsa malosho-go ga kuwooka, lulaiwuta-se shindo shilawoṙe kyiiṙa na iiṙikyia Ruwa,
na ga malosho ga ngyuupatiso, na iyekyia mawoko, na iṟutso wapfu, na ianduyo lya mlungana.
Na isho lochishiwuta Ruwa kaluenenga wuiṙimi wo iwuta kuṙo.
Cha kyipfa walya walemuenengo ngyeela, na isonja kyisumbo kya ruwewu, na iambilyia ṙombo lya Mumuyo Mweele,
na isonja mbonyi ngyicha tsa Ruwa, na pfinya tsa shiyeri shiicha,
wakaṙa iiṙikyia numa ya iho, kyechiiṙimika-se iwagaluo waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi-pfo; cha kyipfa wakapia Mono-Ruwa msalabenyi lya kawi kui mrima yawo, na imriisa sonu na pata.
Kyipfa uruka lokyenyo mvuo yekyekapa ho kyiyeri kui kyiyeri, na iṙosa maṟa gawoṙe kyiira ko walya galeṙemo kyipfa kyawo, wekyewona mboṟa tsiwukyie ko Ruwa;
indi uruka-lo lukoṙosa msha na makacha lokyelego na ikyiṟeseso nyi Ruwa na mafurumionyi galo nyi irumatso.
Kyaindi, wakunde, maa chandu lokyeonguo isho, mbonyinyi tsanyu luleiṙikyia mbonyi ngyicha ngoseṟa, na tsiwoṙe wukyiṟo.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa ammbicho mṟasa nawaṙime iṟunda lyanyu-pfo, na ikunda lyilya mulelyiṟingyishia kui rina lyakye, cha kyipfa muleṟundia wandu wa Ruwa, na mṟasa wulalu muwaṟundia.
Na soe lukundi orio umwi onyu naṟingyishie wuragari wulya wulya, mṟasa mafurumionyi;
kundu mulaṙokuoe, indi muwe wandu wekyeosha walya wekyeoṟa shiteṟio kui iiṙikyia na wusimiri.
Cha kyipfa Ruwa, kyiyeri aleenenga Abrahamu kyaasa kyipfa alawewoṙe ang'anyi kuta ulya alemlyiia nyamu, nalelya nyamu kui mrima okye,
echigamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngyechikuwikyia mboṟa, na ikupfumbutsa.”
Na kuṙo kui isimiria kawona kyaasa kyilya.
Kyipfa wandu wekyelya nyamu kui ulya akyeri ang'anyi kuta wo; na kowo matsitsionyi ga iwingana kui maṙeṙo nyi nyamu, iloṟa kye maṙeṙo-go nyi ga loi,
kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tso Ruwa, akundi iloṟa ngoseṟa mnu walya wekyeoṟa kyaasa kyilya, chandu shilya akundi shilechiiṙima iilachika.
Shilya kyiiṙi kyasho Ruwa alechiiṙima iṙeṙa wongo, luwone iwiyiṟio moo lyilalolomie, soe lulalekyelyio iosha na isimiria shilya shilewiko mbele yaṙu.

Lushiwoṙe cha kyindo kyetirimisha mrima ulakupaaye-paye, kyindo kyiwoṙe wuringyi wung'anyi, kyiwoṙe pfinya, na ulya lokyewika ikusuria lyaṙu nyi Yesu, ulya ekyeiṙa nguwonyi yeshingyia ya hekalu lya ruwewu na halya-ndu ha kyiiṙi haele.
Handu Yesu aleiṙa naho kyipfa kyaṙu, msongoru oṙu, nawa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose mṟasa mlungana cha Melyikyisedekyi.
Cha kyipfa Melyikyisedekyi-cho, mangyi o Salemu, mkohanyi o Ruwa ai wuye ruwewu, nalekarisana na Abrahamu kyiyeri aweiwuya ikapa wamangyi-wo, kammbikyia mboṟa.
Ulya Abrahamu alemgawia kyifunjoe kya ikumi kya shindo shoose; (rina lyakye lya kuwooka nyi mangyi o wusumganyi, lyingyi-se nyi mangyi o Salemu, kyimwi na igamba, mangyi o ufoṟo.
Awoṙe awu-pfo, awoṙe wamae-pfo, awoṙe wafee-pfo, awoṙe kyiyeri alefeo, maa kyiyeri alepfa-pfo, indi namfananyishe na Mono-Ruwa). Icho nyi mkohanyi mṟasa mlungana.
Kyasia, ambuyenyi chandu mndu-cho aweng'anyi, ulya Abrahamu, mku oṙu ang'anyi, alemwenenga kyifunjoe kya ikumi kya shilya aleende shiṙenyi.

Na kyiiṙi kya wana wa Lewi nawo, walya wekyeenengo wukohanyi, wawoṙe wuchilyi wo iṙuo kyifunjoe kya ikumi iwuka ko wandu wawo, wana wa wamawo, chandu mawawaso gagambie, maa chandu wakyeri wa kyishari kya Abrahamu.
Indi oe, ulya kyishari kyakye kyilaletalo kye kyiwukyie kowo, nalewuta kyifunjoe kya ikumi iwuka ko Abrahamu, kammbikyia mboṟa ulya awoṙe kyaasa-kyo.
Maa kyeiṙima ilego nakamwi kye mtutu nekyewikyio mboṟa nyi ang'anyi-pfo.
Na makohanyi wekyepfa wekyewuta kyifunjoe kya ikumi; indi iha Melyikyisedekyi ekyeambilyia kyifunjoe kya ikumi ekyepfa-pfo.
Lyingyi-se kyeiṙima igambo kye, kui njia ya Abrahamu, maa Lewi ekyeambilyia kyifunjoe kya ikumi naleenengyia kyifunjoe kya ikumi;
cha kyipfa alekoafeo kyiyeri-kyo Melyikyisedekyi alekarisana na oe-pfo.

Kyasia, kokooya kulawewoṙe wufofo wukohanyinyi wo Lewi; (kyipfa wandu waleenengo mawawaso kyipfa kya wukohanyi-wo), kuwewoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya kyikyi kuwaṙe mkohanyi ungyi, ai cha Melyikyisedekyi, maa aletalo cha ilyi nai cha Aron?
Kyipfa wukohanyi wulya wukoilachika, kyiwaṟi na mawawaso gailachikye.
Kyipfa oe mbonyi tsakye tsilegambo kuṙo, nyi-we o wandu wa mbaṟe ingyi, mbaṟe kulawoṙe mndu o mbaṟe-yo aleṟunda alyitaṟenyi.
Kyipfa kyikyeri na pata kye Mndumii oṙu nalewuka kyisharinyi kya Yuda, mbaṟe ya wandu walya Mose alaleonguo kyindo kyawo kyoose ko mbonyi tsa wukohanyi.
Lyingyi-se isho luiṙeṙa shikyeri na pata mnu ngoseṟa, kokooya nawoneka mkohanyi ungyi ai cha Melyikyisedekyi;
alakyeri mkohanyi ko mawawaso ga kyimndu, indi kui pfinya tsa moo tsilekyesia.
Kyipfa namṟingyishie kye,
“Iyoe nyi mkohanyi mlungana
cha Melyikyisedekyi.”
Kyipfa kuwoṙe iilachika lya iwawaso lyilya lyilesonguo, kyipfa kya wufafa wolyo, na iuṟa kyiira lyayo;
(cha kyipfa iwawaso lyilya lyileafutsia kyindo-pfo); na hamwi na isho kulewiko ikusuria lyilyicha ngoseṟa, ikusuria lyekyeluenenga itikyiria Ruwa.
Na kyipfa nyamu ilaleuṟika,
(kyipfa walya walesambuṟo makohanyi kulawoṙe nyamu; indi oe, hamwi na nyamu, kui ulya alemmbia,
“Mndumii nalya nyamu
maa echiilacha nyamu-yo-pfo,
iyoe nyi mkohanyi mlungana.”)
Kyasia, iṙuana na wuloi-wu Yesu nawa mloṟi o mma ulya mcha ngoseṟa.
Lyingyi-se walya walesambuṟo makohanyi wafoi, kyipfa waleshingyio nyi upfu walakae ho;
indi oe, kyipfa ekyekaa mlungana, nawoṙe wukohanyi wulekyewuka ho.
Na oe, kyipfa kya ikyo, neiṙima ikyiṟa nakamwi walya wekyecha na ko Ruwa kui oe; kyipfa nakyeri na moo mfiri yoose kundu nawaterewie.
Kyipfa luwewaṟi soe luwaṙe mkohanyi ang'anyi mbaṟe-i akyeri mweele, alawoṙe wuwicho, alawoṙe tewe lyoose, amletsane na walya wekyeṙeko, Ruwa alemwiria wuye ruwewu.

Ulya alakundi kyindo orio mfiri, cha makohanyi walya wengyi wang'anyi, kuwooka iwuta kyiṙaso kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsakye amonyi, numa ya iho kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu-wo; kyipfa oe nalewuta kuṙo lyimwi, kyiyeri alereka moo okye.
Kyipfa uwawaso luwikyie wandu wawoṙe wufafa iwa makohanyi wang'anyi; indi mbonyi-tso tsa nyamu ilecha numa ya uwawaso tsilemsambuṟa iwa Mana aafutsie mlungana na mlungana.
Kyasia, kyiiṙi kya isho luionguo, kyindo kying'anyi kuta shoose nyi ikyi, luwoṙe Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose mbaṟe-i, aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko kyitima kya wuchilyi kya Ruwa Mopfinya.
Mṟundi o handu haele, na o tengo lyilya lya loi, lyilya Mndumii alelyiwika, maa chi mndu-pfo.
Kyipfa orio Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose nekyesambuṟo kundu nawute shiṙaso, kyiwaṟi ichu na oe nawaṙe kyindo kyeṙasa.
Kokooya awekyeri urukyenyi, awechiwa mkohanyi-pfo; kyipfa kuwoṙe wekyewuta shienengo chandu mawawaso gagambie.

Wekyeṟundia kyindo kyikyeri cha kyirinje kya ruwewu; chandu Mose alewio nyi Ruwa nawute, kyiyeri awekuṟeyeṟie iwika tengo lyilya; kyipfa nagamba, “Achikyia shindo shoose kui mfano ulya uleloṟo kulya fumvunyi.”
Kyaindi wulalu nawona iṟunda lyicha ngoseṟa, chandu akyeri mndu aṙuṙe ndago ya mma mcha, Ruwa nagambie kye wandu wakye wechiwona shindo shicha kuta isho.
Kyipfa kokooya mma ulya o kuwooka ulawewoṙe tewe, mrima ya wandu iwechipfulo nyi ulya o kawi-pfo.
Kyipfa kyiyeri ekyegamba kye wawoṙe tewe, nekyegamba,
“Mfiri iicha, Ruwa nagamba,
na inyi ngyechiwika Mma Mhya
na wandu wa numba ya Isiraelyi
na wandu wa numba ya Yuda.
Ochiwa mma cha ulya ngyilewika na waku wawo
mfiri iya ngyilewateteṟa ngyiwawute urukyenyi lo
Misiri-pfo.
Cha kyipfa walalekaa mmenyi oko,
ngyilekulyisa wukyiwa kyipfa kyawo-pfo.
Kyipfa ichu nyicho mma ngyechiwika na
wandu wa Isiraelyi
numa ya mfiri iya, Ruwa nagamba,
‘Ngyechiwika mawawaso gako makusaṟonyi gawo,
na ngyechigaṟeia mrimenyi kowo.
Na inyi ngyechiwa Ruwa kowo,
nawo wechiwa wandu wako.’
Nawo wechiloshana orio mndu na momṟasa okye-pfo,
Maa orio mndu na mono-wamae,
echigamba, ‘Manya Mndumii-pfo.’
Cha kyipfa woose wechingyimanya,
wookyia mtutu owo mṟasa ang'anyi.
Cha kyipfa ngyechiwahooṟia mawicho gawo,
na ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo ngyechitsikumbuo-se-pfo.”
Kui igamba, “Mma Mhya” nagaluo lyilya lya kuwooka iwa lyiku. Kyaindi kyindo kyawooka ikuo nyi iwuka ho kyii.
Kyasia, maa mma o kuwooka uwewoṙe mawawaso ga mbonyi tsa iindia na iana Ruwa, na handu ha kyiwuyana heterewa Ruwa.
Kyipfa tengo lyileachikyio, lyilya lya ipfo kyanja, handu hawewoṙe handu heyekyia taa, na mesa, na mkate ngyiele; nyiho halelago “Haele.”
Na numa ya mkoṟoṟi o kawi o ishingyia handu, tengo lyilya lyekyelago “Haele ha haele,”

lyiwoṙe alyitaṟe ya sahapu, na sanduku ya mma ingyishikyie nyi sahapu ngyuura tsoose, sanduku iwewoṙe ikopo lya sahapu lyiwoṙe manna iya, na upoi lulya lo Aron lulekolooṟia maṟa, na shibau shilya sha mma;
na wuye yasho makyerubi ga kyiṟumi, gechiwikyia kyirinje halya-ndu Ruwa ekyehooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi. Kyasia luwoṙe ṙaawa wulalu lyeonguo mbonyi tsa shindo-shi kyimwi kyimwi-pfo.
Kyasia, shindo-shi shikamuachikyio kuṙo, makohanyi wekyeiṙa na ipfo tengonyi lya ipfo kyanja mfiri yoose, wechiwuta shindo sha iindia na iana Ruwa.

Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya tengo-lyo lya kawi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose nekyeiṙa napfo amonyi, lyimwi orio maka; aṙuṙe samu iwukyie kyindonyi kya kyiṙaso kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi wokye amonyi na wo wandu wengyi kyiyeri walalemanya kye kyilya waweiwuta nyi wunyamaṟi.
Mumuyo Mweele kaloṟa kyindo-kyi, kye njia ya iiṙa na halya-ndu haele ilekoyammanyika-pfo, kyiyeri-kyo tengo lya ipfo kyanja lyilalekolyammbuka ho.
Lyilya lyikyeri mfano o kyiyeri-kyi kyikyeri pfo wulalu; kyiyeri-kyo shienengo sheṙasa shiwuto, shilechiiṙima kui chandu mndu akuichuoe mrimenyi kokye iafutsia mndu aiindia na iterewa Ruwa.
Kyipfa nyi mawawaso ga mbaṟe ya mmbiu tupu, shelya na shindo shenyo na mbaṟe tsesamba kyimṟumoe, shilegambo kye shiṟundo mṟasa kyiyeri-kyo Ruwa echiilacha shindo shoose shiwe shihya.

Kyaindi Kristo kamcha, akyeri Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose o mbonyi tsicha tsechicha, ko tengo lyilya lying'anyi ngoseṟa na lyiafutsie, lyilalyiachikyie nyi wandu, kyimwi na igamba lyilakyeri lya wuyana-wu,
maa chi kui samu ya mburu na magache-pfo, indi kui samu yakye ulya aleiṙa lyimwi tupu na handu Haele, na iluwuta wusingyenyi mlungana.
Cha kyipfa kokooya samu ya mburu na mapung'a na ifui lya igache lya umbe walya wafanyi kyimṟumoe walepusio yekyeilyisha mṟasa mmbiu ukowuka ukoe;

kyasia chi ngoseṟa samu ya Kristo, ulya kye kui Mumuyo o mlungana alereka moo ko Ruwa iwa kyienengo kyilawoṙe tewe, kyechisanja shilya mukusaṟie mrimenyi konyu na mṟumoe ilawoṙe kyiira, muiṙime iindia na iterewa Ruwa ai na moo?
Na kyipfa kya ikyo nyi ulya ekyeende Mma Mhya, Yesu ulya alepfa, na ipfa lyakye lyilewuta wandu maṙekonyi ga mma ulya o kuwooka, wandu walelago waambilyie kyaasa kya kyioṟa kya mlungana.
Kyipfa handu mma o kyioṟa ukyeri, hawaṟi hakae na upfu lo ulya alewika mma-cho.
Cha kyipfa mma o kyioṟa uwoṙe pfinya handu halewaṙa ipfa lya mndu; cha kyipfa lyiwoṙe pfinya maa ale kokooya ulya aleuwika ai na moo-pfo.
Koikyo maa mma ulya o kuwooka ulewooko kulawoṙe samu-pfo.

Kyipfa kyiyeri orio iwawaso lyilegambo nyi Mose ko wandu-wo woose, chandu mawawaso gawekundi, nalewuta samu ya magache na mburu, hamwi na mṟinga na kyiṙi kya hisopo kyikyipfungyie mamberi ga kyimaande ga moondo, kanyanyatsia kyitapu kyilya kya mawawaso, na wandu woose,
echigamba, “Iyi nyi samu yamlunga nyoe na mma ulya Ruwa alemmbia mumwindie.”
Na tengo lyilya nalyo na shindo shoose sha iindia na iterewa Ruwa aleshinyanyatsia samu wuṙo.
Na Uwawasonyi shindo shoose shilesanjo kui samu, na kulawoṙe ipusuo samu kuwoṙe iwuto wunyamaṟi-pfo.
Kyasia, kyiwewaṟi nakala tsa shindo shikyeri ruwewu tsisanjo chandu kyamugambo, kyaindi shindo sha ruwewu imonyi shisanjo kui shiṙaso shishicha kuta isho.
Cha kyipfa Kristo aleiṙa na handu haele haleachikyio nyi wandu-pfo, nyicho mfano o handu haele ha loi; indi naleiṙa na ruwewu ya loi nawono wulalu mbele ya Ruwa kyipfa kyaṙu.
Maa chi kye nakuwute kafoi, chandu Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose ekyeiṙa na handu haele orio maka kui samu ilakyeri yakye-pfo.

Kokooya nyi wuṙo, kyiwemmbaṟi ilyiso wukyiwa kafoi wookyia wuyana wulagumbo. Kyaindi wulalu, lyimwi tupu, mafurumionyi ga shiyeri, nawoneka lya kuwooka na lya mafurumionyi, ihooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi kui kyiṙaso kya mrima okye.
Na chandu wandu wekyeṟeyeṟio ipfa lyimwi tupu, na numa ya ipfa ianduyo;
na wuṙo Kristo na oe, ammbuto iwa kyiṙaso lyimwi tupu na iṙuo ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu wafoi; nechicha-se lya kawi, kulawoṙe wunyamaṟi, ko walya waimmbeṙelyia nachewakyiṟa.

Kyasia uwawaso, kyipfa nyi kyirinje kya mecha gechicha, maa chi fana ya mecha-go-pfo, kui shiṙaso shilya shilya waleenengyia orio maka, shechiiṙima kyiyeri kyoose igaluo walya wekyecha iindia na iana Ruwa iwa wandu waafutsie-pfo.
Kokooya nyi wuṙo, ngyesa shiṙaso shechiṙa ienengyio; cha kyipfa waiindia na iana Ruwa wakamuilyisho lyimwi tupu, walawechikuwona-se wo wawenyi kye wawoṙe wunyamaṟi?
Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya shiṙaso-sho kuwoṙe ikumbuo lya wunyamaṟi orio maka.
Kyipfa kyeiṙimika samu ya mapung'a na mburu iwuta wunyamaṟi-pfo.
Koikyo ilyi echicha na wuyanenyi, nagamba,
“Shiṙaso na shienengo ulekunda-pfo;
kyaindi mmbiu nulengyiṟeyeṟia;
Shiṙaso shewuta alyitaṟenyi na
shilya sheenengyia ngyuunyamaṟi
ulechihiṟo nasho-pfo;
Nyi lyo-ndu ngyilegamba,
ambuya, ngacha (ngyimṟeie kyitapunyi kya mawawaso)
ngyiwute shilya ukundi, Ruwa.”
Iho mawookyionyi nalegamba, “Okyechihiṟo maa ikunda shiṙaso na shienengo shishienengyie alyitaṟenyi na shilya shewuta ngyuunyamaṟi-pfo” (shishienengyie chandu uwawaso lugambie).
Nyi lyo-ndu alegamba, “Ambuya, ngacha ngyiwute shilya ukundi.” Naienengyia kyiṙaso kya kuwooka, kundu nawikye ho kyiṙaso kya kawi.
Kyiiṙi kya shilya Ruwa akundi lowona iilyisho, kui iwuto mmbiu o Yesu Kristo lyimwi tupu.
Na orio mkohanyi nekyegoṟoka orio mfiri echiṟunda cha mkohanyi, na ienengyia shiṙaso shilya shilya kafong'ui; shiṙaso shilechiiṙima maa ale iwuta wunyamaṟi.
Kyaindi ichu, kyiyeri amwenengyie kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi kyiṙaso kyimwi kyechikaa mṟasa mlungana, naleṙamia kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa;
wookyia iho echiweṙelyia mṟasa nawingye washituwa wakye.
Kyipfa kui kyiṙaso kyakye kyimwi nalewagaluo wandu waafutsie mlungana walya waiilyisho maṙeko gawo.
Na Mumuyo Mweele na oe nailuṟingyishia; cha kyipfa numa ya igamba,
“Ichu nyi mma ngyechiwika nawo
numa ya mfiri iya,
Ruwa nagamba,
‘Ngyechiwika mawawaso gako mrimenyi kowo,
na igaṟeia makusaṟonyi gawo.’ ”
Nyi lyo-ndu ekyegamba,
“Ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo na mawuto gawo mawicho ngyechigakumbuo-se maa ale-pfo.”
Kyasia ihooṟio lya isho lyikacha, kuwoṙe kyiṙaso-se kyipfa kya iwuta ngyuunyamaṟi-pfo.
Kyasia, wana wa wama, kyipfa luwoṙe wukari wo iiṙa na handu Haele kui samu ya Yesu,
njia iya aleluwookyia ikyeri ngyihya, na ii na moo, njia iiṙie halya nguwonyi yeshingyia ikyeri nyi mmbiu okye;
na iwaṙa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose achilyie hekalu lya Ruwa lya ruwewu;
lutikyirie Ruwa luwoṙe mrima mmbaṙami; kui imwiṙikyia nakamwi, luwailyishe mrima luṙe makusaṟo mawicho; luwasanje mmbiu kui mṟinga mcha.
Lukuwaṙe tapu na ikusuria lyaṙu, lyilailachikye; kyipfa ulya aleteṟia nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia.
Luambuye chandu lochitaramana na iwutiana shindo shicha na itutumana kui ikunda na iṟunda lyicha.
Maa lulaṙe isanzia handu hamwi, chandu kyikyeri kyiṙo kya wandu wengyi; indi luikyimbiane; na iengyeṟa iwuta kuṙo, kui chandu muwonyi kye mfiri ulya o Yesu ianduya ukyeri kufui.
Kyipfa kokooya lowuta wunyamaṟi lukomuambilyia wuṟango wo wuloi wulya, kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya kyiṙaso kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi-pfo.
Indi kuwoṙe iweṙelyia ianduyo lyioweshie, na wulang'a wo moṙo ukuṟeyeṟie irumatsa walya wakyeri washituwa wa Ruwa.
Mndu alemina mawawaso ga Mose nekyewoogo kulawoṙe iwonio wukyiwa, kyiyeri waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu wagamba kye nammbicho.
Muwonyi kuṙa? Kyiwemmbaṟi ngapo ing'anyi ngoseṟa mndu ulya alemina Mono-Ruwa, na igamba kye samu iya ya mma ilemuilyisha chi kyindo-pfo, na ilahia Mumuyo o isaṟia-pfoe?
Kyipfa lumwichi ulya alegamba, “Itaa kyiṟaache nyi iṟunda lyako, inyi ngyechitaa.” Na lyingyi-se, “Mndumii nechianduya wandu wakye.”
Nyi kyindo kyioweshie iolokyio nyi ngapo ya Ruwa ai na moo.
Kyaindi kumbuonyi mfiri ya mawookyionyi, iya kyiyeri mulewona ngyeela, mulekarishia iwingana lying'anyi lya fowa.
Shiyeri shingyi kulawoṙe iiṟikyiṟo mulekulunga na walya waweilahio na iwutio shindo shiwicho.
Kyipfa mulewonia wukyiwa walya wawewapfungye. Lyingyi-se mukoiṙikyia kui sia isoko masaa ganyu, muichi kye mrimenyi konyu kuwoṙe masaa gai mecha ngoseṟa, galekyesia.
Kyasia mulaṙe wukari maa wuṟango wonyu, cha kyipfa wuwoṙe wori wung'anyi.
Kyipfa muwaṟi iwaṙa wusimiri, kundu kye mukommbuta shilya Ruwa akundi muambilyie kyaasa kyilya.
“Cha kyipfa hatsugae kyiyeri kyifuhi mnu
ulya aicha nechicha, maa echikyelyio-pfo.
Kyaindi msumganyi oko
nechiwaṙa moo kui iiṙikyia.
Na oe kaiya-iya
mrima oko ochiwaṙa sia kyipfa kyakye-pfo.”
Kyaindi soe lukyeri kyiiṙi kya walya waiiya-iya na iṙeka-pfo, indi lukyeri kyiiṙi kya walya wawoṙe iiṙikyia na ikyiṟa mrima yaṙu.
Kyasia, iiṙikyia nyi iambilyia shindo shiweṙelyio kulawoṙe iiya-iya. Nyi iiṙikyia nakamwi shindo shilekyewono.
Kyipfa kui iiṙikyia waku waṙu waleṟingyishio.
Kui iiṙikyia luichi kye wuyana wulegumbo kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, maa shindo shekyewono shilegumbo kui shindo shiwonio-pfo.

Kui iiṙikyia Abelyi naleenenga Ruwa kyiṙaso kyicha kuta kyilya kya Kaini. Koikyo naleṟingyishio kye namsumganyi; Ruwa kaṟingyishia shienengo shakye, na kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyakye, Abelyi naiṙeṙa maa chandu alempfa.
Kui iiṙikyia Enokyi nalesamiṟo, kundu alapfe. Maa alewono-pfo, cha kyipfa Ruwa nalemsamiṟa, kyipfa alawendesamiṟo nalekoaṟingyishio kye nachihiṟa Ruwa.
Kyaindi kulawoṙe iiṙikyia kyeiṙimika imchihiṟa-pfo; cha kyipfa mndu ekyeyenda ko Ruwa kyiwaṟi naiṙikyie kye Ruwa nakyeri pfo, na kye nekyeenenga wori walya wekyempfula.

Kui iiṙikyia Noe amwikyimbio nyi Ruwa ko mbonyi tsa shindo shilandewonekye, kui chandu aleindia na iowuo Ruwa, naleachikyia safina, naiṙime ikyiṟa wandu wa kanyi kokye. Na kui kyilya alewuta naleloṟa wandu wa wuyana kye wawoṙe ṙeko, kawa mokyioṟa o wusumganyi wokyewono kui iiṙikyia.
Kui iiṙikyia Abrahamu naleiṙikyia kyiyeri alelago, nawukye nayende handu halya echihaenengo iwa kyioṟa; kafuma alaichi kundu aiyenda.
Kui iiṙikyia nalekaa wuyenunyi kulya urukyenyi lo kyaasa, cha urukyenyi lulai lokye, echikaa tengonyi hamwi na Isakyi na Yakobo, wai weoṟa hamwi na oe wa kyaasa kyilya kyilya.
Kyipfa Abrahamu naweiweṙelyia mṟi Ruwa aleukusaṟa na iuwika, mṟi ochikaa ho mlungana.
Kui iiṙikyia maa Sara amonyi naleambilyia wuiṙimi wo iira mana, ilyi kyiyeri kyakye kyilekokyamwiṙa; cha kyipfa naletala ulya aleteṟia kye nekyeafutsia kyilya ateṟia.
Na kyipfa kya ikyo wakafeo nyi mndu umwi, na oe nawei cha apfiie, wandu wafoi cha nyenyeri tsa ruwewu, na cha mlelya ukyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi, uleiṙima italo.
Iwa woose wakapfiia iiṙikyienyi, walaambilyia shaasa shilya, indi wakashiwona wai kuleshi na ichihiyo kyipfa kyasho, na igamba kye wawekyeri wayenu, na wakyaro urukyenyi.
Cha kyipfa iwo wekyegamba mbonyi cha itso wailoṟa na pata kye waipfula uruka lowo wawenyi.
Na kokooya wawekumbuo uruka lulya walewuka, wawewona ṙaawa lyewuya.
Kyaindi wulalu wailanga uruka lucha ngoseṟa, uruka lo ruwewu. Koikyo Ruwa ekyerigo nyi sonu ilago Ruwa owo-pfo; kyipfa nalewawikyia mṟi.
Kui iiṙikyia Abrahamu kyiyeri aleyesho, nalewuta Isakyi nawe kyiṙaso; na oe aleambilyia shaasa-sho naweiwuta mono-kye, mana kyimuumwi.
Yee, ulya alewio, “Kui njia ya Isakyi kyishari kyapfo kyechilago,”
echiwona kye Ruwa neiṙima imṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu; Abrahamu kawona-se Isakyi iwuka upfunyi kui mfano.
Kui iiṙikyia Isakyi nalewikyia Yakobo na Esau mboṟa, maa ko mbonyi tsa shindo shechicha kyiyeri kya numa.
Kui iiṙikyia Yakobo, kyiyeri aweipfa, kawikyia mboṟa orio mana o Yosefu, kaana na iterewa Ruwa akuyekyie mṙoenyi o upoi lokye.
Kui iiṙikyia, Yosefu kyiyeri aleshika mafurumionyi gakye, naleonguo mbonyi tsa wana wa Isiraelyi iwuka Misiri, kagamba kyindo mmbiu okye ochiwutio.
Kui iiṙikyia, Mose kyiyeri alefeo, kaṟiko mori iṟaṟu na wafee wakye, cha kyipfa walewona kye nyi mana mcha, maa waleowuo iwawaso lya mangyi-pfo.
Kui iiṙikyia, kyiyeri Mose alewa mndu apfulukyie, nalelega ilago mana o mana o kyika o Farao.
Kawona nyi nanga ilyiso wukyiwa hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa kuta ipfula sia ya wunyamaṟi wo kyiyeri kyifuhi;
echiwona kye imino kyipfa kya Kristo kokye nyi wunjama wung'anyi kuta masaa ga Misiri; cha kyipfa naleweṙelyia wori-wo.
Kui iiṙikyia kawuka Misiri, alaowuoe nyashi ya mangyi, kyipfa nalekarishia cha mndu awonyi ulya alekyewono.
Kui iiṙikyia kaachikyia Pasaka, na kulya inyanyatsa samu, kundu ulya morumatsa wana wambele alawapaaye wo.
Kui iiṙikyia wakaiṙa ipalyipalyinyi lya Shamu, cha ilyi waiiṙa handu hagaṙutsu; kyiyeri Wamisiri waletambagana iwuta kuṙo wakaṙoo nyi mṟinga, wakapfa.
Kui iiṙikyia shiambasa sha Yeriko shileoloka, kyiyeri shileiṟiwio mfiri mfungaaṙe.
Kui iiṙikyia Rahabu, iṟai lyilya, alerumara hamwi na walya walenyamaṟa-pfo; cha kyipfa naleambilyia kui ufoṟo walya waleṙumo iowelyia mbonyi tsa uruka.
Na inyi ngyigambe kyi-se? Kyipfa kyiyeri kyiwengyishika ionguo mbonyi tsa Kyedion, Baraka, Samson, Yefuta, Dawidi, Samolyi na tsa weonguo shisuku-pfo.
Walya kui iiṙikyia walewinga ngyuuchilyi tsa wamangyi, walewuta sha wusumganyi, waleambilyia kyaasa, waleshinga maṙumbu ga simba,
walerumisha pfinya tsa moṙo, walekyia iwoogo nyi ngyuushu. Waleenengo pfinya numa ya iwa wafafa, walewaṙa wuragari shiṙenyi, walewinga wamesa wa wayenu.
Waka waleambilyia wapfu wawo waleṟutso. Kyaindi wengyi walekapo uwicho mṟasa iwoogo, wengyi wakagamba wakundi iwuto wusingyenyi-pfo, kundu wawone wuṟutsi wuwucha ngoseṟa.
Wengyi waleyesho kui imino na ikapo. Yee, kui shipfungo, na kui iwiko kyipfungonyi.
Walekapo na magoe, wakamanyo kui msemeno, waleyesho, walewoogo kui ushu; waletenga-tenga waṟee njonyi tsa moondo na tsa mburu. Waweuṟie shindo shifoi, wechilyiso wukyiwa, wechiwutio shindo shiwicho;
(wandu walya wuyana wulawewaṟi wakae pfo.) Wawetenga-tenga nguṙunyi na mafumvunyi na mbakonyi na mṟeshenyi ya urukyenyi.
Na wandu-wo woose wamṟingyishio kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyawo, waleambilyia kyaasa-pfo;
cha kyipfa Ruwa naweisonguo iluṟeyeṟia soe kyindo kyicha, kundu soe lulakyeri ho walaiṙime iafutsio chandu Ruwa akundi wawe.

Kyasia na soe taa, cha kyipfa luwaiṟiwie nyi waṟingyishi wafoi mbaṟe-i, luwikyie mbai orio ṟio lyilemeri, na wunyamaṟi wulya wokyeluwaṙa tapu. Lupfuṟukane kui wusimiri kulya iṟundenyi lyilyiṙambikye koṙu,

lochiambuya Yesu, ulya ekyewooka na iafutsia iiṙikyia lyaṙu. Ulya alekarishia mawawio ga halya msalabenyi. Kyipfa kya sia iya iweimmbeṙa, alekusaṟa maa ale kya sonu ya iwoogo msalabenyi-pfo. Na wulalu naṙamie kuwokonyi ko kulyoe ko kyiṙi kya mng'ano kya Ruwa.
Kusaṟenyi mnu mbonyi tsa ulya alekarishia iwingana lying'anyi mbaṟe-i lya walya wekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi. Koikyo maa mulaiṙikyie iloloma na ipfiiyo nyi mṙoe.
Mulandekapane shiṙa mṟasa samu ipusuke, mochiwingana na wunyamaṟi-pfo.
Lyingyi-se mulewaṙima shilya muleikyimbio, shekyeṙeṙa na nyoe cha iṙeṙa na wana,
“Mono-ko, ulamine kyiyeri Ruwa akugalutsa mkaṟo yapfo,
Maa ulaṙe iaṙanyia kyiyeri oe akuṟoṟoma.
Kyipfa ulya Ruwa amkundi nekyemwilacha mkaṟo yakye.
Na nekyekapa orio mndu amwiṙikyie cha mana.”
Muwaṟi kyipfa kya iilacho mkaṟo, Ruwa nammbutie nyoe cha wana; kyipfa nyi mana uha awuye alekyemwilacha mkaṟo?
Kyasia kokooya mulawoṙe iilacho mkaṟo, kukyeri ṙombo lya woose, nyi lyo-ndu mochiwa wana wa nja, maa chi wana wa mka o wolyi-pfo.
Hamwi na isho luwewoṙe waawu waṙu wa iha wuyanenyi waleluilacha mkaṟo, na soe lukowaindia.
Kyasia chi nanga mnu ikaa wuchilyinyi wo Awu o mrima na iwaṙa moo?
Orio ngapo ikyeri kyindo kyekyeende sia-pfo, indi kya fowa; kyaindi kyiyeri kya numa yekyeendie walya wawatoṟishe nyi ngapo-yo ndunda tsa wusumganyi tsiwoṙe ufoṟo.
Koikyo goṟuonyi mawoko gailoloma na ndi tsiluoe tsiṙeṙema,
muachikyie maṙende ganyu njia tsigoṟotsu, kundu kyindo kyikyeri kyileeta kyilaṙetso, indi kyikyiṟo.
Pfulenyi kui wuragari iwaṙa ufoṟo na wandu woose, na wuele, wulya kulawoṙe mndu echiwona Mndumii alauwoṙe,
mochiambuya mnu mndu alauṟe isaṟia lya Ruwa. Na mndu oose alawe cha iṟa lyekyewawa, namulyise nyoe wukyiwa na ifanyiṟa mkaṟo ya wandu.
Kulawaṙe mndu mṟui maa alaowuye na iindia Ruwa, cha Esau, alekumba kyioṟa kyakye kya mana mmbele kyipfa kya kyelya.
Kyipfa muichi kye maa lyilya kyiyeri kya numa alekunda ioṟa mboṟa nalelego (kyipfa alewona ṙaawa lyeṙumbuya wunyamaṟi-pfo), maa chandu alepfula ṙaawa-lyo kui mcheṟeṟe.
Maa mulekooya fumvu lyeiṙima ipooyo-pfo, lyileaka moṙo, maa ipuchi lya njuu, na meema, na kyiwiṟi,
na ṟui lya iganda na ṟui lya maṙeṙo; galya walya waleicho waleterewa walawio kyindo kyoose kyingyi.
Kyipfa waleiṙima ikarishia kyindo kyilya walewio, “Maa indo lya saka lyikapaaya fumvu-lyo lyekapo na magoe.”
Na isho shilewono chandu shiwekyeri shindo sheowesha, mṟasa Mose kagamba, “Ngawoṙo nyi wuowu na iṙeṙema.”
Indi nyoe mukokooya fumvu lya Sion, na mṟi o Ruwa ai na moo, Yerusalemu ya ruwewu, kundu kuwoṙe shiku sha malaika,
kyisanzionyi na siṟi ya wandu wakyeri cha wana wambele wa Ruwa wawaṟeie ruwewu, na Ruwa moṙumbuo moondu o wandu woose, na mrima ya wandu wasumganyi wamarisie kyaro,
na Yesu alewika Mma Mhya, na samu yakye ilepusuka, yekyeonguo shindo shicha kuta iya ya Abelyi.
Ambuyenyi mulalege ulya ekyeonguo. Kyipfa kokooya walalekyia walya walelega ulya alewaikyimbia urukyenyi, ngoseṟa mnu lochikyia soe lukokushowa na ulya ekyeluikyimbia ai ruwewu-pfo.
Ulya ṟui lyakye lyileṙeṙemsha uruka kyiyeri kyilya; kyaindi wulalu nateṟia egamba, “Lyimwi-se ngyechiṙeṙemsha, chi uruka tikyi-pfo, indi na ruwewu taa.”
Kyaindi ṙeṙo lyilya, “Lyimwi-se,” lyaṟingyishia isamiṟo shilya sheiṙima iṙeṙemsho, cha shindo shilegumbo, kundu shindo shilechiiṙima iṙeṙemsho shikae.
Kyasia, cha kyipfa luiambilyia Wumangyi wulechiiṙima iṙeṙemsho, luwaṙe isaṟia, lyilya kyipfa kya ikyo luterewe Ruwa na imwindia kui njia yechimchihiṟa, hamwi na wupfereri na wuowu;
kyipfa Ruwa oṙu nyi moṙo okyerumatsa.
Ikundana cha wana wa mka lyikae ho.
Mulawaṙime iambilyia wayenu; kyipfa kui iwuta kuṙo wandu wengyi waleambilyia malaika kulawoṙe imanya.
Kumbuonyi walya wakyeri kyipfungonyi cha ilyi muwapfungye hamwi nawo; na iwo wailyiiyo mbaka, chandu na nyoe muilyiiyo mbaka.
Wandu woose wawone kye wolyi nyi kyindo kyicha, na mii ang'u mka alakuwinishe na wandu wengyi; cha kyipfa waṟui Ruwa nechiwaolotsia ngapo.
Mulawaṙe mkaṟo o kunda heleri; wenyi cha wandu walauṟie kyindo.
Cha kyipfa oe amonyi nagambie,
“Ruwa nyi oe ekyengyitarama ngyechiowuo-pfo,
mndu nechingyiwutia kyi?”
Kumbuonyi walya wawekyemusongoya, walemuongoya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa; lyingyi-se, kui iambuya mnu mafurumionyi ga mkaṟo owo, oshenyi iiṙikyia lyawo.
Yesu Kristo nyi oe ulya, ukou na inu na mṟasa mlungana.
Maa mulaṟaisho nyi malosho ga mbaṟe tsingyi, na mayenu; kyipfa nyi kyicha mrima ukarisho kui isaṟia, maa chi kui shelya shilya walya waleyenda nasho walalewona kyiira-pfo.
Luwoṙe alyitaṟe walya wekyeṟundia tengo lyilya walawoṙe momu o ilya shindo shayo.
Kyipfa shindo shilya samu yasho ileendo nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose na handu haele kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi, kyaindi nyama tsa shindo-sho tsekyeṙasio nja ya handu wandu wekyekaa.
Kyipfa kya ikyo, Yesu na oe, kundu nailyishe wandu kui samu yakye amonyi, nalelyiso wukyiwa nja ya mṟi.
Kyasia lufume luyende kokye nja ya handu wandu wekyekaa, na imino hamwi na oe.
Kyipfa iha luwoṙe mṟi ochikaa ho mlungana-pfo, indi luipfula mṟi ulya uicha.
Kyasia, kui njia yakye oe, luenengye Ruwa kyiṙaso kya kyiṟumi mlungana, maṙeṙo gaṙu nyi kyienengo kyaṙu.
Kyaindi mulawaṙime iwuta shindo shicha na ikaa handu hamwi; kyipfa shienengo cha isho nyisho shekyechihiṟa Ruwa.

Indienyi walya wekyemusongoya, na iwapfereria; kyipfa wo wekyelaa kyiṙombo kyipfa kya mrima yanyu. Kyipfa wechiwia Ruwa mbonyi tsa wuṟundi wowo, kundu kye wawute kuṙo kui sia maa chi kui fowa-pfo; kyipfa kyiwechimuenenga nyoe kyiira-pfo.
Luterewienyi; kyipfa luiṙikyie kye luwoṙe makusaṟo mecha mrimenyi, lukundi iwaṙa mkaṟo mcha shindonyi shoose.
Na inyi ngyimuterewa ngoseṟa mnu iwuta isho kundu ngyiwiyiṟo na konyu iwinyi.
Kyasia, Ruwa o ufoṟo aleende-se iwuka ko wapfu Mlyisi Ang'anyi o moondo, kui samu ya mma o mlungana, oe Mndumii oṙu Yesu,

namuenengye nyoe iafutsia kyaro orio iṟundenyi lyicha, muiṙime iwuta shilya akundi; na oe echiwuta mrimenyi koṙu kyilya kyichihiṟie mbele yakye, kui Yesu Kristo; kyiṟumi kyikae na oe mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Kyaindi ngyimuterewa, wana wa wama, muaṙanyie necha ulogo-lu lo iikyimbiana; kyipfa ngamuṟeia paruo-i kui maṙeṙo maangu.
Manyenyi kye mono-wama oṙu Timoteo ammbuto kyipfungonyi; ulya, kacha iwinyi, ngyechiwonana na nyoe hamwi na oe.
Iṟikyiṟenyi woose wekyemusongoya nyoe, na wandu wa Ruwa woose; iwo wakyeri wa Italyia wamuiṟikyiṟa.
Isaṟia lyikae na nyoe moose.
Yakobo, mtumo o Ruwa, na o Mndumii Yesu Kristo, ko wandu woose wa Ruwa wanyanyaṟikyie ipfo na ipfo; ngamuiṟikyiṟa.
Wana wa wama wako, talenyi kye nyi sia tikyi, mukooloka shiyeshonyi sha orio mbaṟe;
mochimanya kye iyesho lya iiṙikyia lyanyu lyekyeende wusimiri.
Wusimiri wuwaṙe iṟunda lyiafukyie, muiṙime iwa wandu muafutsie kui maṟunda na wuyendelyi wucha.
Kyaindi mndu o konyu kauṟa wuṟango, naterewe ko Ruwa, ekyeenenga woose kui ilekyia, maa ekyeṟoṟoma-pfo; na oe nechienengo.
Indi naterewe kui iiṙikyia, kulawoṙe ikapa kawi maa ale, kyipfa mokapa kawi nyi kyimwi na mṟinga oiṙa ipalyipalyinyi ukoṙoo nyi mkuma, na iwiyitso kunu na kunu.
Kyipfa mndu cha icho alakusaṟe kye neambilyia kyindo ko Mndumii.
Mndu o makusaṟo galagoṟokyi nekyekapa kawi njienyi tsakye tsoose.
Kyaindi mono-wama alawoṙe kyiṟumi kya maṟunda nachihiyo cha kyipfa naenengo kyiṟumi;
na mnjama nachihiyo kyipfa nasotso; cha kyipfa nechiṙeka cha kyiwaṟo kya maṟa.
Kyipfa mnengyeṟi okyeṙo na mrikye, ukoumiṟa iṟa, na kyiwaṟo kya iṟa-lyo kyekyeoloka, na wucha wolyo woose wokyenyamaṟika. Nyi wuṙo mnjama echirumatso njienyi tsakye tsoose.
Agusu mndu ekyekarishia shiyesho; cha kyipfa kamwiṙikyio neambilyia wori wo moo, wulya Mndumii aṟeyeṟie walya wamkundi.
Kyiyeri mndu ayesho, alagambe, “Ngyiyesho nyi Mndumii;” kyipfa Ruwa eiṙima iyesho nyi wunyamaṟi, maa oe amonyi ekyeyesha mndu-pfo.
Kyaindi orio umwi nekyeyesho nyi lango tsakye amonyi na kunu tsechimkuruo na imlemba.
Numa ya iho lango ngyiwicho tsekyeende wunyamaṟi, na wunyamaṟi wukomng'ana wokyeende upfu.
Wana wa wama wako wakunde, mulalembo.
Orio ienengyia lyikyeri lyicha, na orio kyindo kyekyewuto kyiafutsie, kyekyewuka wuye, kyekyesoka ko Awu agumbie mnengyeṟi, mori na nyenyeri. Kokye kuwoṙe iilachika lyekyeende meema-pfo.
Kui ikunda lyakye amonyi nalelufee kui Ṙeṙo lya loi, luwe cha wana wawagumbe nyi oe.
Isho muichi, wana wa wama wako wakunde. Kyasia orio mndu nawe mwanguhu iaṙanyia indi chi mwanguhu iṙeṙa maa ikapo nyi nyashi-pfo; maa moṙeṙa-pfo.
Cha kyipfa nyashi ya mndu yekyeṟunda wusumganyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
Koikyo wikyienyi kuleshi ukoe loose na wuwicho wuingyikyie, na iambilyia kui wuhoo Ṙeṙo lyilya lyilewooyo konyu, lyechiiṙima ikyiṟa mrima yanyu.
Kyaindi wenyi wandu mokyewuta kyilya mokyeicho, maa chi wandu weaṙanyia tikyi kunu mochikulemba muwenyi-pfo.
Cha kyipfa mndu kawa moaṙanyia tikyi maa ekyewuta kyilya aiicho-pfo, mndu-cho nyi kyimwi na mndu aikuambuya kyiyewonyi.
Kyipfa nekyekuambuya, numa kayenda, cha ilyi kawaṙima chandu akyeri.
Kyaindi mndu moambuya mawawaso gaafutsie galakyeri ga wutumo, na ikaa kyiiṙi kyago, alawe mndu ekyeaṙanyia na iwaṙima indi mowuta kyilya aiicho, icho nechiwa agusu kyiiṙi kya iwuta lyakye.
Mndu kakusaṟa kye nawoṙe mwiṙikyie, indi ekyeringa ulumi lokye-pfo, kunu echilemba mrima okye, mwiṙikyie o mndu-cho chi kyindo-pfo.
Mwiṙikyie mcha ulawoṙe kyindo kyifanyi mbele ya Mndumii Ruwa nyi ichu: indesaia ngoṙa na wakusu wukyiwenyi wowo, na ikushowa na wuyana kulawoṙe wunyamaṟi.
Wana wa wama wako, iiṙikyia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, Mndumii o mng'ano, maa mulawe nalyo kui ikundia wandu.
Kyipfa mndu aṟee peti ya sahapu na nguwo ngyicha kaiṙa na sinagoginyi lyanyu na numa ya iho mkyiwa aṟee masaṟa kaiṙa;
na nyoe mukokundia ulya aṟee nguwo ngyicha, na immbia, “Ṙamia iha handu hecha;” na iwia mkyiwa ulya, “Goṟoka halya,” ang'u “Ṙamia maṙendenyi gako,”
ngyesa mowuta uwicho mrimenyi konyu mukowa weanduya wawoṙe makusaṟo mawicho-pfoe?
Wana wa wama wako wakunde, aṙanyienyi, “Ngyesa Ruwa alesambuṟa wakyiwa wa wuyana wawe wanjama wa iiṙikyia na weoṟa Wumangyi aleteṟia wamkundi-pfoe?”
Indi nyoe mulemina mkyiwa. Ngyesa wanjama chiwo waimulyisa wukyiwa na imuṙuo kyianduyonyi-pfoe?
Chiwo wailahia rina lyilya lyicha muleenengo-pfoe?
Kyaindi mukoafutsia iwawaso lyilya lya Wumangyi chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Kunda momṟasa opfo cha iyoe kumonyi,” muiwuta necha.
Indi mukokundia wandu, muiwuta wunyamaṟi na ianduyo nyi uwawaso kye mui wanyamaṟi.
Kyipfa mndu oose echiosha mawawaso goose, indi kakapa ṙende kyindonyi kyimwi, naṙeko kyiiṙi kya goose.
Cha kyipfa icho alegamba, “Ulaṟuguye na Ulaṟuguyo,” nalewegamba taa, “Ulawaage.” Kyasia kokooya ulaṟuguya ang'u iṟuguyo, kyaindi kowaaga, nofunja uwawaso.
Ṙeṙenyi na iwuta cha wandu wechianduyo kui uwawaso lulawoṙe wutumo.
Kyipfa Ruwa echiwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kyiyeri aianduya mndu alekyewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi-pfo. Kyipfa iwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi lying'anyi kuta ianduya.
Wana wa wama wako, kuwoṙe kyiira kyiha, mndu kagamba nawoṙe iiṙikyia, kyaindi awoṙe mawuto-pfo? Ngyesa iiṙikyia lyilya lyechiiṙima imkyiṟa?
Kokooya mono-wama o kyisoṟo ang'u o kyika namkuuye na awoṙe kyindo kyelyio-pfo,
na mndu o konyu kawawia, “Yendenyi na ufoṟo, mundeoṙa moṙo na iiguṙa,” kyaindi alawaenengye sha mmbiu, kyawaṙa kyiira kyiha?
Nyi wuṙo na iiṙikyia, lyilandewaṙe mawuto, lyapfa kyiiṙi kyalyo.
Kyaindi mndu negamba, “Iyoe nuwoṙe iiṙikyia, na inyi ngyiwoṙe mawuto. Ngyiloṟa iiṙikyia lyapfo kulawoṙe mawuto, na inyi ngyekuloṟa iiṙikyia lyako kui mawuto gako.”
Iyoe nuiṙikyie kye Ruwa nyi umwi; nowuta necha. Masatana nago gaiṙikyie na iṙeṙema.
Kyaindi nukundi imanya, iyoe mndu ulai kyindo, kye iiṙikyia lyilawoṙe mawuto lyiwoṙe ndunda-pfo?
Ngyesa awu oṙu Abrahamu aletalyio kye nawoṙe wusumganyi kui mawuto, lyilya alewuta Isakyi mono-kye mesenyi ya Mndumii-pfoe?
Ommbona kye iiṙikyia lyilewuta maṟunda hamwi na mawuto gakye, na kye iiṙikyia lyilya lyileafutsio kui njia ya mawuto galya.
Shiṟeio shilya shikaafutsio; shiṟeio shilegamba, “Abrahamu naleiṙikyia Ruwa, kyikatalo kokye kye nyi wusumganyi;” na oe nalelago mbuya ya Ruwa.
Muwonyi kye mndu nekyetalo kye nawoṙe wusumganyi kui mawuto gakye; chi kui iiṙikyia lyimonyi-pfo.
Nyi wuṙo na Rahabu ulya awei iṟai. Ngyesa aletalo kye nawoṙe wusumganyi kui mawuto, lyilya aleambilyia wandu walya waweowelyia mbonyi tsa Waisiraelyi, kawafumiṟia nja kui njia ingyi-pfoe?
Kyipfa chandu kyikyeri kye mmbiu ulawoṙe mrima upfiie, nyi wuṙo na iiṙikyia lyilawoṙe mawuto lyipfiie.
Wana wa wama wako, mulawe walosha wafoi, muichi kye soe walosha lochiambilyia ianduyo lying'anyi kuta.
Kyipfa lokyekapa ṙende soe loose shindonyi shifoi. Mndu alekyekapa ṙende kyiiṙi kya iṙeṙa, icho nyi mndu aafutsie, echiiṙima itirimisha mmbiu okye oose cha kui kyindo kyilya kyekyetirimisha shindo.
Ambuyenyi, lokyewika kyindo kyetirimisha shindo maṙumbunyi ga farasi, kundu tsiluindie, na kuṙo lukoweṟuo mmbiu yatso yoose.

Lyingyi-se ambuyenyi ngalawa; maa chandu tsing'anyi cha kyikyi, na iṙoo nyi shiwiṟi shing'anyi, tsekyeweṟutso nyi kyindo kyitung'tu kyeweṟutsa shindo, tsikayenda kundu koose ulya ekyetsiṙuo akunda tsiyende.
Na wuṙo taa ulumi nyi kyiwungo kyitutu, nalo lokyekushela ikushela lying'anyi. Ambuyenyi chandu moṙo mtung'tu okyekoṟa nguṙu ing'anyi mnu.
Na ulumi nyi moṙo; wuyana wulya wo wunyamaṟi, ulumi lulya, lulewiko shiwungonyi shaṙu, nalo nyilo lokyefanyiṟa mmbiu oose. Lokyeatsa moṙo ulya uwukyie Ngyehenenyi na ilurumatsa piu.
Kyipfa orio mbaṟe ya indo lya saka, na ya shileye, na ya shindo shekyekukuruo na ndewu, na ya shindo shikyeri ipalyipalyinyi, shekyeiṙima ichilyio, nasho shilemchilyio nyi wandu.
Indi ulumi kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iluchilyia-pfo; nyi wuwicho wulekyetsia, wuichuo wuṟoi wokyeende upfu.
Kui ulumi lokyeṟumisha Ruwa Awu oṙu, na kui ulumi lokyesesa wandu walegumbo kui fana ya Ruwa.
Kyiiṙi kya ṙumbu lyilya lyilya kokyewuka mboṟa na seso. Wana wa wama wako, kyiwaṟi mbonyi-tso tsiwe kuṙo-pfo.
Ngyesa, shoka ṟukonyi lyimwi yechiiṙima iwuta mṟinga okyeloṙa na mṟinga okyesuka?
Wana wa wama wako, ngyesa, mfumu ochiiṙima iwika seituni, ang'u msabibu iwika nduo? Nyi wuṙo shoka yechiiṙima iwuta mṟinga okyesuka na mṟinga okyeloṙa-pfo.
Nyi wui awoṙe wuṟango na imanya konyu? Naloṟe maṟunda gakye kui wuyendelyi wokye mcha, wuhoonyi wo wuṟango.
Kyaindi mukowaṙa wunyeng'i wo nyashi na maluyano mrimenyi konyu, maa mulakuiring'ishe, maa mulaṙeṙe wongo kui iwingana na loi.
Wuṟango-wo chi wulya wuwukyie wuye-pfo, indi nyi wo wuyana, wo mbaṟe ya kyimndu na Satana.
Kyipfa handu hawoṙe wunyeng'i na maluyano, nyi ho-ndu hawoṙe kyituṟu, na orio kyindo kyiwicho.

Kyaindi wuṟango wuwukyie wuye, kya kuwooka wuwucha, ngoseṟa nyi wo ufoṟo, nyi wo wuhoo, wukuṟeyeṟie iaṙanyia maṙeṙo ga wandu, wuichuo isaṟia na ndunda ngyicha, wuwoṙe wuṟiingyi maa wuwoṙe wukulembecheṟi-pfo.
Na ndunda tsa wusumganyi tsekyeṙongo ufoṟonyi na walya wekyewuta sha ufoṟo.
Shiṙa nyi kwi shiwuka, na ngapano tsikyeri konyu nyi kwi tsiwukyie? Chi kunu langonyi tsanyu tsekyeende shiṙa shiwungonyi shanyu-pfoe?
Muilanga maa muwoṙe kyindo-pfo; muiwaaga na inyeng'a, maa mochiiṙima iwona-pfo. Muiende shiṙa na ikapana, maa muwoṙe kyindo-pfo kyipfa muiterewa-pfo.
Muiterewa mulawone cha kyipfa muiterewa uwicho, kundu muṟunde nasho ko lango tsanyu.
Lanyoe waṟui, muichi kye iwaṙa mbuya na wuyana nyi iwaṙa kyituwa na Ruwa-pfoe? Kyasia orio mndu akundi iwaṙa mbuya na wuyana nekyewa nawaṙa kyituwa na Ruwa.
Ang'u mokusaṟa kye shiṟeio shiṙeṙa wulya? Mumuyo-cho ekyekaa mrimenyi koṙu chi nekyelulanga mṟasa iluwaṙia wunyeng'i-pfoe?
Kyaindi nekyelutarama soe isaṟia lyiengyeṟikyie; koikyo nekyegamba, “Ruwa nekyewingana na walya wekyekuṙosa, indi nekyeenenga isaṟia wekyekutitiṟa.”
Kyasia indienyi Ruwa. Legenyi Satana, na oe nemṙicha.
Tikyirenyi ko Ruwa, na oe netikyira kufuhi na nyoe. Sanjenyi mawoko ganyu kyimṟumoe, nyoe wanyamaṟi, na isanja mrima yanyu nyoe wakulembecheṟi.
Sokyionyi nyi fowa na ikapa ṟanyi na ifiiṟa. Iseka lyanyu lyiilachikye lyiwe ikapa ṟanyi, na ichihiyo lyanyu lyiilachikye lyiwe iwihiyo.
Kutitiṟenyi ushangunyi lo Ruwa kyiyeri muiterewa na oe nemuenenga kyiṟumi.
Wana wa wama, maa mulairiane wongo. Moiria mono-wamae wongo, ang'u ianduya mono-wamae, nekyeiria wongo na ianduya uwawaso. Kyaindi koanduya uwawaso, noṙa iindia na iwooka ianduya.
Nyi Ruwa amonyi tikyi ekyewika uwawaso na nyi oe moanduya wandu. Nyi oe echiiṙima ikyiṟa na irumatsa. Iyoe nyi wui uianduya mndu ungyi?
Kyasia-ng'u, nyoe mokyegamba, “Inu ang'u ngama luiṙa na mṟinyi mlyiwe na ikaa pfo maka umwi, na ikapa mbucha na iwona kyiira;”
kyaindi muichi kyindo kyiwutika ngama-pfo. Moo onyu nyi kyikyi? Nyoe nyi kyimwi na mtsu okyewono kyiyeri kyifuhi, numa ulawono-se.
Kyiwechia igamba, “Mndumii kakunda, lulandepfe lochiwika kuṙi ang'u kuṙi.”
Kyaindi wulalu muikuiring'isha makushelonyi ganyu. Ikushela lya mbaṟe-i iyi nyi lyiwicho.
Kyasia ulya aichi iwuta mecha, indi alawute kuṙo, icho nanyamaṟia Ruwa.
Kyasia-ng'u, nyoe wanjama! Fiiṟenyi, mugambe kyelewui kyipfa kya matuuro gaicha na konyu.
Masaa ganyu gamaporu, na nguwo tsanyu tsingyilye nyi mashinu.

Sahapu tsanyu na shindo shanyu sha woguru wung'anyi shikyindie ukoe, na ukoe-lo lomuṟingyishia, na mmbiu yanyu yechinyamaṟika cha ilyi nyi ikoṟo nyi moṙo. Mulekooma kyiseyesoe mfirinyi ya mafurumionyi.
Kumbuonyi wori wo waṟundi walesambuo shilyimu shanyu mulalewataa. Aṙanyienyi chandu waifiiṟa. Kyifiiṟo kyawo kyileaṙanyio nyi Ruwa.
Ikaa lyanyu wuyanenyi nyi lya ichihiyo na ikushela. Mulekuwegia cha mfiri ulya Ruwa echianduya wandu woose.
Muleanduya mndu msumganyi na immbaaga, maa chandu alaiwingana na nyoe.
Koikyo, wana wa wama, karishienyi, mṟasa icha lya Mndumii. Ambuyenyi chandu mṙemi ekyeweṙelyia shilyimu sha woguru wung'anyi. Nekyekarishia kyipfa kyasho mṟasa mvuo tsa kuwooka na tsefurumia tsikape.
Na nyoe karishienyi muṟingyishie mrima yanyu, cha kyipfa icha lya Mndumii lyatikyira kufuhi.
Wana wa wama, maa mulanunuwiane, mulacheanduyo. Ambuyenyi moanduya nagoṟokyi mbele ya moongo.
Wana wa wama wako, weonguo shisuku walya waleende ndumo ya Ruwa nyi mfano mcha o wandu walekarishia matuuro.
Ambuyenyi, lokyegamba wagusu walya walesimiria. Muleicho mbonyi tsa wusimiri wo Yobu, mulewona mafurumionyi ga Mndumii kye Mndumii nyi nawoṙe isaṟia na iwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi.
Kyaindi ngoseṟa ya shoose, wana wa wama wako, mulalye nyamu, kui Ruwewu maa kui uruka; maa kui mbaṟe ingyi yoose; indi yee yanyu iwe yee, na ote yanyu iwe ote, kundu Ruwa alamuanduye.
Kokooya mndu o konyu naolokyio nyi fowa naterewe ko Ruwa. Kokooya nawoṙe mrima mkyesi naimbe shiimbo sheana.
Kokooya mndu o konyu naluoe nalage wameeku wa siṟi; wamterewie na imshia mafuṙa kui rina lya Mndumii.
Kokooya wameeku-wo waiṙikyia kye Ruwa neaṙanyia kyiterewo kyawo, ulya aluoe nechikyiṟo. Ruwa nemmbiyiṟia pfinya maa kokooya anyamaṟie nechihooṟio.
Tochianenyi ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, na iterewiana, muiṙime ikyiṟo. Iterewa lya mndu msumganyi lyiwoṙe kyiira mnu.
Elyiya nawei mndu o mbaṟe imwi cha soe, kapfuṟukana iterewa ko loi kundu mvuo ilakape, na mvuo ilekapa ko maka iṟaṟu na mori iṟandaaṟu-pfo.
Katerewa-se na mvuo tsikakapa na shilyimu shikaṙo.
Wana wa wama wako, kokooya mndu o konyu aṙetsa njia ya wukyiṟo, na mndu ungyi kamtarama iwuya;
manyenyi kye ulya motarama mṙeko iwuka njienyi ya wuṙetsi, nechikyiṟa mrima okye na upfu, na ishikyia wuingyi wo ngyuunyamaṟi.
Inyi Petiro, ngyikyeri msu o Yesu Kristo, ngaṟeia paruo-i ko wasambuṟe wanyanyaṟikyie ipfo na ipfo, wekyekaa cha wayenu ngyuurukyenyi tsa Ponto, na Galatia, na Kapadokyia, na Asia, na Bitinia.
Chandu Ruwa Awu alesonguo imumanya kui imuilyisha nyi Mumuyo, mṟasa mukoiṙima iindia na inyanyatsio samu ya Yesu Kristo. Isaṟia na ufoṟo shiengyeṟo konyu.
Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, ulya kui isaṟia lyakye alelufee lya kawi kundu luwone ikusuria lyiwoṙe moo kui iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo iwuka ko wapfu.
Luwone na kyioṟa kyilekyenyamaṟika, kyilawoṙe ukoe, kyilekyesia, kyilekoomo ruwewu kyipfa kyanyu.
Na nyoe mokyeringo nyi pfinya tsa Ruwa kui njia ya iiṙikyia mṟasa muiṙime iwona wukyiṟo wuwuṟeyeṟe wuloṟo kyiyeri kya mafurumionyi.
Muichihiyo mnu kyiyeri-kyo, maa chandu wulalu ko kyiyeri kyifuhi, kokooya kyiwaṟi iwa kuṙo, mowoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kui shiyesho sha mbaṟe tsifoi.

Kundu kye iyesho kui iiṙikyia lyanyu, lyilya lyiwoṙe woguru wung'anyi kuta sahapu yekyenyamaṟika, maa chandu sahapu-yo yekyeyeṟo kui moṙo; muambilyie iṟumisho na kyiṟumi mfiri ulya Yesu Kristo echiloṟo.
Na oe mumkundi, maa chandu mulammbonyi; ulya maa chandu mulammbonyi wulalu, mumwiṙikyie; na ichihiyo mnu, kui sia ilekyewono, iwoṙe kyiṟumi.
Kyiiṙi kya ichihiyo lyanyu wulalu Ruwa naimukyiṟa, ikyiṟo lyikyeri ndunda tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu lyikyeri kui Yesu Kristo.
Ko mbonyi tsa wukyiṟo-wo weonguo shisuku walepfula-pfula na isoruo-soruo, walya waleonguo shisuku ko mbonyi tsa isaṟia lyechimukooya nyoe.

Wakapfula nyi kyiyeri kyiha, na nyi kyiyeri kya mbaṟe iha kyileikyimbo nyi Mumuyo o Kristo awekyeri mrimenyi kowo, ulya alesonguo iṟingyishia matuuro Kristo echienengo, na kyiṟumi kyekokyikyeri pfo numa ya isho.

Wakaloṟo kye chi kyipfa kyawo wawenyi-pfo, indi kyipfa kyanyu waleṟunda ipfo shindonyi, shilya wulalu shalosho konyu na walya walemuongoya nyoe Ndumi Ngyicha kui Mumuyo Mweele aleṙumo iwuka ruwewu. Shindo-sho malaika walangyie ishimanya.
Koikyo kuṟeyeṟenyi na iwaṙa meena; mochiweṙelyia nakamwi isaṟia lyilya mochiwona kyiyeri Yesu Kristo echiloṟo.
Cha wana wa wuindi mulakufananyishe na lango tsanyu tsa mawookyionyi, tsa wutondo wonyu;
indi chandu ulya alemulaga nyoe ai mweele, nyoe na nyoe wenyi waele mkaṟonyi onyu oose.
Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Mochiwa waele kyipfa inyi ngyimweele.”
Na kokooya mokyemlaga Awu, ulya ekyeanduya wandu kulawoṙe ikundia, iṙuana na iṟunda lyakye, chumienyi kui wuowu kyiyeri kya ikaa lyanyu iha cha wayenu.
Na nyoe manyenyi kye mulekyiṟo chi kui shindo shekyenyamaṟika cha heleri ang'u sahapu-pfo; muiṙime iwuka mkaṟonyi onyu ulawoṙe kyiira muleuambilyia ko waku wanyu;
indi kui samu ya woguru, cha ya kyiondo kyilawoṙe tewe, ya Kristo.
Na oe nalemanyika loi wookyia mawookyionyi, wuyana wulandegumbo; kyaindi naleloṟo mafurumionyi ga shiyeri kyipfa kyanyu.
Ulya kui oe mowa wandu waiṙikyie Ruwa, alemṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu kamuenenga kyiṟumi; mṟasa iiṙikyia lyanyu na ikusuria lyanyu lyiwe ko Ruwa.
Mukomuilyisha mrima yanyu kui iindia wuloi, mṟasa iwaṙa ikundana cha wana wa wama kulawoṙe wukulembecheṟi, kyasia pfuṟukanenyi ikundana kui mrima.
Cha kyipfa muwafee lya kawi; chi kui mbeu yekyenyamaṟika-pfo indi kui iya ilekyenyamaṟika; kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyiwoṙe moo, lyekyekaa ho mṟasa mlungana.
Kyipfa,
“Mmbiu oose nyi cha maṟa,
na mng'ano ocho nyi cha kyiwaṟo.
Maṟa gekyeuma na shiwaṟo shekyeoloka.
Indi Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii lyechikaa mlungana.”
Na Ṙeṙo-lyo nyi mbonyi tsilya ngyicha tsileongoyo konyu.
Kyasia, ṙenyi wuwicho na ngyeṟo, na wukulembecheṟi na wunyeng'i na iiria wengyi shindo sha wongo.
Chandu wana waionga wakundi maruwa ga wamawo, muwaṟi orio mfiri ilanga kyelya kya mrima kyilakyisanze-sanze na kyindo kyingyi. Mukolya kyelya-kyo kya mrima moching'ana na ikyiṟo,
kokooya mosonja kye Mndumii nyi monyi isaṟia.
Yendenyi kokye oe, ai igoe lyiwoṙe moo, lyilelego nyi wandu, indi ko Ruwa nyi lyilyisambuṟe, lyiwaṟi iindio.
Na nyoe, cha magoe Ruwa agaenengyie moo, muwawikye muwe numba ya Mumuyo, wukohanyi wuele, muwute shiṙaso sha mrima, shichihiṟie Ruwa, kui njia ya Yesu Kristo.
Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie shiṟeionyi shiele,
“Ngawika kulya Sion igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi,
lyilyisambuṟe, lyiwaṟi iindio,
na orio mndu amwiṙikyie echirigo nyi sonu-pfo.”
Kyasia, iindio-lyi nyi konyu nyoe muiṙikyie. Indi ko walya walaiṙikyie kyikyiṟeie,
“Igoe lyilelego nyi wewika numba,
lyawa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.”
Lyingyi-se,
“Ilyi nyi igoe lyeenenga wandu ikapa ṙende,
na iṟaṟa lyeolotsa wandu.”
Cha kyipfa kui Ṙeṙo lyilya wekyekapa ṙende, walalyiiṙikyie nawo walewiko ho kundu waambilyie shindo sha mbaṟe-yo iyo.

Indi nyoe nyi kyishari kyisambuṟe, wukohanyi wo kyimangyi, isanga lyiele, wandu wa wuchilyi wo Ruwa, muiṙime ionguo mbonyi tsa mawuto gakye ga maṟiyisho. Ulya alemulaga muwukye meemenyi muiṙe na ngyeelenyi yakye ya maṟiyisho.
Nyoe ipfo mawookyionyi muwei chi isanga-pfo, kyaindi wulalu nyi isanga lya Ruwa; mukyeri wandu mulawoṙe isaṟia, indi wulalu mowona isaṟia.
Wakunde, ngyimuterewa cha wandu waiiṙa na wakyaro, lekanenyi na lango tsa mmbiu tsekyewingana na mrima.
Muwaṙe mkaṟo mcha kyiyeri mukyeri na walya walaiṙikyie Yesu, kundu kokooya wekyemuiria kye mowuta shindo shiwicho, wakaambuya mawuto ganyu mecha, waṟumishe Ruwa kyiyeri-kyo Yesu echicha lya kawi.
Oshenyi orio kyindo walya wawoṙe wuchilyi wagamba, kyipfa kya Mndumii. Kokooya nyi mangyi, muindienyi cha mndu awoṙe wuchilyi wung'anyi.
Kokooya nyi wasongoru waindienyi cha wandu Ruwa awaṙumie itaa kyiṟaache walya wekyewuta shindo shiwicho na iṟumisha walya wekyewuta shindo shicha.
Cha kyipfa nyisho shindo Ruwa akundi. Kye kui iwuta shindo shicha mushingye maṙumbu ya wutondo ga matondo.
Cha wandu walawachilyie nyi kyindo, kyaindi walekyekusuria ikyo kui iṟika wuwicho, indi cha waṟundi wa Ruwa.
Indienyi wandu woose. Kundenyi woose waiṙikyie Yesu. Terewenyi na iowuo Ruwa. Enengyenyi mangyi kyiṟumi.
Lanyoe waṟundi, indienyi wandumii wanyu kui wuowu wung'anyi. Chi walya wawecha na wahoo tupu-pfo, indi maa walya walang'a.
Kyipfa iwu nyiwo wucha wukundio, mndu echikarishia fowa kui ikumbuo Ruwa, kyiyeri alyiso wukyiwa kui ionio.
Cha kyipfa nyi kyiṟumi kyiha ikarishia? Nyi ilyi monyamaṟa na ikapo ngofi? Kyaindi ikarishia, kyiyeri mowuta shindo shicha na ilyiso wukyiwa, iwu nyiwo wucha wuwukunde mbele ya Ruwa.
Cha kyipfa nyiwo mulelagio; kyipfa Kristo na oe nalelyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kyanyu, kamuṙeea mfano, muoshe ndifo tsakye.
Oe alenyamaṟa, maa iwaṙa ngyeṟo-pfo.
Oe kyiyeri alelahio, alelahia-pfo; kyiyeri alelyiso wukyiwa, aletaa kyiṟaache-pfo; indi nalekuṙambika ko ulya ekyeanduya kui wusumganyi.
Oe amonyi naleṙuo ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu mmbiunyi kokye msalabenyi o wunyamaṟi na ikaa chandu Ruwa akundi; kyipfa Kristo alekapio msalabenyi nyoe mowaṙa moo o kyimrima.
Cha kyipfa muweiṙeka cha moondo; kyaindi wulalu mowiyilyia Mlyisi na Moambuya mrima yanyu.
Nyoe waka, indienyi wamii wanyu; kundu kokooya kuwoṙe walaiṙikyie Ṙeṙo, waiṙime ilyiiṙikyia kui mkaṟo ya waka wawo kulawoṙe igamba kyindo;
wechiambuya mkaṟo onyu mcha, na o wuowu.
Ikuchopa lyanyu, lyilawe ikuchopa lya kyanja, cha ioka njui, iṟaa sahapu na iṟaa nguwo.
Indi lyiwe wucha wo mrimenyi wulekyewono; shindonyi shekuchopa shilekyenyamaṟika; wucha wo mrima o wuhoo na wuramiri, wuwoṙe woguru wung'anyi ushangyunyi lo Ruwa.
Kyipfa kuṙo nyi wuṙo walekuchopa waka waele wa kacha, walekusuria Ruwa, na iindia wamii wawo.
Chandu Sara aleindia Abrahamu, kamlaga Mndumii; na nyoe nyi wana wakye, kyiyeri mowuta shindo shicha, maa muleowesho nyi wuowu woose-pfo.
Nyoe wasoṟo, kaenyi na waka wanyu kui wuṟango, muichi kye mka nyi kyiiya kyifafa; na muwe cha weoṟa hamwi na isaṟia lya moo, kundu iterewa lyanyu lyilashingyio nyi kyindo.
Ulogo lo furumia nyi ilu, muwaṙe makusaṟo gamwi, mukyeri wandu wekyewoniana wukyiwa, wakundanyi cha wana wa mka, mochiwihiyo kyipfa kya wukyiwa wo mndu ungyi, wapfereri.
Wandu mulekyetaa kyiṟaache ang'u ilahia ulya amulahia indi wandu wekyewikyia mboṟa; cha kyipfa isho nyisho mulelagio kundu muoṟe mboṟa.
Cha kyipfa,
“Ulya akundi ikaa na sia,
na iwaṙa mfiri ngyicha,
naringye ulumi lokye lulaṙeṙe shindo shiwicho,
na mshimbo yakye ilaṙeṙe ngyeṟo.
Na naṙe mawicho, nawute shicha,
napfule ufoṟo mnu.
Kyipfa meso ga Mndumii gekyeambuya wasumganyi,
na maṙwi gakye gekyeaṙanyia shiterewo shawo.
Indi Ruwa akundi wekyewuta mawicho-pfo.”
Na nyi wui echimmbutia kyindo kyiwicho, kokooya mopfuṟukana iwuta shindo shicha?
Kyaindi kokooya molyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kya iwa wasumganyi muwoṙe sia ing'anyi. Maa mulaowuo iowesha lyawo, maa mulaiṟewe mrimenyi; indi ilyishenyi Kristo Mndumii mrimenyi konyu.
Mukuṟeyeṟe orio mfiri igaluo orio mndu ammbesa mbonyi tsa ikusuria lyikyeri mrimenyi konyu; kyaindi kui wuhoo na wuowu.
Na nyoe muwaṙe makusaṟo mecha mrimenyi, kundu orio kyindo mochiirio, warigo nyi sonu walya wekyegamba kye mkaṟo onyu ummbicho maa chandu mulandewute kyindo kyoose kyiwicho.
Kyipfa nyi nanga ilyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kya iwuta shindo shicha, kokooya isho nyisho Ruwa akundi, kuta ilyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kya iwuta shindo shiwicho.

Cha kyipfa Kristo na oe nalelyiso wukyiwa lyimwi tupu kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi woṙu, amsumganyi kyipfa kya walya walawasumganyi, kundu naluende na ko Ruwa; mmbiu okye ukowoogo, indi mrima okye ukoenengo moo.
Na kui mrima-cho kayenda ko mrima iwekyeri kyipfungonyi kawaongoya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa;
wandu walawewoṙe wuindi kyiyeri kya ipfo numa, kyiyeri Ruwa alewaweṙelyia kulawoṙe iwina lyilya Noe aleachikyia safina; safina ileenenga wandu nyanya ikyia iwoogo nyi mṟinga.

Mfano o shindo-sho nyi wupatiso, wokyemukyiṟa nyoe taa mfiri ya wulalu; (chi kui iwikyia kuleshi ukoe o mmbiu-pfo, indi kyaasa kyilya lokyewikyia Ruwa kya iafutsia shilya loteṟia, lukyeri wandu wekyeosha Yesu), kui iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo.
Na oe nakyeri kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa, nayenda ruwewu, echichilyia malaika na shindo shingyi shoose shiwoṙe pfinya kulya ruwewu.
Kyasia kyipfa mmbiu o Kristo ulelyiso wukyiwa, na nyoe ṟaenyi shisha sha makusaṟo galya galya awewoṙe; cha kyipfa oe mmbiu okye ulelyiso wukyiwa nalekana na wunyamaṟi.
Wookyia wulalu mulaengyeṟe iosha lango tsa mmbiu, indi oshenyi shilya Ruwa akundi, kyiyeri kyanyu kyitsugai kyekaa iha wuyanenyi.

Kyipfa kyiyeri kya moo yaṙu kyileiṙa kyishikyie iwuta shilya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyewuta; iwuta shindo shiwoṙe ukoe, na lango, na wunanzi, na shelya sha ilya na ielewetsa, na shindo shekyenanza, hamwi na iindia na iterewa mafano chandu kyilakyeri kya sungusinyi.
Shindo shekyeenenga wandu-wo walaiṙikyie iṟiyio chandu mulekyepfuṟukana iwuta shindo shilya shilya sha ukoe wung'anyi, wechimulahia.
Nawo wechionguo shindo walewuta ko ulya akuṟeyeṟie ianduya wai na moo na wapfu.
Kyipfa kya ikyo maa walya wapfiie waleongoyo Ndumi Ngyicha, kundu kye waanduyo kyimmbiu chandu wandu wekyeanduyo; indi wawaṙe moo kyimrima chandu Ruwa ai na moo.
Kyaindi mafurumionyi ga shindo shoose gakyeri kufuhi. Kyasia ṟanguonyi, mulae kyiṙombo mochiterewa.
Ngoseṟa ya isho shoose pfuṟukanenyi nakamwi ikundana; kyipfa ikunda lyekyeshikyia ngyuunyamaṟi tsifoi.
Muambilyiane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi kulawoṙe inuṟia;
orio umwi iṙuana na chandu aleambilyia kyisumbo, ṟundianenyi nakyo; cha waringyi wecha wa isaṟia lya mbaṟe tsifoi lya Ruwa.

Mndu kaṙeṙa, naṙeṙe chandu Ruwa akundi; mndu kaṟunda, naṟunde kui pfinya amwenengye nyi Ruwa; kundu Ruwa naṟumisho shindonyi shoose kui Yesu Kristo. Kyiṟumi na pfinya shikae na oe mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
Wakunde, mulaṟiyio kya wukyiwa wulya wukyeri konyu, wokyemukoṟa nyoe cha moṙo imuyesha, cha ilyi nyi kyindo kyiyenu kyacha na konyu.
Kyaindi chandu mulelya wukyiwa wo Kristo, chihiyonyi; kundu na kyiyeri kyiṟumi kyakye kyechiloṟo muchihiyo kui ikapa ngulyilyi na ngoru.
Mukowio kye mowuta shiwicho kyipfa kya rina lya Kristo nyi nanga; cha kyipfa Mumuyo o kyiṟumi na o Ruwa nakyeri na nyoe.
Mndu o konyu alalyiso wukyiwa cha mmbaagi, ang'u mbafu, ang'u mndu ekyewuta shindo shiwicho, ang'u cha mndu ekyekuwinisha na shindo sha wandu wengyi.
Kyaindi kyipfa nyi Mkristiano alarigo nyi sonu, indi naṟumishe Ruwa kui rina-lyo.
Cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyamshika kya ianduyo iwooka wandunyi wa Ruwa; na ianduyo lyikawooka koṙu soe, mafurumionyi ga walya walekyeaṙanyia Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa gechiwa kuṙa?
Na kokooya kyechiwa kyuumu ko mndu msumganyi ikyia, ulya alaowuye na iindia Ruwa na mnyamaṟi nechiwono kwi?
Kyasia walya wailyiso wukyiwa kui shilya Ruwa akundi waṙambikye mrima yawo ko Ruwa, kyiiṙi kya iwuta shindo shicha, cha ilyi nyi ko ulya agumbie shindo, ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia.
Ngyiterewa wameeku wa siṟi wakyeri konyu, inyi ngyikyeri meeku oṙiawo, na mṟingyishi o wukyiwa Kristo alelyiso, na ienengo kyiṟumi kyechiloṟo ipfo-ndu luiyenda;
lyisenyi poo lya Mndumii lyikyeri konyu, na ilyigoṟokyia. Chi kui iitiko-pfo, indi kulawoṙe iitiko, chandu Ruwa akundi, chi kui ikunda iwona heleri tsa sonu-pfo, indi kui ikuwuta nakamwi.
Maa chi cha wandu waikugaluo wandumii shikaṟonyi shawo-pfo, indi kui iloṟa mkaṟo mcha ko poo-lyo.
Na kyiyeri Mlyisi ang'anyi echiloṟo, mochiambilyia iṟikoso lya kyiṟumi, lyilya lyilekyenyamaṟika.
Na wuṙo nyoe wanakye, indienyi wameeku. Yee, nyoe moose waṙenyi wupfereri, muiṙime iṟundiana; cha kyipfa Ruwa nekyekapa walya wekyekuira, kyaindi nekyeenenga wapfereri isaṟia.
Kyasia pfererienyi wuchilyinyi wo Ruwa wuwoṙe pfinya, kundu namuṙose kui kyiyeri kyakye;
kunu mochimṙambika fowa tsanyu tsoose, cha kyipfa oe nekyekuwinisha mnu na shindo shanyu.
Muwaṙe meena na ilaa kyiṙombo; cha kyipfa mokyituwa onyu Mokyiriinzi, cha simba isepfuo, nekyetenga-tenga, echipfula mndu nammeṟe.
Na nyoe mmbingyenyi, mulailoloma iiṙikyienyi, muichi kye wukyiwa wulya wulya wukyeri ko wana wa wamanyu wakyeri wuyanenyi.

Na Ruwa o isaṟia lyoose, alemulaga nyoe iiṙa na kyiṟuminyi kyakye kya mlungana kyiiṙi kya Kristo, mukomlyiso wukyiwa kyiyeri kyitutu, oe amonyi nechimmbutia-se orio kyindo muwaṟi iwutio, na imuenenga pfinya.
Wuchilyi wo Ruwa wukae ho mlungana na mlungana. Amen.

Silyiwano, mono-wama ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia, naṟeia paruo-i handu hako. Ngamuṟeia shindo shaangu, iikyimbia na iṟingyishia kye ilyi nyilyo isaṟia lya loi lya Ruwa. Goṟokyenyi isaṟienyi lya Ruwa kulawoṙe iloloma.
Oṙianyu msambuṟe iha Babelyi namuiṟikyiṟa, na Mariko, mono-ko.
Iṟikyiṟanenyi chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
Ufoṟo lukae konyu nyoe moose, muwalungye na Kristo. Amen.
Inyi Simion Petiro, ngyikyeri mṟundi na msu o Yesu Kristo, ngaṟeia paruo-i ko walya walewona iiṙikyia lyimwi na soe, lyiwoṙe woguru, wusumganyinyi wo Ruwa oṙu, na Mkyiṟa Yesu Kristo.
Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo luengyeṟo kyiiṙi kya imanya Ruwa na Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
Cha kyipfa wuiṙimi wokye wo kyiRuwa wuleluenenga shindo shoose shiwaṟi moo na iowuo hamwi na iindia Ruwa, kui immanya oe alelulaga kui mng'ano okye na wucha wokye amonyi.

Lyingyi-se ko isho naleluenenga shaasa shing'anyi mnu, sha woguru, kundu kye kui ikyo muiṙime iwa hamwi na walya wawoṙe mkaṟo o kyiRuwa, mochikyiṟo iwuka wunyamaṟinyi wukyeri wuyanenyi kyipfa kya lango.
Yee, na kyipfa kya ikyo mochipfuṟukana mnu ura lonyu, iiṙikyienyi lyanyu, wikyenyi ho na wucha, na wuchenyi wonyu wuṟango.
Na wuṟangonyi wonyu meena, na meenenyi onyu wusimiri; na wusimirinyi wonyu iowuo na iindia Ruwa.
Na kyiiṙi kya iowuo na iindia Ruwa, ikundana lya wana wa mka; na kyiiṙi kya ikundana lya wana wa mka, ikunda.
Kokooya shindo sha mbaṟe-i-iyi shakaa konyu na iingyikyi, shemuenenga nyoe iwaṙa wuragari na ikumbia ndunda ngyicha, kui imanya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Kyipfa ulya alawoṙe isho nyi kyipfupfuṟe, echiiṙima iwona shindo shikyeri kuleshi-pfo, nawaṙima kulya iyeṟemtso maṙeko gakye ga kacha.
Koikyo wana wa wama, pfuṟukanenyi ngoseṟa ikarisha ilago lyanyu na isambuṟo lyanyu; kyipfa mukowuta isho mochikapa ṙende-pfo.
Kyipfa kuṙi mochitaramo ienengo iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo mlungana wo Mndumii oṙu, Mkyiṟa oṙu Yesu Kristo.
Koikyo ngyikusurie imukumbuṟa isho mfiri yoose, maa chandu mushiichi na iṟingyishio kyiiṙi kya loi mukyeri nayo.
Na inyi ngyiwonyi nyi sungusinyi, ko kyiyeri-kyi ngyikyeri na moo, iwapaaya-paya kui iwakumbuṟa.
Ngyiichi kye ipfa lyako lyiafukyia iwinyi, chandu Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo alengyiloṟa.
Kyaindi ngyechipfuṟukana, kye ngampfa inyi muiṙime ikumbuo mbonyi-tso.
Kyipfa luleosha shindo shileṟeio kui wuṟango na ngyeṟo kyiyeri lulemmanyisha nyoe pfinya tsa Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo na icha lyakye-pfo; indi lulekolowona luwenyi wung'anyi wokye.
Kyipfa naleambilyia iwuka ko Ruwa Awu kyiṟumi na mng'ano, iho-ndu aleendio ṟui lyilewuka mng'anonyi ung'anyi, “Ichu nyi Mana oko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihie kyipfa kyakye.”
Na ṟui-lyo soe lulelyiicho lyechiwuka Ruwewu kyiyeri luwekyeri na oe fumvunyi lyilya lyiele.
Na soe luiṙikyie necha shilya weonguo shisuku wagambie, shilya nyoe mukoshiambuya necha, cha taa ilyimika meemenyi, mowuta necha mṟasa kyiyeri kochikya na nyenyeri ya ngamenyi iwaa mrimenyi konyu.
Mochimanya ulogo-lu kuwooka kye kuwoṙe ionguo shisuku shiṟeionyi lokyetambuluo chandu mndu mlyiwe akunda tupu-pfo.
Kyipfa ionguo shisuku lyichie na handu hoose chandu mndu akundi-pfo; indi wandu waleṙeṙa mbonyi tsiwukyie ko Ruwa, wechisongoyo nyi Mumuyo Mweele.

Kyaindi kulewuka weonguo shisuku wa wongo kyiiṙi kya wandu walya, chandu na konyu kochiwuka walosha wa wongo, wechiende kui wuṟango wo wuṙetsi malosho mawicho, wechilega maa Mndumii ulya alewakyiṟa, wechikuendie inyamaṟo lyiwukyie ko Ruwa.
Wafoi waiṙikyie wewuta shindo shifananyi na walosha-wo wa wongo. Na walya walaiṙikyie wakawona kuṙo, weṙeṙa mawicho kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lya Kyikristiano.
Kui lango tsawo ngyiwicho wechiwona kyiira kyipfa kya imuongoya mbonyi tsa wongo. Wookyia kacha Ruwa alemuwaanduya na iṙumbuo kya inyamaṟo lyawo. Ruwa ekyelaa-pfo, nechiwaanduya chandu agambie.
Mukumburie kye Ruwa naleanduya malaika walya walenyamaṟa. Nalewawiyitsa moṙonyi, kawawika shipfungonyi sha meema, waringo mṟasa kuche mfiri ulya o ianduyo.
Maa Ruwa alehooṟia wuyana wulya wo kacha-pfo, indi naleende Mfu onyamaṟa wuyana wo walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa. Walekyiṟo nyi Noe amonyi awekyeri msumganyi, na wandu wengyi mfungaaṙe.
Lyingyi-se, kaanduya mṟi ya Sodoma na Gomora echiinyamaṟa kui moṙo, kaiwika iwe kyiṟingyishio ko wandu walechiiṙikyia Ruwa numa ya ishi,
kakyiṟa Loti, ulya msumganyi alesokyio nyi fowa mnu kyipfa kya wuwicho wo wanyamaṟi-wo.
Kyipfa mndu-chu msumganyi akyeri kyiiṙi kyawo, kui iwona na iicho, nalekutuura mrima okye uwoṙe wusumganyi, mfiri kui mfiri, kui mawuto gawo galawoṙe uwawaso.
Kyasia, Mndumii naichi ikyiṟa wandu waowuye na ikunda Ruwa iwuka shiyeshonyi, na ikooma walawoṙe wusumganyi kyiiṙi kya iweṙelyia ianduyo mṟasa mfiri ulya o ianduyo.
Na ngoseṟa walya wekyeosha mmbiu langonyi tsa mbonyi ngyiwicho na imina wawoṙe wuchilyi.
Walosha-wo wa wongo wawoṙe wukari na makushelo, wekyelahia malaika wa Ruwa maa wekyewaindia-pfo. Indi malaika wawoṙe pfinya kuta walosha-wo maa wekyegamba shindo shawo mbele ya Mndumii-pfo.
Kyaindi iwo kyimwi cha mando ga saka galawoṙe wuṟango, walefeo cha mando ga saka tikyi wakyeri nyi wewaṙa na iwoogo, wechilahia Ruwa shindonyi walashiichi, wechirumatso irumatsonyi lyawo.

Wechiwona mawicho gakyeri wori wo wuwicho wowo, wakusaṟie kye iosha lango tsa mmbiu kulawoṙe wuowu nyi ichihiyo. Wawa nyi wunyamaṟi na sonu, wechilosha lango tsa wuyana tsilawoṙe meena shelyenyi shawo sha ikunda, ilyi wekyeachikyia shelya hamwi na nyoe.
Wawoṙe meso gaichuo wuṟui, wandu walekyeṙa iwuta wunyamaṟi, wekyelemba mrima ilangyikarishe, wawoṙe mrima ingyiichiwiṟe ilanga, wana wa seso.
Wechiṙa njia ngyigoṟotsu, wakaṙeka; wechiosha njia ya Balaamu, mana o Beori, alekunda wori wo wuwicho;
kyaindi naleṙeṙio kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi wokye amonyi. Nzoi ilaichi iṙeṙa, yechiṙeṙa kui ṟui lya mndu, ileshingyia wusuko wo moonguo shisuku ulya.
Iwa nyi kyimwi na shoka tsilawoṙe mṟinga na mapuchi gaiṙoo nyi kyiwiṟi. Ruwa nawaṟeyeṟie handu mlungana meemenyi ung'anyi.
Kyipfa wekyeṙeṙa maṙeṙo gekushela na galawoṙe kyiira, na kui lango ngyiwicho tsa mmbiu yawo wekyelemba walya waleṙicha mawicho na lango tsa wuyana.
Wechienenga kyiteṟio kya wongo wandu wengyi nawo wawenyi nyi watumo wa wuwicho, kyipfa mndu kawingo nyi mndu ungyi nekyewa mtumo o mndu ulya.
Cha kyipfa walya walemṙicha mawicho ga wuyana kui imanya Mndumii na Mkyiṟa Yesu Kristo, kokooya wawoṙo-se na iwingo, mbaṟe yawo ya mafurumionyi gawo nyi ingyiwicho kuta iya ya kuwooka.
Kyipfa nyi-we nanga kowo walawechimanya njia ya wusumganyi, kuta iimanya, numa iṙa iwawaso lyilya lyiele waleenengo.
Kyaindi kyawa kowo kyimwi na mfano ulya o loi, kyite kyawiyilyia mṙeeko okyo kyimonyi, na nguwe ilesanjo yawuya ikufoga-foga toombonyi.
Wakunde, paruo-i nyi ya kawi ngyimuṟeia nyoe. Ipfo paruonyi tsiwi ngyilepfuṟukana iamtsa makusaṟo mecha mṙoenyi konyu kui imukumbuṟa mbonyi-tsi.
Ngyikundi muiṙime ikumbuo shindo shilya shileṙeṙo kacha nyi weonguo shisuku waele; na iwawaso lyilya lya Mndumii na Mkyiṟa lyileendo nyi wasu wanyu.
Mochimanya kuwooka kyindo-kyi kye mfirinyi yefurumia wandu wekyetaluo wechicha na italuo lyawo, wekyeosha lango tsawo wawenyi,
na igamba, “Nyi kwi kyikyeri kyaasa kyilya kya icha lyakye? Cha kyipfa wookyia kyiyeri-kyo waku waṙu walepfa, shindo shoose shikyeri chandu shiwei, wookyia wuyana wulegumbo.”
Kyipfa wekyeshinga meso gawo walawone kyindo-kyi kye kuwewoṙe ngyina wookyia kacha, na uruka taa, lulugumbe iwuka mṟingyenyi, kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
Ko isho wuyana wulya wo kyiyeri kyilya wulenyamaṟo nyi mṟinga, wukorumara.
Kyaindi ngyina tsa wulalu na uruka shingyikoome kyiseyesoe kui moṙo, kui Ṙeṙo-lyo ilyo, shechiringo mṟasa mfiri o ianduyo, na kui irumara lya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
Kyaindi, wakunde, mulawaṙime kyindo-kyi, kye ko Mndumii mfiri umwi nyi kyimwi na maka kyiku, na maka kyiku nyi kyimwi na mfiri umwi.

Mndumii ekyekyelyio iafutsia kyaasa kyakye, chandu wandu wengyi wekyekusaṟa kya ikyelyio-pfo, kyaindi nekyesimiria konyu, kyipfa akundi mndu oose naṙekye-pfo, indi woose waiṙime iwona iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.
Kyaindi mfiri o Mndumii ochicha cha mbafu. Mfiri-cho ngyina tsechirumatso kui ndiṟimo tsing'anyi, na orio kyindo kya wuyana kyechikoṟo na irumatso, na wuyana na shoose shikyeri pfo shesenekyia.
Kyasia, cha kyipfa shindo-shi shoose sherumatso kuṙo, kyamukooya nyoe muwe wandu wa mkaṟo ya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya ichumia lyanyu lya wuele na iowuo na ikunda Ruwa,
mochiweṙelyia mṟasa mfiri ulya o Ruwa uche, mochiuitika, na kyiiṙi kya mfiri-cho ngyina tserumatso tsechiunguo, na shindo sha wuyana shechisenekyia na isalaa?
Kyaindi chandu kyikyeri kyaasa kyakye, luiweṙelyia ruwewu ngyihya na uruka luhya, shikyeri kye wusumganyi wochikaa kyiiṙi kyasho.
Koikyo, wakunde, kyipfa muiweṙelyia mbonyi-tso, pfuṟukanenyi kundu muwono ufoṟonyi kye muwoṙe ṙeko maa sonu mbele yakye-pfo.
Na nyoe talenyi wusimiri wo Mndumii oṙu kye nyi wukyiṟo, chandu na mono-wama oṙu mkunde Paulo aleṟeia kui wuṟango aleenengo.

Na wuṙo paruonyi tsakye taa, echionguo pfo mbonyi-tso. Kyiiṙi kya paruo-tso kuwoṙe mbonyi tsikyeri kye nyi kyuumu itsimanya, na mbonyi-tso wandu walawoṙe wuṟango, walagoṟokyi sungusinyi, wekyetsionguo mbaṟe ingyi, chandu wekyeweonguo mbaṟe ingyi shiṟeio shingyi, kui irumatso lyawo wawenyi.
Kyasia, wakunde, mukosonguo imanya isho, kuringyenyi mrima yanyu, mulacheṙoo nyi maṙeko ga wanyamaṟi-wo, mukooloka na iṙa kyilya muiṙikyie.
Kyaindi ng'anenyi isaṟienyi, na kyiiṙi kya imanya Mndumii oṙu na Mkyiṟa Yesu Kristo. Mng'ano ui kokye wulalu na mlungana.
Lumuṟeia nyoe mbonyi tsa Ṙeṙo lyekyeende moo, lyiwekyeri pfo wookyia mawookyionyi. Ṙeṙo lyilya lulelyiicho, lulelyiwona kui meso gaṙu, lukolyiambuya, na mawoko gaṙu gakalyipaaya-paya.
(Na moo-cho uleloṟo, na soe luleuwona; lyingyi-se luiṟingyishia, na imuongoya nyoe moo ulya o mlungana, uwekyeri ko Awu, ukoloṟo koṙu.)
Lumuongoya nyoe Ṙeṙo lyilya lulelyiwona na ilyiicho, kundu na nyoe taa muiṙime ikaa hamwi na soe; na ikaa lyaṙu handu hamwi nyi hamwi na Awu, hamwi na Mono-kye Yesu Kristo.
Na ishi lushiṟeia, kundu sia yaṙu iafutsio.
Na itsi nyitso mbonyi luleicho ko Yesu, na itsionguo konyu, kye Ruwa nyi ngyeela, maa meema oose ukyeri kokye-pfo.
Lukogamba kye lukyeri handu hamwi na oe, kyaindi lukowaṙa mkaṟo ya meema, loṙeṙa wongo, maa luiwuta kyikyeri kya loi-pfo.
Indi lukowaṙa mkaṟo ya ngyeela, chandu oe akyeri ngyeelenyi, lokaa handu hamwi soe, na samu ya Kristo, Mono-kye, yalusanja wunyamaṟi woose.
Lukogamba kye luwoṙe wunyamaṟi-pfo, lokulemba luwenyi, maa kuwoṙe wuloi koṙu-pfo.
Lukotochia Ruwa ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, oe nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia na namsumganyi mṟasa naluwute ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, na ilusanja wuwicho woose.
Lukogamba kye lunyamaṟie-pfo, lomgaluo oe mndu ekyeṙeṙa wongo, maa kyilya agamba kyikyeri koṙu-pfo.
Wana wako, ngyimuṟeia ishi kundu mulawute sha wunyamaṟi. Na kokooya mndu awuta kya wunyamaṟi luwoṙe Moluterewia ko Awu, Yesu Kristo awoṙe wusumganyi.
Na oe nyi oe moluwuta ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu; chi ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu tupu-pfo indi na tsa wandu wa wuyanenyi koose.
Na kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye lomanya Ruwa, kokooya loosha shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba.
Ulya aigamba, “Ngyimwichi,” kyaindi alaoshe shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba, nekyeṙeṙa wongo, maa wuloi wukyeri mrimenyi kokye-pfo.
Kyaindi ulya ekyeosha malosho ga Ṙeṙo lyakye, icho mrimenyi kokye ikunda lya Ruwa lyikyeri pfo loi. Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye luwalungye na oe.
Ulya aigamba kye namlungye na Ruwa, kyimmbaṟi iwuta kuṙo chandu Yesu alewuta.
Wakunde, ngyimuṟeia iwawaso lyihya-pfo, kyaindi iwawaso lya kacha muwekyeri nalyo wookyia mawookyionyi. Na iwawaso-lyo lya kacha nyi mbonyi tsilya muleicho.
Lyingyi-se ngamuṟeia iwawaso lyihya; mbonyi tsikyeri loi kokye na konyu; kyipfa meema uiṙa na ngyeela iya ya loi yamlyimika.
Ulya aigamba kye nakyeri ngyeelenyi, na oe nasuuye mono-wama okye, nakyeri meemenyi mṟasa wulalu.
Ulya akundi mono-wama okye, nekyekaa ngyeelenyi, maa mrimenyi kokye kuwoṙe kyindo kyetewe-pfo.
Indi ulya asuuye mono-wama okye nakyeri meemenyi, lyingyi-se naichumia meemenyi, maa aichi kundu aiyenda-pfo, cha kyipfa meema omgaluo kyipfupfuṟe.
Ngyimuṟeia nyoe wana wako, cha kyipfa mohooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu kyipfa kya rina lyakye.
Ngyimuṟeia nyoe waawu, cha kyipfa momanya ulya akyeri pfo wookyia mawookyionyi. Ngyimuṟeia nyoe wanakye, cha kyipfa mowinga ulya mmbicho. Ngamuṟeia nyoe wana, cha kyipfa momanya Awu.
Ngamuṟeia nyoe waawu, cha kyipfa muichi ulya akyeri pfo wookyia mawookyionyi. Ngamuṟeia nyoe wanakye, cha kyipfa muwoṙe pfinya, na Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyikeri mrimenyi konyu, na nyoe mowinga ulya mmbicho.
Maa mulakunde wuyana, maa shindo shikyeri wuyanenyi. Mndu kakunda wuyana, ikunda Ruwa kukyeri mrimenyi kokye-pfo.
Orio kyindo kyikyeri wuyanenyi, lango tsa mmbiu, na lango tsa meso, na moo okyeenenga wandu ikushela, shekyewuka ko Awu-pfo, indi shekyewuka wuyanenyi.
Na wuyana wuisia, hamwi na lango tsa wuyana-wo, indi ulya ekyewuta shilya Ruwa akundi nechikaa ho mṟasa mlungana.
Wana wako, nyi kyiyeri kya mafurumionyi; na chandu muleicho kye mowingana na Kristo naicha, maa wulalu wewingana na Kristo wafoi wamuwoneka. Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye nyi kyiyeri kya mafurumionyi.
Walewuka koṙu, indi wawei wa koṙu-pfo. Kyipfa kokooya wawei wa koṙu, wawekaa hamwi na soe. Kyaindi walecha kundu waloṟo kye chi woose wai wa koṙu-pfo.
Muwapusie Mumuyo Mweele na nyoe moose muichi.
Ngyilemuṟeia nyoe kyipfa mulaichi kyikyeri loi-pfo, indi cha kyipfa muichi kyilya kyikyeri loi, lyingyi-se kye kuwoṙe kyoose kya wongo kyekyewuka ipfo kyindonyi kyikyeri loi-pfo.
Nyi wui ai moṙeṙa wongo sile ulya ekyekana kye Yesu nyi Kristo? Icho nyi oe mowingana na Kristo, ulya ekyekana Awu na Mana.
Orio mokana Mana awoṙe Awu-pfo. Moiṙikyia Mana nawoṙe Awu taa.
Kyasia nyoe, ikyo mulekyiicho wookyia mawookyionyi, kyikae mrimenyi konyu. Kokooya ikyo mulekyiicho wookyia mawookyionyi kyikyeri mrimenyi konyu na nyoe mochikaa ko Mana, na ko Awu.
Na ikyi nyikyo kyaasa aleluenenga, moo o mlungana.
Ngamuṟeia ishi ko mbonyi tsa wandu walya wakundi imuṙetsa nyoe.

Na nyoe, Mumuyo Mweele muleambilyia kokye ukyeri mrimenyi konyu, maa kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kya mndu imulosha nyoe-pfo; kyaindi chandu Mumuyo okye uimulosha mbonyi tsa shindo shoose, lyingyi-se nyi loi maa chi wongo-pfo, na chandu ulemulosha, kaenyi kokye.
Na wulalu, wana wako, kaenyi kokye, kundu ilyi echiloṟo, luwaṙe wukari na wuṟango, maa lularigo nyi sonu mbele yakye kyiyeri kya icha lyakye lya kawi.
Kokooya momanya kye oe nyi msumganyi, manyenyi kye orio mndu ekyewuta shindo sha wusumganyi namfee nyi oe.
Kumbuonyi nyi ikunda lya mbaṟe iha Awu aleluenenga, kye lulago wana wa Ruwa; na nyi wuṙo lukyeri. Kyipfa kya ikyo wandu wa wuyana waluichi-pfo, cha kyipfa walemanya Ruwa-pfo.
Wakunde, wulalu lukyeri wana wa Ruwa, maa kyilandemanyikye chandu lochiwa-pfo; kyaindi luichi kye kyiyeri Kristo echiloṟo, lochiwa cha oe; cha kyipfa lochimmbona chandu akyeri.
Na orio mndu awoṙe ikusuria-lyi kui Kristo nekyekuilyisha, chandu oe akyeri mweele.
Orio mndu ekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi, nawuta kyindo kyiwicho; cha kyipfa wunyamaṟi nyi kyindo kyiwicho.
Na nyoe muichi kye Kristo naleloṟo, kundu naluwute ngyuunyamaṟi; na wunyamaṟi wukyeri kokye-pfo.
Orio mndu ekyekaa kokye ekyewuta kyindo kya wunyamaṟi-pfo; orio mndu ekyewuta kyindo kya wunyamaṟi, ammbonyi maa amwichi-pfo.
Wana wako, mndu alamulembe. Mndu ekyewuta sha wusumganyi nawoṙe wusumganyi, chandu Kristo awoṙe wusumganyi.
Mndu ekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi nyi o Satana; cha kyipfa Satana nekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi wookyia mawookyionyi. Kyipfa kya ikyo Mono-Ruwa naleloṟo, kundu nanyamaṟe maṟunda ga Mokyiriinzi.
Orio mndu amfee nyi Ruwa ekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi-pfo, kyipfa kyishari kyakye kyikyeri kokye; maa echiiṙima iwuta sha wunyamaṟi-pfo kyipfa namfee iwuka ko Ruwa.
Kyipfa kya ikyo wana wa Ruwa waichio na pata, na wana wa Mokyiriinzi taa. Mndu oose alekyewuta sha wusumganyi awukyie ko Ruwa-pfo, maa ulya alakundi mono-wama okye.
Kyipfa itsi nyitso mbonyi muletsiicho wookyia mawookyionyi, kye lukundane.
Lulawe cha Kaini awekyeri o Satana, kawaaga mono-wama okye-pfo. Na oe nalemmbaaga kyipfa kya kyikyi? Cha kyipfa mawuto gakye gawemawicho, na galya ga mono-wamae gawei ga wusumganyi.
Wana wa wama wako, mulaṟiyio, wandu wa wuyana wakamusuo.
Soe luichi kye lomuiṙa iwuka upfunyi iiṙa na moonyi, cha kyipfa lukundi wana wa wama kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Ulya alakundi, nakyeri upfunyi.
Orio mndu mosuo mono-wama okye nyi mmbaagi; na nyoe muichi kye orio mmbaagi awoṙe moo o mlungana mrimenyi kokye-pfo.
Kui ikyo lomanya ikunda, cha kyipfa Kristo nalereka moo okye kyipfa kyaṙu. Kyiluwaṟi na soe ireka moo oṙu kyipfa kya wana wa wama-wo.
Kyaindi mndu kawaṙa kando ka kunu wuyanenyi, naaho kawona mono-wama okye alawoṙe kyindo, alamtarame, ngyesa ikunda lya Ruwa lyakaa kuṙa mrimenyi ko mndu-cho?
Wana wako, lulakunde kui ṙeṙo, maa kui ulumi-pfo, indi kui mawuto na wuloi.
Kyipfa kya ikyo lochimanya kye lukyeri wa loi, na soe lochiwiyiṟia mrima yaṙu moo mbele yakye,
kokooya mrima yaṙu iluanduya; cha kyipfa Ruwa nang'anyi kuta mrima yaṙu na oe naichi shoose.
Wakunde, mrima yaṙu ilandeluanduye, luwoṙe wukari na wuṟango ko Ruwa.
